item.text: dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud/
rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya mahA rA ga kr-iSha ma ra d+ha ra tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud/ 'jam dpal gsin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang brdal khyab chen po na/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i
gzhal yas ni/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ rtsa ba nas ra ga rak+Sha chags pa'i rba glong 'khrug cing 'khyil ba/ rak+ta 'khrug pa sbabs brer la/ rak+ta brag gi mi reng bsam gyis mi khyab pa
'jigs pa'i gar byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas bse'i sdig pa dmar po kha dgu mig dgu pas sems can gyi srog klom pa/ gser gyi rus sbal la mtshon cha'i spu yod pa/ nyi zla
'bar ba'i mig yod pa/ lto ba nas srid pa gsum gyi bla tshe 'khyams pa/ rak+ta chags pa'i rlabs ni 'khrug cing 'khyil ba'i dbus na/ thod pa brtsegs pa las grub
pa'i mkhar/ bse'i mdung 'khrol ba/ mi ro mang pa'i rgya mtshan 'phyar rked pa nas rlung nag gi 'khor lo ni/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang nag gi phyogs bcur 'thor ba/ srid pa'i rlung nag
las grub pa'i sprul pa/ rlung nag rol ba'i bu gnod sbyin 'bum dar nag gi g.yab 'dor ba/ steng na gnam lcags 'phar ba'i thog gi tsha tshar 'phro ba/ gnam lcags thogs gi 'od
zer las/ gnam lcags kyi mda'i 'phen ba dang/ 'khor lo bsgreg ldan gyi mda' 'phen pa dang/ mtshon cha 'khrug pa'i char pa rgyun du 'bab pa/ phyogs mtshams thams cad nas ro

myags dur khrod stong stong yod pa/ dur khrod kyi tshal re re na ma mo bye ba dgu khri dgu khri yod pa/ sprul pa bye ba sa yar 'gyed ba/ shin tu gdug pa 'chang zhing yangs pa/ mtshon cha 'khrug ba'i tshar pa dang/ skad mi

snyan bar grags pa/ dri mi zhim ba/ ro langs pa dang/ ro bdug mnam pa/ ro rab tu kha ba/ dur khrod kyi rgyan de dag dang re re la las kyi srin bo dang srin mo sha za ba dang// khrag 'thung ba dang/ dbugs 'phrog

pa dang/ mdangs len pa dang/ sha rus longs spyod pa dang/ 'thub pa dang/ gshog pa dang/ spyags pa'i glu len pa dang/ stag dang/ bya rog dang/ khra dang/ sha ba dang/ spyang ki dang/ dom dang/ dred dang/

gzig dang/ seng ge dang/ sre mo dang/ byi la dang/ stag rgod dang/ phag pa dang/ sbrul dang/ de dag la sogs pa ni shin tu nga ro mi snyan pa/ sdug pa'i sgra skad rab tu sgrogs pa'o// rab tu 'jigs pa gdul

bya'i gnas de na ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khro mchog ya mAn ta ka zhi ba kun tu bzang po mnyam pa nyid kyi sku las/ las kyi gnod sbyin dregs pa 'dul ba'i don du sbyin dregs ba can gyi tshul bzung ste/ gser

gyi mdog rin chen dbyibs 'dra ba'i sku nyid chu nag gi sprin nag 'dra ba/ gdug byed kyi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams te/ dur khrod rgyan dang ro nyes spras/ de'i tshe ye shes dang las kyi lha mo 'bum gtso mo// gtso mo
nyid kyi g.yon 'khod pa/ las byed 'bum gyi gtso mo yang/ lha mchog nyid kyi g.yas na rab tu khros par bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor yang ye shes las grub pa'i 'khor dang/ gdug

byed ye shes kyi sprul ba dang/ 'jigs rten rlag par mdzad pa'i gshin rje ni/ phyi 'byung ba la dbang byed pa'i gshin rje dang/ nang phung po la dbang byed pa'i gshin rje dang/ gsang ba rig pa khrid pa'i gsin rje

dang/ bse'i gyad gtum po dang/ bse'i skyes bu drag po dang/ bse'i rol pa dang/ bse'i khye'u chung dang/ bse'i lha mo dang/ bse'i skyes pa dang/ rje'u dang/ blon po dang/ sprul pa dang/ bsam las 'das pa

ste/ dur khyi nag po dang/ lce spyang nag mo ro la rngam pa dang/ myos byed dang/ lkugs byed dang/ 'dzin ging dang/ sprul pa yang sprul dang/ rje mo dang/ yang rje mo dang/ blon mo yang g.yog mor bcas te/ la la ni

sha la za/ la la ni khrag la 'thung/ la la ni rus pa 'cha'/ la la ni ngu/ la la ni dgod/ la la ni mi sdug pa'i gar byed/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gom pa'i stabs rdeg/ la la ni gnam lcags 'phen/ la la

ni 'khor lo 'phen la la ni mda' 'phen/ la la ni srog la zhal gyis rngub ste/ kha nas kha rlangs dug gi chu 'bab/ mig nas khrag 'dzag/ dbugs zhe sdang gi me 'bar sna nas nad kyi na bun 'thul/ 'jig rten

khams la dbang byed pa'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na mthu stobs kyi bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje/ las kyi gnod sbyin mi 'grungs pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ karma khrag 'thung khros pa'i skur gyur te/ sku mdog smug nag ra ga
rak+ta'i mdog/ dpal 'bar chen mo'i mdun na gnas// 'jig rten dregs pa can gyi 'khor// gdug pas skyong zhing gtso bo mdzad// nyid las mi gzhan sprul bas gdug pa 'dul// lha klu las sogs 'jig
rten dreg pa can// dur khrod mchog gi gnas nas thabs cig go/ de nas yang de'i cho de'i dus na/ dpal 'bar chen po ya mAn ta ka de/ gdug pa can dang 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mi g.yo mi 'khrug par

bzhugs te/ oM sa ma ya Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka/ ha la tsakru/ pany+tsa rU pa ni/ kun lan rtsa sa ma ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la e a ra li ru lu
ru lu ru lu/ hring hring hring/ zhes gsungs pas gdug byed dregs pa'i 'khor de dag bred/ rab tu dngangs shing bred/ lus 'dar/ yid dngangs nas/ rab tu dngangs shing yid 'khrug dran pa'i sems stong ste/

rang rang gi srog ni gdungs pa'i shugs kyis brjod do// srog gi snying po phyung nas phul lo// ya ma ta du a ra ra sha shaha/ tsa dza rtsi tri/ tan ga phu/ bstan pa dam pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// dpal gshin rje
dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ drag po'i gleng gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso bo des stan las langs te/ dpal 'bar chen po khro bdag rje
la// bskor ba lan du mas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// srid gsum gdug ba tshar gcad nas// 'jam pa'i dpa' bos bzhugs pa de// de nyid bsgrub bar bya ba yi// las dang

bya ba bka' stsol mdzod// ces zhus pas/ dpal 'bar chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyin cig 'jig rten mgon po khyod// lnga brgya dus kyi nye dus su// dam sri dag gi bstan pa 'byung// rang gis rang gi bstan pa

'jig/ rdo rje nang dme byung ba yis// sngags kyi byin rlabs nyams par gyur// nad dang gdon du 'khrug pa yis// dus med cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung// de tshe nga yi dus yin pas// bstan pa nga yis gnas par

byed// dus gsum 'byung bar ma nges te// nga la su zhig thugs gtod na// lha mchog nyid du mngon du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nga la nyan bar brtson pa legs// 'jig rten gtso
bo legs par nyon// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// mnyam par rdzogs la yid bsam ste// yul la rten pas rtogs pa skye// snang ba stong pa dbyer mi phyed// rang bzhin rdzogs la dngos grub myur// snang la

'gag med rgyan shar bas// nga yi dngos grub 'dod pa des// sku mdog phyag mtshan nges med bsgom// gal te 'byung po dam sri ni// rang gi rgyud las lhar srid pas// bdag ces med pa'i ngang du bsgral// ces
gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma rig 'khrul rgyas rgyu lus la// bag chags khrig pa'i rten bcas nas// mi 'dod pa dag 'byung gyur bas// mtshan ma rdzogs pas gshed po lngas// las rnams

rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// gnas dus dkyil 'khor rdzas la sogs// grub pa'i sngags la sogs pa sbyar// nad 'khrug dam tshig nyams pa'i tshe// 'byung ba bshig phyir gshin rje rbad/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rang
srog gcad// bsnyen pa'i lha nyid bdud du dbab// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gleng bslang drag po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po
la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad zhus// kye ma dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// gdug ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// lho yi ro phyogs nyams 'jigs pa// shan ma ri la sogs pa ni// dur khrod shing gcig dur

khrod dang// brag dmar brag nag sa phug dang// nyams dga' ba yi gnas su bya// byang chub rtsal nas sems sbyangs te// bsnyen pa'i don du gsungs pa yi// zhi khro cho ga gzhung bzhin te// 'bras bu lnga la rten
bcas nas// sbyor sgrol mchod pas mnyes byas la// las kyi rim ba rdzogs par bya// khrus dang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la// shag gdab 'ben bca' go cha bstar// phyag rgya chen po'i sku rdzogs
pas// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// ku sha'i stan la sems par 'dug/ ris su bris sam 'bur du gtod// mig gi rten la yid bsam lha// sgo lnga rang so yul med gzhag/ be shing 'khar ba thogs nas

ni// bying nas rmugs bar gyur pa na// 'jam dbyangs khro bo'i 'dzab kyis bskul// g.yel zhing dgod par gyur ba na// mtshan ma lha yi sku la brtag/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka hU~M phaT/ khro rgyal rngam pa'i rgyal

po nyid// bdag dang dbyer med rdzogs pa'i sku// thugs ka'i hU~M las yi ge ni// 'khor lo'i tshul de rang rgyud sbyangs// klad pa sku dang mgrin dbugs gsungs// 'khor lo rdzogs pas 'phro 'du'i gnas// mtshon

pa'i sprin tshogs rgyas 'gyur ba// mtho gang las ni stong gsum gang// 'dod yon phul te byin brlabs bsdu// sngags nyid lha yi skur gyur pas// snang ba'i dus na skur gsal bas// stong ba'i dus na rdzogs pa

nyid// rgyu lus lha yi sku ru 'pho// ngag gis grag stong sngags su 'pho// sems nyid gsal stong chen por 'pho// sgrib pa gsum las rim par grol// nam mkha' bzhin te mnyam rdzogs che// 'khor lo thams cad
rdzogs par 'dod// dka' thub chen po byed pa na// gsad pa'i las kyi sngags yang gdags// sku gzugs bzhad dam 'gul ba'am// lung ston sgra 'am gzugs brnyan nam// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du
'byung// bstan par red nas dngos grub slang// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ yi ge 'khor lo rdzogs chen gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas dpal
'bar chen po la// 'jig rten gtso bos 'di skad gsol// kye ma dpal 'bar khro bdag ni// bsnyen pa de ltar rdzogs gyur nas// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par bya// de skad gsol pa btab pa

dang// dam tshig bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag dang// gsar rnying yi dgas grong khyer na// gdug pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis// rdo rje 'gros dang stang thabs bya// grong khyer
bshig pa'i sa dag las// rak+Sha khrag gis chag chag gdab// gzhan gyi thal chen ma yin pa// rang gi don du bsgrub pa yi// thal chen gyis ni bri bar bya// gnam sa gnyis la thig btab pas// dkyil 'khor
rnam gnyis lhun gyis grub// dur khrod gzhal yas phun sum tshogs// dbus ni gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar la gru chad ser// 'khor lo brgyad dang zla gam dmar po bzhi// thod 'phreng me ris rab
tu mdzes// dur khrod rgyan dang rdzogs spras la// rab tu 'jigs par dpa' bos bri// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa'i// rdo rje dpa' bo'i tsham rngam gyis// bgegs bskrad rdo
rje'i gur chen dbub// sgra rnams brdung zhing nga ro yis// dam can mkha' 'gros sprin ltar gtibs// tshogs phud de dag mnyes byas la// ris su bris sam blugs su blugs// tsa ka li la sogs pas
dgram// yig 'bru srog dang 'dra bas dgod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas phur byin brlabs dbang bskur ba// bskyed pa'i sngags bri dar lce'u gdags// dbyings nas spyan drangs

dbyer med bstim// so so'i rtsa ba'i drag sngags las// dgyes shing brtan par bya ba ni// gshed phur nyid la lcags phur te// de 'dra sor tshad bcu gnyis pa// ma mo gnyis dang sgrol ging la'o// thar byed brgyad
dang drag phur re// yang sngon re dang brag la bya// bse ti dun ti ba ti dang// go ti la sogs phur rdzas so// glon ma la sogs bla rkun ma// dgrol bdag la sogs dgod dang bsam// ya mAn ta ka la sogs

pa'i// yab yum sras dang bcas pa yis// ru tra sgrol zhing 'gugs par byed// sku stod khro rgyal 'jigs pa las// smad ni lcags phur dpal dang ldan// zhal nas phur bu'i 'dzab zlos pas// nyi shu bzhi dang rtsa
ba bzhis mdzes// rten bca' 'ben bca' thun yang bca'// 'brub khang chas gzhug spung phur bca'// bsgrub dang drag po'i gtor ma bca'// dngos grub la sogs tshe rten bca'// las kyi sbyor ba sbyar skabs

la// zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang sbyar// mngon spyod dag dang 'gug pa dang// dbye bskrad mnan dang smyo 'phros dang// las ni gsang ba'i sngags dang sbyar// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// chos

rnams kun gyi rtsa ba byang chub sems// spros ba'i mtshon cha mi mnga' ba'i// rtog med spros bral chos dbyings ni// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin spros dang bral ba la// rig pa spros bral mi rtog
pas// chos sku bde ba chen po'i klong// chos nyid kun khyab ye nas don// ma rtog sems can 'khor ba la// snying rje nam mkha' lta bu'i 'od// skye ba med las sems nyid a// a yi cho 'phrul byin rlabs

las// 'byung ba dbang chen sa bon spros// yum chen lnga yi mkha' klong nas// thugs rje 'byung ba'i yig 'bru las// gru gsum mthing nag gzhal yas shar// dregs pa khyo shug nyi zla mdzes// a las sprul pa'i hU~M
nag ni// stag gzig dug gi 'phro dang 'dra// spros 'dul thugs mtshan nyid las ni// dpal 'bar khros pas gshin rje gshed// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// gyad kyi dor stabs yi dgas
gnon// g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal// be con dgra sta stir dbyug g.yas// sdigs mdzub mthe'u chung thod rlon g.yon// ko rlon g.yang gzhi sham thabs dang// thod 'phrel sprul dang me

ris brgyan// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// dbang bskur byin gyis rlob dang sgom// de don yang dag nges bshad pa// skye med sems nyid don dam lha// de yi ngang las

sku gsal ba// mtshan ma'i lha zhes bya ba ste// de las sprul pa las kyi lha// de ltar gsal ba'i sems nyid de// snying po byang chub sems zhes bya// sems la 'gyur med rtag chen sdu// de nyid ngang gi stong pa

nyid// ro langs khro mo dpal 'bar ma// thig le gsang sngags sa bon rgyu// de nyid don dam stong pa nyid// gdug pa 'dul phyir zhe sdang khros// rtsa ba'i sa bon rgyu dang bral// 'jam dpal khros pas gshin rje

gshed// thugs sprul gshin rje ma ru rtses// bdud ni srin mo ma ru rtse// dur khrod khrag la rol pa'i phyir// snang srid rak+ta'i gzhal yas su// sku mdog dmar nag khrag rul mdog/ drang srong khros pa'i cha byad
can// be con 'khor los dgra bgegs sgrol// bse mo snying zan ma ru rtse// blon mo yang blon la sogs pa// dpag tumed pas bskor bar bsam// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim bskyed de// ye shes dkyil
'khor spyan drangs mchod// dus bzhi ma yengs brtson 'grus kyis// yang dang yang du bya ba min// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa'i// thugs kha la sogs gnas dag tu// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i thig le klong// bcud
kyi dam pa 'di nyid la// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'dod// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ dngos grub chen po rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen
po la// 'jig rten jo bos yang dag bshad// kye ma'o 'jigs byed chen po lags// dngos grub chen po rdzogs mdzad pas// rdzogs dang 'pho ba byang sems gang// de la yang dag bshad bya ba// stong ba nyid
las sku ru gsal// 'gro don thugs rje rdzogs pa la// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can// klad pa sku yi 'khor lo la// mgrin pa gsung la snying kha thugs// lte ba yon tan 'khor lo la// gsang ba'i

'phrin las 'khor lo la// stong pa nyid las skur gsal ba// tsit+ta gsang ba'i ga'u ru// ye shes 'jam dpal rdo rje nyid// 'khor lo rdzogs dang yig 'brus brgyan// chos nyid 'khor lo rdzogs rtsar 'dod// bde

chen 'khor lo rdzogs rtsar 'dod// bde chen 'khor lo rdzogs tshul gyis// gsang ba ya ma ra tsa'i sku// gzugs snang 'ongs spyod rdzogs par mdzad// logs spyod chen pos si ra gnyis// thugs rje chags tshul
ma ru rtses// sgra snang sprul ba'i skur rdzogs mdzad// gzhi stengs yon tan rdzogs pa yi// sprul ba nyid la 'khor la rdzogs// ye shes myos byed 'bar bas ni// yon tan ye shes klong du
rdzogs// gsang ba rdzogs pa'i me rlung nyid// thogs med ral pa tshar dgu yis// kun nas rdzogs pas don 'grub ste// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa'o// ye shes sems rdzogs gzugs dkyil du// kha

dog lnga ldan yig 'bru lnga// sa pa ta tsa ru la// a li drug pas brgyan pa ste// A li ban tsas spros pa nyid// gcig la lnga rdzogs ye shes rtags// 'jigs pa'i bdud 'joms 'gro drug bcod// nyon mongs lnga
nyid rang sar grol// thogs med ngos gzung med pa dang// 'gyur med 'gag med gsal stong 'od// ma bris dkyil 'khor rdzogs che'o// rang 'od rang snang yig 'bru+u la// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i yig 'bru

la// ma rtogs sems can rang rgyud sbyang// rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gdeng ldan nyid// 'khor lo ye nas rdzogs pa'i don// dug lnga ye shes rdzogs pa che'o// 'byung ba lnga 'dus phung pa nyid// longs spyod rdzogs pa
lha yi sku// ngang dang yid kyang de bzhin no// e ma ngo mtshar yang chen po// sku la bgres rgud mi mnga' gzhon// gsung la 'gag pa med pas bde// thugs la skye 'gag med bas gsal// 'phel 'grib med de

grol ba che// thog med bkag med rdzogs pa che'o// de dag yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jam dbyangs rdo rje nyid gsal bas// rngam bar snang bas mi 'gyur ba// thig le rdo rje sems dpar 'pho// 'khor ba'i smag

rum mun bsal nas// chos dbyings rnamad ga byang chub che// mkha' ltar dag pas sems nyid dngos// klad pa sku yi 'khor lo yi// bde chen 'khor lo chen po ni// ma ra tsa'i sku gsal bas// rnam bar snang ba'i
sku ru 'pho// me long ye shes gsal ba che// mgrin pa gsung gi 'khor lo la// 'phags pa ma ru rtse gsal bas// snang ba mtha' yas sku ru 'pho// chags pa ma 'gag so sor rtogs// lte ba yon tan chen po'i
dkyil// myos byed 'bar bar sku gsal bas// yon tan rang byung rang rol bas// rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru 'pho// mnyam nyid ye shes zang thal che ho// gsang ba 'phrin las 'khor lo la// ral ba tshar dgu

gsal ba las// don yod grub pa'i sku ru 'pho// ma brtsal ye shes 'gro don rdzogs// skye med dbyings las sku gsal lha// gsal ba yengs med ting 'dzin srog/ dgongs bas klong du sgrol bas snying// snang la
rang bzhin med par rdzogs// gzhi la skye ba med pa'i dkyil// rang 'byung 'gag pa med par 'khor// stong pa byang chub sems nyid yum// rang 'byung rig ba shar gsal yab// zung du 'phel bar gnyis med
srog/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// don dam srog gi spros bral te// rnal 'byor nyams la 'byor pas thob// kun rdzob sku gsung thugs gsal te// ting 'dzin ye shes
rdzogs pa ho// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad
zhus// kye ho dpal 'bar khro bo'i bdag/ bsam pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// don de dkrug pa'i dgra byung na// de la ji ltar gsal ba las// de nas yang dag bshad
bya ba// ting 'dzin gsang sngags drag po'i rdzas// 'byor pa rnam pa gsum du sdeb// skad cig bdag gam rim pa yis// 'jigs sku mthing nag me dpung 'bar// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// mthing nag
gyad kyi 'jigs tshul can// rigs lnga'i khro bo dbu la brgyan// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' mthing// mgur nas zhabs kyi long bu ru// shes rgyud khro thung mtshon gang ba// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo

bsnams// de las sprul ba'i 'do zer gyis// mtshon cha 'khor lo'i me dbal sngags// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// srid pa gsum yang 'gug par nus// ra las rak+ta mahA las// snang srid khrag mtsho khol

mar bsam// badzra kro d+ha yak+sha ma ru rtse// 'jigs pa'i sku mdog dmar la gtum// be con 'khor lo phyag na bsnams// de nas sprul ba'i bse mo dang// gyad kyi dmag dpon la sogs bsam// chos kyi rgyal po

la sogs pas// nyi zla 'khor lo ltar bzhon nas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// snang ba 'di dag rab tu bskor// lcags kyu khengs par rab bsgom ste// dza yi sbyor bas 'gug bar 'gyur// kha kha ru lu
la sogs pas// 'jig rten rme dud thog pa yis// 'jigs rten khams rnams khengs bsam nas// phaT kyi sbyor bas byed par 'gyur// gang dag lha klu mi la sogs// gzir cing mnan par 'dod na yang// ri

rgyal rbab dang lcags thog 'dras// mgo 'gas lus la sher btab bsgom// trig nan sbyor bas gzir bar 'gyur// ri rab rgya gram dag dang ni// gling bzhi gling phran lha yi dpal// stong gsum gling bzhi ri rab

dang// 'phro 'du lha yi gzhal yas su// lha tshogs pho brang gtams pa dang// don yod grub pa'i pho brang dang// lam dang nan gyi sbyor ba yis// srid pa gsum yang non par 'gyur// rdo rje khro bo gsal ba

dang// mtshon cha 'khrig pa'i ga pu dang// rdo rje lcags kyu ldan pa yis// hur thums dza yi sbyor ba yis// dregs pa'i srog snying 'phrog bar 'gyur// e ni 'bar ba'i spar lug dang// gdub rtsub 'khrig shing hom
khung du// dza la ram gyis sbyor ba yis// mngon snang dngos med sreg par 'gyur// ral gri spu gri 'khor lo dang// mar ya'i sbyor pa thams cad sgrol bar nus pa yin/ zhes gsungs so// de nas
yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba yi// thugs kha la sogs gnas gsum du// sku gsum yig 'bru de nyid sngags// rab tu mgal me 'khor lo'i tshul// dril bu'i sgra ltar rgyun mi 'chad// 'od
zer nyi ma lta bu ste// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma sprul te// bde gshegs mchod la byin brlabs lus// bdag dang sems can rtog sgrib sbyang// de nyid drag bo'i las kyi dus// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo nyid du

bsam// di nyid ma ru rtse sogs la// khros pas rang rang 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs la// rang rang yig 'bru bzhi bzhi ni// ya ni sngo nag dag la 'khor// de yis 'khor lo bsgyur pa yin/ zhes
gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra de// lus ni 'byung ba las grub pas// ci 'dra ci gsal bsgoms pa yis// snying khar yi ge ni dmar bsam// de la mtshon cha'i yi ge
ni// ma ra ya yis bskor bar bsam// rang gshed yin pas ral gri bsam// drag sngags 'khor lo 'phros pa yis// rang srog de nyid gcod par bsam// 'jigs byed las kyi gshin rje dang// dmar nag ma
mo mang po yis// sha rid dag la sbrang 'dus 'tshal// hab hab thun thun 'dus par bsam/ kha rlangs nad kyi rang bzhin gyis// rtsa rnams khengs te myos bar bsam// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme
rgyud las// mtshan ma brjod pa rdzas kyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'bar ba chen po des// drag po'i sngags kyis nges par bshad// 'phags pa'i nang nas 'jam dpal nyid// lha mo'i nang

nas 'od zer can// las byed nang nas dza ti ma// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum gyis bskor// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na gang yang 'grub// de bsgom de nyid bod rbad sngags// o sa ma yA Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya man ta

ka/ ban tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka ka ma rU pa hU~M phaT/ ta a/ nri ya man ta ka ka la rU pa nri drongs shig/ shrI te kro ha ha/ shrI ni dza ya khaM thums// nr-i dzA 'gal byed sod/ klag byed gtso khang

khang thums// oM sa ma ya ma 'dzu gug ta hU~M/ a nu rA ga ya mA na ta ka hU~M/ de phyi thums thums// he sra ha dam dam/ sa ma ya gu gu dul/ ya mAn bam rim rbad rbad/ sod chod sod chod/ gtum mo ro langs

'jigs pa'i gzugs// de nyid de bsgom bod rbad gsang// oM many+dzu shriHya man ta ka u tsu Sh+ma kra tra spe ta li/ muM kro d+hi shwa ri/ rag sha yag sha dzA dza/ snying kha rag b+h+yo/ nag mo snying rtsa ma b+h+yo/ khrag la mu sha ma

b+h+yo// nag mo ting lam b+h+yo/ nag mo ting ting kA la rag mo b+h+yo/ dum ru ma la dum bu/ tsa ru ra dum bu/ khra su kha kha thums// dam tsi ru// dus ya na rbad/ sgeg ma khro ma ral gcig ma// de nyid snying po

'di dag go/ oM many+dzu shri ya mA na ta ka/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dzA/ trag rag sha mu/ snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ kha 'gram mu 'grum b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo ru tra rbad/ rag sha rbad/ snying rtsa rbad/ kha thun rbad/ tsi

ta rbad/ ma ra ya rbad/ thal phyung thal phyung// ma thun ma ma thun// rbad du rbad du/ du yaM/ tsi ta yang/ ru thums sa ma ya raM thu/ thuM pu ru/ ru thu ya na rbad/ hU~M du hU~M phaT rbad/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang las sngags

dang// dmod pa'i sngags dang gsang sngags dang// ma lus de nyid yin pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ bye ba sngon du 'gro bar rigs// ri
rab rdul du rlag pa dang// rgya mtsho dag kyang skam par nus// gnam lcags ser ba dbab pa dang// bzlog pa dag kyang thog pa med// khros na bdud kyang brlag byed la// ltas pa tsam gyis dgra yang
rung// dga' na sems can gso ba dang// 'khor ba dong yang sprug bar nus// sngags kyi don nyid lha yin te// lha yi yang bzhin sngags nyid do// des na bskyed pa med yang ni// lung las chu bur rdol ba
bzhin// snying pos yan lag rdzogs par gsal// de nyid bsnyen dang skyed pa ni// rig pa can gyis de shes bya// sgrub pa'i dus su sil bu 'am// yang na dril la bzlas par bya// yi ge rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo

ni// gshed po la sogs thugs la gnas// grangs dang mtshan ma dus las ni// mtshan ma mthong na de nyid yin// yab yum sngags kyi grangs thim yang// lha yi mtshan ma ma mthong na// sngags kyi dam tshig nyams

srid pas// lhu lhums bsil la brgya gshags bya// de tshe mtshan rtags mngon du ster// des kyang rtags rnams ma byung na// gsang sngags sil bur lto nas bzlog/ ru khug ru nyal ru nyal dang// ru bzlog drag
pos gnad la dbab// gzhug la dam tshig brdar la gzhag/ lha nyid gnad la dbab pa ste// kun gyis bya ba ma yin te// las rnams rdugs nas bya ba yin// mi 'gro 'gro bar bya ba yin// mi 'grub 'grub bar

bya bar ba ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum khros 'jigs pa ya ma ra// drag po'i gsang sngags 'di dag go/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA tsa sa do me ya/ yaM yaM thums/

gshin rje nag po snying po snying khrag la dun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtsa rtsa la hur bug la thums srog la ma ra ya/ tri ling shang ka du/ tri dza yag sha/ rbad phu/ phye ma kha bdar ru ru pra sbra dum dum shig/ dgra bo ni ma ra ya tsa tsa ra
rbad/ drag sngags gsang ba'i las dag yin// yag sha me dbal srog bdag che// sngags bdag 'khor los thugs la gnas// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud
las// gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po la// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad zhus// he he dpal chen 'bar bdag khro// las kyi gshin rje'i srog sngags gang// de la
yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum khro mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yi dgas sha za'i ded dpon po// gdon gyi yang bdud ma gdon 'khol// sha khrag srog dbugs mnga' bdag po// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs

pa// mun nag 'khyil ba'i nang shed na// 'od phung nag po 'phros brjid pa// nyi zla 'khor lo zer zhon nas// srid gsum nyul zhing bla rtse 'phrog/ sprul pa bdun brgya nyi shu gcig/ dug mtsho mer ba'i nang na

gnas// pho gshed sum brgya drug cu gcig/ nyi ma'i rta la rab zhon nas// nyin dus rgyu zhing phung po 'joms// mi gshed sum brgya drug cu ni// mun pa'i glog dmar zhon nas su// mtshan mo rgyu zhing 'byung ba

'joms// yang sprul bye ba dgu khri gcig/ dug mtsho mer ba'i bar na gnas// chibs su klu glang nag po zhon// sku la lcags kyi shun khrab gsol// thod pa zhing chung sbrul gyis brgyan// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo phyag
na bsnams// de dag srog snying dam pa ni// 'phrul yig sum cu rtsa gcig la// bkod pa'i yig 'bru bcu bdun yin// bod pa'i gzung yig 'bru gcig ste// rnam shes ya ni sngo nag go/ ye shes lha dang 'jig

rten pa// de dag kun srog dam pa de// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+she ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya/ oM hriSh+t+rIH wi kr-i ta na na hU~M sa ma ya/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma ra tsa ma ma e ka dza ti dza

dzA/ tri ling shang ka du tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ tri sa du tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ 'bur khri gshin ni tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ ba tri kha yang zhug tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ 'dus tri tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ ra khri chum tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ bla khri shig tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/

snying la ya tsa tsa ra tsa du rbad/ oM many+dzu shrI a kro d+he ka kA la rU pa/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ d+hi sti ye krin a ne a ne a ne/ ya ma me d+ha k+She/ ra dza sa do ru Na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ dun ting kha la ya dgra bo'i snying la ya/
drag sngags 'khor lo ya ma'i srog/ srid gsum bla tshe 'joms pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu bshad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// ya mAn ta ka yab yum las/

sprul pa'i sras ni lcam dral lngas// gdug pa sgrol zhing sku+u la 'khor// kun gyis las mdzad sgrol ba'i ging// de dag drag sngags bshad bya ba// rnal ma rnams te srog la rngam/ srog la mer mer/ dpris la

chums/ thu bis thu dgra bo nri ma ra ya tsa tsa rA tsa rbad/ badzra kun d+ha ri dza dzA hU~M/ badzra shu lan he ri dza dza hU~M/ badzra kang ka d+ha ra dza dzA hU~M/ badzra tsa mun ta ri dza dza hU~M/ su tri pa ya badzra tsit+ta/ yo gI shwa ra/ ya

ma tsi ta hU~M/ ya ma tsi ta hU~M/ kyi khrid ra khrid ku ru ma shwa ro la khrag 'thung ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ krang he krang he/ ru ru ro ru tsa pa la nag mo re ma ti b+h+yo/ badzra yi sha ma ru rtse dun dun/ badzra mahA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ 'khor lo rdzogs

pa'i thugs kha ru// sa bon rgyu dang yig 'brus spras// srid gsum gang ba'i sprul pa spros// rak+ta khrag gi klong dkyil nas// 'jigs byed me dpung 'bar 'dra'i sku// ra ga rak+ta dmar nag 'jigs// snang srid

dbang gi sprul pa 'gyed// rdo rje be con rab tu brdeg/ g.yon pa mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'phen// rdo rje bse mo snying zan ma// rbal mo gdug pa chen mo yang// sku mdog gsal bas spro 'du bya'o// dpal gshin rje
dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ las kyi gshin rje bse gtor dang bcas pa'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten gtso bo des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma
rab tu 'jigs byed che// gsang sngags 'di nyid bshad 'gyur na// las dang bya ba bka' stsol mdzod// ces zhus pas/ nyon cig 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso// bstan pa dag la dgra dar ba// bsnyen bsgrub las
kyi mthar bya ba// dam sri gdug pa bsgral ba yi// sme phur bcas shing gdab ba dang// 'khor lo drag pos bsgral ba dang// zor thun drag pos bsgral ba'i phyir// mnan bsregs 'phang ba'i las mtha'
brtul// de la sme phur las bya ba// maN+Dal bcas rdzogs gong bzhin te// phur pa brgyad dang bcu bdun nam// yang na brgya dang rtsa gcig yin// de dag med na rgyud bcu'o// mgon po gshin rje'i lha ru
bsam// stod ni khro zhal 'jigs pa'i sku// smad ni drag por 'gyur ba'i dbal// de ltar bsam la gnas su dgod// byin brlabs dbang bskur skur gsal te// mi bzad phur pa nag po drug/ byin gyis
brlabs la ban d+har spung// sme phur bya ba sor bcu gnyis// ri rab ltar brjid zur brgyad pa'o// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgoms// phur pa sgrol ging bdag por bslab// zur brgyad las kyi gshin rje
brgyad// brgyad bdun dag la bse mo'i tshogs// dbal la phung byed ma mo gsum// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang// 'brub khung las kyi maN+Dal du// ling ga dngos su gsal ba dang// snying kha dag srog gi
gzhi// khrag gi dngas ma'i nang shed na// srog gi dngas ma yi ge nri// 'od kyi dngas ma yig 'bru gsum// de la nr-i nyid dza yi bar// dbug nyid bar bar khyibs khyibs gnas// de la dgongs pas phur ba
dril// de yang ting 'dzin 'di lta ste// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa de'i// snying kar bla mas bstim pa yi// ye shes sems dpar zhugs pa nyid// dam tshig srog gi lha yin pas// dam tshig

bsrungs na dngos grub rten// nyams na snying khrag 'jib pa'i 'dre// de la dam bdar mchod bshags la// dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed du gtang// lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pas// snying rtsa brgyad nas za bar
bsam// de la phur pa gdab par bya'o// yang ni 'od dang 'od zer las// 'go ba'i lha dang dbye bar bsam// tha ma lus sems rab phul la// bkrag dang gzi mdangs spug chu tshul// khong seng byang chub sems
pa'i lam don// ya ma rA dza'i spyi bor phyung// byang sems 'dra ba bdag la bstim// de yang dang po byin brlabs sems dpa' gshegs// gnyis pas 'go ba'i lha lnga dbral// gsum pas byang chub sems spyan

'dren// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i phung po de// de nas phur bas dus gsum gdab// bdag dag dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyis// yab kyi sngags kyis snying la gdab// oM tsin d+ha tsin d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tib ta tsakru hU~M

phaT/ oM badzra sa twa sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ che ge mo shig a be ya sha oM oM/ dgra bo nr-i ma ra yA/ ma ra du yA ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ tshal pa baM ril/ dam pa dum bu dum bu hU~M phaT/ dgra bo che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ mkhal rtsa

g.yon la ro langs gdab// ha sa nr-i sha rak+Sha ra se ta li hU~M oM oM/ phaT ka ma ra ya phaT/ nag mo rak+Sha snying rtsa la ya/ dgra bo che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ mkhal rtsa g.yas la dza ti mas// oM badzra ki li ki li ya/ ma ma

e ka tsa ti/ snying kha rag thum ril rbad/ shrI many+dzu ya ma ra dza ma ma e ka ti hri d+ha ya na/ kro ti shA ri snying kha raka tsa la rbad/ dgra bo che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ sgrol ging bdag pos klad pa la'o// oM rnal ma rnal te srog

la rngam gshol la/ mer mer dpris la thums thums pris thums lcags kyi skra/ tri ling shang ka du/ zi za yag sha rbad/ phu phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig che ge mo ni mA ra ya rbad/ oM ta na pA na/

rbad na rbad na/ rbad na rbud rbad na rbud/ snyong shos sha ya/ pri li pri li li/ ya ma snying la ya/ mgo la ya/ rtsa la ya/ dbugs la ya/ de nas bse mos gnas su gdab// pu tri sa ya/ dgra bo che ge mo ni shag rbad/

ba ra tsi ta che ge ni shag rbad/ ba ra tsi ta che ge ni shag rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge nra shag rbad/ ru ru pe ka tang ka te b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru pe dza ye bi dza ya b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru be a/ tsi ta b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ ru ru

be a pa ra tsi ta b+h+yo ni shag/ de nas blon mo rnams kyis gdab// oM badzra ud ka ra mu ti gri rna/ mu sri gri rna/ ka pi ra dza ya hU~M phaT/ ni shag rbad/ A be sha ya phaT/ ni shag rbad/ a phaT me ri kun d+ha li baM thum/

ni shag rbad/ khrag ti ma rA ya phaT ni shag rbad/ lce spyang nag mo dag dang ni// bse yi spyang mos gnas su gdab/ badzra ka li ma ma b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ badzra tsan d+ha ha la ha la hU~M/ ni shag rbad/ badzra

tsan d+ha tsan d+ha hU~M nri shag rbad/ kro ma tsa la/ kro ma dza la hU~M nri shag rbad/ ma ra dza tra ma ra ya dza tra hU~M nri shag rbad/ de nas srin mo bzhi yis gdab// mun lo dan ti b+h+yo/ ni shag rbad/ phral na phral na/ hU~M ni shag rbad/

phrag ni phrag ni hU~M ni shag rbad/ phra mo kha phra mo ka ni shag rbad/ srog gi shan pa brgyad kyis gdab// trag rag sha ni shag rbad/ ma rag sha ni shag rbad/ ba rag sha ni shag rbad/ mo rag sha ni shag rbad/ bya rag sha

ni shag rbad/ sug rag sha ni shag rbad/ he rag sha ni shag rbad/ mgrin rag sha ni shag rbad/ snying rag sha ni shag rbad/ de'i rting shugs sgrol drag sngags gdab// badzra d+ha ra yi ba shag rbad/ rbad na rbad mu khams

mug/ ni shag rbad/ d+ha ra ya ni shag rbad/ khaM ril rbad na ni shag rbad/ khug rngam ni shag rbad/ khro bo yang snying drag pos gdab// ha na ha na badzra ni shag rbad/ da ha da ha badzra ni shag rbad/ pa dza pa dza badzra ni shag

rbad/ ma tha ma badzra ni shag rbad/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra ni shag rbad/ su ru su ru badzra ni shag rbad/ mu ru mu ru badzra ni shag rbad/ ka ta ka ya badzra ni shag rbad/ dza ye bi dza ye ni shag rbad/ ma ra sa na pra mar ta na ye phaT
ni shag rbad/ 'bar ma bla nyul drag sngags brdeg/ he rag sha gre/ be rag sha me rag sha/ thibs su ril gnya' na thibs/ mug thibs/ phu brda' than thibs san ting nan dun ting/ dbang phyug la sogs sgrol

sngags gdab// ma nu rag sha si b+h+yo/ ni shig rbad/ bla rkun la brdeg cing khyi spyang srog la rol// mung tra ma b+h+yo ni shag rbad/ raM pu ru la b+h+yo shag rbad haM ha ba trag na b+h+yo ni shag rbad/ a shug me/ ha na ha na ni shag
rbad/ a shug me mar ma ra na shag rbad/ a shug me dza la dza la che ge ni shag rbad/ ces pa lha yi phur pa yis// rdzogs par bskul zhing gnas su gdab// yang na yab yum sras dang bcas// bse mos phur ba
btab pa la// blon mos khrag 'thung yab rjes la// sngags rnams bzlas shing nyungs kar blug/ phur pa drug gis gnas bdun gdab// de yis 'grub par dpa' bos bshad// de nas ling thod par brub// phur

nag ral pa tshar dgu sgrag/ gdug ba'i yul lam yi dgas grong// de lta bu ru gtad par bya// rdo rje sme 'thab 'byung ba na// skrag ni nag po khru gang la// rten 'brel snying pos rab tu gnas// bum par ya man ta
ka'i sngags// yab yum sras bcas sngags bris gzhug/ phur pa nag po de dag ni// kho yi snying khar bcugs la gzhag/ rang gnas dkyil 'khor 'og tu sba// yang na mchod rten nang du gtad// rang la ngang gis
'brub pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ bse'i dme phur chen po'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po

des// 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsungs// rdo rje nang sme byung ba'i tshe// sme phung srog gi spu gri bshad// dang por bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// ban d+ha nag po bsgral ba'i phyir// 'brub khung nag po khru gang
bar// gzas pa po'i ling ga legs bcas la// phur pa nag po chas su gzhug/ ga 'khor lo yum gyi lto bar bcas// bdag nyid ya man ta ka yi// thugs kar ro sdud nag por bsam// phur pa'i 'khor lo rab
snags la// ro langs drag po'i 'khor lo bskor// dmigs pa de nyid rlag par 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal byas la// sme phur nag pos ling ga gsad// nyungs kar nyungs

nag ske tshes brab// de la yang dag nges pa'i don// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// ya man ta ka ha la lta// srid gsum zhabs 'og 'dus par bsgoms// zhing gi g.yang gzhi'i spyi tsar sgon// sbrul chun thur la
'phyang bar bya// gzhis ste chas rnams mgo gzhug bzlog/ rus sbal stangs su zhing la 'dug/ seng ldeng 'khar ba hong tshugs bya// rngam pa'i nga ros mi snyan 'byung// gdug pa'i sngags bzlas spyugs glu

blangs// mtshon cha rtse nas 'dzin la sogs// bzlog pa'i dam par yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// oM sa ma yA/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ka/ ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka ti dza dza ma ma srog la

baM ril ril/ ya ma baM ya ma chum thums ya/ ya ma srog thun snying baM ril b+h+yo/ ya ma kug thun ma ra ya thun thun/ dgra bo'i tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng shag ma ra ya rbad/ ces ni stong ni phrag brgya bzlas// de
la mtshon rtags ster bar nges// ling ka thod par 'brub// mchod rten nag pos gtad bya na// sngags pa nag po rlag par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje mar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ sme phur srog gi spu gri'i
le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po yis// 'khor lo bskor ba'i las bshad pa// gzhung dang mthun par yid 'thad gzung// dkyil 'khor gru gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po

'khor lo brgyad// phyi pa zla gam thod 'phreng can// rab tu mkhas pas bri bar bya// de steng dur khrod ro ras la// bag chus dkar rab sbyangs la// gong dang 'dra bar 'khor lo bri// ya ma brgyad kyi gsang sngags
bri// phyogs bzhir bse mo'i srog snying bri// mtshams su dgug pa'i 'khor lo bri// rabs chad mon gyi thod pa ru// dbus su yab la g.yas g.yon yum// dpral bar ya ma ra tsa'i sngags// mtha' ma bse mo
rje blon dang// yang snying rgyal po thams cad br-i// ras kyi dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag/ dkyil 'khor steng du 'khor lo ni// be con ral gri rgya gram can// gsang sngags sbrel ba shri dang
bsam// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed por bsgoms// sgrol ging bdag po ma ru rtse// be con 'khor lo rab tu 'phen// mngag pa'i las byed gzhan ma brgyad// dmag sna 'dren pa'i gyad chen bzhi// dgug byed
dam can pho nya stong// de ltar gsal ba shin tu gces// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs brgyad// 'khor lo 'bru bzhi thugs la gnas// sngo nag ya ma 'khor ba'i tshul// nyams pa'i lus la 'khor lo 'phen// bstan

pa 'jig pa'i dam sri la// rang rgyud las kyi gshin rje bzhi// spyi bo mgrin pa lte ba snying// mig po che la kha yang gdangs// mchu dang so sen rab tu rno// phyi nas dmigs kyis bskul ba yis// nang nas

rang srog rang gis gcod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba des// ma ru rtse dang shan pa brgyad// sngags dang ting 'dzin 'od kyi bcun// dmigs pa nyid la 'khor lo

'phang// bdud sngags rtsa bcad 'phrin las byas// nyi ma bzhi ru shes par bya// ya ma rA tsa sa twa me ya/ che ge mo a mo khaM pra mA ra ya/ ya ma rA dza dza la chum/ dza rtsa ra dza rbad/ ra tring chum rtsa rtsa ra tsa rbad/ ya me do

ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu kham rag ta dza ma ra ya/ tri ling shang ka du/ dza dza ra dza rbad/ bla khri shig rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mur dza ya 'du+u sa tri rtsa ra dza rbad/ kha tri kha yag zhung

rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ oM sa ma yA/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya mAn ta ka/ pan dza de ro ni dza/ sny-ing la ya rtsa rtsa rA tsa rbad pho nya las kyi ya ma brgyad// gdug byed gshin rje'i nyin bar rgyu// dmar nag ma mo mtshan rangs

rgyu// de la drag po'i thun sngags drangs// ye shes lha rgyud gnas nas bskul// sa ma ya dang khrag skyug bzlas// ya ma snying 'di yang drag tu bzlas// oM tsi bi ri tsa tra ba na sa ma ya tshal ba/ a nri tri trig nan/ mA ra

ya/ a gu sha dza dza dzA nA ga mA ra dza tshal pa/ a rni tri/ trig sna mA ra ya a gu sha dza dza dza/ shu shu shu rag sha ya tshal ba/ a nri trig trig nan mA ra ya/ o gu sha dza dza dza/ a be sha ya tshal pa/ a ni trig nan/ ma ra ya/

a gu dza dza dza/ lha 'dre mi gsum dbang du 'dus// dus gsum dag tu de dag bzlas// de nas 'khor lo ling ga gzhag/ drag sngags rangs pa grangs pa yin// thun dang yungs kar bsngags cing drang// khrag thun

dbab cing pho nya gtang// phyir mi ldog pa'i las byas la// dur khrod gnas sam pho brang 'og/ yi dgas grong ngam klu yi khyim// mkhas pas gtad la bro yis gzir// rtsa rgyud yan chad rlag pa ru// dam tshig
bdag pos yang dag gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// shal
bsgrub drag po thun gyi las// mthing nag khro zhal lnga pa yi// zhal ni gru gsum gting du bru// mda' gzhu gsum bcas gtsang mar gzugs// rabs chad mon thod mu stu ra rA// drag po thun gyi rdzas bsags

pa// ra khrag mi khrag khri khrag dang// phag gi khrag dang mchin pa sbyar// ra dug btsan dug sbyang dug dang// sa dug shing dug sna dgu bsag/ 'bras dang gro dang til dang khre yi chang// de dag sbyar la dbus su
gzhug/ sa lu sa lu/ dug 'du khrag 'du/ bal phyur bal phyur/ chil chil/ rug rug/ sab sab/ thod par brubs la dbang yang bskur// thod par lha tshogs snying po dgod// de la bzlas pa'i sngags bstan

pa// oM many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka hU~M/ sa ma yA/ many+dzu kug hU~M/ ha ha dam dam/ sa ma yA gu gu thul/ ya man bam ril de phyi thums thums// rbad rbad sod chod oM kha bo sha/ ka tra pe sha be sha ru pe sha ka thun/ ra ga rag ta/

ma ra ya thun/ tsi pi ri thun/ bra a ni tri thun/ na ga ma thun/ shu gra ri thun/ ces nub re la stong stong khri khri rab tu bgrang// bud med mang po byung ba dang// mon dang zhub can mang po 'byung// khang ba 'tsheg dang

'od dang sgra// thun ni khol dang rlangs pa dang// gnag dang lbu ba byung 'phar ba dang// sla dang nyung bar gyur pa na// bshags pa bya zhing ma nyes bgrang// de nas 'phang ba'i las bya ste// ye shes lha tshogs thugs

dam bskul// drag sngags de dag bzlas par bya// oM su tri sa mA ya thun/ ba ra tsi ta ma ra ya thun ya/ yo gi shwa ra mA ra ya thun ya/ ya ma tsi ta mA ra ya thun ya/ badzra mahA yag sha mA ra ya thun ya mA ra ya thod pa/
snying la ya thod pa/ rnam shes ma ra ya thodapa/ gzugs phung mA ra ya thod pa/ 'khor bcas ma ra ya thod pa/ dun ting ma ra ya thod pa/ zhes ni gnas la 'phang bar bya'o// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos
bshad// dpal gshin rje mar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ drag po thun 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten mgon po yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye kye srog
bdag 'bar ba che// 'khor lo'i srog gi ngo bo gang// de la bskor lugs du zhig yod// las ni gang byed dpe ni gang// zhes zhus pas// de la yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo'i srog gi ngo bo de// don dam
brjod las 'das pa de// kun rdzob ming dang yi ge las/ gshin rje'i srog gi ngo bo yang// rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor los bya// gnam sa srid ba'i lha srin kun// ma lus 'khor bas 'khor lo yin// srid gsum
lto ba'i grong khyer yin// zhes gsungs so// bskor lugs bsam las 'das gyur kyang// bsgrub bya byin brlabs 'khor lo dang// drag po rang gshed 'khor lo bskor// bsgrub bya dag la phyi nang
gsum// bskor lugs bsam las 'das pa yin// de yang 'chi bdag thod pa'i bsgrub pa dang// ma dang gshin rje bsgrub pa dang// ro ras yi dgas bsgrub pa dang// srog bdag g.yang gzhi'i bsgrub par
gsungs// thod pa nag po ma ra ya// thod pa nag po gnas pa'i grong// 'chi bdag nag po gnas pa'i grong// drag sngags mtshon cha gdug pa'i dpal// dam nyams ru tra dmigs pa'i 'ben// rabs chad thod

pa gnyis rtsal la// 'chi bdag pho mo gnyis byas te// me rlung 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// 'khor lo rtsibs bdun nang du bstan// ral gri dgra yi 'bru bdun dgod// bsgrub sngags 'di dag rgyun du bzlas// o a

kro te ka ya mAn ta ka/ ya ma me d+ha k+She/ ra dza sa twa/ ru na Na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ de nas dgra bo'i 'khor lo bskor// drag sngags bdun pa 'di bzlas so// ya ma me d+ha k+She ni dza/ de yi mtshan mo mos sngags drangs// oM

sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka ya ma ra dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha/ mu tra snying kha rag ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo// nyin mtshan dag la khri khri dang// sgra dang 'od dang 'tshub ma dang// me dang chu dang ri nyal dang// khyi

'gyed pa dang ri dgas gshor// 'ded dang 'dzin dang 'ching ba dang// gsod dang brdeg dang bshad byed dang// khra dang spyang khu gdung ba dang// mon dang zhib can byung ba na// de tshe las rnams grub pa
yin// 'khor lo lnga la thun la gnyis// nyi ma bdun du las byas na// zla ba bdun na rlag par 'gyur// de la mngon du ma gyur na// sngags pas dam tshig nyams pa yin// phyis ni bsgrubs kyang rang la
ldog/ shi sa 'khor lo lan bdun bskor// hU~M ya ma k+She d+ha me phaT/ srid pas 'dus pas sems can la// lus la 'khor lo gnas pa na// 'khor lo zhes ni de la bya// 'byung bas bsdus pas smos ci
dgos// dpal 'bar chen pos yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtad pas gshin rje nyid la ste// dngos ni bye ba gung rings so// lha khang ro khung nag po yis// sbrul lce bsnol lam stag gi
kha// de ru gtad mnan thebs par bya// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gtad// de ltar byas na smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ thod pa nag po 'chi
bdag gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas dpal 'bar chen po des// ma gtang zhing lpags bsgrub pa ston// ma gtang nag po sngags pa'i gshed// las rnams grub pas bya ba las// las 'di sngas
na rang la gnod// phyin ci log gi tsakra ste// zhing lpags mi ni rabs chad dam// mon pa nag po'i pags pa la// dug khrag dag gis 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid ro langs nag por bsgom// ling
ga khrag dang dug chur byug/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor des// gzir byed drag sngags mgo la drangs// nyin bzhi las kyi 'khor lo bskor// de ma grub pa g.yas kyi spog/ lha srin bkug la gnas su

gtad// de ltar bayas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// oM A kro te ka ya mAn ta ka kA la ru pa dza/ ya a hri/ ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ yak+She ra ya ra ni yo da ya/ ya da yon ru do me ya/ ya me

do sa dza ra ma ya/ d+h+ri te e krin/ a ne a ne/ che ge mo snying khrag rtsa la ya mA ra ya phaT/ drag po ngan sngags klad du grang// ya ma d+ha k+She/ ma me d+ha k+She ya/ d+ha k+She ya me ma/ k+She ya ma me d+ha ya ma du ru ra/ tsa sha na ya/ mu

ka ye/ a pa ye ya ka pa ye/ d+h+ri d+ha ye/ ha la ye/ che ge mo myag baM ril/ pra ma ya rbad/ nyi ma dang po'i sngags su shes// ra dza to/ dza sa d+ho ra/ d+ho ra dza d+ha ya/ ya ma du sha dza na ma/ mu ka ye/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ pri d+ha

ye ha la ye/ che ge mo myogs bam ril/ mur dza ya/ rbad ya/ nyi ma gnyis pa'i las yin no// ru na yo ni/ na yo ni ru/ yo ni ru na/ ni tu na yo/ ya ma du ru ra dza sha na la/ mu ka ye/ a sa ye/ ka sa ye/ bri d+ha ye/

ha la ye/ che ge mo myags thums ril rag ta dza ra ya rbad/ nyi ma gsum pa'i las yin no// ra ya dza ni/ ya dza ni ra/ dza ni ra ya/ ni ra ya tsa/ ya ma du ra dza na la sha/ mu ka ye/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ bri d+ha le/ ha la
ye/ che ge mo myags thum ril/ ma ra ya rbad ya/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i las kyi 'grub// bsnur 'gros rus sbal chen po la// rnams thus ru khug 'bru ded pa// ro langs nag po'i las su bshad// de nas yang dag

bshad bya ba// des kyang las la ma grub na// ro langs 'khrug byed g.yas nas bskor// mgo 'dren las sngags ming dang ni// spu gris bsdebs pas gcod par 'gyur// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las yin no// oM hriSh+tIHwi

kri ta kA la rU pa dza dza/ ya ma k+She d+ha me/ ma k+she d+ha ma ya/ k+She d+ha me ya ma d+ha me ma yak+She/ ra ni dza la ya/ ni dza ya ra/ tsa ra ya ni ya ra ni dza/ ra ni yo ni/ ni yo na ra/ yo ni ra ni/ na ra no yo/ ro to sa ya/ to sa dza ru/ sa

tsa ru d+ho/ tsa ru to sa/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i las yin no// spu gri 'khor lo 'khro ba 'dra// che ge mo nri a mu khaM/ ma la yam/ da la ye/ kyi bo ye/ li hi ye/ snying khrag myog rbad/ snying khrag myog rbad rak+ta dza ya rbad/ sny-ing

khrag myog/ mu ra dza ya rbad/ snying khrag myog ma ra ya rbad/ 'phrin las rdzogs dang lha srin dkrug/ ya ma dkrugs phyung 'jur shag/ ra dza dkrug phyung 'jur shag/ che ge mo klad pa dkrug ma ra ya rbad/ ling ka
'khor lo bcas pa de// mchod rten khru gang 'og tu gtad// klu yi sa 'am dur khrod gnas// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ ma tang sme
nag las kyi 'khor lo ro langs nag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar khro bdag rje// dur khrod ras la bsgrub pa bstan// dud khrod ras la 'chi bdag gzugs// kha bgrad mig

bzlog mche ba gtsigs// lag na dbyug pa nag po thogs// de 'dra lto ru 'khor lo bri// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bya// 'khor lo rtsang mar kha la 'gram// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ya ma
gnas pa'i maN+Dal bri// chag chag thig dang tshon bkye la// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar// 'khor lo nag po dpal kha dmar// bar khyams gnam la zla gam dmar// sgo rigs te ga rus pas bya// rig pa
can gyi lha bkod de// dmar nag 'chol ba'i las mchog yin// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo dmigs pas bskor ba'i tshe// yig 'bru sum cu rtsa drug la// nyin par 'gug dang rtsa rnam khro// mtshan

mo gsod dag sha khrag za// drag po 'khor lo'i drag sngags so// ra dza sa do ru na yo da ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM/ pra ma ya hU~M phaT/ do ru Na yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mur dza ya hU~M phaT/ yo ni ra ya dza ni ra ma

yA/ che ge mo a mu khaM rag ta dza ra ya hU~M phaT/ ya dza ni rA dza ra do me ya/ oM che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ mtshan ni bse mo'i drag sngags dang// sa ma ya dang khrag skyug bzlas// yang snying thugs kyi rgyal po
brdeg/ yang dag dpa' bos bla med gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad bya pas// nyin bzhi drag sngags 'di bzhin bzlas// 'jig rten dbang chen gshin rje dang// gdug byed shan pa mang po'i tshogs// btsan

gyi jag pa 'chas pa ltar// 'jig rten khams kun khengs par bsam// mo 'khor g.yon nas 'khor nas ni// 'gug byed rlung nag 'khor lo yin// ra dza sa do ru Na yod ya/ d+he ru na ya ni ra yak+She ya/ yo ni ra ya

dza ni ra dza sa do me ya/ mtshan bzhi drag sngags 'di ltar bskor// gdug byed gshin rje nag po dang// sgrol ging srog bdag dmar po dang// dbang chen srid gsum ma mo dang// khram thogs gri thogs bdud dang

ging// bdud kyi shan pa srog gcod ltar// khrag dang sha la rol par bsgom// sngags kyang drag la 'dril ba dang// ri rgyal rbab dang gnam lcags thogs// spu gri so dang 'dra bar bsam// ra ni dza ya ra ni yo da

ya/ to sa dza ra na dza yak+She ya/ yo na ru to sa dza ra/ ya ma ya ra ni yo ni/ ru to me ya/ ming dang spu gri gdags yig ni// 'di ltar bzlas pa dpa' bos bshad// che ge a mu khaM/ snying baM ril rbad ya/ che ge mo nri/

a mu khaM ru ta nan khaM ti rbad ya/ che ge mo nr-i a mu khaM/ ra ma ra ya khaM du rbad ya/ las rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang// ling ga 'khor lo thod par brub// oM hri Sh+tiHbi kr-i tA mon dang dgra bo ma ra ya

du dza/ oM hriSh+t+rIHwi kr-i tA mon ta dgra bo ma ra ya nan/ gtad khram las ni 'thebs par bya// sgrol ging gshin rje dmar po dang// bse mo tshogs kyis thun yang brab// drang srong dmod pa rdzogs pa dang/ 'phrin
las bro gzir pho brang dang// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ yi dgas gshin rje ro ras nag po'i le'u ste bcwo lnga pa'o//// de nas dpal
'bar khro bo yi// g.yang gzhi nag po'i las 'di bshad// sngags pa nang 'bras 'byung ba 'am// las rnams brkug pas bya ba yin// thog mar bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// drag po'i las 'di mthar bya ba// drag
pos 'khor lo ma bris kyang// gshin rje nyid kyi thugs la gnas// mi 'jigs dpa' bo brtul zhugs kyis// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// thig bzhi btab pas le tse dgu// phyi rim la tse bcu gnyis la// ye ge
mkhas pas dgod par bya// lcags sam shing nag phur pa dgod// dpal chen gtor ma dgod cing brlab// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa// drag po'i gtor ma rgyun du dbul// thun gyi 'khor lo 'brub khung du// ra
dza rog pa 'gal kha la/ ming byang bcu gsum ra la gdags// ma nyes dpang gzugs cho nges btab// gshin rje ma mo bdud dang ging// dus bzhir bskul zhing pho nyas dgug/ lha dang dbye zhing rang la

bstim// dpra rtags rang dang nyams la brtag/ ma ra ya dang tsi bi ris// dus gsum dgug pa'i las kyang bya// khug pa'i drod rtags byung ba dang// gcer bu byung la skra yang rje// maN+Dal tha mar ra khrid

la// bskor ra bya zhing dam can bod// de nas ra des dgra bzlog bya// dmigs pa ra kha bstem la bsgral// g.yang gzhi ma bral bar bshus la// g.yang gzhi'i dbus su sgrub khung ni// ra khrag dug dang sbyar bas

bri// de yi mtha' mar 'khor lo yi// dbus su yi ge nr-i bris la// ra snying ling ga sbrel la bzhag/ drag po'i ngan sngags 'di dag go/ oM sa ma ya/ a r+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka san tsa te ro ni dza hU~M/ dza ya ra ni/

yo na ru do/ sa rtsa ra ni/ k+She ta me ya ma/ ni ma ra ya/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa baM/ ril dam pa dum bu mA ra ya rbad/ g.yang gzhi drag sngags 'khor lo bskor// nyungs kar nyung nag ske tshe brab// thun dang
rtsang phur gdab par bya// de nas g.yang gzhi gril ba la// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas bdug/ gshin rje bdag gi sme gtor dang// phur pa nag po sor bzhi bsgrug/ gshin rje nag po la sogs pa// shan pa
gri thogs dmar pos khrid// rgya mtsho'i rlung gi bar dag tu// lcags kyi khang rom 'bar ba ru// sgrol bdag bdud la gtad par bsam// ri rab chen po nyid kyis mnan// ye shes lha tshogs bro
yis gzir// ces dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gshin rje srog bdag g.yang gzhi'i 'khor lo nag po'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de
nas 'jigs byed 'khor gyi gtso bo des/ dpal 'bar chen po rngam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho dang la 'bar chen po lags// phyi rabs bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// dmod pa drag po'i gsang sngags
gang// zhes zhus pas/ legs so 'jig rten mgon po nyon// srog bsgrub gsang ba thugs kyi bcud// srog rten bca' zhing gnod sbyin sten// bla 'gug 'go ba'i lha dang dbye// pe con rtsang phur thun gyis

gsad// srog gshed shan pa gri thogs rbad// sgrol ging bse yi gyad chen rbad// ban d+he bon po mu stegs dang// bud med sdig rtag 'khor ba na// gsad pa'i las drug las la sbyar// sgrol ging dmar po mched
bzhi la// gnod sbyin pho mo thams cad bskul// des kyang mi 'dul gang yang med// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dud khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla gam
gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi// zla gam dmar nag brgyad kyis mdzes// 'khor lo zla gam yig mtshon te// rig pa can gyi lha grangs dgram// phur ba la sogs lha rdzas dgram// bse 'khor bcas la mnga' yang
gsol// gtor ma gsum dang mtsho bzhi bca'// khrag 'thung gtor ma'i gzer yang bca'// sring mo gsum gyi rdzas kyang bzhag/ rol po lte kar dgra yi gter// so so'i srog gi rkang rdzas bya// nag po spyi
dkar gshin rje la// bya mo rngul thig ro langs ma// rgya mtsho gser zam ti la// ging la mi yi tsit+tas bskang// smug mo mon mgo spyang mun la// dmar mo sbrul mgo shu lan gyi// ser mo 'ug mgo tsa mun
gyi// dkar mo zangs mgo keg mun gyi// de dag srog gam mdangs kyis bkang// yang na slug po ba lag go/ zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ting 'dzin rim dang chu bur tshul// dbang chen
gzhal yas gdan steng du// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs drug bar+g+rad// sngo dang mthing dang ljang nag zhal// be con dgra sta ral gri dang// sdigs mdzub kha dang ban d+ha

dmar// bdud dang ma he'i gdan la bzhugs// k+She dang swa dang ya las ni// yum sras baM chen gdan la bzhugs// khang las mtsho bzhi yis// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las dang// de yi phyi rim b+h+yo dzi
las// klon mo dbang phyug sgrol ging tshigs// dpag tu med pas bskor bar bsams// chos nyid ngang las sku bzhengs la// so so pho brang dam pa nas// spyan drangs phyag btsal bzhugs pa

dang// mchod bstod bshags pa la sogs bya// de nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// gshed po la sogs thugs ka ru// rgyu las rang sngags 'khor lo tshul// oM za ma ya shrI many+dzu ya man ta/ ya ma ra tsa/ ma ma e ka

dza ti dza dzA/ trag rag sha mu tra kha mun ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM shrI many+dzu ya ma ra ra sa do me ya/ yam yaM thums thums// gshin rje nag po snying khrag la bdun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtsa dza la hur/ dbugs la thums/ srog yam yam dza

dzA/ oM su tri ba ya/ ba ra tsi ta yo gi sha ra/ ya ma tsit+ta hU~M phaT swAhA/ rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bla med brtson// kri ling shang ka du/ dri za yag sha rbad su/ phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra duM duM shig shig dgra bo ma ra ya/ rtsa

rtsa rA dza rbad/ kyi krid t+ta khrid ro la khrag 'thung// kang kang keng keng kying kying/ tsin d+ha ma ro la khrag 'thung// kang kang keng keng kying kying/ sha za ba'i/ snying 'byin pa'i/ khrag 'thung ba'i/ dbugs 'phrog pa'i/

srog gcod pa'i/ snying za'i tsa ta ya/ ma rag sha a tang par la to// sha la kyi spyang kra he kra he hU~M phaT/ nyin mtshan ma nor drag po'i mda'// srog ni ting 'dzin bstan pa ru// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu
bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srog la shan pa dgye ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan dpal 'bar des// 'jig rten grags pa dbang bsdus
la// dgra bo khram la gdab pa'o// drag po las kyi gzer ka gzung// lha srin pho nya 'thab bzhin du// bya rog 'ug pa'i las bya zhing// lha srin dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// bdag nyid sgrol ging bdag po

bsgom// pho nya bkug la tsi bi ri// lha srin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// oM ya mAn ta ka ya ma rA tsa badzra dun b+h+yo/ Ar+ya shri srig sba dza dza sa ma ya stom/ de nas gu gul la sogs pas// 'go ba'i lha rnams rim par
dbye// dbye ba'i sngags rnams bzlas pa'i tshe// thugs las sprul pa'i khro bo yis// snang srid bkang nas lha srin dkrugs// 'go ba'i lha rnams bkrag par bsam// gu gul dud pa drag po des// 'go ba'i lha

la phog par bsam// oM la du sa ma du/ hu lu li/ myos na dag la/ gzer na ya/ a ni trag rag sha ma ra ye phye// de nas pho lha la sogs pa// rdzas dang sngags kyi rim pa dbye// spyi ru dbye na 'di ltar ro// bya
rog 'ug pa'i gong ru la// lha dang dgra yi ming bris gdags// ling ka'i mdun rgyab dag tu yang// bya rog 'ug pa'i mtshon gyis bkyig/ gu gul dud pa rgyun du gtang// de rjes pho nyas drag tu dgug/ bstim
dang gdung pa'i las dag bya// de nas ra sgral ling ga snying// ra yi rdzas rnams chas dgos la// thun dang sreg dang mnan pa bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ drag po

shugs sgrol gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje be con drag po che// 'di yi be shing 'khar ba la// yi dam lha tshogs sngags bris la// rtag tu lag tu mi 'bral bar// mi

rgod bya zhing bgrod dkar 'gro// dgra 'am bgegs kyi bar chad sel// snying po 'di dag drag tu bzlas// oM shriHmany+dzu ya ma rA dza/ u shA nan/ b+han d+ha nan/ gu trang gu trang/ ba shan mu ti ma ra ya rbad/ khros na lha
yang rlag par byed// 'jig rten mgon pos yang dag gsungs// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// shi shing nag po'i phur pa la// rme bdud sna tshogs bdud byas la// drag sngags bzlas shing gdab las

bya// gnan pa'i yang snying las la 'jug/ sgrol ging bdag po'i srog sngags yin// sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// gro ga shog shog ras dag la// dgra bo de yi ling ga bri// gru gsum gting du kha spub
la// drag sngags 'di dag khri phrag gsum// rdzogs sogs khri phrag btab la gzhag/ 'jam dpal dmar pos mnan par bsam// de yi steng mchod rten nag po mnan// oM badzra ki li ki li ya ha/ snying la tho

ram/ rag sha snying la rbad/ tsa pa la nan/ khrag thum ral rbad/ rol rbad/ k+She la maM khug thuM ril rbad/ rol rmugs thuM ril rbad/ ni ma ra ya/ ma ra du/ snying tshal pa shag sha nan/ ha ra ha ra/ k+ShaM k+ShaM dgra bo'i srog

dbugs snying la ya/ nang khrol smad lnga la ya/ phung po rnam shes lnga la ya/ gang la dmigs pa rtsa rgyud rtsag/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rtsang dmar nyi shu rtsa gcig la// drag po'i rtsang dmar bdun 'grabs

la// dbang phyug la sogs sring mo yis// 'byung ba shigs shing phung po 'joms// dgra bo'i ling ga bri zhing bsams// khrag rten mchin pa drod rten mcher// dbugs rten glo ba sa rten mkhal// de rnams snying
las gyes pa yin// lan bdun gdab cing rgyun du bzlas/ ling ga dong gi nang du gzhug/ he thums he thums ling ling sod sod/ byin tshig ling srod sod sod/ ku bying ling ga ling sod sod/ sa 'khor sa 'khor

ling sod sod/ thun phob sod sod/ sod sod/ shig shig/ rtsang gis gtsang la thod ngan blugs// drag sngags khri phrag drug bzlas brab// sri mo khros 'drar gtad pa na// rtsa rgyud rlag par dpa' bos bshad// de

nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ra rog bsgral ba'i snying khrag de// ra snying nang ngam ra thod blug/ nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe la// sngags 'di bzlas te yul mkhar 'phang// tri ling shang ka du tri za yag sha rbad su/

phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig/ dgra bo ma rA ya/ ting sa thun// ting ling shang ka thun/ 'bum khri k+She ni baM 'du sa tri/ ra tri chum/ bla tri shig/ snying khrag rbad/ las kyi khrag thun gsang
ba'i gter// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ yo ma thun gyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar ba des srog gshed

drag po'i las 'di gsungs so// brag dmar stag gzig 'dra ba'i gnas// nags tshal thug pa'i gnas phyin la// srog la chan pa gdab pa'i las// rabs chad thod pa nag po la// rgyab tu rdau rje rgya gram la// hri

sti bzhi yi sngags kyis bskor// nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// drag sngags bzhi pas mtshan par bri// dbus su gru gsum ling ga gzhag/ 'brub khung gru gsum sring srings la// skar khung btod la rtsang gis

bskor// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgoms// khrag dang dug dang lcags phye dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshes brab// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA tsha ma ma e ka dza ti dza/ de la rgyan gyi las rnams bya// de nas drag tu

as byed dus// drag sngags 'di dag bzlas shing brab// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo be sha ma ra se/ na tra gus ra se/ gu ha ka te sa te/ ta pa na ku pa ra ma ta sha mi/ a nu ru pa/ su ru pa/ na ta ku pa ra tsa tra kha na

dza khi he mo ha sa/ ku pa ra na/ he ma ha nan/ gu ha ka/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa su lu su lu sa ha/ kri li sha ga du tri za yag sha rbad/ su phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra duM duM shig shig/ dgra bo ni ma ra ya/ rnal ma rnal te

gsod la rngam/ gshog la mer/ sris la chums/ thu bi thu lcags kyi pra/ dgra bo ma ra ya/ bdud pra ma ya/ du ru du ru/ har ti har ti/ nag po dza pi dza ya/ dgra bo srog ma ra ya rbad/ ces pa'i drag sngags khri phrag

bzhi// rdzogs dang mchod rten rmang du gnan// srog rtsa thod bsgrub mnan pa'i las// drag sngags 'phrul thabs ma shes na// sngags pa'i srog la bar chad 'byung// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud
las/ shan pa sgrol byed kyi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed dpal 'bar chen po des/ sgrol ging bse'i gyad chen po'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// rdza klud

dmar nag 'jigs pa ru// gtso bo'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa des// 'brub khung nag po khru gang ba// dug khrag dag gis zhal zhal byas// ra spyang thod pa rnag pa'i rdzas// 'khor lo bri bar shes par bya// dpa' bo

chen pos 'jig rten 'dod// nyi shu gcig gis sod par 'gyur// nyi zer zla zer skar zer la// rbad cing bla ni dgug par bya// grib so byung dang nyi ma nub// nam gyi gung la gsad par bya// las rnams rdzogs
par gyur pa dang// skya rengs dang bo shar ba dang// dgra bo mchod rten rmang du mnan// las sngags dag ni gtad sngags bzlas// dug dang khrag skam nyungs kar gyis// dus gsum dag tu brab

par bya// ra dmar snying dang sha khrag la// gtor ma byas te dbul bar bya// 'od dang sgra dang rta pa dang// zhib chen mon pa mang po 'byung// sems can gsod dang rta rgyug dang// 'khrug pa'i rus skos byed pa

ni// gshin rje bsgrub pa'i rtags yin no// mtshon thogs pa dang ra khrid dang// ra dang ri dgas gshor ba dang// dngos grub byung na bla khug pas// de'i tshe gsang sngags gdags par bya// sha khur snying khyer byung

ba na// las rnams 'grub pas gtang rag gtang// oM ya he phaT/ ma ho phaT/ shu ho phaT/ ma ru rtse phaT/ nyi phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ rngaM rngaM phaT/ rngaM rngaM dgra bo'i srog la rngaM/ nyi phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ sa mu ye phaT/ oM sa ma ya/

phug phug/ rtog rtog/ tsit+ta phyung/ snying la tshal pa kha raM tshal pa b+h+yo/ khaM khaM snying la khaM/ phyung phyung tsit+ta phyung/ tsag shu baM ril/ thum thum ril snying la ya/ snying khrag khong nas phyung la shog/ che ge mo mA ra ya/ bla rtags

byung nas zhag gsum du// ling ka dag la brab par bya// skabs su thun gyis brab pa'i las// oM ya ma shu tri ya dun/ ma ru ram pa sa la ya/ mug ni mug rbad/ rbad du rbad sa ya sni/ che ge mo rbad rbad/ sha la rbad
rbad/ rus la rbad rbad/ sog la rbad rbad/ dbugs la rbad rbad/ nyungs kar dug dang khrag gis brab// myur du rlag par gdon mi za// bsnyen dang bsgrub pas las sbyar la// gdug pa'i gnas su gtad khram
bya// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ sgrol ging dmar po shan pa gsod byed kyi le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ gshin rje

dmar po snying 'byin gyi las/ spu gri ngar mo 'di gsungs so// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i shan ma rir// sngags pa dam tshig ldan pa des// 'brub khung nag po khru gang du// dpangs su sum brtsegs dag tu bya// rtsang
dmar bdun gyis kha yang bskor// dur khrod mon thod nag po la// khrag dang dug gi lde khus byug/ nang du dgra bo'i ming bcug la// bdag nyid lha ru+u gsal ba des// lag phur sor brgyad pa la ni// 'jam

dpal dmar po gsal bsgom gdab// nyungs kar khro chung bsams la brab// sngags pa mi ngas mi tshig spangs// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ gshin rje dmar po dgra bo'i snying po la// thuM thuM/ me ru ka/ srog la

hur thums/ kri ling shang ka du rbad/ ma ra ya snying 'khril/ srog la ya hur thums rbad thums rbad thums/ rtse rang ru rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ drag sngags drag la 'gril bar blangs// nyi shu gcig la rlag par
'gyur// dkar nag rdzas dang yungs kar brab// phung pa ling ka'i snying la gdab// phud dang gtor ma rgyun du gtang// zla ba bdun la rlag par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'ba' ba'i rme
rgyud las/ gshin rje dmar po shan pa sgrol byed kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen pos/ bsad pa srog gi las srin po dmar nag srog rtsa

nag po zhes bya ba'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pas dam can bod// lung pa nag po nags tshal can// shan pa khyi khrid rgyu ba'i sa// 'brub khung nag po khru gang 'bru// thod pa nag por ling ga
bca'// dam rdzas tshogs kyis mnyes par bya// nyungs kar la sogs rdzas kyis brab// bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba des// drag sngags spu gri 'dra ba yis// dmigs pa myal dmyal gsod par bsam// be con

rdeg cing sdigs mdzub sgreng// so bsgo bdam shing nyungs brdeg/ mi khyi'i sgra yang spang bar bya// rnal ma rnal te srog la rngam/ hab le hob le nan// du ru du ru/ tu tra ru tra dza/ b+h+yi sha r+d+ha ra/ che ge mo'i snying la khril

phril/ mA ra ya phaT rbad/ nyi shu gcig na ma ra na/ de dus gtang rag gtang ba gces// thod pa dur lung nag por gtad// mchod rten nag po khru gang bas// thod pa'i steng nas mnan pa bya// dpal gshin rje
dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srin po dmar nag shan pa rngam byed kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa srog gi las/ gnod sbyin dmar
po mi kun gyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// ya mAn ta ka gsal bsgoms la// rabs chad thod pa kha yel du// dug dang khrag gis gru gsum
bri// dbus su ling ga gan rkyal gzhag/ sdigs mdzub gtad cing nyungs kar brdeg/ phud dang gtor mas mnyes par bya// bdun gsum lon nas dur khrod du// dur g.yam dag la rgya gram bri// de nas drag

sngags 'khor lo bskor// ya ma ra dze hU~M phaT/ mu mu mu hU~M phaT/ khu khu hU~M phaT/ cha cha hU~M phaT/ rje ta ya rje ta ya hU~M phaT/ dur dur dur hU~M phaT/ mi khyi sgra yang g.yeng mi bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar
nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las// gnod sbyin dmar po srog zan gyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud sgrol ging dmar po'i drag sngags 'di gsungs

so// 'chi bdag bdud kyi sdai dpon ni// khram bdag 'bru'i snying stig las// 'brub khung nag po khru gang du// 'brub khung kha la rtsang dmar bskor// nang du ming dang rus bcug la// drag sngags 'di nyid bzlas
shing brab// bdud pra ma ya/ rag sha pa dza rbad/ mA ra ya she dza rkug pa kha'i// mur ta ya/ ru pa dza kha thums/ sni ling sha la sha dza/ ti la nag nyungs nag khrag gis brab// nyi shu gcig la ma ra

ya// ling ga hoM la sreg la gtang// dgra bo ma ra ya ni ag ni dza la raM/ ma ra ya na sha sha phaT rbad/ ces btags la bsreg par bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ bdud ma ru rtse las
kyi shan pa'i drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ srog bdag ma ru rtse las kyi shan pa srog lan gyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// srog gshed dmar po bse yi

gyad/ shugs sgrol drag po nye ba'i thugs// las kyi ging chen gsang ba'i bdud// srog rtsa sgril ma'i bar na gnas// de yi drag sngags bshad bya ba// oM tri ling shang ka thun// tri pa dza la tri dza pa la/ sad du ya ne/

shu me tri kar tri kar// hu ha ra hu ha ra/ dma' ra tse srog la chod chod/ che ge mo srog la 'drig sho 'grig sho/ rtsa ru thum ling/ gug thum ling// mug dma' ra rtse rbad/ lha bsnyen gong du song ba des// ra tsa dkar
po gnya' nag la// dmigs pa'i ling ga bcu gsum gdags// 'brub khung nang du ra btags la// drag sngags bzlas shing yungs kar brab// rtsa ra sod dang dgra rtags 'byung// ra bshas gtang rag gtang

bar bya// yang na ra dkar snying nag du// dgra bo'i ling ga bcug pa yang// 'brub khung bcug la sngags rnams brab// 'do dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg/ srog gcod pa dang ra gsad na// dgra la rtags ni 'byung
bar 'gyur// yang na snying kar snying kas btum// 'byung bas dus la smos ci dgos// dpal gshin rje dmar nag gi rme rgyud las/ ma ru rtse shugs sgrol gyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos/ sa bdag chen mo las kyi 'khor lo'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// de yang dur khrod 'jigs pa ru// maN+Dal 'brub khung khrag gis byug/ dur

khrod ras la bcu drug rtsibs// dur khrod dbus su ming bris tha ma ru// thod 'phreng me ri la sogs bri// mon nag thod pa'i thun yang bca'// bskyaid pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// ya mAn ta ka gsal ba dag/ srog gi

snying po nyid kyis su// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod pa phul// bsnyen 'di ltar dbul bar bya// oM su tri pa ya/ ba ra tsi ta/ ya gi sho ra/ ya ma tsi ta hU~M phaT/ swAhA/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pas 'khor lo ni// nyin mtshan

brgyad du bskor byas la// thun las nyin gcig gnan las gcig/ nyi ma bdun gyis rdzogs par bya// oM su tri pa ya che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ba kri su che ge mo mA ra ya rtsa rtsa ra

dza rbad/ ba ra tsit+ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad// ta tsi ra pa che ge mo nri ma ra ya rtsa rtsa ra rtsa rbad/ yo gi sha ra che ge mo ni/ ra ma ya rbad rtsa dza ra dza rbad/ ra sha ki yo che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/

rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza rbad/ ya ma tsi ta che ge mo ni ma ra ya rbad/ rtsa rtsa rA dza ya rbad/ ta tsi yo ma che ge mo ni mar ya rbad/ ces nyi ma bzhi ru bya// mon mo mang po cho nges

'debs// me 'bar 'od dang rlung nag dang// shwa dang ser ba drag po 'byung// oM su tri a thod dmar ya/ che ge mo'i srog la thun/ bar ra tsit+ta thod dmar ya che ge mo'i srog la thun/ yo gi shwa ra thod dmar ya/

dgra bo'i srog la thun/ ya ma tsit+ta thod dmar ya che ge mo'i srog la thun/ thun ni ling ga dag la bstim// phud dang gtor mas mnyes par bya// so so'i dam rdzas dag gis bskang// las rnams bsdug na bya ba
las// kun gyis byas na rlag par 'gyur// dam can gnad la dbab pa las// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ bse mo las kyi 'khor lo'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu
bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jigs rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rdo rje nang dme drag po 'am// las rtags bsgrub rtags med cing// las rnams 'gor na ji ltar bya// dur
khrod chen por rab bzung la// sngags pas brtul zhugs spyod pa'i tshe// ras dar nag po'i gos gon nas// dpral bar me long gdags bya zhing// mgo la dar sngon thod kyang bcings// yi dgas ro yi stan la

'dug/ lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// gshin rje'i sku la lta zhing bsgom// de nas langs nas spyod pa'i tshe// seng ldeng 'khar ba 'dom gang la// oM tsug bya zhing sdigs mdzub bsgreng// nga rgyal bya zhing zhe sdang
gis// snying po yi ge bcu bdun bzlas// de'i tshe mtshan rtags mang po 'byung// sku gzugs bzhad dam 'gul pa'am// lung bstan sgra 'am gzigs brnyan nam// rmi lam rtags rnams mang du 'byung// de nas
bstod cing 'phrin las brtsam// bsnyen pa'i sngon rtags ma byung na// sa ma ya la sel yod pas// lus ngag 'bad pa'i bshags pa bya// des kyang mngon du ma gyur na// las 'phro med dam bsod nams zhan// de
yis bya ba ma yin pa// kun gyis byas na rang la gnod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa bka' bzlog nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya

mAn ta ka pa na dza ta ro ni ruM dza/ oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa hU~M phaT/ ta a bri ya mAn ta ka kA la rU pa grongs shig/ shwi te kro ha ha rbad/ shri d+he kro ha ha ni 'gal byed sod rbad/ 'gal byed gtso bos khang
khang thums/ sa ma ya man du kug ta hU~M/ de phyi thums thums/ he ta ha daM daM/ sa ma ya gu gu thul/ ya man baM rim ram/ rbad rbad sod sod chod chod/ de dag sngags kyi 'khor lo ste// bskal pa'i
mtshon cha 'khrig la// 'gal byed nyal nyal gcod par bsam// yum sras la yang de shes bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// des kyang sgrol bar ma gyur na// sngags kyi 'khor lo lto nas
bzlog/ khram par ming dang rnam shes spel// rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad ces gdags// de yis khams gsum sgrol bar nus// yi ge gnad yig bzlog pa yis// lha nyid gnad la phab pa yin// de bzhin kun la shes par

sbyar// las nyid rang srog 'chad ces gsungs so// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// bse mo'i srog snying bzlog zhabs la// dgug pa'i yang snying bzlas brtag ste// nyin gyi las su shes par bya// sgrol ging srog
sngags gto bzlog la// mtshon cha nag po gdags par bya// de lta'i las 'di 'byung 'gyur na// 'jig rten rlag par dpa' bos bshad// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen po

des// gsang ba thugs kyi bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dur khrod rab tu 'jigs pa ru// sa chog gtor ma gtang nas kyang// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal ni// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas
rnam par brgyan// bar khyams gnag la zla gam dmar// sgo rigs zla gam re res mtshan// dbus su hU~M zhes bri bar bya// de nas yig mtshon dgod pa dang// lcags phur dag la gtso bo'i sngags// bzlas te

grol la dbus su dgod// rang rang phur bu rang sngags kyis// zla gam dag la yum sras dang/ phyi rim bse yi lha mo dang// blon po 'khor bcas dgod par bya// sgra rnams bud bsgreng 'dud pa dang// snyug ma
tshigs ni lha ma la// khrag gis byugs te dbus btsugs la// bse mkhar chen por byin gyis brlabs// so so'i mtshag ni bse phur du// mar khu sbrang rtsi khrag dang ni// 'o ma la sogs phyogs bzhir

bca'// mtshams su khrag ni gzhag par bya// bla mtsho chen po bsad du bsam// lho sgor mar me lnga brgya gtang// shar lho mtshams su hoM nag bca'// lho nub gru gsum gnad thod bca'// nub byang 'brub khung

dag tu ni// sgro dang dug gi rgya mtsho la// rtsang la ling ga spying rtsang gzhag/ byang shar 'brub khung dag tu ni// phur ba'i tshogs rnams spung phur bya// pho nya rnams kyi rdzas la dgod// so so'i ling ga bcas la

gzhag/ dbus su mu su ra dag gam// mon thod nang du thun bcas la// lha rnams tshang ba'i sngags bkod la// dur khrod ras la bris pa yi// 'khor lo dag tu gtums la gzhag/ rgyun gyi rnag pa de la bya// dam
rdzas tshogs ni 'tshogs byas la// sngags pa gdeng ldan dpa' bo des// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin 'jug/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dang po sems nyid rnams dag
stong// nam mkha' 'dra ste 'di zhes bstan du med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can 'khor ba la// snying rje nyi zla 'od ltar snyoms par bya// rang sems skye med yi ge a ru bsam// skye med nyid las ma 'gags
dbang chen shar// dur khrod khyod shug a nyid gdan steng 'gro// hU~M/ bskal ba'i me dpung 'bar bas brjid// khams gsum gdug pa dbang sdud bran du 'khol// spros 'dus mthing nag rdo rje dag tu

'gyur// gsar rnying sa bon rgyu dang 'bras bu cig go/ oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+han dza hU~M phaT/ gtum chen rab 'bar ha la'i gad rgyangs sgrogs// mthing nag ral pa kham nag gyen du

brdzes// spyan dgu stang thabs gru gsum mthing nag 'bar// rdo rje be con kha T+wAM rnge'u dang// sdigs mdzub dgra sta dbyug to b+han d+ha dmar// rigs lngas dbu brgyan khro bo'i chas kyis brgyan// spyan nas me 'bar
smin mtshams glog stong 'gyur// spyan nas 'brug sgrogs shangs nas rlung nag 'tshub// zhabs gnyis gyad kyis bgrad pas gdug pa 'dul// de 'dra'i sku ni bdag nyid rnam par bsam// muM tro ti sho ri nag mo

rog sha dza dza/ lha mo'i nang nas ro langs me 'bar ma// spyan gsum khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i kha yang gdangs// thod sbrul lus brgyan skra mardzes gsus po che// tri shul thod rlon khrag gis rab tu bkang// rlung nag
bcibs pa'i ban chen gdan la bzhugs// ma ma trag sha nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ sgrol bdag nag mo mche gtsigs rngam pa'i sku// sgeg mo ral gcig g.yu yi ral gcig ma// gser g.yu mu tig rin chen bai

DUr+ya// pu sha rag 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// khrag mtsho mtha' nas skems shing lcags phur 'dril// spu gri tsit+ta 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// ra rag ta ma 'da' la hU~M/ stong gsum bdal ba'i khrag gi rgya mtsho

'khrug/ khrag mtsho mtha' med 'khyil ba'i klong yangs su// yi dwags dregs pa'i gdan la dmar nag bzhugs// hU~M badzra kro d+he yag sham ra rtse hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal ma ru rtse// dmar
nag gtum khro 'jigs pa'i me// gtum po'i tshogs kyis khams gsum khyab par spros// ma he smug nag bcibs shing stong khams rgyu// phyag g.yas rdo rje be con dregs pa 'dul// g.yas pa mtshon cha'i 'khor

los srid gsum sgrol// thugs las 'gug byed dza 'phros pas// dza las spral pa'i pho nya ma// lce spyang nag mo khrag gi ral pa can// 'jigs byed kha gdangs mche ba zang yag gtsigs// gdug pa'i lce yis stong
khams brnyab cing len// spyang mo 'jigs byed bzhi yis rab bskor te// gdug pa'i nga ros spyang ngus di ri ri// ru ru ro ru tsa pa la nag mo dun b+h+yo/ dza las sprul ba'i sa bdag bse mo bzhi// sku

mdog phyag mtshan ma nges sprul pa mo// dbang gi cod pan dar nag cod pan can// pa tri pa ya/ ba ra tsi ta/ yo gi shwa ra ya ma tsi ta/ dza las srid gsum pho nya'i tshogs// kang ka mchu rings tshogs dang ni// li
'du'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams// dpag tu med pas rab bskor te// dgra rnams sha la rol bar bsam// ye shes pho brang dam pa dang// rang gnas 'jig rten grong khyer gnas// gdug pa 'dul phyir spyan

drangs mchod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya man ta ka/ pan dza re ro ni hU~M dza/ he la dza tra pan dza ru

pa ni/ ku lan dza sa ma ya/ nA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ gu gul thul/ mA ra ya/ ya man/ baM ril rbad rbad/ sod chod sod chod/ oM many+dzu ya mA na ta ka u ts+tsha ma ma kro d+ha pe ta li/ muM kro d+hi shwa ri dza dzA/ rag sha yag sha snying la

ya shes/ dun ting dun ting mug/ ma ra ya/ sod chod sod chod/ oM many+dzu shrI ya ma ra dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha mu tra snying kha rag mo b+h+yo/ nag mo kha li baM dza b+h+yo/ kha 'gram mu 'gram za 'graM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo

mA ra ya/ snying la ril ril du pa ya na rbad rbad/ oM shri many+dzu ya ma ra dza sa do me ya/ yaM tha yaM thums thums/ gshin rje dmar po dgra bo'i snying khrag la dug b+h+yo/ ma ru rtse dza la hur/ dbugs thums srog la yaM yaM dza

dza/ ku lan d+ha ri dza dza hU~M/ tsa mun da ri dza dza hU~M/ kang kang da ri dza dza hU~M/ khyi khrid ra khrid ro la khrag 'thung/ kang kang keng keng kying kying/ tsan d+ha ma ril khrag 'thung/ kang kang keng keng kying kying/ sha za ba'i/

snying 'byin pa'i/ khrag 'thung ba'i// dbugs 'phrog pa'i// srog gcod ba'i/ ro za ba'i// tsi ta ma ra ya sha za/ a tang par la/ sha la kyi spyang/ kra he kra he hU~M phaT/ gshin rje dmar nag 'bum khri dang// sprul pa
bsam 'das ma tshogs dang// dregs pa lha srin thams cad kun// sprin phung bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// drag po las kying shan pa dgod// gsad pa'i drag
sngags drag po'i las/ de nas slob dpon khyed rengs gdon// g.yon la khrag byugs dbus ni nag po bya// lag pa khrag byugs skra yang brdzes// dar nag thod bcings mi spags gon// rak+ta se ral me long

dpral// seng ldeng thogs la gshed po bsgom// bud med gdong pa nag por byug/ g.yas pa sle nag ming nas 'bod// g.yon pa lcags kyu 'dren tshul bya// khyo ga gdong pa rak+tas byug/ skra yi zhags pas ling ga
'then// kun kyang zhabs ma nang rjes la// gshed po ral gcig sgrol ging bsgom// yang snying thugs kyi rgyal po zlo// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs so// dgug pa'i sngags
rnams bzlas pa'i tshe// bdag gi spu yi bu ga nas// lcags kyu zhags pa thogs pa yi// khro bo 'jigs pa 'khor bcas kyis// dgra bo dgug cing bstim pa yang// ling ga dag la gnas par bsgom// de bzhin

dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// rang rang lta ba'i sprul pa yis// 'jig rten gang zhing dgra bo dgug/ ling ga dag la bstim bzhin bzlas// ye shes lha rnams thugs dam bskul// sgrol ging bse yi lha mo dang// pho

nya mang po dran med gang// rig pa lha yi rdzu 'phrul can// srid pa gsum gyi bya ra ma// sku la ye shes 'od 'bar ma// srid gsum gsal byed pho nya mngag/ snang srid dbang du 'dul bya zhing// dgug dang dbye ba
