bsnol mar rgyud// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sme phur gyi yang snying 'di gsungs so// che ge mo nri ra dza/ 'gal byed prod/ rlag byed gtso bos khang khang thums// sa ma ya many+dzu kug ta hU~M/

a nu ra ga ya mAn ta hU~M/ de phyi thums thums/ he sta ha ma sa ma ya gu gu thul/ ya man baM rim/ rbad rbad sod chod sod/ tses bzlas pa bya'o// che ge mo ni ya man ta ga la ru pa grongs shig/ shriHte kro ha ha/ shriHpi

dza ya kham thums/ zhes pas drag tu bskul bar bya'o// che ge mo ni dum ru ma bu tsi tu ra dum gcig/ khrag dug kha kha thums thums/ ma du ma tsi/ ru ru sa ya na/ mA ra ya rbad/ des kyang rab tu gsad par

bya'o// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru tra rbad/ raka sha rbad/ ma ma sny-ing rtsa rbad/ kha thun rbad/ rA ra ya rbad/ thal phyung thal phyung/ ma ma thun ma ma thun/ rbad du rbad du/ sa du yaM/ tsit+ta yaM/

ru thuM sa ma ya/ ma ra du thums sa ru ru thums ya na rbad/ ces ni tun dang phur bus brab/ tri ling shing ka du ri za yag sha rbad/ phu phye ma kha 'da' ru ru pra pra dum dum shig shig/ dgra bo ma ra rtsa rtsa ra dza rbad/ gsad cing rlag par byed pa'i

sngags// oM ga ga ta ya ga ta ya/ sarba dusaTan/ phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba sa saM/ phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big nam/ kA ya waka tsit+ta kI la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ drag tu bzlas shing
gnad du gdab// gnan pa dang bsreg pa'i las kyang bya// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ sme phur thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des sme phur gyi yang snying 'di dag gsungs so// oM a kro d+he ka ya man ta ka/ a mu khaM ya ma rA dza/ a mu khams sa do me ya/ a mu khaM/ ya me do ru/ a mu khaM/ Na yo ta

ya a mu khaM/ ya da yo ni a mu khaM/ ra yak+She ya a mu khaM/ yak+She yats+tsha a mu khaM/ ni ra ma ya a mu khaM/ oM hriSh+tIHwa kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ sa ma ya/ che ge mo ni ki la kI la ya ma ra ya rbad rbad/ phye rag

sha rag sha hU~M/ nr-i mA ra ya/ staM pa ya nan/ mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ra ya 'khor lo nag pos ru tra bsgral ba'i sme phur yang snying 'di gsungs

so// ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ ya khye ya ra ni/ yo da ya/ na yo ta ya ru do me ya/ ya me do sa dza ra ma ya/ ming trig nan a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya hU~M dza/ stam pa ya nan/ ma ra ya rbad/ ban d+he nang 'gras rlag par
'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ra ya 'khor lo nag pos ru tra bsgral ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// dbus ni gru
gsum mthing nag la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis ston// 'khor lo brgyad ni nag por bya// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyar la// pho thod mtshon cha 'khor lor bsam// mo thod lcags kyi 'khor lor

bsam// 'khor lo pho bskor mo bskor bri// pho thod spyi bor bug pa dbug/ thod pa gri bo'i khrag gis byug/ steng gi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du/ ri rab 'khor lo bri bar bya// de ltar byas pa'i 'khor lo de// dbus kyi

mthing nag e la gzhag/ de yi nang du ling ga gzhag/ ro ras shing lo rgya shog la// ra khrag kho bo yag stag gis// legs par bris la gnan yig dgod// nyi ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor// khrag dang sdug rnams

rab tu bsdug/ de nas thod pa'i 'khor lo de// ro ras gtums la 'brub khung gzhug/ mchod rten nag po khru gang la// baM rim lnga ru yod pa yis// khong seng can gyi thod pa mnan// bum pa'i 'og tu skar khung

gdod// bum pa ya man ta ka'i sngags// lha tshogs du ma'i sngags bris gzhug/ rab tu gnas pa dag kyang bya// rtag tu de la bskor bya zhing// mchod pa dag kyang rgyun du dbul// pho nya mang pos gzir gnon

bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ya man ta ya ma ra dza e ka dza ti dza/ ma ra dza sa do me ya/ ya me du ru Na yo da ya/ ya

da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ dgra bo tsit+ta la ma ra ya hU~M phaT dza/ shrI mun dzu ya ma ra tsa dza dza/ ya man ta ka a ka tsi ta dzi/ che ge mo tsi ta khar rbad rbad/ che ge mo tsi ta khar rbad rbad/ gshaM du rtsi grug

ling rbad/ dgra bo ni hur thums dza/ oM shri many+dzu ya ma rA tsa be ta le snying kha rag sa ma ya thum ril rbad/ ya ma ra dza sa sa do me ya/ khrag la do ru me ya dgra bo'i glad pa la ha/ hi ho re baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do

me ya/ ya me do ru k+Sha ye/ mgo chod che ge mo glo snying snying basnrid ma ra ya/ do ru me ya byi tsa ye sing ga ye/ bri ta yo/ tsa ta ye/ byi tsa se/ ha la se/ che ge mo trig nan/ nri ma ra ya hur thums dza/ nri ma

ra tsi ta/ myag thum ril rbad/ che ge mo nr-i ma ra ya rbad/ gsang sngags ga'u nag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje dme 'thab lcags kyi khang bu drag sngags snying po gsang ba'i rgyud ces gsungs so// de la yang ni

bshad bya ba// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang// bsnol khrag sme khra dug rdzas dang// lcags phye dag la sogs la bzlas// dus gsum brab shing gzir ba na// rtsa rgyud rlag par yang dag ba shad// ces

gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sme phur gyi las gzhug gi chings 'di gsungs so// mdzo rtol de'u'i thod pa 'am// khams gshed brtsis pa'i thod pa la// spyi bor rdo rje rgya gram dang// ri rab gling
bzhis lam dar bcas// thod pa lcags kyi mun khang la// 'chi bdag ral ba tsar dgu bzhugs// sbrul nag stong gi gdan stengs na// gshin rje dbyug pa nag po bsnams// de la gzas pa gtad bya

ba// ral gri 'bar bas sa dral nan// ral pa tshar dgu gsal pa dang// kye ma 'di nas tod pa gshed kyi mun khang na// baM ri gtams pa'i dur khrod na// khrag 'tsho 'khyil ba'i gling dkyil na// gnod sbyin kun

gyi tshogs chen rje// klu srin kun gyi dmag dpon te// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha ba// dkon mchog spyi dgrar gyur pa ni// khyod la gtad kyi sho ra re// de skad bdag kyang rab tu brjod// bsgom zhing phyag rgya
rab tu gsal// ya rtag dam rdzas gtad cing dra ba// sngags brab drang srong dmod pas gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnan sngags dang khram la gdab pa'i sngags 'di gsungs

so// oM du sa tri k+She ya hU~M/ oM hriSh+tIHwi kr-i tA mon ta dgra bo ma ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya hU~M nan/ 'bri nan rtsa rtsi nan/ ha su sad b+h+yo/ thuM bying thuM bying/ b+h+yo thum b+h+yo thum/ brum pa ra li nan/ seng spu sengs pu sed/ k+Sha drad k+Sha

drad/ ni khad kha sa me sa he/ e ri le li ba shan shig shig/ e hri trad nan/ tri pa li le// shan bra ba mi// e re li le/ gshan/ he ha pa shi sha ra/ tsha tsha li li hi nan/ sha shi b+h+yo thums hu ru hu ru/ hU~M ta ra ta ra/

tshal tshal/ mug mug mug/ myos myos myos/ rag sha tsi ta dza la hU~M/ karma tsa ti dza la hU~M/ ga ru ga ru/ ra ti ra ti/ gur ti gur ti/ 'am du 'am du/ tsan tri hri ka so pa ti kha gri sog ma ra rbad/ stam pa ya srog stam pa
ya srog stam pa 'dir rbad rbad/ thod pa'i dbang po dag la gdab// ral pa tshar dgu'i lag tu gtata// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdab// ces gsungs so// de nas yang dag nges bshad pa// shar lho 'brub
khung dag tu yang// gdug pa can gyi shing bu la// drug brtsegs dag gaM baM po bsgreng// khrag dang dug chus bsku bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor lhor ltar 'dug/ gtor ma mar dang gung shing

dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang// ling ga la sogs bsag par bya// gzhan yang zangs phye lcags phye dang// rus bye rdo rje gtor ma dang// snying dang glo ba ming byang dang// mchin pa mkhal ma rgyu pa

dang// khrag dang rus pa la sogs dang// snying dang mkhris pa rje dar dang// mar khu sbrang dang 'o ma khrag/ bdag nyid khros pa'i gdug sems kyis// rag sha 'phreng ba se ral pa// lag tu lcags kyi gzar pu

yis// me lha'i tshogs dang lha tshogs la/ bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim byas nas// so so rtsa sngags kha raM khas// drag tu dam rdzas dbul bar bya// thugs kyi snying po'i zhabs dag la// lha tshogs so so'i rtsa sngags

dang// sraig sngags bsdaibs la 'bul bya zhing// re re nyid la rtsa brgyad sngags// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig yin// rdzogs dang thal ba klu la gtad// yang na rlung lha'i tshogs la dbul// de ltar rdzogs rje bsdu dang
gshegs// rnal 'byor sgrib sbyang bar chad sel// dmigs pa myur tu rlag par 'gyur/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ rdo rje dme phur dang/ lcags spur pu dang/ gnan cing srog gcad
las kyi gzhug sdud pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// he he dpal 'bar khro rgyal gdong// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bstan pa

gnas par mi 'gyur te// las kyi bdud chen khong nas 'khrug/ dam sri rang gi rgyud las ldang// rang gis rang gi bstan pa 'jig/ rang sha rang gis za ba'i dus// de lta bu yi dus byung bas// stong phrag brgyad cu'i
gdon rnams 'khrug/ nad dang mtshon ni skar ltar 'khrug/ bsgrub pa'i long med cing// bstan pa rang gis 'jig pas na// de dus bstan pa gang gis bsrung// zhes zhus pas/ nyon cig 'jig rten mgon po

khyod// khyod kyis dus gsum mkhyen gsal ba// nga la zhus pa legs so nyon// bskal ba snyigs ma byung ba'i tsha/ bstan pa rang gis 'jig pas na// srid pa lto nas bzlog kyang 'tshal// mtshon cha rtse nas gzung
yang 'tshal// lha 'dre'i srog nas gzung yang 'tshal// 'dus byas mi rtag bshad kyang 'tshal// rang gshed rang la bslab pa dang// mtshon kha nang du bstan pa dang// rang srog rang gis gcad kyang
'tshal// bsnyen pa'i lha ni bdud du dbab// ces gsungs so// skye med rnam dag lhun gyis grub// ye shes dkyil 'khor chu zla'i tshul// mi rtog dbyings las thugs rje sgrol// phyogs dus lha yi dkyil 'khor
che// mchod pa bla med rgya ches mchod// chos nyid la ni chos nyid rol// snang srid ye sangs rgyas pa la// tshogs bsags dge rtsa'i bya sa med// don dam skye med ye shes lha// kun rdzob 'gag med
gdug pa 'dul// gzugs snang thams cad khro bo'i sku// bza' btung sha khrag ri bo mtsho// skye 'gro ma lus sgrol ba'i zhing// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// srog dang srog gi gnad nas
ded// don dam zhes pa'i ming dang bral// brjod med nam mkha' dang 'dra// kun rdzob gzugs la gces pa// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bas lta// rjes mi dang yi ge las// gsal ba'i srog dang yig 'bru
slang// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// lnga brgya snyigs ma'i dus de ru// stong phrag brgyad cu'i gdon rnams 'khrug/ sngags pa nang 'gras byung
ba yis// dam sri 'jig rten lha 'dres byed// de la bgegs rigs du ma la// ded dpon ris su rtog pa gang// sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// rang gshed rang la slong ba gang// bzlog dang bsrung dang
bsad pa dang// bsreg dang mnan pa ji ltar lags// srog gi yi ge ji lta bu// gcod cing gzir dang rnam shes srog/ yang dag dpa' bos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid
cang mi gsung bar dregs pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas yang 'di skad gsungs so// nyon cig 'jig rten mgon po khyod// bgegs rigs du ma de dag la// ded dpon nyi shu
rtsa lnga yin// de dag kun gyi rje bo ni// yi dgas gshin rje nag po yin// skos dang las kyi chos 'chad cing// srid gsum sems can tshe srog 'brel// ces gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang

sngags kyi rgyal po 'di thon to// oM sa mA ya ar+ya many+dzu/ oM shrI mu tra ya man ta ka pan tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ he la tsa tra rus ni/ ku lan tsa sa mA ya ra ya gu gu thul mA ra ya/ drag po nam mkha' thog dang 'dra// zhes
gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras kyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog snying rnam shes byung ba

'di gsungs so// ya ma rag mo rag sha/ k+She ma badzra kri ta/ dun ting ki la ya/ ma ma rok+ma/ nyid du rngubs/ he sha rag krag/ dug brag/ dun ting 'bi la li/ a dun ti/ tri shan/ ra tsa ha ti/ tsa ra mu trag/ sha truM sti

sta/ ri ni ri/ tri nag a tri sa du/ tsa tri/ ra tsa/ rA tsa nA ga du sa pu tri/ kha rag/ k+She ma tri/ dun ting dun ting/ tro srog mA ra ya/ ga na pa ti/ bi na ka ti/ ka la tu dbrag/ byi ru ra/ na ga mo ting/ sa ga byi ru/ badzra
a gu sha dza/ trig nan/ dza la rim ram/ ma ra ya rbad/ stam pa ya nan/ sa ma ya dam dam/ de dag spyi'i gzir byed do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten lha 'dre'i srog gcad pa 'di

gsungs so// oM ya ma ta da/ d+ha a tra na rwa rak+She sha dza tsa sa ga ni tra tri me sri sa ma yA ma ru lu/ dun ting ki la ya/ tir ta ka/ ru tra de ba/ rag sha yag sha/ yag mo/ mun mun/ shu la/ ra tsa/ dun ting/ badzra sa du/

haM shaM/ sa na ga/ ru gri/ sarba shad druM/ dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras kyi 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog snying bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rdo rje nang 'gras kyi las gnam lcags 'khor lo nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// yid 'thad dur khrod ma ra yar// byang chub sems ldan rnal 'byor pas// maN+Dal zla gam gru bzhi'i bar// gru
gsum nag po dpangs su brtsigs// dur khrod ras la dug khrag gis// 'khor lo rim pas bskor byas la// dang por yab kyi gsang sngags bri// nang du rtse bstan mtshon cha bri// dbus su gshin rje nag po
yi// lto bar rang gshed 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid srog la ya man ta kar bsgom// 'brub khung kha la 'khor lo dgram// dang po bod pa ni/ mi 'ong 'ong bar bya ba yin// gshin rje gshed pos dbang du

bsdu// gnyis pa ri rgyal rbab lta bus// rang dbang med pas gzir myos bya// gsum pa srog snying thob par bya// bzhi pas ma ra tri dang bcas// lnga bas mnan cing bsreg par bya// de nas phyis ni log gnon

du// dam tshig mar bas bzhag pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas dpal 'bar nyid kyis rdo rje rang gshed kyi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sa mA ya Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra/ ya mAn ta ka ban tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ he

la tsakra pa na/ tsa ru pa ni/ ku lan tsa sa ma ya/ ma ra ya gu gul thul/ mA ra ya/ e ra ga re ba sha mo ha/ na ma i ri sha b+h+yo/ badzra sarba du stan/ ya ma trig na/ srog ni hur tums dza/ sa ma ya a gu sha dza dza/ ming
trig nan/ srog hur thums dza/ ya ma ya ma rA tsa/ ming tig nan srog hur thums dza/ ming srog staM pa yan/ sa ma ya dam dam/ gshin rje 'khor lo la sogs pa// bskor nas rang nyid rlag par 'gyur// bdag

nyid gsal ba'i go cha ste// drag sngags mtshon cha 'khor lo yis// dmigs pa sngags kyi gnas yin te// rang gshed yin pas yang dag gsungs// de la yang dag bshad bya na// ya ma trig nan/ ya che ge mo tsit+ta

mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya sod/ tsit+ta gnad la bor ba'o// ya ma hur thums rbad ril/[ \u0f84]raM ni tsi ta ma ra ya rbad/ hU~M badzra ma ru ni dza dza/ hU~M ni hur thums ril tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma snying
tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ srog long rbod/ gshin rje 'khor lo ma ra ya// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa yi// srog la 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'khor

lo nag po snying la bskor ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las/ mtshon 'khrugs nag mo zhas bya ba 'di gsungs so// dur khrod yid dang 'thad par 'gro// sa ma

ya dang ldan byas la// maN+Dal brub khung khru gang sar// khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya// dur khrod ras sam shog shog la// 'khor lo rim pa ldan pa la// tha ma gshin rje'i sngags kyis bskor// dug dang khrag tu
bsres pa yis// ma mo'i gzugs ni dbus su bri// lto bar gnad kyi 'khor lo bri// dbus su srog gi yi ge bri// ling ga bri ba zag pa zad// bdud bcas khro bo'i rgyu la bri// yi ge'i gnas su dgod par
bya// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgom// 'khor lo ma mo chen mor bsgom// ling ka gzas par gsal bar bya// gsad pa'i gzor kyang gong ltar bsgrub// 'khor lo non khar thun gyis brab// dam can 'bod
cing gtor ma gtang// brang brdung ma nyes dpang yang gzugs// de nas 'khor lo drag tu bskor// bdun nam gsum mam bcu gnyis 'grub// srid pa ma mo thams cad kun// khra spyang gzan la 'du ba

ltar// mnyam pa nyid la 'du bar 'gyur// oM sa mA ya/ he la tsa tra e rA ga/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma hur thums dza/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma ni hur thums dza/ ma ma ru lu staM pa ya yan/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ che

ge mo tsi ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya sod/ ma ma ru lu hur thums ril/ baM tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ hU~M badzra ma du ni dza dzaHhU~M nr-i hur thums ril/ tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ ma ru lu snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri
srog long dbugs la yang rbad/ khrag dug nyungs kar nyungs nag dang// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye dang brab// yug sa mo yi zhabs mas gdab// 'jug tu zhabs mar gums nas ni// dur khrod dag tu gnan par
bya// ma mo'i zor thun ma sa rbad ya/ 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// dam bdar rtags thon rag ta gtang// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyus las/ srid pa gsum zor bzlog thun zor
bzlog/ thun dang gshed 'khor lo snying la gzer 'debs kyi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po des/ rdo rje nang sme las rgya mdud nag po dang mgo mjug ma zhes bya ba
'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i gnas bzung la// dug shing nag po tsher ma can/ yang na shir shing nag po la// mgo 'jug ma nor phur pa de// paug por nag po'i
dud pas bdugs// rgya mdud nag por hU~M nag gcig/ rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// rgya mdud 'og mar gzir sngags bri// tha ma dpal ma ma ra ya// lcum zhog dag la bco lnga pa// rtsa ba'i yi ge

bri bar bya// 'khor lo gong dang rgyu 'thun te// 'dzo rta'i khrag dang dug bsres la// khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs bdar bri// 'brub khung gting du gru gsum bru// tha ma rtsang dmar dag gis bskor// de la ling ga

bri ba dag/ shog shog kar ri ka la bri// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar bsgom// khros pas nga rgyal drag pos brgad// mdzo rta dre'u'i thod pa la// rdo rje rgya gram rab tu bri// oM laM snying po bris la gzhag/ yul gsum
'di nyid gsal byas la// drag po rang gshed 'khor lo rang gshed bskor// phur bu'i dbal kha rang la ldog/ phur bu mda' ru 'phen par rmi// phur bu dbal nas 'dzin par rmi// oM sa ma ya he la tsakra/ e ra

rA ga badzra/ dun ting ka la ya tri nan// ta hur thums dza/ dun ting ka la ya/ aM gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ dun ting ki la ya krig nan/ dun ting la ya/ che ge mo nr-i hur thums badzra/ ta tri ma ra ya

rbad/ dun ting ka la ya krig/ dun ting ki la ya che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad nan/ dun ting ki la ya trig nan/ ta che ge mo tsit+ta la mA ra ya rbad/ ta che ge mo nr-i hur thums dzA/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/

dun ting ki la hu thums ril/ raM bri tsi ra mA ra ya rbad/ hU~M madzra ma du ni dza dzA/ hU~M nr-i hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ dun ting ki la ya snying tsit+ta ma ra ya/ tri sog long dbugs la yang rbad// khrag dug nyungs

kar dag gis brab// phur pa nag po dril zhing brdeg/ de nas lha klu'i gnas dag tu// 'khor lo thod par rab brubs la// ling ka'i snying khar phur pas gdab phur bus btab kyang rang la 'debs so// rgyu ldog
phur gshed nag po yin// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ ki la ya khrag 'di nag po rang gshed 'khor lo'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po nyid kyis rdo

rje nang dme'i las phung byed dug mda' nag po 'di gsungs so// ri nag mon nag khros pa 'dra// rtswa dang shing du skyes pa'i gnas// sngags pa dam tshig ldan pa'i mis// maN+Dal mthing nag gru gsum la// gri rgod

khrag gis zhal zhal bya// kha la rtsang mar dgram par bya// skyer pa'i mda' la skyung kha'i sgro// mtho gang ba ni tshad yin no// dug dang khrag dang rtod nag byug/ khraM khraM khraM la thob ces bri// dar nag yang dor bdud la
gtad// rtags thon gtang rag khas kyang blangs// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// 'khor lo bdud du rab bsgoms la// lid+ga gzas pa de la gtad// rang gshed rang la bskor bar gsod// oM sa mA yA/

he la tsakra/ e ra ge badzra ru tra trig nan/ rta hur thums dza/ ru tri d+ha a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad staM b+ha ya nan/ ru tre trig nan/ ru tri che ge mo nr-i hur thums ma dza/ da ni ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri trig nan/

ru tri che ge mo hur thums rbad/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri trig nan/ d+ha che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ d+ha che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ru dri hur thums ril/ ru Ni tsi t+ti mA ra ya rbad/ o badzra ma du ni dza

dza/ hU~M N-i hur thums ril/ tsi t+ta ma ra ya rbad/ ru tri snying tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ skyer ba'i mda' nag dag la yang// bsngags shing ling dag la brdeg/ bdud kyi khram shing nag po
la// bdud kyi gzugs bri 'khor lo de// bdud du bsam la bdud du brdeg/ bdud kyi khram kha stong 'gyur na// mun pa'i zhags pa stong 'gyur dang// 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// dam tshig bdag pos
dbang du bshad// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ bdud rang gshed rang la dbab pa ru tra nag po srog len khram nag rang gshed kyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

nyid kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las me 'bar nag mo 'bru gcig pa/ shang ka'i rang gshed 'di gsungs so// ma la ya yi rtse mo 'am// sha spyang 'du ba'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal nag po khru gang pa// rim pa gsum dang
ldan pa la// zla gam ljang nag bri bar bya// rgya shog dag la 'khor lo bri// dbus su ljang nag gsha' bsams bri// ling ga rang gzugs rang gnad bri// 'bru gtor gser skyaims phud gtor la// bdag nyid ya

man ta kar bsgom// gnod sbyin sngo nag 'bar ba la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam sri la// mtshon cha'i char pa phab par bsam// de 'dar phyai dang mtshon cha che// dug khrag ra'i ngar bslud la// 'dud dang ling ga

dag la brab/ ya man ta ka gsal bsgoms nas// oM sa ma yA/ he sa tsakra/ e ra ga/ badzra yag shri trig nan/ k+Sha hur thums dza/ yang sha k+Sha/ a gu sha dza/ mA ra ya/ stam b+ha ya nan/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che

ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ k+Sha ni ma ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/ yag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ yag sha trig nan/

k+Sha che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ yag sha hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ta rbad/ yag sha hur thums ril/ ri ni tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad nan// oM badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M ni hur thums

ril/ tsi t+ta mA ra ya rbad/ ya a snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri/ srog ling dbugs la rbad/ tsham rngam drag po'i sngags brabs// myur du rlag par dpa' bos bshad// gnod sbyin sde dpon brgya rtsa brgyad// nyi shu rtsa lnga la
sogs pa// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// rbad kha stong dang brub shing stong// rang la rang gi mtshon char 'bebs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud
las/ gnod sbyin rang gshed chen pa ngar ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje nang sme'i las gdug pa klu'i 'jigs thabs 'di gsungs so// na ga med pa me brtsegs

'khyil// dur khrod ro sha bsgrub pa'i gnas// rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa yis// dur khrod sa 'am phung sa la// 'brub khung byas la dug khrag byug/ ldong ros ro yi sol bas byug/ rus sbal nag po'i pags pa
la// shing shun dag la klu yi gzugs// sbrul nag gzugs la mgo gzugs bya// lto bar rang gshed kyi yi ge dgod// ling ka khro ba dag la bris// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// klu gnyan rang gshed rang

la dbab// oM sa mA ya Ar+ya/ he la tsakra/ ban tsa e ra ga badzra/ na ga trig nan/ phu hur thums dzra/ sa na ga phu/ a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya staM sa ya nan/ na ga trig nan/ sa na ga che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ phu sgri mA

ra ya phaT/ na ga trig nan/ na ge che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ na ga trig nan/ phu che ge mo tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ phu che ge mo sa hur thums/ dza ti mA ra ya rbad/ na ga hur thums ril/ ri nri tsit+ta mA ra

ya rbad/ hU~M badzra ma du ni dza dza/ tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ na ga snying tsit+ta ma ra ya tri srog long dbugs la rbad/ klu gnyan gnad la bor ba'i las// byad dang stong dang dug nad la?s// thar byed bstan pa'i bdud du
dbab// gzhan yang gtad mkhan dang 'gras// myur du kho nyid 'phung bar 'gyur// bsrung ba bya bar 'dod na yang// rigs dang drung gis thabs las dang// rtsol ba dang/ byed kyi las gzhen chags las gyur
dug las thar/ ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ las kyi klu nag 'khrug pa rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis rdo rje nang sme las mtshon cha 'khrug pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// dza la mo rab srog gi bdag/ 'jig rten dregs can sgrub pa'i mis// ri gsum rtse la sogs pa ru// maN+Dal nag po khru gang la// gri bo'i

khrag gis bri bar bya// rgya gor dag la 'khor lo bri// dregs can mi yi lus po la// sems can g.yag gi mgo bo can// yang na sha ba'i mgo ru bya// sha ba'i ru la khro stod la// mtshal gyis g.yung drung bri bar
bya// ling ga bri ba shes byas la// 'khor lo 'brub khung kha ru dgram// dam can ya mAn ta ka'i sku// 'khor lo dmar nag g.yag mgo can// dza dmar srog dang bcas pa'i bsam// gzas pa dngos su gsal ba
gces// shod ka'i rde'u dkar nag dang// dug dang khrag la sngags bzlas te// sku la gtor zhing drag sngags drang// oM sa ma yA/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga/ badzra shu la trig nan/ dza hur thums dza/ shu la
dza dza/ a gu sha dza dza/ ma ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ shu la trig nan/ shu la che ge mo nr-i/ hur thums dza/ dza nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ shu la trig nan/ shu la che ge mo hur thums dza/ che

ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ shu la trig nan/ che ge mo tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ dza che ge mo hur thums/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ shu lu hur thums ril/ hU~M badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M nr-i hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ shu la tsit+ta snying tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya
rbad// khrag tu shod rdi'u char phab la// sha ru'i khram la rab tu gtem// ling ga 'khor lo rab gtum la// ri gsum rtse la gnan pa bya// sha khyi gso dang jag pa 'gyed// me 'bar chu yang 'khrugs pa

rmigs// 'byung ba lnga yi btsan dang ni// klu btsan yams shod la sogs pa// tha rabs sum brgya drug cu dang// shod ka stong dang nad ka 'bum// dmod mkhan yod na kho dang rlag/ 'jigs byed srog rtsa khrag gi
lung// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gri thabs 'bum 'gyur rang gshed kyi le'u ste so brgyad po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las srog rtsa 'khor lo
nag po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// ri gsum rtse 'am ngo brgya'i brag/ bya rgod lding ba'i gnas su bya// sngags ba dam tshig ldan pa yis// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas la// maN+Dal gru gsum mthing nag

la// rtsang bskor thod pa'i 'phreng bar bskor// dar dkar dag la 'khor lo bri// ling ga dag la bri/ srog gi yi ge bkod byas la// 'brub khung kha ru dgram par bya// khyi dkar thod pa dag la yang// dpral bar

mtshal gyis g.yung drung bri// mtshon sna lnga yi skud pas gril// tsa dkar tsit+ta dmigs byas la// ya man ta ka gsal ba dang// oM sa ma/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga badzra/ ra dza trig nan/ tsa hur thums dza/ ra tsa tsa/ a

gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ stam b+ha ya nan/ ra tsa trig nan/ ra tsa che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ tsa ni mA ra ya rbad/ rA tsa trig nan/ tsa che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo ma ra ya rbad/ rA tsi trig nan/ rA tsa ge ge mo tsit+ta

mA ra ya rbad/ tsa che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rA tsa hur thums ril/ raM tsi ni ta mA ya rbad/ hU~M nr-i hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ t+ta tsa snying tsit+ta mA ra ya tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ rdzas

dang 'khor lo khyi yi thod par brub// lha khang sgo 'am mtshod rten nam// gtad khram 'khor los kha bcad mnan/ rgyal po sde bzhi man chad nas// rgyal phran sum brgya drug cu yang// 'khor lo 'di yi dbang du
'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ ra tsa srog len rgyal po rang gshed kyi 'khor los bstan pa ste le'u so dgu pa'o//// de nas dpal 'bar chen po des/ rdo rje nang
dme'i las srin po mda' sha 'bri ba/ ling ga'i snying sngags rang gshed kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ gdug pa'i srog dang bral ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gnas sam shing gcig drung// rab tu sa rtsub
gnas dag tu// maN+Dal drag po e dang ldan// e la ya yi 'dab ma la// srin po gdug pa'i 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgoms// ling ga 'khor lo dgram byas la// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ e

ga badzra/ rag sha trig nan/ ra hur thums dza/ rag sha ra/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM b+ha ya nan/ rag sha trig nan/ rag sha che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra

ya rbad/ rag sha hur thums ril/ ri ni tsit+ta ma' ra ya rbad/ hU~M badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rag sha tsit+ta mi tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ lang ka'i srin sngags thams cad
kyang// 'khor lo 'di la srog 'dus pas// rang dbang med pas las byed 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srin po'i srog bdud rang gshed gsang khram nag po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
pa'o//// de nas yang dpal 'jigs byed chen po des/ rdo rje nang dme las lha rgod kyi drag sngags rang gshed phab ste/ srog la 'khor lo bskor ba'i las 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten lha chen dbang chen
dang// bsten pa'i lha dang bsgrub pa'i lha// 'go ba'i sla la sogs pa ste// rang gshed phab la bdud du dbab// lha cig skyes pa'i lha lnga'o// rang las 'byung bas rang la dbab// lha yi gtar srog 'du ba
yis// rang 'thad gnas su maN+Dal bya// gru gsum mthing nag khrag tu byug/ sme rdzas rnams kyis me yang gtang// 'khor lo rgya shog dag la bya// yi ge gnad la dgod par bya// 'go ba'i lha lnga dag kyang

bri// ling ga bris la 'khor lo brub// ya man ta ka gsal ba dang// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsa kra/ e ra ga badzra/ de ba pa tsa trig nan/ a hur thums dzA/ de ba a pa a gu sha dza dza/ de ba tsan tsa trig nan/ de ba ban

tsa che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ a ni ma ra ya rbad/ de ba pe na/ tsa trig nan/ a de ba che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ de ba pan tsa trig nan/ a che ge mo tsit+ta ya ma rbad/ a che ge mo hur thums

dza/ tsit+ta ma ma ra ya phaT/ de ba pan tsa hur thums ril/ raM tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ hU~M badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M ni hur thums thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ de ba pan tsa snying tsit+ta ma trig srog long dbugs la ya rbad/
'khor lo kho bo'i khang 'gram mam// yang na lha rten gnas dag gam// rigs gsum gnas su gnas gyur na// bsten pa rang gi bdud du 'bab// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud
las/ bsten pa rang la gshed du dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje nang dme'i las gdon thams cad rang gshed du dbab pa// srog bdag 'khor lo nag po 'di
gsungs so// lang ga grub pa'i gnas dag tu// brag dmar logs la bsgrub par bya// srid pa'i srog bdag gnad la bor// ban d+he bon po dmangs dang rje// mgo nag yongs kyi rje dpon de// rang gshed
bskur la srog la rbad// dur khrod mchod pa'i sa dag la// 'brub khung brtsigs la gtsang mar dgod// lag pa li'i lo ma li// ka ri ka la 'khor lo bri// ling ga bris la 'khor lo dgram// ya mAn ta kar

gsal bar bsgom// oM sa mA ya/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga bar/ badzra sa du trig nan/ kra hur thums dza/ badzra sa du dza/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ya rbad/ stam pa ya nan/ badzra sa du trig nan/ badzra sa du che ge mo nr-i

hur thums dza/ tra ni ma ra ya rbad/ badzra sa du trig nan/ badzra sa du che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ badzra sa du hur thums ril/ baM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M ni hur thums ril/ tsit+ta

mA ra ya rbad/ badzra sa du snying tsit+ta ma tri srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ lha rten gnas sam ri zur gnan// sten pa bdud du babs par gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las dgra bla gshed
kyi le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las dmu bdud srog mnga' byed kyis sos chus la/ gdug pa khram la 'debs pa 'di gsungs so// brag bo che yi rtsang phyin
la// maN+Dal gru gsum rtsang gis bskor// 'khor lo bris la gnad yig dgod// ling ga lto bar bcug nas kyang/ ya man ta ka gsal bar bcug gam// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ mun mun trig ta nan/ ba

hur thums dza/ mun mun pa/ a gu sha dza dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM pa ya nan/ mun mun trig nan/ mun mun mun che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza/ sa ni ma ra ya rbad/ mun mun trig nan/ mun mun che ge mo nr-i hur thums dza che

ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ mun trig nan/ ba che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mun mun hur thums ril/ raM ni tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ oM badzra ma du ni dza dza/ hU~M ni hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ mun mun snying
tsit+ta ma ra ya rbad/ trig srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ brag nag 'og tu mnan byas la// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gdug pa khram 'debs kyi
le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las khram nag dmig 'og phyin ci log 'di gsungs so// dug shing skye ba'-i sa dag tu// ro bsregs sa dang g.yul
bkye'i sa// 'brub khung brtsegs ma dag tu bya// sbal pa nag po'i pags pa 'am/ ra rog gi rog pags pa la// sme khrag dag gis 'khor lo bri// ling ga 'khor lo'i ltor brubs la// sa sna rdo phye sna tshogs

dang// dug dang khrag gi char pa dbab// rag ta bzang zhing skyug pa bod// ya man ta ka gsal bsgroms la// sa ma ya/ he la tsakra/ he la tsakra/ e ra ga badzra/ tir ti ka trig nan/ dur hur thums dza/ tir ti ka

du/ a gu sha dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ staM pa ya nan/ tir ti ka trig nan/ tir ti ka che ge mo hur thums dza/ du ni mA ra ya rbad/ tir ti ka trig nan/ tir ti ka che ge mo hur thums dza/ che ge mo mA ra ya rbad// tir ti ka

trig nan/ du che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ du ba che ge mo mA ra ya rbad/ du che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ tir ti ka thums ril/ raM ni tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ hU~M badzra du ni dza dza/ hU~M hur thums ril/ tsit+ta mA ra ya
rbad/ tir ti snying tsit+ta mA ra ya srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ ri nag rtse la mnan byas la// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ mu stegs ngan
sngags thams cad 'khor lo'i dbang du bskor la// gdug byed khram la 'debs pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nang dme'i las bgegs dang log 'dren sna 'dren dang/
sdong par bcas pa rang gshed 'khor lo 'di gsungs so// phug bdag dang ni 'gong po dang// gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo'i tshogs// rang gshed rang la bslang la gsad// gnod sbyin srin mo bud med
tshogs// rang gnad yi ge 'khor lo bya// 'gong po dag la bu chung 'dra// dam sri phag gam rnga mo bya// klu bdud mo ni bud med 'dra// 'khor lo bskor zhing nyungs kar brab// phur pas btab la hom la

bsreg/ yang na gzir cing mnan pa bya// oM sa ma ya/ he la tsakra badzra/ rag mo trig nan/ ra hur thums dza/ rag mo ma ra ya rbad/ rag mo trig nan/ sha hur thums dza/ haM shaM trig nan/ sha hur thums dza/ du ma

trig nan/ me hur thums dza/ ru tri trig nan/ sri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad rbad/ srog staM b+ha ya nan/ mi srog ag ni sha trung dza la raM/ 'jig rten dregs pa thams cad ni// snying 'gas srog dang 'bral bar
'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog 'phrog cing rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten mgon po
des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'jig rten dregs pa 'di dag la// rdo rje nang 'gras las dag tu// rang gshed 'khor lo gshad pa na// 'khor lo bskor dus gang la bya// stong srog
'du na gang du 'du// mchod cing bsten pa ji ltar lags// rtags kyi rim pa ji ltar 'byung// zhes zhus pas// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyin cig 'jig rten
mgon po khrod// dregs pa rang shug pa yi 'khrug pa yis// mtshan rtags ngan na 'khor lo gzir// sngags pa nang 'gras byung ba'i tshe// sbod gtong stobs ni 'gran pa'i tshe// gzig yag rtags kyi me

long lta// gang byung de la 'khor lo bskor// rtags rnams 'khrugs par byung ba na// snying srog gcig tu bsdus la gta?ng// stong srog gcig gis gcad par bya// yang na 'di ltar shes par bya// pho srog gcig tu
shes par bya// mo srog gcig tu shes par bya// gdug pa gsum po gcig tu shes// mu stegs ngan sngags gcig tu shes// bgegs kyi ru log che ba na// srog gi bu gte'u gzung bar bya// phyis kyi log mnon
byung ba na// dam tshig mna' yis bsgag par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sra ba'i cho ga bgo bar bya// brdeg pa'i mtshon cha brdung bar bya// 'ben gyi bca' lugs bca' bar
bya// gsal ba'i me long rab blta zhing// stong sde dmangs su gcad par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong srog thams cad gcig tu gsad/ gdug pa can gnad la phab pa// srog la

ma ra yas gdab ba 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya man ta ka pa na tsa te ro ni tsa hU~M dza/ he la tsakra pan tsa rU pa ni lan tsa sa ma ya/ ma ra ya gu gu thul/ mA ra ya e ra ya ga de ba sha mo ha na ma

i ru sha b+h+yo/ badzra sarba du saTan/ yak+She na yab rag mo/ ra gsha'/ gshe ma/ badzra kro d+ha/ dun ti ki la ya/ ma ma rag mo/ nyid du rngubs/ ha sha rag tra/ du phrag dun ting/ 'bing la ni/ a dun tri/ tri sha na/ ra dza

ha ti/ ra dza mu trag/ sha trung sti sta/ ra ni ro trig nan/ a tri sa du/ tsa tri sa du/ tsa tri/ rA dza/ rA dza na ga/ de ba ru tri kha rag k+She ma tri/ dun ting dun ting tri srog ma ra ya/ 'ga' na sa ti/ 'phi na ka ro/ ka la du

phrag/ byi ru ra/ na ga mo tri/ na ga byi du/ sarba sha trung nan/ e ni hur thums dza/ e ni che ge mo mA ra ya/ sarba sha trung trig nan/ e ni che ge mo'i dbang du tsit+ta mA ya rbad/ e ni che ge mo hur thums dza/ tsit+ta mA ra ya

rbad/ sarba sha trung snying tsit+ta mA ra ya srog long dbugs la ya rbad/ de yis stong snying 'dus pa yin// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// las rnams 'gor na ru log bya// gsad pa'i nang nas mchog tu
bshad// gang dag bsrung bar 'dod na yang// kla du mgo 'dren shes pa la// tshig gsum bzlas pas bsrung bar 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ stong srog bsdu
gsad kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// mchod rten gyi gtang rag gtang ba'i las 'di gsungs so// dam bcas rnam pa gnyis yin te// mchod pa 'thun

pa'i rdzas rnams yin// rin chen rnam lnga dri ma lnga// sman dang 'bru yi gtor ma gtang// 'bru skyems la sogs gtang par bya// mi sha rta sha khrag chen dang// ba dmar glang dmar sha khrag snying// 'bri rog g.yag

rog sha khrag gzugs// seng ge dkar mo sha khrag snying// nya sbrul sbal pa'i sha khrag dang// tsa ra khaM brgya'i sha dang khrag/ lug nag sha khrag til nag dang// mkha' lding shel nag smug mo yi// sha khrag snying dang
bcas pa dang// chu gtsang khrag gtsang bsres pa dang/ ra dmar sha khrag snying la sogs// phag pa rog po'i snying khrag dang// rta yi sha khrag la sogs dang// gzugs la sogs pa so sor mchod// 'jig rten

dregs pa de rnams la// dgra rtags byung ba'i dus su mdzod// 'jig rten lha 'dre'i srog shes na// sprin dpung bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// rje bor mthong nas nges bar

'khur// ma nor nges pa'i lam yang ston// ces gsungs so// mi mthun gnad kyis rdzas bstan pa// mi rta bya gsum tsil bu dang// nya sbrul sbal pa gsum gyi sha/ khyi phag spyang ki'i rtug pa dang// mdzo rtol

'dre'u'i sbug zhob dang// rta rmig glang ru bzhogs pa dang// ra dug sbyang dur bung dug dang// thar nu la sogs dug sna dang/ dud pas 'dugs na grong chen yang// snying 'gas srog dang bral bar 'gyur// mi
mthun log 'dren 'byung ba na// dmigs la dud 'dug 'khor lo bskor// da lta nyid du rlag par 'gyur// yul bdag yod pa'i gnas dag tu// rdzas su 'dug ste yul bdag gzir// da lta nyid du grog por
'byung// rgya tshil thang khrom nag mo dang// zha nye gnad rdzas bsregs gyur na// yul khams phung ba'i dal yams phab// drag po gnad kyi las thabs yin// dam tshig bdag por rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin
rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ drag po rdzas kyi le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di gsungs so// bsnyen bsgrub las la sbyar ba yi// 'bod stong sme
stobs 'gran dus su// rtags rnams 'khrug par ston pa dang// rang rang rtags su 'byung 'gyur te// rbod gtong bzlog pas kho rang brlag/ me 'bar ba dang 'od shar ba dang// nyi zla shar dang nam langs
dang// ban d+he mon dang rgya gar dang// rang byung dang ni mon mo dang// rdo rje slob dpon byung ba na// ye shes lha tshogs nye ba yin// mkha' la 'phur nas rtsa phur 'debs// mtshon cha brdung dang
'debs pa dang// lus shugs che la sems yang yol// des ni rab tu grub pa yin// mda' dang mde'u char pa 'byung// de dang kho yi rbod gtong yin// rtags ni gang dang gang byung yang// phar la gsod dang
'dzin pa bzang// tshur la gnod par byed pas na// de tshe drug sngags rab tu bzlas// mdze po zhib chen mon dang btsun// gshin rje'i rtags su shes par bya// de rje nyams dga' sems gsal na// drag po
sngags kyang bzlas mi dgos// nyams 'jigs ngu bro snying mi dga'// lus ni gti mug chen por 'gyur// de tshe lha yi sku gsal bas// drag sngags phyogs su 'phangs pas grub// mun sros pa dang rgya mtsho

'khyil// g.yag dang ra yis khengs pa dang// bud med gcer bu mthong ba dang// btsun pa btsad po a tsa ra// rta pa mang po byung ba dang// brag dmar 'jigs dang brag nag dang// sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang

lcong// ba glang mang po byung ba dang// rkang mangs mang po byung ba dang// lha khang chos bskor ston pa dang// mi red skya bo byung ba dang// bon po ral pa can yang 'byung// ban d+he mang po byung ba dang// ra lug byung

dang byis ba dang// khyi phag mu sprang byung ba dang// rje dpon dang ni rigs 'dzin dang// 'bring nag mang po byung pa dang/ khra spyang mang po byung ba dang// mon pa sbrul zhags khyer ba 'byung// gang byung rtags gzung
drag sngags gnad// nyungs kar la sog bzlas la gtor/ de yi rang gshed phebs par byed// dregs pa de dag 'khor bcas kyis// ded dpon bsdongs la grogs dang ni// pho nya las la 'phang ma dang// bar
chad byed pa'i log 'dren yin// srog gi yi ge gnad dag ni// shes pas gdug pa yang dag ni// shin tu 'khrugs na 'khor lo bskor// rtags rnams 'khrug na byi srog gcad// rang gshed gang mos gang 'gro
lta// bsrung dang bzlog dang gsad dang mnan// me la sreg dang dam bdar la// dregs pa bzhi dang dngos grub 'du// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ rdo rje nang 'gras
rtags kyi le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen pos srog gi snying gzer chen po 'di gsungs so// 'jigs byed rngam chen gtum chen 'bar ba'i sku// 'od dpung stug po
bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar// phyag drug mtshon chas dgra bgegs log la sgrol// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs gsal dang// thugs kyi ye shes sems dpa' bsam// de las thugs ka chos kyi 'khor lo
las// dbus su yi ge hU~M nag bsam// pad+ma brgyad la 'bru brgyad 'phra mo las// yi ge 'khor tshogs mgal me bzhin du 'khor// ro langs khro mo me 'dag 'phungs 'dra yis// thugs khang k+Sha las
'bru brgyad 'khor ba'i tshul// sgeg ma ral gcig me dpung 'bar 'dra'i sku// thugs kar sa las 'bru brgyad 'khor lo la// snying po bskor bas rab tu bskor bar bsam// ma ru rtse ni dmar nag gtum po'i

sku// thugs khar ya las 'bru brgyad phyag rgya 'bar// snying pos 'khor lo'i tshul du bsgoms byas te// dza bzhis bse mo'i thugs kar 'bru bzhi bsam// ye shes me dpung 'od 'bar 'khor lo'i tshul// ye shes
lha mchod sems can sgrib sbyangs te// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gdug pa rab btul nas// byang sems dbang gis 'od 'bar a yu de// ye shes sems dpa' sbyan drangs a yur 'gyur// ting 'dzin sems la

bstim pas 'od du zhu// dam tshig sems dpas sku gsung mi sti staM// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// thugs kha'i sngags kyi sa sbrul las// lcags kyu'i dbyibs su 'phros pa yis// ye shes lha
dang 'jig rten pa// srog dang srog nas rab bskul te// thams cad dbang du bsdu bar bya// dmigs pa gang yin sngon bkug ste// rngam pa'i zhal gyi rdub par bya// las kyi rlung gis rab ded nas// dmar nag
tshogs kyis lus la rub// sngon dmar nad kyis rtsa rnams khengs// 'on dong mig rtsa rig rig bsam// dbye dgub las kyi drag sngags gdags// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bdag dang
dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyis// dmigs pa nyal thag chad par bya// pho nya shan pas bdud dang ging// phye sa dmag tu 'khrugs pa yis// gzas pa rngub brlag par 'gyur// dur khrod brgyad dang mkha' 'gro

mas// gshog dang 'thub dang longs spyod dang// rngam pas srin gyi tshul bzung bsam// 'jig rten snang grags thams cad kyang// sha za'i tshogs te 'phra rab rngub// ces gsungs so// srog gi yang snying ting
'dzin bcud// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing// don dam chos sku'i ngang du gcig/ ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srog gi snying zer gdab pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rngam ba chen pos rdo rje nang dme'i las khram kha rang gshed kyi sgom pa 'di gsungs so// stong nyid ngang las sku sprul pa// khro rgyal rngam pa'i gshin rje
gshed// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// khams gsum srid pa thams cad kyang// byad kyis 'thor thangs 'og tu brdzis// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' nyid// kham nag ral pa zur gsum
brdzes// yang na mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bsnams// de yi zur gsum rtse mo nas// hU~M nag sol dum bcag pa 'dra// thugs kha lcags kyi rus sbal la// mtshon cha'i spu la nyi ma'i mig/ sder mo

lcags kyis 'khrig pa 'dra// yan lag mgo dang gzhug ma drug/ rang 'byung mchod rten drug tu gnas// lto na lcags kyi sa ru de// mtshon cha sna tshogs pa na// srid pa gsum gyi bla rtse 'khyams// dmigs pa gang
yin drug po'i srog/ rus sbal rngam pa'i shugs kyis 'dren// de 'dra gsal ba'i hU~M nag la// 'khor lo lta bur yig 'bru spros// dmigs pa gang yin gnas su spros// ri rgyal rbab dang gnam lcags thog/ mgo
bkas lus la gsher btab nas// lcags kyus drangs te rdzas la bstim// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gang dag log 'dren bzlog pa'i dus// de nyid rab tu gsal brten la// drag
sngags mtshon cha me dbal// dgug cing gzir nas srog snying phrogs// rang srog rang gis gcad nas kyang// drag sngags mtshon cha 'khor lo yis// myal myal gtubs shing gcad par bsam// zhes gsungs
so// de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// ru dra bsgral bar 'dod na yang// gang yin ling ga 'khor lo sgyur// bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra de// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i lus nyid la// nyon mongs bag chags sems su

chags// de yi dkar nag snying dkyil na// dngas ma rang 'byung 'od lnga dang// snyigs ma'i dngas ma khrag mtsho 'chal// sbal pa lta bu'i dbus na nr-i// dang po'i srog nyid chags pa'i gzhi// de las 'byung ba'i rtsa
bzhi chags// 'byung bzhi nus pas phung po 'grub// de bskyed pa yi lha bzhi 'byung// de las rang 'byung bdud bzhi gnas// de ltar 'byung bzhi gnas pa des// bdag gi rdzas la skyed pa la// dregs pa rang
dbang med par bkug/ de nas gzir te dbang med bskul// rang 'byung gnas pa'i dregs pa dang// dmigs nas rbad pa'i dregs pa gnyis// de'i tshe me dang shing 'dres tshul// 'byung ba'i phung po rlag par
'gyur// rang srog rang gis gcod par 'gyur// de yis lus srog phyed par 'gyur// des kyang gsod par ma gyur na// tsit+ta gnad la phab la gtang// srog ni rab tu bskur bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas

yang dag bshad bya ba// de nas sreg par 'dod na yang// rang 'byung me dang 'byung ba me// me dang shing 'dres tshul du bya// las 'jug dam tshig 'dar bar bya// drag sngags 'khor lo nag po des// bka' las
'das na gcod par bsam// mi 'da' mna' yis bor bar bsam// de nas dregs pa srog bral nas// chos nyid stong pa nyid las zhi// yang na rang rang gnas su 'khod// 'thu dang rdzu 'phrul phrogs byas
la// dngos grub blang ba'i las kyang bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ gshed 'khor lo la dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis ri rab mnan pa'i mchog bya ba 'di gsungs so// srin po gdug pa'i thod pa la// mnan pa'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// rdo rje rgya gram sngags dang bcas// gang yin rdzas bcug mnan pa

bya// dur khraud ras sam rgya shog la// rdo rje rgya gram ri rab gzugs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lam dang bcas// de la yi ge bkod pa yang// oM hri sti byi b+h+yi kri ka na na hU~M phaT/ nan che ge mo sas stib/ chus khyer/

mes tshig/ rlung g.yengs mkhas ga/ rna ri tshi ri ti'i/ oM laM hU~M laM/ staM b+ha ya nan/ de dag bris shing bzlas te mnan// mi srogs stam pa ya nan// de ni mnan pa'i yang snying yin// dur khrod g.yam pa sngon po
la// dug khrag bag chus sbyar byas te// mnan na srid pa gsum yang mnon// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sreg pa'i las 'di gsungs so// ma traM snying kha gru gsum du// bang rim gsum

gyis mdzes pa la// dbus su rdo rje rgya gram gyi// lte bar raM las rwa la yang// phyi rim rdo rje phyed ma dang// mtshon cha sna tshogs bri bar bya// de nas drag po'i rdzas rnams dang// ling ga dag ni rab spungs

nas// bdag nyid ya man ta kar bsgom// oM sa ma ya/ Ar+ya many+dzu/ e la tsakra/ e ra ga badzra/ ming trig mnan/ srog la hur thums dza/ ming srog mA ra ya/ ag ne dz+wa la raM raM/ zhes ni rab tu khros pas
sreg/ thal ba mchod rten 'og tu mnan// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ mnan sreg drag po'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin

las kyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// rab tu ri zlum sa dkar du// maN+Dal zlum po zla ba 'dra// 'kho ralo ga'u'i sbyor ba dang// bzhin dang chas dang lta phyogs kyis// phur bu rtse mo zlum byas te// rtsa ba dag las shan
ting gis// 'jigs pa brgyad las yang dag skyob// rdzas dang gtor ma mchod pa rims// de phyir sa gtsang gser ri la// gur kum dag la bsten pa yi// ling ga'i 'khor lo bcas rdzogs nas// bzhin dang

phur bu rgyan chas phyogs// ma ning pus ting ku ru yis// sbyor ba drug dang ldan par 'gyur// ri dmar brag dmar gnas dag tu// ga'u 'khor lo bcas rdzogs par// rgya skyegs dag gis bri bar bya// phur gdab
bzhin dang rgyan chas phyogs// ma nor pa shang ku ru yis// mos pa rnam bzhi thob par 'gyur// dmar nag gru gsum zla gam 'dra// ro bsregs sol ba rdo sol khrag/ khros pas sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// phur
gdab bzhin bzlog chas bsgyur nas// la phyogs ma nor ma ra ya// 'jig rten mngon spyod 'grub par 'gyur// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i le'u
ste nga gnyis ba'o//// de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma 'jig rten mgon po lags// bstan pa dam pa bsrung ba las// bsgrub dang gdab pa'i las
rdzogs pa// 'jig rten mgon pos ji ltar gdab// ces gsol pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmod pa'i yang snying 'di gsungs so// gnod sbyin dmar po sha zan gyi// dmod pa'i yang snying dam pa

de// sngags pa nag 'gras byung yang rung// snying po bcud len 'bru la 'du// de don snying po mchog gyur pa// oM a kri rA tsa dur na/ sa du snying la sril sril// a kro rA tsa tsi ta ni sha la rbad rbad/ ya ya rnal ma tri
dza/ snying la kha thun ma ra ya rbad/ 'gul khug dag tu nyungs kar la// drag sngags bsnyen pas grangs gyur na// gang la bya ba thogs med ces// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu bshad// de nas gnod sbyin dmar

po rus sbal spu gri'i drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// rtsibs drug mchod rten drug dang sbyar// dbus su rnag pa'i ming rus bri// thod pa nag po'i nang du brub// thod pa rgya gram lam

dang bcas// nyungs kar khrag dang til nag gis// ling ga dag la bri bar bya// tro ma ri na sha trag thun/ tsi ta mA ra ya tri rbad/ tsi ta spra ma yag sha rbad// srog te tri ma sha dza/ tsag re kha tri/ yag sha dza/ tsi ta ma ri

ya ya dza/ dgra bo'i tsi ta dz+wa la raM shag sha rbad rbad/ de dag bris dang bzlas byas te// zhag bdun nub mo las la sbyar// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ las 'phrang dog

drag po ljang nag khros pa gnod sbyin dmar po'i dmod sngags kyi le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi srin po khyi khrid yab yum gyi drag po'i dmod sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod
mon gyi mgo bo la// dug dag khrag gis rab byugs la// rta khrag ra khrag mi khrag dang// chang la sogs pas rab bsgyur nas// rnal 'byor sngas su gzhag par bya// grub pa'i rmi rtags byung ba dang// rnel

gri'i thod par thun b+h+yo la// thod par gzas pa'i ling ga bri// de nas thun dbang rdzas dgod brdeg/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// shar phyogs brag dang chu 'thab tu// ling ga thod pa bcas la gzhag/ rtsa

rgyud rlag par yang dag bshad// yag sha 'gri na mA ra ya dza dza/ yag mo ging kha rag ma b+h+yo/ badzra kha d+ha kha d+ha ya/ mA ra ya rbad/ tsit+ta rbad snying subs/ tri a 'gu sha/ ha na ma tha/ ka ki d+ha ha/ rag sha lu kha/ gar rdza
ya ma ra ya phaT phaT/ ces pas 'grub par yang dag gzung// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ srin po khyi khrid mar po bse'i gyad kyi dmod sngags kyi le'u ste nga bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje dmar po las kyi shan pa bse gdong gi drag sngags 'di gsungs so// dur khrod gnas su+u sa gzung la/ nyungs kar rgyal po dag dang ni// ma do'i phye

ma rab bsres la// gshin rje khrag skyug snying po bzlas// a mu ka yi rdzas blangs brub// lus la thun gyis thebs pa dang// khrag skyug sbrid cing brgyal nas su// 'gul mi shes par sa la lhung// ta na bi yo da ya

pan tsa hU~M che ge mo hU~M phaT/ pa tsa b+h+yi tra sa ma ya/ btsan thabs 'di la las sbyar na// dgra 'am bgegs la sogs pa brlag/ gzhan yang khrag dang chu dang gangs// gang la bya ba thogs med ces// dam tshig bdag
pos rab tu gsungs// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme gyud las/ bse gdong gshin rje dmar po khrag skyug gi ngan sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis

bdud kyi gyad chen srog len dmar po'i phung bshig 'di gsungs so// dur khrod ched du dben pa ru// lha bsnyen sngon du song ba des// daN+Dal gru gsum mthing nag tu// khyi nag dom bu'i thod pa ru// khri khrag khyi yi

klad pa dang// ra khrag ra yi klad pa blugs// gang la bya ba'i ming yang gzhug/ bzlas ba drag la gril bar bya// bdud kyi khram la thebs pa dang// bdud po nag po snying du 'jug/ sems kyang bar snang khams la

'phyo// ri'u nag po gon pa rmi// rta nag po ni zhon pa dang// mi nag 'bod dang khyi nag za// bya nag mang po dngos su lding// ltas ngan de rnams byung ba na// phung shig las rnams 'grub pa yin// tsa kha mu tsa kha mu

snying rtsa che/ chom sa ya chom sa ya/ ruM ruM thul yang yang sod/ yuM yuM thul/ snying la choM choM/ srog rtsa la thob ya ya/ dza dza thum la/ snying la chom chom/ srog rtsa la thob ya ya/ dza dza thum laM/ snying la chom chom/ srog rtsa la

ya thob ya ya/ trag trag snying la ya/ ra tri ru tri ru mA ra du sod/ tha pri tha pri tha pri/ mA ra ya sod sod/ ces pa drag tu bzlas gyur na// blag bas dam rdzas gtang rag gtang// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar
ba'i rme rgyud las/ bdud srog len nag po'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten mgon po des// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed che// rgyud kyi rgyal po

de nyid ni// ji ltar byung zhing ji ltar gnas// rgyud kyi ming ni ji ltar gsal// yongs su gzung zhing bca' ba dang// tha ma rdzogs dang gtad pa ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal
gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma 'jig rten mthu chen nyon// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med
pa'i// srog gi ngo bo shar ba'i rgyud// dus gsum bud+d+ha bla med rgyud// thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir bstan pa 'di la dgongs// thar pa'i lam log las kyis mnar ba
rnams// bstan pa 'jig cing rnal 'byor sku la bsdo// de yi 'bras bu dmyal khams 'khor bar rgyud// de dag thar lam bstan phyir ngas// don dam spros med to med mnyam nyid dang// rtags kyi gdug pa ma
lus 'dul phyir bshad// drag po thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul phyir bshad// rgyud kyi ming ni dmar nag 'bar ba'i rgyud// nag po chos nyid mi 'gyur stong pa'i don// dmar po bsgral ba ma bkag sgrol ba'i

rtags// don bzhin rtags rnams 'brel pa'i rgyud du bshad// lnga brgya tha ma dus kyi bstan pas nyen// rang sha za zhing rang khrag 'thung dus su// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi gnas dus de ru// rang gis rang gi

bstan pa 'jig dus su// rdo rje rgyud sme 'di yis bstan pa bsrung// rdo rje mtshon cha gcod pa'i rgyud du zung// dregs pa'i srog snying rang la 'dus pas na// snying 'khor myos byed chen po'i rgyud du zung// rgyud kyi
bca' thabs bstan pa yang// rgya mtsho'i gting du rdo ba bor ltar bca'// chu srin gre bar rin chen lta bur bca'// ma snyed dbyings su rtog spyod 'das ltar bca'// kun la spel na bstan pa 'jig par
byed// mtshon cha'i 'khor los rang la gcod par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos rang gi snying khrag 'jib// rtag tu gshin rje'i khang par 'khyams par 'gyur// legs par nyon la yid la zung// dpal 'bar dbang
phyug 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso// lha klu mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rgyud 'di gzung zhing bca' bar bya// rdzogs ldan gnyis ldan bstan pa mar 'grib la// bstan pa mi gnas rang gis 'jig/ de'i

tshe bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa'i klong dkyil nas// nyon mongs gdug ba 'dul phyir rang nyid khro// dpal 'bar chen po ya man ta ka yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul du
don las rtags// sdud pa 'jig rten mgon po dang// lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs du ma'i tshogs// phyogs kyi yab yum sprul ba dpag med dang// bdun brgya nyi shu gshin rje'i tshogs rnams la// lha srin gnad
phebs srog gi rgyud chen gtad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las// rgyud 'byung ba dang/ ming dang/ bca' thabs dang/ yongs su gsung ba dang/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste nga
bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i gtso bo dang// ye shes kyi gshed bzhi dang// phyogs skyong ba'i khro bo dang/ gdug byed kyi gshin rje bdun brgya nyi shu dang/ sprul pa bye ba dgu khri ma
mo dang bcas pa dang/ gdug byed bse'i lha mo dang/ bse'i gyad dang/ bdud ging dang/ sgrol ging dang/ shan pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ dri za dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam
mkha' lding dang/ thams cad pa'i 'khor dag dga' mgu yi rangs te mgrin gcig tu bstod pa/ mi gnas mi dmigs chos sku dag pa la// bdud 'dul khro bo mchog gi skur bstan pa// thugs rje gzi ldan
gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od 'bar zhing// gdug pa'i mtshon cha mang po phyag
na bsnams// rab brjid gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// ta na ga ta dbyings su 'khril ba'i yum// dbang phyug chen po'i sku la nyer gnas pa// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ral gcig ma// gdug pa 'dul
mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod de me tog rab tu gtor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal 'bar chen po nyid de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur to// de nas yang 'khor mang po rnams 'dus te/ dpal
'bar chen po'i 'khor na/ 'jig rten pa du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor skyong zhing dregs pa can thams cad kyi gtso bo mdzad pa dang/ sgrol ging bdag po la bstod pa/ dpal 'bar dbang phyug 'jig rten
pa'i gtso// zhes bstod do// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud las/ lha srin gyis rjes su yi rangs te bstod pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//// de nas lha dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis/ 'jig

rten 'di ru mi la ma gtad par/ yul u rgyan gyi yul rgya mtsho chen po la brten pa rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pa las/ gzhan gyis bgrod par mi nas pa/ dur khrod chen po dbus 'gyur gyi tshal/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro

ma 'du ba'i gling/ ri zo mo pu ri byang chub kyi tshal bya ba de na/ rang 'byung gi mchod rten chen po gnas pa la/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis grub ste/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la/
bai DUr+ya zhun mas spus bris pa tsam du rang nan du bris nas/ bse dang lcags kyi sdig par bcug/ rus pa sna tshogs pa'i sgrom bur stsal te sbas so// dpal gshin rje dmar nag 'bar ba'i rme rgyud rdzogs

so//// de nas slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas rdo rje thod 'phreng rtsal/ dbu rgyan slag sha sha'i lung pa phug khong seng chen bya ba de na dgongs pa mdzad pa las/ lha srin rnams kyis nyin bzhin du bskor ba
mdzad de/ mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa yin no// de nas bod yul dbus su/ rje byang chub sems dpa' khri srong lde btsan gyis bsam yas bzhengs su gsol bas/ lha srin gyis rtsig tu ma gter

nas/ ji ltar bya zhus pas/ slob dpon bo d+hi sa twa'i zhal nas/ u rgyan pad+ma bya ba rgya gar na bzhugs te/ spyan 'drongs na lha srin thul lo gsungs nas spyan dren gtang bas/ slob dpon gyi mngon par shes pa la
shar nas/ bsam yas byon pa dang lam khar mjal nas/ der dregs can btul/ bsam yas lhun gyis grub ste/ 'jam dpal dmar nag ni 'ching phu'i brag phug rge 'u'i ya thog tu/ u rgyan gyi mkhan po pad+ma

'byung gnas dang// lo tsa ba dge slong nam mkha'i snying bos bsgyur ba'o// rdo rje thod 'phreng gis/ rdo rje dbang phyug bde chen rtsal/ des rdo rje dbang chen 'byam pa rtsal/ zhal dri med zla shar rtsal/ spu ngan rdo rje
yang dbang gter// kun la yod na khyad par med// rgyud lugs 'di dang 'grogs nas gter du mchis// las dag dam tshig can dang phrad par shog///
rgya gar skad du/ ya ma rA dza karma bi shi tan tra/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i rgyal po las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud/ 'jam dpal gshin rje 'joms byed drug po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mgon po gshin

rje gshed// shi tu drag por khros nas kyang// yang dag gsang ba'i nges don las// sdig can gang zhig 'das byed pa// de dag chad pas gcad pa'i phyir// drag po sngags kyi las 'di gsungs// dam tshig nyams

pa'i dgra bo la// zor dang thun gyis bsgral ba'i phyir// dben pa'i dur khrod gnas song nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// gus pas de la phyag btsal nas// gshin rje'i dgra ni spyan drangs te// ya ma rA dza

gdul bar bya'o// ya ma rA dza spyan drangs te// gang la bya ba gdul bar bya'o// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dam rdzas lnga yis chag chag btab// dkyil 'khor dbus su bri ba ni// mthing nag gru gsum bri bar

bya// mgo bo rang gi phyogs su bstan// ya mAn ta ka yab yum dgod// ya ma rA dza stangs dbyal dang// lcags kyi spyang mo mang po dgod// bdag nyid drag po rab yum bsgom// gshed ma ya rA dza sgom// pho nya
'joms pa'i las byed ma// lcags kyi spyang mo ral gcig sgom// dam rdzas yo byad tshang bar bsags// rnam shes dbang po dgug bya'i phyir// dgra bo dgug pa'i nyo nya gtang// khug cig pho nya mi bzang
ma// lcags kyi spyang mo ral gcig ma// mig nas khrag gi tsha tsha 'phro// kha nas skad 'don tser re re/ ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// khro chu khol ma'i skyin thang 'beb// rkang lag lcags kyi
sder mo las// gnam sa med par spar gyis 'debs// ri klungs med par rjes kyis 'gengs// zas su sems can gson po za// bang gis gnas su yud kyis phyin// gang la bya ba'i dgra bo de// ma thogs myur

du khrid la shog/ dang po zhe sdang pha yi skyed// bar du 'dod chags ma yi mngal// de nas dri za lte bar 'khor// tha mar nyon mongs lnga yi gzugs// lnga phung rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// gshin rje ma mo pho nya

rnams// thogs med 'jigs pa'i sku ru sprul pa la// mgo bo'i dkyil du khrag zor ya// lta ba'i mig la khrag zor ya// nyan pa'i rna la khrag zor ya// snom pa'i sna la khrag zor ya// smra ba'i lce la khrag zor

ya// dran pa'i snying la khrag zor ya// 'gro ba'i rkang la khrag zor ya// yul mkhar khyim la khrag zor ya// nor gyi dbyig la khrag zor ya// 'og gi rta la khrag zor ya// bu dang chung ma bu mo dang// 'khor bcas ma

lus rdul du rlog/ khrag zor 'phang ba'i sngags/ thod khrag spyos shig tsit+ta gu lu nan/ snying khrag spyos shig tsakra raM/ rnam shes spyos shig sha na raM/ ngag rnams spyos shig so ting kha ram/ gzugs phung chings shig su

tri ni/ yan lag cings shig dza tri dza traM/ zhes brjod la seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa zor dang bcas pa 'phang ngo// bal mo nag mo mi sring gdug pa'i sngags kyis 'phang ngo// bram ze lce dgu'i dgug pa'i
ngan sngags kyis gdab cing 'phang ngo// de nas dam nyams dgra bo de// 'chor ba med par bya ba'i phyir// bdud mo mi zan nyid la gtad// ma bdun dpon g.yog gsum la gtad// ya ma rA dza nyid la
gtad// gdab pa'i sngags la/ i u e sa ma ya thibs thibs/ ling shar yang nges so// oM sa ma ya tiSh+Tha haM/ ma ma mA ru thibs thibs/ thab bru bur kha sha paM/ rbad thum ri li li/ thig nag gcig med/

gnyis drug brgyad bcad// mnam mthongs phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi reng sod/ badzra ne phaT/ badzra ra ra de phaT/ badzra dza ra de phaT/ badzra da de phaT/ badzra i ting na ga le/ nA ga le/ sum pa le tsin yang tsin
yang/ len yang len yang// dgra bo che ge mo/ ma rA ya dza/ drag po kun 'joms ngan sngags 'dis// btab na lha yang rlag par 'gyur// dgra la btab na zhag gsum na// rdul cha tsam yang med par

byed// brnag pa bcud kyi nying khu 'di// snod ngan phal pa bstan pa min// gshin rje nag po las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ khrag zor 'phang ba'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// de nas mgon po ha la skus// zhe sdang cho
ga thod 'di yis// skye bo chos nyid ma rtogs pas// rnal 'byor sku dgra byed pa la// bstan pa bsrung phyir 'di gsungs so// mi mgo ma rnams kyis thod pa ya mtshan can yang rung/ rje rigs yod

na legs/ de med na skye bo drag rtsal can gyi thod pa blangs la/ de yang rlon pa rnyed na legs/ na skam po la zor snod byas la/ de yi nang snying khrag dang phud gtsang mas bkang la/ nam phar phyed tshur la langs la/ dgra

bo'i phyogs la kha bltas la/ ting nge 'dzin gsal la ma mo 'bum sde'i sngags 'di brjod do// oM ya mA ya/ tiSh+ta tiSh+ta mo rbad/ rbad mo phaT/ raka sha ma rbad phaT/ ti sha ma phaT/ rbad thuM phaT/ ma mo rabs gcod mo

phaT/ ma ma snying kha rag mo rbad/ snying khrag 'thung pa'i ma mo ha hab/ ces grangs 'bum yan chad bzlas la/ thod khrag 'di dgra bo'i dur la 'phangs la// gang du phyin pa'i sar dbang bskur la gzhag/ de gtor

ma cha gcig dgra bo'i dur du sbas na dgra bo rabs 'chad do// sngags yang rnam gcig la/ yungs kar dang khrag bsres la gdab pa/ oM shag shag rbad thum ril li li/ thum ril li da dza/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad

bzlas so// de yang brdeg thabs rnams gcig la/ dgra bo'i khyim la brdeg pa'i thabs kyis thabs dang sba thabs su brdeg ste/ ma tshor bar gdung sna la brdeg/ tshor na mi rung ngo// ma mo d+hi ti ma b+h+yo/ ma mo shi kri ma b+h+yo/

ma mo sha len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo khrag 'thung ma b+h+yo/ ma mo rus 'cha' ma b+h+yo/ ma mo srog gcod ma b+h+yo/ ma mo dbugs len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo mdangs len ma b+h+yo/ ma mo yid 'phrog ma b+h+yo/ ma mo tshe 'phrog ma b+h+yo/ dkar nag
snying gi mtshams su rgyob// sems 'di ma bzung yang bar thong// sha khrag rus pa'i mchod pa 'bul// dug gsum mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sdig can 'di yis 'gal byed de// dam tshig can gyi bka' gcod
pa// dben rigs gnyan po bshig bshig pa// lta rigs dkor la 'bag 'bag pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bslu ba// nams kyang gtang bar mi bya ste// ma gzhag bsgral na bde chen po// dza dza shig

shig se khog bzhin du shig/ phyogs mtshams med bar gtong cig rlung la phyor// oM na mo b+hu thA/ pra man ti pra man ta dze dza ko sha ri sho ka ri phaT/ mi shu pre phaT/ phung shi shu he phaT/ snying khrag khong nas khar

'thung la/ khong khrag kha nas skyug tu chug/ na mo kha se me/ kha se me phaT/ dgra bo'i snying rtsa drang ba 'di skad do// phrig phrig kub kub ig ig aM g+hu sha dza dza/ 'dren pa'i sngags so// tsit+ta nr-i ma ra yadza/ so na

sha ba le/ tsod pa le hU~M hU~M/ yaM ti/ su tri ni/ ma mo gnam gyi dpal mo btsan b+h+yo/ bskyed tri b+h+yo/ da rod a da ro/ kha kha le le dza dza/ u shu u shu skyes de ur mo/ skye ro skye ro ma ma lha dza dza dza/ ra lu ru lu/ kha cher mi
shig/ tsin d+ha tsin d+ha/ rbad rbad/ ha ha ho ho/ yan lag bsnol cig/ d+hing d+hing dgra bo'i sgal tshigs chuM shig phaT phaT/ dges par rol cig/ ha ha ho ho/ mi khyim phung bya gdangs phung du thogs

shig/ mA ra ya mA ra ya dgra bo phung du chug shig sho ra re/ b+ha ri ha/ bal ka b+h+yo/ bal ka b+h+yo/ za ro sho ha/ ha kha'i ha kha'i/ dpa' bo khyed rnams kyis thal bar lhogs shig/ hab hab heb heb/ ma mo chen mo khrag

'thung ma la/ lag na dgra bo'i tshe dang dbugs 'chang ba/ drongs shig khug cig dgra bo nr-i dza nr-i dza/ tshal da shag tshal da shag/ baM bruM baM bruM/ mugs mugs/ myogs myogs/ rab 'bring 'asum las lo zla ba dang

zhag dus so// dzan hi dzan hi/ na ya man d+hi rbad/ shes pa la ya/ smra ba'i lce la ya/ snying tshig tsit+ta la ya/ snang shes lus la ya/ tsit+ta d+ha tsin d+ha b+h+yo byed shes phaT/ tsin d+ha tsin d+ha hU~M phaT/ khal te khal te hU~M phaT/

rgyud du hU~M/ ya ma ye hU~M phaT/ dgra bo'i snying dang srog tsa la b+h+yo/ zhes sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ thod pa'i nang du spyang khu'i mche ba gnyes btsal/ btsal ba'i dus su dgra bo'i ming nas byung la bri/ sngags su ha

ha he he/ mche ba gnyis la btsal la sbas te/ ho ho he ha/ zhes bya sha zan gang yang rung ba'i mgo bo btsal la gzhug/ krid bya krod byo khyi rgya bo'i mche ba la dgra bo'i ming rus bris la btsal/ ha ha zhes 'ug pa'i

mgo la mig rus bris la btsal/ mchu la ming rus bris la btsal/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ zhag dus sna tshogs btsal la/ khyad par du gu gul nag po med du mi rung ngo// zhag gsum du bsnyen pa gzugs shing bden
pa bdar/ gser skyems gcig bshams la bsrung ba'i lha 'dre dang phyed par byed// mchod pa len du ma 'tshal na/ gzod bdag nyid chas su zhugs la/ ting nge 'dzin gsal la drag po'i las bya'o// de nas

sngags gong ma gtang ngo// bdag gi gung mo la khrag phyung la dpral ba'i dbyings su bsku'o// 'o dod bod bdag gis mnyes byas la/ rang gi sna la khrag phyung la dpung mgo g.yas g.yon du bsku/ lag ngar g.yas

g.yon du byug/ thod pa'i mig gi bug pa'i nang du nas zhing ras kyis btags la/ zhing ras kyis ma so nas kyang btags la/ dgra bo'i phyogs su bstan la las bya'o// thag nye na dgra bo'i khyim dang mkhar la

'phang ngo// ring na phyogs su 'phangs so// gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ zhe sdang gi cho ga tho zor nag po'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de ma grub na thod pa mo'i zor gtang na/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags

'bum bzlas te/ nyi ma dang po'i sngags kyis mgo 'khor bar byed/ nyi ma gnyis pa'i sngags kyis khrag 'thor bar byed/ nyi ma gsum pa'i sngags kyis rab tu brgyal bar byed/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ma ra

ya gdon mi za bar 'grub/ de la mgo 'khor bar byed pa'i sngags la/ oM b+h+yo ri dzi phraM ma ra ya dza/ sny-ing 'dren cing smos par byed par sngags la/ kho ra bra phaT/ phod phod/ mA ra ya dza/ kha nas ngu

'bod zer zhing yan lag sa la brdung ba'i sngags la/ duM duM bruM bruM kha rag sha thum ri li li dza/ lus la bya ba'i sngags la/ kha sha baM ra ka sha traM/ rbad thuM ri li li/ 'gro ba'i stabs la bya ba'i sngags la/ kug bruM

bruM/ hri hri dul dul sod sod/ des 'chor mi srid do// yid la brnag pa chen po byed na/ rdzas kyi rnam grangs ni/ rnel dri mo'i thod pa dang/ ra rgya bo'i snying khrag dang/ byi la ga pa'i 'jug bu dang/ bla rdo 'am 'og

sa blangs la 'brus te/ gro ga 'am shing shun la gzugs bcas te/ tshon skud sna lngas bcing/ dkyil 'khor mthing kha gru gsum du bris pa'i nang du gzhag/ ling ga'i mgo gshin rje la gtad/ rkang pa byang shar gyi
'byung po la gtad la/ dgongs pa lcags kyi lcang mo ral gcig ma sgom/ de las bsdus te bsgoms pas khrag gi rgya mtsho me long tsam du sgom/ de las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pa las/ dpal gyi bka' nyan khrag

gi dri snom ma/ phyag brnyan pho nya rnams thugs ka nas bskyed do// de rnams kyis dgra bo'i snying dkar nag gi mtshams nas rnam par shes pa'i sems yud tsam gyis khugs par bsam mo// de la 'di skad bskul

lo// dgra bo dbugs pa'i pho nya btang// dpal gyi phyag brnyan khrag gi dri snom ma/ khrag mdog dmar mo bse yi lan phran can// spyan mig nyi ma'i zer dang 'dra zhing rno// lcang mo lcags kyu'i rtse la bskal pa'i me

chen 'bar// dgra bo nyams pa'i snying 'byin chang par bcug la gsol// khros pa'i kha dog dmar po khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ skad ni nam mkha'i 'brug bas che// bang ni bar snang glog pas mgyogs// zangs sder
dmar po lag pa na// bye phrug sha chen 'jum pa ltar// 'gal byed 'byung po'i don snying sbar gyis 'debs// phung po rdul phran bzhin du rlogs// gzugs la phung po ma yin par// rnam par shes pa khyer la
shog/ ces nyungs kar gyis pho nya lan gsum bkye bas/ rgyab rten dang dbral lo// yid kyis mngon sum du zhugs par sa la dmigs la gzugs la phab la gu gul nag po dang/ til nag pos bdug

go/ mtshams drag tu gcad do// de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer du brdeg go/ gnyis snying khar brdeg go/ gnyis brla gnyis la brdeg go/ gnyis dpung mgo re rer brdeg
go/ de nas yang yungs kar gyi rgyal po thogs la bram ze lce dgu'i sngags kyis brdeg go/ dgra bo'i snying dkar nag mtshams su gdab bo// i yu a sa ma ya thibs thibs/ dgra bo ma ra dza/ zhes btab na mi
'chor ro// nges so// 'chor mi srid do// yang mon nam rabs chad nag mo'i thod par dgra bo'i ming byang stsal la/ chu mig nya lcibs can mis ma tshor bar btsal te/ bal mo'i ngan sngags kyis

gdab bo// oM sa ma ya triSh+ta maM/ ma ru mA ra ya thibs thibs/ thab bra bur kha sha yaM baM maM/ rbad thum ri li li/ mA ra ya dza dza/ sngon bal mo kun chen dang bal mo rdo rje gnyis kyi mthu 'gran pas/ nags kyi spyang mo
la me 'chad pa la/ ming pos sngags btab cing g.yag lpags rlon pas brdabs nas rog rog btang ngo// sring mos sngags rang gis btab pas sol bar rog gis btang ngo// sngags 'di ci la btab kyang mi

'chor ro// oM rmag shag rmag shag rbad/ thum ri li li rbad/ mur mo shang/ sed ya sems/ ba b+ha ya mA ra ya zhes gtogs shig/ rgyus pa rtsa nas phyung zhig/ mig skyu nas drongs shig/ lce skam par drongs shig/ de
nas bdud mo mi zan la gtad pa'i thabs la/ thig nig gcig ched/ gnyis drag brgyad bcad/ gnam mthong phye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi rang sod/ des 'chor mi srid do// de nas ma bdud dpon g.yog la

gtad pa'i sngags la/ badzra ne ne phaT/ ma le dum dgra bo la phaT/ mA ra ya dza/ g.ya' ma skyol la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badzra ra ra de phaT/ bal ma dre'u sna ma la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badzra dzra ra te phaT/ khri sman

la gtad pa'i sngags la/ badzra e hi e hi/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum ba le/ sum ba le/ zhes brdeg go/ de nas yang dgra bo dgug pa'i pho nya btang la 'di skad do// hU~M sku yang thu lum chen mo la// zhal kyang thu
lum chen mo ste/ phyag kyang thu lum chen mo la// zhabs kyang thu lum chen mo la// mche ba thu lum chen mo la// bar bar ral ba char du 'bebs// mche ba thu lum gtsigs pa yis// gnam lcags zhun ma'i ser

chen 'bebs// lag pa g.yab mo brdabs pa yis// khro chu khol ma'i skyin thang 'bebs// gdug pa'i rkan sgra gtogs pas kyang// srid pa'i ri rab rtse nas snyil// drag po'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems// 'di ni

gdul byed chen mo ste// zhal gyi ngom zum nag mo yis// khro chu khol ma'i mdog 'dra ma// ral pa'i sprin dmar glog ltar 'gyur// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// 'jig rten khams rnams za ba mo// drongs shig khug

cig pho nya mo// sdang ba'i dgra bo khrid la shog/ oM rbad bu rbad bu/ thal ba thal ba/ phye ma phye ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ ma ra ya dza/ zhes brdeg go/ sa gzhi gnon pa'i dus su byi brun gyis brdeg go/ sa tshon thebs

nas rang gi chu dang bud med kyi zla mtshan gsum bsres la gdab bo// de'i sngags la/ le byin da re/ ya phye dpal rem/ se gyong se man hi tsi li zhong ngo// thog thog dbal sod/ ma me chu me/ pu ye pu ma/ mur ma
ti har na sod/ long glo gser gyi bdag mo la btang ba la mo rkang phran gyi sngags la/ oM tsin yang tsin yang len yang len yang/ nri mA ra ya dza/ glog spur mang po na mo b+hu thA ya brdeg go/ dkyil

'khor khrag gi rgya mtsho me long tsam cig sgom mo// de'i steng na lcags kyi spyang mo me stag tsam 'phro ba 'am// mgar ba'i tsha tsha 'phro ba tsam cig sgom mo// de'i ce stong khams khyab par sgom mo// dus ni gnam stong

ngam tshes brgyad skar ma gdug skar sta thogs la bya'o// bal mo dgu'i sngags 'di ma mo thams cad kyis bal mo kha gnas dmar po la brgyud/ des wa kham la brgyud/ des bal mo bachu rings ma la brgyud/ zhe
sdang thams cad kyi bcud blangs te me ltar spar ro// bal mo dgu'i sngags 'dis dgra bo'i gzugs la gdab bo// dgra bo ni mA ra ya dza/ byi la'i lce 'dis brdebs pas ni// khams gsum kun kyang phung bar

byas// bcol ba'i dgra rnams phung bar byed// gtad do cog ni phung bar byed// de nas brlag bar bya ba'i sngags 'di skad do// oM ti pu ma shig ni bu ma shig/ si ka ri sa ka ri/ dug dug dug/ smye shos/ tha

b+haM tha b+haM phaT/ ces brgyab na brlag par 'gyur ro// brnag pa bcud kyi snying po 'di// snod ngan phal gyis mi thub ste// su yang gtad pa ma yin no// chu srin rgod ma'i kha bzhin du// gdams nas gzhan la dbye
ma yin// gang zhig snod ngan spel na ni// bdag nyid ngan song ltung bar 'gyur// gshin rje nag po las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'joms byed nag po ngan sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas

yang mgon po gshin rje ha la nag po mngon du grub par 'dod na/ sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas na mngon du 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM na mo lha ga ba sti/ badzra kro d+ha ra dza ya/ ya ma ni kren 'dra na/ ban dza mA ga ra ya/

oM dzaM dzu/ ha na d+ha ha pa tsa dza la pa/ tsun tsa tsun tsa/ sarba b+hu na ta na ka yak+Sha ra kran swAhA/ pri ti bi sha tsa/ krun ban d+ha bu ta na/ ka ta pu ta na/ sa ra sa ra ha hU~M phaT/ badzra pe ta li hU~M phaT/ dzram ma dzu ye phaT/ 'di ni

yab yum phrugs su bcas pa'i yang snying ste/ sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas na mngon du 'gyur ro// las drag po gang byed kyang dang po sngags 'di ma bzlas na mi 'grub bo// de nas 'jam dpal 'bru drug pa'i sngags

kyi dgra bo drangs na mi khugs mi srid do// oM shrI many+dzu kA la rU pa che ge mo nr-i dza nr-i drongs/ de nas brdeg pa'i sngags/ oM shrI many+dzu ka la rU pa/ che ge mo rak+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ de nas khrag skyug tu gzhug pa'i sngags/ a

sa ma ya many+dzu kug ta hU~M/ sa ma ya sa tham sa tham/ shog tham shog tham/ baM mugs baM mugs/ zhes byas la rang gi mal 'og tu dgra bo'i gzugs mnan la gzhag go/ de nas mi 'chor bar bya ba'i sngags ni/ oM
me na ma ru ye swAhA/ zhes bsdams la gzhag go/ gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i yang snying gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang mgon po gshin rje gshed kyis ya ma rA dza'i

'phrin las kha thun nag pos dgra bo gsad ba'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// sngags pa bdag nyid dang po khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi cha lugs sa zhugs la/ oM ya man ta ka dza/ ya ma rA dza hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/

bdag nyid khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sku phyag rgya gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/ 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza tsar gyis phyung ste/ mdun na sku che la yan lag rags pa sku mdog smug nag bsam gyis mi khyab pa gcig
'jig rten gyi khams su 'phros pas/ 'jig rten khams thams cad ya ma rA dzas gang bar sgom mo// des dgra bo thams cad dbang du bsdus nas/ slar 'dus pa las/ sngags pa bdag nyid mgon po gshin rje
gshed kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa'i mdun du/ rgyal po chen po la blon po chen po bka' nod pa bzhin/ 'jigs byed chen po cig bka' stsal/ gang sgom grub par bgyi'o// zhes 'khod pa las/ sngags pa bdag
nyid chas gos nag po gon la/ rmad du byung ba'i dmar gyi gtor ma cha gcig gi nang du/ byi la'i gcin dang/ smug chen dang/ smug chung dang/ dgra bo'i ming rus gtor ma'i nang du bcug la/ dug dang mar

bsres pas dgra bo'i gzugs kyi thog nas mar sbreng zhing/ dam nyams pa 'di sod cig par bsgol/ sngags dang/ nyungs kar dang/ mtshon chas kyang gdab bo// zla ba mar gyi ngo la dang shi ka la bya/ dus dang
gza' skar ngan pa la brtsam mo// dang po sku rgyan cig pa gsal bar bskyed pa 'di skad ces bskul lo// oM gtum chen dregs pa chen po thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dbang byed bdud 'dul dur khrod chas kyis

brgyan// khro rngam gdug pas srid gsum thal bar rlog/ sgrol byed sku mchog ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra gzhan/ khams gsum sgrol byed 'phrin las dus la bab// hU~M ya man ta ka dza hU~M

dza/ gtum chen rab 'bar gshin rje 'joms mdzad lha// ya ma rA dza'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ya ma ra dza hU~M/ nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od stong 'gyed// gdug byed mtshon cha mang po bskal ba'i me ltar

'bar// rab brjid gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// oM g+hu ya dz+nya na muM hU~M/ rdo rje'i sku la klu dbang rab brjid cing// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon na bzar gsol// yi dgas mgo bcad skam rlon

'phreng bas brgyan dang thod du bcings// khro ba'i rgyal po zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs drug hU~M sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum stongs mdzad zhabs drug gshin rje gnon// oM byin du ya ma dza ya nan/ brkyang
bskum brjid pas gshin rje ya ba ti'i snying kha gnan// ljags dril tshems kyi gseb nas rdo rje thog phab pas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang gcer bur bud cing rngam pa 'don// rab tu 'dar zhing

bred nas bran du 'khol// tsham rngam khro bo'i sgra skad sgra bsgrags pas// 'khor gyi ma mo rnams kyang dar cug cug/ oM ma kha le kha thun nan// tshangs pa 'khor bcas rngul gyi thigs 'dzag cing// lha chen khyab 'jug

mahA de ba gnan// phyag na ban d+ha rlog pa rab bsnams shing// dngos grub 'khrug cing klad khrag zhal du gsol// khyung dang 'ug pa lta bu'i khra bsnams shing// dam las 'das pa rnams la gtong bar mdzad// oM

ya ma kha thun ra dza hU~M nan/ rnal 'byor bdag la gdug cing 'gal byed pa'i// dgra rnams rab tu chings shing phung bar mdzad du gsol// gshin rje nag po ya ma rA dza khro bo kun gyi rje// bstan gyi lhar yang khyod

la gsol 'debs na// dgra bo'i mgo nas chom chom bsnams su gsol// khyod kyi sku dang cha byang 'di 'dra mthong ba'i tshe// nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'bros// khyung chen sngon po mkha' la lding
pa bzhin// ci ltar byas kyang thogs pa med mkhyen pas// rnal 'byor bdag la gnod pa'i dgra dang bgegs// yud tsam gyis ni thal bar brlag tu gsol// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam dges

bskul ma// e ka dza ti gu ya ral gcig ma// mi 'pham khro gnyer g.yu yi ral pa can// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb re re nas// khro chung zhal gsum phyag drug stong khams 'gengs par mdzad// kun kyang mi

bzad 'jigs pa'i lcags kyu can// lcags kyu btab pas dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// gang la bya ba ma thogs tal bar rlogs// phung po sha khrag rus pa zhal du bzhes// oM a kro byin tsa ra tsa hU~M dza/ ha ha de bag

dza/ dza hU~M baM ho/ hU~M phaT/ de nas spyan drangs te/ dbus phyogs mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mthing nag khaM pa ra la pa gyen du 'khyil ba'i lha// ral pa khaM nag gyen du 'khyil ba

las// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams kun kyang 'dar cug bcug/ spyan mig sdang mig gyen du bzlog pa yis// phyogs bcu khro bo kun kyang gan phug bsre// smin ma glong stong 'od spung sdug pa 'bar ba yis// sprul
