ba'i pho nya mang pos srid pa gsum yang lhag gis 'gengs// shangs nas rlung byung rdo rje tshub nag drag po yis// sa gzhi g.yo nying bar snang 'khrug par byed// mche ba zla tshes dkar po gtsigs pa yis// gnod

pa'i dgra dang bgegs kyi srog rtsa gcod par mdzad// zhal nas khro bo'i brda skad phyung ba yis/ khams gsum srid gsum 'gul zhing ldeg par byed// sma ra ser po 'jigs pa'i me stag 'phro// stong khams 'od
kyis 'gengs shing dgra bo bsreg/ phyag drug mtshon cha gdug pa mang pos ni// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus thal bar rlog/ thugs dam bskul phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su
gsol// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam dges bskul ma// e ka dza ti 'jigs byed dpal gyi yum// rnal 'byor bdag gi dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs ma cig lha mo rdo rje dam tshig
ma// sku stod g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// sku smad stag lpags rlon pa 'bum gyis g.yogs pa'i cha ga can// dbu la g.yu yi ral pa dur khrod khams kyang khyab// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i thugs dam
bskang phyir gshegs su gsol// dgra bo'i rtsa drungs nas 'byin cing gshegs su gsol// bzhengs shig bzhengs shig chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// bskul lo bskul lo sems can don la bskul// mdzod cig mdzod

cig bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// dzaHhU~M baM ho// ya man ta ka e ka dza ti/ ya ma ra dza/ ya man k+Sha ya dza dza/ gu ya a kraM dza dza/ dgra bo bcol gyis yud tsam 'phrin las mdzod// sha khrag dmar gyi

mchod pa bsnams su gsol// da ni phyag btsal te/ gdug pa 'dul mdzad gshin rje gshed kyi lha// sbrul dang thod rlon mang pos sku yi rgyan du byas// rngam pa'i nga ros thams cad zil gyis gnon// gtum chen
gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje bdud 'dul srid pa gsum gyi lha// drag shul mthu snyems gnod par dgra rnams 'joms// mi bzad drag po gtum khro thugs rje can// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza'i
sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed sku la dges mchod 'bul mdzad ma// sgeg mo ral gcig gshin rje gshed kyi yum// na bza' ras kyi dug gul gsol// ma gcig e ka dza ti'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// da

ni sman mchod dang bshags pa bya ba yang 'dir rdzogs par bya'o// de nas dgra bo bstab pa bya ste/ e gru gsum nang du ri bong mgo yang rung/ mkhar krong srin khyer btags pa dang/ sa 'jam po la dgra bo'i
gzugs byas la/ e'i steng du gzhag la dgra bo'i gzugs kyi rkang pa nas skud pa sngon dmar gyis btags la gtor ma la gdags/ gcig mgul nas btags la/ khro ba'i sku gdags/ skud pa gcig sngags

pa'i lag par bzung// skud pas phar then tshur then du byas/ ming byang bzhi bris la/ ming byang gcig ya mAn ta ka'i thugs khar dbul/ gcig go ta ra mar stsal/ gcig snang srid kyi lha 'dre la dbul/ gzug

gzugs kyi snying khar gzhug gzugs kyi snying kha'i ming byang la dug dang khrag bsres la sbreng/ ya ma rA dza'i snying po dang ngan sngags kha thun gyis gdab bo// nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du bzlas/ nyungs
kar la sngags la gdab/ zhar la dmar gyi mchod pa dbul/ 'dzab grangs shing 'phrin las bcol/ rak+ta sbreng zhing sngags 'di skad bzlas so// ya ma rA dza sa do me b+h+yo ru lu ru lu che ge mo hU~M phaT/

baM ri li li rbad nan/ oM dub bur dub bur che ge mo nan/ tshal nan/ oM snying sho me kha la mu lo tsa thun nan/ oM swa sti ru ru gong kra rA dza nan/ mA ra ya dza/ ya ma ra dza'i snying po rgyun ma chad par grang ngo// oM A kro

many+dzu shri ka la ru pa k+she ya sa du nan/ baM rbad ru lu ru lu dza/ ru lu ru lu tshal pa ya ni/ do sha ru ni nan/ che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ mA ra ya dza/ zhes nyungs kar la bzlas shing gtor ma'i ming byang la gdab/ hU~M che ge

byas la gzugs la yang gdab bo// mtshan byang chu mig kha shar du bltas pa 'am/ lho 'am/ byang du 'ang rung ste/ gzhung ma nor bar ba'o// rab 'bring gis zhag dang zla ba dgu nas rtags 'ong ngo// gshin rje

las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA thugs kyi kha tun nag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dgra bo la mda' thun gtang bar bya ste/ de la dang po sngags pa bdag nyid kyi spyi gtsug nas/ oM mthing
nag 'bar ba 'phros 'dus pa las/ oM kro many+dzu shri ya mAn ta ka 'di la hU~M/ zhes brjod pas/ 'phags pa gshin rje gshed po sku mdog mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus

mthing mche ba gtsigs pa/ g.yas dang po na zhing gi dbyug tho/ bar pa na dgra sta/ tha ma na ral gri/ g.yon dang po na sdigs mdzub/ bar pa na mdung thung/ tha ma na thod rlon khrag gis bkang ba/ zhabs drug la
gnyis sha za dang srin mo gnon pa/ zhabs gnyis ma mo dang khrag 'thung gnon pa/ zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs su bzhugs pa/ bdud dang/ srin po dang/ ma mo dang/ khrag 'thung rnams bran tshar la 'don
pa bzhin 'khol bar sgom mo// khro bo de'i thugs ka nas/ yi ge dza las 'phros 'dus pa las/ 'phags pa ya ma ra dza'i sku yungs 'bru tsam gcig la/ sku mdog smug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ ba spu'i
gseb yan chad go mtshams med par gtams par sgom mo// thugs kyi gser mda' 'di nyid kyang dpag chen gyi mda' g.yag la brgyab pa ltar/ ya ma rA dzA thugs kyi mda' thun dgra bo'i snying gi dkyil du
brgyab pas slar mi ldog par sgom mo// thugs mda' 'di nyid kyang skar mda' laM du zhugs pa bzhin nam/ me stag phus btab pa bzhin 'phros pas las dang// nyon mongs pa dang/ bag chags kyi sgrib

pa thams cad sbyangs nas dgra bo'i snying dkyil du brgyab ste/ gzer btab pa bzhin du sgom mo// g.yu spyang lag pa g.yon gyis thogs pa ni/ yum e ka dza ti zhes kyang bya/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes kyang bya ste/
mig bzlog pa/ mche ba gcigs pa/ ral ba dmar po'i rtse la lcags kyi me 'bar bar sgom mo// lag pa g.yas pa na mda' thogs pa ni/ 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza nyid du gsal bar sgom mo// de

ltar yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems kyi gzer thebs te/ dgra bgegs su la brgyab cing btab kyang slar mi ldog par sgom mo// de yis sngags la/ oM rA dza sa du me she ka dza ti mu ka a sho ma/ oM pe

ta li rakra ya k+sha man swAhA/ dza dza/ zhes yum gyi snying po brjod pas dgra bo'i tsit+ta'i thog tu thugs kyi mda' thog babs pa mazhin du sgom mo// de nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// hU~M/ nga ni skyes mchog gshin rje
rgyal po ste// lag na gsod pa'i mda' gzhu thogs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu ma lus gzhom pa la/ gti mug zhe sdang rjes su 'chang ba min// gzhu mchog mgo bo yar bltas pas// khro mo chen mo pe ta

li// gzhu mchog 'og ma mar bltas pas// srin mo chen mo mgo 'phyangs mo// rgya mdud byang chub sems kyi ngo bor bstan// chung zungs byang chub sems kyi khong lu bdud rtsi'i snod// gzhu rgyud drag po sgral ba'i rgyu
ma bzang ba yin// bshul ni mnyen la lcugs pas yum du ston// bshams ni skyes mchog don la zhugs pa'i mkhas pas bshams// rnyed ni dgra dang bgegs chen rnams kyis rnyed// mda' ni mtshon gyi rgyal po

lag cha gsod pa yin// stong ni thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yin// mde'u kha chung ting zab tsit+ta'i dky-il du brdegs ba yin// ya ma rA dza'i skyer mda' la// ma mo tshogs kyis yud kyis sgron// byang chub

sems kyi mde'u bcug/ srid pa gsum gyi spyin chus bskus// 'phen ni gzas kyi dgra la 'phen// rgyob cig che ge'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// oM e dun ti had ma yaM ma ti baM nan/ ra dza sa du ma kro nan/ sgro la

gtod pa/ nag mo mig rnon ltas ston ma// khyim phyi 'khor zhing sha la dga'// nag mo mig drug ma// tshe gsum dral zhing rgyu snying 'dren// dgra bo'i mig 'dren bya rog ma// 'bras bu phyung zhig bya rog ma// oM kro ti
kang ka kha kha ma hU~M phaT/ ri bong gi mig la brdeg/ gsod byed chen mo hor pa mo// hor mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma// chum shig chum shig hor pa mo// dus la bab bo hor pa mo// rgyob cig dgra bgegs gsod

byed ma// snying gi dkyil du mda' zor rgyob// oM hor mo ba tsit+ta tsit+ta phaT/ phra men chen mo 'ug pa'i mgo/ ltas ngan rgyal mo'i dus la bab// nub mthong 'ug pa'i dus la bab// rno byed spyan gyis srid gsum

gzigs// 'dzin byed thugs kyis stong khams khyab// 'jigs pa'i rkan sgra phyogs bzhir sgrogs// 'ug pa'i sgra skad dir ri ri// gzhu mchog rgyab cig 'ug pa'i mchu// oM hu lu mu kha hab hab// hU~M hab hU~M hab
phaT phaT/ dgra bo'i yul la dam du brdeg/ bde gshegs thugs las sprul ba'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// rgyab cig dgra bo 'brong ltar 'gying ba'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// ra dza sa du nan/
gcig ste bde ba thugs kyi mda' rgyob cig/ dus la bab po snying gi dkyil du rgyob// zla gam gdengs pa'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// rgyob cig snying gi dkyil du rgyob// sogs ka gdengs pa'i mda' mchog

dam pa 'dis// sku yi phyag rgya'i rgya mdud la// g.yu yi mda' sgra shar ra ra// lcags kyi gzhu sgra 'ur ru ru// sku ni dud kha chen po las// 'byung po kun gyi gshed mar byung// gshed bdag ya ma rA dza'i dus la
bab// mig gis bltas te zhe sdang bskyed// zhes sdang rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// mig gi dkyil du mda' thun ya// gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur snang bas// snom
par byed pa sna yin te// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sna yi dkyil du mda' thun ya// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes 'bar ba'i mda' mchog dam pa 'di// nyan par byed pa rna

ba yin// rna ba'i dkyil du mda' thun ya// gru bzhi gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi rngam pa gzi brjid chen po la// smra bar byed pa kha yin te/ kha yis smra ba'i gti mug phyung// gti mug gsal bar bya

ba'i phyir/ kha yi dkyil du mda' thun ya// lus kyi byug pas phrag dog bskyed// phrag dog rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// lus kyi dkyil du khrag zor ya// mda' ni 'phrin las ngang nyid dbyings su 'bigs// spyin

ni byang chub sems kyis 'dzin ba'i don// sgro ni sku gsung thugs kyi ngang// mde'u gnyis med dbyings su 'bigs// gzhu ni shes rab thabs dang ldan// rgyud ni ye shes 'od du spreng// gsang ba thugs kyi mda'

mchog dam pa 'di// rgyob cig dgra bo'i snying gi dkyil du rgyob// 'phongs shig pho bdud btsan dang gnyan la 'phongs// srid pa chags pa bshig pa'i phyir// lte ba'i khung du mda' thun rgyob// 'dod chags

drungs nas dbyung ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i dky-il du mda' thun ya// oM kha la mu dan ting du rbad/ srog rtsa gcad pa'i sngags la/ oM yu na kha ga kha lo mu lo ldibs/ lce ldibs su gzhug pa'i sngags la/ ma b+haM ma b+haM

du na rbad/ cha nyams su gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM ya tsa lu lu tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ dbugs 'phrog pa'i sngags la/ oM sa du dad nan/ myo ru gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM prad de ro ma nyams nan/ snying khrag

skug pa'i sngags la/ oM dan khrag ti rak+ta tsa ra ta nan/ de ltar byas na zhag bcu nas rtags 'ong/ gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA dza gsang ba thugs kyi mda' thun gyi le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas dpa' bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis dgra bo sgral ba'i phur thun 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba la// phur pa gzhung bzhin bkod nas kyang// sgom zhing
tshul bzhin byin brlabs nas// 'phrin las cho ga 'di bskul lo// dbus phyogs gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza gshegs su gsol// yum chen srin mo mgo 'phyangs
dbyings nas bzhengs// yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' dbyings nas// thugs kyi sprul pa khro bo mi g.yo mgon// dbyug tho 'bar bas lha mchog srid pa gsum gyi bdag/ gshin rje 'chi bdag dbang po
kun 'dul ba// kha dog nag pos bdud 'dul ral gri can// srin mo ma mo ma he stag gzig zhon nas ni// ral gris srid pa gsum po thal par rlog/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad lha la phyag 'tshal lo// sku
mdog sngo nag gshin rje gshed kyi lha// ci bgyi bka' nyan ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// ma mo rbod gtong sdang ba'i dgra la gtong// sdigs mdzub 'bar bas dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// sdang mig bgrad pas

gshin rje'i tshogs rnams 'dul// rkan sgra brdabs pas srin po bran du 'khol// srin po khros pas khrag mtsho khong du gsol// spyugs pas glu blangs ma mo dgra la gtong// gshin rje khros te shin tu rngam pa

yis// srin po pho mo'i don snying spar gyis 'debs// srin po khros te shin tu rngam pa las// ma mo stong gi don snying spar gyis 'debs// ma mo khros te shin tu rngam pa yis// sdang ba dgra bo'i don snying spar gyis

'debs// oM ya mAn ta ka k+shaM/ A ya a tsa la k+ShaM/ oM ma dug rtsa rtsa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug k+ShaM/ che ge mo srog rtsa mugs ti rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ting rngubs// srin pos rus pa chom chom tshal tshal
gsol// gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob// dgra bo khram la ri li li// dgra bo'i sha la spyag spyag thogs// dgra bo'i rde nag mang por spungs// phur bu nag po gcig la stong mi g.yo mgon por bsgoms
la// sngags pa bdag nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dril zhing bzlas pa po la gdab bo// phur pa'i chu srin kha man chad bdud kyi bu mo khram baM bdag mo yin par sgom mo// de nas 'di skad
bskul lo// hU~M/ sku mdog dmar mo zangs kyi dril zhags can// zangs kyi ral pa sprugs pa'i skrar gseb nas// ma mo nag mo lnga bcu sdang ba'i dgra la gtong// lcags kyi phyag sor 'bar ba brdabs pa
yis// gshin rje nag po dun dun 'bangs su 'khol// khro mo sdigs mdzub phyar te brdabs pa yis// ma mo nag mo dun dun 'bangs su 'khol// sku yi cha byad shin tu 'jigs pa yis// srin mo 'bum khri 'bum
stong thal bar rlog/ dges te gad mo drag tu bgad pa yis// sdang ba'i dgra bo gtan du phung bar mdzad// mgo 'phyangs ma dgra la dza dza/ dun mugs bla rtsa la dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun mugs dza dza/

nang khrol smad lda la tsa baM/ thun bam thum ri li li rbad rbad/ sngags lan dgu gdab bo// phe chen dang mo chen gnyis rabs chad do// rtsad nas dbyung ngo// nan tan du gyis la sho ra re// 'phrin las 'di byed pa'i

dus su mtshan ltar rm-i lam du mon pa nag po 'am/ bud med nag mo dang phrad nas bdag la bkur sti byed pa byung na/ las byas zin pa yin te/ de ltar byas na zhag bco lnga nas rtags 'ong ngo// gshin rje las sna
tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA dza gsang ba thugs kyi phur thun gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshin rje gshed kyis/ gshin rje las mkhan bcu pho nyar bsngags pa'i 'phrin las dang po thugs
gsang ba 'di bka' stsal to// hU~M/ dbus phyogs gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jigs byed ya ma ra dza gshegs su gsol// yum mchog pe ta nag mo dbyings nas bzhengs// 'jigs byed sku
las bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs// bka' sdod gshin rje las mkhan bcu yis bskor ba ni// steng gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// sku mdog mthing

nag 'jigs pa'i sku// chibs su nyi zla gza' skar chibs// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad phyag char bsnams// steng gi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM shag tshal pa rbad pu rbad pu nan/ ya ma ra dza'i spyan lam

du// dgra bo mngon sum du khrid la shog/ shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad ma// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'chi bdag kun gyi rje// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na skye 'gro rtsis kyi byang
bu bsnams/ shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM rtsa thun nan rbad pu nan/ shar lho mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad ma// gshin rje'i rgyal po rmig pa'i mgo// sku mdog dud pa 'jigs pa'i

gzugs// phyag na mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba bsnams// shar lho mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM khram d+hi tshal pa nan/ rbad pu rbad bu nan/ lho yi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad ma// gshin rje'i rgyal
po rkong rtse brag gyon ni// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lus la bran mangs zur mangs bsnams// phyag na brag srin 'dul ba'i rta nag bsnams// lho yi phyogs nas dgra po khug la shog/ oM tshal ba
tshal pa haM nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ lho nub mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad ma// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po a ba glang mgo can// sku mdog mthing nag 'jig pa'i gzugs// phyag na tri shu rtse gsum
bsnams// lho nub mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM k+sho ma sha sho nan/ rbad pu rbad bu nan/ nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gsod byed ya ba ti// sku
mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na gsod cing gcod pa'i spu gri bsnams// nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM khi khaM baM nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ nub byang mtshams nas dgra bo
'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po lcogs pa mgo dgu ni// sku mdog sngo nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na ral gri 'bar ba bsnams// nub byang mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM kha so la khram
rgam nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gsod byed rngam ba'i rje// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na gcod pa'i dgra sta

bsnams// byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM ma tshal pa nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ byang shar mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs 'dzad pa// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po gcod sbyong rje// sku mdog dmar ser

'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na mi phyung nyes legs spyod spyod byed pa'i khram shing bsnams// byang shar mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ oM khraM sti khraM khraM nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ 'og gi phyogs nas dgra bo
'gugs mdzad pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po bdud mkhar 'joms byed rje// sku mdog smug nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag na brdung zhing 'thag pa'i tho ba bsnams// 'og gi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la

shog/ khro bo che dang ya ma ra dza'i spyan lam du// mngon du dgra bo khug la shog/ da lta nyid du 'di sgrol cig/ oM rdul phran rdul phran/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ dgra bo ma ra ya dza/ zhes brjod la mda' 'ug pa ma gcig

gi mde khung du mtshan byang dang dug sna tshogs gzhug go/ phyogs mtshams nas bkug pa dgra bo'i yul phyogs su 'phang ngo// lan gsum byas na mi 'chor ro// gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA
dza gsang ba thugs kyi zor thun gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dpa' bo chen pos 'phrin las 'di brjod do// ya stags cho ga snga ma bzhin// gzhung nas byung ba bzhin du bshams/ bong zan dar
dang g.yag ru'i nang// dar sna phud dang tshe nyungs blug/ hU~M/ dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsod byed ya ma rA dza gshegs su gsol// dmar smug brjid pas ma mo kun gyi
rje// khro gtum btsan dregs srid pa gsum gyi lha// che btsan dregs pa'i ma mo 'bangs su 'khol// gsod byed de yi thugs dam dges bskul ma// ma gcig chen mo mgo 'phyangs ma// dgra la khrag thun
'bebs shing da tshur spyon// dgra bo'i khyim dang dur mchad mugs// 'jigs byed de yi zhabs kyi cha 'og gnas// srid gsum sha khrag mnga' mdzad ma mo rnams// dgra bo'i khrag la dmar lam

bstan gyi da tshur spyon// tsit+ta rtsa nas dbyung gis ma thogs da tshur spyon// srid pa gsum gyi mnga' bdag mo// phyag na lcags kyu khraM baM dgu khri dgu 'bum bsnams// 'khor gyi ma mo stong dang rtsa brgyad kun// thun

zor 'bebs kyin ma thogs da tshur spyon// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong khrag gi dri snom ma// sha khrag gsur la rol pas ma thogs myur du spyon// aM muM ya mugs ti subs// che ge mo la chug chug cho cho/ yang

yang/ bal dub bal hU~M/ bal yu snying gong rtsa thun nan/ ma thun nan/ che ge mo la nan/ bal thun nan/ khrag thun nan/ gong grag la nan/ che ge mo khong khrag la nan/ dmyal thag chod cig/ bal mo spu sti ma'i

khrag thun no// zhes g.yag ru'i nang du kha bcug la bzlas so// mtshan byang gtor ma'i nang du gzhug go/ dug dang khrag bsres la gtor ma'i nang du gtig go/ zhag bdun nas rtags 'ong ngo// dgra bo'i khyim la
'phang/ phog na rab tu bzang ngo// gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA dza gsang ba thugs kyi khrag thun gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas mgon po gshin rje gshed// sku khros rab tu
gtsigs nas kyang// dam las 'das pa bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po'i 'phrin las 'di gsungs so// smug nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza gshegs su gsol// dbang
chen dregs pas sku la 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// smug nag 'khyil pas bdud dpung thal bar rlog/ 'jigs byed de yi thugs dam dges bskul ma// bdud kyi lcam mo gshin rje'i yum gcig ma// yab

yum gnyis med rol ba'i mkha' dkyil nas// bka' nyan pho nya phyag brnyan zungs pa 'khor// za byed bdud mo tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// steng gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po khro bo

brang dkar rje// phyag na bdud kyi spar shad 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon pa bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsnams// steng gi phyogs nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ oM ma ra nan/ dza dza che ge mo ma ra nan rbad pu rbad pu

nan/ shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po mahA khro bdag rje// phyag na bdud kyi zhags pa 'dom ni dgu brgya dgu bcu bsnams// shar gyi phyogs nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma ra na

dza dza che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ shar lho mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa bdud kyi rgyal po to yo to myags rje// phyag g.yas bdud kyi gsod byed spu gri rno ba bsnams// phyag g.yon bdud
kyi shod rde'u dkar nag 'grems// shar lho mtshams nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ sngags gong ma brjod// lho yi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po bdud bdag thod pa

rje// bong bu ga pa g.yu mthur can gcig khal du 'gel// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing khram bam bsnams// lho yi phyogs nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma rA na dza dza che ge mo mA ra ya nan// rbad pu rbad pu nan/ ho
nub mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad ma// bdud kyi rgyal po smu bdud brag dkar rje/ khal du bong bu ga pa g.yu mthur can gcig bkal// phyag na bdud kyi shod kyi sgro ba ma 'go can gcig bsnams// lho

nub mtshams nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma ra na dza dzA che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po 'tshams bdud khro bo rje// phyag na ljags dril

zhags pa 'ching byed bsnams// nub kyi phyogs nas dgra bo khug la shog/ ma ra na dza dza che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ nub byang mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po stong ri

mgo nag rje// phyag na bdud sha nag po'i thod pa bsnams// nub byang mtshams nas dgra bo khug la shog/ ma ra na dza dzA che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad

pa// bdud kyi rgyal po khri dza ru tra rje// phyag g.yas bdud kyi rta nag 'byams pa bsnams// g.yon na mi mgo rlon pa bsnams// byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma ra na dza dza che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad

pu rbad pu nan/ byang shar mtshams nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po spyi bdud ya ma rje// phyag na bdud kyi tri shul rtse gsum bsnams// phyag na bdud kyi lcags kyi gze ma bsnams// byang shar

mtshams nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma ra na dza dza che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ rbad pu rbad pu nan/ 'og gi phyogs nas dgra bo 'gugs mdzad pa// bdud kyi rgyal po sa to nag po ni// phyag g.yas chu srin rgyal mtshan
bsnams// g.yon na gti mug phag mgo bsnams// skye 'gro sems can thams cad gsod par mdzad// 'og gi phyogs nas dgra bo khrid la shog/ ma ra ni dza dzA che ge mo zhig rbad pu nan/ dza dza/ 'jig rten phyi
mar dus ma gdab// 'jig rten phyi mar dus btab pas// sems can rang bzhin skye 'chi 'byung// nam mkha' stong las khungs ma byung// nam mkha' stong las khungs byung na// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med
dam ci// sems can bskul ba med la snyad ma gdags// sems can bskul ba chung la snyad btags na// khyed la thugs rje mi mnga' 'am// ma thogs bdud dang gshin rje rnams// gang la bya ba'i snying nas zung
la shog/ sngags pa khros pa las kyi gshin rje 'dra// 'jig rten khams kyi gshin rje mi bzad kun// nyams pa'i sha la rol cing bsnams su gsol// sngags pa khros pa las kyi bdud po

'dra// 'jig rten khams kyi bdud kyi mi zan kun// nyams pa'i sha dang khrag la rol cing bzhes su gsol// sngags pa khros pa las kyi srin po 'dra// 'jig rten khams kyi srin po mi zan kun// nyams pa'i sha
khrag dbugs la rol pa mdzad du gsol// zhes brjod la khrag dang sol ba bsres pa'i gtor ma la spyan drangs la las bcol lo// spyang dug chang gis blangs la/ dgra bo'i mtshan byang dug gi nang du gzhug

go/ gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud las/ ya ma rA dza gsang ba thugs kyi dug thun gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas 'di dag rgyun du bsnyen cing bsgrubs na/ dgra dang rkun mo gang yang rung ste// rkang rjes

kyi sa blangs la/ glang gi gcin gyis sbrus te/ de'ang bu mo khyo kha dang ma phrad pas sbrus la/ dag bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ dur khrod kyi thal bas bskus la/ skyer mde'u rnon po dang phyi rus gnyis spel mar/
gzugs brnyan de'i snying kha dang/ lte ba dang/ mig dang/ kha dang/ sna dang/ rna ba'i bu ga rnams su gzugs/ de nas stegs bu 'dom gang 'phangs su mtho gang ba gcig byas la// dri chus chag chag gdab/
dbus su gru gsum 'phangs su sor bzhi pa/ logs la chag re pa gcig brtsigs la/ e'i mgo lhor bstan la de gzhag go/ de'i phyi rim lte ba zlum por byas// de'i phyi rim la dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs

bcu gnyis bar thal chen gyis bri/ e'i dbus rak+tas maN+Dal byas la/ de'i nang du gzugs brnyan de'i mgo lhor bstan la gzhag go/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i nang du sngags thal chen gyis

bris pa ni/ badzra badzra mA mA me me mU mU mU mU mI miha/ bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i mig la bri/ 'khor lo mu ran dang che ge mig tu che ge'i rus dang ming gnyis smos la bcu gnyis bri'o// de la sngags 'di 'bum bzlas

shing drang ngo// oM tri ya pa byo te/ ka ta ka ta/ mA mA/ ku ru k+sha ra pe ta li dza hU~M dza dza/ zhes bzlas pas/ sngags pa bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la/ g.yas be con g.yon sdigs mdzub 'phros

par sgom mo// de'i thugs kar ya nag po 'phros 'dus pa las/ gshin rje nag po mi zan po gos su shun chen rnying pa dang/ ro shun gyi ras rnying pa gyon cing 'ongs nas gang la bya ba'i snying kha nas bzung ste khyer

bar bsam mo// de 'di sod cig par dam stsal te sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor mar rak+ta dang sman phud sbrengs la sngags 'di bzlas so// oM kha khA ni pre ho kh+ha de swAhA/ gshin rje'i gtor ma'i sngags so// rkang pa
g.yon pas dgra bo'i gzugs nan/ badzra nr-i ya/ du mA ra ya dza/ zhes gong ma bzhin du dbul bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma rtsang chag gang bar khrag dang khyi khrag gis bskus pa bcu gcig
gis bskor ro// bskul tshig dus dus su brjod pa'i 'di skad do// gshin rje gsal shing mi bzad pa// btab par bgyi ba rnam par 'joms// gshog cing gcod pa'i ral gri yis// tshe dang phung po bcas par

choms// pe ta ra tsa che ge mo hU~M he pa hi phaT/ mgon po mi bzad lcags kyi tho bas brdung// lus ngag yid gsum thal ba rdul du rlog/ d+h+ris ba ga te pa che ge mo zhig tish+ta phaT/ po ta ka ra mi dza dza/ gan ti tish+ta

phaT/ snying la brdeg pa'i pho nya yis// tshe dang phung po bcas par chom// che ge mo zhig d+hi si ha sh+ta phaT/ gshog cing gcod pa'i ka ta ri// mgo nas rting par dum bur gtub// che ge mo la hi na ba ha ra li hU~M phaT/

mi bzad gdug pa kha thong kha// g.yas g.yon mgo rus thal gyis phyung// thig hU~M na ra ya che ge ma tra tra phaT/ dus kyi 'khor lo mi bzad pas/ khongs nas khyig cing phung po chom// che ge mo de ba tsakra mu phaT/ de

nas seng ldeng gi phur pa la yungs mar bskus pa pho mtshan mo mtshan la gdab/ de yi sngags la/ da ra ba spo da phaT/ ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+she ya/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/

mA ra ya/ ya ma ra dza sa ti ha da ka ra hU~M phaT/ pa tsa bi spo ta na/ song sho ya/ luM bu dza ra mA ra ya dza/ zhes brjod la/ gong ma'i/ cho ga'i ya btags la/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba dang/ dbang po lag pa dang/ byi'u
rug pa dang/ skyer tsher dang/ lan tshwa bsres pa'i phyis dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan la gdab cing/ phur bu mi phyin par dam po gzugs la gdab bo// yang na gzugs bsregs la gdab bo// ya stags kyis phyes

gdab pa'i thabs dang sbyar zhing bya'o// ya stags bka' dang mthun pa btsal lo// he la sngags la/ e tsakra dgra bo dza/ ya ma tsakra dgra la dza/ ya mA rA dza'i las gang byed kyang he la gsal bar bsgoms la/ de'i

snying po nyi ma bzhi pa grangs ci mang du ma bzlas na/ las mi 'grub pas/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags ci mang du bzlas so// de la sman dgongs pa ni ldum bu rab tu dri zhim pa'i 'bras bu lho nas 'ong ba de btsal

lo// tshil chen dang/ khrag dang/ de gsum bsres la cha bsnyam la/ bsnyen pa khri yan chad bzlas shing/ de la nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags 'bum 'bum bzlas shing gzugs la byug go/ gshin rje las sna tshogs pa'i
rgyud las/ he la sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// gshin rje nag po ya ma ra dza khros pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// ngan sngags bkol ba'i las rgyud lags so////
rgya gar skad du/ badzra tsakra e nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'khor lo drag po zhes bya ba/ rdo rje ur mo'i rtog pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i

bdag po rdo rje rnon po yis/ rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje drag po 'bar ba che// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rdo rje mi shigs sra ba'o// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// lha srin mthu rtsal 'gran pa'i
dus// drag sngags rtsis 'gran byed pa'i dus// gnam lcags ur mo nang 'gras dus// btsan po'i mkhar du 'jug pa dang// rno gsum mtshon char brdung ba dang// stong gsum g.yul du gcad pa nyid// ye

shes chen pos bshad par 'tshal// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje mi chod 'jigs pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bstan// rdo rje thogs med rdo rje che// rdo rje 'bar ba mi bzad che// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs byed

drag/ bcu gsum gnyis kyis yang dag par// bsrung dang phyir bzlog 'khor lo dang// mnan dang bshig pa'i 'khor lo dang// che ba che mchog lha yi lha// de nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste// yang na gtsug tor 'khor
lo sgyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs rje yis// sprul pa gsam las 'phrin las gsum// sku la phyag rgya rdzogs pa ste// ur mo so bsdebs gsang ba'i don// 'byung bzhi dkrug dang dregs pa'i las// 'di dag

rnam par bshad pa'o// rdo rje ur mo'i rtog pa dang po'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ba// rdo rje rnon rdo rje 'chang// che ba'i che mchog nyid kyis bshad// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las// lnga gnyis

bdag por gyur ba yis// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di nyid do// e e e/ a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka/ oM A uSh+NI Sha badzra tsakra brtI sarba lauki ka/ lo kot+ta ra yan+t+ra man+t+ra sarba bi Sha bi tsu r+N+Na ya/ pra yo ga ti/ ma ma kri te/

ye na ke na/ tsit+ta/ kri tA ni tA ni/ sar+b+ba big+h+nan/ ts+tshin+da gnyis b+hin+da b+hin+da/ kam+pa ya gnyis/ bi d+h+wan sa ya gnyis/ sha ta sa ha pra d+ha/ bi tsUr+N+Na ya/ u Sh+NI Sha badzra tsakra bar+t+ti/ b+h+ruM gsum/ druM gsum/ hU~M gsum phaT/ rdo rje

'khor los 'jom pa che// rdo rje mchod 'jigs pa che// rdo rje las kun grub mdzad pa// gsang sngags rgyal po khyod la 'dud// gsang sngags ngo bo khyod la 'dud// rdo rje ur mo las khro bo bcu'i de nyid de/
gsang sngags bstan pa rtog pa gnyis pa'o//// gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje che// rdo rje 'khor los gcod pa po// ngo bo sa bon de nyid de// sna tshogs gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'khor lo rgyal po de dag

gyur// lnga gnyis rtsibs ldan rin chen rgyu// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i gdan// de las gyur pa 'jigs byed che// 'dod pa'i rgyal po lcags kyu che// gshin rje mthing nag be con 'bar// ha pa gri ba pad+ma
dmar// bgegs la thar byed rdo rje ljang// dbyug pa sngon po dbyug tho bsnams// gzhan gyisami thub dbyug pa thogs// stobs chen lag na kha T+wA kha// mi g.yo mthing kha ral gri 'dzin// snod

mdzes rdo rje rtse gcig pa// rdo rje hU~M mdzad tho ba thogs// g.yon pa sdibs mdzub 'bar ba ste// sma ra smin ma ser ba ste// skra brdzes gyen du bsgreng bar gnas// dus mtha'i me ltar bzod par dka'// kun kyang
mthing nag chen por gnas// phyogs mtshams kun dang steng 'og tu// 'jigs pa yi ni 'jigs par mdzad// phyogs mtshams dregs pa'i gdan la gnas// sngags dang rgyud dang 'khrul 'khor dang// khro

bo thams cad 'joms pa ste// lto bar 'khrul 'khor rtsibs kyis gcod// rdo rje me ri 'khor lo 'bar// rngul du bshig nas phye mar byed// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og tu// 'khor lo thogs pa med par
'khor// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag bsgoms nas// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas gyur na// lha chen la sogs dregs pa can// srid pa gsum la gcod par byed// khro bo kun tu mi 'gyur te// 'khor lo thams cad

gcod ces pa// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu bshad// gro ga shing shun ka ri ka/ gong gi 'khor lo bri bya ste// bris pa brgyan gyi 'khor los bsrung// bzlog pa dag kyang byed pa yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdag

pos bshad// rdo rje ur mo las bsrung zhing bzlog pa de kho na'o// rtog pa gsum pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ba// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje hU~M ste hU~M zhes sgrogs// bsrung ba zhes su

rnam par bshad// ye shes dam tshig chen po ba// dngos po kha dog bdud kyi gcod// zla gam dbang sdud thur du rko// gtor snod rdza lu zha nye la// sman dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dag/ drangs su bcas pa'i gzhan

dag gis// rbad 'dre de dag la bsngos na// rtsa brgyad brgya 'am nyi shu gcig/ bdun gyi tha ma gnyen po gza'// grogs su shes pas dgra la brdeg/ gtor ma'i sbyor ba bshad pa yin// rabs chad mi thod khrag
dang 'brus// bzlas tshogs dgra la brdeg pa ni// zor bzlog nag por bshad pa yin// 'khor lo bskor zhing 'phang bar bya// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu bshad// gsang bya ba srog gcad pa// dur khrod
g.yas par tsakra bri// baM chen thod nag kha g.yel du// zhag gsum sngags bzlas snying la btig/ yang na bka' rten nag po la// nyams pa'i gzugs bya sngags kyis bskor// bka' rten bka' bzlog khrag
gsum gtig/ 'byung po'i srang bzhir mnan par bya// ur mo 'dril ba dag srid pas// 'khor la rtse bzlog mtha' nas bshig/ zor dang gtor mas bshis pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu
bshad// stobs mnan gsang ba'i las byas la// mchod rten nag pos mnan pa dang// gti mug nag po'i tsit+ta ru// ngag gi nus pa mnan pa yin// zhes ni gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad// rdo
rje ur mo las bzhi'i 'khor lo las/ rtog pa bshig pa dang bcas pa bzhi pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po pas// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs byed pa// gsang bar 'dus pa de nyid de// gsang sngags rdo rje

rdo rje che// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje las// gsang sngags rgyal po zhes bya ba// oM a uSh+NI Sha tsakra sarba lo ki swAhA/ yan+t+ra man+t+ra lo ki swAhA/ baM ra ti d+hi li ki la swAhA/ pho mo sde brgyad mnan pa ste// khro bor rgyal po tshaM

daM yin// oM a uSh+NI Sha ya rbad/ yan tra tsa tra rbad/ man+t+ra ya ma rbad/ badzra kI li kI la nri rbad/ ma ma te tam baM/ ya ma rA dza gar pa ni hU~M dza mA ra ya rbad rbad/ gsad pa'i 'khor lo de nyid// u ka da ra tsur nar

byed// oM mA uSh+NI Sha ya ma rbad/ yan tra tsakra rbad/ man+t+ra ya tsa ma rbad/ ma ma ra dza ni dza rbad/ badzra kI li kI la ya snying thums ya ma ti/ taM baM mA ra ya thun rbad/ sku gdung nag po'i khrag gis gsad// oM a uSh+NI Sha ya

rbad/ tsakra tsakra tsakra rbad/ man tra ya ya tsa ma ya rbad/ ma ma te raM baM/ thun rbad ya/ ma rA dza snying thums rbad/ badzra kI li kI la ya rbad rbad/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ s+pho ta ya s+pho ta ya badzra/

bi s+pho ta ya bi s+pho ta ya badzra/ gardza gardza badzra/ ku ru ku ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra/ kaM pa ya kaM pa ya badzra/ bi tsur na bi tsur na badzra/ badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra/ bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM bruM/ druM

druM druM dru+uM druM druM druM druM druM druM/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ e e e/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ bruM bruM bruM/ tir khar kra tsa/ badzra ba sh+ni u Sha ya na tsur bri pra ha ta na ya sa d+ho bi ya ba kaM ya pa kaM/ d+ha bin d+ha bin/ d+ha tsin d+ha tsin/ nan bag rba

sa/ no ta no ta/ trid tsi na/ kye na ye ta kred ma ma/ d+hi ka yo tra/ ya na tsur b+hi/ sa rbi rba sa/ tra tan tra man+t+ra yan/ ra ta kod lo/ ka ki lo rba sa/ ti bar tra tsa badzra sha/ sh+ni u a o/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba lo ki swAhA/
sarba lo ki/ sarba bi d+han stam pa ya nan/ gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu gsungs// rdo rje ur mo sngags kyi yang snying 'dus pa rtog pa lnga pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ba// gsad pa'i sbyor
ba thams cad la// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las te// bdag po rnam par mi shigs pa// sprul pa gsum zhes rnam par grangs// nag po kha gdangs glog 'phreng can// gshin rje rgyal po de nyid yin// bdud
mo khrag gi ral pa can// sprugs pa'i 'chi bdag tshe srog bdag/ 'di nyid sprul pa zhes grags pa// sku la 'chi bdag rgyal po ste// rigs bzhi klu dang sprul pa brgyad// sa bdag klu gnyan bdud sogs
yin// gsad pa'i las kyis rgya gar 'gro// rnal 'byor nus pa'i stobs ldan pas// dri yi lus kun rab byugs te// nub phyogs klu yi grong rgal ba'i// khar khongs srin khyer blangs nas ni// sa yi

phya phye med par bkru// 'od dpung nag po'i mdun dag tu// gnod sbyin nag po'i chu mig la// sa dang chu blangs rgyal ba yis// rdo rje rgyal po gsang bdag bshad// sbrul nag ral can lto bar ni// zhe sdang smod

pa'i tsakra bri// nag po klu yi sngags kyis bskor// zhe sdang nag po'i gzugs brnyan sgom// e ka tsa dun khrag yams rngubs shig srog la baM rig shag rbad/ dza nag dzi la baM hur thums dza/ nr-i srog la tshi baM tsit+ta

khas nA ga ra baM nan/ yang snying rgyal po 'di yang yin// nag po baM tsi tsi r+g+ra trag thur snying la 'gul/ myags tsa bzhi rkum shan shan srog la shan/ thur sod swAhA/ sgom bskul drag sngags bsnol mar brdeg/ mgo

dgu'i sprul pa nag po ni// byang phyogs gdol pa ngos bzung gtad// srang dang srang mgo gang yang 'dra// mdze dri dri thams su rgya nad// klu yi dug mda' nag po yin// gal te las 'gyangs ma grub na// sngags

kyi lto dkrugs 'di dag gsungs// e ka tsa ti dun khrag yaM rngubs shig/ dgra bo'i srog la na dgar baM nan// baM tsit+ta khas ni dza la hur thums dza/ dza nag dzi la baM/ srog la baM ril ri shag rbad/ srog la shan thur

sod/ rtsa bzhi skum pa nan shag/ myags myags snying 'grul// drag thur nag po tsi tsi dgra la b+h+yo/ shi ma ar la gtad pa yin// 'di ni yang snying rgyal po ste// gnad gcod spu gri nag po yin// e raM raM laM laM baM baM
yaM yaM/ snying thur nag po tsi tsi trag thur nir rbud rbud/ ces ni gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad// rdo rje ur mo las/ 'chi bdag klu'i rtog pa drug pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// shin tu mi
bzad rdo rje'i sku// gsung gi sprul pa srog gi bdag/ dmar po srog gi las mdzad pa// gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgya las// srog gshed bdun phrag bdun byung ste// bka' yi bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad// ban
dgra nag po sgral pa'i dong// kun tu 'joms byed chen po yin// zla ba nag po ces pa'i grogs// me'i rlung dus rigs kyi mgo/ pha mes thod par ra ba tu bshad// thod pa e yi 'bru gnas gcas// phung shul

bka' rten rnying ba'i sa// grog po phugs brdugs sa la bya'o// dug dang sme khrag sbyar byas la// sor lnga pa ni tshad yin no// dgra bo'i rdzas la 'dra 'bag bya// sor bzhi pa ni tshad yin te// rang la rang gis

gsod par bya// dug shing phur bas snying gzir gdab// mdze can thod pa kha g.yel la// bshig pa'i tsakra bcas nas kyang/ kha sbyar rdo rje rgya gram ldan// dza bzhi hU~M bzhi thod pa la// bdag nyid phyag rgya ldan pa
yis// gnod sbyin ngan sngags 'di dgod do// sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje las// gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag ni// nges pa kho na 'di lta ste// oM a kro rA dza dur b+ha snying la sil sil/ a

kro rA dza tsit+ta ni sha la rbad rbad/ ya ya ma rnal ma nr-i dza/ snying la kha thun mA ra ya rbad/ kro ma ri sha sha trag thun/ tsit+ta mA ra ya tri rbad/ sho la ri rag sha kha baM/ tsit+ta kra ma rag+sha rbad/ srog de dri ma dri sha dza/ tsag re kha tri

yag sha dza/ tri ta ma ti ya ya dza/ srog tsa khrag ti snying phyung// thum ril raM shag rbad/ r+n+ri srog hur thums dza/ srog la mA ra ya rbad/ dmar po yak+sha khro bdag rje// rag mo skar ma kro d+hi ma/ sprul pa gnod sbyin 'bar

ba ste// snying 'byin gnod byed gcod par byed// 'gugs byed dang ni bshig byed dang// las kyi gshin rje shan pa'i sngags// rgyun du bzlas na brgya byin yang// khrag tu skyugs nas ma ra ya// rgyun dang zhag

bdun rdzogs pa dang// rten pa yod na de la yin// chu mig steng bag can du mnan// k+she las gyur par yak+sha ni// dmar ljang karma he ru ka/ gnod sbyin nag po bdun dang bcas// snying sbyin dmar po bdun dag
dang/ gnod sbyin bdun ni sbrul mgo can// gcod byed gnod sbyin ging bdud gri// 'gugs byed bdun ni lcags kyu can// bshig byed gnod sbyin 'khor lo can// las kyi gshi rje mon pa bdun// sngags ni
srog rtsa gcod par gyur// sngags ni nad kyis slangs par 'gyur// snying la gnas pa'i sems dpa' ni// lcags kyi sdig pa nag por 'gyur// rang gshed nag po bshig pa'i las// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab
tu bshad// rdo rje ur mo las/ srog gnod sbyin gyis bshig pa dang gdug pa can gnya' mnan pa ste rtog pa bdun pa'o//// de nas gsang bdag khro bo che// rdo rje khro bo rnam par 'joms// spu gri so bsdebs
ka ma la// 'di dag las kyi bang chen yin// dben pa'i gnas su phyin nas ni// dgongs kyi grib so nag po la// mkhas bas 'khor lo bri bar bya// rgya shog ro ras ka ri ka/ sdig pa nag po'i sha dag
dang// dug dang rdo sol nag po la// sdig pa nag po stobs chen ltor// phrag dog bse sbal dmar po bri// lte bar dgra gzugs a mu ka/ gru gsum zla gam rgya gram bzhi// bcu drug rtsibs ldan lcags mkhar

bdun// dbus su rnam shes srog kyang bri// rgya gram rtsa ba bcu drug mchog/ lcags mkhar snod du gsang sngags bri/ kha sbyar rabs chad thod par gzhug/ phung sa gsum la e byas dgod// rnal 'byor phyag rgya

ldan par mdzod// de nas tshe bdag nag po yis// mchog gi sbyor ba drag po yi// gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs pa'o// e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ a mu kaM nr-i srog hur thums dza/ tsha khrag tsit+ta
phyung// srog la rbad// thum ril rbad/ de la spu gri bsnol ma ni// 'bru brgyad pa ni slad ma ste// bdun pa dang po srog la rbad// gnyis pa la ni snying la yin// de bzhin gsum pa klad pa la// bzhi

pa dbugs la rbad pa ste// lnga pa bla la rbad pa yin// drug pa sha la bdun pa khrag/ thun rbad b+h+yo zhes mtha' ru sbyor// raM raM khaM khaM laM laM yaM yaM/ tsa khrag srog tig/ tsa thig la phog/ snying thig phob/ srog thig la

phob/ khrag thig bdun du sgrab byas la// thod pa lha khang rnying par mnan// ces pa gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad// rdo rje ur mo las/ tshe bdag spu gri rnol mar gcod pa rtog pa brgyad pa'o//// gsang ba'i

bdag po rdo rje che// ur mo nang 'gras gyad non no// myur du ma chod las 'gyangs na// lto dkrugs drag po gsang ste// 'di dag rdo rje las 'thon no// e myags ya rngub/ mug shag ka dun/ tro ma ri sha sha

trag thun/ che ge mo'i srog la rbad/ thum ril rbad rtsa khrag tsit+ta phyung/ nr-i srog hur thums dza/ gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa dang// bzhi lnga drug tu shes par sbyar// dge bcu mi spang ci nus bya// 'jam dpal mtshan ni

yang dag brjod// bla ma mchod cing bshags pa bya// mkha' 'gro mnyes pa'i gtor ma gtang// ban+d+he bon po mu stegs dang// rgyal po dang ni rdo rje kun// 'di dag myur du gang dag yang// nges par brlag ces

gsang bas bshad// rdo rje ur mo las gyad non gyi rtog pa ste/ rtog pa dgu pa'o//// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje che// rdo rje 'joms pa sngags kyi bdag/ slad kyi gyad non gsang sngags te// rgyud kun gyi ni

bdag po mchog/ nyes pa sku gsung thugs las so// a+ye a+ye a+ye/ a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ma ya ye/ ka la ru pa ka pa la ye/ hri ti a ba ye/ a a ne a ne/ u u ne u ne/ du du ne du ne/ a i u e aM aM ra ri la

li/ du ru ye bya tsa ye/ sing nga ye/ hri da ye/ bi da ye/ ha la ye mu ka ye/ u u ne/ u u ne/ byi tri ta/ a a na na/ ya ma ta ka/ ya ma ra dza/ ya ma tri te/ ma ya rak+sha ya ma ra a pe ta li kro d+hI shwa ri/ ma ma e ka dza ti

dza/ de ma kha la baM ril/ b+h+yo b+h+yo ya/ snying kha raka srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'di dag rnam par mi bshig pa// gsang ba'i yang snying kho na 'o// rdo rje ur mo las/ stobs chen zil gnon gyi rtog pa ste bcu pa'o//// de
nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// kun tu rnam par gcod pa ste// dmar len yang gsang srog gi sdig/ sngags ni srog rtsa rlung du 'gyur// sngags dang dam rdzas gnyis su 'gyur// bod cing bsgregs pa'i srog ni

rlung du shes// oM shri badzra kro d+ha/ ya ma ya/ ma ma ma ru lu/ ta dun ting kI la ya/ ra rag sha/ ra rag mo/ dun ting tir ka/ d+hi ru tra/ k+sha yag sha/ tsa ra tsa/ dza shu le/ tri badzra sA du/ tri haM shaM/ dza d+h+ri ba/ ru ru tri/ phu nA

ga/ trig nan/ hur thums dza/ sarba sha truM staM pa ya/ da trid rbad/ sarba raM tri/ ya 'drid phyung/ srog la gzir nan phyung/ mahA staM pa ya/ u nan sbur nan/ trig nan/ snying la staM pa ya nan/ dman tra raM
mahA rag thum ling/ 'di dag yang gsang dmar len mchog/ rdo rje can gyis yang dag bshad// rdo rje ur mo las/ srog dmar len gyi le'u ste rtog pa bcu gcig pa'o// rdo rje drag po lto bsdebs pa// bsam

gtan snying gi 'khor lo ba// phung sa gsum gyi 'brub gnas te// e yi rtse mo lhor bstan te// kha khyer ldan pa rtsang thod me// dur khrod sol ba dug gis byug/ dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri// mu khyud rim pa lnga ru

bskor// dbus su drag po rnag pa'i srog/ rgya gram rtsa ba'i sngags bkod pa// 'khor lo rnams la spu grir ldan// mu khyud las kyi sham sngags sgral// gang yin dregs pa'i lto ba 'am// rno myur gti mug khog par

bca'// 'khor lo dong la gtsang la dgram// kha sbyar drag po'i gsang sngags bzlas// myos shing tsha bas gsod pa'i rdzas// rab tu brab dang bshig par bya'o// bdag nyid phyag rgya rdzogs pa nyid// gtsug gtor
'khor lo rgyur ba lam// dregs pa 'dul ba'i lhar bsgoms la// drag sngags lcags kyu bsnol thog gis// brdeg cing rngam tshigs gsang bar bzlas// sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje las// drag po'i gsang sngags

'di 'thon to// had+ya thA/ e myags ya rngubs mug shag ka dun/ sarba tsit+ta yaM/ shag hur khaM'adrid nan gzir rbad/ sarba sha truM trig nan/ e hur thums dza/ sarba sha truM snying gzer sbur nan/ ha la yaM thun
gzir thums dza/ e kha shag rbad/ zhag grangs gsum mam bdun nam dgu// nyi shu rtsa gcig grangs thim nas// nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi la// sbyor ba mkhas pas mnan pa ste// nam gyi gung la mnan par
bya// rdo rje ur mo las/ phyag rgya bsam gtan gyi rtog pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje 'bar ba gshed po che// gyad kyi gnon pa stobs po che// 'byung ba'i lto dkrugs drag po dgod// rnam rtog dra ba
'joms pa'o// phur pa gsum dang drag po'i rdzas// las kyi bdag po yod na bri// gzhan du kho yi lha srungs bri// bag phye khrag dang sa sbyar te// mi nag ral ba rting bar bsleb// kha nas srad bu nag po
'byung// de yang yan lag bcing bar bya// gdong pa nag por byug par bya// khog pa stong par bya ba yin// sku gdung nag po bang rim gsum// de yi snying khar yin zhes bshad// 'khor lo nag po rgya shog

la// 'byung bzhi gnad gcod bri bar bya// de yi khog bar yin zhes pa// dug khrag btsan dug nyungs kar brdeg/ nam gyi gung ngam nyin gung la// drag po'i sngags dgod brgya rtsa brgyad// des ni rang gshed rang

la 'bebs// zhes pa'i rdo rje 'di gsungs so// e dun ka y+YaM/ e ra ka laM raM yaM khaM mA ra ya rbad/ he ba laM raM raM yaM khaM mA ra rbad/ sha mo he laM raM yaM khaM mA ra ya rbad/ na ma laM raM yaM khaM mA ra ya rbad/

i ri shi laMraM yaM khaM mA ra ya rbad/ sas stibs/ mes tshig/ chus skur/ rlung yan/ kha ri ba ldag/ rna ring/ tsi ring/ raM laM khaM yaM brdib/ 'byung ba lnga'i drag po rgod// stong las sgral bar ngas ma bshad// rdzas dang

sngags zer bzlog mi bya// 'gras pa'i so mtshams bar du gzhag/ bdud bzhi las gyur rtog pa'i lha// rang las grub pa dregs pa can// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba kun// drug bzhi khro bo brgyad khri yis// rang gi
'byung ba bshig par 'gyur// rdo rje ur mo las rtog pa bcu gsum pa'o//// rdo rje ur mo phyin ci log/ mu stegs ka la k+sha de// log 'dren nag po kha gdengs yin// tir ti kha gdangs dregs pa'i

khar// 'bar 'dra nag bo rdzangs pa na// nag po 'ba' 'dra brlag par gzigs// de la de yi sbyor ba bshad// yor mo phur mo sri shing la// dre nag rnga ma nag pos bcing// sa nag rdo nag dug nag gsum// ra rog phag

rog glang khrag dang// des ni spru bar rab tu bya// nag po kha gdangs chen po ste// khru tshad phyed du bya ba yin// ral pa sa la bslebs pa ni// dres nag rngo ma dag la bya// de ltar byas pa'i gzugs de

yi// khog pa stong par dmod pa bri// nyi shu+u dgu yi nub mo la// lho nub mtshams su las bya ba// a mu ka zhes bos pa la// dmod pa nag po 'di dag go// a ka de ba de gar pa nag po ru tra ha la nag po kha dong

kha/ nag po kha dong kha'i/ nir ni kha'i/ de ni ming dang srog bcug la// ru dra nag po'i gnas khang ngam// de yi lam srang dag tu mnan// nges par brlag par rdo rjes bshad// rdo rje ur mo las rtog pa bcu bzhi
pa'o//// de nas rdo rnon po yis// rgyud rnams kun tu gsang ba yi// gnad gcod spu gri lta bu ste// 'byung ba gnad kyi las gcod pa// de yi drag sngags 'di dag ste// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje

las// gsungs pa 'di dag 'byung ba'i gnad// e yaM raM baM suM mA ra ya rbad rbad rbad ya/ suM baM yaM e/ ma ra ya rbud/ rbud rbud rbad ya/ e rbad/ yaM rbad raM rbad/ sum rbad/ khas khas/ shig thibs mA ra ya e/

ya mA mA ra yaM/ raM mA ra ya raM/ baM mA ra ya baM suM ma ra ya suM/ sarba sha truM gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ s+pho ta/ rba na rba na/ rbu na rbu na/

rba na rbud rba na rbud/ thun b+h+yo thun b+h+yo/ rbad nas dza la 'bri sha ha la ha b+h+yo rbad/ dregs pa can ni gtad gcod pa// 'byung ba gnas kyi 'khrul 'khor te// drag po so ru yang dag bshad// rdo rje ur mo las rtog pa
bco lnga pa'o//// rdo rje 'bar ba drag po yis// gnod sbyin rnam par mi shigs ba// dregs pa'i nang na dbang chen te// des na 'ba' 'dra nag po'i gshed// de yi chung ma 'dre srin mo// srin
mo nag mo 'chi bltas can// de yis bltas can// de y-i bltas pas nyams pa 'byin// des ni myir bar brlag par 'gyur// rlung lha'i phyogs su phyin nas ni// sUr+ya med pa'i grog po nas// sa nag phul gang

bslangs nas ni// mchod rten rnying pa'i sa dang sbyar// phag pa rta dang khyi yi khrag/ dug dang sbyar bas gzugs byas la// bong nag rngog mas skra byas te// mi lus phag pa'i mgo can la// khyid gang ba ru bya bar
bshad// gza' rgod mig dmar dar ba'i tshe// de yi gub mo srid la bya// a mu ka yi gzugs dag gis// kho yi rdzas rnyed rab tu bshad// ma rnyed ming rus gsang mtshan bri// gzugs la dug gi chu khrag

byug/ tsher mas phug la kha ru rtsang// so mtshams yang na phyi sgo'i drung// 'og tu yin zhes dgra la bstan// ma ma rak+sha tsit+ta shad du sod/ raka mo kha long kha'i/ yag mo kha long kha'i/ ru dra kha long kha'i/ ka ma d+hi ka
ni a mu ka kha'i/ gzugs kyi mtha' ma yin zhes pa// brgya 'am stong gis bya bar bshad// srod kyi dus su bya bar yin// rdo rje ur mo las rtog pa bcu drug pa'o//// rdo rje khro bos yang dag
bshad// 'ba' 'dra nag po sgral ba yi// ur mo gsang ba'i rtog pa 'di// 'di las gsang ba'i yang tig med// bla ma rdo rje spun dag dang// sngags pa byang chub sems dpa'i rigs/ 'di dag yongs kyi srog

yin pas// de la byas na byang chub med// 'bras bu rang phung na rag pes// de yi rnam shes 'phrog par byed// ji srid rdo rje nang 'gras na// rang gis ma nyes nges pas tsam// bshags dang mkha' 'gro mchod dang
bskang// lta ba don dang ldan par bya// dge bcu blang dang yang dag brjod// de bas de rdzogs bshags pa bya// rdo rje ur mo las rtog pa bcu bdun pa'o//// rdo rje 'bar ba drag po yis// ur mo nag

gcod rnam par rgyal// seng ge kha 'thab rtsal gyi mchog/ nyi zla kha sbyor gsal ba'i mchog/ ur mo nang 'thab shig pa'i mchog/ rdo rje khro bo khyod la 'dud// rdo rje las grub khyod la 'dud// sngags kyi ngo bo khyod

la 'dud// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// ma lus sgrol 'dud khyod phyag 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa bla med don// rdo rje gcod

pa'i las gsungs pa'o// rdo rje gcod ba ur mo las rtog pa bco brgyad pa'o//// rdo rje khro bo rnam par gcod khro bo rnam rtog rgyal ba'i yang snying// rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud khro bo thams cad kyi yang snying rdzogs
so//// rgya gar skad du/ badzra ma sUr+ya rak+ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje nyi mkhrag 'thung gi rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal ya man ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje nyi ma khrag 'thung

gis// 'od zer 'phros pas dug lnga sgrol// rdo rje nyi ma dbang drag 'bar// rdo rje nyi ma sku gtum tshogs// de ni sku yi sprul par bshad// ru dra'i khrag las grub pa ni// rdo rje bse yi lta mo bzhi// khros pas srid

gsum sgrol bar mdzad// 'di ni gsung gi sprul bar bshad// pha bdud ma klu gnyis las bskyed// gdug pa bse yi lcam dral tshogs// yas phyin bse phyin de phyin phag phyin mar khu sbrang rtsi// khrag zhag 'o ma'i

mtsho// ku ma da ri/ k+shu la da ri/ tsa mun da ri/ kaM ka da ri/ chen mo bzhi// blon mo 'khor dang bcas pa yis// bdud dang gza' dang btsan dang klu dang bzhi// bsgral te yul dang mtsho dang rta phrogs pas// 'dul
ba'i lha mo chen mo bzhi// phur bu'i bsrungs mar dam bcas shing// gshin rje'i sgo mar khas blangs shing// rnal 'byor bsrungs mar zhal 'ches pa// rdo rje bse yi lha mo bzhi// 'di sgrub pa la don gsum

ste// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gter// sgrub pa'i snying po bstan par bya// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// dang po sku yi sgrub pa bshad// gnas dang sa gzhi bzung ba dang// phyi mtshams srung zhing nang
mtshams gcad// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// dbang gi zla gam gsum gyis bskor// phyi rim zla gam dmar nag brgyad// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// me dpung sgo bzhir bri bar bya// lha

dang sbyar te phur pa dgod// bse phor dmar po srubs med bzhir// bse mo'i dam rdzas dgod par bya// dpal gyi gtor ma brgyan dang ldan// byang shar las kyi 'brub khung du// che ge mo yi ling ga bca'// de
nas 'bar ba'i dkyil la 'khor bskyed// 'dzab rdzogs 'phrin las drag tu bcol// de ni sku yi sgrub par bshad// sku'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gsung gi sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor gru

gsum rgyas pa ni// phyogs bzhi zla gam bzhi po la// rtsa ba'i snying por bri bar bya// de yi bar khyams zla gam nag po la// brnag pa'i thun sngags bri bar bya// de yi phyi rim ljang khu la// dgug pa'i drag sngags bri

bar bya// sgo bzhi'i rtsa ba'i thun sngags bri// de nas wa thod dmar po bzhir// rtsa ba'i sngags dang che ge mo// spel zhing bris la zla gam dbus su gzhug/ bdag nyid rtsa ba'i yi dam lhar// yud tsam gsal

ba'i thugs kha nas// dza las khros ba'i lha mo bzhi// dmar mo sbrul gyi ral pa can// phur pa g.yas la lcags kyu g.yon// de 'dra bzhi ru gsal ba dang// srog gi snying po 'di dag las// oM su tri ba ya/ ba ra

tsit+ta yo tri sho ri/ ya ma tsit+ta hU~M phaT swAhA/ zla gam dmar po'i sngags su shes// de nas zla gam nag po yi// oM kyi khrid ra khrid ro la khrag 'thung/ kang kaM keM keng kaM ka ya/ tsin+d+ha ma la ro la khrag

'thung/ kaM kaM keM keM kaM ka ya/ snying za ba'i tsit+ta la mar sha ro la khrag 'thung/ kaM kaM keM keM kaM ka ya/ a tang par la to sha la kyi kyi hi hi hU~M phaT rbad/ tsa tsa ra dza dza rbad/ bse mo'i sku mdog nag mor sgom// phyogs

bzhi'i sngags rnams ma nor bar// de nas zla gam ljang khu yi// oM tsi bi ri tsakra pa na sa ma ya/ tshal pa a nr-i tri mA ra ya aM gu sha dza dza/ na ga mA ra ya/ tshal pa a nri tri mA ra ya a gu sha dza dzA/ shu shu rak+sha ya tshal pa

a nri tri mA ra ya/ aM gu sha dza dzA/ a be sha ya tshal ba/ a nri tri mA ra ya/ sha aM gu sha dzA dzA/ bse mo'i sku mdog ljang khur bsam// sngags ni brgya 'am rtsa brgyad bzlas// wa thod dug rdzas khrag gis bkang ba

bzhir// rtsa ba'i thun sngags 'di yis 'phang// oM su tri mA ra ya thun yaM/ ba ra tsit+ta tun yaM/ yo ki shwa ri thun ya/ ya ma tsit+ta thun ya/ badzra ma hA yak+sha thun ya/ sgo thun bzhi ni/ shar du mda' la lho ru rdo// nub tu

khrag la byang du tsha/ dbus kyi phur ba bcu bdun dang// so sor gdab pa'i phur pa bzhi// spyi ru drag tu bzlas pa ni// mA ra ya thod pa/ ta ki ni la thod pa/ snying la ya thod pa/ rnam shes mA ra ya thod pa/ gzugs

phung mA ra ya thod pa// 'khor bcas mA ra ya thod pa/ dun ting mA ra ya thod pa/ 'di ni thod pa gnyis la bsngag/ oM ra ga rag+ta mA ra ya thun/ tsi bi ri thun/ sra ma a nri tri thun/ nA ga ma thun/ k+shu kri ka ri thun/ 'di

dug rdzas nyid la bsngag/ de nas sgrub pa thon ka'i las kyi rim pa ni/ dbus kyi phur pa bcu bdun ni// 'brub khung du su tri'i sngags kyi btab la/ de nas wa thod spyan drangs te// shar gyi wa thod spyan drangs

pa// ku ma da ri sa ma ya dza/ de las su tri rtsa brgyad las// de nas nag po'i steng du gzhag/ kyi khrid rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas ljang khu'i steng du gzhag/ tsi bi ri tsakra bzlas pa bya'o// de nas sgo thun dang
mtshams gcad pa bsres la/ thun sngags bzlas/ de nas 'phangs na dgra bo brlag/ de yis phyogs gzhan 'dre bar bya// de nas slar la sgrub pa byed 'dod na// wa thod nang du ming rus gzhug/ tshon skud sngo

dmar nyid kyis bcing// bdag nyid dgongs pa gsal ba dang// su kri'i snying po stong stong bzlas// yang na 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi// shar gyi thod pa gta' ru bzung// lho yi thod par sbyin sreg bya// nub

kyi thod pa klu la gtad// byang gi thod pa sri ru gnan// lha la byas kyang gdon mi za// 'di ni gsungs gi bsgrub pa'o// gsung gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas thugs kyi sprul pa bshad// 'di ni
'phrin las zab mo'i lung// man ngag thugs kyi sgrub thabs te// dkyil 'khor dbus mthing nag gru gsum hom khung can// gru gsum bar khyams bzhi par byas pa la// zla gam bzhi skor sgo

bzhi gzhung// dbus su lcags phur nyid la ni// ya mAn ta ka dgod par bya// zla gam bzhi la seng ldeng phur pa bzhi// rtsa ba'i snying po bris la dgod par bya// rtsa ru gdab phur bzhi yang gzugs// sgo bzhir

seng ldeng phur pa bzhi// gzhan yang bse phor dngul phor mdzo ru ba men rwar// so so'i dam rdzas dgod par bya// ru skyogs la ni spyan drangs la// ma mo rnams la mchod pa bya// bse phor kha sbyar nang du ni// mi khyi

ra dang phag gi khrag/ blug la hom khung gru la gzhag/ smyug ma tshigs lnga rten du bca'// byang shar 'brub khung nag po ru// tsa ra rog po te dkar la// rnam shes brgyad la mtshan byang brgyad// brnag pa'i rdzas su

gzhag par bya// dang por snang la rang bzhin med par sgom// gnyis la khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin// gsum pa mtshon pa'i hU~M las kyang// dbang chen rim pa chags pa dang// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka dang// dbu

gsum sngo skya mthing dang ljang ba'i zhal// phyag drug be con dgra sta ral gri bsnams// sdigs mdzub rnge'u chung dril bu thod rlon g.yon// zhabs drug bdud dang ma he gdan la brkyang bskum tshul// khro bo'i rgyan cha
bdun dang ldan par sgom// bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kha nas// ma dang dza las spros pa ni// sbyor sgrol yum gnyis sku la 'khril bar bsam// yab yum sbyar ba'i byin rlabs las// bdag nyid thugs khar yi ge

hU~M// dmar nag rab tu 'tsher ba las// badzra yak+sha ma ru rtse dun dun/ ces brjod pas// sgrol ging gi bdag po ma ru tse// sku che la yan lag rags pa ni// dmar nag mdog la spyan gsum// be con g.yas la

sdigs mdzub g.yon// ral pa'i thor tshugs sbrul gyis bcings// bdud kyi gdan la brkyang bskum tshul// sgrol ging nyid kyi thugs kha nas// ma las khros pa'i lha mo ni// ku ma da ri hU~M b+h+yo/ shar du rdo rje yan byin

bskyed// k+shu la da ri hU~M b+h+yo/ lho ru rdo rje bse byin bskyed// tsa mun da ri hU~M b+h+yo/ nub tu rdo rje de byin bskyed// kaM ka da ri hU~M b+h+yo/ byang du rdo rje phag phyin bskyed// rgyun gyi 'dzab tu drangs pa ni// thugs kyi yang snying la/

oM sa ma ya/ shrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag sha/ kha mun tra/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo/ nub re la stong stong tshang bar bzlas so// oM shrI many+dzu ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ yaM yaM thuM thuMs gshin rje

nag po'i snying khrag la dun b+h+yo/ ma ru rtse rtsal hur lcugs la thum srog la yaM yaM dza dza/ stong drangs/ mon mo rtsa ba'i snying po la// oM su tri ba ya/ ba ra tsit+ta yo kri sha ra/ ya ma tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba'i snying po

stong stong sa ya drang ngo// bsam rgyud ni gzan pa po la btang/ brnag pa'i thun nag bal mo'i ngan sngags la/ oM khyi khrid ra khrid mi ro la khrag 'thung/ kaM kaM keM keM kaM ka ya/ tsin+d+ha ma la ro la khrag

'thung/ kaM kaM keM keM kaM ka ya/ snying la za ba'i tsit+ta la mA ra ya/ ro la khrag 'thung/ kaM kaM keM keM kaM ka ya/ tang bar la to/ sha la kyi kyi ti ti hU~M phaT rbad/ rtsa tsa rA dza rbad/ sha rus za ba'i snying po ste/ phyag rgya bcas la

ling ga'i spyi bor gtugs la bzlas rgyun du yang drang ngo// de nas las drag po'i bya thabs ni/ ro tsas ras la ling ga bri// dpral bar ming la snying khar rus dang bri// g.yas su ma ra ya bri// g.yon du ma ra ni

bri// mngoms su ma ra da bri// mgo bo ma ra dza yis bskor// dur khrod thod pa dag dang sbrel// phyi rol dag tu sbas nas kyang// thugs dam rgyud bskul pho nya gtang// 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di dag grangs// dgra

bo ni nri sha khu ru ni dza dzA/ zhes bzlas pa ni drag tu dgug/ de'i dus su sngags pa chas su 'jug ste/ dar nag thod bcing me long gdags// 'khor yang chas su gsal la// gra bo dgug pa'i las bya// de nas

khugs pa dang/ lha dang dbye ba'i las byas te/ gu gul la sogs pa'i dud pas bdug cing/ sngags 'di bzlas so// oM lang ku sa ma ya du/ hu lu ling/ myos na rgyal kha gzer ga rna ya/ zhes bzlas so// de nas

bya rog dang ru g.yas pa dang/ 'ug pa'i dang ru g.yon pas dbye/ a nir/ trag rak+sha mA ra ya phye/ zhes bzlas so// de nas seng ldeng dpyug pas btags pa ni// oM tsi pa swAhA/ ka ru hU~M phaT/ ces btag/ de nas

drag po'i ngan sngags brdeg/ nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshes brdeg/ lus ni lha yi dkyil 'khor sgom// sring mos bkug cing ming pos sgrol// oM tsi pi ri tsakra/ ba na sa ma ya/ tshal ba a ni tri mA ra ya/ aM gu sha

dza dza/ nA ga ma rA dza/ tshal pa a nri tri mA ra ya/ aM gu sha dza dza dza/ shu shu rak+sha ya/ tshal pa a nri dri ma ra ya/ aM gu sha dza dza dza/ a be sha ya/ tshal ba a nri tri mA ra ya/ aM gu sha dza dza/ zhes bzlas so// bse'i lha

mos bkug par bsam la/ ming po'i sngags kyis gdab ste/ oM tri ling shang ka du/ dri za yak+sha rbad pu phye ma kha 'dar/ ru ru pra pra/ duM duM/ shig shig/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ tsa tsa ra dza rbad/ ma ru rtse yis bsad par
bsam// de nas nyin mtshan med pa ru// ma ru rtse dang bse mo'i ngan sngags kyi tun du gdab po// de nas pho na dgye zhing phur pas gdab pa ni// snying khar ya mAn ta kas gdab// g.yas su e ka dza
tis gdab// g.yon du pe ta li yis gdab// 'doms su ma ru rtse yis gdab// dpral bar bse yi lha mos gdab// rtsa ba'i snying pos bzlas shing gdab// de nas gzugs dang ming rus la rak+ta'i thun gdab/
de nas yang bse phor gyi khrag la/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang thun sngags stong tsam bzlas la khrag la bstim/ de nas nub tha ma ban+d+ha lcang lo can du byo la/ las kyi sngags bzlas la/ ma nyes pa'i dpang
btsugs la 'phang ngo// ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga bya// de nas ra bsgral la snying du ming byang bcug la/ de nas mgo yi nang du gzhug/ pags pas gtums la skud pas bsdams// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar

bsgom// rgya mtsho'i gting nas byung ba yi// sgrol ging bdag po ma ru rtse// dmar nag bse yi ral pa can// de la dgra bo gtad par bsam// oM hri ti byi kri ta mon tu dgra bo mA ra ya nan/ byas la gnod par
ngas pa'i sar sba/ gnyer gtad las kyi rim pa bya// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i bro yang brdung// thugs kyi sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje nyi ma khrag 'thung gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma rA dza kro d+hi rA dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo gshin rje'i rgyal po'i rgyud/ dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og

min gyi gnas na dpal rdo rje srin po bzhugs te/ de yi tshe dpal phyag na rdo rjes/ khro bo'i rgyal po ta ki ra dzas bstan pa/ bsrung ba'i bdag po bstan pa'i thabs bstan du gsol zhes zhus pas/ dpal 'jigs

byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ bstan pa ni thugs kyi snying po'o// gnod byed 'joms pa'i thabs ni bsrung ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i rgyal po ta ki'i rA dza de yi thabs dang man ngag gang du bstan pa ni/

khro bo ta ki rA dza dngos po de yi thabs bstan pa ni/ gsad pa'i thabs dang/ gso ba'i thabs dang/ dbab pa'i thabs dang/ gcad pa'i thabs dang bzhi'o// de la gsang pa'i thabs ni// khro bo ta ki ra dza sku

mdog mthing nag la nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ stag gi sham thabs dang/ chu srin gyi g.yang gzhi dang/ sbrul gyi chun bu dang/ dur khrod kyi chas brgyad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang/ phyag g.yas na shel gyi
gri bsnams/ g.yon na lcags kyu spar shad bsnams pa ste dgra bgegs kyi 'bigs pa'o// de'i thun rdzas ni nyungs kar la bsngags la gtor ma la thun brab/ ling ga gsar rnying gnyis/ rang dri mi gtong bar/
snying khar ming/ dpral bar rus/ lte bar mtshan/ de yi sgoms su gsad pa'i ma rA dza/ lha 'dre gnyan sar sbas gnan la/ zhag bdun dag tu bsgrub par bya// de yi sgrub pa'i drag sngags bstan pa
ni/ oM ta ki rA dza tsit+ta hU~M phaT/ ces 'bum tsho bdun du bzlas so// gsad pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o//// gso ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ gu gul dkar po la me gtang la/ nad pa'i dri ma bkru zhing chu la
bsngags la lus mgo 'jug khyab par byug go/ bsrung ba'i drag sngags ni/ oM ta ki rA dza hU~M phaT/ gso ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// yang dbab pa'i thabs bstan pa ni/ khrag sna mang po tshogs tshad

dang// dam nyams dmigs pa'i sngo sna dang// gangs chu la sogs pa'i chu snatshogs la sngags bzlas te/ zhag bdun na 'bum tsho bdun la dgra yul du sngo gseb tu gtor ro// ser ba'i sngags ni/ oM ta ki ra tsa

tsan d+ha ka hU~M phaT/ rA dza du li shag trang phroM hril/ na ga rA dza dud phroM shar phob/ ces pas chu mig med par ser ba phebs so// thog ser dbab ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// ser ba gcad pa'i thabs ni 'di dag

go/ khro bo'i rgyal po ka ti rA dzas stong khams me'i rang bzhin du khyab pas/ sdang mig bgrad pa na mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha nas me'i 'od 'phro ba/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub gyen la bsgreng ba/ g.yas pa yungs kar

dril nas 'phen pa'i drag sngags ni/ oM ta ki rA dza tsin+d+ha tsin+d+ha kharga hU~M phaT/ ces gcad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// yang de yi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje srin po la/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/

smyo 'bog gi thabs dang sbyor thabs bstan du gsol/ rdo rje srin pos bka' stsal ba/ bstan pa'i snying po la gnod pa byed pa la/ tshes gsum gyi chu dang yungs kar la sngags brdeg ste/ oM ta ki rA dza tsit+ta karag
kharag hU~M phaT/ ces pas dgra yi them pa'i 'og gam khang rtsar gtor na nges par nyams par 'gyur ro// smyo 'bog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang phan pa'i thabs bstan du gsol zhes zhus pas/

dpal rdo rje mchang gi bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten rims nad tshub ma lta bur byung yang/ ban+d+he sngags pa'i rus pa dang/ yungs kar dang/ khrag zor la sngags la brdeg ste/ oM ta ki rA dza tsin+d+ha karag kharag hU~M phaT/
ces yungs kar dang rin po che sna tshogs la 'bum bzlas nas mgul du btags na thub bo// sre'u gso ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// yang ngan sngags kyi dug mda' 'phangs na/ yungs kar dang/ khrag sna

dang/ gtor ma la ngan sngags bzlas te/ oM ta ki rA dza tsin+d+ha karag kharag hU~M phaT/ ces pas dgra phyogs su 'phang ste/ b+h+yo/ chos kyi chos zor 'phen pa slar la bzlog/ rgya yi ngan sngags 'phen pa slar la
bzlog/ bon gyi bon zor 'phen ba slar la bzlog/ b+h+yo rang gis rang la zo/ rang sngags kyis rang phung du chug/ rang mtshon rang la zug/ rang gi dmod pas rang phung du chug/ ces so// ngan sngags
dug mda'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas dpal chen pos bka' stsal ba/ hU~M bcom ldan dpal chen gshin rje gshed// khro bo'i rgyal po ta ki ra dza ni// mthing nag me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od ldan zhing// sku
smad stag gi sham thabs brgyan// chu srin g.yang gzhi lhabs se lhabs// phyag g.yas shel gyi gri gug bsnams// dam nyams dgra bgegs gshog pa/ dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la// sdang dgra
gnod bgegs rdul du lhogs// hU~M/ srin po 'dul mdzad khro rgyal btso// smug nag me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje ral gri sbyor bas gdug pa 'dul// thogs med nam mkha' lta bu'i zhal mnga'
ba// be con zhags pas dgra bgegs snying nas 'dren// mthing nag me yi dkyil 'khor 'od kyis kun tu bskor// gri gug 'bar ba phyag na bsnams pa yis// las ngan dgra bgegs snying khrag dron mo

'dren// shangs na dbugs byung rlung nag tshub mar 'tshub// sbyan rtsa dmar po bzlog pas stong gsum me yis bsreg/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag stong gsum 'tshig/ sku bskyod tsam gyis ma mo dbang du sdud// bstan pa
gnyan po bsrung ba'i bya ra byed// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di gsol la// thugs dam dus la bab bo sa ma ya// ma g.yel bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// ces bskul ba'i le'u ste brgyad
pa'o//// de nas yang thod pa mtshan dang ldan pa ru// rten 'brel nus mthu tshangs bsogs pa// gru gsum zla gam gru bzhi'i nang du ni// rdzas gsal nas ni zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon mi

za'o// lha 'dre'i rgyu srang yod na/ gnyan po gang yod sa ru sba// sgo ru khru gang brkos nas ni// sbas te g.yam pas kha yang gcad// las kyi rdo rje rkang pa mnan// bcing ba phyag na rdo rjer sgom// hU~M/ nga ni khro bo'i

rgyal po ste// ta ki rA dza yin nges pas// sbyor ba 'di ni bya bar gsungs// mnan ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag kyang// rang gi srog bzhin ma bcangs na// snod dang mi ldan spel ba
na// na rag chen por lhung bar 'gyur// de bas nan tan cher bskyed la// rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la// mna' dam bcas la gtad par bya// zhes gsungs so// khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyud bka' khyad par
can// don gyi man ngag snying po'i rgyud// rgyud gtad pa'i le' ste bcu pa'o//// 'phags pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo ka ti rA dza'i rgyud tshogs rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha bi dza ya ya man+t+ra ta ka tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud/ dpal ya mAn ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus

gcig na/ lho phyogs me ri 'bar ba yi// yi dgas phal chen dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i// pho nya'i tshogs kyi gshin rje la// dgongs te 'di skad bka' stsal to// nga ni khro rgyal gshin rje

gshed// yid la gang yin su sgom pa// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob// yang na nam mkhar 'phur bar 'gyur// nam mkha' la ni babs nas kyang// nga ni rang byung ngo mtshar lha// nga ni dus gsum mngon du

byung// de bzhin nga ni phyis kyang 'byung// nga ni da ltar 'byung ba'i lha// 'di ni kun tu nga yi dbang// su zhig gang la gang sgom pa// gang zhig nga la mchod byed pa// lha ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil
'khor thams cad 'grub par 'byung// nga ni rab tu gang ba yin// gsang nas sbyor ba byas nas ni// bzlas brjod mi dgos 'grub par 'gyur// gsang zhing sbyor ba byas na ni// khu ba ras ya yi tshogs// rab
tu gsang ste 'grub bar bshad// gsang bcas sbyor ba byas na ni// shes na dngos grub dam pa dbyig/ des 'thob 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sbyo ba po zhig dag pa yis// mdor na 'phrin las rnam bzhi

'grub// chos rnams sgra yis sgrogs par 'gyur// nga ni dus ngan tha ma'i tshe// bstan pa dang ni ston pa byed// dge bcu dag ni nub pa'i tshe// de tshe nga yi dngos grub sbyin// dam tshig nyams pa mang ba'i tshe// de tshe

nga yi bstan pa 'phel// de tshe nga yi chos kyang sgrogs// gang zhig sgom zhing sems pa dang// yi dam du yang mchod byed pa// dngos grub yid la ci 'dod pa// 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pa ster// be con phyag rgya
zungs su zung// dus gsum du yang zungs su zung// lha nye ba'i man ngag sbyor ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// ya mAn ta ka gshin rje
gshed// dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste// g.yas ni dkar la g.yon ni dmar// dbus ni sku dang mthun pa'i zhal// sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra// zhal bgrad rdo rje mche ba gtsigs// spyan dmar glog

stong 'gyu ba bzhin// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// bde gshegs rgyal ba thugs kyi mchog/ phyag drug g.yas kyi bar pa na// kha T+wAM kha yi

rnge'u chung 'khrol// ma mo mkha' 'gro dam la sdud// phyag drug g.yas kyi tha ma na// rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po bsnams// nyon mongs gnas nas 'dren par badzad// phyag drug g.yon gyi dang po na// dung chen dmar
gyis bkang ba bsnams// thugs rje chags pas dbang du sdud// phyag drug g.yon gyi bar pa na// ba su ta yi zhags pa bsnams// dam las 'das pa 'ching bar mdzad// phyag drug g.yon gyi tha ma
na// zhing chung dbyug tho smug po bsnams// bdud dang dgra bgegs zil gyis gnon// sku yang che la bam ldir bzang// glang chen ko rlon na bza' gsol// stag lpags brjid pa'i sham thabs can// zhing chen

g.yang gzhi'i ya ba bskor// thod pa skam rlon se ral kha// sbrul nag stong gis lhu tshigs brgyan// zhing chen sgril ma'i gdan stengs ma// brkyang bskum tshul du brjid par bzhugs// g.yon na khro mo gnyis gnas
pa// za byed chen mo pe ta li// mig gsum gdong ni khro gnyer can// lus ni me chen 'bar ba la/ gzi chen rab tu mdangs kyi lha// gtum mo du gul gos gyon ma// gyen du skra brdzes gsus mo che// de bzhin
lag na rtse gsum thogs// gzi chen rab tu bsdigs par mdzad// bde gshegs sras kyi bka' sdod ma// zhing chung sgril ma'i gdan stengs na// brkyang bskum tshul gyis sbyor ba mdzad// me dpung 'bar ba'i
dkyil 'khor na// 'khor ni togs med btsan thabs can// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa'i// pho nya'i tshogs kyis gshin rje yi// yi dgas phal chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// khro mo ke ri brgyad kyis bskor// phyi
rim sing nga brgyad kyis bskor// thar byed chen mo bzhi yis bskor// dbang phyug ma yi tshogs kyis bskor// yi dgas phal chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// gshegs shing byon pa'i gnas na yang// bsnyen cing sgrub

pa'i lha lags kyis// yal gam can la brtse dgongs nas// sems can don la gshegs su gsol// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+harma saM ga b+h+ya/ a tro ta ba ri bi ri sarba sa ma ye na dza hU~M baM ho// e h+ye hi a gad dza hU~M dza/ zhes

gsungs so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor la phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab na ster bar mdzad do// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba spyan drangs zhing mchod pa dbul ba'i le'u
ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang las kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// khro bos yang dag bka' stsal ba// dkyil 'khor re mig bcu bdun la// sgo bzhi dang ni ldan par bya// ri mig dgu pa dag la ni// a

kro'i yi ge bcu bdun dgod// sgo bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi// thal chen re gas mngar te bri// de stengs sems nyid dag pa yis// cho ga rnam gsum sbyor ba las// bdag nyid ya mAn ta kar gyur// de la mnyes
pa'i masnyen pa dbul// oM a kro te ya man ta ka ha na ma tha ban dza hU~M phaT/ de ni ji srid mnyes pa dbul// mchog dang thun mong ster bar mdzad// des ni las rnams thams cad 'grub// de nas sems
gdug bsgrub bya ni// dkon mchog gsum la smon byed pa// nan tan gyis ni bsgral bar gsungs// de la sbyor ba 'di dag go/ mi mgo ma gas ma chag pa// shi ba'i skra las pir byas la// khrag
dang dug la sogs pa yis// ta la'i 'dab la ming rus bri// ngan pa rul pa'i gos sam ni// yang na thal chu gsher ba 'am// rul pa man pa'i gos gyon la// khros shing 'khrug par bsgom bya ste// gzugs

brnyan rkang pas mnan byas te// ming rus phur bu sor brgyad la// bskul ba yi ni sngags bzlas te// rgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas te gdab// de nas dgra yi sgor ni sba// mngon sbyod las ni 'di byas na// mkhyen dang

mi mkhyen rnam spangs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyang 'jig pa dang// snang dang mi snang gang yang rung// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur// gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos// zla ba phyed kyis rdzogs par
bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams kyi mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las/ le'u gsum pa ste rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ gshin rje nag po'i rgyud/ dpal gshin rje gshed po la phyag 'tshal lo// bud med zhi bas bsrung na/ dar dkar ram/ gro ga 'am/ ras dkar po

gtsang ma la gi hang gis 'khor lo rtsibs can gnyis bris la/ na ma'i bar du bsrung bar bya ba'i ming bris nas kham pa'i gab tse kha sbyar ba'i nang du bcug ste/ mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa yang blug la/
gzungs thag dkar pos dkri zhing mdun gyi stegs bu'i steng du gzhag go/ me tog dkar pos dus gsum du mchod de// bdag nyid kha shar phyogs su bltas la/ ya mAn ta ka sku mdog dkar po zhi ba'i chas su

sgom/ phyag na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bum pa dkar bo bdud rtsi chus bkang bas bsrung bar bya ba la dbang bskur bar sgom zhing 'dzab bya'o// snying po ni/ oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ na ma che ge

mo shan ting ku ru na ma swAhA/ zhi ba'i las so// skyes pa bsrung na dar dkar ram/ gro ga 'am/ ras ser po gtsang ma la zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs can gnyis gur kum gyis bris la/ gang la bya ba'i

ming yang swAhA'i bar du bri'o// gab rtse kha sbyar ba'i nang du mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa yang blug la/ 'khor lo ming dang bcas pa yang der bcug ste gzungs thag ser pos dkris la stegs bu'i steng du gzhag
go/ me tog ser pos dus gsum du mchod de bdag nyid kha byang phyogs su bltas la/ ya mAn ta ka sku mdog ser po rgyal po'i cha lugs su sgom zhing/ bdag nyid bsrung bar bya ba'i rgyu gnyis ka

zla ba gser gyi zhun ma lta bu'i steng na gnas shing/ phyag na gser gyi bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgya ser pos gang ba bsnams pas dbang bskur bar sgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// snying po ni oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M

phaT phaT swAhA/ che ge mo shan ting ku ru swAhA/ zhi ba'i sngags so// oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ tsam che ge mo pus ting ku ru swAhA/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las kyi sngags so// dbang gi las ni gro ga 'am/

ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ srin lag gi khrag rnams bsres la 'khor lo gnyis bris/ snag tsha dkar pos dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug mtha' skor du bris la/ ka kha la sogs pa'i yi

ge phyi ma kun snag tsha dmar pos bri'o// ho gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming rus rdzogs par bris la/ zangs kyi gab tse kha sbyar ba'i nang du mar dang sbrang rtsis gang bar blugs la/ 'khor lo yang der bcug
la gzugs thag dmar pos dkris nas stegs bu'i steng du gzhag go/ me tog dmar pos dus gsum du mchod de// bdag nyid kha nub phyogs su bltas nas ya mAn ta ka sku mdog dmar po dbang gi tshul du
sgom zhing/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dmar por bsam zhing dbang du bya ba'i gzugs kyang dmar por bsgoms te/ zla ba'i steng na mngon du 'dug bar dmigs la/ bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer dmar po
'phros bas gang dbang du bya ba de'i lus dang sems 'od zer dmar pos bkang nas nyams shing myos par gyur te/ 'od slar 'dus pas drangs nas bdag gi rkang pa'i drung du 'ongs te dbang du 'dus par bsam

mo// ji tsam dbang du ma gyur cing ma khugs na mar snod du bcas pa de dud pa med pa'i mdag ma bzang po la bsro zhing/ 'dzab mang du bzlas na ji tsam dro bar gyur pa na/ khugs shing dbang du 'gyur ro// snying

po ni/ oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo dbang du gyur cig swAhA/ oM hriSh+t+rIH bi kr-i ta na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ baM che ge mo khugs bar gyur cig swAhA/ dbang gi las so// dgug pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras

sam/ bud med kyi smad dkris byas pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ gcig la dza gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming bri/ gcig la hri gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming bris nas
bud med kyi ban d+ha sbyar ba'i nang du bcug la skud pa dmar pos dkris la stegs bu'i steng du gzhag go/ me tog dmar pos dus gsum du mchod do// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka'i sku mdog nyi ma nub ka'i
dmar thag 'dra bar bsgoms la/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyu bsnams pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dmar po bsnams pas gang dgug pa'i snying kha nas bzung ste drangs par sgom zhing 'dzab bzlas

so// des ma khug na zhing kha ta ri gzhar ba'i phye ma la me bus la de la bsro zhing 'dzab bgrang na de tsha bar gyur tsam na khugs par 'gyur ro// oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ hri che ge mo A kar Sha ya hri

swAhA/ oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ dza che ge mo A kar Sha ya dza swAhA/ dgug pa'i las so// mnan pa'i las ni/ dur khrod kyi ras blangs la ldong ros sam/ yung bas snag tsha byas nas 'khor lo gnyis

bris la/ lan gnyis kyi bar du gang la bya ba'i ming bris te kham ba'i gab tse ser po bskus pa kha sbyar ba'i nang du bcug la/ gab tse steng ma'i rgyab tu dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa re ga bdun rim gyis bskor bar

bris/ de'i dkyil du ri rab gcig bris te/ ri rab kyi steng na rwa brgyad du byung ba'i steng du ri rab gru bzhi pa chen po brgyad bris la/ ri rab dang ri brgyad kyi nang du/ hU~M baM hU~M/ hU~M baM hU~M/ brgyad bris la/ de'i steng

du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rdo rje rgya gram gyis bskor bar bris la/ de'i nang ngam/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod grub pa bzhugs par sgom mo// rdo rje gram gyi dbus su laM ser po bri/ tshon skud ser pos
dkris la mnan no// bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bltas ya mAn ta ka sku mdog ser po dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ser po'i nang na bzhugs par bsgoms la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang laM ser po las 'do zer na bun

nam/ sprin nag po'i sprin phung 'dra ba byung bas gang la bya ba de g.yogs shing/ des ci'ang mi mthong mi shes pa dang/ ri rab rdo rje rgya gram dang bcas kyang yang nas yang du lan brgyad kyi bar du mnan par sgom

zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// oM hriSh+t+rIHbi kr-i ta na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ lam che ge mo'i gnas su stam pa na lam/ mnan pa'i las so// ngag mnan pa'i las bya dgos na/ gong nas 'byung ba bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris

la/ gang la bye ba'i ming dang smra ba'i don kun laM gyi bar du rdzogs par bris la bzlas brjod bya zhing ngag mnan no// drag pos las bya dgos na/ mi smra bar dur khrod kyi ras blangs la ske tshe dang/ lan tshwa dang/

yungs nag gi mar dang/ dug dang/ shing nim ba'i lo ma dang/ ka na ka'i khu ba dang/ ro bsregs ba'i sol ba dang/ mdzub mo'i khrag rnams bsres la snag tsha byas te/ bya rog gi sgro rtsa la smyu gu byas nas 'khor

lo gnyis la hU~M gnyis kyi bar du ming bris nas/ mdun gyi stegs bu'i steng du gzhag go/ me tog sngon pos dus gsum du mchod do// bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bltas nas ya mAn+ta ka sku mdog char sprin nag
po'i mdog 'dra ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i zhal bgrad cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ ljags 'bar ba'i glog lta bu 'dril zhing bskal
ba'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa bsnams pa/ gsus pa che skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba can/ sma ra kham pa 'bar ba/ sbrul nag po 'bar bas yan lag dkris pa/
zhal dang mgul nas hU~M gi sgra 'byin par bdag nyid bsgoms la/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs de ni shin tu ngan pa/ rid pa/ rul pa zhig mngon du gsal bar bsams la/ de'i lus la spyi bo dang/ skra mtshams

dang/ snying kha dang/ dpung mgo dang/ mgo dang/ rgyus pa'i sa rnams su kho bsrung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya bris pa dang/ bsrung ba la sogs pa byas pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgyas bshig la

bkug ste drung du 'dug par dmigs so// khro bo'i 'khor khro bo dang/ khro mo dang/ 'phra men ma'i tshogs mang po sbyan drangs la/ de yang nas yang du bstabs te rnam par shes dang/ mdangs dang/ srog med par
