yum// mthing nag me dpung nang na bzhugs// mi snying spyang mo 'jigs ba'i gzugs// rab tu khros pa'i tshul du gnas// 'jigs byed thugs kyi byin rlabs las// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza dang// nag mo khrag
mig khro gnyer can// brnag pa las kyi pho nyar bsam// gzhan yang sprul pa yang sprul tshogs// dpag tu med pas bskor ba yis// bdag nyid rnam par gsal ba ni// yang dang yang du bsgom bar bya// 'jam
dbyangs rdo rje'i hU~M sgra yis// sku rgyan gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bstod cing gsal gdab sprul pa yis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po sngags kyi tsham rngam brjod// gru gsum

mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// ya mAn+ta ka spyan drangs nas// mchod cing bstod pa dag kyang bya// rtag pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du// sngags kyi yi ge rim par bya// dngos grub chen po bsgrubs byas la// ji

ltar 'dod pa bzhin du blang// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'phreng ba la// gsod pa'i spu gri'i sngags btags la// nyi ma bzhi ru las la sbyar// thun gyi kha gso rgyun du bya// zhes gsungs so// gshin rje ya ma rA dza sku

khros pa'i rgyud las/ gshin rje dpa' bo bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu

tra ya man+taka pa tsa te ro ni hU~M dza/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya man+ta ka/ ya ma rA dzA/ ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rak+sha mu tra snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ rak+mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lon tsin dan ma la

b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ 'phags pa'i nang nas gshin rje gshed// rdo rje khros pa 'jigs pa che// 'chi bdag gshin rje shan pa'i tshogs// 'khor ni nag po 'bum dngabacas// bsnyen cing bsgrubs na

gang yang 'grub// skye med dbyings las sprul pa yi// shes skyob las rnams grub pas na// gsang sngags yi ge'i rim pa bya// oMshrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka/ ya ma rA dzA sa to mi ya/ ya me to ru na ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She

ya/ yak+She yata tsa ni ra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa ste// 'jig rten dregs pa kun gyi srog/ ma lus 'dus pa'i stobs dpag med// rang bzhin stong ba spros dang bral// ye shes rigs pa'i klong du

brdal// smin cing grol ba'i thabs mchog ste// spros bral rnal mas shes skyob nyid// sngags ni gang yin ming yin la// mtshan dang dpe byad yongs rdzogs pas// phyag rgya chen po shes skyob nyid// 'di dag bde

ba'i lam can yin// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho sa// rnam rtog seng ge khyung chen me// kam pa kyob so sa ma ri// raM yaM baM laM tsa ma ri// nA ga de ba ra ka sha dang// a dang khyab ho bu bu ta// ya ma ka li bde ba'i
klong// yid bzhin 'phreng ba lta bur bshad// yon tan mtha' yas shes skyob nyid// dregs pa'i srog dang 'gro drug sems// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i thugs// dngos gzhi ma bcos rnal ma yis// rtsa

ba mi 'gyur byang chub sems// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin// khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// thugs kyi snying po gsang ba ste// dug pa'i yi ge mtshon ste// yid dang dbang po rang grol gyis// ri mo la ni
sems gzhag ste// myur bul yi ge 'dres spangs te// rgyun gyi spyod lam thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// yan lag ma nyams bde bar bzlas// phyag rgya brtan dang dmigs pa thob// bde

ba'i ye shes skye ba ste// grol ba'i phyag rgya yang dag lam// 'di de bde dang smin pa'i mchog/ bgrod dang phyag rgya stobs med cing// bla ma'i bka' lung ma thob na// ji srid bzlas brjod brtson pa dag/ sun
'byin grol med 'chi ba'i gnas// sngon med 'gro ba'i lam mchog bral// bde med rang 'ching mnar med spyod// de bzhin skyon spangs yon tan ldan// yid sbyin nor bu lta bu ste// ma lus dgos pa kun don
sgrub// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed po sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// gsang sngags rim pa de ltar na// drag po'i
'phrin las sbyor ka yi// brnag pa'i kha thun ji ltar bca'// las kyi 'khor lo ji ltar bskor// 'jam dbyangs khro bos nges gsungs pa// snyigs ma lnga yi dus nyid du// sangs rgyas bstan ba
'jig pa yi// nyams pa bdun po bsgral ba'i phyir// dur khrod ma lings gnas mchog tu// stobs ldan mchog tu gyur ba yis// byed pa 'ching ba gsum spangs shing// dman pa'i snyigs ma gsum dor na// bde

ba'i rigs pa gsum rnyed de// drug dar gsum dang ldan pa'o// rnal 'byor bde ba'i lam can des// mi 'jigs seng ge lta bur bya'o// dur khrod chen po'i sa bdag la// rtags kyi tshad ma thob pa des// maN+Dal

mda' gang gru bzhi la// sme khrag sna tshogs byug bar bya'o// dbus su drag po'i 'brub gnas la// dug dang khrag gis byug par bya// kha khyer gdug pa'i rtsang gis bskor// yi dgas kyi ni gos dag la// nyams

pa'i gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// rnam shes gnad kyis 'gugs pa yi// dza yi bar du yi ge nr-i// bod cing 'grogs par byed pa nr-i// ming dang rus kyang bri bar bya// gdug pa'i khram la 'debs pa'o// mtshon cha'i
yi ges bskor bar bri// sngags dang ting 'dzin pho nya yis// rnam shes bkug la gzugs la bstim// gu gul sbyar ma'i dud pa yis// lha lnga myos shing 'tshubs par byed// lha lnga bskrad cing zhabs mas
bsdam// sngon dmar skud bas ske nas gdags// dur khrod gnas nas 'khor lo'i rgyud// rabs chad mon dngamu su ru// nag po mi shes mgo blangs la// gug rgyal dri dang chu yi bsad// ma nor thod ba gzhag

par bya// stag pa'i phyogs na gnas pa yi// srid pa rang grub gshin rje btsal// nag po gyel ba'i seng ge'i tshul// zhal bgrad mche ba gtsigs pa ste// srid gsum zas su za ba'i tshul// brtag pa'i 'chi bdag

zhal dbye'o// nag po gyel pa 'jigs pa che// dngos ni bye ba gung rings so// de yi snying khar yi ge'i ya// rdo sol nag pos bri bar bya// zhal nas kha thun ngan sngags ni// 'chi bdag mtha' ma 'khor bar

bri// khrag gi gzugs kyi kha nas bri// zhal gyi dmod pa drag po ste// 'khor lo thun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las// thod pa'i nang du ro langs bri// lto 'am yang na 'khor lo bri// khams gsum srid gsum grong khyer

gsum// yum gyi lto na yod pas na/ khang khyud rim pa gsum du bskor// thod mkha' lnga dang btson khang bzhi// lcags khang bcu gnyis bcu drug tu// mkhas pas gshin rje'i grong khyer bya// dbus su 'phel byed

mu la ya/ khang pa'i phyogs bzhi 'byung ba bzhi// gshed kyi yi ge dgod par bya// bcu gnyis med dbal yi ge la// bcu drug kha gnon gsang sngags bri// mun dang nang du dgug pa yi// klu yi 'khor lo bri bar
bya// de yi phyi rim dag tu yang// dmod pa dug gi spu gri ste// 'chi bdag dmod mo zhes su grags// de nas thod pa kha sbyar la// rdza rnga brdung zhing gshin rje bod// tshil chen me dang gsur dud
gtang// khur ba bus te spyugs glu blang// rak+ta dmar gyi arga dang// smug chen smug chung snying la bod// 'chi bdag bskyed dang spyan drangs bstim// dbang du bsdus la 'phrin las bcol// mchod bstabs
'phrin las gshed dmar bskul// dur khrod ras sam rgya shog la// gcod pa nam mkha'i 'khor lo bri// rim pa gsum ldan mtshon cha dag/ thod dbyug ral gri be con dang// rgya gram la sogs sna tshogs

bri// rtsang bzhi hoM khung kha la dgram// rnam shes gcod cing 'gugs ste// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo zhes kyang drangs// rabs chad dang ni mon thod du// sme khrag gsum dang dug sbyar la// drag po'i sngags ni bstim

shing bsag/ gsang ba thun gyi 'khor lo yin// de nas 'khor lo bskor ba dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i las rim gyis// tshogs brgyad 'joms pa'i ya tshogs brgyad// dril gtor sngags kyi mtshon cha ste// phyi yi
'khor lo yin par 'dod// gnad dgu 'joms pa drag po'i 'bru// gzer dgu 'debs pa mtshon cha'i so// gnan bzlog gnad kyi 'khor lo nang// bcu bdun drag po rus sbal 'gros// gsad pa'i sngags su

de ltar bshad// yang gsang drag po gnad kyi gcod// rnal ma bzlog ba lto dkrug pa// yang gsang thugs kyi mtshon cha bshad// ngan sngags dug gi mtshon cha ste// rtsa ba spu gri gcod pa'i ngar// mtshon cha las kyi

nges par bshad// ya ma ra ya dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo zhig a mu kaM pra ma ya oM phaT/ rak+ta tsa ra ya hU~M phaT/ mur tsa ya hU~M phaT/ mar ya hU~M phaT/

rA dza sa to ru na yo ta ya/ ra ni tsa ya/ ra ni yo tsa ya/ to ru na yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ to sa tsa ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ yo na ru to sa tsa ra ma ya/ sa tsa ni rA dzA sa twa me ya/ ya ra ni yo na ru to me ya/

che ge mo a mu kaM/ snying baM rul rbad ya/ ya tra sa la mu tra rbad/ ru sa ta nan khraM ti rbad ya/ mA ra ya khraM du rbad ya/ ya ma me tak+She/ rA dza sa twa/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ ka ba bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor gyis// nyin dang

mtshan mor las bya ba// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bshad pa yin// yang gsang snying po'i bcud dang 'bru// ya ma me ta k+She/ ni ra tsa sa/ to ru na yo/ ni ra dza/ drag po dug gi 'bru thus te// 'chi bdag las la bod pa

yis// rnal ba'i las su bshad pa yin// ya ma k+She ta me/ dza ra ni dza/ ya ra ni yo/ na ru to sa/ drag po gnad gcod dug gi mtshon// gtad pa'i las sngags te// dkrugs pa'i sngags su yang dag bshad// mA rA
ya yi so gdags sam// yang na nyin bzhi'i go rims bzhin// drag po'i 'khor lo bskor bar bya// che ge mo a mu kaM/ srog la trig shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng sha ka dzra/ srog la thums mugs rbad/ tsit+ta

breng shag dza/ srog la thun shag rbad/ nr-i tsit+ta breng hur thums dza/ srog la gzir shag rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag dza/ srog la breng breng dza/ nr-i srog la dun dun rbad/ khaM shag tsa la rbad/ srog la myos rbad/ khyer

phung mugs ti ling shag lo dza/ srog rtsa khrag ti snying phyung thum ril raM shag rbad/ gsod pa spu gri'i mtshon cha ste// lus srog 'byed pa'i sngags su bstan// zla ba tha chung mar ngo la// drag po'i las la sbyar bar

bya// 'khor lo'i mtshon cha me dbal gyis// rtsa srog shes pa 'brel bar byed// sngags kyi bstod tshigs bar bar du// spyi rgyugs sngags kyi phu sprugs bya// dgongs kyi ro longs rub dus su// drag po kha thun
sngags kyis gdab// rgyun gyi 'dzab kyis khog phub la// gshin rje nag por khram la gdab// nyungs kar sngags kyis bla dgug cing// dug khrag thun gyis bsnun cing gsad// 'khor lo gcod pa'i grogs su
'gyur// las kyi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// tshes gcig dag tu brtsis pa yi// nyi ma sa 'og song ba la// dur khrod gnas sam klu yi grong// 'byung bo'i gnas su gnan pa bya// gnan pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa

dang// zor gyi kha gso rgyun mi gcad// ces gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed po ya ma ra dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las// kha thun nag po 'khor lo gcod byed kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po
yis// kha thus 'khor lo nag po yi// las kyi rim pa de lta na// 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje rnams// gshed ma srog la rbad pa dang// drag po thun gyis gsad pa yi// thun gyi ngan sngags ji lta bu// 'jam

dpal khros pas nges gsungs pa// gdug byed gshin rje pho mo rnams// 'di nas byang phyogs ri bo'i rmang// dpag tshad brgyad khri mar 'das na// rgya mtsho'i gling gi bar dag na// thod pa lcags kyi mun khang
na// gshin rje yongs kyi sde dpon po// ma mo kun gyi tshogs rje bo// klu bdud yongs kyi srin po ste// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha pa// gson pho brkos la 'debs par byed// shi ba kun gyi gshin bu
rje// gshin rje nag po dgra bo'i gshed// bdud po mi zan skye 'gro'i bdud// bye ba gung ring sus mi zlog/ me lce klog gi 'phreng ba can// lag na be chen 'khor lo thogs// zas su dam nyams srog dbugs

za// ma he nag po zhon nas rgyu// thog dang ser ba zhal nas 'bebs// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// khram la thob la ltong la \u0f84rgyus// be chen rgyob la 'khor lo skor// bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// srid
gsum lto na 'chang ba mo// sha khrag srog dbugs bdag mo ste// las kyi rlung dmar zhon nas ni// lag na thod pa'i khrag spyo zhing// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad gtong ma// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo

'di// khram la thob la stong la rgyus// khram mda' bu yug char ltar phob// sprul pa gshin rje nag po'i tshogs// pho brang lcags mkhar glong dgu nas// 'chi bdag gshin rje las la rgyu// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po

ni// mthing nag ma he sngo nag chibs// lag na ral gri zhags pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje phya sangs ni// dkar skya zla ba'i 'khor lo zhon// lag na tshe srog bum pa thogs// mgo 'khor byed pa'i gshin rje

dang// tshe srog sdud pa'i gshin rje yis// tshangs pa'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la stong la rgyus// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje'i rgyal po ya ba ti// sngo nag chu glang sngon po

zhon// lag na ral gri dgra sta thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje rtel pa ni// nag po rnga mo rlung la zhon// lag na gsod byed mda' gzhu bsnams// khrag tu skyug pa'i gshin rje dang// srog dbugs len pa'i gshin

rje dang// mgrin pa'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// mtshon chas chod la 'khor los skor// gshin rje a ba glang mgo ni// dud kha dre rta rkang gsum zhon// lag na lcags kyu zhags

pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje smigs pa ni// sngo nag rlung sha rwa bcu zhon/ lag na ber kha zhags pa thogs// rgyal bar byed pa'i gshin rje dang// bla srog len pa'i gshin rje yis// lte ba'i rtsa chen gcad pa'i
phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje ral ba tshar dgu ni// ljang nag gdug pa sbrul la zhon// lag na zhags ba dbyug pa thogs// bka' nyan gshin rje

mig dmar ni// dmar po lkug la zhon// lag na spu gri zhags pa bsnams// gsod bar byed pa'i gshin rje dang// srog rtsa gcod pa'i gshin rje yis// snying gi rtsa chen gcad pa'i phyir// khram la thob la stong la

rgyus// mtshon chas gtubs la 'khor los skor// gshin rje'i khraM khraM khraM la thob// gsod byed gshin rje'i chung ma ste// nag mo ral ba 'bebs pa mo// bdud kyi lcam mo khrag mig ma// mon mo gser gyi rna cha

can// nyams pa'i dgra bo bsgral ba'i phyir// khram la thob la ltong la rgyus// myos pa khrag gi thun phob cig/ gsod pa dug gi thun phob la// gsod byed gshin rje'i gnas su khrid// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i

rtsibs la skyon// gshin rje'i khraM khraM khraM la thob// gdug byed gshin rje pho mo rnams// gshed dmar srog la bskul bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngan sngags 'di dag gsungs so// oM ya ma rA dza

sa to me b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ baM ri li ri li rbad nan/ oM dub nur dub nur/ che ge mo tshal pa tshal pa nan/ oM snying gshogs snying me kha la mu lo b+h+yo/ rtsa thun nan/ oM sa sti ru ru gong tra ra dza nan/

che ge mo mA ra ya nan/ oM mun ya mugs ti subs/ che ge mo la cho cho/ bal hu bal hu/ bal yu bal yu/ snying gong rtsa thun nan/ rtsa thun nan/ che ge mo nan/ khrag thun khong khrag che ge mo'i khong khrag la thum ril
ril b+h+yo/ myos pa khrag la gsod ba dug/ gdug pa'i mda' la dri la brdeg/ zhal gyi dmod pa dug mda' ste// 'khor lo'i kha ni thun gyis gcad// dpal gshin rje gshed ya marA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las/
gshed dmar srog la bskur zhing thun gyis gsad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sny-ing po yis// gdug byed 'chi bdag bskur ba dang// thun gyis gsad pa de ltar na// las rnams kun gyis ma grub
na// gsad pa las kyi thus kha ru// 'chi bdag gshin rje spang smad kyi// dmod pa'i drag sngags ji ltar bsgrub// 'jam dpal khro bos nges gsungs pa// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po yi// gsad pa las kyi thus
kha ru// drag po sbad smad ar la gtad// zhal dang 'khor lo'i dmod pa yis// ma grub sbogs dang shi sa bstan pa yis// gsang ba'i drag sngags bstan pa yin// thog mar byang chub sems ldan pas// dur

khrod dgon pa de dag tu// mi bsad g.yul gyi phung sa la// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum chag gang rtsig/ bang rim gsum ldan nag po byug/ gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta dang// gshin rje pho

mo'i dam rdzas bsag/ mon dang snrel dri'i thod pa la// mkhas pas gshags la 'chi bdag bri// pho dang mo yi drag sngags ni// g.yas dang g.yon du ma nor bri// beb sa ti sang ha'i mgo/ bskyed la spyan drangs
dbang bsdu mchod// lto ru a mu rni dza gzhug/ tshas ldan dar nag re bas gtum// 'brub khung bcug la ro lam brgyad// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim pa las// gshin rje gshed po gsal bar bya// las kyi gshin
rje gsal bar bya// bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod pa dbul// gshed dmar srog la rbad par bya// de nas nyin mtshan dmod par bye// dgongs kyi grob so byung ba dang// ro langs las la rub dus su// dmod pa

sngags kyi phu sprug bya// las rdzogs brag dang chu 'thab bam// 'on te 'byung po'i srang du gnan// thod sbrul drag po'i las su bshad// gzhan yang pho mo'i thod pa'am// dur khrod ro ras de dag la// mkhas pas

'khor lo bris byas la// pho mo gzhan gyi dmod pa dgod// nyi ma bzhi ru las sbyar na// las rnams grub bar dpa' bos bshad// nyin mo gdug pa pho yi sngags// mA' ra ya yis dgra bo sgrol// mtshan mo gdug pa
mo yi sngags// mA ra nr-i dza'i sgra las drang// gsang ba sngags kyi spu gri las// rno dbal sngags kyi so brdar la// dmod pa nyin mtshan bsnol mar drang// spyi rgyugs sngags kyi char phab la// bla
dgug khram la gdab par bya// myos ba'i thun gyis rab snyugs la// gdug pa can nam shi sar gtad// gzhan yang dmod pa'i las bya na// rab chad thod par gru gsum e// dug khrag ldan pas bris byas

la// drag po'i dmod pa dril ba'i mchog/ bzlas shing gzugs la trag tu brab// las rdzogs lung dang mthun par gnan// drag po sngags kyi grangs rdzogs kyang// lus srog mngon du ma phye na// sngags kyis yi

ge lto nas zlog/ dkrugs pa'i sngags kyis shi sa bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chi bdag dmod pa dug gi spu gri 'di dag gsung so// ya ma rA dza gshin rje sa to yam// ya mA rA gshin rje mug to yaM/ ya

mA rA dza gshin rje kha to yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje snying to yaM/ ya ma rA dza gshin rje khrag ti yaM/ ya ma rA dza kha thun dus bsdus/ ya ma rA dza sum b+h+yo/ gshin rje nag po dun b+h+yo/ kring kring ma ra tsa ma ni/ snying shad shad

nr-i dza/ klad pa go ro tsa na gshogs// snying kha rag snying kha rag/ rag sha dug thun du ru shag/ rag sha ma tang ni dza b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ sdang ba'i dgra bo la/ ma mo las kyi thun phob/ khrag nad rim nad phob/ dmod pa

spu gri'i sngags su bshad/ oM many+dzu shrI ya ma dza sa to me ya/ ya ma snying to me ya/ ya ma khrag to me ya/ ya ma mu to me ya/ nag po ya ma ri dza/ nag po d+ha ri dza/ nag po rag sha dgra bo mA ra ya baM ril rbad ya/ traka raka

sha mi ti/ rag mo nri sha ku ru thums/ rbad rbad mA ra ya myos myos/ long long rbad rbad 'dar yed yed/ thums ling ling/ dgra bo mA ra dza rbad ya/ las kyi gshin rje'i dmod pa ste// yab yum gsang ba'i dril
sngags yin// gzhan yang las kyi brgya kha ru// 'chi bdag ar la gtad par bya// dbyar dgun gnyis kyi tha chung la// zhag grangs bcu gnyis gcig tu bsgrub// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// tha

ma thal chen spar khab gtang// thod ngan ro ras ga 'u la// drag po sbad smad 'khor lo bri// thod pa'i nang du a mu kam// thod pa bya rog rjes can du// gtor ma bshams la 'chi bdag mchod/ 'od dang sgra dang
rdo 'phen dang// dkar shal ma dang nyi zla dang// mkhar la mi gzugs 'phungs pa'o// de la 'jigs pa'i sems spangs te// 'chi bdag drag sngags bzlas shing brdeg/ kram ha ra/ byi sha ya ma/ ma rag tra ya/

b+h+yo ru lu ru lu he ya me/ san tsa ya kro ti/ ya ma ma ra ya snying kha raka tra/ sha sha me sen tsa/ ya ma ma mA ra ya snying kha rag/ raka tra ya su ma ti/ ya ma ma ka li/ hU~M tra la ra ya tsa dang/ kha rak+ta ya/ ma ma
ka la/ ko ta mA ra ya tsit+ta du ha ma dza dzA/ 'chi bdag rgyu ba'i dus su brdeg/ rdzogs dang gnan gtad rim par bya// zhes gsungs so// ya ma rA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ drag po spad smad ar la
gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// gsang ba'i mthus ka de ltar na// bskyod pa zor gyi thus ka gang// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges gsungs pa// bdud kyi lcam mo khrag mig

ma// srin mo 'jigs byed re ma ti// srog thig gsang ba'i thun sgrub brtsam// ri gsum rtse 'am chu gling du// dug las sprus pa'i maN+Dal bya// mthing nag gru gsum thod 'phreng mdzes// rgya gram thod pa gru chad

ldan// sgo bzhi dur khrod ldan par bya// dbus su bse mkhar dar 'phen can// bya na bzhi dang tsit+ta brgyan// ma mo dre zhon mdung thung 'dzin// dur khrod rgyan ldan ral pa can// spyi gtsug rgya gram nyi ma can// thod

'phreng zhing chen g.yang gzhi dang// re lde sbrul nag khro chung 'bar// phyogs bzhir gsod byed srin mo bzhi// seng ge stag chen glang dang 'brug/ kun kyang snying 'byin thod khrag 'dzin// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub
gnas su// mtshan ngan ban d+har dug khrag bsres// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe bstim// thod ngan ling kha bcas la brab// sngags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// thugs kha'i snying po sngags bcas
pas// gtso bo'i thugs khar bzlas pa 'am// bzlas pa'i sngags kyis srog phrogs la// 'phrin las bdag mor de mngag go/ gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsis mchod// srog snying bzlas shing dam rdzas btab// dkyil

'khor dbus su nag mo'i sku// khro gnyer 'jigs par bshad pa dang// me yi phung po 'thor ba dang// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil dang rlom// lci 'thob 'od sgra sgrub khang 'tsheg/ 'dod pa mthong nas gsad pa
brtsam// zhag gsum bdun nam bcu bzhi yis// gsad pa drag po'i las rnams brtsam// phur gdab zor 'phang mtshon gyis gtub// ling ga dur khrod mun gling gnan// dkyil 'khor 'thun rdzas dgram pa

yang// gsang ba thus ka'i las su bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po thun gyis sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya mAn ta ka ya mA rA dza ma ma a ka dza ti dza dza/ raka mo te kum dza dza kha la

ma hi b+h+yo b+h+yo/ snying kha raka srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM tad+ya thA/ rak+mo trag rak+sha/ ma hi srog la dza dza/ ma mo rak+mo ki li srog la dun dun dza// trag rak+sha ma hi srog la breng breng/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ trag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ re ma ti
dgra bo'i srog la hur thums thums mA ra ya rbad rbad/ spyi dang khyad par bsnyen pa ste// drag po gsad pa'i las rdzogs pa// srog tig yang tigs gsad pa yin// mgo 'phyangs ma dza dza/ dun

mugs bla rtsa la dza dza/ rtsa bo che la dun mugs/ nang khrol smad lnga la rtsa bo// thun baM thun ri ri li li rbad/ bla srog 'gugs shing gsod pa ste// 'bar ma nyungs thun sngags su 'dod// khram sngags

nag mo 'dis kyang gdab// oM ya mAn+ta ka k+ShaM/ Ar+ya a rtsa la khram ma dug tsa tsa tshal pa tshal pa rbad rbad/ ma dug k+ShaM/ che ge mo srog rtsa la mugs ti rbad/ tsa tsa ra tsa rbad/ ma mo khrag la dun ti rdubs// srin po rus

la choM choM tshol/ gshin rje'i khram la lhan lhan thob/ dgra bo khraM kha ri li li nri dza rbad/ phur pa ya mAn+ta ka'i sku// khrag mig ma dang bcas pa bsam// nyin mtshan dus drug dag tu 'am// dus ni 'brug sgras tshub mas
gdab// rtsa dang lus srog 'brel bar bshad// dpal gshin rje nag po ya ma rA dza sku khros ba'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi lcam mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje snying po yis// bskyod pa'i
zor kha de ltar na// gnan pa las kyi thus ka ru// klu bdud nag po ji ltar sgrub// 'jam dpal khro bos nges gsungs pa// gnan pa'i las kyi thus kha ni// 'chi bdag klu bdud nag po yis// nyin bzhi'i 'khor

lo rdzogs byas nas// gnyis ra gdug pa'i sa phyogs gnan// klu gnas grong ngam dur khrod du// sngags kyi tshad ma thod pa yi// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dur khrod ras la sme khrag byug/ tsha ba gsum

ldan dug chus byugs// pad+ma rak+tas 'khor lo bri// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// bcu gnyis bcu drug mu khyud gsum// dbus su sbrul gyi ra bar ldan// gshed bzhi'i gnas su thod pa sprul// btson khang

rus sbal lto ru ming// bcu gnyis rgya gram sbrul dang me// bcu drug mtshon cha rgya gram sbrul// na ga klu yi sngags kyis bskor// gshed bzhi'i gsang sngags tshan bzhi la// spu gri gsad gnan nyin mtshan
bsnol// skabs su thun sngags spyi rgyugs bzlas// rdzogs dang mdze can thod pa 'am// klu mkhar sbrul nag lto ba ru// dmigs pa 'khor lo dril te gzhug/ dar nag gtums la rgya yis gdab// gnyan ra gdug

pa'i sa phyogs ni// byang phyogs gdol ba'i gnas su gnan// klu sbrul nag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// lto yis gzir la rgya yis gcag/ klu bdud ya ma'i pho brang gdab// steng du ri rab 'khor lo bskyed// rdo rje rgya
gram 'gros kyis gnan// mchog phur bdun gyis sa la gdab// lam du zhugs nas rgya gram bcag/ zhag bdun bar du slar mi 'gro// sku la phyag rgyas bsdigs dang rbad// las rnams ma lus 'grub par

gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu sbrul nag po'i ngan sngags// gsang ba'i dug mda' 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// ya ma me ta k+She/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma me ta k+She ma/ dgra bo mur

tsa ya rbad/ ya ta me ma k+She/ dgra bo rak+ta tsa ra rbad/ ya k+She ma ye ta/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ ya ma me ta k+She/ nA ga khams thums myags/ dgra bo nri sbur rbad/ ya me ta k+She ma/ nA ga khams thums myags/

dgra bo'i srog la nri sbur rbad/ ya ta k+She nas me/ mA ga khams thums myags dgra bo'i srog nri sbur rbad/ ya k+She ma me te/ nA khams thums myags/ dgra bo'i srog la nri sbur rbad/ nyin mtshan sngags ni ma nor

bzlas// thun sngags drag pos skabs su brab// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas/ trag thur snying 'gul myags myags/ rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan srog la shan sbur sod swAhA/ drag sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// klu la nges
par gtad pa na// klu sbrul nag pos nges par 'dzin// dpal gshin rje nag po ya ma rA dza sku khros pa'i rgyud las/ klu bdud sbrul nag 'khor lo'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis

ni// rdo rje can la nges gsungs pa// nyon cig rdo rje snying po che// rang bzhin rnam dag spros med las// bstan pa'i snying po nges pa'i don// gsang ba'i bka' rgyud rol par bshad// ma nor las kyi thus kha
ru// thod pa nag po 'chi bdag gis// rang rgyud gshin rje bsgrub pa'i lung// 'khor lo gsum dang phyi nang gsum// gsang ba'i yang tig brnag pa'i so// las rnams kun la nges par 'phags// gsad pa'i
zor dang gnan pa yi// las kyi thus ka gsang ba 'di// rdo rje can gyis nges par long// rtsa ba yan lag gnyis yin te// sgrub dang spogs pa'i rim par 'dod// don dam skye med spros las 'das// ngang la

rdzogs pa khro bo'i sku// 'bar byed khro bo gtum bag can// rang rgyud gshin rje sgrub pa'i lugs// 'khor lo tun bsdebs bsgral ba'i las// gsang ba don gyi snying po 'di// bgrod thob phyag rgya rtogs ldan

nam// dngos grub thob dang bsnyen pa rdzogs// don dang ldan pas 'khor lo bskor// de ma yin par rang la sdog/ dus kyi zla ba tha chung bzhi'i// mar ngo dag la bya ba yin// yi ge 'bru shag grong khyer nyid// srid
pa gsum gyi lto na gnas// de phyir 'chi bdag rang rgyud kyis// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum du bshad// thod pa zhal gyi 'khor lo dang// gcod pa nam mkha'i 'khor lo dang// drag po thun gyi 'khor lo'o// thebs
ldog nges pa'i tshad ma dag/ nges par bshad pa 'di lta ste// thabs ldog 'byams dang 'gor ba'o// de las 'khor lo thebs pa'i rgyu// bgrod thob lha gsal bsnyen pa rdzogs// ka bzhi tshugs dang gdung bzhi
bris// gcud phur bzhi ldan gzer bzhi thebs// rnal 'byor dkrug pa'i las rnams rdzogs// de yis nges par gcod cing thebs// de bzhin ldog pa'i rgyu bzhi ni// yi ge lhag chad nor ba
dang// shad 'dres sna dbyar thig mtshams 'byar// re ga la rten dri mas gros// drag po'i 'khor lo ldog ba'i rgyu// de bzhin 'byams pa'i rgyu bstan pa// sngags la nan chung 'dzab ma
rdzogs// las mchog nyams dang gtad yar chungs// gnyen po ma bskaur ri rab kyi// bsgom thabs ma byas 'khor lo 'khyams// de bzhin 'khor lo 'gor ba dag/ yi ge so sor mi mnyam dang// mgo log yi
ge nor ba dag/ bsgrubs kyang mi 'grub las rnams 'gor// de phyir tshad mas gtan la dbab// drag chen 'khor lo bskor bya zhing// thun gyi kha gso rgyun du bya// yan lag spogs pa chen po ste// zhal dang
dmog pa'i 'khor lo yis// drag po spad kyi mtha' sdud bya// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud// lus dang yan lag spu gri'i rgyud// gsang
sngags nges pa'i rno dbal 'di// thugs las gsang ba'i lam du phyung// 'di las 'jigs rten dngos grub mchog/ gsang ba'i nges don 'di yin pas// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// nga ni de la thugs
brtse'o// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams dga' mgu yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// dpal gshin rje nag po sku khros pa'i rgyud las// gtad cing yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gshin rje zla

gsang nag po las kyithus ka'i rgyud la/ ya ma rA dza sku khros pa rdzogs so//// bal yul rgyal po b+ha su d+ha ra dang/ bod kyi ban chung sangs rgyas bdag 'dra yis// bal yul b+ha ra sa ru bsgyur ba'o// bod
'bangs yongs la mi brdal bar// rtsis byugs chu brag gnyis la gzhag/ ces gsungs so// sngags dang/ mtshon cha dang/ bka'i bdag po gsum gyis rgyas btab bo//// rgya
gar skad du/ shrI ya ma bi dA ra dz+wa la tan tra na maH/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje 'joms byed 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'joms byed 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ lha byin bdud kyi rgyal po btsun mo dang// bu dang/ bu mo dang/ 'khor

dang/ g.yog tu bcas pa grangs med pa 'khor de nyid du lhags te/ bdud kyi dpung chen po dang/ slu brid dang/ rdzu 'phrul mang po ston ste/ ma rungs pa ca co mang pos 'khor rnams la bar chad sna tshogs byas
so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams thams cad ci'ang ma yin pa snang bar byas te/ ye shes rol pa'i sku 'joms byed 'bar ba bzhengs te/ thugs kha nas 'jigs pa'i sprul pa sna

tshogs pa mang po byung/ zhal nas 'jigs pa'i gsung sgra phyung ste/ spyan 'bar ba sdang mig tu bdud kyi rgyal po la gzigs te/ gsang sngags drag po 'di dag gsungs so/ sha ri b+h+yo/ ma ri b+h+yo/ khrag

ma ma b+h+yo/ tsir snying b+h+yo/ snying b+h+yo/ ma k+Shi thod khrag dza/ khrag ti snying la ya/ nr-i tri chod/ na ga chod/ mu lo chod/ bdud tri chod/ sha lo chod/ ya ma chod/ ra dz+wa chod/ sha la kying kying b+h+yo b+h+yo/ gsang sngags rgyal po de

brjod ma thag tu bdud lha sbyin brlag cing 'khor mang po brgyal bar gyur to// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad kyang mer mer shig shig tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar zhing ldeg ste/ thams cad kyang

'dar zhing rab tu 'dar ba dang/ sngangs shing rab tu sngags pa dang/ brgyal bar gyur to// la la ni gan cing bub nas kha nas khrag dang lbu bar skyug go/ la la ni skad ngan pa sna tshogs 'don cing skyabs tshol

bar dong ngo// de dag thams cad kyang mer mer por song zhing sa ma ya'o// gleng gzhi byol sngags dang bcas pa'i skabs te dang po'o//// de nas snying po rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa/ kye 'joms byed rgyal po bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs pa yi dus nyid na// lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bdud dang bar du gcod pa la// dpa' bo thugs rje thabs mkhas pas// mi 'jig rdo
rje lta bu yis// phas kyi rgol ba 'joms pa yi// byol sngags thabs dang bcas pa yis// nyid kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i don// rol pa mchog gis bshad par mdzod// ces gsol pas/ bcom dan 'das rdo rje
khros pa'i rgyal po 'joms byed 'bar ba des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa chen po dgongs pa yi// bdud kyi dpung chen gzhom pa dang// dgra yi dpung chen bshig pa'i phyir// 'joms byed 'bar ba de
nyid bsgoms// stong nyid snying rje'i 'bras bu ni// mthing nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru las// gshin rje'i dbyug pa nag por gyur// de nas 'joms byed 'bar ba yi// nag po 'jigs byed chen por sku// gsang

sngags rgyal po de nyid 'bar// thugs khar chu skyes nyi ma'i steng// rdo rje sngon po yig 'bru 'bar// 'od kyi 'phreng bas gdug pa 'dul// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag go/ oM hri sh+tIHbi kr-i tA na na oM phaT/ rdo rje
'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// mi chod mi shigs rdo rje'i sku// ma rungs pa dag 'joms par mdzod// khro bo'i rgyal po gdug pa gdul// gzi brjid 'phags pa dus mtha'i me// spu gri rlung dang 'khor lo
'bar// de nyid 'joms byed 'bar ba yin// bsnyen pa bya ba'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// dpal gyi zor sgrub chen po
ste// gshin rje'i dong zer nag po 'di// rdo rje can la bka' stsal to// dur khrod dgon pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal mda' gang gru bzhi bya// pho brang zlum pos yongs su bcad// dbus su gshin
rje'i zhal yin te// re gas mtshams gcad dkar dang dmar// zur drug po'i dbang drag la// gong ras zhi ba mu khyud nag/ mtha' skor dbang gi re bya// dbus su 'jigs byed yab yum gnyis// mthing nag

dmar nag 'bar ba la// thod dbyug me yi 'khor lo dang// gri gug thod khrag 'dzin pa yin// dbang drag gru gsum drug po la// sa bon las ni skur gyur ba// stag dang seng ge dom dang dred// chu srin gling gi
mgo can la// sta ri khram baM lag char bsnams// las mkhan pho nya mi bzad pa// phyogs bzhir srog gi tsa ra ba// ban de bon po zhang blon dang// mon pa nag po bsam pa yin// zor kong sor gnyis gru gsum

pa// bdun nam bcu gsum nyi shu gcig/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// der ni zor gyi rdzas bsag pa// 'bru gsum gang bu brag nag tshe// 'bru nag gsum dang phur pa gtsang// mar me lha bshos nag po dang/

dud pa sbang ma mda' dang bral// tsan d+ha li 'phang rtsa mo dang// phas kyi rgol ba'i ling ga dang// drag po'i sngags rnams spel la dgod// gza' rgod dmag dpon dar ba la// yang na phur pa dag la gtad// zla
ba nag po'i mar ngo la// gung gnyis bcas dang 'phang ba ste// drag po'i las su yang dag bshad// bsgrub pa bya ba'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// phas kyi rgol ba gcod byed pa'i// gza' rgod drag po rgyu dus

su// dur khrod la sogs dben gnas su// brag 'grum phung shul ro bsregs sa// mthing nag e byas ro sol byug/ srog dang lcags kyu dmar po bri// ma nu mu su ka ba la// lha sbyin bdud kyi rten bris la// srog
khang dmar por gzhug par bya// steng du 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// srog bdag chen po'i phyag byar ldan// gtor ma dam thun rdzas dgod// 'joms byed 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// gshed bzhi'i las kyi
sngags kyis gsad// mtha' brtul ur mo me la bya// dur khrod gnas sam rgya gram lam// ri rab rgya gram 'bar bas gnan// zor kha bskul dang 'phang bar bya// dmag dpon bzhis nyams pa bsgral ba'i

skabs te bzhi pa'o//// mA ra ya yi las dag la// bsreg pa me yi sbyor ba ni// lho phyogs gru gsum me thab tu// gdug pa can gyi shing bcer la// bdag nyid lta yi nga rgyal gyis// nub dang lho ru kha bltas
la// skra bshig byad bzhin sol bas byug/ khros pa nyid kyis rdzas re dang// lha byin gzugs la bstam byas te// mi bsad mtshon gyis gtubs byas la// khrag dang dug gis bsnun par
bya// 'joms byed nag po'i zhal du dbul// mchod ba rnams kyang tshang bar dbul// thal ba bA yu yaM la bskur// sbyin sreg gis bsgral ba'i skabs te lnga pa'o//// ma rungs pa dang lha sbyin

rmongs// phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa dag/ gnan pa bya ba gtor stegs 'og/ gru gsum mtho gang brus byas la// gang la bya ba'i ling ga gzhag/ steng nas du nan ri rab bca'/ steng du dpal gyi gtor ma gzhag/ ri
rab chen por gnan par bsam// gtor stegs kyis gnan pa'i skabs te drug pa'o//// gzhan yang kham kong sor bzhi pa// zhabs su srog yig dmar po bri// lha sbyin bdud kyi ling kha gzhag/ zor gyi byol

sngags drag po bstim// khrag dang dug gis rdzas rnams dang// ltas ngan mda' yi zor bsnun te// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// gdung ba'i glu dang ru dung dang// spyugs pa'i gad mo dang sgrogs te// a mu ka
yi sngags brjod bya// drag sngags gzhan yang 'char bzhin dbab// steng nas mchod rten nag pos gnan// mchod rten klu yi grong khyer ram// dur khrod ro khung dag tu gnan// gang la byas pa gdon mi
za// gnan pas las la sbyar ba ste skabs bdun pa'o//// de nas 'jig rten chen po yis// byol sngags thabs dang bcas pa dang// 'khor lo'i nges pa bka' stsal pa// lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa
yis// gtsang ma'i gnas su maN+Dal bsham// gang la bya ba'i kha zas la// glud bya gtor ma gtang bar bya// gal te grol bar ma gyur na// zor kong byol zor gzhung bzhin bca'// rang gi kha zas dag la

yang// glud bya lus kyi dri ma bkru// rang gi khru tshad gang ldan la// dri ma can gyi gos bskon// pho dang mo yi shing byang la// lo grags du lon khram byas la// phrag pa g.yas g.yon dag la gzugs// ra rog grod
par chang blugs la// glud la bskur te thod nag bcang// lag tu ra rog sha bskur la// nad pa'i mdun du gzhag bya ste// gdan yang dkar nag brje bar bya// bsrung bya ras dkar stan la gzugs// glud de
rdzas dang bcas par ni// byol sngags drag pos bzhi mdor bskyal// nad dang gdon rnams med par 'gyur// nad pa gso ba'i skabs te brgyad pa'o//// bus pa chung ba gso bya ba// se ba'i phur bu bcu byas
la// dar nag thum por sngags 'bru blugs// pha ma'i mal la bskor te gzugs// nub nas nas smug bre gang la// mda' dar me long ldan la gzugs// shar du stan dkar bting byas la// pha ma'am bu tsha
btsas pa gzhag/ nub kyi lha yi mda'i blangs la// sngags bzlas pha mar bcas pa bskor// dar dkar gro ga de dag le// 'khor lo rtsibs drug mu khyud ldan// gur kum gyis ni bri bar bya// lte
bar sna tshogs rdo rje la// bsgrub pa'i ming dang rak+Shar sbyar// gsang sngags rgyal po bcu pa bri// rtsibs sogs byol sngags drag po bri// rten 'brel sngags dang mtshon cha bri// rab tu gnas pa byas
nas ni// dang po ma yi lus la gdags// btsas nas bu yi lus la gdags// sri can ling kha bris byas la// zor brdeg drag po'i me la bsreg/ thal ba yang ni lus la bcang// sri can kha bcing rgyal po
yin// sri'u gso ba'i skabs te dgu pa'o//// gzhan yang mdze 'phro gcod 'dod na// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas la// chu sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma shar// sngo sna'i gtor ma lho ru ste// dkar gtor
nub la dmar gtor byang// zor kong re re spel bar bya// lha grangs mnyam pa'i nam mkha' dang// mda' 'phang kun la shes par bya// lo grangs mnyam pa'i glud byas la// mtha' ma tshon skud lnga dang
ldan// glud dang zhabs su bskor byas la// gtor ma phyogs su gtang bar bya// gter gzhag zhi bas brid byas la// gdong zor nag pos tshar gcad cing// bsrung skud la sogs gdags par bya// sku gnyan
gdug pa'i 'khrun gcad pa'o// mdze 'phro gcad pa'i skabs te bcu pa'o//// dus kyi 'chi ba byung gyur na// dmar gtor bcu gsum par bar du// kong zor bcu gsum bsnol mar bsham// drag sngags

mkhas pas bzlog pa bya// gtor ma ngar glud bcu gsum ldan// de dag sbyor ba 'khor re la// gtor ma re re bskor bya zhing// kong bu re re skor zhing 'phang// las kyi rnam smin tshe zad bzlog/ phral gyi rkyen la
smos ci dgos// 'chi ba bslu ba'i skabs te bcu gcig pa'o//// rmi lam bdud kyis bslus gyur na// ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan pa yis// byol sngags sham bur ldan pa yi// nyal ba'i sngags la bsgyur bzlog
bya// rjes la bzlog pa'i rtags rnams 'byung// gal te rtags rnams ma bzlog na// gdong zor nag po'i sbyor ba bya// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa'i skabs te bcu gnyis pa'o//// gang gi byol po bzlog 'dod

pas// kong zor bcas la phyogs su bsgrigs// gza' dang rgyu skar la sogs pa// bzlog par bya ba'i ming byang ni// rta bong rnga mo'i khrag gis bri// bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga la// rtsa ba'i las sngags bri ba

dang// 'bab chu'i rdo la'ang de bzhin bri// kong zor 'og tu byol po gzhug/ dbal zor re re phyogs su 'phang// yugs sa'i skra yi 'ur rdo yis// rdo zor phyogs su 'phangs pa yi// pha tshan gyi byol po bzlog pa'i
skabs te bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rims nad bsrung ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi srad bu la// byol sngags mdud pa re re dang// sngags ky-i sham bu bsdeb par bya// bal gyi thum po bcu gsum yang// zor kong
re rer blug bar byad// pho rgyud mo rgyud dbang chen gsum// so so'i sngags ldan phur bu gdabs// gser dang gla rtsi so sor gtum// gu gul nyungs kar btsan dug bsregs// lus la btags
pas srung bar byed// zor gyis yams nad zlog par byed// rims dal bsrung ba'i sbyor ba'o// dal yams rim nad bsrung ba'i skabs te bcu bzhi pa'o//// bol song dud 'gro bsrung ba ni// ye shes lnga
ldan tshon skud bsdebs// mdud pa'i nang du sngags nyungs gtum// drag po mi yi las byas pa'i// thal ba la sogs phur du gdags// sngon du phyugs kyi gzugs glud gtang// glo dang gor dang yor la
sogs// nad rnams thub par yang dag bshad// dud 'gro'i nad rims bsrung ba'i skabs te bco lnga pa'o//// gzhan dang lo tog bsrung ba ni// zor kong nang du sngags bcug la// thal chen nyungs kar

gyis brab cing// phur pa la sogs bsrung rdzas rnams// phyogs mtshams dbus su sba ba dang// dbus su khyi yi thod pa ru// rdzas dang drag po'i sngags blug ste// lha srin rnams la rta bsdam la// gser skyems la
sogs gtang bar bya// de yis thub pa 'gyur ba yin// ser ba bsrung ba'i skabs te bcu drug pa'o//// gzhan gyi dmag dpung bzlog pa ni// mtshon cha'i rtse dang dmag dpon ming// zor kong nang du bcug
la bzlog/ zor kong nang du sngags dang rdzas// blug la dgra yi phyogs su 'phang// dmag dang jag pa chom rkun bzlog/ dmag dpung bzlog pa'i skabs te bcu bdun pa'o//// shi kha bye ba gcad pa na// pho

mo du yod lo grangs kyi// glud dang gtor ma gtang pa dang// mchod rten brtsig pa la sogs bya// tshon skud lnga'i 'ur rdo yis// zor rnams ro khung thog tu 'phang// gtor zor ro yi steng du 'phang// skra dang so

dang sen mo dang rkang dreg rnams la ling ga bya// byad dgrol dreg phyis la sogs bya// de stengs tsha tsha mchod rten brtsigs pas gnan// shi kha chod par the tshom med// shi kha gcod pa'i skabs te bcwa brgyad
pa'o//// shwa bud chen po bzlog pa ni// mdze can thod pa nag po ru// gdug byed zor gyi kong bu brub// gtsug tor nang du gzhag nas kyang// kha ni gyen du bstan par bya// gzhan yang ltas ngan la sogs
pa// gong gi rdzas dang ming bcas pa// zor gyi las kyis 'joms shing bzlog/ shwa bud bzlog pa'i skabs te bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po yis// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gsang

sngags 'di// 'bar ba'i klong nas bka' stsal to// oM badzra tsi dun rbad rbad/ snying khrag thun khrag rbad rbad/ thum shig khug ling rbad rbad/ snying khrag dun rmugs rbad rbad/ tse tse na rbad ya ya/ snying

la ya ya rbad rbad/ pra ti sa many+dzu rmugs/ pra ti sa many+dzu chod chod/ kha la raka sha rbud rbud/ dum bu rag sha rbud rbud/ tsit+ta rak+sha rbud rbud/ tsakra rak+sha rbud rbud/ tsi ta ha na ha na rbad rbad/ shi shi na tsa ne

rbad rbad/ tsi pa ta rbad/ srog gi dza pa ra bzhi yis gsad pa'o// thi pur ya ma shag te b+h+yo thi bur ya ma tsan+t+ra b+h+yo/ thi pur ya ma ra ti b+h+yo/ thi bur ya ma ra tri b+h+yo/ srog bdag bzhi yi bzlog pa'o// sa ma ya a ti kra ma

ni mA ra ya bzlog bzlog/ gdong bzlog go/ a pa ra hi che ge mo rak+Sha pu tra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ bdag gzhan bsrung ba'o// nA ga tsit+ta/ nA ga a pa ra nA ga shig bzlog byer/ mdze 'phro gcad pa'o// ra dza tsa tang a par sha

ya/ sri'u bsrung ba'o// a nri su hra shig/ phyogs bsrung ba'o// ba ni ru tra bzlog byer yam/ bi sha mA ra ya/ b+ha ri sha ur na mi ni b+h+yo/ shwa dang ser ba bsrung ba'o// mA ra ya a ba ra na che ge mo bzlog/ byol po

bzlog pa'o// man+t+ra mun tra sa man+ta ru tra rak+Sha man bzlog bzlog/ sngags pa nang 'gras pa bzlog pa'o// ma ra ni dzi ben tra ya/ 'chi bdag bzlog pa'o// du na nan/ sa du nan/ snying du na nan/ pri du rbad/ kha thun

rbad/ tsi ta ni sha ku lu rbad/ mo ha ni stam b+ha ya nan/ sas stib/ mes tshig/ chus skyur/ rlung yen/ kha ri bldag rna ri tsi ri stib/ stobs gnan pa'o/ zhes gsungs so// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bstan pa'i skabs te
nyi shu pa'o//// de nas 'jigs byed chen po yis// 'joms byed 'bar ba chen po ni// thugs dam gnad nas bskul bar bshad// hU~M/ 'jigs byed 'joms byed 'bar ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug
'bar ba'i gzugs// zhabs bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// 'od zer 'jigs tshul sna tshogs 'phro// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// khams gsum za byed zhal
gsum ni// dbus ma smug nag bgrad pa'i zhal// gti mug sha la kam kam za// g.yas pa mthing nag mche gtsigs zhal// zhe sdang rus pa chem chem za// g.yon pa dmar la lce 'bur zhal// 'dod chags khrag

la cib cib 'thung// rgyud drug sgrol mdzad phyag mtshan drug/ mtshon cha 'bar bas dgra srog gcod// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// skye 'chi rtsad gcod lha bzhi gnon// dam nyams bsgral ba'i gdan la
bzhugs// sku la dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'jigs byed nag po'i tshogs kyi dbus na 'gying// 'joms byed nag po'i tshogs ni sprin ltar gtibs// gsod byed nag
po'i tshogs ni pho nyar 'gyed// za byed nag po'i tshogs ni bran ltar 'khol// thugs dam dus la bab kyis gshegs su gsol// che mchog ya mAn+ta ka'i bka' byung gis// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar
pa 'di gsol la// thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// de nas bzlog pa'i pho nya gtang// hU~M/ nga ni 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// lus la me yi 'od 'phro zhing// g.yas pa

dbyug thos ma mo dbang du sdud// g.yon pa me yi 'khor lo yis// thun dang phur kha sngags zor bzlog/ nga ni sngags 'chang rgyal po ste// phur zor bzlog pa'i dbang phyug gtso// mda' zor khrag zor gtor zor
dang// dug zor bal mo'i rdo 'phen dang// gtso ru byol zor bzlog pa'i bdag/ gdon dang nad dang mi mthun phyogs// thams cad bzlog pa'i rgyal po yin// sngon lta bzlog pa gang nas byung// gdong zor nag

po gang nas byung// zor bzlog nag po su yis mdzad// rgyal ba shAkya byang chub la// nag po bdud kyi dpung chen dang// slu brid bdud mo'i rdzu 'phrul dang// lha sbyin bdud kyi chad pa byung// dpa' bo khros po'i cha

byad kyis// khrag gi zor kong brgyab pa'i tshe// gdug byed sngags kyi byol zor brgyab// bdud kyi dpung chen byung ba bzlog/ bdud mo'i slu brid cho 'phrul bzlog/ lha sbyin bdud kyi chad pa bzlog/ yang dag
sangs rgyas gdung ma chad// sngon lta'i bzlog pa de nas byung// da lta bzlog pa 'di ltar bzlog/ sngags 'chang rnal 'byor bdag cag la// ma mo 'bum gyi dal kha dang// bdud nag 'bum gyi khram kha

dang// btsan dmar 'bum gyi shad d+he'u dang// gshin rje 'bum gyi chad pa dang// lha chen gdug pa'i yul ngan dang// lha ma yin gyi rgyu thabs dang// sa bdag klu yi byad kha dang// 'phra men ma yi nye 'byed
bzlog/ ngan sbyor bsam pa ngan pa dang// sbyor ba rtsub pa thams cad zlog/ ces bzlog pa'i 'phrin las gtsor bya'o// srin po gdong zor gshin rje nag po'i lung// 'phrin las gnad nas bskul ba'i skabs te
nyi shu gcig pa'o//// srin po gdong zor gshin rje 'joms byed 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// snubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches bsgyur pa'o////

rgya gar skad du/ mon pa ta kA la kro d+ha tan tra/ bod skad du/ mon pa nag po khros pa'i rgyud/ nag po bam log gi rgyud ces kyang bya/ nag po ro zan gyi rgyud ces kyang bya'o// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bdud 'dul dpa' bo chen po 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i klong na/ rdo rje zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/
mi dang/ mi ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ ro langs dang/ gshin rje'i tshogs dang/ bdud mi srun pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang 'dus pa de rnams phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lag na rdo rje
mthu chen pos zhus pa/ nyid la mchod nas legs par zhus/ nyid kyi bstan pa 'jig pa la// de nas rab 'jigs chen pos stsal// nga yi bstan pa 'jig pa la// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya

ste// bsgral ba 'bar zhig thugs rje mchog/ myur du bsgrims te bsgral par bya'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// de ni nga yis bshad kyi nyon// gtam rgyud zhu gnang gi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpa' bo

chen po des bdud mi srun pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ting 'dzin la thugs rje der skyes cing// 'bras bu mngon par sprul te/ dur khrod kyi klong chen po nas/ shin tu khros pa'i zhal nas/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka

ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me do ru na yo da ya/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ ya k+She ra tsa ni mA ra ya phaT/ ces brjod pas/ gshin rje'i tshogs lhags par gyur to// de dag gi nang nas yA ma

rA dza zhes bya ba dang/ myos byed 'bar ba zhes bya ba dang/ ar+ya ma ru rtse zhes bya ba dang/ gshin rje ral pa tshar dgu zhes bya bas yang/ pra ya ni shi ku ru hU~M phaT/ rak+ta ra tsaya hU~M phaT/ rak+ta mu ra tsa ya hU~M phaT/ ma

ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces rang rang gi las la btsud bas bdud mi srun pa kun tshul bzhin du bka' nyan te/ bred sngangs bzhin 'jigs pas skyabs su song ngo// de nas gshed po'i sku gsung thugs las rdzu 'phrul cher
ston cing// las la ci rigs par bstod do// ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas zhus pas bka' stsal pa// 'gal byed cham la dbab 'dod na/ ya mAn ta kar bsgoms byas la// srog gi lha

bzhi bsgrub par byed// de yi gsang ba bshad par bya// tshangs dbang drag po zhes bya ste// ban d+he nag po zhes bya ba// mgon po legs ldan nag po'i bu// mahA ka la dngos yin no// bon po nag po zhes bya

ba// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i bu// ma hA de pa dngos yin no// zhang blon nag po zhes bya ba// rgyal rigs ku bi ra yi bu// he le srog len dngos yin no// srid pa'i mon ba zhes bya ba// srin po gdong zor
nag po'i bu// khyab 'jug du ba dngos yin no// gsang ba'i lha ngo bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ya mAn+ta ka'i sku sngags dang// ya ma rA dza'i sngags bzhi

yis// mgo gnon lha yi bsnyen pa bya// gzhan yang drag po'i sngags bstan pa// oM badzra tsi dun rbad rbad swAhA/ snying khrag dun khug rbad rbad swAhA/ thum shi khug ling rbad rbad swAhA/ snying khrag dun rmugs rbad rbad

swAhA/ sgrub pa'i sngags so// ka sha ka sha khrag thol shag/ ma thal shig snying chod ya ya/ lha dang dbral zhing rtsa ba gcad pa'i sngags so// bra bra zhung zhung ril ril rbad rbad ya ya/ byad du gzhug pa

dang brab pa'i sngags so// tse tse na na rbad rbad snying ya ya rbad rbad pra ti sa man dza/ rmugs rmugs// pra ti sa man chod chod/ rbad cing drag tu bsgral ba'i sngags so/ kha la rak+sha rbud rbud d+ha/ dum bu

raka sha rbud rbud d+ha/ tsit+ta rak+sha rbud rbud d+ha/ tsakra rak+sha rbud rbud d+ha/ gsad pa'i 'khor lo gzhug ba'i sngags so// tsit+ta rbad rbad dzi pa ta rbad rbad ha na ha na rbad rbad/ shi na shi na tse na tse na rbad rbad/ ha hU~M mA ra ya

hU~M phaT/ myur du gsad pa'i sngags so// dug dang 'dra'o// ya khraM la khraM la thod pa gur tsar lings swAhA/ khraM shing dkrug cing khram la gdab pa'i sngags so// drag po sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas

gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor phur rtsang khram shing dang// thod nag 'khor lo rwa khrag dang// de yi srog pa tsit+ta bcas// shi skra gzungs thag pags chen phur// sgrub pa'i rdzas gyi rim pa'o// sha khrag ra

rog bya nag khri nag dang// mon bu nag po'i tsit+ta bzhi// dam rdzas btab pa'i rim pa'o// sha khrag mdos dang gtor ma phud// sman chen la sogs ci 'byor ba// bskang ba'i rdzas kyi rim pa'o// dmar nag skud

pas bcings pa ni// byad kyi dbang du bsdus pa yin// dri ldan chen po'i gdug pa ni// lha dang dbye ba'i rdzas yin no// nyungs kar rgyal po'i mda' 'phang ba// drag sngags las sbyor kun la'o// gnan pa ra
rog thod pa'i nang// sreg pa lugs kyi gong bu'i nang// 'phang ba ra dom nag po'i nang// las gzhug snod kyi rim pas so// bsags pa rdzas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad par

bya// las sbyor drag po'i dus nyid du// gsad khang nag po gru gsum rim sum du// ro lam nag po'i dbye ba bya// ling kha khyid gang shes par bya// chos pa chos byed rtsal can la// 'byung ba bshig la mar me
gsad// khram shing thogs te drag tu bskor// dpa' bo chen po dran byas la// shan pa ro zan las la bskul// lcags sbar nag po gdengs byas la// dam nyams tsit+ta bcu bzhi dbyung// don tshogs brabs la
bdud la sbyin// rgyun mi 'chad bar gtor ma gtang// gcer bur phyung la sbyang dus bya// las sbyar brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rab 'jigs chen po'i ting 'dzin

gyis// lha bzhi drag tu bod byas la// sha khrag phud gtor dam rdzas sbyin// g.yab dar nag po lce bzhis g.yab// ya man+ta ka'i bsnyen pa yis// dang por rang lus chegs su gzhug/ oM mahA ka la ya ban de nag

po srog thun bi shaswAhA/ oM ma hA ka la ya bon bo nag bo srog thun bi sha swAhA/ oM mahA kA la ya zhang blon nag po srog thun bi sha swAhA/ oM mahA kA la ya mon pa nag po srog thun pi sha swAhA/ de nas lha
bzhi sgrub pa yis// zhi snying gcig tu dril ba'i sngags// rtags la thug par bzlas pa bya// de yang sgrub pa gnyis yin te// rtan gyi 'khor lo legs par bca'// rtsa sngags 'bor len byas te
sgrub// dgug pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// zhal bgrad mche gtsigs skra bshig la// ma nyes dpang gzugs bden pa bdar// mig nas khrag mig bzlog par bya// sna nas dug dur 'brug sgra drag/ kha nas dug

skyug cho nges gdab// rtse tse dug sngags 'bum du bzlas// de nas drag po'i las bzhi sbyar// mtha' sdud gsum gyis mtha' nas gcad// des ni las rnams gdon mi za// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// zla
ba gsum na lus sems 'bral// bsnyen sgrub las sbyor mtha' sdud kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srog gi gshed bzhi sgrub dus su// dang po zang zing mang po 'byung// de nas
dngos su 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te dngos su ma byung na'ang// rang gi rmi lam dus dag tu// ban bon rje dpon mon po'i tshogs// drag sngags zlog dang dar nag thags// dbyug pas 'debs dang sgra skad
'byin// gzhan yang skyes pa mang po dang// bya nag gcan gzan la sogs pa// sna tshogs pa yi cho 'phrul 'byung// de la 'jigs par ma byed cig/ rtags rnams log gam 'khrugs 'gyur ram// bya skad byung na

mdos kyis bskang// de ni zur 'bru nag po las/ zur gsum nag po khru gang la// stod dang smad du rak+ta dang// rdo sol thal chen dag gis byug/ zur la nyungs kar tshar pa gzugs// phyogs bzhi'i srog rdzas

lo de bzhi// lag tu dar nag khram shing bskur// sbab zer skra la thod nag bcings// tshe dang nyung mos rab brgyan cing// nad rkyal tshon sna phrag la bkal// 'thun pa'i dam rdzas ma lus bsag/ bos te dam

rdzas bstab byas la// bsngags te mi mthun phyogs su bskyal// bsrung dang bzlog pa'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM mahA kA la ya raka sha mahA kA la ru baM/ mahA kA la naMnaM/ ti shas a b+he b+he/ kA la rU pa ku la rU pa/

hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ srung na hU~M la bzlog na phaT// b+h+yo zhes bya ba rbad la gtang// de yis phas kyi rbod gtong bzlog/ rang gi nyams chag skongs par 'gyur// grub rtags dang bskang mdos bsrung

sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ra ba bzhi yi yar ngo la// ya mAn+ta ka'i bsnyen pa'i dus// 'bring po bzhi dang gong 'og la// drag po lha bzhi bsgrub pa'i dus// tha

chungs bzhi yi mar ngo la// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya'o// mar ngo'i nyi shu gnyis la ni// ma mo rgyu ba'i dus yin te// drag sngags dril gtor drag tu bya// ra ba'i nya la srin po'i dus// drag po sreg las bya ba
'o// 'bring po'i nya la ma mo'i dus// zor thun 'phang ba'i las bya'o// tha chung nyi shu lnga po la// sa bdag chen mo'i las kyi dus// 'jug sdud gnan pa'i las bya'o// drag po'i dus bstan pa'i le'u

ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'bru gcig sngags kyi thems bstan pa// oM nas swAhA yan chad du// yig 'bru brgyad po tshang ba ni// sgrug pa srog gi snying po yin// dril gtor gnyis su
shes par bya// las sbyor dus su de nyid gzhug/ de la 'bru gcig ces bya'o// ka sha'i yi ge bcu bzhi dang// brang zhung yi ge bcu par bsdebs// skabs su khram gyis dkrug cing brdeg/ skabs su nyungs kar

mda' 'phang dang// phur gtsang 'dril zhing brdeg pa'o// kA shA bcu gnyi dril ba ni// drag sngags las sbyor kun la 'gro// brang zhung yi ge drug pa ni// skabs su ling kha sogs pa bcing// prang zhung bcu pa dril

ba ni// drag sngags las sbyor kun la 'gro// tse tse rbad pa bcu gsum gyi// chod chod gnyis kyi man ngag ni// rbad pa kho na'i dus su'o// drag sngags kun gyi dril dus su// chod chod bsdebs pas bcu bzhir
'gro// bod rbad gsad gsum dril ba 'am// yang na rbad gsad bsdebs pa 'am// cho bor chod ces drag tu brjod// de yang 'bru gcig ces su bshad// rag sha sna bzhi bsad pa'i sngags// bdun tshan bzhi la

nyi shu brgyad// dril la de ltar kho nar bzlas// gtor na gsang sngags tshan bzhi po// phral te so so'i btags la gsad// gsang ba'i sngags kyi sham bu ni// tsit+ta nyi shu brgyad ba'i sngags// yas sbyor dus su
btags pa de// dri lam gtor ma gang byed kyang// kun gyi gzhug la btags la gtad// de nas myur du grub par 'gyur// drag sngags thems kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya

ba// 'jug sdud las kyi sngags bstan pa// tsi dun la sogs sgrub pa dang// kA Sha'i sngags dang brang zhung dang//// tse tse rbad pa'i sngags dang ni// raka sha rnam bzhis gsang sngags dang// gsang ba sngags
kyi sham bur bcas// rim bzhin dril la nyin mo brdeg/ de ltar las gzhug gang byed kyang// bod pa la sogs drag sngags rnams// tshul bzhin gtor ma mtshan mo brdeg/ de ltar las gzhug gang byed
cing// shar nub bdun gsum nyi shu gcig/ brtul zhugs drag po bskyed gyur na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur kyang// bcu phrag gsum na mngon sum ni// rten dang brten pa 'brel bar 'gyur// rak+ta
tsit+ta thibs nan/ ru ta srog la dz+wa la raM/ da ha shad trUM rbad b+h+yo/ las gzhug bsdus te dge bar bya'o// gsang pa 'jug sdud kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bzhan yang bshad bya ba// las
sbyor drag po'i dus nyid du// gsang khang nag po sum rim du// re ga nag pos dbye bar bya// ling kha khyi khrid shes par bya// chos pa chos byed rtsal can la// 'byung ba bshig la mar me bsad// khraM

shing thog te drag tu bskor// dpa' bo chen po dran byas la// shan pa ro zan las la bskur// lcags sbar nag po gdengs byas la// dam nyams tsit+ta bcu bzhi dbyung// don tshogs brabs la bdud la sbyin// rgyun
mi 'chad par gtor ma gtang// gcer bur phyung la spyang dus bya// las sbyor brtul zhugs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las rnams thams cad rdzogs gyur nas// rten

gyi sa bon yi ge nr-i/ nri de ar gyur hU~M gis blangs// phaT kyi sbyor ba'i lhums su blangs// rigs kyi snying po 'bru gcig gis// rgyal sras dam par bskyed pa gzhag/ des ni dge ba khyad par 'phags// gzhan

yang 'dus byas dge rtsa ni// kun gyi don du 'bad par bya'o// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// sngags 'chang rgyal dang sngags g.yog spru// las kyi lha la gtang rag

gtang// de yang dge rtsa khyad par 'phags// sngags 'chang dri mas mi sdig ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes par 'gyur// gnas spar ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad

bya ba// rab 'jigs chen pos bka' stsal pa// shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la// nga yis bstan pa'i mtshon cha 'di// dad ldan sgrub pa brtson 'grus can// dam tshig cha phra gtso bor 'dzin// skal ldan de dang
phrad gyur nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar shog/ snying rje med pa'i gdung sems can// sgyu zol kha gsag nyams len chung// ma gus log sta dam tshig med// mu stegs rlung gi 'khor lo can// de las

'di 'dra sba bar bya// rmongs pas gal te byin gyur na// tsha grang ltogs dang gti mug tu// myur du 'gro ste yun du sdug/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// lnga brgya dus kyitha ma
la// bstan pa srung phyir rgyas par gyis// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams shin tu zhum par gyur te/ skad ngan pa bton cing kun brgyal bar gyur to// da nas brgyal ba sangs pa
dang// mchod pa chen po phul zhing/ mngon par dga' nas/ rjes su yi rangs te/ rab 'jigs chen pos gsung pa la mngon par bstod do// de nas dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang mi snang bar gyur to// snod med la sba ba dang/ rgyud gtad pa dang// rjes yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// mon pa nag po
khros pa tsit+ta bam log gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// paN+Di ta A tsar+ya dmar po dang/ lots+tsha ba mgos kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgyal bu sprin gyi shugs can gyis bod yul du bsnams nas byon

pa'o//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta gu h+ya dz+nyA na many+dzu shrI ya ma kr-iSh+Na tan+d+ra gar+b+ha/ tsakra ma Ni rat+na ka du a ta ri sha u Ni g+ha du nA ma/ tan+t+ra ma hA rA dza/ bod skad du/ de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i ye shes/ 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa zhes
bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo 'jigs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma dam pa'i dpal dang/ steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i seng
ge dang/ gzhan yang sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ byang chub pa rnams dang/ gzhan yang 'jam dpal nag po'i tshogs la/
gshin rje gshed dang/ thugs mchog 'bar ba dang/ ya ma rA dza dang/ myos byed 'bar ba dang/ ar+ya dmar po dang/ ral pa tshar dgu dang/ rdo rje bdud 'joms dang/ dmar po dang/ dmigs pa dang/ mig
dmar dang/ a ba glang mgo dang/ lcogs pa mgo dgu dang/ ya ba ti dang/ rtel pa dang/ phya sangs dang/ stag mgo nag po dang/ ro langs ma dang/ e ka dza ti dang/ lha mo nag mo dang/ bdud mo nag mo dang/

sbal mgo khrag mig ma dang/ srin mo mgo 'phyangs dang/ ya sha nag mo dang/ rdo rje ral gcig dang/ drang srong dkar skya dang/ rak+ta dri snoms dang/ spyang mo mgo dgu dang/ khrag gi ral pa can dang/ nag mo

spus 'gro dang/ sngo skya mche ba dang/ rlung lnga spyan gsum ma dang/ rak+sha kha rag ma dang/ gnod sbyin ral pa can la sogs te yum gyi tshogs dang/ de dag rang rang gi 'khor na zhe sdang gi rgyal po dang/ nga rgyal gyi

rgyal po dang/ 'dod chags kyi rgyal po dang/ phrag dog gi rgyal po dang/ gti mug gi rgyal po dang/ bdud kyi tshogs dang/ dri za'i tshogs dang/ drang srong gi tshogs dang/ gshin rje'i tshogs dang/ srin po'i

tshogs dang/ klu dbang gi tshogs dang/ ya bdud kyi tshogs dang/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang/ 'byung po'i tshogs dang/ sa bdag gi tshogs dang/ gzhan yang las kyi gshin rje'i tshogs la/ tshe bdag nag po dang/
stag mda' dmar po dang/ gab pa thun 'bebs dang/ chos kyi rgyal po dang/ bye ba sa ta dang/ bye ba gung rings dang/ nag po lto 'phyangs dang/ 'chi bdag nag po dang/ bdud 'bebs rten can dang/ 'dod
pa'i rgyal po dang/ kha g.yal mche gtsigs dang/ me dbal srog gcod dang/ de dag la sogs te re re'i 'khor na las kyi gshin rje khri khri gnas pa'i tshogs rnams dang/ gzhan yang 'chi bdag

bdud kyi tshogs la/ bdud kyi rgyal po ri nag spungs pa dang// bdud po mi zan bcu dang/ bdud kyi blon po bdun dang/ bdun kyi gyad pa sde bzhi dang/ bdud kyi bskos pa sde bzhi dang/ bdud kyi skya dmag sde

bcu gsum dang/ bdud kyi zungs pa bzhi dang/ bdud kyi pho nya bzhi dang/ bdud kyi bla rkun bzhi dang/ bdud kyi shan pa sde bzhi dang/ de la sogs te bdud rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang/ gzhan yang mon pa

bdun la sogs te mon gyi tshogs rnams dang/ gzhan yang thig le chos kyi sku las mngon par shar ba/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo la sogs kyi yum lnga dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las shar ba srid pa bde 'gro la
sogs te ye shes kyi ma mo bcu bzhi dang/ ye shes rol ba la sogs pa las sprul pa e ka dzA ti la sogs pa srid pa'i sman mo rnams dang/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ma mo nag mo'i tshogs
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mo la sogs pa bdud mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang/

gnod sbyin 'phrog ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang/ mon mo kha g.yal la sogs te mon mo'i tshogs dang/ srin mo khrag 'thung la sogs te srin mo'i tshogs dang/ lha mo dga' byed la sogs te lha mo'i
tshogs dang/ klu mo yak+Sha la sogs te klu mo'i tshogs dang/ de dag la sogs te dregs shing rngam pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po/ btsun mo gsang ba'i yum chen mo dang gnyis su med par gyur te/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i ngang las sangs

rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyang bde ba chen pa'iro myong ba la ma g.yos pa kho nar gnas so// de ltar de'i ngang las 'di skad ces bya ba'i sgra rang byung bar gyur to// gnas dang ston pa 'khor bstan dus/
'di zhes mtshon pa rnam bzhi'i dbyibs/ skad ces gsal byed ston pa'i gtso/ bshad ni las can 'khor sdud yid/ pa sgra don dam rgyud mchog nges/ dus bzhi mnyam nyid 'dir rdzogs pa'o// zhes grags par

gyur to/ don gyi snying po 'phrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'khrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nyid las ma g.yos pa'i 'khor sprul pa'i sku yi
rang byung gi ye shes rol pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas/ thal mo sbyar te mi g.yo ba las bslang ba'i phyir gsol ba/ e ma ho/ ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa la/ kun gzhi rnam dag ngang
las ma g.yos kyang/ rdzogs pa'i tshul du longs spyod skur bzhengs pas/ mnyam nyid ngang las 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig ces bskul bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi ngang las

khro chen 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs te gsang ba'i rtsa rnams g.yos te/ drag po gtum rngam seng ge zil gnon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i gar bsgyur te/ gsung rngam

ba'i nga ro 'di bsgrags so/ hU~M hU~M hU~M dz+nyA na dz+wa la/ e ha la ha la/ a kro te ka phaT phaT/ dza hU~M baM ho hring hring/ zhes 'brug gi sgra dus gcig ldir ba tsam bsgrags pas/ 'og min gyi gnas dang de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyang bskyod la khad/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ shig shig rab tu shig shig dbus mtho na mtha'
dma' bar gyur/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/ ldeg cing 'jigs la khad par gyur to// 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad kyang brgyal te lus sa la rdebs par gyur to/ de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal po

sprul pa'i sku yis/ 'khor rnams pa rgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lhun grub rdo rje la gsol ba btab bo/ kye ho lnga nyid lhun grub rdo rje 'chang/ bde chen thig le spros bral dag pa las/ ye shes
rol pa'i rdzogs skur bzhengs nas kyang/ cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam 'das dpag tu med/ 'jig rten khams rnams 'ur 'ur chem chem g.yos/ 'khor rnams
khams nas lus kyang sa la rdebs/ dbugs dang ma bral dran pa'i dbang po nyams// de phyir 'khor rnams srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs lhun gyis
rdzogs pa'i rdo rje des/ 'khor rnams brgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs so// skad cig ma de nyid las 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs so// de nyid du

rang rang gi de kho na nyid mthong ste/ ye shes rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i sku phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs te/ 'khor 'dus pa'i tshogs phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i dregs pa
can de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la mgrin gcig tu gsol ba/ kye hau rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs/ thig le ye shes rol pa las// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs shing
rngam// khros pas 'khor rnams dran pa nyams// rdzu 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar cha// bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa yi// rang dam srog gi snying po rnams// bstan pa srung phyir las dang bcas// rdo rje
khros pa'i spyan sngar 'bul// dpa' bo chen po khros nyid kyis// rnam shes srog snying 'di bzhes la// dbang bskur byin rlabs stobs ldan mdzod// bdag cag dregs pa'i 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'jig
rten khams 'di ru// mun par 'thibs dang bsregs pa dang// lo thog 'joms dang gnam lcags 'bebs// smyo 'bog yams nad srog gcod dang// mdze shu sna tshogs 'dus pa'i nad// bdag cag rnams kyi
rang las lags// dpa' bo chen po ci la skyon/ cho 'phrul chen po ci la ston// bdag cag gdug byed dregs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sprul pa bgyid// ces gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das sku
gsung thugs mi bzad pa'i rdo rje de dges pa chen por gyur te/ zhi ba dang/ khro bo dang/ gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ bdud pho mo dang/ rgyal po dang/ gza' rgod dang/ srin po pho mo dang/ mon

pho mo dang/ ging pho mo dang/ dmu dang/ btsan dang/ srog bdag dang/ lha gdon dang/ sa bdag pho mo dang/ klu dang/ gnyan dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ de dag la sogs te lha ma srin bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i srog gi snying po rang

dam gcig tu dril nas bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ la las ni bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi ru phye ste phul lo// la las ni yan lag rnam pa gsum du phye nas phul lo// la la ni rgyun gyi drag sngags su

phul lo// la las ni dmod pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni bsgrub pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni chig chod kyi drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni tshad can gyi ngan sngags su phul lo// la las
ni tshad med kyi ngan sngags su phul lo// la las ni gdab pa'i ngan sngags su phul lo/ de nas gcom ldan 'das kyis srog dang las thams cad gcig tu dril te/ dbang du bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs so// nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang dam bca' ba 'di gsungs so// he he/ 'khor tshogs zhi khro sprul pa kun// nga nyid rdo rje kun bzang ni// chos sku skye 'gag med pa las// longs spyod chen po'i skur

bstan te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ nga nyid lhun rdzogs khro bdag che/ sku lnga yang dag rdzogs pa yang/ lnga nyid lhun grub ye shes ni// brtan g.yo kun la brdal cing khyab// thams cad nyid gsal chos

sku'o// sems nyid ye shes rang gsal ba// ma sangs zab med bsod nams kyang// rang snang longs spyod chen po'i sku// thams cad nyid la lhun grub sta// ma btsal nyid la nyid rdzogs pa// mngon par byang chub
sku ru bshad// snang stong gnyis su mi phyed phyir// gdul bya 'joms pas rdo rje'i sku// gdul bya rnams kyi ngo bo la// zhing khams bsam yas thams cad du// cir yang snang phyir sprul sku'o// de dag

nga nyid rdo rje 'chang// gsung lnga lhun gyis grub pa yang// spros pa thams cad brjod med phyir// brjod bya'i ngo bo gzhan na med// sgra tshig thams cad las 'das te// brjod bral bsam brjod kun gyi gzhi// sgra

rnams ma spang rang snang phyir// don nyid brjod bya kun snang bas// de mtshon byed pa'i yan lag ni// snang la sogs pa'i don ston pa'o// dngos nyid sgra rnams sems nyid phyir// 'dzin med snang brjod mi gos
yangs// sgra kun sems nyid bdag gsung gsal// grags stong gnyis med mi phyed pa'o// sgra gcig lan gcig spros phyir// ston pas de bzhin nyid du gsungs// sgra yi bye brag kun rdzogs pas// gdul bya'i ngo
la so sor thos// ma brjod ye shes rig pa yis// thams cad gsal bar brda sprod phyir// rig pa spros med brjod bral de// thams cad khyab pas dgra rnams kun// bdag tu lhun grub cir yang rol// gdul

bya'i yid bzhin dus gcig gsal// de dag rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// ye shes lhun grub thugs nyid kyang// mtshan ma kun bral ngang gi stong// sgrib med nyid du lhun rdzogs gsal// dbyings nyid brda khyab
gnyis dang bral// chos rnams ma 'dres kun tu ston// yon tan lhun rdzogs rol bsam yas// de nyid rdo rje nga yi thugs// 'khor 'das dregs pa rngam chen kun// srog dang nus pa dbang bsdus te// dregs pa'i
tshul du las ngo long// dbang po bkrag mdangs nga dbang bsgyur// zhes gsungs pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang srog gi snying po thams cad nus pa dpag tu med pa'i mthur byin gyis brlabs te bsdus

so// las thams cad sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi mthu dang bcas par byin brlabs te bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ yi ge gsum gyi brda ru dril nas srid pa'i khyabs khang du dbang du bsdus so// de nas
'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis ngag mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje 'chang chen dpal/ bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan snga ru// rang dam srog gi snying po
phul// bdag cag rang las bsgrub bar bgyid// bstan pa srung zhing chos 'khor bskyang// log par lta ba'i dgra dang bgegs// skad cig yud la bsgral bar bgyi// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga ru// dam bcas

bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// tshal pa brgyar gas sreg bar shog/ ces bro bor nas dam bcas so// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri
drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi nang nas gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rngam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ kye
ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang/ rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang// las las grub ba'i gnas mchog dang// gsang ba drod kyi 'khor lo gsum// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/

bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba gsum gyi don rgyas par bshad do// 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ phyi nang snod bcud dag pa
ru// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ de yi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab/ dur khrod chen po gtum pa yi/ gdug pa can dang ldan pa ru/ las las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung// yum gyi b+ha ga yangs

pa ru// gsang ba drod kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di lta ste// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// thod pa keng rus bcag par bcas// sgo bzhi gru chad par

khyams 'gram// rta babs bzhi dang tA ra Na// lhun po bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas// nor bu rin chen keng rus kyis// ka ba brgyad dang de bzhin gdung// tshangs pa'i dral phyam zhing rus bcas// thod pa rgyu ma zhing

chung gis// bla 'og thams cad spras pa'o// stag gzig seng ge ma he glang// chu srin gnam lcags sgo la mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo dur khrod brgyan// yid 'ong mchod pas gang bar spras// rin chen pha gu thod pa

zhing// dra ba dra phyed dril bu dang// zhing chung rgyan gyis mdzes pa'o// rdo rje me 'od shin tu 'bar// dbus ni gru gsum mthing nag la//gsang mdzad rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang lcags// rdo rje ra ba le tse dgu// thod
rlon 'phreng ba rtsibs bcu lcags// gos ras khrag mtsho thod skam bskor// phyi rim 'khor lo dgu gnyis g.yu// gos ras gser bcas rdo rjes gsor// gru chad khrag mtsho dmar nag bzhi// bar khyams bzhi dang
sgo bzhi phyogs// phyi yi bar khyams sgo bzhi ldan// dbus su gshin rje bdud mo bsnol// ma he nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gshed bdag gtso bo me klong dbus// g.yas g.yon sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i dbus// gru
gsum gdan la dregs pa'i tshul// mdun na srin po'i gdan stengs su// thugs mchog yab yum rngam zhing bzhad// rtsibs bzhi rang rang gdan stengs su// gshed po bzhi rnams yum dang bcas// rtsibs bcur
phyogs skyong yab yum la// rtsibs mchan bdud po yab yum gnas// phyi rim sgrol ging bco brgyad la// rtsibs mchan ging mo de bzhin te// gru chad ro langs lce sbyang gnas// nang gi bar khyams thar byed
brgyad// yum dang bcas te gnas pa'o// sgo bzhir sgo ma sgrol byed bzhi// phyi yi bar khyams mon pho mo// las kyi gshin rje bdun gnyis gnas// sgo bzhir bse yi lha mo bzhi// rang rang gdan la
rdzogs par gnas// phyi khyams khor yug sde brgyad gnas// 'bum phrag g.yog dang yang g.yog bcas drug khri drug stong 'khod pa'o// rang sngags srog gis 'brel ba yis// dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa

ni// 'khor du sngags ba kun 'dus pa'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// dur khrod las grub dkyil 'khor ni// lho yi phyogs na gshin rje'i gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gtum drag tshal// zhes bya rgya
khyon dpag tu med// rmang logs gser dang g.yu ru snang// rtse mo gnam lcags ur mo la// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bad gtams pa// 'khor lo gnam lcags mtshon cha yis// 'od zer bzhir 'phro rab tu

'khrug/ mchog chen mchog phran dra bas gtams// bam chen chu srin 'khor lo yi// ka ba ka zhu ka gdan bcas// gnam lcags thog gi tsha tsha 'phro// thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'bur chung zhing// zhing chen bla re 'phan

dang gdugs// chu srin rgyal mtshan dpa' ngar bkram// tsit+ta mang po sprin ltar btibs// rtse nas rtsa bar zhag 'dzag khol// bskal ba'i me ri sna tshogs 'bar// ke rus sha khrag dur khrod 'dam// gnam lcags

khang ba zangs me ru 'bar// 'khor lo'i gzhal yas ro myags 'dam// dur khrod gnas chen khri stong yod// nyi zla 'phra men mthongs yod pa// gza' dang skar mas yongs su brgyan// mtshon gyi brlabs dang rlung

nag drib so dang// keng rus ri rab mtha' ma lcags ris bskor// de lta bu yi gnas de na/ ro yi tshogs rnams gnas pa ni/ rlon dang skams dang rul pa dang// gsar dang rnying dang phyed dal dang// bam dang
dpungs dang mnam pa dang// rangs pa dang ni stod smad dang// rengs dang rnam par rengs pa dang// 'khums dang bub dang 'gyel ba dang// langs pa dang ni 'greng ba dang// lhu rdum mgo dang phyed ma

dang// keng rus brul dang tshal bu dang// khrag dang rnag dang chu ser dang// zhag dang lha rkang nang rol dang// rgyu ma dri zhen pags pa la// ro la 'brad dang gshog pa dang// 'thung shing 'tshong dang longs spyod

byed// de lta bu yi dur khrod na// 'jig rten yi dwags srog la za ba dang// stag gzig dom dred bya rog kang ka dang/ byan lag spyang ki khwa 'ug lin du kha// srin 'bu la sogs de dag thams cad kyang// sha za
khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha' ba dang// ldag nyog byed dang lta dang rgod pa dang// ngu dang cho nges 'debs dang khu cos 'don/ 'phyong dang rgol dang srog la 'jab pa dang// mig bsgrims lag rjes brgyug pa
dang// rngam dang srog len bla rku bdud kyang bcod// mo la sems 'phyor 'jug cing mngal kyang skems// drag po'i rkan rdebs ltas ngan sgra sgrogs dang// gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs

ston dang// 'khor lo'i bro brdung lcags kyi mda' 'phen dang// spyugs pa'i glu len mgo yi dung 'bud dang// dar gyi g.yab 'dor rang la rang 'khro dang// sha za khrag 'thung snying 'byin srog gcod dang// lag

pa gar bsgyur rdo rje'i thog 'phen dang// gti mug ma sa'i dur khrod ri ltar spungs pa dang// 'dod chags rak+ta'i dur khrod rba glo 'khyil ba dang/ zhe sdang keng rus dur khrod brag ltar gtam pa dang/ rab tu

'jigs shing shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/ las las grub pa'i dur khrod chen por bshad gsang ba'i dur khrod kyi dkyil 'di ltar ste/ rang rgyud dkyil 'khor drug dag srog shing gsum/ thig le bcud ldan yi ge'i rnam

par ldan// rang rang rtsa dang kha dog ye shes gsal// yum gyi b+ha ga mkha' dbyings dag pa ru// rnam bzhi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor nyi zla'i gdan// thig le'i ye shes rol ba'i bde chen sku// snang srid ka dag lhun
gyis grub par bzhugs// de nyid gsang ba bde chen dkyil 'khor bshad// ces gsungs so// des 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngag 'thun par 'di skad ces bstod

do// e ma ho/ mnyam nyid ngang las dreg pa'i skur sprul nas// gdug pa can rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus// bstan pa gnas phyir 'khor du sprul nas 'gyed// don gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngo mtshar che// rdo rje
'chang chen khro bo'i rgyal// rnam dag chos sku gnyis med mkha'// ye shes rol pas 'jigs pa'i sku// cho 'phrul thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// ces bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye 'gag dang bral
ba'i don 'di bstan to// skye 'gro ma lus chos sku bde ba'i ngang// ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs// 'khor ba'i skyon bral bsam yas dpag med sku// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs sprul pa
bstan// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngo mtshar brjod de/ 'gro ba las kyis rmongs pa la// 'dul ba'i sku yis las rim bstan// bstan pa gnyis med mnyam

sbyar bas// gdug pa thabs bsgral ngo mtshar che// zhes brjod do// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor don gyi le'u ste gsum

pa'o//// de nas nyid kyi thugs las sprul pa'i sku gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad to// e ma ho/ chos sku byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang rgyal
po// 'gro ba'i don du khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las mchog bsdus pas// mi dge mtshams med dman pa kun bsgrol ba'i// las kyi rgyal po sbyor ba smin pa'i
mchog/ mchong chen gdug pa gnad tshul dregs pa yis// yan lag brgya gnyis bzhi dang yang bzhi dang// gzer thun nag po'i dmod pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas
bka' bstsal pa// snying po byang chub sems bsdus nas// byin rlabs ldan pas gsang bcud bstan// 'jig rten khams na 'dul ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus dregs pas myos// bstan pa rin chen rgya lam

cig/ snying po 'phrul gyi sbyor pa gcig/ lus kyi las sbyor brgya phrag brgya// yan lag nyis brgya stong bcu drug/ 'phra bsgyur bye bas khri phrag gcig/ bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi lnga dang gcig/ bgrod pa'i rim pa drug

phyed ldan// yan lag sngon dang bcas pa bzhi// rten gyi sbyor ba las bcu gnyis// 'dren pa'i gsang lam bcu gnyis ldan// sgo dgu gsang bcud e ka'i thog/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzhi dang stong// dbang gi rim

pa lnga dang bcas// phyi nang gsang chen dril// rang bzhin sprul dang sgrub byed las/ ye shes ya ma pany+tsa ti/ las mchog thabs mchog gnyis dang tsa// dkar nag las gsang brgya dang bcu// gshin rje ma mo mkha'

'gro ging// bdud dang srin po sha za klu// smyo byed rgyal po dkar srungs gza'// sa bdag sde brgyad srog gcod gnyan// rlag byed chu srin mu stegs sri// log 'dren 'byung po dur khrod bdag dri za lha gdon drang

srong 'byung// gnod sbyin gnon po grib gnon shan// smyo byed skem byed brjed byed bshed// mdangs 'phrog khrag 'thung gtum po rgod// dbugs len drod nyul sha za rngam// khyung khra dur bya dur bya 'ug kha rgod
lce spyang stag dom wa// khyi sbrul bung ba sdig sdom 'bu// 'jig rten dregs pa srog dbang 'phrog/ thams cad sregs shing las la myos// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas pa yis// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun

kun// rgyud 'dir bstan pa kun 'byung ba// sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhir bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi
bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su rtog ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'brel ba'i don 'di bshad do// bde dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis// snod

dang ngang tshul yul du brtag/ bde lam gsang sgo dregs pa yis// gter sgo yang thog sha za'i srog/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// rten dang grol ba sems dpag med// dri med sems kyi rgyan ldan mchog/
'joms byed ya ma za yi lus// myos bar dug gi sbu dri can// dbang po brtan dang rdo rje ma// ya ma brtan ma lus srin mo// rdo rje snying po stobs dpag med// me chu 'byung bzhi brtan dang
'pho// las kyi 'dren pa'i srog lus brgyan// dregs pa dbang phyug bde ba'i gnas// 'pho ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can// gsang lam yang thog mi 'gyur 'phel// bde byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'joms
byed ya ma ka li'i srog/ 'dren pa stobs kyi lam las gzung// rkyen gsum lus gcig brda yis sbyar// shes pa gsum bsdus gcig la rten// dbye ba'i las ni bcu gnyis brgyad// rgyal mtshan rgyud kyi 'phrul

dbang bcas/ rig pa stobs kyi lam dang ldan// 'phen pa'i sbyor ba stobs dang sdud// rdo rje srin po sbyor ba gcig/ 'khor lo rin chen sgyu ma'i gter// dbang can bran dang las dbang g.yog/ mun khang mtsho
gling ya ma'i gnas// nam mkha'i rgyal po khams dang chu// lo yi dgra dang rang dbang 'joms// gsang mchog rlung khams yan lag lus// gcod pas mtshon cha gshed dbang sgyur// me yis 'jigs pa yang dag
