skyed// las kyis sprod pa'i snying po sa// don dang ldan pa'i las sbyangs la// las chen thig le nam mkha'i khongs// rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i stobs// snying po gsum la yang dag sdud/ khams lnga'i dbyibs su
bde ba bcud// sangs rgyas kun bdag lnga yi ngang// lnga nyid stobs bdag rang gnas mchog/ gsang ba'i ri gcan rin chen mdzod// mchog gi las dang sbyor ba'i las// 'khor lo rgyal po bde ba'i
gnas// 'phrul gyi snying po gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba dbang gis rang rgyas btag/ mi mthun lus la gnod byed gdon// dus dang len pa'i khams su sbyar// yul dang dbang po skye mched la// dbab pa'i

sbyor ba gcig dang bcas// gshin rje nag po bdud dang gshed// rang lus phyag rgya'i stobs dang ldan// che ba'i thig les dregs pa 'khol// zil gnon phyag rgyas kun dbang sdud// las kyi phyag rgya dbang rim
brtsegs/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ni// dug lnga'i nad kyis gdungs shing 'khyams// de la sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// lus la gnag pa'i sdig pa gzhug/ gsum bsdus dril la yul dbang
dbrog/ las kyi 'khor ba las la mngag/ lam sbyangs yul bgrod gnas dang sprad// phyag rgya'i lus la gsum gyis brlab// sku gsung thugs kyi bde gnas su// chos sku 'od zer 'bar bcas 'khyil// 'phro

'du dang bcas rang dbang sgyur// dri ma gsum dang drug la smin// nus pa'i stobs kyis dbang po sdud// gcig gi khams dang thams cad sbyar// 'du ba nad kyis lus la smin// b+ha ga bde ba'i pho brang du// byang [?]
chub 'khor ba'i lam sbyangs nas// bde ba chen po'i gnas phab la// sems dang dri ma gnyis bsdus la// sa bon dag pa'i dbyings su 'phangs// bde ba dang bcas gnas su 'khyil// sngags dang
mchog las gzi brjid 'bar// zhing khams kun spros sbyang bgrod bsdu// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bde gnas ldan// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo 'od 'bar gang// ye shes 'khor lo thig ler 'khyil// 'khor lo khro chung

stong dpag med// dkrugs pas phyag rgya gzhan dbang sgyur// lus bcud dngas ma sems dang bral// pho brang sgo ru rten bzhi dbral// dbus kyi pho brang e la bsdu// rdo rje snying po brda yis dkru// bde lam bde

gnas dgu thog dang// gsang lam rdo rje bgrod lam 'phang// tshul gsum sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// stobs bzhi yan lag bzhi dang ldan// be bag ta yi khu ba dang// rdo yis mtsho gling ka 'phangs dang// bde ba
gsang mchog rgyal lam bskyed// ya ma ka li'i zhing khams nas// ya ma rak+sha 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang po snyings ma yul la rol// dngas ma'i srog mdangs bde gnas gsal// rnyig pa thod pa'i snying por
bsdu// gsang gsum bde ba'i yul dang sprad// don gsum thabs kyis bgrod par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// brda
gsum thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ya ma rA dzAs gsol ba// bde chen gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchog/ bgrod cing lta ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal
pos// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bgrod ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// rig pa sems kyi lta ba ni// bde ba'i 'khor lo ye shes can// 'khrug byed tsit+ta'i 'khor lor bcas// myos pa rten dang dbral ba nyid// srog

gi dbang po kun bsdus la// tshe gnas rdo rje'i lam du sbyang// dbang po rdo rje yul la bstim// srog gi rdo rje dbang bsdus la// rdo rje srin po'i stobs la bstim// rdo rje thig le stobs ldan la// 'phra man rdo

rje'i sprul pa 'gyed// nyi ma'i rdo rje las dbang dkrug/ brtan pa'i rdo rjes gzir byas nas// tshe 'das srog rten rdo rjes 'joms// gnyis ldan rdo rje'i brda yis dbye// don gyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i sku// dbang po
mchog gi rdo rjer 'gyur// don ldan rig pa chos sku'i klong// rdo rje'i rgyal po'i bcud sdud dbab// rang gnas tshe yi lam du gzud// 'jog po bde lam gyen bzlog 'phang// yul gyi dmigs pa rang la

gzud// phyi nang snod bcud 'od du 'bar// ye shes 'phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// gsang rgyal 'phrin las dngos grub 'di// b+h+yaM [(]yahaM[)]raM [(]gaka [)]ka tra/ b+ha ga sha dz+hu na b+ha la t+hI/

[(]sah+ye[)]r+b+ha yA mA ra ka sha'i 'bru/[(]la'aho[)]g+hA s+t+ri rA [(]bahahwaM[)(]shahwaM[)]tri/ hUng lhaM na na 'u sti ru tra/[ (]sahAM[)(]kah+yi[)]b+h+rA b+hu d+h+ru b+hi lhAM/[ (]stashri[)(]k+Shagra[)(]nyashrahi[)]lha b+ha ska ya d+he d+hal d+huM [(]ah+yaM[)(]yaAM[)]/ sa
a'i sbyor ba tshul gsum sbyar/ 'phrul gyi 'khrul mig skabs kyis sbyar// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ ye shes 'khrul 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// 'khrul mig

drag po 'khrul 'khor gyi// rgyu dang tshad dang gzer dang gnad// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las dang gzer// dus dang gnas dang rdzas dang thabs// phyogs dang blang dang rgod dang 'pho// ldog dang 'khyams 'bral
gcod dang 'bigs// rdzas dang gnas dang rgyu dang thun// rnal bzlog gzir gnan blang// las dang dngos grub thun mong mchog/ lus dang yan lag thabs gnad dang// bde ba smin byed dbang bsdu

'phang// sangs rgyas kun mnyam mthu stobs bdag/ rin chen rdo rje sa ma ta// ut+pal ljon shing myu gu'i 'bru// me tog mdog ldan bcud phyung ba// rtsi thog ma sbyar len dang 'khyams// rtsa ba dbang gi 'grod ba'i
mchog/ mdangs bcas bsgrol ba thabs ldan blang// bcu drug rkyang pa bzhi ldan gcig/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bde dbang sgyur// 'bigs dang gcod la sogs pa'i las// bsrungs dang skyob pa kun byed

pa'o// 'khrul mig drag po gnyis dbang gcig/ 'khor lo mi 'gyur brtan pa yi// phyag rgya rdo rje sngags kyi gzer// mtshon cha'i lo ma spu gri'i gnas// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang chen thabs// gnyis med mthun
pa'i las nyid las// 'khor lo chos sku phyag rgyar gsal// zla ba shar ltar brtan brjid la// nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i 'od stong 'bar// sbyor ba'i 'khor lo du ma 'phro// mtshon cha'i 'khor los rtsa lam
gcod// sngags kyis 'khor los sreg cing sdud// ting 'dzin 'khor los bskul zhing 'byed// rdo rje 'khor lo bde mchog gsal// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gsang bcud len// sems pa'i 'khor los rang dbang
'bebs// shugs kyis 'khor los rang dang ldan// bag chags 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po 'khor lo'i lto bar gzhug/ 'byung ba'i 'khor lo stobs kyis mnan// gnyis
ldan 'khor lo gcig gi ngang// bskul ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gcig zhing 'bar// dmigs pa'i 'khor lo bde bas gang// bcud kyi 'khor lo sdud cing 'phel// bde ba'i 'khor lo rtsa lam brgyud// gsang
ba'i 'khor lo bde bas gang// sa bon 'khor lo las kyi dbab// 'khor lo sgra dang bcas nas 'khyil// 'od zer 'khor lo phyag rgyar dbab// thugs kyi sbyor ba bsam yas mchog/ chos sku phyag rgya'i 'os ldan
gsal// 'khor lo'i gnas su 'khor lo bca'// gsang ba tshe yi 'khor lor 'bar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan la// las kyi 'khor lo sa ra pa// gshin rje nag po 'joms pa yi// bde

ldan 'khor lo brtsegs pa yi// pho brang gnas dang sbyar ba'i lus// zhi ba'i gnas su las dang sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// don gyi snying 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me

long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo lta ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o///// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pas rang rgyud kyi thig le 'di bshad do// bde ba'i sbyor ba bgrod pa'i mchog/ rang

rgyud thig le mchod pa'i phul// ye shes rol pa mnyes pa'i rgyan// bde ba rgyan gyi mchod pa dang// yid 'ong glu yi dbang phyug rtsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// las chen sbyor ba'i yul dbang
sgrol// ting 'dzin shugs 'gro rgyun dbang sgyur// 'phrin las sna tshogs 'gag pa med// byin rlabs mchog ldan mchod pa'i mchog/ rig pa rang dbang rgyun mi 'chad// g.yas nas bde lam bskul lam
dbab// tshangs pa'i gnas su mchod rgyun 'khril// bde chen mchod rgyun lhun mnyam gsal// sngags kyi stobs kyi rlung bskul la// drod kyi dbang po rtsa lam bzhu// rkyen dang ldan pas mchod rgyun
'bebs// g.yas nas bskul nas g.yon nas 'bebs// rak+ta chags pa'i mchod pa yi// g.yon nas bskul nas g.yas nas 'bebs// g+hu b+hin dri yi mchod pa yin// g.yas g.yon gnyis nas bskul nas

su// dbu ma'i thig le rgyun shar ba// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yin// rtsa gsum bskul nas gang zhing 'bar/ sna tshogs b+ha ling mchod pa yin// rtsa rnams bde bas mdzes gang ba// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa
yin// ye shes rang gnas 'od gsal ba// snang gsal 'od 'bar mchod pa yin// bskyed pa ha si cir yang g.yo/ bde ldan sgra yi mchod pa yin// thams cad gnyis med ro mnyam gcig/ kun tu bzang po'i

mchod pa yin// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'khyil// sbyor ba dbang gi mchod pa yin// shes pa gnyis 'dzin rtog bral ba// stobs chen shugs bsgrol mchod pa yin// rdo rje 'od ldan phyag rgya yis// ye shes chen

po rang nyams gsal// rang gnas thig le'i mchod pa yin// lnga rdzogs bde ba gcig tu 'khyil// lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa yin// bdag dbang rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// rang byung lnga dang mdzes pa'i ro// 'chi
med bdud rtsi mchod pa yin// mtshan mar mi gnas dbyings su thim// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yin// mchod rgyun don ldan 'grod pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid bdag la rol zhing mchod// tshangs pa gser gyi
sgo gnyis nas// ye shes nyi zla thig le dgug/ phyag rgya'i lus la bstam zhing gnas// gang yin dbang po legs bskor gzhug/ sgo gnyis rtsal sbyangs thig ler bstim// yang dang ma la dngas ma

bsdu// ya tshogs brgyad dang lnga drug gnyis// stobs gsum rdo rje'i lam bsgrod nas// yang dag bde ba'i gnas su spro// bde bas gang nas shes rab bskyod// gnyis med phyag rgyas rang gang gsal// rgyun dang

bde ba'i mchod par rol// rdo rje rgyal po bskyod pa yis// shri pany+tsa raM bde ba'i/ de ba gu h+ya rA dzA la/ brtan pa'i thig le bzlas pa bya// bde ba chen po'i sku la gsal// nyon mongs bde ba rang gnas

'bar// sgrol ba'i ye shes rang 'bar rtsal// sbyor ba sgra yi thig le dbab// gshin rje sku yi dbyings su thim// ngam gling dgu 'dus rdo rje'i rtse// b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i pho brang du// 'bru yi dngas ma dril bsdus

la// phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pas bzung// byin dbang rdo rje ngang gi rdzogs// sbyor ba du ma'i skabs kyi brtsam// gang 'dod las la thog med 'jug/ thun mong mchog gi dgongs par ldan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya

bgrod par bshad// tra tan garba tsakra ma Ni rat+na ke du a ta ra she u tra tan tra/ gsang ba'i thig le lta ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gsang ba'i don gyi skabs so// de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas sprul ba'i sku

gshin rje'i rgyal po rang gi stan langs te/ bskor ba lan brgya phrag stong du byas te/ thal mo sbyar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba/ kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang/ sku

gsung thugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs// 'jam dpal nag po khro chen gyi// bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi sngon 'gro gang// dngos nyid las rims bya thabs tshul// 'khor la rgyas par mdzad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ de

bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje snying pos bka' bstsal pa/ ye shes bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi ni// bgrod pa'i rim pas sngon 'gro brtsams// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje
gshed// myos par bya ba'i lus la gdon// 'khor lo brgya phrag sbyor ba gcig/ rim pa du ma las kyi gnad// yan lag rgyan gyi 'khor lo gsum/ rdo rje srin po las mon gshed// khro ba'i rgyal po yang dag
gzud// dbang gi gnas su phyag rgyar 'bar// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// sku gsung thugs khro mi bzad pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// zhi khro rab 'byams rang bzhin dpal// gdul bya drag phyir

shin tu khros// che btsan drags pa bran du 'khol// tshe yi dngos grub thob 'dod pas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bgrod pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// sems nyid ye shes 'od gsal zhing// rang bzhin lhun
grub bde ba che// chos sku chen po'i rol bsam yas// nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la// gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas// 'jam dpal gshed kyi gnas mchog ni// ngam ri brag nag gnam lcags
'dar// sog po khros 'dra srin mdung rtse// ngam grog g.yang sa skyi g.ya' 'jigs// gu 'dus mi ro gsar rnying yod// sha zan srog gcod 'dab chags ling// gcan gzan gdug pa 'drim zhing gnas// 'jig
rten lha 'dre'i gnas bcas sa// mkha' 'gro ma lus 'dun sa rgyu// lho ru kha ltas gnag la gzir// gnas der gshin rje gshed po gnyen// sems kyi chos nyid ma bcos la// de bzhin nyid kyi blo bzhag
ste// gnyis med rtsol bral ngang nyid dang// dpa' bos yun ni ring du gnas// de ma yin pa'i gang zag gis/ dus gsum phyogs bcu'i bdag nyid can// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yis// thun mong ma

yin mtshan dper ldan// nyi zla'i tshul sgom thig le grang// shes rab pha rol phyin ma yis// gsung gi thig le yang dag bsgrags// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi/ glu yi mtshan rnams yang dag brjod// de

sogs mdo sde ci nus bgrangs// sku yi phyag rgya sna tshogs bzhengs// srog gdon skyabs dang sbyin pa bsgye// sbyin gtor phyi mchod dag par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi las rdzogs nas// sa blang sbyang brtsig dngos
la 'jug/ 'don yon mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma gsum// chang phud rin chen sman dang 'bru sna tshogs// bshams la dkon mchog gsum po dang// rgyal po bzhi dang gtsang rigs sde brgyad 'khor// sa bdag sa
srin yi dwags dang// lha mo bstan ma bgegs kyi rigs// 'gro ba rigs drug spyan drang 'bod// mnyes shing mgu bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dod yon gtor ma mchod par 'bul// byin gyis brlabs te tshim gyur
na// gnas mchog chen po'i sa phyogs 'dir// rnal 'byor dam ldan dpa' bo bdag/ gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal gyi// gsang ba'i dngos grub len byed pa// lha klu bgegs chen khyed rnams la// sa slong las
kyi grogs 'chol gyis// 'dod yon mchod sbyin 'di long la// bar chad ma byed grogs stong gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa yun du srung// dam las ma 'da' zhes brjod do// bdag nyid khro chen thugs kha

nas// thig le ye shes rol pa las// 'byung ba'i snying po rnam gsum gyis// 'phros pas sa gzhi bsregs stor dkrug/ don dam stong nyid ngang du gnas// de nas rgyud la maN+Dal rtsig/ khro bo'i nga rgyal phyag rgya

che// rdo rje 'gros dang gar gyi bskor// de nas mtshams gsum dang po gcod// rgyang grags phyogs mtshams bzhi gnyis su// mtho brgyad rang rang gtsang rigs mgon// de nang phyogs bzhir tho chen bzhi// rgyal
chen sde bzhir mnga' yang gsol// mchod yon gtor ma byin nas kyang// bar chod byed pa'i dam sri kun// mtshams kyi nang du shor ra re// phyogs mtshams srung ba'i las mdzod cig/ nang nas
dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod las kyi gnyer gtad bya/ de nas nang du+u ra sogs sam// khyi sogs sa 'dzul sogs pa la// bar chod dam sri logs 'dren gyis// ming gzugs snying po stobs bcus

bri// phag thod dang bcas them 'og dang// lam chen rgya gram srang du mnan// khro rgyal gshed kyi stobs kyis gzir// sngon du 'gro ba'i rim par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i snying po khri drug

stong pa'i rgyud las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang bdag gnad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ting
'dzin sbyor ba'i nyams ldan pa// rang rig sems kyi sgron ma 'bar/ phyi rol yul la rten mi gzung// dbang phyug khro bdag gshed kyi gzo// dbyings phyug ro langs gsang ba'i yul// thugs khar thugs mchog
yab yum gnas// yan lag gshed po yum dang bcas// de bzhin gnas su phyogs skyong 'bar// bu ga thar byed yab dang yum// stod smad tshigs la sgrol ba'i ging// ba spu bu ga las grub mon// sprul pa yang

sprul dpag tu med// mdun rgyab lta zur sgo srungs ma// ye shes stobs ldan rol pa 'phro// gsang gnas khyams dang sbu gu dang// za ma tog dang ge sar la// phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal// ha si
bde sgra sngags kyi tshig/ thig le 'phro 'du byin dbang sdud// bde ba'i ye shes mchod pa'i phul// sman pa rang gi dbang po la// rim pa las kyi gnad chen bskor// bdud sgor rten zhal 'chi bdag

gshed// tshangs pa'i gnas su chos rgyal rngam// dran po'i dbang po 'chi bdag rgyal// dregs pa'i ngag lam lto pa nag/ srid pa'i rten tsar me dbal gcod// gsang ba dgu khri sa ta las// de bzhin gnas su sha
za bdud// ba spu bu ga me mtshon 'bar// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// ye shes 'khor lo de nyid dbab// thabs dang shes rab sprul pa 'gyed// rol pa rjes mthun cho gar ldan// rang 'byung ye shes
lha bsnyen mchog/ thig le rol pa me mtshon thogs// sreg gcod sgrol ba'i ngar dang ldan// dbugs kyi rta zhon yul la bskyod// bskyod bskul las kyi bsnyen pa mchog/ dman pa dngos nyid ling ga la// dregs

pa gtum chen mtshon dpal ngar// shing sring bzhin du bsad pa'i mchog/ las gsum rdzogs pa'i thugs su bshad// ta tan ga rba tsakra ma ni rat+na ke d+hu a ta ri sha u kram tan tra las/ gsum thabs kyi le'u ste
dgu pa'o//// sngon 'gro thabs kyi skabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa dngos kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rten gyi gnas der las gzugs pa// rabs chad nag po'i khang pa

dang// g.yul bkye sa dang mi phung shul// ri rgod 'gram dang thal chen dang// de dag rgyu la maN+Dal cig/ khru bzhi rgya la dbangs khru gang// mi rta'i snying khrag btsan dug dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag

gdab// ba su srad bu rak+ta'i tshal// gsang ba yum gyi mkha' las dgye// thig g.yon mtshan ldan bar nas dra// thig gdab byin ldan rdul tshon bri// nri rangs su yi sbyor ba yis// rak+sha dug shing nyung lim lo/ kha

dog lnga ldan ye shes brlab// gzugs brnyan 'bar ba yongs la snang// gsang mdzod dgu ldan pho brang mchog/ dbus mthing zla khams bzhi 'khor lo// de bzhin 'khor lo dmar nag sngo// gru chad mtsho gling ngam

gling khrag/ sgo khyud bzhi yi 'khor lor bcas// phyi yi bar khyams de bzhin sgo// phyogs kyi kha dog rab tu 'bar// rdo rje thod 'phreng me rir 'bar// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ste// sprul pa'i 'khor lo dgu gnyis

ldan// bar khyams gru chad sgo khyud gnyis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bzhi ldan bya// bam chen ma he nyi zla dregs// rtsa ba'i gdan stengs gzhan ro rkyang// zhing rgyan bla re thod sprul bcas// 'phring ba g.yer ka dra phyed
dar// 'dod yon lha mo don rnams bsam// dbus la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab dang yum// gshed pho bdud mo bzhir ldan bcas// mu khyud dang
por dgod par bya// gnyis pa 'khor lo'i rim pa la// phyogs skyong yab yum bcas pa dgod// bar chod gshed kyi bdud rnams kun// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo'i rim pa

la// sgrol ba'i ging chen bco brgyad dang// ging mo bco brgyad bka' nod tshul// khrag mtsho ro langs lce spyang rngam// bar khyams nang gi 'khor lo la// thar byed yab yum brgyad gnyis rngam// sgo khyud sgrod byed
'khor lo la// ya ma bstan ma la sogs dgod// phyi yi bar khyams snam bu la// mon pa mon mo las kyi gshed// bdun bdun gnyis gnyis gnyis bcu brgyad// yang sprul drug khri drug stong gnas// sgo bzhi sgo

srungs bse mo bzhi// rten bzhi gnas kyi 'khor lo la// rten pa lha yi 'khor lo brtan// ye shes byin rlabs stobs ldan bya// rjes su mthun pa'i chos gar ldan// rten rdzas gnyis dang mchod rdzas dgram// rgyan

rdzas rol rdzas gtor ma khrag/ dur khrod rdzas la rdzas dgus byug/ gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya bzhengs// rab gnas byin ldan lha tshogs dgram// sa gsum la sogs bdud rtsi khrag/ sbyong bgrod dang ldan phyag
rgya'i sku// dbang bskur mchod bstod lho ru dgram// dmug chen dmug chung bdud rtsi bcud// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar// steng 'og phyag rgya'i yab yum dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi thig ler

ldan// mthing nag dang bcas ru sprod gdab// phyi yi mchod pa go rims bzhin// nang gi mchod pa bdud rtsi phung// rak+ta sna mangs thod par sbyar// dpal gyi gtor ma sna tshogs dbul// sras mchog gtor ma sha

khrag lho// las kyi ya ma'i gtor ma shar// ma mo mkha' 'gro drug gtor byang// ging bdud mon gyi gtor ma nub// zhing chen zhing chung bla ri 'phan// rgyu ma'i zhags pa thod pa'i 'phreng// mchog chen gling bu ltag

sprod rnga// ban d+ha'i cha lang keng rus rgyan// bsur chen dud pa sha chen cal// tsit+ta'i pho long khrag gi mtsho// phyogs bcu khor yug sbrin du gtibs// gri lcags mchog dang seng ldeng skyer// phur pa rtsang bcas rang

rang grangs// dbus la sogs pa'i gdan la 'god// zla ba dgun 'bring nya la gdams// yang na gshin rje gshed nyid kyis// zla ba zhag dus snying la rab// de bzung yon tan 'phel bar bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin
po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bcas bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos sngon du 'gro ba'i don 'di gsungs so// mnyam

nyid dag pa'i ye shes las// mkha' dkyil nyi shar brdal pa bzhin// bdag nyid gshed chen gar gyi sku// thugs kyi snying po ring du bskul// 'od zer las byung 'bar ba'i sku// snang srid bde 'chang de bzhin
nyid// sprin ltar rngam sgra phyogs bcur g.yo// de bskul me ri mtshon char 'khrigs// khro bo 'bar bcas gtum rngam bltams// log 'dren dam sri rdul du brlag/ skrag cing bar mtshams phyogs bcu

bsrungs// chos rnams stong nyid rtogs dang bral// dmigs med rang bzhin byang chub sems// mkha' ltar mnyam pa chos kyi dbyings// skye 'gag bral ba'i ngang nyid las// yod pa ma yin med pa min// stong pa
nyid las cho 'phrul byung// de nyid ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// sems nyid ngang las g.yo ba med// sems kyi rol pa snang nga yang// sprin dang 'ja' tshon khu rlangs bzhin// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin
las// dngos po skye ba nyid kyis stong// chos rnams thams cad thig ler 'dus// thig le rol ba'i byin rlabs las// dug gsum sbyong ba'i 'phreng ba gsum// sreg sbyangs sel ba'i rang bzhin las// thabs
dang shes rab mtshan mar 'bar// gnyis med ga bur nyon mongs lnga// gnas bdag yon tan lhun grub pa'i// 'phreng ba rin chen rim par brtsegs// rkyen dang ldan pas 'byung ba'i rim// ye shes phyogs bzhi
dbus brtags te// rang shar mtshan ma gzhal yas khang// gdan stengs thig le 'phro 'du las// rjes mthun cho gas rdzogs pa'i sku// rkyen ldan yab yum phyag rgya che// rgyas pa'i 'phro 'du bskyod
byas pas// thig le dbyibs ldan mkha' la 'phro//de las dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang// bdag nyid thig le'i rnam pa de// gtso chen thugs kyi sgo nas zhugs// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur te// dkyil 'khor
ye shes 'od du 'bar// cho 'phrul gsum ldan phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor bdag nyid sras mchog nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas// dbyings nas rang bzhin shugs kyis bskyod// rang snang
dkyil 'khor dbyer med mnyam// ye shes rol pa'i rang nyid las// mtshan ma lha yi phyag rgyar 'bar// snang srid 'dod yon dkyil 'khor nyid// gnyis med tshim rgyas par rol// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil

'khor thim// dges shing mnyes pa'i las rdzogs nas// bdag nyid gtso bo phyag rgya'i sku// thugs khar nyi zla snying po sngags// rang nyams 'od 'bar snying po gso// skad cig sngags dang 'od 'bar gsal// mi

g.yo brtan pa'i shugs kyis drang// 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba gzi mdangs sdud// bde ba'i dum bu sems las blang// de yang dgongs pa'i don dang sbyar// sems kyi rdo rje brtan thob nas// ye shes phyag rgya drod la

dbab// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis grang// nyi ma rdo rje chu rlung dang// pad+ma rin chen so ma ta// nam mkha' 'khor lo gsal dang bcas// dur khrod rten dang gzhal yas bcud// snying po gsum gyi brda dang

sbyar// ya ma ka la'i bsnyen par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'khrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ phyi rtags nang du bsdu ba 'di bshad do/ bde ba'i gnas su sngon 'gro brtsams// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// dam rdzas kha gsang mchod pa 'bul// de

stengs khyad par rdzas bdun bsags// sman sna ga bur la sogs pa// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu bsag mtshan ldan pad+ma'i khrag sogs pa// bdun dang bcas pa dngos grub rdzas// snying po lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// 'o

ma sna lnga spos sna lngar// rin chen sna lngar bcas pa de// rje rigs la sogs ma nor pa'i// thod pa mdzes ldan pho mo gnyis// gu gul chu yis zhen par byug/ tshil chen byugs la phyag rgya dgod// gnas gsum
snying po gsum dag bri// 'phreng ba rnam gsum sku yi mthar// ye shes rigs lnga'i snying po la// 'bras bu lnga yi 'phreng bas bskor// de la rten bca' ga bur sbyar// dkar dmar dur khrod ba stims la
blang// dgongs pa'i drod ldan nang rtags 'byung// ye shes dngos grub rdzas su bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// phyi
rtags nang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nang rtags gsang bar bsdu ba 'di bshad do// dngos grub thod pa'i ga bur de// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang// phyag
rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor la// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs kyi bcud// zhi khro rab 'byams gzi brjid mdangs// ye shes gshed kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// ma

lus gnyis med rdzas la thim// 'od kyi 'phro 'du bdag dang der// lus la ye shes 'khor lo gsal// sgra dbyangs snying po'i thig ler ldan// 'od zer sprul pa phyag rgyar 'phro// mchod bskangs bstod cing dngos
grub bsdus// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin rten la bstims// ga bur me 'bar ldeg sgra 'gul// gsang rtags yul du mthong bar 'gyur// 'dren pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po

che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// nang rtags gsang bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang rtags mngon du phyung ba'i don 'di bshad

do// khyad par dngos grub rdzas chen de// gshin rje gshed kyi thugs nyid de// ri lu dkyil 'khor lha yi grangs// yab yum snyoms zhugs thugs kyi bcud// ye shes nyi zla'i 'od zer gyis// bdag gi sgrib pa nyon
mongs sbyong// rnam rtog bag chags thams cad sreg ye shes lnga yi bde dbang bskur// bkrag dang gzi mdangs ye shes rgyas// rnam shes las thabs dngos grub 'beb// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa
yi// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bdag la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang// 'jam dpal nag po'i sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor grub// spyod yul kun kyang phyag rgya'i
tshogs// gzugs su snang ba thams cad sku// sgra sgrogs stong pa thams cad gsung// gnyis med dran shes thams cad thugs// de ltar gsang rtags mngon du 'byung// rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa yi// 'jam
dpal gshin rje gshed po zhes// rnal 'byor de la nga yis bshad// gsang rtags mngon du dbyung ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// las kyi gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba 'di

bshad do// gnas mchog tshang bar dkyil 'khor bri// rdzas dang sbyor ba gong bzhin bca'// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod gzung la// drod rtags tshad mas gtan la dbab// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rnyed de// ye shes
lus la tshud nas kyang// las kyi ya ma'i bsnyen pa bya// rang nyid phyag rgya chen po la// lus kyi 'khor lo bstan byas la// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan pa yi// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas te// thugs

kyi 'od zer lcags kyu'i tshul// lho phyogs dur khrod rol pa nas// las kyi gshin rje rngam pa'i tshul// sna tshogs me rlung 'khor lo can// sha za khrag 'thung rngam sgra sgrogs/ kha nas nad dal dmod pa
'bebs// 'bum phrag rang dbang med par dgug/ dbang du bsdus la las la mngag/ las kyi gshin rje dregs pa kun// dbang du bsdus pa'i drod dang ldan// de nas bzlas sbyar ya tshogs bzlas// las la

tshud pa'i drod la rtag de yang 'chi bdag gshin rje yi// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa yin// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong ba'i rgyud las// las kyi ya ma

bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// kye ho bde gshegs gsang ba'i sku// drag po las kyi sbyor ba dang// 'khrul 'khor don gyi snying po
rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po des// gshin rje gshed kyis gsad pa drag po'i las 'di bshad do// dngos grub gnyis dang bde ldan

na// drag po las kyi sbyor ba brtsams// dur khrod gnyan ra gdud pa ru// brnag pa thun dang 'khor lo'i rdzas// 'brub khung ling kha'i rgyud rten bcas// dong gzhug mtshon cha 'khor lo bca'// de dag rgyas pa 'di

lta ste// phung sa'i stegs bu dug khrag byug de stengs gru gsum rtse gas la// khru gang rgya la mtho mdzug chag thod pa rtsang phur phyir bar nang// rgya sol dug dang rak+ta byug phyi sa chu rjes dri ma dkru// rten bcud shun
bcas drug gnyis tshad// dbang po dod pa gcal thabs gcer// ming rus dug khrag snying kha mgo/ rabs chad thod par e nang gnag tsher ma'i stan la gan kyal bsgyel// khrag gsum dug gsum phye gsum

'bru// khra ma thod sar skam thun bca'// 'khrul 'khor drag po'i las bshad pa// ye shes las kyi bye ba gnyis// rnal 'byor drod kyi tshad dang sbyar// yab kyi 'khrul 'khor las kyi bdud// bca' ba'i rim pa

'di lta ste// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' bo yi// ka la ka pa ma ni tog gos su bcas pa'i rgyu blangs la// thod pa'i snying por bcud sdu bya// de la gcod pa'i tsakra pri// dur khrod ras la bam chen gyi// sme ba lnga

yi thang ba bya// ni ra su yi thal ba yis// mtha' ma brgya dang rgyang bcad la// mchog phran rkyang ngam bya rog sgro// bam skra rgyus pas pir byas te// bam chen don gyi khrag dug gis// gcod pa'i 'khor lo rjes su
bri// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo ngar dang bcas// rdo rje 'chang chen dregs pas myos// 'jam dpal nag po gshin rje gshed// khro rgyal kun gyi stobs dang sbyar// mthu stobs bdag po dbang phyug gi ya
ma rA dzas yang gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// zab cing rgya che'i chos nyid ni// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sras mchog byang chub

sems// zab cing rgya chen sgra sgrogs pa'i// chos nyid nga yis rgyas bshad do// sems can bsam pa tha dad pas// chos kyi bye brag thams cad kyang// mdor bsdus bshad tshul rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas rnams

kyi dgongs pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyu yi theg chen tshul bshad dang// gsang sngags rnal 'byor tshul bshad dang// bla med dgongs pa'i tshul bshad pa'o// rgyu yi theg pa chen po yi// tshul du bshad pa
'di lta ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// rgya chen kun rdzob bden pa dang// zab pa don dam bden pa'o// kun rdzob bden pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag pa dang
log pa'o// dang po rtog bcas rtog med pa'i// shes pa yul dang yul can te// mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa'o// gnyis pa snang la don byed ni// mi gnas pa de mi srid chos// yang na kun rdzob bden pa
gsum// brtags dang shes dang brjod pa'o// don dam bden pa'ang rnam pa gnyis// zab mo gtam gyi don dam dang// 'jig rten grags de'i don dam mo// dang po skye med brjod dang bral// dngos med mngon

par 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad bral// blo dang dngos po ma rig pa// gting zab brtag dka' stong pa nyid// rang bzhin med pa'i de kho na'o// gnyis pa yang dag shes pa ni// yul dang yul

can bcas pa'o// de nyid gzhan du brjod med pas// rgya che de bzhin zab pa nyid// rang bzhin gcig phyir de kho na// so so ma yin tha mi dad// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid do// yang na don dam bden pa
gsum// don dang bsgrub dang thob pa'o// dang po chos rnams de bzhin nyid// cir yang mi gnas stong nyid do// gnyis pa sgrib med ye shes te// gang dang dbyer med dag pa'o// gsum pa rnam par byang ba

yi// 'bras bu ye shes dam pa'o// de dag rang bzhin tha dad min// des na rgya che zab par bshad// gsang sngags rnal 'byor theg pa yi// tshul du bshad pa 'di lta ste// snying po rang rig dngos med de// cir

yang snang zhing cir yang 'grub// rol pa ma 'gags sna tshogs snang// 'khor ba phyi nang snod bcud dang// mya ngan 'das pa sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor lam dang 'bras bu'i chos// phyi nang gsang ba sna
tshogs su// mi 'gags rang snang cir yang byung// rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// de dag sna tshogs cir snang yang// mtha' rnams ma spangs bral ba'i phyir// dngos med stong nyid rang bzhin
med// skye med dngos med phyogs dang bral// cir yang ma grub brtag tu med// zab pa zhes su bshad pa yin// dngos po med nyid ma 'gags snang// ji ltar snang yang dngos med nyid// gcig las ma g.yos sna
tshogs 'byung// sna tshogs rang bzhin gnyis med cig/ phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhi ste// rigs can rigs dang bral ba yin// zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa'o// ya ma ra rdzas yang gsol pa// bla med
dgongs pa'i tshul bshad nyid// gang lags pa de bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ bla med dgongs pa'i bshad tshul la// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// dpe yi zab cing rgya che dang// don

ci zab cing rgya che dang// rtags kyis zab cing rgya che ba'o// gsol pa/ dpe yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ dpe ni nam mkha' yin pa ste// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad la// nam mkha' ma

khyab gcig kyang med// 'byung ba gling bzhi'i rnam pa dang// nyi zla gza' skar gzha' sprin rnams// nam mkha' nyid kyi cho 'phrul te// sna tshogs snang ba rgya che bas// ji ltar snang yang dngos ma grub// rgyu

med rkyen med skye 'gag med/ kha dog dbyibs med rang bzhin med// gzung du med cing brtag tu med// zad pa med cing 'gro 'ong med// klong yangs gting rings zab par bshad// gsol pa/ don gyi mtshan nyid bshad

du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ don gyi chos nyid yin pa ste// chos nyid rang bzhin dag pa las// chos can dngos po sna tshogs snang// 'khor ba gnam ri sa brag dang// rtsi shing gling bzhi ri rab bcas// mtshan

ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang// zhing khams sna tshogs gzhal yas khang// gdan rgyan longs spyod du mar snang// rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// sna tshogs snang yang rang bzhin
med// ma byas ma bcos 'gyur ba med// gting zab brtag dka' spros med pa// blo dang dngos pos ma rig pa// mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i ngang// chos dbyings rang bzhin stong pa nyid// rtog med dmigs
med mu mtha' med// des na zab pa zhes bshad do// gsol pa/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ rtags ni sems nyid yin pa ste// sems nyid rang bzhin dngos med las// rol pa'i
cho 'phrul cir yang snang// 'khor ba 'gro drug sems can gyi// lus dang bag chags las dbang sogs// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// rten 'brel bcu gnyis chu bo bzhi// sna tshogs ma rtogs ngo la
snang// myang 'das dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// sku dang ye shes mdzad pa dang// rigs dang dkyil 'khor yon tan dang// stobs dang mi 'jigs zad par dang// zil gnon skye mched sna tshogs

snang// lam dang 'bras bu theg pa'i rim// rang snang bas na rgya cher bshad// rang 'byung snying pos kun la khyab// dngos med rang rig ngo bo nyid// ma bcos lhun grub 'gyur ba med// sems nyid rang gsal
'dus ma byas// skye 'gag med cing mtha' dbus med// rtog med zab pa zhes su bshad// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// gnyis med rang bzhin rdzogs par
bshad// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba zab pa rgya che ba'i le'u ste nyis brgya drug pa'o//// de nas gshin rje gshed
rgyal pos/ rdo rje 'chang chen dpa' bo la// pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba btab// kye ho rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i rim pa la// sngon 'gro yan
lag brjod pa'i thabs// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// rang bzhin spros med chos nyid de// rnam

rtog zug rngu med pas nas kyang// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// rang bzhin spros med chos nyid de// rnam rtog zug rngu med pas 'jam// de rtog thugs rje 'byung bas
dpal// sgrib med ye shes 'od gsal ba// rang rig rang gsal rnam dag sems// nyon mongs rnam rtog bdud 'joms pa// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste// de yi mtshan nas brjod pa la// sngon 'gro
lam ni yan las brgyad// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul sdig pa bshags// yi rangs 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba dang// skyabs 'gro dge rtsa bsngo ba'o// de dag
rnam par dbye ba ni// chos dbyings 'og min phyogs bcu'i zhing khams na// skye mched chos sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul sku chos nyid dge 'dun sras bcas la// lus ngag yid gsum dang bas phyag
'tshal lo// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin rgya chen po// dngos sbyor yid kyi rnam srul 'jig rten bkang// sku gsum lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems sogs kun la rgyas par
'bul// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dbang gis na// lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// thams cad sku gsum rdo rje'i bde gshegs dang// byang chub spyan sngar ma lus bshags par
bgyi'o// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa' dag dang 'gro ba yi// rgya chen rab zab bsod nams dge ba'i tshogs// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi
rangs// phyogs bcu 'jig rten bsam yas dpag med na// sku gsung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ bzhugs shing mnyam bzhag 'gro 'dul de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor bar
bskul// dus gsum bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// de dag kun la bdag gis thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i don du bskal pa dpag med du// bzhugs shing thugs rjes don mdzad gsol ba 'debs// skye

med ngang las ye shes skur ston cig/ thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab mdzad pa'i// dpa' bo bdud 'dul sangs rgyas thams cad la// byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig pa
bshags la sogs// dge ba gzhan gyis de dag thams cad kun// bla med byang chub chen po thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis yang dag yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de ltar sngon du 'gro ba yis// lam gyi yan lag

brgyad rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ yan lag brgyad kyi le'u ste sum brgya tham pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// lam gyi sbyor
ba 'di bshad do// nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// de yi mtshan gyi gdon thabs la// gang zag mos pa tha dad phyir// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod kyang// mdor bsdus rnam
pa gsum yin te// dbang po rab kyis brjod pa ni// mi rtog ye shes bltas te gdon// dbang po 'bring gi brjod pa ni// gsang sngags tshul du bltas te gdon// dbang po tha mas mtshan brjod pa// che ba'i yon

tan bltas te gdon// de gsum thabs gyi sngon du ni// khrus bya ba dang sems skyed dang// dam tshig sdom pa gzung bar bya// de dag rgyas pa 'di dag ste// khrus la phyi nang gnyis yin te// phyi khrus chu gtsang dri zhim

btsas// dang po'i sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyis// chu nang zla stengs a dkar bsam// bdag thugs 'od 'phros a la thim// 'od du zhu bas dri ma'i tshogs// ma lus bar ni dag par gsam// lhag ma dzam+b+ha la la
sbyin// nang khrus bdag med rnam dag la// lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa'o// sems skyed pa yi sbyor ba ni// ye shes lnga dang snying rje gsum// bsgoms pas mngon par byang chub pa'o// 'khor 'das la sogs

sna tshogs bar// snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun// snang ba rang bzhin med pa yi// sgrib med ye shes chen por gsal// dper na me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// ma yengs
'dris par rab tu blta// de ltar chos kun dngos med pas// gcig dang du mar bral ba yis// rang bzhin stong nyid chen po la// mtshan mar grub pa yang dag med// dper na nam mkha' dngos
med bzhin// skye med rtag dka' 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos de la// bzang ngan che chung ye nas med// phyogs dang ris med mtha' dbus med// mngon sum mi gnas kun la snyoms// mnyam pa

nyid kyi snying po la// rim par bkod pa ye nas med// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bsgoms// chos rnams so so'i mtshan nyid kyang// ma 'dres sna tshogs rnam par snang// de yang sgrib med rang gsal ba// thams
cad mkhyen pa'i rig pa nyid// bye brag sna tshogs rnam pa yang// rtags na rig pa'i ye shes nyid// de las gzhan pa'i chos med bsgoms// lam dang 'bras bu la sogs te// yon tan bya ba'i 'dod don

rnams// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa yi// rang rig snying po sgrib med de// 'gro don shugs la grub par byed// ma 'khrul rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// de ltar ye shes lnga bsgoms nas// snying rje rnam par

gsum bsgom pa// ma rig rgyu la log rtog rkyen// des bskyed sdug bsngal phung bor smin// mgon med 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor phyin// sems can de dag sdug bsngal las// thar par bsgral te don bya sbyor// chos
rnams bdag med stong pa nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i mtshan nyid las// chos kun gzhan med de bzhin nyid// de rtogs mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med pas// don bya snying rje'i yul
dngos med// dmigs med rang bzhin yongs dag pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid bsgoms// sdom pa bzung ba'i rim pa ni// sku gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' chen por
bcas// dus 'di nas ni dgongs su gsol// bdag ni byang chub snying po la// nam zhig gnas kyi bar dag tu// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed kyi// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid de// dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid// stong nyid de bzhin nyid dbyings las// de bzhin rigs mchog sdom pa gzung// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dbyer med rnam rtog kun 'joms pa// rdo
rje rigs mchog sdom pa gzung// mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// yon tan thams cad lhun rdzogs pa'i// blang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen rigs mchog sdom pa gzung// chos gang dri ma med

pa'i ngang// skyon gyis ma gos 'od gsal ba'i// rang gi mtshan nyid ma 'dres rdzogs// pad+ma rigs mchog sdom pa gzung// bla med byang chub sems kyi mchog thugs rje thabs rol cir yang snang// pha rol phyin
sogs chos thams cad// las kyi rigs mchog sdom pa gzung// mtha' yas sems can kun don phyir// byang chub mchog tu bdag sems bskyed// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi// ngan song
bdag gis bsgral bar bgyi// 'khor ba bdag gis grol bar bgyi// rgyu yis sa las dbugs dbyung bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gis byang chub mchog la dgog/ ces ni sdom pa gzung

bar bya// gzhan gyi bzhad pa dag gis kyang// sdom pa rab tu gzung ba'o// dam tshig thun mong khyad par gyis// thun mong dam tshig dran pa ni// nyams na gso bar khas blangs te// spyi yi dam tshig bzhin du

srung// khyad par dam tshig rnam bzhi ste// phyi nang khrus dang bya ba dang// ming tshig dag gis bar ma bcad// gzhan gyis mi thos klag pa dang// sems ni ma yengs gsol ba'o// de dag sngon 'gro'i yan lag
go/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste sum brgya gcig pa'o//// lam gyi yan lag gi skabs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma rA dzas gsol btab pa// gang zag
dbang po rab don du// mtshan ni mi rtog ye shes su// bltas te gdon pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pas bka 'a stsal pa// nyon cig gshin rje gshedakyi sras// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// stong pa

nyid kyi ngang las kyang// dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid bskyed// thugs khar nyi zla kha sbyor gyi// bar du a ni dkar po bsgom// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// don dam skye med brjod dang bral// ye
shes spros bral rang bzhin bsgom// de las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// chos nyid byang chub sems su sbyangs// bsdus te thim pas bdag nyid kyang// ye shes sgyu ma'i sku ru

bsgoms// skye med yi ge shel ltar dag shin tu gsal la dri med bsgom// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog don chen ye ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba

med// dngos po dag la mtshan brjod pas// thugs kha'i skye med yi ge de// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// stong pa nyid kyi rang sgra 'byung// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog des ni stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig
rten khams ni mtha' yas su// stong nyid rang gsal sgra bsgrags te// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// bdag dang 'khor dang chos thams cad// stong nyid rang sgra rig pa des// skye ba med cing 'gag pa
med// brjod du med cing tha snyad med// brtag tu med cing btung du med// thog ma med cing tha ma med// 'gyur ba med cing dngos po med// mya ngan 'das med 'khor ba'ang med// ngo bo nyid med bdag gzhan
med// yongs su shes par bya ba'ang med// rnam par rtog med mi rtog med// g.yo ba med cing mi g.yo med// gting zab brtag dka' ma bcos pa// blos ma rig cing sgrib med pa'i// rang gsal

dngos med dbyings su gsal// de ltar bsgom zhing brjod pa ni// nyin mtshan dus gsum rgyun du gdon// skyo ba mtshan gyi yang snying gis// stong nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas su// byas te langs la rjes thob

la// dngos po thams cad ye shes brgyan// chos nyid rol pa rang snang ba// bde stong dbyer med klong na gnas// de ltar bsgoms zhing lta byas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu thob// chos sku rnam dag thob gyur

na// longs spyod rdzogs sku ye shes kyis// rol pa'i rang snang sprul pa'i sku// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang// sems can rnams la mngon snang ngo// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// mtshan
mi rtog pa'i ye shes su bltas te gdon pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gnyis pa'o//// sras mchog gshin rjes yang gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// mtshan ni zab mo gsang sngags kyis// don du bltas
te gdon pa zhes// bgyi ba gang lags bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don bshad kyis legs par nyon// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa yi// dngos med stong nyid ngang las

kyang// sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i tshul gyis ni// nam mkha' dbyings kyi rang bzhin bsgoms// gsal ba skar ma lta bu yi// ye shes 'od zer las byung ba// hU~M ni sngon po 'od zer gyi// tshogs dang ldan par rab tu

bsgom// de las 'od zer dpag med pa'i// rtse mo la ni sangs rgyas sku// mang po rab tu 'phros pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don byas nas// slar 'dus hU~M la thim gyur pas// 'od du zhu bas rdo rje che/ kha dog

drug ldan rtse drug gyur// khro zhal drug gis rab mdzes pa'o// bum pa'i nang du b+h+ruM dkar las// rin po che yi mchod rten ni// stong gsum stong chen tshad tsam bsgom// mchod rten de yi bum nang du// ye ge hri la

chos 'byung bsam// de nas sna tshogs rdo rje yi// lte bar b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// rin chen lnga yi rtsig par bcas// 'don yon mchod pa'i lha mos 'khrigs// rin chen pha

gus rnam par mdzes// dra ba dra phyed dril bur bcas// dar bu kha dang pad+ma dang// rin chen ka ba za ra tshags// ta ra na da 'khor lo gdugs// rdo rje ye shes me rir ldan// de lta'i nang na srog chags
gdan// seng ge glang chen rta mchog dang// rma bya shang shang pad+ma yi// gdan rnams rab tu gsal bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi gdan stengs su// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las// rnam par snang mdzad gangs
chen mtsho// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// ral pa'i dbu brgyan rgyan med bsgom// de yi thugs kha zla stengs su// d+hi las dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// zhal lnga
phyag bzhi skyil krung bzhugs// sku mdog dkar po rgyan gyis brgyan// g.yas bzhi ral gri g.yon bzhi na// shes rab po ti bzhi yang bsnams// 'od gsal shin tu 'bar bar bsgom// de yi thugs khar bsgom

pa na// rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa ni// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis mtshon// sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bgrod pa yi// rang bzhin las byung shes rab kyi// 'khor lo lte mthar mu khyud bzhi// rtsibs drug kha dog

drug dang ldan// lte bar a dkar 'phro 'du las// a nyid las thim de stobs kyis// mu khyud nang la rtsa sngags dgod// rtsibs drug dang po nas brtsams te// sngags drug rang rang kha dog bzhin// phyi bskor mu

khyud nang ma la// yang snying 'phreng sngags dag gis bskor// phyi la sgra yig gsal byed sgom// de dbus ye shes thig le yi// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las// bcom ldan ye shes sems pa'i sku// zhal drug phyag

gnyis sprin dkar mdog zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// phyag g.yas ut+pal dmar po la// phyag g.yon ut+pal sngon po 'o// steng na shes rab po ti bsnams// yod pa zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// in+ta ni
la'i gtsug phud mdzes// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer 'bar// rgyan rnams rdzogs par rab tu bsgom// de yi thugs khar zla stengs su// don dam yi ge a dkar bsgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros
pas// sems can kun gyi sgrib bsal nas// tshur 'dus bdag lus snang bar bya// zhag drug dag nas 'od 'phros te// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// ye shes 'od kyis snang bar byas// de nas rdo rje

sgo drug nas/ kha dog drug gi 'od byung ste// sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad kun// ye shes 'od kyis snang byas na// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kun// mchod dang don byas slar 'dus te// ye shes rdo
rje de nyid la// lan gsum dag tu bskor byas nas// de nyid la ni rab bzhugs pas// bdag med chos nyid rtogs par byas// zla ba la gnas snying po dang// sngags dang gcig tu gyur par bsgom// des ni

sgrib pa ma lus pa// dag cing byang nas ye shes gsal// de ltar rgyun du ma yengs pa// bsgom zhing brjod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// tshe 'di ring por mi thogs par// sku dang zla ba a gsum gyi// sgo nas chos sku
longs spyod sku// sprul sku rnam gsum thob par 'gyur// thun mong dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi// sku dang zhing khams bsam yas mthong// spyan lnga mngon shes drug la sogs// phan yon ji bzhin thob par
'gyur// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gsum pa'o//// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rigs ni so

sor dbye ba yis// gdon thabs rnal 'byor rim pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// phyag rgya rdo rje dbyings kyi dal// byang sems rdo rje bsgom pa ni// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gdan stengs su// a ni dkar po
yongs gyur las// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// dkar po gzhon tshul skyil krung bzhugs// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan dang ldan cing// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes// phyag g.yas rdo rje gsor ba'i

tshul// phyag g.yon dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// de yi thugs khar dang por yi ge brgya// sangs rgyas gzhung bzhin bsgom par bya// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsgom// mu khyud sngags la sogs snga ma
bzhin// rtsibs la a ra pa tsa dgod// lte bar a dkar gyur pa la// a ra pa tsa ye shes sems// dkar po gzhon nu zur phud lnga// rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs ldan// g.yas pa ral gri po ti
g.yon// skyil krung bzhugs pa'i thugs khar a// dkar po las ni ye shes kyi// 'od zer 'phro 'du de bzhin bya// de ltar gsal bas mtshan brjod pa// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// shes pa dag

nas rab brtsams te// theg pa chen po tshul gyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// sgo nas rnam bar snang mdzad kyi// dkyil 'khor la

bstod rnal 'byor gyis// a ni 'od du zhu ba las// rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// rdo rje skyil mo krung dang ldan// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom// de thugs
'khor lo rtsibs bcu dkar// rtsibs la dz+nya na mu rti dgod// lte bar a las ye shes sems// shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba// dkar po gzhon nu rgyan gyis mdzes// phyag g.yas ral gri 'khor lo g.yon// thugs

khar zla stengs a dkar po// ye shes 'od zer 'phro 'du ni// de bzhin byas te mtshan brjod pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// zhes

pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi// sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// hU~M 'od du zhu ba las mi bskyod pa sngon po sa

gnon phyag rgya can// de thugs dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// thugs khar 'khor la rtsibs brgyad sngo// rtsibs la du kha rtse sogs dgod// lte bar hU~M las ye shes sems// rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba// sngon po gzhon
nu zur phud lnga// g.yas g.yon rdo rje ral gri 'dzin// thugs khar zla ba hU~M sngon po// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya zhing brjod// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ces pa dag nas rab brtsams

te// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis// sgo nas snang ba mtha' yas kyis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rim pa

ni// dbus su hri ni dmar po las// snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bsgom// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dmar// badzra ti k+ShaN

'bru brgyad dgod// de dbus hri dmar 'od zhu las// rdo rje non po ye shes sems// na bza' rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// zur phud lnga pa skyil krung bzhugs// ral gri pad+ma g.yas g.yon 'dzin// thugs khar
zla dal hri dmar po// 'phro 'du bya zhing mtshan brjod pa// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// ces pa dag nas rab brtsams te// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal// zhes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las

gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// sgo nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// de 'od zhu las oM ser po// gyur pa rin chen 'byung ldan ni// ser po mchog sbyin

phyag rgya can/ dang po'i sangs rgyas de bzhin bsgom// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bA gI shwa ra 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar oM ni ser po las// ngag gi dbang phyug ye shes sems// sha za rgyan rdzogs

zur phud lnga// phyag g.yas ral gri rin chen g.yon// thugs khar zla ba oM ser las// 'phro 'du sbar zhing mtshan brjod pa// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// nor bu chen po
rin chen tog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// sgo nas don yod grub pa yis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rnal 'byor ni// de 'od zhu bas a

ljang khu// de las don yod grub pa sku// ljang khu mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ljang// dz+nyA na kA ya 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar a ni ljang khu

las// ye shes sku can ye shes sems// ljang khu rgyan rdzogs zur phud lnga// phyag ni g.yas g.yon ral gri dang// rdo rje rgya gram bsnams par bsgom// thugs khar zla stengs a ljang las// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya
zhing brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba'i// zhes dag nas ni rab brtsams te// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de ltar rgyun du bstod byas nas// yon tan
'bras bu bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las// rigs so sor phye

ba'i le'u ste sum brgya bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngon du bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rnam snang chen po la sogs te// rigs bsdus nyid du bsgom byas na// don dam skye med snying po las// ye

shes 'od zer rnam drug 'phros// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// 'od zer mthing kha ye shes sems// zhal nas mthing kha dag nas byung// 'khor lo rtsibs mthing nas brgyud te// dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal mthing

byung// shar phyogs stong chen 'jig rten khams// dpag tu med par rab 'phros pas// sems can kun gyi zhe sdang sbyangs// sdug bsngal sgrib pa dag par byas// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer ser po

de bzhin 'phros// zhal ser nas su rtsibs ser brgyud// lho phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams kyis dpag med khyab// sems can kun gyi nga rgyal sbyangs// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi// 'od
zer dmar po de bzhin 'phros// zhal dmar nad byung rtsibs dmar brgyud// nub phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// dpag tu med par khyab pa yi// sems can kun gyi 'dod chags sbyangs// bya ba nan tan ye
shes kyi// 'od zer ljang khu dpag med 'phros// zhal ljang nas byung rtsibs ljang brgyud// byang phyogs stong gsum 'jigs rten khams// stong chen dpag tu med par khyab// sems can kun gyi phrag dog
sbyangs// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer dkar po dpag med 'phros// zhal dkar nas byung rtsibs dkar brgyud// 'og phyogs stong chen dpag tu med// 'jig rten khams rnams kun khyab pas// sems

can kun gyi gti mug sbyangs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// 'od zer dkar po tshad med 'phros// zhal dkar nang byung rtsibs dkar brgyud// steng phyogs stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams ni
dpag med 'phros// sems can theg tshogs sdug bsngal sbyangs// nyon mongs bag chags rtsad nas sbyangs// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag/ 'gro don yid bzhin byas nas kyang// slar 'dus rdo rje chen po
la// lan gsum bskor te rang rang gi/ rang gi sgo nas nang du 'dus pa las// ye shes 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// thim pas shes rab 'khor lo dang// drag cing myur du 'khor ba yis// bdag gi chags sdang
nyon mongs ku// bcad cing thal ba bzhin dang rlag/ sgrib pa bag chags bcad nas sbyangs// ye shes sgrib med lhun gyis grub// nyon mongs gcod cing 'khor ba sbyong// ye shes sgrib med 'khor lo yin// de
ltar rgyun du gsal ba las// mtshan rnams rdzogs par brjod par bya// yang na 'dud tsho sngags rings gdon// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ tshe 'dir ring po mi thogs par// dngos grub la

sogs byin rlabs ni// phan yon bzhin du nges par 'byung// bzhi dang dang po'i sangs rgyas dang// shes rab 'khor lo ye shes yin// a dang zla ba 'phro 'du yis// chos sku sprul sku longs spyod rdzogs// rdo rje'i

sku dang longs spyod rdzogs// ngo bo nyid sku thob par 'gyur// the tshom med de slu med nges// de bzhin gsang ba'i mchog tu bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs yang dag pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i

rgyud chen po khri drug stong pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste sum brgya lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba'i// zab mo gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bshad// rang bzhin rnam
par dag pa yi// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid ni// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// rdo rje mchod rten gzhal yas sogs// rigs bsdus bzhin du bsgom par bya// shes rab 'khor lo'i lte ba la// nyi

zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// skye med dag pa'i snying po las// rigs bsdus ye shes sems dpa' bskyed// de yi thugs kyi snying po las// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// rtsibs drug 'bru drug rab 'phros
pas// shar rtsibs sngon por hU~M sngon 'phros// nub rtsibs dmar por hri dmar 'phros// byang rtsibs ljang khur a ljang 'phros// 'og rtsibs dkar por a dkar 'phros// steng rtsibs dkar por a dkar

'phros// 'bru drug yongs su gyur pa las// shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje ral gri ye shes sems// me long ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// lho yi rtsibs la rin chen rigs// ngag gi dbang phyug ye shes

sems// mnyam nyid ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma'i rigs// rdo rje rnon po ye shes sems// kun rtog ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// byang gi rtsibs la las kyi rigs// ye shes sku can ye shes

sems// nan tan ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// 'og gi rtsibs la de bzhin rigs// shes rab ye shes ye shes sems// stong nyid ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// steng rtsibs byang sems rdo rje'i rigs// a ra pa tsa ye

shes sems// chos dbyings ye shes phyag rgya bsgom// de dag rang rang sngags kyis skyed// dbus kyi thugs kyi snying po las// ye shes drug gi 'od zer byung// ye shes sems dpa'i zhal mthing nas// me long ye

shes 'od sngon byung// rdo rje ral gri'i thugs la brgyud// de 'phros dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi// zhal mthing nas byung gzhal yas khang// rdo rje po yi shar nas 'phros// 'od zer mthing kha'i rtse mo la// mi bskyed
sangs rgyas sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu 'jig rten bsam yas khyab// sems can kun gyi sgrib pa sbyangs// khyad par zhe sdang dag par sbyangs// de bzhin ye shes sangs rgyas kyi// zhal mthun sgo
dang phyogs mthun 'phros// mnyam nyid ye shes 'od zer byung// ngag gi dbang phyug thugs la brgyud// 'od zer lhor 'phros rtse mo la// rin chen 'byung ldan sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can

rnams// khyad par 'dod chags dag par byas// nan tan ye shes 'od ljang byung// ye shes sku can thugs la brgyud// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can rnams// khyad par phrag dog dag par sbyangs// stong nyid ye
shes 'od dkar byung// shes rab ye shes thugs la brgyud// 'od dkar 'og 'phros rtse mo la// rnam par snang mdzad sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu kun khyab sems can rnams// khyad par gti mug dag par
sbyangs// chos dbyings ye shes 'od dkar byung// byang sems rdo rje'i sku bzhugs pa// phyogs bcu stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas su// sku dang 'od zer dpag med khyab// de nas
sems can thams cad kyi// sgrib pa nyon mongs bag chags kun// ma lus dag cing byang bar 'gyur// yid bzhin bde thob don byas te// de nas 'od zer tshur bsdus nas// rdo rje chen po lan gsum

bskor// rang rang sgo nas tshur zhugs te// rang rang ye shes sems la bstims// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs drug gi/ rtse la ye ge 'bru drug gnas// steng rtsibs a gnas 'og rtsibs du// shar rtsibs nri la lho

rtsibs su// nub rtsibs hri gnas byang rtsibs pri// nyon mongs drug gi snying po ste// 'gro ba drug gi sa bon yin// rang rang kha dog ldan par bsgom// de las 'od 'phros lus kun khyab// bdag gi nyon mongs

rnam pa drug yig 'bru drug la bsdus te bstim// de nas shes rab 'khor lo de// shin tu drag cing myur bar 'khor// yig 'bru drug bcad rdul phran tsam// brlag cing the shul med par byas// de ltar rgyun du

gsal bsgom te// 'od zer dbus kyi snying por 'dus// chos sku byang chub sems su gsal// rtsa sngags ye shes snying po dang// ye snying sbrel te rgyun du bzlas// 'dud tshe nyi shus bstod pa bya// yang na mtshan ni
rdzogs par mdzod// bdag don gzhan don gnyis 'grub ste// yang gsang shes rab 'khor lo ni// bskor ba'i lam shes rnam par bshad// thun mong thams cad thugs khar bsdu// yang snying sngags kyi stong pa

nyid// dang po'i sangs rgyas spyod lam bya'o// 'dis ni thun mong mchog nyid kyi// dngos grub myur du 'thob 'gyur ro// thun mong dngos grub phan yon las// 'byung ba bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// tshe ring nad
med longs spyod 'phel// rigs brgyud dar zhing ci bsam 'grub// chos skyong mkha' 'gro la sogs te// mthu stobs can rnams las byed sprul// bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon du

mthong// gzhan yang sangs rgyas sras bcas mthong// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ spyan lnga dbang phyug stobs bcur ldan// mchog ni mi tshe 'di nyid kyi// skye med spros bral chos kyi sku// yon tan kun

rdzogs longs spyod sku// sna tshogs rang snang sprul pa'i sku// 'dus ma byas pa rdo rje'i sku// lhun rdzogs mngon par byang chub sku// snying po ngo bo nyid kyi sku// thob nas sangs rgyas sar bzhugs te// 'gro ba rnams la

mngon snang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rgyud chen po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ yang gsang bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum brgya drug pa'o//// ya ma rA dzas
yang gsol pa/ kye ho rdo rje 'chang chen dpal// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ni che ba'i yon tan du// bltas te gdon pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mtshan ni che ba'i
yon tan du// bltas te gdon pa bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje'i 'chang chen gyis// mtshan ni che ba'i yon tan tu// bltas te gdon pa 'di bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho// yon tan ldan

zhing yon tan shes// de brjod bla med byang chub thob// de don rgyas pa 'di lta ste// rang bzhin stong chen ngang nyid las// dang po'i sangs rgyas gsal bar bskyed// sa gzhi rin chen sna lngar grub// shar phyogs
baiDUr+Ya las grub// lho phyogs rin chen gser las grub// nub phyogs pad+ma rA gar ldan// byang phyogs ljang khu dbyig las grub// dbus ni man shel dag par gsal// de dkyil rin chen las grub
pa'i// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// dpangs mtho g.yur za sdong por 'brel// yal ga lo 'dab me tog 'bras// thams cad rin po che las grub// 'od 'phro byang chub shing de yi// dkyil stod seng ge

bsnol ba'i khri// nyi zla pad+ma dar gyi gdan// rgyu yi theg pa chen po'i lugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mtshan dper ldan// btso ma'i gser mdog rgyan bltams ldan// g.yas pa mchog sbyin ut+pal g.yon// de
ltar 'khor dang ldan par bsgom// 'bras bu gsang sngags lugs nyid kyi// sku mdog ston ka'i zla ltar dkar// dri med ye shes 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal drug mthing zer dmar ljang dkar// phyag gnyis rdo rje
bsdams pa yis// ut+pal sngon dmar rtsa nas bzung// ut+pal snyan gyi thad kar bslebs// steng na shes rab po ti bsnams// mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// ye shes
'od zer 'bar zhing 'phro// sku ni lta bas chog mi shes// zhi ba'i tshul bcu ldan par bsgom// steng phyogs shing chen yal ga la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das// chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// mtshan dpe rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// 'khor gyis yongs bskor 'od 'phro bsgom// g.yas phyogs shing chen yal ga la// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su// sa la gnas
pa'i byang chub che// sems dpa' sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs// mchod sbyin phyag rgyar ldan pa la// rgyan rdzogs 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// g.yon phyogs dpag bsam yal ga la// 'phags pa nyan thos
rang rgyal tshogs// phyag gnyis thal mo snying khar sbyar// 'jam dpal la ni 'dud par bsgom// 'og gi phyogs na 'jig rten lha// tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs te// thams cad dpag bsam yal ga la// 'jus
nas bskor te rgyan du blta// de ltar bskor te bzhugs par bsgom// dpag bsam shing gi mtha' bskor nas/ khams gsum pa yi lha yi bu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// phyag na mchod pa sna
tshogs thogs// mchod pa'i spos sprin dud pa las// zag med char ni zim bur 'bab// de ltar zhing khams chen po cig rab tu gsal bar bsgom byas te// de yi dbus na bzhugs pa yi// 'jam dpal ye
shes sems dpa' de// yon tan bdag po'i gzhir bzhag ste// mtshan ni brgyad brgya bcu gnyis kyi// yon tan sgo nas bstod byas pas// dper na brjod pa tsam gyis ni// me bus sma ra 'tshig pa bzhin// phar
stod tshur ni dngos grub 'byung// rje btsun dbu yi dpral ba nas// ye shes 'od zer dkar po byung// bdag gi dpral bar thim gyur bas// lus kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// sku yi dngos grub thob par
bsam// rje btsun mgur gyi bum pa nas// ye shes 'od zer dmar po byung// bdagagi mgrin par thim gyur pas// ngag gi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// gsung gi dngos grub tho par bsam// rje btsun thugs kyi
dpal be'u nas// ye shes 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros// bdag gi snying khar thim gyur nas// sems kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam// de ltar rtag tu bsgom bya zhing// dus
gsum mtshan ni brjod byas na// zag med bde ba rgyud la skye// dper na me long 'od zer gyis// spra ba la sogs 'tshig pa bzhin// 'jam dpal dpa' bo ye shes kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// ye
shes 'od zer gsum 'phros pas// lus ngag yid gsum mtshan ma dang// sgrib pa ma lus kun sreg sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bstims// rdo rje mchog tu byin brlabs te// lus ni ye shes sgyu ma'i
lus// chu zla'am 'ja' tshon ji bzhin du// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// ngag ni sgrib med gsal ba'i ngag/ khrag cha'i rnam pa ji bzhin du// grag stong dbyer med dag par bsgom// yid ni

gsal la rtog sgrib med// sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma bzhin// rang rig byang chub sems su bsgom// de ltar rgyun du bsgom bya zhing// mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya'o// de nas skyo 'am thun gtong na// mtshan

ni yang snying brjod byas pas// stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal bya// de nas bdag nyid dang po yi// sangs rgyas nyid du langs nas kyang// spyod lam rnal 'byor dam pa brgyad// rtag pa rgyun du nus tshad bya'o// de lta bu yi
rnal 'byor gyis/ thun mong mchog go dngos grub kyang// mi ring ba ni thob gyur te// gdon bgegs la sogs 'tshe mi byed// chos skyong rnams bsrungs skye bos 'khur// tshe ring nad med longs spyod
'phel// bsod nams che zhing ci bsam 'grub// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma ru// bsgom pa'i de nyid zhing khams mthong// gzhan yang bde gshegs sems dpa' 'ang mthong// lung ston chos 'chad thob par

'gyur// bla med byang chub rab kyis thob// 'bring gi 'jam dpal zhal mthong ste// phyir ni 'khor bar ldog mi 'gyur// tha mas lha mi khyad par med// chos spyod skal ldan byang chub thob// tshe 'di nyid la thob
'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// mtshan che ba'i yon tan du bltas te gdon pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bdun no//// rang bzhin gyi skabs so//// de
nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// rang bzhin rnam dag ye shes sku// bde chen yon tan mchog gi sku// sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sku// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dang// dpa'
bo gcig pa'i bsgom pa nyid// rnam par bkod pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sras mchog gshin rje rgyal po khyod// dpa' bo'i bsgom pa zhus pa

na// skye med chos sku byang chub sems// 'gag med ye shes rol par shar// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// ngo bo phyag rgya chen por gsal// thugs rje phyogs med nyi ltar khyab// de yi sgom rim rnam par

dgod// dbang thob dam tshig 'du 'dzi spongs// bla ma mnyes mchod dang ldan pas// dben cing nyams dga' byin che ba// bkra shis bar chad med gnas su// rnam dag sngags chus phyi khrus bya// stong nyid lhag

mos nang khrus bya// bde ba'i stan la skyil krung 'dug/ phyi nang snod bcud dag par sbyangs// dang po'i sangs rgyas rnam par bsgom// thugs khar zla stengs hU~M bsam la// khro bo dpag med spros byas la// gdug
pa can rnams tshar bcad de// 'dus pa zhe sdang rdo rjer bsam// thugs khar rdo rje rtse gsum rdengs// nyi ma la gnas hU~M gis mtshan// des ni bdag nyid srung ba'o// de nas lta byed g.yas g.yon
la// ma dang a las nyi zlar gyur// nub byang mtshams nas bskor bltas pas// nyi mas kun bsregs zla bas so// oM badzra yak+Sha hU~M phaT brjod/ lus sems ngag gi las bya'o// phyogs mtshams rdo rje ra ba
dang// dra bar brlabs cing mtshams bcad do// de ltar bgegs rnams tshar bcad de// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kha yi// zla stengs a las 'od 'phros te// sangs

rgyas la sogs spyan drangs bsgom// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig pa sbyang// yi rangs sems skyed skyabs 'gro zhing// dge bsngo 'dud tshogs nyi shus bstod// sdom pa rab tu gzung bar bya// de dag bsod nams
tshogs shes bya// ye shes tshogs kyi rang bzhin ni// sangs rgyas la sogs bdag thugs bsdu// skye med ye shes me 'bar bas// nyon mongs lus bsregs stong par bsgom// de yi ngang las ye shes

sems// zhal drug phyag gnyis shel ltar dag ye shes lnga yi bye brag gis// byang chub rnam lnga bsgom pa ni// chos rnams dag la rang bzhin med// gzugs brnyan me long ye shes bsgom// dngos med rang bzhin
rnam par dag dmigs med stong nyid ye shes bsgom// dag pa'i ngang las bzang ngan med// khyab gsal mnyam nyid ye shes bsgom// rang gi mtshan nyid sgrib med gsal// ngo bo nyid las ma g.yos pas// kun
rtog chos dbyings ye shes bsgom// rang dbang gyur pas sems can don// byas med yongs rdzogs mthar phyin pas// bya ba nan tan ye shes bsgom// mgon med sdug bsngal bde bar bsgral// sems can la
dmigs snying rje bsgom// bdag med rang bzhin stong nyid dag chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje bsgom// bdag gzhan gnyis med ngo bo nyid// dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje bsgom// mdor na ngo bo cir snang

yang// rang bzhin chos dbyings dag par gsal// 'phags pa 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum brgya brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dpa' bo gcig
pa'i sgom rims bshad// ye shes rang snang gzugs byung ba// rang rig rang snang rnam pa ni// a yongs gyur las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// de 'og pam dkar sna tshogs pad+ma// gdan stengs d+hi ser spro bsdu
las// ral gri d+his mtshan yongs su gyur// de las gser mdog gzhon nu'i tshul// rin chen brgyan mdzes ldem bag can// gsal 'tsher rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan zur phud
lnga// g.yas g.yon ral gri po ti bsnams// ye shes sku ste gzha' ltar gsal// gzhi yi sangs rgyas ting 'dzin gyis// mdun mthing g.yas ser rgyab dmar po// g.yon ljang dbus steng dkar po'i

zhal// g.yas bzhi ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul// g.yon bzhi shes rab po ti bzhi// sna tshogs brgyan mdzes dbu rgyan lnga// dang po'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bsgom// thugs khar a yongs gyur pa las// shes rab
'khor lo mu khyud bzhi// rtsibs drug lte bar yi ge a// rtsibs la ye shes sngags drug gnas// dmar po dkar ljang ser dkar drug/ brti tigaShaN nas brtsams te// a ra pa tsa'i bar du dgod// sngags dang

rtsibs kyi kha dog 'thun// mu khyud dang por rtsa ba'i sngags// mu khyud gnyis la dbyangs bcu gnyis// mu khyud gsum par sku yi sngags// mu khyud mtha' mar ka nas ha// mthar thug yi ge de rnams dgod// shes
rab 'khor lo ting 'dzin no// 'khor lo'i lte dbus zla stengs kyi// a dkar yongs su gyur pa las// bcom ldan ye shes sems pa'i sku// rang rig rang snang zla gsal mdog/ zhal drug rdo rje'i skyil krung

bzhugs// phyag gnyis rin chen sna tshogs brgyan// dbus dkar shar mthing lho shang ser// nub dmar byang ljang steng zhal dkar// zhi ba mdzes pa gzhon nu'i tshul// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang ldan// ye shes
sems dpa'i ting 'dzin no// de thugs dri med zla ba mchog/ de dkyil ye shes ngo bo nyid// skye med yi ge a dkar bsgom// sangs rgyas thams cad de las byung// sangs rgyas sku rnams sku yin te// shes rab
'khor lo gsung yin no// a dang yig 'bru drug la thim// 'od du zhu bas sku ru gyur// de bzhin lte ba'i a la thim// yongs gyur ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// sngags drug rkang thon brjod pa las// dbus su
rigs bsdus ye shes sems// gong bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya// hri las rdo rje rnon po'i sku mdog dmar// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri pad+ma dmar po bsnams// kun rtog ye shes rang shar

sku// pad+ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// hU~M las sdug bsngal gcod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri rdo rje mthing kha 'dzin// me long ye shes rang snang sku// rdo

rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// a las shes rab ye shes sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri 'khor lo dkar po 'dzin// stong nyid ye shes rang snang sku// de

bzhin rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// a las shes rab ye shes sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang// phyag na ut+pal sngon dmar la// ral gri rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin// bya grub ye shes rang snang sku// las
kyi rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// oM las ngag gi dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// mnyam nyid ye shes

rang snang sku// rin chen rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// a las a ra pa tsa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar la gdangs// phyag na ut+pal sngo dmar la// ral gri shes rab po ti 'dzin// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye

shes sku// byang chub sems kyi sangs rgyas bsgom// de dag ye shes bye brag ste// byang chub sems las gzhan med do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgya pa las// 'khor lo bskyed pa'i le'u ste
sum brgya bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsgom rim sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang bzhin skye med snying po las// ye shes sgrib med 'od 'phros pas// chos dbyings rnam dag pho brang

nas// de bzhin ye shes spros med sku// snang la rang bzhin med par gsal// phyag rgya bzhi yis spyan drangs la// bdag mdun gsal bsgoms mchod pa dbul// oM shri many+dzu Ar+ya dz+nyA na sa twa ya/ oM A:hU~M hri aM a/

zhes pa dag la mchod sngags gdags/ gtor ma dag ni rgyun du btang// sgra snyan bdud rtsi nyi shus bstod// dzaHhU~M baM hos bstim par bya/ sngags rings bar du sngags drug ldeb/ thun mgor brgya stong rgyun du
bzlas// rgyun sngags drug po rtag tu bzlas// dus gsum dag tu mtshan yang brjod// 'khor la 'khor zhing rnam rtog gcod// ye shes 'od zer nyon mongs sbyong// de la ma yengs gsal bsgoms bzlas// byin
rlabs dngos grub thams cad 'byung// skye med thugs kyi yi ge las// 'od 'phros rigs drug thugs khar thim// 'dus nas ye shes sku gsal byas// nyon mongs rtog sgrib ma lus bcom// de thugs drug nas
ye shes 'od// snying po las ni thun 'phros pas// dang po bzhi yi sangs rgyas sku// gsal byas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// kun khyab 'gro drug sgrib pa sbyangs// chos dbyings gting mtha' med khyab
pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs khar thim// mchod phul rgyud bskul dngos grub bsdus// slar 'dus rim par thim zhing bsdu// ye shes skye med thig ler thim// bdag sgrib nyon mongs kun sbyangs te// sku
gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// ring por mi thogs myur thob 'gyur// gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu gsum
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// rdzogs rim mtshan med bsgom pa bshad// de nas a las 'od 'phros te// sangs rgyas zhing khams kun khyab nas// ye shes bcud blangs tshur 'dus te// gzhi yi
sangs rgyas la sogs rnams// rim pas ye shes 'od du zhu// a nyid thig le phra mor gsal// thig le stong nyid byang chub sems// bde ba chen po thams cad 'dus// chos sku rang rig dag par

gsal// yul la mi rtog g.yo ba med// gsal la rtog med 'dzin dang bral// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun// chu zla bzhin du rang bzhin med// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid// nam mkha' bzhin du spros dang bral// ma nor spros med rtag yul med// med nyid sna tshogs rang snang bas// de las gzhan pa'i chos med do// de lta bu yi rang bzhin la// shes pa bying rgod med pa
yis// ma yengs rtag tu gnas par bya// sems nyid rang bzhin yin zhes na// chos nyid ngang gnas shes bya// de ltar yun rings gnas pa dang// du ba smig sgyu gzugs brnyan dang// srin bu me khyer mar me

'bar// mtshan ma rnam drug 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar mthong ba'i yon tan ni// thun mong dngos grub kun 'byung ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbang bskur byin gyis rlob par byed// chos
skyong mgon po srung ma rnams// bsrung skyobs la sogs las kun byed// mkha' 'gro rnams dang ma mo rnams// dge ste dngos grub byin rlabs ster// 'jig rten dregs pa sde brgyad rnams// gang bcol las
rnams thogs med sgrub// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha dang khro bo thams cad kun// de yi dgos pa sgrub par byed// tshe ring nad med longs spyod 'phel// ci bsam thams cad nges par

'grub// phyi mar 'bras bu rab 'bring mtha'// rab kyis chos sku thob bar 'gyur// 'bring gis ye shes sgyu ma'i lus// snang la rang bzhin med par thob// mtha' mas lha mi khyad par can// bde gshegs 'byung

dang nges par 'phrad// de tshe 'phes nas mngon sangs rgyas// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsrung

bzlog yang dag lam 'di bshad// sngon du bya ba'i rim pa rnams// rdzogs nas rang bzhin stong pa nyid// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid las// b+h+ruM ni yongs su gyur pa las// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu dmar ser

bsgom// de yi lte bar b+h+ruM las ni// gzhal yas khang ni gsal bar bsgom// de dbus rang rang snying po las// dang po sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang// ye shes sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// thugs khar nyi gdan hU~M

mthing bsam// rtsibs bcu nyi ma pad+ma'i gdan// steng du hU~M las hU~M bcu 'phros// de las rang rang skur bskyed pa// shar du gshin rje thar byed mthing// lho ru shes rab mthar byed dkar// nub tu pad+ma mthar byed
dmar// byang du bgegs ni mthar byed sngo// lho shar 'dod pa'i rgyal po mthing// lho nub dbyug pa sngon po sngo// nub byang stobs chen sngo nag la// byang shar mi g.yo sngo ljang ba// steng du gtsug

tor 'khor lo ser// 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nag/ tho ba lcags kyu dbyug pa dang// dbyug sngon pad+ma kha T+wAM ga rdo rje kha gdangs ral gri dang// rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas na bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub

zhags pa can// sgreg dang khros pa rgyan gyis brgyan// hU~M las 'od zer rab 'phros te// 'od las rigs kyi khro bor 'thon// rang la gang gnod thams cad kun// rang dbang med par dgug byas te// rang gi cha
lugs mtshan mar bcas// 'khor lo'i rtse la rab tu dgod// yang na bdud bzhi de bzhin las// 'khor lo drag tu 'khor ba yis// 'od zer me lce'i mtshon cha ni// sna tshogs tsha tshwa ltar 'phros pas// dmigs

pa thal ba rdul du rlags// thed shul tsam yang med par gyur// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bsgom// gzhan yang srung ba'i rim pa ni// gang la bsrung bar bya ba de// gzhal yas khang ni nang du bsam// 'khor lo
drag tu bskor gyur pas// 'od zer khro tshogs gtams shing 'khrigs// nad dang bgegs dang rbod gtong sogs// gnod par byed pa gang yin rnams// bcad cing gtubs te thal bar rlags// ming

rus thugs kyi snying por sba// de ltar gsal bar bsgom byas na// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rjer 'gyur// rbod gtong drag po phyir zlog cig mngon spyod 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong

pa'i rgyud las// khro bo bcu'i bsrung bzlog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang nyid las// b+h+ruM las 'khor lo rtsibs chen bcu// mtshon

cha sngon po 'bar bar bsgrom// lte bar gzhal yas khang sogs bsgom// de nas dang po'i sangs rgyas dang// 'khor lo ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// thugs kha'i hU~M ni mthing nag pa// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la hU~M

bcu spro// de dag yongs gyur sku ru bskyed// shar du rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed// lho ru gzhon nu gdong drug pa'o// nub tu stobs ldan spyan drug pa'o// byang du rdo rje mche gtsigs skyed// shar lho rdo rje rgyal po

bskyed// lho nub rdo rje drag po bskyed// nub byang rdo rje snying po bskyed// byang shar rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed// 'og tu rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed// steng du gshin rje gshed chen po// rang rang rgyan dang chu lugs

dang// phyag rgya can de dpa' sgeg khro// gtum rngam dus mtha'o me ltar 'bar// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgoms nas// hU~M las 'od 'phros khro bo'i tshogs// sprul pa dpag med rab spros te// bsgrub byar rang
dbang med par dgug/ mtshon cha drag po'i 'khor lo de// shin tu myur zhing drag 'khor bas// gang gi dang rig sngags sogs// gcad cing gtubs te thal bar rlag/ des ni gang yang nges par

sgrol// de bzhin gnod byed gang yin la// bskor bas bdag 'khor la sogs kun// cis kyang mi shig rdo rjer 'gyur// rdo rje khros pa'i 'khor lor bshad// 'jam dpal gshin rje kyi gsang ba khri drug stong pa'i

rgyud las// rdo rje khros pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum brgya bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yang dag de bzhin nyid las ni// b+h+ruM ni ljang nag yongs gyur pas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs
bcu bsgom// lte bar gzhal yas khang dbus su// sangs rgyas 'khor lo ye shes sems// rang rang rnam pa gsal bar bsgom// hU~M las rtsibs bcu'i gdan stengs su// hU~M bcu spros la skur bskyed pa// shar du

kong rtse brag gyon rje// shar lhor a ba glang mgo rje// lho ru ya ba yang rting rje// lho nub khro bo gcod sbyong rje// nub tu khro bo dmigs pa rje// nub byang khro bo te ba rje// byang rdo rje bdud 'joms rje// byang shar chos

kyi rgyal po rje// 'og tu khro bo thod dbyug rje// steng du khro bo nag 'joms rje// kun kyang rgyan dang cha lugs dang// dpa' sgeg khro gtum rngam zhing 'jigs// phyag rgya sna tshogs gar dang ldan// dus mtha' bskal
pa'i me ltar 'bar// sprul pa dpag med 'gyed par bsgom// thugs kyi ye shes khros pa las// ye shes 'od zer sna tshogs spros// dmigs pa gang yin sngon bkug ste// 'khor lo shin tu drag 'khor

bas// bsgrub bya ma lus gcod cing 'thub// me lce mtshon cha sna tshogs dang// thog zer tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// rdul phran tsam du brlag par 'gyur// phyir zlog ces byar gyur pa yin// gzhan yang dmigs pa
