med// rgyas pa lo 'dab lta bu ste// stong phrag brgyad cu chos kyi sgo// gang la ci 'dul theg pa'i grangs// sna tshogs rang snang grub pa'i mtha'// rig pa 'gag med 'char ba la// gsal ba me tog lta bu ste// sna

tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams la// mi mthun med pa gcig med pas// thams cad kun gyi dngos gzhi la// phyogs gcig rgya chad med pa'o// smin pa 'bras bu lta bu ste// yang dag nges don snying po ste// rtogs pa
mngon gyur ye shes gsal// sku gsum lhun gyis rdzogs pa ste// yon tan ma lus 'char ba dang/ zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rang byung snying po yang dag pas// nges don rtogs thabs bshad du
gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rang byung don gyi snying po'i mchog/ rtogs thabs nges don rnam pa lnga// gzer bdun man ngag nges par bdun// don brda thag bcad gtan la dbab// nges pa'i don

ltar mdo bsdu ba// rang byung snying po mnyam pa nyid// yang dag phyogs med lta ba dang// gzhi nyid mngon rtogs nyams blangs pa// ma yengs rgyun gsal bsgom pa dang// blang dor byang med lhug pa yin// don
las mi bzla spyod pa dang// rtogs pa mngon gyur mthar phyin pas// sku gsum lhun rdzogs 'bras bu dang// de dag ma 'khrul ma nor bar// gtan la dbab pa'i gtan tshigs so// gtan la
dbab pa'i gzer bstan ni// gzhi med dngos med rtsol bral ba// snying po rang byung lhun grub gzer// yul med rig pa rang gsal ba// chos rnams shes rab spyan rdzogs gzer// rang sems ma yengs ting nge
'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob gnyis med gzer// nyams blangs ma 'khrul chos skur rtogs// g.yo goms mthar phyin nams kyi gzer// rang sems 'khrul med mngon gyur pas// yon tan ma btsal lhun
grub gzer// don ma rtogs pas lta gdong med// bsgoms dang don med 'khrul ba'i gzer// shes rab don gsal tshad ma yis// rang skyabs phyir rgol tshar bcad gzer// yang dag man ngag nges don
bdun// chos rnams rang byung snying por gcig rang babs gnas pas rtsol byed nges// sangs rgyas sems can gyur cig ces// gnyis su med de gcig par nges// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa kun// gzhi gcig
lhun grub snying por nges// bdag gzhan bzang ngan blang dor med// yang dag mnyam pa nyid du nges// mnyam gzhag rjes thob dbyings med pas// bsgom yod bsgom med gnyis med nges// don rtogs 'khrul
dang ma 'khrul med// dug lnga ye shes lngar dag nges// rang sems sangs rgyas gnyis med pas// rtogs pa mngon 'gyur 'bras bur nges// nges don gzer dang man ngag rnams// gtan la phebs pa'i gtan

tshigs ni// ma 'khrul mi slu rtog bral ba'i// yang dag rigs shes tshad ma yis// ma nor nges par gtan la dbab// snar stegs chos sku'i dbyings nyid de// mthong ba mi mthun du ma'i phyir// rang bzhin skye ba

med pa'i phyir// snang ba ma nges pa yi phyir// thams cad snying po byang chub las// gzhan gyi chos ni gcig med de// snying po byang chub chos kyi sems// ye shes gnas pa'i chos nyid de// ma btsal lhun gyis grub

pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// nges don man ngag gi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu drug go/ de nas ya ma ra dza yis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen la// pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad

gsol// khro bcu gsang ba'i sdebs zhes pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis bshad gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// khro bcu gsang sdebs mthar thug pa// drag sngags ngas bshad khyod nyon cig/ rang byung

chos sku dag pa las// ye shes rol pa phyag rgyar snang// de nyid khro bdag 'bar ba'i sku// de yi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a ne a ne a ne/ oM badzra shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha rA

dza ya/ badzra sa ta ni rma ka ya/ ma hA kro d+ha tsaN+Da kro d+ha kro d+ha rA dza ya/ u ne u ne u ne/ bag bag to ma hA shri he ru ka badzra ma hA pa la ti u u u/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M ka ra badzra sa tang/ badzra kro d+ha uSh+Shi Sha tsakra

wa rti/ badzra kro d+he ya man+ta krita dza ma rA dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha pradz+nyA ta krita ma hA ba la ya/ badzra kro d+ha pad+ma ta krita tsan d+ha rak+Sha ya/ badzra kro d+ha big nan ta krita a mri ta ra dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha TaMk+ki rA dza ya bi dza ya/ badzra kro d+ha

ma hA ba la u tra ya/ badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da kri ta ya/ badzra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la tsan d+ha ya/ badzra kro d+ha sum pa ra dza tiSh+Thi ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ u ne u ne u ne/ kA ya bAg tsit+ta badzra naM/ badzra yak+Sha ma hA kro d+ha be ra pa la ya/ a

si mu sa la/ a pa ri shu pa sha ha ta ya/ u u u/ sa ha kA ya badzra kro d+ha ka pa ye/ ma hA tsakra badzra kro d+ha mu kha ye/ ma hA tsit+ta badzra kro d+ha a pa ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ ma hA kro d+ha nir ma ya/ badzra rak+Sha kro d+ha pa la ti/ u

u u/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ u u u/ tsit+ta ye/ bi ta ye/ ha la ye/ a a a/ i i i/ u u u/ da la ye/ ma la ye/ ki po ye/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M/ sarba sha trun/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ra

ya da ra ya/ a kar+Sha ya ar+Sha ya/ tsur+Na ya tsur+Na ya/ A gad ta ya A gad ta ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ de dag drag po'i gsang sdebs

te// khro rgyal thams cad 'dul ba yin// oM badzra shri he he ru ru/ kaM kaM kaM ma hA kro d+ha ma hA pa la ti/ ha na ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ ban dza ban dza hU~M phaT/ gsang ba drag po mchog sdebs 'di// rdo rje 'chang chen thugs

las byung// ye shes sprul pa'i rngam sgra yin// khro rgyal dmod pa'i mtshon cha yin// dbyangs yig chos sku'i so pa yin// klad gnon rgyal po longs spyod rdzogs// khro rgyal skyes bu sprul pa'i sku// chos sku dbyings
yig 'khub med la// khro bdag chen po dpung dang bcas// dbyangs yig 'khub med klad du drangs// rgyab ri dmag mi tshan chen po// ye shes khro rgyal bcu dang gcig/ dbang sdud 'bru gsum thugs kyi

bcud// dbyangs kyi 'khub med chos sku nyid// rdo rje mi shigs sku gsung thugs// rdo rje khros pa'i dmag chen dpung// dbyangs kyi 'khub med mgo 'dren te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog sku gsung thugs kyi

yang rnying bcas// chos sku'i dbyangs nyid 'khub med do// khro bo stobs chen 'khub med dril// pho mo yang snying sku gsung thugs// chos sku dgyes bzhad 'khub med sdud// gsang ba rno bcud yi ge dgu/ rdo rje khro bo
de dag gis// gdul bya bsgral bya gang yin pa// rgyob cig choms shig sregs shig dang// zung zhig khug cig phye mar thong// drongs shig chings shig phye mar rlogs// don cig gtubs shig sod cig
pa'o// dbang du bsdus la sgrol cig skrod// ye shes rgyal po khro chen gyis// mtshan gsum dgyes chags 'phrin las mdzod// brnan te sku gsung thugs stobs kyis// dpa' bo'i log gnon gdul

bya sgrol// rang dbang med par brlag par mdzod// gtso bo las mkhan btang ba'o// gzhan yang rno gcod spu gri ni// sarba sha trun snying khrag la thum ril rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ srog la hur thums rbad/

dbugs la sum ril rbad/ bi tsur Na ya bi tsuN+Na ya/ basmi ku ru/ ba ril rbad/ ro myags rbad/ kham shag rbad/ ma ra ya rbad/ sarba big nan e yaM raM laM khaM suM badzra karma nan 'drig rbad/ a a badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa

la stam b+ha ya baM baM nan nan nan/ sarba ta thA ga tA ma pa la ya nan a/ ma hA pa la pra taM ki ra pra taM ki ra/ ta phye pa ni tha ru/ rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams zlog cig mA ra ya phaT b+h+yo/ e ka du na snying na bzlog/ du

sad nan ma ra ya bzlog/ sa ma ya bzlog bzlog/ mA ra ya thums ri li li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha la/ pra pa sa ra b+ha ri sha ya phro phro ma hril hril shar shar phob phob b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dud kar phrom phob/ shu ti phrom phob/

shar hril phrom phob// khro rgyal bcu gcig gtso bor bcas// reg chod me lce 'bar ba yi// gsang sdebs snying po yang dag 'dis// rig sngags gcod pa'i reg chod 'dir// ral gri spu gri me lce bzhin// gang la
bab kyang thal bar rlog/ rig sngags gnod pa'i reg chod 'dis// ri rab srog chags mnan pa bzhin// 'byung ba brtan bzhi rngams kyis gnon// srid pa zhig kyang 'chor mi srid// rig sngags phyir bzlog
reg chod 'dis// ji ltar rlung gis sprin chags sam// mun las nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'byung ba'i rgyud dang phyir bzlog na// byad sngags rbod gtong smos ci dgos// rig sngags chu 'khyags reg chod

'dis// skyi 'dang bskal pa'ang 'bebs byed na// chu 'khyags lo 'joms the tshom med// reg chod me lce 'bar ba bzho// ye shes lha yi snying po mtshon// srin po gsad pa'i gnas thog yin// drag sngags gsang

sngags snying por bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khro bo gsang sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// las kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad

do// rnal 'byor dbang thob dam tshig ldan// ye shes lha rnams gang rung gi/ sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yi// drod rtags thob pas las 'di brtsams// dben la brtan pa'i dur khrod du// dge bcu spyad cing

tshogs 'khor bya// ngam grog brag nag ri rgod kyi// sa la maN+Dal gru bzhi bya// dur khrod g.yul 'thab ro bsregs dang// shan pa rabs chad khang sa la// gnyan ri'i chus sbrus 'brub khung bya// gru gsum kha khyer

tsher rtsang bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ nang du drag po nyis 'gyur la// r+n+ri hU~M phaT dza'i thems la blang/ rgyu rten drug dang sa chu shing/ khang sa yul gyi rdzas rnams la/ gang yin don pa'i

ling ga bya// dbang po yan lag dod pa la// ming dang snying po khong du brnag/ thod chen mi shes dong du brnag/ tsha ba gsum dang dug sna tshogs// nad khrag sna tshogs byug par bya// khram thod la sogs mi shis

par// dug rgod ra dug sbyang dug pa// 'ol mo ba spu re lcag pa// mi yi shi khrag dri rims mdze// ra khyi rta nag shi khrag dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tse ba// bdud btsan klu yi chu yis sbyar// skam thun zor la

chus sbyar gsher// thun snod mtshon cha'i phyag rgyas gdab// zhing chen shun dang ro ras la// sme ba lnga dang tsha ba gsum// nri rangs su yis skya bcad la// shan pa'i nyi phyed kha lhor bltas// khro bor bsgoms shing

drag sngags bzlas// kang ka'am 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa yis// dug sna khrag sna dur khrod kyis// sol bas mtshon chas 'khor lo bri// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa bzhin// dbus su rdo rje hU~M mdzad dam// rtsibs bcu

khro bo bcu po yis// rtsa ba'i drag sngags tshan re 'god// phyi rim mu khyud stong pa la// gang byed spu gri grangs med dgod// mtha' ma sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// las kyi khro bo'i lto bar bca'// ral gri sdigs mdzub

khro tshul 'jigs// ngar glud byin brlabs dbang bskur te// dong rtsang ling ga'i kha la lding// gtor ma sha khrag sna tshogs bca'// brnag par byin gyis brlabs la dbul// de nas rnam dag chos kyi sku// don

dam yang dag snying po las// mthing nag hU~M nyid yongs gyur pas// khro rgyal bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu zhabs brgyad bco brgyad phyag/ mthing nag dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyag mtshan mtshon cha sna tshogs
bsnams// dregs pa'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// thugs khar badzra he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// nyi zla'i gdan la brkyang bskum

bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral gri dril bu g.yon// rdo rje snying po 'od 'bar 'phro// dbu+u la rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// mthing kha rdo rje dril bu bsnams// phyogs bcu gtso yi mdun dag

na// khro rgyal bcu gcig gsal bar bsgom// khro chung sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// gang la dmigs pa rdul du rlog thun rdzas me lce thog gzer 'phro// 'khor lo mtshon chas gcod cing 'thub// brgya thun brdeg cing
drag sngags bzlas// de ltar drag sngags drod thob nas// 'khor lo la btsas mchod rten gyi// rab gnas byin can bum par gzhug/ ling ga gdug pa can la gtad// de bzhin yul rten bcud la gnas// zor
'phang spogs na bsreg thabs bya// nya stong zor 'phang kha gso bya// 'di ni gnad dbab bsrung bzlog rnams// myur du 'grub par nges pa ste// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid kyis bshad// 'jam dpal khri

drug stong pa gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ khro bcu gsang sngags sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// reg chod me lce

'bar ba yi// gsang sdebs snying po 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer gyi// 'khrul 'khor drag sngags mtshon cha 'phros// de dag drag po gsang sdebs ni// a ne a ne a ne/ oM shri many+dzu ya man ta

ka hri sti ka la ru pa u ne u ne u ne/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti badzra kro d+har dza ya ya ma ni krin ta badzra kro d+ha ban dza na ga ra la u u staMb+ha ya ka pa ye u u u/ badzra raka yak+Sha/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma ra dza to me ya ma ya ko

ta mi/ u u u/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ u u u/ hri sti pra ma ya/ r+n+ri sha ku ru nri rbad ya/ shri many+dzu ya man ta ka ya ma pak+shun si/ ha pa ru mun mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ klad khrag la myogs rbad la/ ya me to ru na yo ta

ya/ me ya ma k+She ta/ ya ta yo na ri ya k+She ya ta ya me k+She/ yak+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ k+She ya ma me ta/ murdza ya/ mgrin khrag myogs rbad ya rak+ta tsa ra ya/ lta khrug myogs rbad ya/ mA ra ya/ snying khrag myogs rbad ya/ ya ma

re ni dza ya rbad ya/ ya ma ra ni dza ya k+She ya/ me ta k+She ya ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ tak+She ma ma me/ a ti yo ta ru to me ya/ k+She me ma ya ta/ ya me to sa dzA ra ma ye/ ta me ma ya k+Sha/ tsi ta ye/ bi ta ye/ ha la ye/
gzhan dag de ltar bsdeb pa'o// de dag drag sngags don bshad na// chos sku'i dbyangs yig drug 'di dang// so ba klad gnon rgyal po dang// dbyangs yig skyes bu blon po dang// dbyangs kyi 'khub med gnyen
pos 'thung// 'khub med rgyab ri dmag mi dpung// ka ba dbyangs yig yang snying dgu// dbyangs kyi 'khub med spu gri gcod// gtso bo las mkhan log gnon dang// 'thoms pa'i mtshon chas gsad

pa'i// gzhan yang reg chod me lce'i sdebs// rab tu gsang ba'i mchog 'di bshad// a ne a ne a ne/ oM shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ ka pa ye/ ka la ru+u pa ni sha ku/ mu kha ya/ hrista bi kri ta a Na na a pa

ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya a hri/ ma e sti/ u u u/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ badzra kro d+ha ra dza ya/ ya man krig d+ha na bany+dza na ka ra/ badzre mahA kro ta ya ma ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma tsa sa to me ya/ ma ma me ta k+She/ u u

u/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsit+ti ye/ bi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ staM pa la/ ka pa ye/ u u u/ badzra rak+Sha yak+Sha hri sti pra ma ya/ nri sha ku ru nri rbad ya/ ka ta nam ya ka te kro a dzun ma shri oM/ u u

u/ ya ma sa k+Shu na sa ha sa ru mun ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ shag pa tshal pa rbad pu nan/ klad khrag la myogs rbad ya/ rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams zlog cig mA ra ya phaT b+h+yo/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kro mahA ba

la/ a a a/ laM nan/ suM raM yaM baM khaM/ staM ba ya baM baM nan nan a nan ta ya/ sarba big nan tsit+ta thuM ril kha tham nA sha ya kha thaM nA sha ya nan/ rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ trig nan hur thums dza/ myag thum ril rbad ya/ man

tra pra taM/ ki ra pra tam ka ra hU~M phaT/ de dag drag sngags nges don ni// skye med dbyangs yig chos kyi sku// klad gnon rgyal po sku gsung thugs// dbyangs yig 'khub med yang snying dgu/ pho mo snying po sku

gsung thugs// dbyangs yig blon po skyes bu ste// rdo rje khro bo dbyangs kyi gnad// rgyab ri dmag mi ka ba'i mchog/ 'khub med pho mo yang snying dgu pho mo dbyangs yig 'khub med do// gnyen po brdung gnyag spu
gri'i gcod// gtso bo las mkhan dpa' bo'i non// dbyangs yig spul pa las mkhan rgyab// thems pa sgo bzhi gnad kyi gcod// gtso bos phyogs skyong khro bo mngags// des ni 'thoms pa'i gshed bzhi
mngags// de bzhis dmigs pa sngon du sgrol// rig sngags phyir bzlog spu gris so// gnan gzir 'khum med spu gri dang/ kha bcing stobs gnan spu gri dang// bsrungs pa bdag gzhan spu gri dang// gzer dang
sog dbrog gcad pa'o// khyad par reg chod me lce'i sdebs// pho mo gcig tu dril ba ste// 'khrul 'khor g.yas bskor g.yon bskor dang// stag mchong la sogs nyen bzhir bsdeb/ gcig tu dril la yang
bsdebs par bshad/ rig sngags gnan bzlog gcad pa yi// reg chod me lce 'bar ba'i sdebs// ting 'dzin gsal dbang dam tshig ldan// ye shes lha grub dam tshig ldan// dbang thob chos nyid rtogs

pas spyad// a ne a ne a ne/ badzra kro d+ha ra dza ya/ ma hA shri he ru ka tsan d+ha ya/ u ne u ne u ne/ oM shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta ka ka la ru pa/ shri sti b+hi kri ta/ mu ka ye/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ u u/ yam ra ni dza

ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya ra ni spo ta ya ye na ru to me ya/ ya me to sa tsar ma ya/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya a hri/ ma e staM/ ya ma a e hri sti/ sing nga yi/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsit+ta ye/ b+hi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u u u/ ya man ta

ka badzra kro d+ha ya ma ra dza mon ta nag po u u u/ a ya ma du ra tsa sha ba la/ na ra ha sa/ u ne u ne u ne/ da la ye/ ma la ye/ ki po ye/ ya man ta krid hU~M/ shu trun/ bitsur+Na ya bitsur+Na ya b+ha smi ku ru snying khrag

la thums ril rbad/ myags rbad/ myogs rbad/ tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ kham shag rbad/ ro myags rbad/ baM ril rbad/ thu ril rbad/ ma ra ya rbad/ e yaM raM laM baM/ badzra karma nan trig rbad ya/ a a badzra kro d+ha staM pa ya

baM baM nan nan/ suM laM staM pa yan nan nan/ ma hA pa la badzra kro d+ha a nan ta a/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la tsan d+ha ya/ pra taM ki ra pra taM ki ra/ te s+ye ba/ ni pa tha ru/ rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams zlog cig

mA ra ya phaT b+h+yo/ sa ma ya b+h+yo bzlog thum ri ri li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ reg chod me lce 'dra ba 'di// dbyangs yig chos sku so ba yi// klad gnon rgyal po longs spyod rdzogs// chos sku dbyangs yig 'khub med la// khro rgyal

skyes bu sku gsung thugs// dbyangs kyi 'khub med rgyab ri dmag/ dbyangs ldan rgyab dmag mtshan dang bcas// yang snying pho mo sku gsung thugs// pho mo yang snying dgu gnyis la// dpa' bo'i log non 'khum

med dbyangs// sde brgyad rgod bzhi 'khum med dbyangs// rtsa ba las mkhan rno gcod dgu// de dag snying po rtsa ba'o// rig sngags gcod pa'i re chod 'dis// ral gri spu gri me lce bzhin// gang la bas kyang rdul
du rlog rig sngags gnan pa'i reg chod 'dis// ri rab srog chags mnan pa bzhin// 'byung ba gtan gzhi rngams kyis gnon// srid pa zhig kyang 'chor mi srid// rig sngags phyir zlog reg chod 'dis// ji

ltar rlung gi sprin phyags sam// mun las nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'byung ba'i rgyun kyang phyir zlog na// byad sngags rbod gtong smos ci dgos// reg chod me lce 'bar ba gsum// de bzhin srin po gdong dmar

la// btab na the tshom med par gsod// ye shes lha yi snying po mtshon// de na 'di spyod sngags pa yis// dam tshig srog ltar bsrung ba gces// dbang bskur gnang ba thob pa gces// ye shes lha yis drod thob

gces// reg chos gsang sdebs snying po yis// reg chod drag po gsang ba'i sdebs// sngags rgod drod thob sngags pas spyad// a ne a ne a ne/ ma hA shri he ru ka/ badzra kro d+ha ra dza ya/ ma hA pa la sti hU~M/ u ne u

ne u ne/ oM a kro he/ ya man ta/ ya ma ye/ many+dzu shri badzra [(]tigaSha [)]Na ka la ru pa hU~M a/ hri ti sa ma ya/ u u u/ ya a hri/ ma e hri/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra dza ni/ u ne u ne u ne/ stam b+ha

ya/ ka pa ye/ badzra rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ u u u/ hU~M bi sha badzra kro d+ha/ ya ma me ta k+Sha/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo na/ ra dza ni/ u ne u ne u ne/ stam b+ha ya/ ka pa ye/ badzra rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ u u u/ hU~M bi sha badzra kro d+ha/ ya ma me

ta k+Sha/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra dza ni/ u ne u ne u ne/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsit+ta ye/ b+hi ta yi/ ha la ye/ u mu u/ badzra dz+wa la maN+Dal la hU~M phaT/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha na la/ a A [(]aha[)]i

I [(]ahi[)]yu [(]anyu[)(]ahu[)]e e [(]ahe[)]/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha na/ ba pha ba b+ha ma/ u ne u ne u ne/ a mu ga trig rbad nan rbad rbur rbad nan rbad/ hur rbad thums rbad/ dza
rbad/ myags rbad/ thum rbad/ ril rbad/ snying rbad/ khrag rbad/ khaM rbad/ shag rbad/ drag sngags gsang sdebs reg chod 'di// so pa chos sku dbyangs kyis 'dren// klad gnon khro rgyal 'khub med

dbyangs// blon po rdo rje rnon po ste// skyes bu sku gsung thugs 'khum med// rgyab ri dmag mi 'khub med dbyangs// gnyen po brdung brtag dbyangs kyis 'chun// khro bo sprul pa rgyab ri dmag dbyangs 'chun yang

snying pho mo'i 'bru// sprul pa me dpung sde brgyad rno// sgra dbyangs mtshon drag 'khub med dbyangs// gnan gzir srog dbrog sbyor ba bcad// srog snying 'bru re gcod sgrol ba'o// reg chod gsang sdebs drag

sngags la// las kyi sbyor ba bsam yas te// mdor bsdus gsang sdebs de dag go/ ye shes khro bo'i rol pa las// reg chod me lce 'bar ba 'phros// dge bcu ma yengs rgyun du spyad// ye shes khro bo'i rgyal po

yis// mchod pa gtor ma tshogs 'khor bya// ri rgod byin can lhun po dang// rin chen yod dang zhabs kyis bcags// drag po dur khrod sa rnams la// rmu bdud can chus 'jim pa bya// khru gang mchod rten byang

chub cher// dur khrod tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur// khri 'phang bzhi po dkar dmar sngo// ser po bad la gdan khri dmar// dbu ni nag po bum rten zer/ khong stong gdan 'og gru gsum du// gang dmigs rgyud rten

ling ga brnag/ ming rus srog snying spyi snying lte// byad du bcug la mon thod brnag/ dur khrod ras la tsha ba gsum// tsha ba'i rgyal po sme ba lnga// byugs la dug chus 'khor lo bri// lte ba rtsibs la hU~M nyid dang// cha

byad spu gri drag sngags dgod// rtsibs grangs spu gri'i sngags 'bras sbyar// rtsibs mchan ming byang rdzogs par bri// mtha' ma'i sreg byed me dpung 'bar// khro bo khro mo'i lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas
gcod pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra// gcod cing bsregs pas thams cad sgrol// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung 'dra// skom zhing g.yeng bas srog sdud 'joms// mon nam

gri thod dmar mchod du// nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tse dang// gri khrag rims khrag bsnol khrag dang// ra dug spyang dug dug rgod dang// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang// thal chen la sogs skam thun bca'// de

nas rnam dag chos nyid kyi// ngang las bruM ljang yongs gyur pas// mchod rten dur khrod gzhal yas khang// bum par dpal chen he ru ka/ bang rim dang por hU~M las kyang// gshin rje gshed sogs khro bo bcu// khri

'phang gnyis par sprul pa yi// khro bo rnams ni gsal bar bskyed// khri 'phang gsum pa la sogs su// rang gi lha srungs rnams kyang bskyed// gdan 'og dgra bgegs gang yin bsam// b+h+ruM las drag po'i 'khor
lo ni// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan par bsgom// lte ba gtso bo rtsibs la 'khor// hU~M las rang rang snying pos bskyed// rtsibs grangs lha yi grangs dang sbyar// dbang bskur byin brlabs ye shes

bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bstod cing bskul te 'phrin las bcol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// drag sngags smra gcad bzlas par bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po dang// myur
du sgra dang bcas par 'khor// gang dmigs mchod par gcad cing gtub// drag sngags brgya'am stong stong na// thun brdeg khro chung mtshon cha thogs// bsam yas me lce thog gzer gyis// dmigs pa lus srog
rdul phran brlag/ de ltar gsal bas drag tu bzlas// thon nas 'khor lo ling ga bcas// bzlog na rgyun srang 'gram la gnan// bsrung gzir bka' rten mgon pos gnan// gsad na gdug pa'i gnyan la

gtad// nya stong kha gso drag tu bya// 'di lta bu yi drag sngags kyis// mthu stobs bdag po nyid kyang 'joms// gzhan bdag kun la smos ci dgos// mchod rten 'khor lo ting 'dzin thun// drag sngags spyi rgyug

sbyor ba yin// a a a/ oM badzra shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha tsan d+ha hU~M/ a ne a ne a ne/ dz+nyA na ma hA kro d+ha rA dza sa man ta naM/ ka ya badzra kro d+ha shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ya gnan ta bA ga badzra kri taM ya/ kA la ru pa ni

sha ku ru/ tsit+ta badzra tsiN+Da/ hri Sh+ta biHkri ta/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza ni/ e yaM raM paM laM/ u u u/ badzra yak+Sha rak+Sha kro d+ha ma hA pa la stim pa ya ka pa ye/ a A/ i I/ u U/

e e/ o o/ aM aHsing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ tsit+ta ye/ b+hi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u u u/ da lo ye/ ma la ye/ ki po ye/ ni shi ku ru/ a kar Sha yA/ trig nan/ staM b+ha ya/ baM baM laM nan nan/

myags thugs ril mA ra ya nri dza rbad nan/ chos sku so ba klad gnon khro bo'i rgyal// dbyangs yig ye shes khro bo sku gsung thugs// gshin rje gshed po skyes bu 'khub med dbyangs// rgyab ri dmag bcas 'byung ba

lnga yi stobs// rdo rje khro bos brdung rtag dbyangs kyis stobs// yang snying dbyangs ldan rno dpal ye ge dgu/ brnag pa srog 'phrog zir gnon sbyor spyod// me lce 'bar ba reg chod sdebs chen yin// chos kyi sku

las rang byung khro bo'i rgyal// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer nyi ltar 'phros// gdul bya kun sgrol byang chub lam la dgod// rtsa ba'i snying po ye shes lhun grub gces// des ni gang brtsams las rnams thogs med

'grub// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ reg chod me lce 'bar ba'i sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu gnyis so//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la/ ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa/ khro
rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang drag po yi// ting 'dzin rim pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol rdo rjes yang bshad pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// 'jam

dpal gshin rje gshed po yis// 'dzab dgongs bstan pa'i snying po ni// gang na gnas pa'i sa de na// dam can yongs kyi srog kyang gnas// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid dbyings ni skye med las// ye

shes lhun grub rol pa ste// skye ba'i cho 'phrul du mar bstan// snying po byang chub sems nyid ni// ye nas kun la snyoms khyab gnas// 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi ma ste// ma lus srog gi rtsa ba yin// de phyir dus
gsum sangs rgyas rnams// kun gyi thugs kyang de ru gcig khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// lus ngag yid gsum de ru gcig/ byang chub sems dpa' mkha' 'gro rnams// byin rlabs snying po de ru

gcig/ lha srin sde brgyad dregs pa can// srog gi snying po de ru gcig/ des na snying po byang chub sems// bstan pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// kun gzhi byang chub snying po sems// yid ni rang rig ye shes
gsal// kun gzhi dbyings te yid ye shes// kun gzhi shes rab yid ni thabs// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mo la// yid ni kun tu bzang po yin// kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings nyid de// yid ni chos kyi sku nyid

de// yid ni 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// kun gzhi sbyor yum pe ta li// yid ni dpal chen he ru ka/ kun gzhi kro d+hi shwa ri yum// yid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// kun gzhi nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// des
las dbyings dang ye shes dang// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byin gyis brlabs las rang byung ba'i// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer spros// 'gro ba kun khyab don mdzad pa'i// gnad gsum dgongs
pa'i don gsum dang// dgongs pa'i rtsal gsum man ngag gsum// gnad gsum snang srid thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs te ci phyir na// gzugs khams sku ste 'dod khams gsung// gzugs med khams

ni thugs su 'dus// man ngag rnam pa gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyong// dgongs pa'i don gsum zhes bya ba// chos sku longs sku sprul sku yis// gti mug zhe

sdang 'dod chags gsum// skyong zhing rnam dag rtsa nas gcod dgongs pa rtsal gsum zhes bya ba// bsnyen pa dang ni bsgrub chen dang// drag po las kyi dgongs pa'o// dang po bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ni// bdag
nyid chos sku'i ngang nyid las// ya man ta kar gnas pa yis// mgur gyi bum pa zhabs kyi long bu'i bar// khro chung ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis
rngam// g.yas pa be con g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong nas mchongs la khad// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// bye'u khrag chags bzhin du gtams shing 'khrig
par bsgom// khro rgyal bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang// rin chen gur phub 'dra ba'i nang nyid du// rang rig ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// de

yi thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// snying po mthing nag hU~M yig gsal bar bsgom// de mthar bzlas pa'i snying po sngags kyis bskor// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag
pa'i rtags// chos dbyings gting mtha' med pa'i bde gshegs nas// skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus pa thams cad kun// khro bo mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas kun na 'khor lo be con
dang// ral gri dbyug tho kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing// g.yon pa kun nas khro bo'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng// dur khrod chas rgyan rdzogs par kun la brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na 'jigs par bzhugs// ye
shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs par bsgom// bdag nyid ya man ta ka'i zhal nas sngags bzlas pas// sku gsung thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// don ni ye shes lnga
'od kha dog lnga// nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du 'dom gang nas// gshin rje gshed kyi skur gyur gang la phog pa kun// gshin rje gshed gyur de dag zhal kun nas// gsang sngags 'brug gi sgra ltar zlog par
gyur// bdag nyid gshin rje'i gshed kyi thugs kha nas// ye shes 'od zer bsam yas nyi ltar spros// chos kyi dbyings nyid gting mtha' med par khyab// 'od zer thams cad mchod pa'i lha mor gyur// phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad thugs khar thim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod phul thugs dam bskul// 'od zer stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// mtha' yas mu med kun tu khyab pa las// sems can

lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// las kyi gshin rje dregs pa thams cad kyi// srog gi snying po bkrag mdangs rdzu 'phrul mthu// las dang nus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus// sde brgyad lha srin ma mo mkha'
'gro la// thang cig 'dug dbang med pa'i bka' nyan cing// gang bcol las rnams thogs med byed par bsam// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus thim// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa
sbyangs// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la 'dus te thim// sgo gsum sgrib sbyangs dbang bskur byin brlabs bsam// las kyi gshin rje ma mo mkha'
'gro kun// bdag gi dbang du gyur nas las byed bsam// de ltar 'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bu ru// rgyun mi 'chad par gsal bar rab bsgoms te// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags mthong mthong drang bar

bya'o// des ni ye shes lha dang las byed la// mngon du 'grub par 'gyur zhes rdo rjes bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mthar thug gi rgyud las// bsnyen pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya
bdun cu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa'i 'dzab dgongs 'di bshad do// bdag nyid chos sku rnam dag ngang las kyang// khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku ru gsal// dbang bskur byin
brlabs ye shes khro rgyal bstims// gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu dang ma mo dang// ging bdud sha za mon rnams gsal bar bsgom// bdag thugs ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phros pas// lho phyogs 'byung ba brtan
bzhi rngams 'og nas// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer thod mkhar lcags mkhar nas// las kyi gshin rje 'chi bdag dregs pa can// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag dbang bskur// 'khor ni 'bum phrag bcas

pa'i snying khar thim// tshe srog dbang bsdus bdag mdun bka' nyan cing// ci bgyi gsung stong thang cig kyang// 'dug dbang med par las byed bsam// de ltar sum cu rtsa gnyis dril la gzhag/ drod thob las
kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa yin// bdag nyid ya man ta ka'i thugs kha nas// mthing nag ya las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// sngags bzlas nyi zer lta bu'i 'od zer dang// gang la phog pa'i skye 'gro thams cad

kun// las kyi gshin rje sku mdog sna tshogs pa// shin tu 'jigs shing gtum rngam khros pa'i gzugs// sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod rus pa 'cha'// phyag g.yas kun na gong gi mtshon cha dang// me yi 'khor lo

lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams// g.yon pa kun na rlung gi 'khor lo dang// lcags kyu zhags pa 'gug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// dur khrod chas kyis brgyan cing rngam sgra sgrogs// kun gyi zhal nas drag po sngags kyi
sgra// thog dang lce 'bab bzhin du thog chen sgrogs// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun gang bar bsam// bdag nyid ya man ta kas sngags bzlas pa// thugs kha'i sngags las ye shes 'od 'phros
pas// gshed po gzhi yi thugs dam rgyud kyang bskul// gshed bzhi rang dbang med par las byed do// de bzhin gshed bzhis phyogs skyong bcu rnams bskul// phyogs skyong bcu yis bdud pho mthar byed
dang// las kyi gshin rje mon pa bdud rnams bskul// des ni ma mo mkha' 'gro ging pho ging mo dang// gnod sbyin sha za srin po pho mo bskul// skad cig 'dug dbang med par las byed do// de dag kun gyis
sa bdag klu gnyan bskul// rang dbang med par drag po'i las byed do// de rnams dmigs pa'i gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra bo du yod skye nas zhags pas bzung// dkar nag snying nas
lcags kyus bzung nas drangs// rgyab nas rlung gis 'phul zhing me yis 'khor lo bsreg/ rtar mtshan rtsi sbur mi chags pa bzhin du// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sreg sol ba gzhog tu song// lus po 'dar

zhing skra g.yengs gnag la rid// 'on thong skad ngan 'dzer zhing mig rtsa rig rig nyams// de lta bu de las kyi gshin rjes yis// rang dbang med par bkug ste 'khrul 'khor gyi// gsang mdzod bzhi ru bcug cing

ling gal thims bsam// de lta bu yi las mkhan tshogs rnams kyis/ kho yi bsrung skyob byed pa'i lha bzhi po// rlung gi 'khor los phral zhing bskyod g.yeng nam mkhar bskyal// me yi 'khor los bsreg cing thal
bar brlag de ltar gsal bas dgug bstim lha dbye ba'i// drag sngags drod rtags mthong nas bzlas// des ni sred med bu yi bla yang khugs// don po'i bla tshe srog khugs the tshom med// 'jam dpal khri drug

stong gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las// las la sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// drag po las kyi 'dzab dgongs bshad// bdag nyid ya man ta kar gnas pa

yi// thugs kha'i rdo rje snying po ye ge ya// sngo nag gsal la 'tsher ba me lce 'bar// mtha' mar nyi ma bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bskor// me lce 'bar zhing tsha tshar 'phro bar bsam// bdag gi zhal nas gsad pa'i
sngags zlas pas// 'od zer 'phros pas rno myur glog ltar 'gyu// 'od zer dang ni 'gro ba thams cad kun// las kyi gshin rje sku mdog mthing nag khros// sku che yan lag rags pa mtshon cha sna
tshogs thogs// shin tu gtum rngam 'jigs pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gar// de las ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phros// 'od zer gtum rngam 'jigs pa
dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gar// de las ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phros// 'od zer mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs 'gyur// zhal nas drag po gsang ba'i
ngan sngags ni// spu gri sos gcod lta bu 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs// de lta bu yis stong gsum 'jig rten khams// gting mtha' med dbyings thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin/ khengs par bsams te de

dag thams cad kyis// brnab pa'i lus la snags kyi 'od zer dang// mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs char du phab// me lce'i kha la sbrang bus mi chags bzhin// don po'i snying kha dkar nag mtshams de ru// drag
sngags 'od zer rtsa bzhi nas zhugs te// sa chu me rlung 'byung pa bzhi po de// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad gzhir bslang// sha rus drod dbugs 'byung bzhi dkrags// chos nyid ye shes yon

tan rab rgyud kyi// dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi bcad nas srog gi me mar gsod// lus ni rdul phran tsam song shes pa dwangs snyigs phye// srog dbugs phyi ru phyung ste lus srog phye mar bsam// sha khrag phung po thams cad

las kyi gshin rje dang// sha za srin po srin mo khrag 'thung dang// rdo rje ging pho ging mo la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// btod cing zos te the shul med par bsam// ngams ni tshangs pa lha yi tshe yod kyang// skad

cig yud la 'chi 'gyur gzhan dag smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa las sngags drag po'i rgyud las// gsad pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu lnga'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
pos// nyi ma bzhi pa'i sbyor ba bshad// 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar sgo med de// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba yis// brnag pa gcod cing rlag byed bsam// dbus kyi lcags mkhar ya las kyang// 'chi bdag

gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs gzhi'i ya me tak+She las// srog gshed bzhi yi sku ru skyed// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig gi/ ra dza la sogs bcu gnyis so// phyogs skyong gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// mtha'
ma'i spu gri nyin bzhi po// mtshon cha sna tshogs me dpal bskyed// bar gyi snying po sku gsung thugs// ye shes 'od zer stobs chen gyis// pha rol stobs 'joms las mkhan bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa thams cad

kyi// skya rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te pho nyar dgye// rbad cing bla dgug lha dang dpral// ling ga'i rten la bstim par bya// de nas nyi ma dang po yi// nyi ma
rtse la shar pa la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bca'// bdag nyid gshed chen skur gsal ba'i// thugs khar nyi gdan ye ge ya// sngo nag gsal 'tsher me 'bar bsam// de mthar drag sngags 'bru bdun
bskor// me lce 'bar zhing 'od zer 'phro// 'od zer 'phros pas las byed bskul// bde bshegs thugs rje'i thugs las kyang// khro rgyal ya man ta ka bskul// de yi ye shes 'od zer gyis// gshed po ya ma ra
dza bskul// de yis kong rtse brag 'joms dang// rdo rje bdud 'jom a ba glang mgo bskul// de yi bdud po brang dkar rngam pa dang// nag po bkrag med ma hA srog bdag bskul// de yis gshin rje mthar byed
log 'dren mthar byar bskul// de yis rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro dang// ma mo dkar mo'i tshogs dang ging pho ging mo bskul// de yi klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin klad pa'i
rgyas// gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas nas byol song rgyal po ste// 'thoms pa'i gshed bskul tshangs pa'i gtsug rtsa gcad// sha rus sa yi khams las bad kan blang// klad pa dar nyams mgo 'khor

las byed do// be con phyag rgya brnag pa'i spyi bor brdeg/ dgongs ka'i nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// gshed po ya ma rA dza la sogs lnga rnams la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dgra bor dmigs te dbul// drag
tu bskul zhing gtor ma dgra phyogs btang// de bzhin nyi ma kun la shes par bya// khro rgyal gshed pos myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis ya ba ya ti phya sangs bskul// de yis nag po 'dzub med mi dur sa
'dar bskul// de yis byol song thar byed yi dwags thar byed bskul// de yi shugs kyis mkha' 'gro mon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskul// de yis brnag pa gang yin lte ba yi// 'dod
chags zhen pa'i gnas nas dmyal ba'i dbang po ste// gsol byed sdud bskul srid pa'i rten rtsa bcad// dbugs ni rlung gi khams las rlung nad bslang// lus rgyal myos blangs yid 'khrug las byed do// ral
gri phyag rgya brnag pa'i lte bar brdeg dgongs ka nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// myos byed 'bar ba la sogs gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang// khro rgyal gshed pos Ar+ya
dmar po bskul// de yis gshin rje dmigs pa mig dmar bskul// de yis swa 'dar 'khrigs pa tho yo 'thoms pa rje// bdud pho thod bdag thod pa rje rnams bskul// de yis srin po mthar byed klu dbang
mthar byed bskul// de yis chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mo dmar nag tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskul// de yis brnag pa gang yin mgrin pa yis// nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas nas lha min

dbang po ste// srog gi gshed bskul ngag gi rgyun rtsa gcad// khrag gi chu yi khams las khrag nad bslang// lus zungs khrag skyug khong khrag 'dzag pa'i las byed do// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya brnag pa'i mgrin par
brdeg nyi ma dmar thag chad na Ar+ya dmar po dang// ging bdud ma mo rnams la gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la yang// khro rgyal gshed pos ras pa tshar dgu bskul// de yis
chos kyi rgyal po lha mchog rtel pa bskul// de yis ral pa spyi bcings rngam pa klu 'dul rje// sa to nag po mtshal bdud dregs pa bskul// de yis gnod sbyin mthar byed dmyal ba mthar byed dang// dam sri

mthar byed dbang med las la bskul// de yi las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo sngon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin snying kha yi// zhe sdang gtum pa'o gnas nas mi rgod
shan pa ste// srog gcod gshod bskul dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi dang// srog pa rtsa bcad dbugs de phyi ru phyung// drod ni me yi khams las mkhris nad langs// spu gri'i phyag rgya bcas te snying khar

brdeg/ srog gi me gsad srog gcad sha khrag rnams// las kyi gshin rje sha za srin po'i tshogs// ma mo khrag 'thung ging pho ging mo dang// srin mo la sogs tshogs kyis bstod cing sha khrag zos// rjes shul tsam

yang med cing brlag par bsam// srog gi me mar gsad nas shes pa dwangs snyigs phye// dwangs ma 'bring gis phyag rgya gcig par bskyed// rab kyis skye ba chos kyi dbyings su bskul// mtha' ma bdag nyid lus
kyi go char bya// srog gi snyigs ma thod pa'i rten la bstim// sa bdag kla gnyan la sogs gdug pa can la gtad// des ni mi 'gyur nag po'i bdud kyang gsod// srog chags mi la sogs pa kun la smos ci

dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las// nyi ma bzhi pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu drug go/// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'khrul 'khor don rnams rgyas bshad do// drag po mtshon

cha'i 'khrul 'khor la// man ngag don dang ma ldan na// 'khor lo bskor kyang las mi 'grub// des na don rnams rgyas bshad pa// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi ma tshugs na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gnad mi tshugs// 'khor

lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dres na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka ba rdib// las kyi gshin rje mun khang 'khor// las mi 'grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto dral

nas// sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen byung ngo// bcun phur bzhi dang ma ldan na// las kyi gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// bsgrub pa'i las rnams don med 'gyur// ka ba bzhi yi don ni rtsa ba'i yi ge bzhi// don ni
yid la yi ge'i gzugs su gsal ba dang// ngo bo gshin rje gshed po bzhi ru gsal ba dang// rang bzhin mtshon cha'i rnam par gsal ba dang// nus mthu 'byung ba nang gcod gshed// nang 'thab rang gcod

gsal ba'o// gdung bzhi tshangs thig bzhis mtshon nas// rtsa bzhi'i sbubs nas 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi gnas pa// phyi nang snod bcud kun gyi gzhi rten byed// de la nyi ma bzhi po las gnyer gtad pa'o// yang
na spyi bo mgrin pa snying lte yi// 'khor lo'i don gsal sngags bzlas las rdzogs pa'o// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi'i don ni 'di dag ste// bsnyen pa drod rtags thob pa byin rlabs lha yi gzer// rdzas rnams
tshogs pa rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer// bcu drug khang pa'i gzer dang 'phro bdun dgongs pa'i gzer// 'khor lo'i bcun phur bzhi ni rnal 'byor dbang rnams rdzogs// man ngag gdeng thob dgongs ldan

sems kyi bcun phur dang// bsnyen pa bya ba tshad skyol phyi nang gsang rtags ldan// gshin rje ma mo las la tshud pa ni// rtsol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi btsun phur dang// ye shes lha yi stobs kyis las kyi
gshin rje dang// ma mo dbang med las la btsud de khu zlog mi nus pas// ye shes lha yi byin rlabs bcun phur dang// de dag srog nas bskul zhing las bcol te// drag sngags bzlas na dgra bo dbang med

par// bla 'brel srog gcod drag po'i bcun phur ro// gsad pa drag sngags don bzhi shes bya ba// 'phen byed skyes bu lta bu ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i yul la mi bskyed do// skyed byed rkyen gzhu lta bu ma

shes na// bsgrub bya'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya mda' 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i srog yul rgyud la mi 'phrog go gcod byed mde'u 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs
pa'i rtsa dbugs srog gzugs mi chod do// de dag don rnams gsal bar bya ba ni// 'phen byed dbus yig ya las drang bskor 'phen pa'o// skyod byed rkyen gyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal ba'o// mda' ni las
sbyor drag sngags bcu drug pa'o// gcod byed spu gri'i drag sngags mtshan pa bzhis// drag po'i rtsa dbugs srig gzungs gcod pa'o// de dag rab tu gces pa'i sngags kyi sdebs brgyad do// srog gzungs gcad
cing lus srog 'byed lugs ni// 'grod stabs brgyad kyis gsad pa dang// bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa dang// gnad dgu sdebs la gsad pa'o// 'gros stabs brgyad ni gang zhe na// 'bur nag thog 'gros 'bur
'gros mgo mangs dang// 'khril pa sprul 'gros stag mchongs drag po'i 'gros// srin bu ka ta ring 'gros bi bag rta yi 'gros// rta lam nag po'i 'gros dang rus sbal 'phye bo'i 'gros// bcu

gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa ni// rgyu bzhi bsdus te gsad pa dang// dug gsum ar la gtad de gsad pa dang// 'byung ba lnga po rtsad gcad gsad// phung po lnga yi stobs gzhom dang// nang grol smad lnga gtub pa
dang// tshogs drug sgo rnams dag pa dang// dngas ma bdun gyis rtsad gcod dang// dbugs kyi lam dgu dgag pa dang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sgo dgag dang// lus ngag yid gsum mthu bsdu dang// shes

pa dwangs snyigs dbye ba dang// rten gcig me mar gsad pa'o// gnad dgu phab la gsad pa ni// gzas pa po yi rang rgyud la// bla gnas sa dgu bla rten mtshan ma dgu/ de 'jom drag sngags dgu dang skyod byed
ting 'dzin dgu sngags rtag thun rdzas dgu dang sngags 'jug sgo dgu dang// bag chags bsreg pa'i ye ge me 'bar dgu/ gnad dgu bsdus nas 'joms pa'i man ngag dgu/ shes pa dwangs snyigs phye la bsgrod
pa'i tshul dgu'o// de dag 'khrul 'khor spyi ru dgos pa ste// spyi rgyug ces pa thabs kyi man ngag go/ 'khor lo bskor thabs 'bum yod dang// bcu bdun 'bum bskor ma shes na// mtshon cha med
pa'i dpa' bo 'dra// spyi rgyug drag sngags bcu bdun pa// 'di yi drang thabs bskor shes na// bsgrub dang dmod dang gdab pa yi// drag sngags thams cad 'di la tshang// des na gsang sngags kun gyi
mchog/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor man ngag gi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bdun pa'o//// ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen khro rgyal
gtso// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i// spyi yi gdam ngag bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal gdul dka' 'dul phyir khros// mche gtsigs khros tshul bsgyings pa
lta// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i sku yis ni// gshin rje dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rje gshed bsgrub man ngag 'di// ngas bshad legs par nyon las zung// 'jam dpal khro bo bsgrub 'dod

pa'i// sngags pa dpa' brtul ldan pa des// dang por dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung// dam tshig bla ma mched dang sngags// phyag rgya gsang bcu rtsa ba dang// spyad dang mi spang dang du blang// bsgrub dang shes bya sku
gsung thugs// thun mong ma yin yan lag dang// thun mong bdag gzhan rnam grangs dang// mdo lung rtsa ba chen po rnams// dang blangs ma nyams gzhung thub bsrung// des ni dngos grub gang 'dod

rnams// myur du 'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig ma bsrungs gzhung nyams na// bsgrub kyang mi 'grub brlag par 'gyur// des na dam tshig srog bzhin bsrungs// khyad par rdo rje slob dpon la'o// dam

ldan phyi nang gsang dbang nod// phyi na dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang// nang dbang rgyal thabs spyi lugs dbang// gsang dbang bam chen brtul zhugs dbang// bum pa gsang ba shes rab ni// ye shes bde chen dbang
bzhi nod// dbang rdzogs byin rlabs dngos grub 'byung// de ldan sngags pa dpa' bo yi// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas der// ri bo dgu 'dul ri bran 'dud// shar gyi dngas 'phrog nub zer len// rtse mo
gnam snyog sked pa lhun// rtsa ba sham ring dur khrod gnas// rtswa shing me tog ri dgas bya// spos kyi sprin chags chu bo gangs// byin che bkra shis nyams dga' ba'i// gnas der dge spyad bsnyen bsgrub

bya// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang// bsgrub pa chen po rnam pa bzhi// bsnyen pa dag la rnam gsum ste// sbyor ba goms dang sngon du 'gro'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa dngos grub blang// sbyor goms pa yi bsnyen pa
ni// sa la phyag rgya bzhengs pa dang// mchod sbyin gtor ma rgya chen dang// phyag 'tshal mchod bshags la sogs kun// 'jam dpal nyid kyi gzhung bzhin bya// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang yang
brjod// 'jam dpal mtshan mchog brgya rtsa brgyad// gzungs sngags rgya chen bstod la sogs// ma nyams dag par rgyun du gdon// sbyor ba goms pa'i bsnyen pa'o// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa la// dang por

gnas pa de nyid la// rtsa ba'i chus sbyangs maN+Dal rtsig khru gang 'dom gang rgya dang dpangs// yang na gnas kyi rgya tshad sbyar// dri dang khrag sna bdud rtsis byug/ zhing gi srad bu byin brlabs thig tshangs thig

zur thig cha chen chung// phyed 'gres sum cha bya rog rjes// legs btab rdul tshon byis gyis brlab// rus chen kha dog ma ru dbye// khrag sna dur khrod sol ba dang// skyer pa me tog ut+pal rams// de dag byin

gyis brlabs la bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// de phyir 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// sngon po rtsibs mchan khrag mtsho smug thod skam rlon pa'i 'phreng bas

bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho bar khyams phyogs// sgo bzhi lnga rtsibs 'dod yon dmar// pha gu dra phyed dar bu kad// rta babs brgyad rtser 'khor lo gdugs// ri dgas zla phyed rdo rje sgo// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba
la// rdo rje thod skam me ris bskor// pho brang rang gzhung bzhin du'o// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gri thod lcags phur dgod// g.yas g.yon mchog chen seng ldeng dgod// 'jam dpal gshed chen

khro rgyal dang// sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i yum gnyis su// rten 'brel dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// de mdun shen shing tsher nag phur// thugs mchog yab yum byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bzhir seng ldeng skyer

ba dang// sher shing 'dzo bo'i phur pa bzhi// gshed bzhi yab yum byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bcur shing lcags mchog phur dgod// phyogs skyong yab yum byin gyis brlabs// gru chad lha snam sgo bzhi ru// de

bzhin rtsang phud gdug pa'i shing// ro langs las kyi gshin rje dang// lce spyang kang ka mon pho mo// ging bdud sgo bzhi las mkhan rnams// rang rang gzhung bzhin byin gyis brlabs// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdul

tshon bzhengs// de nas rdzas kyi rim pa lnga// rten rdzas dam rdzas mchod rdzas dang// rgyan rdzas drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// dung chen dmu lugs gling gsum pa// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// bdud rtsi grub sman

bsil chen dang// g+hi haM gur kum khrag sna tshogs// gla ba spos sna chu gtsang sbyar// tshon rtsi sbyar te steng thod la// khro rgyal nyid dang thugs mchog dang// gshed po bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// 'og thod de bzhin
yum rnams bri// yab yum phyag rgya gsal rdzogs bri// mtha' mar sku gsung yon tan thugs// 'phrin las sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyi ru spos sna gla rtsi dang// tshil chen dri ldan sman gyis byug

de ni rten rdzas zhes bya'o// smug chen sar pa ma rul skams// gong gi rdzas kyi sngags rnams bri// rtse mo bcud bdun hU~M rnams dgod// smug chung la sogs snying sna tshogs// bdud rtsi grub sman khrag sna

tshogs// 'bru sna spos sna sman sna tshogs// sbyar lugs mthing nag dar gyis dril// ru sprod rgyas btab dal bus bzhag de dag dam rdzas zhes bya'o// 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor ma ni// dpal bshos sha chen rnam lnga

sogs// sha khrag sna tshogs brgyan pa gnyis// khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// gtor ma rgyan ldan nub tu bzhag/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i 'khor bcas kyi// gtor ma rgyan ldan lho ru bzhag/ ma mo yul rnams

mkha' 'gro yi// gtor ma nal bu dre 'u mdzo// gtor ma byang shar mtshams su bzhag spos dang me tog mar me dang// dri chab gtsang bshos phyi mchod bsham// zhing chen ma nyams gzugs kyis mchod// rkang chen

gling bu thod pa'i rnga// mi mgo'i dung 'bud sgra yis mchod// tshil chen gsur dang dri chen spos// khrag chen sha chen spos dris mchod// 'bru sna'i lha bshos tshil chen brgyan// sha rus sna tshogs ro yis mchod// zhing

chen glang chen stag lpags gos// reg bya'i mchod pa bla med bsham// phud rgor rak+ta bdud rtsi bsham// de dag mchod pa'i rdzas zhes bya// zhing chen bla re zhing chung 'phan// rgyu zhags dra ba keng rus bcal// sha

chen lhu rdum lho phyogs dgram// brten rdzas skyes bu bu don te// gzhan la mi bstan mthong mi rung// gzhan yang drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// 'khor lo ling ga thun rdzas dang// sbyin sreg 'brub khung mnan pa'i

rdzas// thams cad ma chad rdzogs par bsham// bsgrub pa la 'jug dus tshod ni// gshin rje'i lo dang zla ba dang// zhag dang dus tshod snying bzhi 'am// dgun zla gsum spyir dbyar ston gyi// rab 'bring tha chungs

mar ngo la'o// gza' sbyang phur pa mig dmar lag bra nye nam gru rta thogs skag de dag dus la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon 'gro rdzas dang dus tshod kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun

cu brgyad do//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bshad// dang po phyi nas gsang mtshams gcad// bdag nyid khro rgyal skur bskyed la// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir mtho brgyad
gzugs// gtsang ris phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed// de nas phyogs bzhir mtho bzhi gzugs// rgyal chen bzhi ru byin gyis brlab// de la gtsang gtor mchod pa dbul// gtsang ris mgon po chos skyong
khyed// bde gshegs spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i bar dag tu// phyi nang dam sri shor ra re// nang nas dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod phyi mtshams bsrung las bca'/
de nas ra sogs khyi sogs la/ gang gnod dam sri'i ming gzugs bri// de la sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// bkug cing bstims la brab cing gzir// them 'og mnan la sgo byang gdags// nang mtshams mnan pa

zhes bya'o// de nas sngags pa chas gos ni// nag po zhing chen slag pa bgo/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por bsgom// thugs las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// me lce mtshon cha khro bo yis// gsang mtshams dam du
bcad cing bsrung// gshegs dang byin dbab mchod pa brlab// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom// dbang chen 'byung ba rims brtseg bsgom// gzhal yas khang bskyed gdan

rnams gdings// rgyu nyid rtsa ba'i snying po las// cho ga gsum gyi 'phro 'du yi// bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags brjod pas// khro rgyal ya man ta ka bskyed// sgrol sbyor gsang ba'i yum gnyis bskyed// rdo rje pad+ma byin
brlabs te// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// rgyu yi snying po hU~M nyid 'phros// phyogs mtshams rtsibs kyi rang gdan la// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis gshed po
bzhi// phyogs skyong bcu dang thugs mchog sras// yab yum rdzogs shing gsal bar bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// lha rnams gru chad zhing tshogs rnams// pho mo las byed pho nyar
bcas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bskyed// sgo bzhir rgyal chen sgo ma bzhi// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bzhengs// spyan drangs phyag btsal gnyis

med bstim// phyi mchod lnga dang kun bzang mchod// phyag rgya ye shes mchod pa 'bul// nang mchod rnam lnga bdud rtsi sman// mchod pa dbul zhing dngos grub blang// bdud rtsi rak+ta mchod 'bul bstab// gsang ba
sbyor sgrol mchod pa dbul// za byed chen po lhag pas mchod// 'dod yon gtor mas thugs dam bskang// dam tshig sgrib sbyang bshags pa bya// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang// gshin rje gshed la

bstod pa bya// de nas sngon 'gro 'dzab drang ste// dam tshig ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po sngags// 'dzab dgongs 'phro 'du rim pa ni// bstan pa'i snying po bzhin du bya// grangs rtags
dus kyi bsnyen par bya// grangs ni bye ba sa ya 'bum// ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgrims te bya// rtags ne go chas bdag lus brgyan// rdo rje 'khor lo lag babs gsor// mchod rten la 'dzeg mgo la skyes// mon
pa zhib can lho bal rnams// la sogs gcan gzan bdag go bsrun// gru dang glang chen seng ge zhon// nyi zla lag babs gdan la 'dug lus las 'od byung thams cad gsal// mi bying chu

bo'i thog nas 'gro// ri rab rtser phyin ging bzhi lta// nam mkha' la 'gro sngags sgra sgrogs// 'brug sgra me 'bar rlung nag 'tshub// phyag byed lha srin bdag khur ba// rmi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang// de
las sogs te gzhan dag kyang// mtshan rtags mang po mthong mthong bzlas// de dag sngags kyi bzlas lugs ni// dang por zhi ba khro bo yis// 'phrin las gzhung srang mchod pa dbul// bstod dang 'jab drang

dgongs pa bya// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// thugs kyi 'dzab drang man ngag ni// dang po sku yi sngags sdong bzlas// de nas gsung thugs yon tan sngags// rang rang rkyang par lnga brgya bzlas// de

nas dril ba stong du bzlas// thun 'gor de bzhin thun 'jug tu// sku yi snying po brgya brgya la// gsung thugs yon tan bcu bcu gdags// de bzhin stong la brgya gdags so// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na

ma tha b+hany+dzu hU~M phaT/ oM ya man ka ka la ru pa hU~M phaT/ oM shri ste bi kri ta a na na hU~M phaT/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hU~M dza dza/ bstod dang mchod pa sum yar dbul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo nya
stong brgyad// nyi shu gnyis sogs dus la bya// yang na rgyun du byas na rab// za tshogs sum yar mchod pa dbul// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma yis// ging dang mkha' 'gro mchod las bcol// tshogs la dang po

rab mtha' ru// mchod dang bshags dang drag po'i las// bstab pa bya zhing 'gugs 'dren bya// gtor ma phud spro phyis kyi rta// gzhan gsum rang rang phyogs su btang// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas

rdzas dang gtor ma gsum// dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris byas te// khyad par dngos grub blang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi grub lnga sman sna lnga// spos lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang snying sna'i phye// phud rgod thod
pa mtshan ldan sbyar// 'brub khung 'khor lo ling ga thun// bcas la 'dzab dgongs gsal ldan pas// thun bzhir smra bcad ma yengs bzlas// dang por zhi khro'i las gzhung bsrang// mchod pa gsum par tshogs

mchod dbul// rak+ta sbreng zhing mchod bshags bstod// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi bcad// bsgrub khang g.yo dang lha sku ston// 'od 'bar sngags sgra sgra chen sgrogs// mon dang zhib can las la chos// sa g.yos

nam mkha' grub pa skad// go chas lus brgyan mtshon cha 'bar// de rtsogs rmi nyams mngon sum 'byung// gsang rtags lus yang sems gsal zhing// lha sku mngon mthong lung ston dang// snga na med pa'i rnam pa
myong// nyon mongs shes pa yul la 'bar// rang dbang med par khro gtum 'tshig lha srin sde brgyad bskor phyag 'tshal// rang sems sgrib sbyangs mngon shes 'byung// de nas ting 'dzin thabs ldan
pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// des ni bdag dang yi dam lha// gnyis med ngo bo gcig par 'gyur// de dag gsang sngags bzlas lugs ni// sku yi snying po bcu bdun pa// rgyun du ma yengs
bzlas par bya// gsung dang thugs dang yon tan sngags// stong la brgya gdags brgya la bcu// de la nye bar bsnyen pa gdags// mtshan ma gsum gyi 'gugs sngags 'dis// ye shes lha tshogs mngon du

'gyur// ya ma snying sha sha dza dza dun// ya ma snying ru pa sha ya// ya ma snying a kar+Sha ya dza dza hU~M// zhes bzlas nye ba'i bsnyen par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du 'gro

ba'i bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu dgu'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa las la sbyor ba bshad// dkyil 'khor gtor ma dam rdzas bzhin// gtor ma mchod pa la sogs pa// gong du mi
btang skabs 'dir btang// dkyil 'khor zhal sbyar de bzhin no// rabs chad ro bsregs g.yul bkye ba// dur khrod ro bsregs gong gsum pa// bzhi mdo shan pa'i rten sa la// drag po'i chus sbyar 'brub khung

ni// khru gang rgyal mtho gang dang// sor bzhi nang dpangs mdzub khrid de// bar dang phyi ru shes par bya// dang por tsher rtsang srin mo 'gros// bar la thod rlon mtha' mar sbrus// nang du shi khrag sna tshogs byug/ phyi

ru dug sna sol chen byug/ gting du gru gsum nyis 'gyur bzhi// hU~M dang phaT dang dza dang rbad// gsum gsum thems la nre blangs dgod// logs la b+h+yo gsum kun la'o// rjes sa phyi sa dri ma gcin// skra shad

gos dum zhing khang sa// ling ga sor bcu dbang po dod// skra bsil gsar bu khong stong pa// snying khar mi bring dpral bar rus// lte bar bla la bla dag khams// gro ga la bris khong par gzhug pha mes bu tsha spun

zla'ang gzhug nad rims gri khrag sna tshogs dang// dug sna tshogs kyis nad phyir byug de bzhin sga sgog pi pi ling// tsha ba gsum gyis phyi nas byug rgyu rkyen nye bar gsod ba'i rkyen// mkhar rkongs srin can bad

mkhris slong// bong bu'i sa bon nad rnams 'du// sa dmar lus la tsha ba bskyed// nad khrag de bskyed dug snas gsod// drag po thod par byad du gzhug bdag la rgyab bstan gan gyal dang// spyi tshugs skabs

sbyar dong du brnag/ drag po thun gyi rdzas rnams ni// nyungs kar srog gcod myur du gsod// nyungs nag sngags mda' bla tshe 'joms// skye tshe me 'bar tsha ba bskyed// rdo phyes smyo 'bog gsad pa 'grub// zangs
phyes shan dmar myur du gsod// lcags phyes srog gcod myur du 'joms// mi yi nad khrag sna tshogs kyis// rang rang nad 'bebs gsod par byed// gri khrag sna tshogs de bzhin gsod// rta khrag

dri dang glang thabs gsod// khyi khrag sha zan srog la 'bebs// ra khrag sri can dur nas gsod// dug chen myur du srog gcod gsod// ba spu smyo 'bog 'chal pas gsod// ra dug me 'bar tsha bas gsod// sbyang
dug nad slong 'dus pas gsod// de dag la sogs thun rdzas rnams// rten 'brel mthu yod kun kyang bsog/ mon nam rabs chad thod par blugs// sha za mtshon char byin gyis brlab// rten pa sa yi 'khor lo
yi// dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'brub khung lnga// ling ga bcug la thun dbab cing// 'khor lo bskor zhing phur pas gdab// dur khrod ras sam zhing lpags pa// yi dwags klad gzhungs dri chen chu// khrag

sogs rme ba lnga sbyar te// rus chen dkar pos dung phyis bya// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur gsal bas// lho bltas sngags bzlas khro sems kyis// skra shig tshol chen lus byugs te// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsod byed

bri// bya rog sgra rtsa'i snyu gu yis// snag tsha sga sgog pi pi ling// shing shags sa bon tsi tra ka/ dur khrod sol ba na le sham// lan tshA nag po nyungs na nag mar// dug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs// de dag sbyar la

'khrul 'khor bri// dbus su thig bskor rim pa bzhi// 'du ba bzhi yi nad slong yin// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// lcags mkhar lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// rtsa ba drag po'i 'bru lnga dgod// mu la rtsa
ba'i 'khor lo yin// phyi rims lcags mkhar drug gnyis la// rten 'brel lus 'joms 'bru bcu gnyis// me dbal gshed kyi 'khor lo yin// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying
po gsum// gnas mthun lto sbyor gsum sbag dgod/ kha gnon stobs kyi 'khor lo yin// mtha' ma mtshon cha'i nyi shu'i rtsibs// gsad pa srog gcod yig 'bru gnas// gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yin/
kha sbyor yab yum lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni// pho yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra// gcod cing sreg pas thams cad 'joms// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung
'dra// skyom zhing g.yeng bas rims dal 'bebs// dug khrag ngar glud thar byas te// khyams khang rtsibs mchan ming rus dgod// dbus su rtsang phur kha la lding// mi rgyus mkhar nag shur par bcom// bdag
nyid gshin rje gshed po yi// thugs las 'od zer drag sngags 'phros// 'khor lo las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par byin gyis brlab// sngags 'bru las kyi gshin rje bdud// mtshon cha sna tshogs
srogs gcod bsam// 'brub khung gshed kyi khyams khang ste// srid gsum bla srog khyams khang ngo// thod pa lcags mkhar sgo med du// rtsang phur las kyi gshin rje dang// ma mo sha za'i tshogs su
bsam// ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// de la mthu gzhug byin gyis brlab// de ltar rten 'brel sa sna la// rigs ngan chus sbyar gshin rje'i gzugs// 'jigs tshul lto 'phyangs khong stong bya// rgya sol

khrag sna dug chus byug/ de nas ting 'dzin dgongs ldan pas// las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub sngags bzlas// rgyun rings brgya brgyas mgo drangs te// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu bdun pa// nyin dang mtshan mor bsgrims
te bzlas// stong tshig 'khugs bcas don dbul mchod// bstod dang las bcol drag tu bskul// thun bzhir smra bcad bar mi gcad// bsgrub khang g.yo zhing sa 'gul dang// rlung nag tshub ma gnas sa
khengs// me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'khrug/ bdag nyid khrab gon mtshon cha thogs// mon pa mi nag rigs mi gcig mtshon thogs dgra la dmag 'dren dang// sgra chen gnas sa 'brum pa skad// gcan gzan

bying med a tsa ra// mang po'i dpon byas dgra la chas// gzhan yang dud 'gro 'ching zhing 'khyig dgra dngos btson 'dzin skye shi gcod// khyi ra rngan byed phyugs gsad bshas// brnag pa de bzhin sha bgos
na// las la tshud de las rnams 'grub// de nas dgug dang dbye ba dang// gsang ba'i 'khor lo nyi ma bzhir// bskor zhing gsad pa'i las rnams bya// las kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa dang// dung ting ka yis las
la rbad// bla srog bkug la lha bzhi dbye// ling ga la bstim dgra dngos bsam// nyi ma bzhir gsad las rdzogs bya'o// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrugs kyis// 'gros stabs brgyad kyis 'khrul 'khor

bskor// 'bru ded drag sngags bdun pa rnams// bdun bzhi nyi shu brgyad du bskor// ru khugs ru khugs chen po dang// g.yu yi sbyang mo dgu phrugs dang// bya rog khu 'khrig ces bya dang// g.yas bskor g.yon
bskor stag mchongs dang// ro langs stag chen 'jug brdums sogs// bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad par bya// de dag bsgrub pa chen por bshad// gsad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// gzir ba stobs kyi bdag

pos bya// dbang ni btsun mo'i lto ru'o// dgu pa dre'u seng ge'i ltor// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o// rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya// rgyas pa nor lha'i gzugs su bya// zhi ba zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor te// smyo ba spre'u shan dmar ro// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu'o// yams dal dred mo ral can la// mdze shu rus sbal chen po'i ltor// gri rgod shan pa khan dmar la'o// bzlog pa gnam sa 'khrug byed
la'o// de ltar 'khrul 'khor las rdzogs bya'o// mtshan mo chun dril thun du dbab// sha za srog gcod pho mo'i ging// nad dang mtshon cha thog ltar 'bebs// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs
kyis// brnag pa rdul phran tsam du brlag/ nyin bzhir drag sngags 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog lus gtubs// de bzhin rdul phran tsam du brlag de ltar las rdzogs rtags mthong nas// bsreg

dang mnan dang zor 'phang ba// mtha' brgya rnam gnyis gzhung bzhin bya// spogs pa ro langs stag mchongs so// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rag+sha snying kha rak+ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/

rag mo te kuM dza dza/ kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya yon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag ma srog rtsa la b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dza mu tra ni/ gshin rje nag po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i

snying la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ nri a kar+Sha ya AM gu sha dza dza/ de ba b+hid dam sha ya pra be sha phaT/ hU~M stam pa ya dza nan/ hri ti pra

ma ya/ mur dza ya/ rak+ta ra dza ya/ mA ra ya/ nri sha ku ru nri rbad ya/ de dag las kyi rim pa yis/ thun mong mchog gi dngos grub 'byung/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen po'i
le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu tham pa'o//// de nas 'jam dpal rnon po yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i// lha bsgrub rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol
pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyed nyon cig/ chos nyid rnam dag ye shes spros bral 'jam// thugs rje zhor 'byung 'gro don mthar phyin dpal// rig pa'i ye shes bgres rgud med pas
gzhon// rigs drug ye shes drug ldan nyon mongs 'joms// de mtshon phyag rgyar snang bas zhal drug pa// 'gro ba'i dpal mgon legs sbyin phan byed lha// dngos grub byin rlabs 'byung bas bsgrub pa'o// de

nyid mngon du bya ba'i bsgrub pa ni// ri rgyal lhor ltas dur khrod byin can du// sngags pa dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yis// sku gdung sbyin gtor 'jam dpal mtshan rnams brjod// gnas kyis dang gshin rje'i

gnas sa la// stegs bu ngos re khru do dpangs khru gang// dur khrod sol chen nra rings skyer rtsi khrag/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus gnag dmar dang ljang// gru chad sgo bzhi phyogs mtshon bar khyams khrag/ thod

pa skam rlon 'phreng ba me ris bskor// de dbus thod pa dmu lugs smug chen chung// bdud rtsi rak+tas sngags bris gtso bo'i rdzas// rtsibs brgyad pad+ma 'dab brgyad gang rung la// shar du tri shul lho ru ral gri
dgod// nub tu dgra sta byang du shag ti mtshon// mtshams bzhir be chon gru chad me ri zhing// bar khyams dur khrod sgo bzhi be chon dgod// de ltar rdul tshon dkyil 'khor legs par bri// dur khrod

ras la ri bong khrag chen rtsogs// bdud rtsis bris sku lho ru dgram// 'bru sna gtor ma cha gsum mi rta la sogs kyi// sha khrag bcas pa bdud rtsi rak+ta dang// phyi mchod rnam par sgrib pa sbyang phyir bsham// tshil

chen mar med gsung chen dud pa dang// zhing rkang gling bu thod pa ltag sprod rnga// zhing lpags bla 'phan dur khrod rgyan rnams dgram// sngags pa lhor bltas zhing chen chas gos bgo/ rak+ta'i thig le gdong gdab
'jam dpal dpa' bo la// rjes su yi rang dbul zhing dad pa bskyed// spyi gtsug smug nag bruM gsal nyi ma'i gdan// mthing nag ya yi 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byas// slar 'dus bdag thim ya

man ta kar bskyed// dpal chen de kho na nyid glu blang ngo// de ba la hri/ de ba la hri/ ting khro ting khro ru pa ti ho/ go ro tsa na bdud rtsi'i ril bu mur/ lha ni thog ma'i mtshan mo rang nas nye'o// maN+Dal steng du 'bru

sna'i lha bshos bca'// tshil chen zhab ma ut+pal sngon pos brgyan// lha la sum yar tshogs dbul rang yang rol// bdag ni yi dam lha mchog khyod bsgrub ces// dam bca' phyag rgya lu gu rgyud du sbrel// gshin rje
gshed la dam bca' 'di skad brjod// ho/ bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs sngon nas las dang thugs rje dang// smon lam rgyun gyi rnam 'byor ba dag dang 'brel// thugs dam 'brel
ba'i lha mchog gshin rje gshed// srog la bab kyang lha mchog khyod mi gtong// thugs rje rtse gcig rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs// lha mchog bdag la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
grub stsal du gsol// byams pa'i zhal bzangs bdag la bstan du gsol// zhes brjod dam bca' mang du bya// tshil chen gsur chen klad pa rten// ka ra bI ra'i me tog mchod// mtshams ni dam bcad ma

yengs bya// de ltar sngon du rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon 'gro bca' thabs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gcig go/// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa

bshad// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// rnam dag chos nyid stong par gsal// kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin// chos rnams snang la rang bzhin med// tshad med bzhi bsgom ting 'dzin rgyu// bdag nyid lus med
ting 'dzin rgyu// ma las nyid ma'i dal dbus su// rang sems mthing nag hU~M du gsal// de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// 'phags pa 'jam dpal thugs
khar thim// thugs dam rgyud bskur mchod pa phul// stong gsum 'jig rten khams su 'phros// sems can ma lus sgrib sbyangs te// don byas slar 'dus hU~M la thim// bdag gi sgo gsum sgrib pa

dang// bag chags ma lus bsregs sbyangs te// bdag lus 'od zhu hU~M nyid las// gser gyi rdo rje lngar gyur// de bzhin 'phro 'dus rdo rjer zhu// gser zhun lta bu'i byang chub sems// de las sku bskyed sngags

brjod pas// bdag nyid khro rgyal dpal chen po// ya man ta ka'i sku ru gyur// sku mdog mthing nag stang zil 'dra// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis la// zhabs drug g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhugs// rtsa
ba'i dbus la mthing nag khro// g.yas zhal dkar po zhi ba 'dzum// g.yon zhal dmar po brjid pa bzhad// de stengs dbus zhal zhi ba ser// de yi g.yas zhal ljang khu gdangs// g.yon zhal sngo skya mche
ba btsigs// zhal re'i dpral bar rigs lnga'i zhal// zhal kun ljags 'dril mche btsigs rngam// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// thod skam ser khra sprul gyis bsgyings// bcu gnyis phyag na bsnams pa

ni// g.yas pa drug na go rims su// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram dang// chos sbyin phyag rgya tri shul la// be chon ral gri lcags kyu dang// sti ra'i zhing chung thur du brkyang// g.yon pa drug na go rims su// khyung khra
sdigs mdzub me 'bar ba// ban d+ha khrag bkang shag ti'i mdung// gnam lcags mda' gzhu rgyu zhags bsnams// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag gi sham thabs mchog tshar brgyan// thod rlon 'phreng
ba'i se ral kha// phyag gdub zhabs gdub rigs bzhi'i sprul// dpral bar rak+ta zla gam thig le// mkhur 'dzum thal chen tshom bur mtshan// kos ko zhag gi zo ris can// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
na// ma he'i gdan la brjid par bzhugs// de 'og gshin rje pho mo brdzis/ kha bub gan kyal byi chings gdan// thugs khar nyi ma'i gdan dkyil na// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku// sku mdog dkar

ser 'dzum zhi bzhad// phyag g.yas rdo rje ut+pal g.yon// dbu rgyan rin chen brgyan gyis mdzes// thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// lte bar nyi ma hU~M mthing nag/ mtha' ma snying po sngags kyis bskor// thugs kyi ye

shes 'dus ma byas// gzung 'dzin skye 'gag spros bral ba'i// hU~M las g.yon du hU~M 'phros pas// 'phro 'du la sogs de bzhin bya// bskyed pa'i sngags brjod shes rab yum// ro langs khro mo pe ta li// zhal
gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po yab la 'khyud// bar pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa// yab kyi thugs khar bsgrengs nas 'dzin// mtha' ma yab

kyi lte bar 'khyud// g.yon pa khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng// ban d+ha rak+ta yab la stob// tha ma tri shul bsgreng ba'o// rgyan dang cha lugs yab dang 'thun// khro rgyal ya man ta ka yi// thugs las 'od

'phros sngags brjod pas// dbyug tho las ni mthing nag ya// de las sprul pa'i khro bo sras// ya ma rA dza khye'u chung sngo// spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs tshul rngam// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// zhing gi ko
rlon stag lpags bsnams// g.yas g.yon be chon sdigs mdzub bsgreng// gtso bo'i pho nyar bka' sdod pa'o// lha rnams dal gyi pho brang na// thod pa skam rlon gzhal yas na// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na
bzhugs// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor// sku las ye shes me dpung 'bar// nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang 'joms// sprul sku sems can thams cad la// dus gsum ji ltar mos pa bzhin// gang la ci
'dul der ston pa'o// b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang bskyed de// de dbus khro rgyal yab yum bskyed// 'khor du gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs// sprul pa'i las mkhan ma lus bskyed// de thugs ye shes 'od
'phros pas// phyogs bcu chos kyi dbyings nyid nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim// phyag mtshan phyi nang gsang mchod 'bul// dngos grub blang zhing thugs dam bskang// bshags dang tshogs kyi

'khor lo byo'o// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ oM AH hU~M pe ta yi rak+ta rak+ta man hU~M phaT/ oM bA+e pa sa ta dz+nya na phaT/ ya ma sa ma ya dza/ oM bud d+ha d+harmA seng ge b+h+ya/ e ha hi b+ha ga ba na/ ya man ta

ka kro d+ha shwa ri ya ma rA dza sa ma ya dza hU~M baM ho/ ya ma ye ma hA su ka ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM tiSh+Tha lhan/ oM ya man ta ka e ka b.ri/ shri badzra d+hu be du/ pu Sh+pe pu/ A lo ke hri/ gan d+he a/ ma hA mu tra pu tsa ho/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta shri

b+ha na kha ram kha hi/ ma hA ma sa kha hi/ ma hA rak+ta kha hi/ ma hA tsit+ta kha hi/ ma hA go ro tsa ni kha hi ma hA ba su ta kha hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta kha hi/ ma hA b+ha ling ta i dam gri h+na gri h+na/ kha hi kha hi/ rak+ta pi pa to/ ma hA bo

d+hi tsit+ta su ka ho/ ma hA mam sa rak+ta ke ma ni ri ti pan tsa ba ri ye swA hA/ oM shri badzra ru pa ka ya hU~M/ pra ti a ra li hU~M/ du pa du hU~M/ b+ha ling ta hU~M/ tsan d+ha li hU~M/ sba ra na kha hU~M/ pany+tsa a mri ta hU~M?/ oM ma hA kro d+ha shri ya

man ta ka a la la ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog gi rgyud las/ las rim bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di bshad
do// bdag nyid ya man ta kar gsal ba yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// de thugs rdo rje'i snying po sngags// de las sngags kyi 'phro 'du bya// bdag nyid chen por bsgrub pa'o// mdun du dkyil
'khor dbus su bsgom// de bzhin 'phro 'du ma yengs bzlas// yi dam lha yi bsgrub pa'o// bdag thugs snying po 'od 'phros pas// 'dom gang phan chad khro bo'o// skur gyur sngags zlos stong
gsum gyi// stong khyab sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// mu mtha' med pa'i chos dbyings khyab// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// 'jam dpal khro bo tshogs chen gyi// thugs thim mchod phul thugs dam
bskul// tshur 'dus bdag thugs snying por thim// bdag nyid sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dus// de ltar gsal bas ma yengs par// dus der rtags dang grangs su bzlas// bye
ba bdun dang bdun 'bum khri// dus ni gnyan zla'i nya stong bsgrim// rtags ni mngon phyung bar du bzlas// sum yar mchod pa dbul zhing bstod// srod 'jing rtags byung dam sri 'dre// yin pas mtshams bcad

mnan gzir bya// nam phyed tho rangs rtags byung na// lha yin mchod dbul dngos grub blang// ban d+ha dmigs can phyag rgya bcas// sbas la lan dgur sngags glu blang// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya man ta ka pa

tsa te ro ni hU~M dza dza/ oM sa ma ya a nu ra ga na pa ti/ ya man ta ka ha ha he/ oM ya man ta ka hU~M/ kA la ru pa hU~M/ oM hriSh+ti bi kri tra a na na hU~M phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+Sha ra

tsa sa to/ ru ni yi na ra ya dza ni/ hU~M dza/ khro rgyal ya man ta ka yi/ thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// lho phyogs dur khrod ma la ya// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// skye 'gro kun srog dbang sgyur
ba'i// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'chi bdag gnag/ 'khor bcas srog drangs mdun du bkug/ nag po 'jigs tshul tshe srog bdag/ khro rgyal bka' sdod las bcol byed// 'phro 'dus rgyud bskul las byed

bsam// ma yengs rtags byung bar du bzlas// sku gzugs g.yo 'gul sngags sgra sgrogs// snang srid nyi zla'i 'od kyis gang// nyams la lho sgo byed snyam byed// gza' skar mang po thang la lhung// gcan gzan
mche btsigs bdag sgo bsrung// bdag nyid nyams dgu rang sems gsal// rlung nag 'tshub ma sa g.yos dang// 'brug sgra chen po skar mda' lhung// yi dam lha mchog mngon gshegs nas// sku mdog nag po
gdong pa gzur// mche ba ring la dmar ba gtsigs// zhal bgrad spyan rtsa dmar po bsgrigs// dur khrod chas ldan lho bal 'dra// me dpung nang na bzhugs par ston// bdag nyid las kyi 'phro ngan na// rigs
kyi bu khyod ci 'dod zer// klad du ral gri brdeg tshul ston// sran chung 'jigs na nyen che'o// mi 'jigs sran tshugs phyag rgya sngags// bdag gi 'phags pa dam pa'i mchog grub pa khyod kyi thugs dam
ste// bsrung ba 'di lta bu zhig 'tshal// gang 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang// tshig mangs mi smra sems brtan pas// dbyangs snyan dam pa'i glu 'di blang// u tra ra sa dar ma ka/ a a ni ka na ga na

d+ha yed/ e e pa ta pa ta pa tan/ dz+nya na si d+hi phra ma ya a tha/ zhes brjod dngos grub nges dam bca'// des ni gang 'dod las 'grub 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang dag gsang ba'i rgyud las/

sgrub thabs rim pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor bshad// dus kyi mtha' ma shar ba'i tshe// bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba'i

phyir// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bskor// des ni gdul bya sgrol zhing gcod// zhing chen dur khrod ras dag la// sme ba lnga yis thang ba bya// ni rangs dung phyis rkyang bcad la// dug khrag rgya sol zhun ma

yis// lhor bltas bya rog sgro rtsas pris// dbus nas thig skor rim pa bzhi// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// de phyir rlung

ri stong pa la// mtha' ma rtsibs chen dgu gnyis ldan// de la gnas shing dgongs pa ni// rtsa ba gshed kyi 'bru lnga dbus// lcags mkhar me dbal 'bru bcu gnyis// rlung ri sku gsung thugs kyi stobs// rtsibs
la gcod byed mtshod dbal 'bru// gsang mdzod rtsibs mchan brnag pa'i ming// g.yas skor steng gcod yab kyi ltor// 'jigs tshul be con sdigs mdzub bsgreng// g.yon skor 'og gcod yum gyi
ltor// 'jigs tshul tri shul thod khrag bsnams/ kha sbyar dong rtsang brnag pa'i steng// dgug dang dbye ba'i las rdzogs phyir// mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bskor zhing gcod// brnag pa rdul phran tsam du
'gyur// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha gzhi gcig la// bskor bas nyin bzhir las drug 'grub// 'jam dpal zhal drug nyin nas 'byung// bzhi skor re res las 'grub 'gyur// de dag rgyas pa'i rim bshad

'di'o// steng gi dbus zhal zhi ba nas// smyo 'bog srog gcod 'khor lo 'phros// yak+She ni rA dza sa to me/ ya ma sa to ru na yo ta/ ya me na yo ni ra yak+She/ ya ta ra ya dza ni ra ma/ steng gi zhal g.yas ljang khu

nas// rdo rje rtse gsum chu 'khyags dbab pa 'phros// ya ta ya ma ni ra tsa/ yak+She ya ma ya to ru/ ra ma ye ta na yo ni/ to me ya ta na yo ni/ steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas/ gnam lcags ur mo thog dbab

'phros/ rak+She yo ya yo k+She ru/ to ma ya ya yo ma to/ yo k+She ra ya rak+She yo/ ya ma to ya to ma ya/ 'og gi dbus zhal mthing nag nas/ srog gcod gshed nag 'khrul 'khor 'phros/ ya ma me ta k+She ni ra tsa/ ya me te k+She

ma sa to ru/ ya ta k+She ma me na yo ni/ ya k+She ma me ta ra ya dza/ 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas/ gdug pa srog len mdze nad gtong ba 'phros/ ya ma ni ra tsa ta yo/ ya me sa to ru k+She na ya/ ya ta na

yo na mar/ ya k+She ra ya dza me to// 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po nas/ dmar po srog gcod dri rbod gtong ba 'phros/ ya ma ra yo ta yo tsa/ ya me to ya k+She ya ru/ ya ta yo ya ma ra ni/ ya k+She ya ya me to dza/ pra ma ya/

mur dza ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya/ ma ra ya/ nag ku ru nri rbad ya/ ra tsa a sa ma la tri/ ud ma hA pra tsa le rbad/ dud kar phrom shu ti phrom ya ma phrom/ ya ma hur shar b+ha ri sha ra ya shar phob/ badzra dz+wa la raM shar

phob/ thog thog chem chem srog la thum rbad b+h+yo/ ya ka shi bi sha tsi ru ka la ru tra sha trun sog la mA ra ya dza/ tsi ri dza la rak+Sha tsa ra ya na g+ha hu ma ya ba sti sha trun snying khrag baM ril rbad/ rak+Sha khram ti mA ra ya rbad bu

nan/ tsit+ta tshal pa khram khram mA ya rbad/ de dag gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor te// drag po'i las kun 'grub par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga brgya

brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// thun drug gsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// phung sa gsum gyi 'brub khung ni// gru gsum dpangs khru mtho gang tshad/ kha khyer thod 'phreng tsher rtsang

bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ de nang mon pa'ang gri thod du// rten drug ling ga ming rus bcas// tsha ba nad khrag byugs la brnag/ gri bo dmar chod thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi dri nad khrag/ mon pa la

byung thod pa ru/ dug rgod ra sbyang ba spru dug/ mdze can dmar chod thod pa ru// mdze khrag sbal sbrul chu bya'i khrag/ mi phyugs gang rung smyon thod du/ de khrag nyungs kar nyungs nag 'bru// 'brong chen khrom gyi 'thom

nag tu// gcan gzan sna tshogs sha zan bya'i// khrag snying mchu sder mche ba bsham// dbang drag phur pa dug ngar blud// bdag nyid khro rgyal gdong drug pa// ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// 'brub khung

gshin rje'i khyams khung nas// thun rdzas nad dang mtshon cha'i dbal// yab kyi las kyi gshin rje 'khol// yum gyis ma mo bdud mo 'khol// kun 'dus thun gyi mtshon cha yis// brnag pa'i lus srog rdul du rlog

de ltar gsal bas drag sngags bzlas// khro rgyal ya man ta ka yis// zhal drug drag sngags gzugs la brab// steng dbus ser po zhi ba'i zhal// smyo 'bog dbab sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI

ya man ta krita ma ma e ka dza ti ta ka ni sha trum ma na ha ra ud ma ta nr-i mA ra ya dza/ steng gi zhal g.yas ljang khu nas// snying gzer dbab sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya man ta ka tri sha ra k+sha pe ta li kro d+hi ru lu b+h+yo
