tsit+ta tshal pa kham shag rbad/ steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// mdze nad thun sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma kla la hU ya na ga rag+sha ti ku la phu ta ya/ ma ma kro d+hi tsi ti dz+wa la ha na ya snying khrag bam

ril rbad/ 'og gi dbus zhal nag po nas/ klad gzer dbab sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma tsa na d+ha kro d+ha nir ka mo shan pa mA ra ya ro tsa na mun thibs shag ti rbad// 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas// rgyu

gzer thun sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma rak+sha dza ma ya snying kha rag ba su ta ro myags khrag ti rbad/ srog tagi rbad/ snying tig rbad/ 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po nas// dri rgod dbab sngags 'phros pas

brdeg/ ya ma rak+sha ya ma khrag/ ya ma tri ta ha la ya khram ti rbad/ ha ri thum ril ram shag rbad/ 'bru yi thun gyi smyo 'bog gtong// mdze khrag thun rtsogs mdze nad 'bebs// khrag thun dmar po dri rgod
'bebs// dug thun nag pos rgyu gzer 'bebs// bya gcan thun gyis klad gzer 'bebs// phur thun nag pos snying gzer 'bebs// thun rtags me 'bar me stag 'thor/ khol dang lud dang rlangs pa

'byung// sgra dang 'phrad zhing 'thor ba 'byung// sngags pa dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// des ni brag la brgyab na 'gas// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// thun

drug gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do// sangs rgyas rang sde sngags pa dang// mu stegs gzhan sde'i byad sngags kyis// sbyor ba
drag po gnod byed na// de bzlog rang bsad 'khor lo ni// rang bzhin rnam dag stong pa las// bruM yig sngon po yongs gyur pas// gnam lcags 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// rno la rgya che me 'bar bsgom// dbus

kyi lte bar hU~M yig las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// gzhon nu gdong drug gsal bar bskyed// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po las// ye shes drug 'od zhal nas 'phros// rtsibs drug sprul pa'i gshin rjer
gyur// 'og gi dbus zhal nag po nas// shar rtsibs 'od nag 'phros pa las// khro bo me 'bar bdud 'dul sprul// mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// 'og gi zhal g.yas dkar po nas// shar lho dkar po

'od 'phros pas// khro bo rnam rgyal ging chen sprul// dkar po 'khor lo dbyug tho bsnams// 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po las// nub rtsibs dmar po'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo tshe srog dbang sdud sprul// dmar

po pad+ma rgyu zhags bsnams// steng gi g.yas zhal ljang khu las// nub byang ljang khu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo yon tan 'bar ba sprul// ser po gsal zhing dgra sta bsnams// steng gi g.yas zhal ljang khu
las// nub byang ljang khu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo stobs ldan bzhad par sprul// ljang khu be chon khram bam bsnams// steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// byang rtsibs mthing nag 'od 'phros
pas// khro bo khams gsum zil gnon sprul// mthing nag ral gri rgyu zhags bsnams// kun kyang zhing chen gdan la bzhugs// me dpung klong na dur khrod chas// ye shes 'khor los byin brlabs bya// mchod pa

la sogs kun rdzogs bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis// gdul bya kun gcod rdul phran brlag/ gsang sngags bar chad med par bzlas// oM shrI many+dzu ya man ta ka/ ka ya ru pa sa ma ya/ badzra kro d+ha rA dza

ya/ badzra ra dza mu ha na/ ya ma rA dzra kro d+ha ya tsa kra tiSh+Na warti/ pra taM ki ra ha na ha na/ tha ma tha ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka shrI many+dzu ka la ru pa/ badzra kro d+ha ya ma ye sa ma ya hU~M/ du na du na pa tsa pa

tsa/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ya ma sarba pud+d+ha na ka ya raka sha ra ka sha sa ra sa ra/ dgra bo mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa twa me ya mar kang sha phung to me/ ya ma ti sha khrag to me/ ya ma yak+sha mug to me/ ya ma

tsan d+ha snying to me/ ya ma tri ta srog to me/ myags thums ril rbad/ bsreg pa me yi las rim gyi/ zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag po/ ri lum dkar po rtsi chags pa/ me thab zlum po dngul chus byug/ yam shing tsan dan

dkar po dang// be dkar 'jag dkar mtshar bu'i shing// ga bur shu dag cu gang dang// ming byang gu gul dkar po bsreg/ lha yang dkar po shel ltar dag/ bsgoms la rgya spos bre gu spos// spang spos rtsi mar

me tog dkar// shing thog g+hi hang bsreg byas na// drag po smyo pa'ang zhi 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun la gdon mi za// nyon mongs khong khro gdon bgegs dgra// byang sngags nad dal sdang sems can// ma lus

rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// ri rgyal lhun po rtsi shing sar// me thab gru bzhi gser gyis byug rtsi shing sna tshogs 'bras bu can// skyer pa'i yam shing ming byang dang// rtsi mar spos dang shing mngar dang// pad+ma ge sar star
bu dang// shug 'brum ku sha yung ba dang// gser gyi me tog sna tshogs bsreg lha yang btso ma'i gser ltar bsgom// longs spyod rigs brgyud tshe dang nor// bsod nams dbang thang dpag med 'phel// shin tu

rgyas pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// lhun po dgu 'dus brjid che'i sa// me thab zla gam pa la shas// byugs la yam shing tsan dan dmar// pa la sha dang gser shing la// khre dang je tse mon sran dang// g+hi hang pad+ma me
tog dang// gur gum ming byang bcas pa bsnams// pad+ma dmar po'i me tog bsreg lha yang dmar po brjid tshul bsgom// rgyal blon sngags pa stobs can dang// yul khams dang ni bud med dang// 'dre gdon
pho mo sdang byed ma lus pa// nges par dbang sdud bran bzhin 'gyur// dur khrod brag nag mtho la gzar// me thab gru gsum sol chen byug/ dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// dug dang dri spod shing
me spar// sha sna tshogs dang tshil chen dang// khrag sna 'bru mar ming byang rgyu// gtor ma gu gul nag po bsreg lha yang mthing nag khros par bsgom// dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol 'joms gsod// gzir bzlog

rlag par byed 'gyur ro// de dag gsang sngags smra bcad bzlas// shan ting ku ru swAhA/ puSh+ti ku ru s+pha pha ra na/ pa shang ku ru hri dza/ mA ra ya ku ru phaT/// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyin

sreg gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gnan gtad sbyor ba 'di bshad do/ ling ga 'khor lor bcas pa de// 'khor lo dur khrod gnas su gnas// ling ga thod

chen mi shis bcug dur khrod tsha sgo dmyal chu khol// khu rlangs ngam grog lhor ltar dmar// las kyi gshin rje de gnas gtad// myos nas glang thabs nad kyis 'chi// ya ma pa tra ha sha na b+h+yo// ya ma rA dza khrag to
me ya// ri nag ri mgo mdud pa 'dra// brag nag mtsho nag 'khyil cing 'khol// byang bltas bdud nag gnas pa'i sa// der gtad 'thibs nad lkugs pa'i gsod/ rak+sha pra ka mo ni b+h+yo/ kA la ru ta b+ha ti

ya// gangs ri brag dkar yang rtse na/ mtho rtse rgod lding rtsang yul na// lha rgod dreg pa 'khor bcas gnas// der gtad zer thun blang thabs gsod// de ba yak+sha pra thun b+h+yo// a sa pa ya de ba pra// ri brag rko chu

dmar po la// rang gzhan 'bros 'dra sa rtsub na// sha za srin po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad pho gzer thun med gsod// rag sha pra ka mo ni b+h+yo// rak+sha bi sha tsa thun// lcags ri chu srin kha gdengs 'dra// chu 'thab

gdug shing rkang gcig nas// gnod sbyin drag po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad blo bur hur thums gsod// yak+sha kha rag dun b+h+yo// ya ka sha u kra ya/ ri brag thang dmar rkang gcig shing// chu mig sna tshogs lu ma

na// klu bdud nag po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad zha grum nad kyis gsod// nA ga hu ya tan ye b+h+yo/ nA ga yag sha phu ta ya/ chu mig byang bltas rlung nag 'tshub// dgun gsum nyi ma mi 'char ba// de na klu nag

gdug pa gnas// der gtad mdze shu+u nad kyis 'chi// nag po bam ril nA ga b+h+yo// nA ga b+ha ti ta ku la// thang skam srin rdo dregs pa can// rtswa med pra ma shing yod pa// sa bdag nag po gnas pa'i sa// der
gtad 'bras nad phol gyis gsod// be sa khe rin tra b+h+yo// gur lang be sa snying khas// mtsho nag gting rings brag nag rtsar// gting gi mtsho bdud nag mo gnas// der gtad smyos nas myos pas 'chi// dun
ting du med dun b+h+yo/ du la ya dza/ du la ya dza/ dur khrod brag phug gting rings na// ma mo srog zan shan pa gnas// der gtad rims dal nad kyis gsod// ma ma snying khar ka b+h+yo/ ma rak+sha ru lu

dza/ sa ri dmar po gong gsum 'dus// brag dmar yul btsan kha dmar gnas// der gtad dri rgod nad kyis gsod// tsa ra tri shaM dun b+h+yo/ shu la tsa ra ya ka sha dza/ nr-i ha ra hur thums/ staM pa ya/ stam pa ya/
lam nan/ sngags rnams kun gyi 'jug la gdags// 'di ltar gtad pa'i las byas na// dmigs pa gang gtad don po de// myur du gsod byed rlag par 'gyur// thabs 'di 'jig rten lha srin rnams// dgra

srog la dbab ces bya ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pas// de mtha' na ni khro bo gzhan// thams cad kun gyi lag cha 'chor// de la 'khor gyis rab bskor ba// mche ba
gtsigs shing bsgyings pa ste// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyi sku yis ni// gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// 'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor gyis de ltar bstod byas so// 'jam dpal khri drug

stong pa'i rgyud las// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// gshin rje gshed la bstod bskul gsungs// hU~M chos sku byang chub
sems kyi ngang nyid las/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i thugs rje yis// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo sku sprul pa// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshen rje gshed// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings nas
bzhengs su gsol// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i 'phrin las mdzod// hU~M/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal sprul pa'i sku// khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje gshed// me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha 'khrug khams gsum lha
chen thams cad dang// bdud dpung rdul du brlag mdzad pa// khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku// zhal drug phyag rgya bcu gnyis te// zhal gcig dkar la zhal gcig dmar// zhal gcig sngo la zhal gcig
ser// zhal gcig ljang la zhal gcig mthing// zhal gcig hU~M phaT sgra sgrogs pas// zhal gcig zhi la zhal gcig khro// zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal gcig gdangs// zhal gcig mche ba rab tu
gtsigs// zhal gcig brjid la gnon pa'i zhal// a a ha la'i sgra sgrogs pas// zhal re spyan gsum 'dzum bzhad khros// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril ba// smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu// sma
ra ag tshoms me ltar 'bar/ kham nag dbu skra gyen du 'khyil// dbu la thod skam 'phreng bas mdzes// sku yang mthing nag chen po la// sku lus che la yan lag rags// lto che khams gsum lto na 'phro// na
bzar glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i se ral ka/ sbrul nag stong gi gdengs kas klubs// thal chen khrag zhag zhal la brgyan// tshom

bu zo ris thig le can// bcu gnyis phyag rgya 'jigs par ldan// g.yas kyi phyag drug dang po na// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram rnams// chos nyid skye med rol pa'i rtags// phyag drug g.yas kyi gnyis pa na// sbyin
pa'i phyir na phyag brgyad pas// bsgrub pa po la dngos grub gsol// g.yas kyi phyag drug gsum pa na// tri shul phyag mtshan bdud dpung 'joms// log 'dren bdud dpung rdul du rlogs// g.yas kyi phyag drug

bzhi pa na// be con phyag mtshan dgra dpung 'joms// sdang ba'i dgra bo rdul phran gtong// g.yas kyi phyag drug lnga pa na// nyon mongs rgyun gcod ral gri bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag drug tha ma na// rdo rje lcags kyu

sngon po dang// sti ra'i zhing dbyug lhan cig 'dzin// dgra bgegs snying 'byin srog rtsa 'dren// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad nas sbyong// g.yon gyi phyag drug dang po na// khyung gi khra chen lding ba bsnams// dam
nyams kun gyi gshed mar gtong// g.yon gyi phyag drug gnyis pa na// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar bas// nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang bsreg/ g.yon gyi phyag drug gsum pa na// ban d+ha rak+tas bkang ba
'khrug cing gsol// 'khor ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal zad par mdzad// g.yon gyi phyag drug bzhi pa na// shag ti sngon po mdung thung bsnams// bdud dang bgegs dang 'byung po dang// dgra bo'i g.yul ngo
bzlog par mdzad// g.yon gyi phyag drug lnga pa na// lcags gzhu lcags mda' nag po 'phen// dgra bgegs snying la gzir cing 'bebs// g.yon gyi phyag drug tha ma na// ba su ta yi zhags pa bsnams// dgra
bgegs dbang sdud 'khor ba thugs rjes 'dren// zhabs drug rgyud drug mgo nas gnon// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs// phyag dang zhabs gdub thams cad kun// gdug pa'i sbrul nag mang

pos brgyan// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// chibs su ma he sngo nag chibs// ma he gdan gyi sgrom 'og na// gshin rje pho mo gdan du bting// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// sdang

dgra gnod bgegs thal ba rdul du rlog/ hU~M/ g.yon na khro mo nyer gnas ma// yum chen ro langs pe ta li// khros pa'i cha lugs yab dang 'thun// zhal ras 'bar ba gzi yang cha// spyan gsum gdong yang khro
gnyer can// rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing// gyen du skra brdzes gsus mo che// gtum mo dug hrul gos gyon ma// de byin tri shul phyag na bsnams// gzi chen rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// sku yang me
lce 'bar ba can// gdong dang mig ni khros pa'i tshul// phyag dang zhabs gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing

zhal// phyag g.yas dang po yab la 'khyud// bar pa rdo rje thugs khar gsor// mtha' ma yab kyi lto bar 'khyud// g.yon gyi dang po khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng// bar pa ban d+ha rak+tas bkang pa yab la stob// mtha'
ma tri shul dug gsum 'joms// bde gshegs sras kyi bka' sdod ma// yum chen ro langs pe ta la// yab kyi sku la dgyes par 'khril// rtse gcig bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa'i lha// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos
grub gsol// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal bar rlog/ hU~M/ 'jam dpal thugs las sprul pa'i sras// ya ma ra dza 'jigs pa'i sku// mthing nag spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa
gsol// dbu skra kham nag gyen du bsgreng// phyag na be chen sngon po bsnams// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal bar rlog/ thod pa skam rlon 'phreng bas brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// gtso bo'i
bka' nyan las rnams byed// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// dgra dpung shig la bdud dpung choms// 'di skad bstod bskul las rnams 'grub// ye shes lha rnams chos kyi dbyings nas

bskul// byin dbab dam tshig gnad nas bskul ba ni// hU~M/ nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid na// bcom ldan rdo rje khro rgyal gshed chen yab yum dang// rgyal ba'i sras bcas srungs ma dam tshig

can// mkha' 'gro tshogs dang bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod// bdag ni rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod dang// 'dod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa ma lags te// 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse sangs rgyas bstan pa
bsrungs// bstan pa 'jigs byed bsgral bar don brtson pa// ye shes sgrib med khyed kyis sa le mkhyen// bcom ldan 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs sngon nas smon lam 'brel ba'i

lha// sngon gyi thugs dam rnal 'byor bdag dang gcig/ sngon tshe lha mchog khyed nyid bsnyen cing bsgrubs// de ltar bdag gi rtse gcig yi dam lha// thugs dam 'brel ba'i lha mchog bdag bsgrub na// thugs rje
rtse gcig rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs// bdag lus dum bu stong du gtubs gyur kyang// yi dam lha mchog khyod ni gtan mi gtong// mi srid srid pa'i dgra dang bgegs byung yang// khro rgyal mthu chen khyod
kyis mthu gsol cig/ bcom ldan dbang chen khyod kyis dbang bskur cig/ thugs rjes bdud 'dul gshin rje gshed kyi lha// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed ni 'dir gshegs shig/ gshegs nas sku gsung thugs
kyi dngos grub gsol// dus kyi bskal pa me chu rlung 'khrug kyang// khro rgyal khyod nyid gcig pus thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ nad mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rje gshed chen
khro rgyal 'dir gshegs la// thugs rje'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan du gsol// dkon mchog spong zhing dam chos 'dral byed pa// thal bar rlog cig khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// de skad byin dbab dbyings

nas bskul// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po mchog gi rgyud las// gshin rje gshed la bstod cing dbyings nas bskul ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya

mA ra dzas 'di skad gsol// spyi yi don bshad klu nag po// de la gtad pa ji ltar lags// de skad zhus pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don rgyas bshad khyod nyon cig 'khor lo'i spyi don rgyas bshad pa// rnam pa

brgyad dang ma ldan na// 'khor lo bskor kyang don mi 'grub// spyi yi don brgyad gang zhe na// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi ma tshugs na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka ba rdib// las kyi gshin rje mun nag 'khor// las mi 'grub
pa'i skyon 'byung ngo// 'khor lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dres na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gdung 'khrul te// gnad kyis mi tshugs skyon du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto bral

na// sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen 'byung ngo// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po yi// bcun phur bzhi dang ma ldan na// las kyis gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// las byas don med rang 'khor 'gyur// de bzhin 'khor

lo spyir gces pas// 'khor lo'i don bzhi shes bya'o// de dag gang dang gang zhe na// ka ba bzhi zhes bya ba'i don// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bzhi yin te// de don yid la gsal bya ba// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs su
gsal// ngo bo srog gshed lha bzhir gsal// rang bzhin mtshon cha'i rnam par gsal// nus mthu me lce spu gri dug 'byung ba rang gcod rnon por gsal/ gdung bzhi tshad thig bzhis mtshon nas// chos nyid ye

shes yon tan dang// rang rgyud rtsa ba'i sbubs nang nas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung// 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kyi// gzhi rten snying po byed pas na// de ni nyi ma bzhi
pa yi// las gnyer gtad pas nges 'grub pa'o// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha dang// lte ba bzhi yi 'khor lo yi// don gsal bsad pa'i las rdzogs te// chags sdang bzhi las grub pa yi// 'thoms pa'i gshed
bzhi bskul byas pas// nyin bzhi'i 'khor los gsod byed pa'i// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi zhes pa ni// bsnyen pa drod rtags thob pa ni// byin rlabs lha yi gzer zhes bya// rdzas rnams tshang bar 'tshogs pa
ni// rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer zhes bya// 'khrul mig lcags mkhar gshin rje yin// bcu drug khang pa'i gzer zhes bya// drag po'i ting 'dzin rdzogs gsal ba// 'phra bdun dgongs pa'i gzer

zhes bya// 'khor lo'i bcun phur bzhi zhes pa// rnal 'byor dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// man ngag gdeng ldan rang nyams kyi// dgongs ldan sems kyi bcun phur ro// bsnyen pa bye ba tshad skyol te// phyi nang gsang

ba'i rtags ldan pas// las kyis gshin rje ma mo rnams// dbang med las la tshud pa ni// rtsol ba ting 'dzin bcun phur ro// ye shes khro rgyal gshed stobs kyis// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rang dbang
med par las la tshud// 'khu ldog mi nus las byed pa// ye shes byin rlabs bcun phur ro// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// srog nas bskul zhing las bcol te// dmod pa drag po'i sngags bzlas

pas// dgra bo rang dbang med pa ru// bla dang 'bral zhing srog gcod pas// drag po las kyi bcun phur ro// drag po gsad pa'i las dus su// drag sngags don bzhi shes par bya ba ni// 'phen par byed pa skyes

bu lta bu yi// drag po sngags don nges par ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i rgyud las mi bskyod do// myur bar 'gro skyon gzhu rgyud lta bu ma shes na// gzas pa'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya

drag po mde 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i yul dang rgyud la mi 'phog go/ gcod byed mde 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// don po'i rtsa dang srog gzungs mi chod do// de don gsal bar bshad de

zhes bya ba// 'phen byed skyes bu yi ge ya yin te// dbus kyi snying po ya las drangs nas bskor bas 'phen par 'gyur// skyod byed gzhu 'dra rkyen gyi ting nge 'dzin// 'phro 'du bying rgod ma song gsal ba'o// 'phang

bya mda' 'dra ba'i sngags ni// las sbyor drag sngags bcu drug 'bru yin no// gcod byed mde'u lta bu'i drag sngags ni// spu gri drag sngags rnon po'i tshan bzhi yis// dgra bo'i rtsa dang srog gzungs gcod
pa'o// de dag rab tu gces pa yi// 'khor lo'i man ngag sdebs brgyad do// brnag pa srog gzungs gcad cing lus srog 'byed lugs ni/ 'gros stabs brgyad kyis gsad pa dang/ tshul bcu gnyis kyis
gsad pa dang/ gnad dgu sdebs la gsad pa'o// 'gros stabs brgyad ni gang zhe na/ 'bur nag thog 'gros 'bur 'gro mgo mangs dang/ 'khyil pa sprul 'gros stag 'phyos drag po'i 'gros// ka ta ri srin
'gros dang bi bag ta yi 'gros/ rta lam nag po'i 'gro dang rus sbal 'phye bo'i 'gros/ 'khrul 'khor bskor ba'i 'gros stabs brgyad ces bshad/ tshul bcu gnyis kyis gsad pa ni/ rgyu bzhi bsdus te gsad pa
dang/ dug gsum ar gsad gtad pa dang/ 'byung ba rnam lnga rtsad gcad dang// phung po lnga yi stobs gzhom dang// nang grol smad lnga gtub pa dang// dbang po tshogs drug sgo dgag dang// dwangs
ma bdun gyi rtsa bcad dang// dbugs kyi lam sgo dgu dgag dang// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sgo dgag dang// lus ngag yid gsum mthu bsdu dang// shes pa dwangs snyigs dbye ba dang// rten cig me mar gsad
pa'o// gnad dgu dbab pa'i don bshad pa// rgyud la bla gnas sa dgu dang// bla de rten pa'i mtshan ma dgu/ bla 'joms gsad pa'i drag sngags dgu/ skyed byed rkyen gyi ting 'dzin dgu/ drag sngags bskyod
rta thun rdzas dgu/ drag sngags 'jug pa'i sgo dang ni// bag chags bsreg pa'i yi ge dgu/ gnad dgu bsdus 'joms man ngag dgu/ shes pa dwangs snyigs phye la bgrod pa'i tshul dgu'o// de dag 'jam dpal

gshin rje gshed// spyi rgyug 'khrul 'khor man ngag go/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// 'khrul 'khor gyi spyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
pos// klu rgyal gdug pa'i drag sngags bshad// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan la// gdug pa'i klu rgyal mi bzad pas// mdze nad dbab cing gsad pa yi// ngan sngags

drug po'i sbyor ba 'di// gshed kyi sgrub sngags thams cad kyi// spyi rgyug las kyi mtha' rgya yin// stag pa'i shing ngam ro ras la// sme ba lnga yis thang ba bya// snyu gu bya rog sgro rtsa yis// dug sna gdug pa'i khrag dang
chu// khrag chen sbyar bas 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid klu rgyal skur bsgoms te// lhor bltas thig bskor zlum po lnga// dbus su gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru gsum brnag pa'i ming rus gzugs// zla gam
rigs drug klu yi sbrul// phyi rim lcags mkhar nag po la// gdug pa klu yi 'bru bcud dgod// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// spu gri drag sngags tshan re dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu bzhi

la// mdze thun drag sngags tshan re dgod// mtha' ma'i mu khyud zlum po la// sbrul dang sbal pa sdig pa sdom// lcong mo rkang mangs ra bas bskor// rtsibs can brnag pa'i ming rus dgod// sdig pa pho mo'i lto ba

ru// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyor bri// rgyu drug ling ga'i snying khar gzhug/ mdze thod bcug la dngos su brnag gdug pa'i snying khrag dug thun brab// bdag nyid khro rgyal gshin rje mdun du yig 'bru phu
nag po// 'od du zhu bas klu nag po// mgo dgu mig gsum mche ba gtsigs// lag pa bco brgyad g.yas dgu na// sbrul dgu'i zhags pas brnag pa 'ching// g.yon dgu nad kyi rkyal pa dgus// dgra la mi nad
sna dgu gtong// mig nas mtshon cha'i char pa 'bebs// kha rlung nad kyi bskal pa gtong// ro smad sbrul nag 'khyil ba la// shin tu 'jigs shing rngam par bsgom// klu bran thams cad pho nyar

'gyed// phu dang hu yi'i sngags sgra sgrogs// der bsgoms khro rgyal thugs kha nas// ye shes sngags kyi 'od re 'phros// klu yul rgya mtsho'i gling chen nas// klu rgyal 'khor bcas bkug la bstim// klu rgyal nag
po'i thugs kha nas// gdug pa'i klu gnyan sa bdag rnams// mang po 'phros pas ling ga de// dgra bo dngos su gsal ba yi// dkar nag snying gi mtshams nas zhugs// mdangs 'phrogs lus hrul srog gcod

de// sha khrag stod cing zos par bsam// sha khrag gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// drag sngags bzlas shing 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyis gcod// oM nag po ti pa tsa nA ga rak+sha/ che ge mo

ti ku la phe phan shan phos phos/ shig shig chum chum/ hu ya hu ya klu nag po mgo dgu pa/ che ge mo la dza dza/ oM nag po baM ril rtsi rtsi rgyas tsit+ta rgyas/ yan lag sdoms sa ma ya sa ma ya/ mA ra ya/ tsi tsi ti dz+wa la khrag

skyugs/ he he nA ga 'dus/ khram bam ba ru na tsi tsi rgyas/ kha khrag snying la rgyas/ bA ga ru pa ru pa/ hU~M yaM ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya/ snying khrag dun dmugs dum dza dza/ mA ra ya myog rbad/ ces bzlas bye ba

brgya thon nas/ nag po klu la gtad byas na// lo dus na ni don po de// mdze nad btab nas srog 'chad par// the tshom med de nges pa'o// gnan pa drag po'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo rgyu rten ling gar bcas// drag
po gnad kyi rdzas byugs la// sbrul chen po yis byad du gzhug/ khro rgyal stobs kyis gdug pa gtad// gdug pa'i klu la rigs lnga ste// rgyal rigs shar lta dkar la 'khrug/ rus sbal khog par gtad byas
na// smyo 'bog 'tshal bas gsod par byed// rje rigs lhor lta ser la sal// rabs chad thod par bcug gtad na// lkugs dang phol 'bras nad kyis gsod// bram ze nub lta rtsa dmar 'phung// mdze can
dmar gcod thod par gtad// klu gangs dmu chu'i nad kyis gsod// dmangs rigs byang lta ljang la mgyogs// dri bo'i thod par bcug gtad na// dri rgod lkugs pas nges par gsod// dmar nag rlung tshub
nyams mi dga'// dgun gsum nyi ma mi shar ba// gdug pa chen po'i gnas yin te// mon pa'i thod par mnan gtad na// sbos nas gzer thabs nad kyis gsod// kun gyis mdze nag drag po 'bebs/ oM

ka la ti ba tsa nA ga rak+sha badzra pa la/ oM badzra nA gA be rag sha dza la hU~M sha truM nan/ oM kA la ti pa tsa phe phu rak+sha u nan ti/ tri nan nri nan la sha nan/ ku ru tsa ya yaM yaM dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza nan/ oM kA la ti pa tsa u phu
sha rbad/ ka la sha pa ti bi ta rbad nan/ pa ru na be shan nA ga rbad/ nA ga be sa be/ a kri ya nA ga dgra bo nan/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ gang yang myur du gsod byed do// gzhan yang mdze nad dbab

bsad las// shin tu gnyan ra gdug pa yis// rus sbal dngos dang sbrul nag dngos// de la sbal sbrul sdig pa dang// nal bu mdze can dri bo yi// sha chen khrag chen tshil bu dang// brnag pa'i dri chen ming byang
sogs// ba dmar 'o ma dme khrag rnams/ khar rnyed rus sbal mdog 'gyur na// gtum po me yi sreg sbyor bya// yang na gnyan ra gdug pa'i gnas// na tri'i shing la gtum me sbar// gong gi rdzas bsreg drag
sngags brdeg rus sbal sbrul nag gnas su gtad// zhing brdab khrag bsgreng dbang gzugs rbad// btsan thabs las 'dis zla bdun las// mi 'gyang don po lus srog 'bral// lus rul gsod par the tshom
med// yang na gnyan ra gdug chen po// dgu yis sogs rdzas rnams dang// thang dmar shing cig brag rgya'o// dur khrod klu gdug sha khrag la// rus sbal nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ kha gdangs mche gtsigs

mig dmar bgrad// gong gi rdzas byugs sme ba bya// brnag pa'i bdun brgyud ming dang rus// de rang pha mes sogs pa la// bris la rgyu rten khrag chen byug/ rus sbal khar gzhug ro ras dkri// ma rnyed bya kri'i
shun pa la'o// de nyid klu rgyal nag po'i sku// 'chi bdag nag por bskyed la bstim// mnga' gsol ngan sngags drod ldan 'das// gdug pa chen po'i gnas su sba// rang gis ma nyes dpang gzugs shing/ kho
yis nyes pa'i dmod pa bor// klu rgyal gdug pa rnams la'o// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang gsod// srog chags mi rnams smos ci dgos// zla bzhis lus rul srog

'chad nges// de dag drag sngags me dang 'dra// ting 'dzin ma yengs smra gcad bzlas/ oM ka la ti pa tsa nA ga rak+sha rak+sha rA dza/ tsan d+ha ma hA ba khre pa ya/ ti kra la ya/ ka la baM ril tsi ti dza la rgyas/ tra ga thur tsi ta dz+wa

la khrag skyugs/ sha tru da ra da ra/ dgra bo tsit+ta tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA ga rak+sha rA dza/ sha truM snying khrag thum ril/ mA ra ya rbad/ drag po'i las sbyor gang byed dang// snying bzhi ma nor
las byas na// las rnams 'grub par the tshom med// klu rgyal mdze nag 'khor lo 'dis// gang la bskor kyang rlag par byed// sngags pa dam nyams dbang ma thob// rdo rje slob dpon thugs ma mnyes// drag

sngags ma grub man ngag med// rang la ldog pa'i rtags byung na// log pa'i 'phar gnon sbyor ba bya// sbal sbrul sdig pa kha gdangs dang// ba dmar glang dmar ru 'dar 'bu// sbrul chen brang brdung ngu pa
dang// 'khor lo 'bar ba mthong na bzlog de dus log pa 'phar gnon bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// dbu la bya rgyal khyung chen lding// gser lus 'khor lo mtshon gshog pa// rdo

rje'i mchu la gnam lcags sder// thugs khar rdo rje gsang bdag bsgom// mthing nag rigs drug sbrul gyis brgyan// khros tshul rdo rje sprul zhags bsnams// thal chen phag tshil lus byug bdug/ spru dang bla ba'i
go bgo brab// klu rgyal 'chi bdag nag po ni// 'khor bcas bka' nyan las byed mngags// klu yi dug gsum shing lcags brab// srid pa'i klu gnyan gdug pa can// ma lus khro rgyal gshed po yis// sprul pa'i

khro chung bsam mi khyab// skar ltar 'khrug pa rnams kyis dkrug/ nyin mtshan pho mo lto dkrug bya// klu rnams dbang med las la bcug/ gnas sa dkrug nas dgra srog gcod// rang la ldog pa dgra la 'gro// des

na log pa 'phar non no// drag sngags me lce gong ltar brdeg/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya dgu bcu tham pa'o//// de nas ya ma rA dza yis// rdo rje 'chang chen
la gsol pa// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer las// spros pa'i khro bo dregs pa can// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// cha bzung sprul pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// chu
'khyags dbab pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsol bas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyed nyon cig/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// ya ma rA dza myos byed 'bar// dmar po ral pa tshar dgu
ste// drag po gshed chen bzhi rnams bskul// de ni las kyi gshin rje bzhi// chos kyi rgyal po ya ba ti// a ba glang mgo bdud 'joms rjai// rang dbang med par las la bskul// des ni tshangs pa drag po
dang// nye dbang khyab 'jug las la bskul// des ni lha bdud ma mo klu// dmu btsan la sogs sde brgyad kyi// dregs pa can rnams las la 'jug/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po

yi// thugs las sprul pa'i gshed chen bzhi// ya ma rA dza las mkhan sprul// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po yin// de yi sprul pa tshangs pa lha// myos byed 'bar ba las mkhan sprul// gshin rje a ba glang mgo

can// de yi sprul pa drag po yin// ar+ya dmar po las mkhan sprul// gshin rje ya ba ya ti rje// de yi sprul pa nye dbang po// ral pa tshar dgu'i las mkhan sprul// gshin rje rdo rje bdud 'joms rje// de yi sprul

pa khyab 'jug yin// de dag las mkhan sprul pa ni// gling bzhi kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// lha bdud rgyal po gnod sbyin dang// dmu btsun srin po klu sa bdag las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo dang// srin mo bdud mo
stong khri 'bum// sde brgyad pho mo thams cad do// gshin rje gshed pos gshed bzhi bskul// gshed bzhis las kyi gshin rje bskul// las kyi gshin rjes lha bzhi bskul// lha bzhis snang srid lha

'dre bskul// srid pa gsum gyi rtsi 'bras la// chu 'khyags bskral pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// tshangs pas sum cu rtsa gsum nas// tshangs ris man chad 'khrug par byed// dbang phyug chen po rgyal chen bzhi// ri

bdun rol mtsho 'khrug par byed// drag pos gling bzhi 'jig rten khams// lcags ri tshun chad 'khrug par byed// khyab 'jug de kun bar snang khams// nyi zla dang ni gza' skar 'khrug de 'khor lha srin sde brgyad
dang// las kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro yis// sa yi steng nas klu dang gnyan// sa bdag yul rnams 'khrug par byed// de ltar 'jig rten kun dkrugs nas// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// de ltar

dregs pa'i lha rnams ni// smin ma khro gnyer glog ltar 'gyu// zhal gyi rngam sgra 'brug sgrogs pa// spyan nas khrag gi thog gzer 'bebs// shangs nas rlung nag tshub mar 'khyil// tshems nas gnam lcags bu
yug 'bebs// zhal gyi ngang rlangs sprin du 'thibs// ljags dang gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyu// gnam nas bskal pa'i 'brug chen sgrogs// zhal chab chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// srid gsum thog ser
bskal pas 'gengs// de ltar thog ser 'bebs byed pa// gzhi ni klu yis rting pas klu gdug bsdigs// dmag dpon gshin rjes byed pas gshin rje bsgrub// dbang ni lha yis byed pas lha rgod
gdul// g.yos ni ma mos byed pas ma mo brten// rgyab nas bdud kyis byed pas bdud rnams dkrug/ rgyab ni gza' yis byed pas gza' rgod bskul// sna 'dren gnod sbyin byed pas gnod sbyin rbad// byad
mkhan lha ma yin gyis byed pas lha min bkol/ kha lo dri zas sgyur bas dri za mngag/ phung bar srin pos byed pas gzan la dbab// de ltar drag po'i lha rnams kyis// gang la dmigs pa'i yul khams su// chu

'khyags thog ser bskal pa 'bebs// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi snying po las// lha ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
gyis// de dag mngag pa'i sbyor ba bshad// dben la nyams dga'i dur khrod dben// lha srin thams cad 'du gnas su// rten 'brel sa la maN+Dal rtsig/ gang 'bebs yul gyi rdzas kyis byug/ de stengs thod pa

mtshan ldan du// 'bru sna tshogs dang sha chen dang// sha sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bca'// mon pa'i rabs chad nag po'am// thod pa mtshan ngan gling bzhi'i bar// gshin rje bzhi yi rten pa'i rdzas// las byed
bsregs pa'i rdzas dgod de// gling gcig la ni tshangs pa'i rdzas// khri dkar sna dmar snying la dgod// gling gcig la ni khyab 'jug rdzas// tsa ra rog po'i tsit+ta dgod// gling gcig dbang phyug

chen po'i rdzas// mi yi snying chen sbram po dgod// gling gcig dag la khyab 'jug rdzas// thog gi bu yug thog lcags dgod// gzhan yang dug sna khrag sna tshogs// lcags phye zangs phye gu gul gnag nyungs kar

mngag la thod par blugs// de nas sngags pa ting nge 'dzin// rnam par mi rtog ngang nyid las// 'jam dpal ya man+ta kar bsgom// thod pa gzhal yas dur khrod gnas// de ru las kyis gshin rje bzhi// tshangs
pa dkar po be con thogs// drag po mgo dgu dud ka ba// zor ba zhag pa ro smad sbrul// nye dbang dmar nag thod khrag 'phen// khyab 'jug nag po ral gri thogs// gnam lcags thog gi bu yug ma// nag mo
ban d+ha rak+ta 'thor// de bzhi'i sring mo ma mo'i gtso// de ltar gsal bsgoms spyan drang bstim// de nas drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// thugs las 'od zer bsam yas 'phros// 'od zer de dag thams cad
kun// las kyi gshin rje ma mo dang// gnod sbyin dregs pa bsam mi khyab// lag nas dbyug tho zor ba thogs// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad khengs// zor ba rnga bzhi ber kas rdung// ral gris 'thub
cing skon pas 'phyag/ lo thog thams cad rlag par byed// de ltar bsgoms la drag sngags bzlas// drag sngags smra bcad bzlas lugs ni// dang por yang snying rtsa sngags drang// de nas bsgrub pa'i drag

sngags drang// mtha' mar dbab pa'i drag sngags drang// de grub rtags kyi rim pa ni// chu rdzing chen por bskyil ba dang// 'khyags pas gtams dang chu chen 'brub// mi nag mang po bud med mang// skya shar

lo thog rdzi ba dang// dgra yul chu klung chen pos khengs// 'di 'dra'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang// gong gi thod pa'i rdzas rnams dang// 'khor lo khyi nag ra rog po// lus nag po yi g.yang gzhir gtum// dgra
yul lha khang mchod rten nam// yul lha'am klu'am btsan dag la// gza' rgod rgyu dus rta dmar gzhug/ phur pa'i zor gyis lam drangs la// zor khrag yul dbus rten la brteg/ dus ni skyi 'dang chu 'khyags

kyi// bskal pas dgra yul brlag par 'gyur// spogs na rten la sreg thab bya// srid pa gsum gyi lha ma srin// 'khrug nas chu 'khyags ri ltar gtibs// oM a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hU~M phaT/ ya ma

badzra ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duSh+tan ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ru tra phrom/ dud kar phrom/ shu ti phrom/ yu ma phrom/ badzra kha rin tra b+h+yo/ ya ma pa tra ha sham na b+h+yo/ d+harma d+hA du b+h+yo/ de ba yak+Sha pra dun b+h+yo/ rag sha pra ka mo na b+h+yo/

nA ga hu ya stan ya b+h+yo/ yag sha kha rag dun b+h+yo/ hri yag sha shag tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu dun b+h+yo/ oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya dza ni ra

ma ya/ hri ti a mu ka/ yul che ge mor drag tu tsar shar ti phrom dun phrom dkar phrom/ shu ti phrom/ ya ma phrom/ sha ra ra shal lta phob ya/ ya ma ra dza dun b+h+yo/ raM raM ril ril shar shar ma ma ril ril/ nA ga raM raM/

sa du raM raM ril ril b+h+yo phob/ ya ma ra dza raM raM/ ru lu ru lu ling ling hril hril du shug ri las ri las cho la shar shar/ shar ra ra che ge mo'i lo tog la ma rA ya phaT/ long long 'ubs 'ubs hril hril/ ri las lo

la phrom phrom/ tor tor shar shar chem chem nal nal lo la mA ra ya phaT/ dregs pa pho mo kun 'dus pa'i// skyi 'dang chu 'khyags drag sngags yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa las// chu

'khyags sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'khrul 'khor skyi 'dang 'di bshad do// rnal 'byor dpa' bo mnyam bzhag ste// sngags bzlas dur khrod ro ras

sam// shing lo'am gro ga shing shun la// skye tshe lan tshwa nim pa dug ro sol ra khrag skyil 'dang rdzas// lhor bltas bya rog sgro rdzas bris// mu khyud thig skor rim pa bzhi// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram
gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// yang log drug gnyis chu ri'i mkhar// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su skyi 'dang rlung chen 'bru// gshed
gdug thugs kyi dmod pa yin// 'khrul mig bzhi la gshed chen bzhi// thugs kyi snying po mtshon pa dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis la// srog gshas dmod pa'i rgyal po dgod// yang logs chu ri'i

khang pa la// skyi 'dang drag po'i mtshon cha dgod// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// chu ri khang pa shar phyogs su// gshed chen ya ma rA dza dang// chos kyi rgyal po'i snying po ste// ma las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// ru dang

tra dang phrom dang gsum// lha chen tshangs pa'i mtshon cha ste// shar phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang// shar phyogs lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// chu ri khang pa lho phyogs su// gshed chen myos byed 'bar ba dang// a

ba glang mgo'i snying po ste// me las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// dung dung dkar dang phrom dang gsum// drag po gza' rgod mtshon cha ste// lho phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang// lho phyogs lo thog 'bras bu

'joms// chu ri kha la nub phyogs su// gshed chen Ar+ya dmar po dang// ya ba ya ta'i snying po ste// ha las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// shu dang ti dang phrom dang gsum// dbang phyug nye dbang mtshon cha
ste// nub phyogs thog dang bcud la dbang// nub phyogs lo thog 'joms par byed// chu ri kha la byang phyogs su// gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu dang// rdo rje bdud 'joms snying po ste// k+Sha las skyi

'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// ya dang ma dang phrom dang gsum// khyab 'jug nag po'i mtshon cha ste// byang phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang// byang phyogs lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// tha ma'i chu ri zlum po la// dbab
pa'i drag sngags grangs med bskor// rtsibs mchan ser srun yul ming bri// sngags bdag bzhi yi 'phang bar gzhug/ 'khor lo byin rlabs rta dmar gzhug/ rta thod zor gyi thod pa la// dbab sngags 'khor lo
ltar du bri// dbus su rtsa sngags de phyir bsgrub// tha mar dbab sngags drag pos bskor// dbus su yul gyi ming bri'o// nyi ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor// spogs na g.yon bskor stag mchongs bya// gnam gzer

gsang ba zhes bya ba// dmigs pa'i yul gyi nam mkha' la// chu 'khyags 'khor lo chen po bsgom// de yi steng du lha rnams ni// skyi 'dang chas dang ldan par bsgom// de las sprul pa mang 'phros pas// dgra yul
pho mo thams cad kun// rang dbang med par las la bskul// lo thog thams cad rlag byed bsam// chu rgod 'khyags pa'i 'khor lo las// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i ri bstims nas// lo thog rdul du brlag par
bsam// bdag nyid ya man ta ka yis// las kyi gshin rje gshed bzhi bskul// des ni dregs pa rnam bzhi bskul// lha chen tshangs pa'i thugs kha nas// raM las me yi 'khor lo 'phros// dregs pa gza'
rgod thugs kha nas// yaM las rlung gi 'khor lo 'phros// dbang phyug nye dbang thugs kha nas// baM las chu yi 'khor lo 'phros// khyab byed nag po'i thugs kha nas// trag las gnam lcags 'khor lo

'phros// bar snang khams su yig 'bru bzhi'o// 'byung ba tsha grang 'thabs pa las// 'byung ba me chu rlung 'khrugs nas// ma mo rnams kyi byan mkhan byas// dgra yul skyi 'dang chu rlung gis// brlag cing stongs par
byed par bsam// des na yul khams rlag par 'gyur// gzhan yang dregs pa can rnams kyi// 'jig rten khams su chu 'khyags kyi// bskal pa dbab pa'i las bya na// ban d+ha dmar cod gling bzhi bar// 'bru

nag sna tshogs gtor ma bca'/ de la dur khrod sol chen byug/ bag phye'i klu gzugs sna tshogs bya// sngon dmar kha dog sna tshogs bsgyur// sbal sbrul lcong mo'i rdzas kyi bsre// de dag kun kyang gtor mar

gzhug/ khrag sna tshogs kyi zor kyang bca'// de nas ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// drag sngags mtshan rtags byung byung bzlas// yug skra la sogs thag khre'u// sbrul du bsams la thod par dkri// 'bebs na gza'
rgod rgyu dus la// klu yi chu mig gnyen po ru// klad la gsum bskor 'o dod 'bod// gtor ma dang ni zor rgyab na// 'bros long med par yul khams kun// skyi 'dang rlung gis khyer bar

nges// ser ba tshigs khrid byed 'dod na// thod pa'i rdzas dang khrag sna tshogs// thal chen bsres la drag sngags bzlas// gang du 'gro bar rdzas khyer na// khyi bzhin shul du 'breng bar 'gyur// gang 'dod tsam na

khrag sna dang// thal chen thod pa'i rdzas gtor bas// skyi 'dang chen po dbab par nges// gzhan yang chu 'khyags 'bebs 'dod na// sngan ma mo skyes phyi ma pho// skyes pa'i bud med mngal khrag dang// ra dug re

lcags spyang tsher rtsa// bong nga nag po ra rog khrag/ khyi nag khrag sbyar dred shun gtums// ting 'dzin gsal bsgom drag sngags bzlas// rtags thon gza' rgod rgyu dus su// dgra yul klu yi chu mig tu// byang du kha
bltas rlung nag 'tshub// der bcug klu la chu mig dkrug rta rmig gis dkrug bra lcag brab// sngags bzlas chu 'khyags skyi 'dang gis// yul khams thams cad brlag par 'gyur// ya ma rag sha pra pa sar

phob// na ga shed ma ram phob/ pu yu pu yu/ yaM yaM/ shar shar ka dun phob/ ra ga dun phob/ ra ka sha a bi ni phob/ bi bi shar shar phob/ mang ga ni mang ga ni phob/ su rab shag ti nA ga phaT phaT/ pi pi ri li ri

li b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ su ru su ru/ oM phaT phaT/ nA ga li nA ga li/ dum bu dum bu/ hu ya hu ya/ shar shar phob phob/ 'ur 'ur/ thug thug/ chem chem/ nal nal/ phroM phroM/ shar shar/ hril hril/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phob

phob/ dang por bsnyen pa rtsa ba'i sngags/ grub par bzlas te las byas na// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// rnal 'byor dbang dang ldan pas spyad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang snying gsang ba'i

rgyud las/ skyi 'dang 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// sprul pa rdo rje thugs las dgye// khro bdag 'bar bas don bshad pa// drag po khyab 'jug nag

po yi// drag sngags gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di// bstan pa gnyen po srung phyir bshad// 'dzam gling 'jig rten lo thog la// chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'dab pa'o// drag po'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod byin cha'i dben

gnas su// dge bcu tshogs dang sbyin gtor btang// yul sa'i stegs bu yul rdzas byug/ khru gang khru do rgya dang dbangs// gru gsum zla gam thod 'phreng bskor// mthing nag dmar po skam rlon spel// 'khor lo

rtsibs brgyad ljang khur bya// ra rog pad+mar snying la brten// thod pa mtshan ldan gling bzhi par// sha rus khrag rus btsos dang rjen// la phug til sman gtor ma bsham// 'khar gzhong dkar gsum mngar gsum
dang// gu gul klu sman 'bras bu gsum// 'bras chen po yi gtor ma bsham// rabs chad la sogs thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi mngal khrag sogs// dug dang sngo sna yungs kar gnag/ zi ra skye tshe
zor thun rdzas// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sngags bris dug khrag ngar blud la// gru gsum mthing nag dbus su gzugs// dus brgyad rang rang rdzas brgyad bca'// yul ming dbyibs dang lha klu

dang// ser srun ming dang lo thog sngo// bsnol gri'i thod par sngags dang bcas// de ltar dam rdzas 'tshogs par bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal chen por bskyed// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bum drang bstod// gru gsum dbus
su hU~M las kyang// gza' bdud chen po mgo dgu pa// dud kha zor ba chu srin zhags// mgo lus mig khengs ro smad sbrul// glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bu yug 'tshub// rlung nag chu 'khyags skyi gdangs
'bebs// sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed// bdag thugs hU~M las 'od 'phros pas// ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// khyab 'jug nag po lo zan dgug/ dza dza stobs kyis spyan drangs
bstim// rtsa sngags zhabs la mchod sngags btags// gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa 'bul// nyin mtshan gnam sa gtor ma btab// yang na mchod pa'i las gzhung bsrang// khyab 'jug snying po rab sngags
bskor// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// 'phro 'dus mchod phul thugs dam bskul// bkrag mdangs mthu stobs bdag dbang 'dus// de ltar sum yar mchod dbul bzlas// smra bcad drod rtags tshad
mas dbab// mi nag zor thogs rlung nag 'tshub// me 'bar sha rgal chu chen 'khrug/ dngos su mthong ba chu dri bya// de bzhin stong tshogs mchod pa dbul// dgra yul la sogs 'bras bu btab// dgra yul nam

mkhar skyi 'dang gi/ chu 'khyags 'khor lo 'khyil cing 'phro// lha nyid gsal bas drag tu bzlas// lug khyu ser po dngos su 'bab// mi nag zor thogs lo thog rnga// skya shar ber thogs g.yul byed dang// skyi

'dangs sha rgal mang po yis// lung pa dmar zangs bkrus pa 'byung// 'khyag pa rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'tshub// rtags de byung nas dbab par bya/ oM ra hU la a kro ya ra la shag ti hril hril shig shig dun b+h+yo/ oM pa

sha mi ki du ru ma shi ki dza la ti a ta swA hA/ oM tsa pa ti ra hU la ma hA kro d+ha ka ta sha ra/ sha lta sha ra hU~M phaT/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hU la hril hril shig shig phen ya hril b+h+yo/ su badzra yak+sha ke ta/ badzra yak+sha phroM phroM/

drag po dbab pa'i las dag ni// bdag nyid ye shes khro rgyal sku// las byed gza' rgod bka' sdod pa// gang byed kho dang sdongs la dbab// gang 'bebs yul gyi rten rdzas la// thun dang drag sngags brdeg cing
dbab// tshes bzhi'i sod la nub phyogs nas// shar du kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs nag thog lcags phur pas brdeg/ nam mkha' dpangs stod kham nag sprin// nag mo 'jigs tshul

ral pa can// thod pa'i khrag 'thor ma mor sprul// rlung khrag thog dang rdzi kha sgyur// ma ma sa ma ya tra ga rak+sha ma tri ga na sa kha ya ku ru/ te tse b+ha la a yu ta ra ha ra da ra/ un ma naM ni sh+ta truM na sha ya ni dza dza phob/

ljang sngon chen po'i drag sngags so// tshes brgyad nyi dros shar lho nas// nub byang kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs kar bya rgod gshog phur brdeg sngo skya gri thogs 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rlung zhon skyod byed

dgra blar sprul// lto tshil sprin 'dra ser pa sgra// tri dkar dul dul// snying khrag la ril ril// chom chom rtsal thun shig lo thog mA ra ya dza phob// drang srong khros pa'i drag sngags so// bcu gcig 'jing la byang
phyogs nas// lho ru kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs nag gri lcags phur pas brdeg/ nag po ri nag zhags pa thogs// rta nag zhon te bdud du sprul// sems can gzugs 'dra shing lo'i sprin// dus min

mtshan ma mang po byung// ru tra tri ni ra tri ran tri ya/ ma tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM so baM rbad/ lo thog la thun dza ni dza/ phob/ rog ti bdud nag drag sngags so/ bco lnga nyi phyed lho nub nas// byang shar kha bltas drag sngags
bzlas/ sha rul khrag rul mchog phur brdeg/ sngo skya mche gtsigs sdang mig bgrad// 'jigs byed za tshul mda' gzhu thogs// mdug shing g.yag 'dra'i sprin 'byung zhing// rlung nag 'tshub mar bcas te

'ong// mahA tsan d+ha rag sha/ tri tha tri mA ra ya thA/ ru tri mA ra ya/ lo thog la tri b+h+yo phob/ pi ti pa ta'i drag sngags so// bco brgyad nam phyed yol ba la// shar nas nub tu kha ltas bzlas// ngar khrag seng ldeng

phur thun brdeg/ dmar po khrag thig dgra sta thogs// 'jigs tshul gang zhon dmu ru sprul// phying ba brkyang 'dra sprin nag 'khrug/ rmu tri tsan d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rak+sha thum ri li li/ kha sha baM ra ka sha staM thuM ri

li li phob/ hA li ka li drag sngags so// nyi shu gnyis kyi nyi ma bsnur// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor bltas// sngags bzlas skye tshe rkang phur brdeg/ nag po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo thogs// dregs pa'i gtso

bo gshin rjer sprul// srin mdog dmar nag hral hral po// glog dang 'brug sgra ches te 'ongs// ya ma rA dza yaM raM/ ya ma tsan d+ha ri da dza la tsakra d+ha ra na sha ya/ dgra yul ni du mA ra ya phob phob chom chom shig b+h+yo/
du ba mjug rings drag sngags so// nyi shu lnga yi skya rengs la// lho nas byang du kha bltas bzlas// tsa ra dmar po'i khrag thun dang// bya mtshal pu yi gshog phur brdeg/ dmar po sbrul zhags thogs pa

'jigs// sbrul nag 'khyil ba zhon nas rgyug/ sprin dmar hral thibs glog dang bcas// nA ga rA man Ni na ya ya Ni na ta nA ga dza sha ti sa na d+ha ra shu na tsi ta b+hasmi ku ru dgra yul du b+h+yo phob/ khyab

'jug chen po'i drag sngags so// nyi shu dgu yi nyi ma mdung gang na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub kha bltas zlas// sha rul khrag rul ra mchin thun du brdeg/ dud kha mgo dgu ro smad sprul// zor ba chu srin

zhags thogs sprul// rlung nag 'tshub ma dud kha'i sprin 'brug 'byung// mahA b+he d+he pa tra bi nu tsan d+ha ru pi ni ra hu la dgra bo'i lo thog la b+huny+dza ho kha hi he ka li mahA tsan d+ha ma rA ya dza dza phob/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi drag

sngags so// tsa ba ti ra hU la phob/ kri tI kro la sha phob/ ra dza thal ba ni phob/ hu ru hu ru phob/ ma ma raM raM ril ril phob/ sha ra sha lta nA ga phob/ nA ga li nA ga li phob/ dul nal dul nal phob/ ta ka ra dza ti pa

tsi ti phob/ rak+sha dud phrom/ kar phrom phob/ li tsa rbad phrom phob/ drag po sngags kun spu gri yin// de ltar drag po'i sngags bstan pa// 'di ni tho zhes lung ston nam// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba na// rta ma yul
rten bcud la gzhug/ gzer gdab drag po'i gsum nyid do// gzer gdab lo la drag tu mdog/ dus brgyad drag sngags bsdebs la gtong// klu sogs lha btsan yul bdag la// gdug pa can gyi shing me

spar// dkar dmar sngo thabs bskol la spub// thal 'jim gtor zhing drag ru rbad// des ni chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// srid pa 'jig pa tsam du 'byung// dam tshig dbang thob the tshom med// drag po'i skyi
'dang sbyor ba 'dis// gnam sa thams cad 'khrug par byed// dus kyi bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// ri rab bskul zhing rgya mtsho bskor// chu rgod 'khyags pa ra tir gtibs// gang dmigs lo thog rdul du

rlog/ rtsi thog bcud sdud rno dbal mtshon// 'phra men las kyi sbyor ba can// gang 'dod nges par 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsang brnag pa'i las su bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong gsang ba'i rgyud las/ chu

'khyags drag po'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gsum mo//// de nas sprul pa'i rdo rje yis// khyab 'jug las kyi sbyor ba bshad// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa yi// nang du rten 'brel rdzas blugs la// yul lha yul

srung ser srun gyi// ming rus klu gnyan la sogs gzhug/ thod pa kha sbyar ga'u ru// 'khyil ba'i tshul du btsugs byas la// yul rdzas maN+Dal steng du bzhag/ sha rul nya rul khrag rul dang// ra mchin btsos rjen
gu gul gnag/ la phug til sgog pha dang 'thun// sngags bzlas mtshan mo gdab par bya// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman tshogs// gu gul 'bras chan ma dang mthun// sngags bzlas nyin zhing gdab par
bya// ra rog mi snying rang gi rdzas// sngags bzlas dgongs ka nam nangs gdab// gri thod 'khar gzhong nang du blugs// ye shes khro bo'i sku gnas te// khyab 'jug sde brgyad las la mngag/ dus

tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// dmigs pa'i lo thog bsam la dbul// grub rtags mthong nas thun brab dbab// stong thon ga 'ur rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sde brgyad kyis// sprul pa drag sngags brgyad
kyis brdeg/ zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas gdong// ling ga gang rgyu'i gdong phyogs bzhag thun rdzas brab cing phur pas gdab// tshes grangs thim nas grub rtags 'byung// sngags par mchod cing gtor ma

dbul// traka raka sha ra ka mo hril shag rbad/ ser hril shar b+h+yo/ nal bu dang ni dme sha'i gtor ma sbyin/ ma mor sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM a le ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hril shar b+h+yo/ rgya tshos rtsi

mar ra lug dkar// sha khrag 'o ma'i gtor ma sbyin// dgra lha'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki ra hu la hU~M shag shar shar hril b+h+yo/ ra lug nag po'i sha khrag dang// 'bru nag po yi gtor ma

sbyin// bdud nag sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM ser shar khrag la mu sha gtubs swA hA rak+sha se b+h+yo/ sha chen sha sna'i gtor ma sbyin// srin po sha zan drag sngags so// oM raM twaM thun/ shag thum ril raM shar b+h+yo/ ra rgya

lug smug smug bya yi/ sha khrag 'bru sna'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa dmu yi drag sngags so// ya ma rA dza raM raM hril hri shar raM b+h+yo/ mi sha rta sha bdud rtsi khrag/ sbyar ba 'bru sna'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa gshin rje'i drag

sngags so// oM nA ga hril shag sen shag sang dun sa ma ya hril b+h+yo/ klu sman dkar gsum mngar gsum dang// ra dmar sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// klu btsan sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hu

la hril hril shig shig sen sen ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ raM raM hril hril b+h+yo/ rdzas kun 'tshogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i drag sngags so//de ltar drag sngags rdzogs pa dang// sbrul sngon zhing dbul klu la
gzhug/ gnam gzer sa gzer bar gzer gsum// rtse bskyed dbus dang kha 'dren tshul// dmar ring dus la zor 'phang dbab// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gsum du bcas la gcig tu

dbul// 'dis ni chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'bebs// pha ni srin po'i drang song ste// ma ni klu mo ha sham tri// bu ni nag po ra hu+u la// yab ni yag sha glog 'phreng can// yum ni sbal mgo khrag mig ma// bu ni gza'
bdud ke'u kang bdag/ gnam lcags lce 'bab rmu rdo dang// chu 'khyags mi phyugs nad 'bebs so// dug sna khrag sna gu gul gnag/ zangs 'khar thog lcags phye ma la// bsngags te yul gyi lha rten dang// chu
mig gnyan po la sbas na// yul de ring po mi thogs par// skyi 'dang rlung gis 'khyer bar 'gyur// rdzas de dag la ril bur byas// sngags bzlas dgra yi khang 'gram sba/ khang thog sbas te zor
brgyab na/ khang pa 'jig cing 'gas par 'gyur// rdzas de dag la sngags btab ste/ chu mig byang bltas nang sbas na// gang 'dod shwa dang ser ba 'ong// srin rdo mkhar ba thog lcags la// sngags bzlas dug
rgod sna sbyar te// brag nag byang bltas gseb sbas te// rdzas zor don po'i mkhar la brdeb// drag po'i thog chen 'bebs par 'gyur// chu srin sder mo 'bru sna tshogs// 'brug rus khrag sna la mngags
te// 'og tu sbas te phyogs bcur gtor// ser pa khrag tu 'bab par 'gyur// dred zhab mang ga ya ti la// sngags bzlas gtor na thog bzlog 'gyur// nyungs kar rdzas sbyar sngags bzlas te// gtor sha rgal

dang ser ba bzlog/ de dag sbyor ba'i las yin no// gzhan yang gnam lcags 'bar ba yi// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad pa ni// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa gong bzhin du// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags thob pa des// khyad par

gnam lcags dbab pa ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang// mon thod srubs drug kha sbyar te// gri khrag dug snas drag sngags bri// mi phyugs thog grir shi ba yi// snying dang khrag sna khrag sna tshogs// thog

lcags gri lcags khro chu dang// gser zangs 'khar ba lcags phye rdul// 'brug skyugs glog rjes ra rog khrag/ thog grir shi ba'i sha rus khrag/ dug sna tshogs dang gri khrag blugs// thod pa'i dkyil du sde brgyad

dbab sngags bri// mtha' mar dgra bo'i ming rus lo khams bri// rgyu drug ling ga ming byang thod par brnag/ nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tshe'i thun gyis brag/ ling ga sbrur zhing sde brgyad sngags thun brdeg/ zhing chen

pags la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus su brnag pa'i rtsibs la sde brgyad sngags// bkod la sngags bzlas rtags 'di 'byung// rdzas la me 'bar rdzas zhu me stag 'thor// tseg sgra dngos su byung na 'khor

lo thod par bcas// thog rta brnag pa'i mkhar gyi 'gram la sba// ki kang rgyu dus brgyad la thog zer dgra la 'phang// gri mda' 'ug srin khra yi sgro yis sgron/ gri thod mde'u bcug la mda' zor thod zor 'phang/

lha dang sprul pas thog chen bskal pa 'babs// dgra bo lus sogs rdul phran tsam du brlag/ 'dis ni gnam lcags thog chen nges par 'bebs// 'ur chem mA ra ya nis nis kha la rbad du dza dza/ badzra dzA la raM mA

ra ya rbad/ ra hU la ma hA kha la rag sha hril hril 'brug 'brug thog thog rum thog ram thog chem chem shad shad nal nal b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ke'u kang b+h+yo/ drag por phob/ thog thog tshal tshal/ thum thum/ ril li li rbad rbad/
srog la nal la nal shig shig mA ra ya phaT/ gnam lcags thog chen sbyor bar bshad// gsad pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni// gong bzhin bsnyen bsgrub rtsa ba yi// bca' thabs la sogs

rtags thob bya// khyad par phung sa'i 'brub khung la// dug sna shi khrag sna tshogs byug/ de na rabs chad gri thod du// rgyu rten drug gi ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag rdzogs// snying khar ming bris dpral

bar rus// lte bar bla dgas snying khar nr-i// shi khrag gro ga la bris gzhug/ sngags pa ye shes khro bo'i sku// khyab 'jug las mkhan sdongs la brdeg/ ling ga dgra bo dngos su gsal// thun rdzas nad mtshon tsha tshar
'phros// lus srog rdul phran tsam du brlag/ gsal bas ling ga bsgyur zhing bzlas// drag sngags brgya na thun brdeg cing// gtor ma gsum yar dgra bo yi// sha khrag dngos su dmigs la dbul// srog chags
bsad bcing sha dgos na// grub pa'i rtags de sbyor kha bya// zla gcig dus tshod brgyad la brdeg/ thon nas ling ga 'khor lor bcas// khram thod dregs bcing gdugs pa yi// lha 'dre mi bzad pa la
gtad// zhing chen shun la dug khrag gis// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dbus su ming// rtsibs brgyad drag sngags chen brgyad dgod// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog gcod bsam// dus brgyad kha gso zor 'phang

bskul// des ni gang yang srog gcod 'gyur// srog la hu la thuM ril tsit+ta shag rbad ma ra ya dbugs la thums thums// snying tshal pa mA ra ya rbad/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ laM suM baM stam pa ya nan/ lha yi tshe dang ldan pa

yang/ skad cig yud la gsod 'gyur na/ srog chags gzhan la smos ci dgos/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khyab 'jug chen po drag sngags kyi le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu bzhi
pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas spyi dpal mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// gsang bdag rdo rjes yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags bdag/ chos sku'i ngang las gzugs sku bzhengs// khro
rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// thugs kyi snying po mchog 'dus pa'i// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad du gsol// de skad gsol bas yang gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bdag la sogs nyon// dpal chen he ru ka la

sogs// khro bo 'dus pa'i drag sngags ngas bshad do// chos nyid skye med rnam par dag/ rang byung ye shes rang gsal dang// mu mtha' dngos med ma bcos pa// chos kyi dbyings nyid skye 'gag med// gdod nas

gnas pa'i bde chen po// de nyid ngang las rang shar ba// gdul bya thugs rje gdul dka'i phyir// zhi dang khros pa'i sku ru snang// de nyid gdul bya'i sems can la// thugs rje chen po gnyis su skyes// theg
pa thun mong thugs rje gsum// 'gro drug sems can thams cad kun// sdug bsngal dang bral bde la dgod// sems can la dmigs thugs rje'o// bdag med gnyis su dag par gsal// chos

la dmigs pa'i thugs rje'o// chos kun rang bzhin dngos po med// dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'o// thun mong ma yin thugs rje bzhi// rtag pa rgyun du skye ba ni// chu bo chen po'i gzhung dang 'dra// rang bzhin

shugs kyis skye ba ni// nyi ma'i snying po sprin med 'dra// yul dang phrad pas skye ba ni// 'gro bzangs rgyan gyis bsgyegs pa 'dra// bskul zhing gsol btab skye ba ni// sman 'bangs kha nyen sdug bsngal 'dra// de
ltar thugs rje cher skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i mdzod// rab 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs// de dag snying po don dril ba// sangs rgyas khro rgyal kun 'dus pa'i// drag sngags don

kun 'grub byed 'di// thun mong gang brtsams las rnams 'grub// khyad par bla med byang chub thob// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas spyad// de ma yin na dngos mi 'grub// de dag sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ri bo
dgu 'dus ri phran 'dus// shar gyi mdangs 'phrog nub zer len// ljon shing me tog dur khrod gling// rtse mo gnam rnyog lhun rdengs che// nyams dga' byin che'i gnas mchog der// dge bcu spyad cing sbyin

gtor btang// mdo sde gsung bsgrags tshogs 'khor bya// gnas sa de nyid maN+Dal bya// chu gtsang sman spos bdud rtsis byugs// nir ba kha dog lnga phyis la// rigs lngar byin brlabs dkyil 'khor bri// 'khor
lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu la// dbus mthing phyogs mtshon bzhi mtshams mdzes// rtsibs bcu dmar ser rtsibs mchan ljang// bar khyams sgo bzhi phyogs bzhin te// shar dkar nub dmar lho ser po// byang

ljang rtsig pa lnga dang ldan// 'dod yon pha gu dra phyed dang// rta babs lugs bzhin rdo rje ma// lte ba thod rlon rtsibs bzhi skam// rtsibs bcu rdo rje'i ra bar ldan// dbus su thog lcags mchog phur dgod// he ru
ka dpal yab yum bskyed// rtsibs bzhir gri lcags shi shing dang// seng ldeng mchog phur bzhi dgod de// rigs bzhi'i he ru ka ru bskyed// rtsibs bcur seng ldeng skyer pa sogs// phung po khro bcu yab yum

bskyed// dur khrod rgyan 'gram bris sku 'gram// dung chen mtshan bzangs nang nyid du// steng du che mchog he ru ka/ 'og tu kro d+hi shwa ri yum// sku dang sngags dang bris rab gnas bya// nang du don chen sngags bris

dang// bdud rtsi rin chen sman sna tshogs// gsang ba'i dam rdzas dbus su gzhag/ 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor ma la// sha chen la sogs sha sna tshogs// brgyan pa snod bzang bskang mchod rdzas// bdud rtsi rak+ta phyi
mchod lnga// gzhan yang phung sa gsum la sogs// ri rgod sa la klu chus sbyar// 'brub khung gru gsum sum brtsegs pa// khru gang rgya la mtho gang dpangs/ kha khyer dang po thod pas bskor// bar pa

rtser tsang srin mo 'gros// mtha' ma rigs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// nang du dug sna khrag sna bsku// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byugs// gzhan yang dri thod mon thon dang// spyang khu phag pa'i thod pa ru//

yungs kar yungs nag skye tse dang// gri khrag mi rta khyi khrag sogs// dug rgod dar dug spyang dug sogs// rdo lcags zangs phye tsher ma'i tshogs// thod pa re ru ma 'dres bsham// dgra bsad rgyu rten drug la bya// bgegs

gzir sa chu rtswa shing rdo// de la ling ga dbang po dang// ming byang snying po snying khar brnag/ mdze thod bcug la dong du brnag 'khor lo drag po bskor zhing bca'// de nas sngags pa dbang bgrod pas// dam srungs
gdan bsan brtan par bya// chos nyid ma bcos skye med dbyings// sems nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i las// yi ge hU~M dang rdo rje nyid// yongs su gyur las sku bskyed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i
sku// khro rgyal che mchog he ru ka/ chos nyid ma bcos 'gyur med pas// sku mdog mthing nag rngam zhing brjid// dbu dgu theg pa dgu don ldan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing rtsa// g.yas ser g.yon
ljang sngo skya dbus// dbus ljang g.yas smug g.yon dud kha// g.yas gsum 'dzum bzhad mche ba gtsigs// g.yon gsum tshems bsdams rngam pa'i gdong// dbus gsum zhal gdangs 'jigs tshul

can// kun kyang spyan gsum sma ra ser// dbu skra kham nag thod skam brgyan// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad stong nyid mtshon pa'i phyir// phyag rgya bco brgyad phyag mtshan ni// dang po rdo rje dung

dmar 'khrug/ gnyis pa zhing chung snying sbram bsnams// gsum pa zhing dbyug ril med bsnams// bzhi pa be con rgyu zhags bsnams// lnga pa zla ba nyi ma bsnams// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa bsnams// bdun pa

me dpung rlung 'khor lo// brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho khol// dgu pa rin chen ga'u bsnams// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyag rgya bzhi// rnam thar brgyad ldan zhabs brgyad bgrad// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i do shal

brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul dang rin po ches// dbu dang phyag zhabs snyan char brgyan// glang chen ko rlon zhing chen stod// stag gi sham bu rus pa'i brgyan// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che// khyab 'jug bad smad

gdan du mdzad// nyi zla pad+ma gdan du 'bar// rdo rje gshog pa nam mkhar ldengs// me dpung klong na rngam brjid khro// snying po phyag rgya 'os du 'bar// chu las nya 'phar bzhin du bsgom// g.yon na shes rab yum
chen mo// dpal 'bar kro d+hi shwa ri ni// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ma// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing khro// dang po kha T+waM dung dmar

stob// bar pa 'khor lo rgya gram bsnams// tha ma spu gri gsal shing 'dzin// btud de dge sbyor tshul du gzhug dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// dbu la kun tu bzang po bzhugs// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs

na// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing// zhi ba'i tshul ston rgyan dang bcas// mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs// thugs kar badzra he ru ka/ rdo rje'i rigs mchog badzra he ru ka/ g.yas dkar g.yon

dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje be con dgra sta g.yas// dril bu thod 'phreng dung dmar g.yon// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ phyag gi dpung pa g.yas pa la// de bzhin rigs mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ g.yas ser
g.yon ljang dbus smug nag/ 'khor lo dbyug pa tri shul g.yas// zhing dbyug me dpung sdig mdzub g.yon// he ru ka yi dpung g.yon du// rin chen rigs mchog rat+na he ru ka/ g.yas mthing g.yon smug dbus

ser nag/ rin chen ri rab sbrul zhags bsnams// nyi ma zla ba tho ba g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yas su// pad+ma'i rigs mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ g.yas sngo g.yon ser dbus dmar nag/ pad+ma rgyu zhags lcags kyu

g.yas// zhing dbyug khyung khra ril mid g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yon du// las kyi rigs mchog karma he ru ka/ g.yas smug g.yon dkar dbus ljang nag/ rgya gram ral gri gsal shing g.yas// rlung ri dgra sta
sdigs mdzub g.yon// dur khrod sbrul rgyan rdzogs par ldan// dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// mgur gyi mgrin par khro rgyal po// rdo rje gzhon nu mthing nag rngam// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// dang po rtse dgu med dpung 'bar// bar pa rtse lnga kha T+waM ga tha ma ri rab phur pa 'dril// dur khrod rgyan cha rdzogs par ldan// nyi zla pad gdan me dpung

'bar// rdo rje srin po zhes bya ste// 'phrin las mdzad pa'i lha ru bshad// dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis sta zur gnyis// byin pa gnyis dang lte gsang du// ye shes khro bo chen po
bcu// hU~M mdzad mthing nag rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje sngo nag be con bsnams// stobs chen ser nag 'khor lo bsnams// rta mchog dmar nag pad+ma bsnams// mi g.yo ljang nag ral gri bsnams// bdud rtsi

sngo nag rgya gram bsnams// dbyug sngon mthing skya dbyug pa bsnams// 'dod rgyal dkar po dgra sta bsnams// phyag rdor ljang nag rdo rje bsnams// gnod mdzes dud kha rdo rje bsnams// kun kyang dpa' sgeg rgod
gshe 'jigs// glang chen thugs rje khyab pa'i gos// zhing lpags phyi nang gsang bar sdud// stag sham thabs mkhas 'phrin las gos// dur khrod chas brgyad sprul rigs brgyan// nyi zla pad+ma'i

gdan stengs na// me dpung klong na brkyang bskum bzhugs// he ru ka nyid thugs ka ru// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phro 'bar// de ltar gsal zhing 'dres bsgoms na// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos nyid

dbyings kyi pho brang nas// ye shes khro bo de bzhin nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs gsol dang// phyi nang gsang mchod la sogs bya// de nas drag sngags rtsa ba'i 'dzag drang zhing dgongs pa ma yengs

bya// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phros pas// ye shes khro rgyal spyan drangs bstim// ye shes 'od 'phros chos kyi dbyings// gting mtha' med par khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdzogs longs sprul pa'i sku// phyogs bcu kun
dang byang chub sems// kun la mchod sprul dngos grub bsdus// bdag gi sgo gsum sgrib sbyangs dag/ dngos grub byin rlabs 'dus par bsgom// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo mthu
stobs can// ma lus rang srog dbang bsdus te// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ de ltar gsal zhing 'dres par bsgom// rtsa ba'i drag sngags smra bcad pas// de nas ring po mi thogs bar// sa chu me rlung

nam mkha' sogs// zad par skye mched lnga yang mthong// dam tshig gtsang zhing dbang rdzogs na// phyag rgya'i sku nyid mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku dang zhing khams dang// nyi zla dbang byed chos 'khor
bskor// nam mkha' bdag 'dug 'od zer 'bar// mchod rten la 'dzeg rdo rje gsor// de sogs mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// bla ma slob dpon lung ston rab// rmi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang// sems
gsal mngon shes che phra 'byung// bde ba'i ro myong nyams dga' ba// de btson mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// des ni byin rlabs dpag tu med// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
pa yi// gsang sngags rgyal po spyi 'dzab 'di// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur pa// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// oM

a a a/ d+harmA kA ya dz+nyA na/ d+hA 'du badzra tsit+ta pa tra pa tra sa man ta sarba ta thA ga hri da ya garba/ d+harmA sam pho ni ra ma kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badzra d+ha du a/ hU~M sarba bud+d+ha kA ya mahA kro d+ha shri he ru ka tsan d+ha kro d+ha ya badzra ma hA pa

pra u kra ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta kro d+ha rA dzA ya shrI he ru ka a ne a ne a ne/ ma hA badzra kro d+ha bo de sa twa ya kro d+ha ni/ hU~M ka ra/ ya man ta ka ma hA ba la ya ha ya gri ba/ badzra shrI he ru ka bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka rat+na shrI he ru ka pad+ma shrI

he ru ka karma shrI he ru ka badzra ki li ki li ya/ badzra rak+sha mahA kro d+ha shrI badzra ku ma ra ya hU~M/ a rgya a rtsa la/ a mri ta kuN+Da li nI la daN+Da/ Tak+ki rA dza/ badzra pA Ni/ suM pa rA dza/ u ne u ne u ne/ badzra dz+nyA na

tsakra maN+Dal kro d+ha/ pra dz+nyA d+hA du pa mi ta ya/ kro d+ha shwa ri pa pra ya/ badzra ma hA sho ro sarba du kro d+hi ma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ sarba ma hA kro d+ha kro d+hi tsan d+ha hU~M b+h+yo dza dza/ chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab
kun 'dus pa'i// ye shes lhun rdzogs gsang sngags 'di// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzin dang// chos skyong mgon po bdun cu
gnyis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtum po dgod// gang gis thos par gyur pa rnams// rab dga' shin tu yi rang mos// phyag 'tshal bskor dang las rnams byed// rnal 'byor gtsug khur ci bcol nyan// thal
sbyar sbyangs ldan gnod pa sel// de yis dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang// zhing khams kun na bzhugs pa yi// sprul sku'i sangs
rgyas thams cad dang// sa gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang// nyan thos rang rgyal thams cad kyis// gsan nas dgyes nas mnyes 'gyur te// gdug pa dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// thun mong mchog gi
dngos grub 'bebs// byin rlabs mthu stobs dpag tu med// de nas ring po mi thogs par// bla med byang chub yang dag thob// yi ge 'khor lo'i sa chen non// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i

rgyud las// rtsa ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal las kyi dngos grub bshad// sangs rgyas sku gsum thams cad kun// gdul dkar drag po gdul ba'i phyir// khro

rgyal sprul pa kun 'dus pa'i// drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba la// las kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis// thun mong dang ni mchog nyid do// thun mong byin rlabs rnam pa bzhi// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i

phyir// gsad pa me lce lta bu dang// bsrung ba rdo rje lta bu dang// phyir bzlog sa ri lta bu dang// dbab la skyi 'dang lta bu'o// dang po gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'brub khung thun la ling ga bca'// sngags pa khro rgyal
'dus par bsgom// 'brub khung srid pa'i khyams khang du// ling ga dgra bo dngos su bsam// bdag thugs 'os 'phros thun la thim// 'bru gsum khro tshogs 'jigs par bsam// dug sna sha za mtshon thogs
bsam// khrag 'thung ma mo nad 'bebs bsam// klad pa gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'thoms pa'i gshed// bskul bas klad rtsa gcad de myos// nyi dros nyi phyed khrag thun dbab// mgrin pa
nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas// lha min dbang po gsod pa'i bdud// bskul bas ngag rgyun mgrin rtsa bcad// nyi phyed yol mthar dug thun dbab// snying kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi rgod shan
la srog gi gshed// bskul pas rtsa gcad dran pa nyams// lte ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas// phyed yol dgongs par phyed thun dbab// dmyal ba'i dbang po gsod pa'i gnas// bskul pas srid pa'i rten rtsa

gcad// mtshan mo srod dang nam gung dang// gung yol tho rangs bar dag tu// de bzhin rim pa thun bzhi dbab// ye shes lnga yi rang 'od 'bar// thun gyi rta skyon yul la bskyod// 'od kyis dug lnga gnas su

'joms// 'od de sgo dgu'i srog rtsar gzhug/ me rlung snying po dmar nag dbus// srog de 'phrog gcod yig 'bru bdun// phyogs bzhi steng 'og srog rtsar gnas// dkar nag snying dkyil zhu zhing khol// hU~M gis

'phrog rtsa thums kyis gsod// dza yis 'gugs shing ya yis 'phul// ra yis sreg cing ma yis gsod// rbad kyis srog gcod me 'bar gsod// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru smin// de dag drag sngags tsan dug 'dra// hU~M

a ne a ne a ne/ sarba d+harma d+ha du bi shu d+d+he ga ga na a b+ha wa/ d+harma kA ya shu n+ya ta gar+b+ha/ saM b+ho ka ya rat+na a ti saM ba haM/ nirma ka ya b+hi sha de a hU~M sa man ta pa tra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra naM/ badzra sa twa/ nir ma kA ya badzra

shrI he ru ka ba ka ba ga to badzra kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ ka ya kro d+ha/ bka kra ti/ tsi ta tsan d+ha badzra shrI he ru ka/ badzra rak+sha kro d+ha hU~M/ bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka ta thA ga ta kro d+ha hU~M/ rat+na shrI he ru ka tsan da kri kro ta hU~M/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka mahA pa

shang kro d+ha hU~M/ karmA shrI he ru/ badzra yak+sha kro d+ha hU~M/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ hU~M kA ras twa ya/ ya man+ta ka hri ti ka la ru pa ya/ ma hA pa la sti pa ya/ ha ya gri ba tsan d+ha ya/ ar+ya a tsa la ro Sha na ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li rak+sha ya/ nI

la dan Da akra ya/ Tak+kI rA dzA tsa pa la ya/ badzra pA ni badzra rak+sha ya/ sum pa ra tsa ha la ha la/ badzra kI li kI la/ shrI ri badzra ku ma ra hU~M/ ma hA kro d+ha u tshus ma kro d+ha badzra rak+sha/ dz+nyA na kro d+ha da sha pa la ti hU~M/ pradz+nyA sa

man+ta b+ha tra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri ma ma dz+nyA na ta ki ni/ dza la sam ba ri/ kro tI raka sha/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo/ sa man dza/ ma hA kro d+hi nir ma badzra/ ma hA kro d+hi karma kri ta da kri ni b+h+yo dza hU~M/ sangs rgyas thams cad sprul pa

yi// ye shes khro bo thams cad dang// dbyings kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// kun 'dus snying po rtsa ba yi// gsang sngags rgyal po lhun rdzogs 'di// gang gis thos pa dbang du 'du// mos gus dad pas ci

gsung nyan// bsad pa drag po'i ngan sngags 'di// me lce'am tsan dug khol ma 'dra/ badzra rak+sha thun ya rbad/ yag sha la thibs thums rbad/ kro d+ha raM shag snying rtsa rbad/ ru tra ra tsa srog rtsa la rbad/ ma ma trag rak+sha

srog pa la thums ril rbad/ yag mo ka li thang thang snying khrag la rbad/ raka mo kro d+ha thun rmugs rbad/ karma TA ki ni shan pa dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza/ sha truM snying khrag la bi ril rbad/ tsit+ta tshal pa baM ril
rbad/ dbugs la subs ya thum ril rbad/ srog la hur thams rbad/ srog la hur long rbad/ rak+ta mugs thibs rbad/ dbugs la subs thums rbad/ tsit+ta brang shag rbad/ che ge mo mA rA ya yaM/ myogs

myogs/ thums thums/ rbad rbad/ dza dza/ sod sod/ gsang ba ngan sngags spu gri 'dis// rnal 'byor dam ldan dbang thob cing// rtsa ba'i snying po rdzogs gyur na// brag la brgyab dang 'gas gyur na// srog chags
dag la smos ci dgos// dud 'gro gsad pa la sogs te// drod rtags mtshan ma byung ba na// gdug pa can la sogs par mnan// thun 'phang lo dus bzhin du sgrol// gsad pa rgod kyi sbyor ba yin// 'jam

dpal khri drug stong pa bstan pa'i snying po'i rgyud las// bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// phyir bzlog so ri lca bu bshad// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten
la// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas nyid// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo'i rig sngags kyis// gnod byed sngags pa de nyid la// phyir la bzlog ste rang gshed dbab// de nyid gsad

pa'i 'khor lo ni// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas spyad// rtsa ba'i snying po thems rdzogs nas// chos nyid rnam dag ngang nyid las// dmar nag b+h+ruM nyid yongs gyur las// badzra tsa kra b+h+ru?M brjod pas/ mtshon cha'i
'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// steng 'og rtsibs gnyis bcu bzhi ste// dbang drag stobs ldan dmar nag pa// shin tu rno la rgya cher bsgom// de nyid dbus kyi lte ba la// mthing nag hU~M yig yongs gyur
pas// bskyed pa'i snying po sgra dbyangs kyis// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ yab yum gsal la rdzogs par bskyed// dbu la kun tu bzang po nyid// thugs khar badzra he ru ka/ mgrin par rdo rje gzhon nu

bskyed// thugs las rtsibs la 'od 'phros pas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du gyur// de stengs thugs kyi snying po las// ye shes rang gsal 'od 'phros pas// snying po hU~M yig bcu bzhir gyur// de dag yongs gyur rang

sngags kyis// shar rtsibs bud+d+ha he ru ka lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka byang rtsibs karma he ru ka steng rtsibs rdo rje hU~M mdzad de// 'og rtsibs gnod mdzes rgyal po'o// nub stod nub byang rtsibs

gnyis la// rta mchog dpal dang mi g.yo ba// byang stod byang shar rtsibs gnyis la// phyag na rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// de ltar rab tu gsal rdzogs nas// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched rlab// thugs las
ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos kyi dbyings nyid pho brang nas// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'i// mchod pa dbul zhing bdud rtsi blang// bdag nyid gtso bo'i snying

dbus su// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dmar ser bsgom// lte bar badzra he ru ka rtsibs bzhir hU~M bzhi kha dog bzhin// rtsibs kyi kha la chags sdang bzhi// gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang yig
'bru bzhi// a dkar ma ser raM dmar po// haM ni nag po bzhin du brtags// phyi yi 'khor lo'i kha rtsibs la// nyon mongs phung po lha yi bu// 'chi bdag bdud bzhi dkar ser dmar// nag po'i mdog ste dngos

su na// dga' rab dbang phyug lha sbyin dang// nags kyi rgyal po mu khyud bzang// de nas phyi dang nang nyid du// yig 'bru bdud las rang 'od 'phros// chags sdang gnod byed bkug bsdus bstim// mtshon cha'i

'khor lo rnon po de// drag tu sgra dang bcas par 'khor// de dag rdul phran tsam du bcad// byad sngags rbod gtong dgra dang bgegs// nad dang rims dang gnod byed rnams// gcad bya rdul phran tsam du rlag de

ltar drag sngags smra bcad bzlas// 'di lta bu yi 'khor lo yis// 'byung ba'i rgyun dang zlog 'gyur na// dam can rbod gtong smos ci dgos// rang srog rdo rje bzhin du 'gyur// nad bgegs rkyen gyis tshugs mi
srid// nyon mongs chags sdang kun bcad nyon mongs gcod// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lo yin// bsad na rten drug gzugs la brdeg bsrung gzir rdzas kyi ling ga la'o// mthar ni rgyun srang mgon pos
mnan// des na stobs chen rgyal po'ang 'joms// gnod byed rnams la smos ci dgos// gzugs can dgra la ngos su gnas// gzugs med bgegs la bag chags tshul// dbang thob dam ldan sngags pa

yis// rtsa ba'i snying po drod thob bya// de nas las sbyor gang brtsam 'grub// de ma yin na don mi 'grub// he ru ka dpal la sogs te// ye shes khro bo thams cad 'dus// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// sarba

ta thA ga ta ya nir ma/ badzra kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ ma hA pa la ti/ tsan da kri ta ya/ sarba sha truM/ man+t+ra pra yo ga po ta ya sa ma ti/ sarba duSh+taN/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi tsurna ya bi tsu rna ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ staM

b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ bi dwan sa ya/ bi dwan sa ya/ a bi tsurna ya/ a bi tsurna ya/ tsakra ti k+Sh+Na wa rti/ pra ta ka ri/ pra ta ka ri/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ ku ru ku ru/ shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha badzra pa la/ da sha a kra ya/ b+h+ruM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM/ ta

s+ye pa/ ne pa thu thu/ pra hi ki ra/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ badzra rak+sha dgra srog la hur thums dza tsit+ti tshal pa rbad/ dbugs la thum ril rbad/ ma ra ya rbad/ phyir bzlog drag sngags rtsa bar bsdeb/ bsrung gzir

drag sngags rgod chen 'di'o// badzra mahA kro d+ha shrI he ru ka sarba bud+d+ha ma hA pa la/ bud+d+ha baM bud+d+ha/ ha sa ha/ sarba bi g+h+nAn/ badzra kro d+ha u kra ya/ myag thum ril rbad nan/ badzra marak+sha kro ta nA sha ya sbur nan/

badzra ma hA kro d+ha ya trig nan/ sarba ta tha ga ta/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra ma hA bo la staM pa ya nan/ badzra yak+sha sarba dush+tan rtsa khrag tsi ti thums ril nan/ e nan u nan suM laM baM raM nan/ badzra yak+sha sarba duSh+tan big+ha nan/

ha ra ha ra dza/ aM ku sha ya dza/ A kar sha ya dze/ da ra na ya dza/ da ra na ya dza/ hur thums dza/ badzra tig sna rak+sha kro ta tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ srog la ro myag rbad/ nA sha ya rbad/ tsurna ya rbad/ tsit+ta khaM shag rbad/

myag thum ril rbad/ mA ra ya rbad nan/ zhi khro dag nas the brang bar/ gzir na mi 'joms gang yang med/ thams cad gan 'bub myos brgyal rlam/ rang 'khor rdo rje ltar du 'gyur/ bsrung gzir kun gyi mchog tu

bshad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ phyir bzlog gi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dbab pa skyin thang lta bu bshad// sangs rgyas bstan

pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sdang byed bsnag pa'i lo thog la// chu 'khyags skyin 'dang dbab pa ni// gong gi thun rdzas gcig tu bsre// thun snod gzhal yas khang nang du// ye shes sprul pa'i khro bo tshogs// kun kyang
mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// phyag na ral gri zor ba dang// be con gtun shing ber ga bsnams// dgra yul lo thog bcud rnams kyang// rnga zhing 'thub cing brdung bar bsam// bdag nyid khro rgyal 'dus par
bsgom// 'drub khung dgra yul rdzas la bya// de nang yul ming ser bsrung gtso// ming bris bcug la zor gdan bya// drag sngags bar chad med par drang// gnam gzer dgra yul nam mkha' la// chu 'khyags
'khor lo'i gdan stengs na// de ltar sprul pa'i khro bo rnams// pho brang btab ste chu 'khyags kyis// bskal pa'i skyin 'dang 'bebs par bsam// 'og nas khyab 'jug gza' rgod kyi// dmag 'gros dgra yul

rlag par bsam// de ltar lha rnams thams cad kun/ kha rlangs na bun sprin du gtibs/ spyan mig gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyu// rngam sgra nga ro 'brug tu sgrog/ zhal chab skyi 'dang chu 'khyags 'bebs// ye shes khro
rgyal 'dus pa yis// khro bo las la bcug des ni gza' rgod dbang med bskul// des ni yul gyi lha klu bskungs// ma mo mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin na// 'dod khams gnas ris lha yul nas// gling bzhi lcags
ri'i nang tshun chad// gdug pa klu yi yul yan chad// 'khrugs te chu 'khyags skyin 'dang 'bebs// rta ma yul dbus rten la gzhug/ khyab 'jug dus brgyad zor 'phang dbab// spogs na dur khrod rtsub mo
btang// dgra yul lo thog sngo na bsreg/ gsur chen zor khrag thab kyang bya// thal 'dzing gtor zhing dbab sngags bsdus// 'dis ni chu 'khyags bskal pa 'bebs// badzra yak+sha kro d+ha pra ba sa ra ya

phrom phob b+h+yo/ badzra rak+sha dud kar phrom phob b+h+yo/ badzra tsan dar thu tri ya ma phrom phob b+h+yo/ su badzra ya k+sha ke ta phrom shar phob/ badzra rak+sha ga te shar ra sha lta drag tu phob/ ra hu la rak+sha se tri dud kar phrom shar phob/ rag

mo khrag la mu sha ma b+ha ri sha sad drag tu phob/ a ya du ra tsa shan pa u kra ya phrom hril shar b+h+yo drag tu phog da sha lo ka pa la ti ta ki ni nA ka li de ba a su ra tsa ra ti shaM ma ma raka mo/ thog la 'ur 'ur thug thug

shar shar hril hril ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo phob phob/ rnal 'byor dbang rdzogs dam ldan na// chu 'khyags skyi 'dang bskal pa 'bebs// khro rgyal thams cad 'dus pa yis// drag sngags 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// gsad dang
