'khyil// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu brgyan can// shin tu dpal sgeg 'jigs tshul bzhugs// nam mkha' rdo rje'i ro langs ma// mthing nag rdo rje dung dmar bsnams// 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM

badzra pradz+nyA d+ha du shri mu ma/ sra brtan rdo rje dbyangs can ma// sngo nag 'khor lo dung dmar bsnams// nyon mongs bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badzra de sha ra ti lang// gnyen sdud rdo rje mdzod ldan ma// ser
nag rin chen dung dmar bsnams// lha yi bu bdud gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badzra mo hA ra ti maM/ 'od gsal rdo rje phag gdongs ma// dmar nag pad+ma mdung dmar bsnams// phung po bdud kyi gdan la

bzhugs// oMpradz+nyA badzra ra ga ra ti pyaM/ yang bskyod rdo rje tsa tsi ka/ ljang nag ral gri dung dmar bsnams// bdag 'dzin bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oMpradz+nyA badzra ra ta taM/ kun kyang khro mo 'jigs tshul

rngam// dpa' sgeg byams pa'i mdangs kyis bzhugs// rtag par 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje ral gri mthing nag khros// oM badzra kha T+ga d+h+rig chad par 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje be con ser nag

rngams// oM badzra daN+Da d+h+rig bdag tu 'dzin pa gshin rje'i sgra// rdo rje pad+ma dmar nag brjid// oM pad+ma d+h+rig mtshan mar 'dzin pa gshin rje'i dgra// rdo rje tho ba ljang nag gtum// oM badzra mud ka ra d+h+rig kun kyang
gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// spyan gsum mche gtsigs khro bo'i sku// me dpung klong na brkyang bskum bzhugs// dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan// yab yum gtso 'khor thams cad la// rus pa'i chas kyis

mdzes par spras// de 'khor las byed gshin rje'i tshogs// 'chi bdag drug khri drug stong gis// bskor te las byed pho nyar mngags// gang la bya ba'i gdul bya de// sgrol zhing byang chub sa la 'god// rang bzhin

nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te// chos kyi sku las mngon shar ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu'o//// de nas rdo rje
'chang chen pos// mngon rtogs las rim 'di bshad do// oM/ gdod nas rnam dag byang chub sems// bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin las// bdag 'dzin log rtog dbang gis 'khor// snying
po mchog tu sems bskyed do// nyon mongs dug lnga 'khor ba'i gzhi// dngos med stong gsal mnyam pa nyid// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs lhun grub pa'i// sgrib med ye shes dag par gsal// hU~M/ ma rig rtog pa'i
las dbang gis// srid gsum rlag byed bdud du smin// gshin rje dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun// khro rgyal dpal chen rdo rje mdzod// hU~M/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i

dbyings// skye med dngos med mtha' las 'das// ma bcos ma slad mnyam pa nyid// rtog med spros bral chos nyid dang// oM ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba Ad+ma ko haM/ hU~M rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa yi// ye shes sgyu

ma cir yang snang// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// thams cad gzhi'i tshon bzhin du gsal// oM d+harma d+hA du wa b+hA ba Ad+ma ko \u0f85haM/ hU~M/ chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// ye shes rol pa rang shar las// khro

rgyal gti mug rdo rjer snang// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ ye shes rtsal shar khyad par las// me rlung chu yi snying po yis// 'jig rten khams rnams bsregs sbyangs dkrug/ raM yaM khaM/ steng 'og nam mkha' sa gzhi

kun// 'khor lo pad+ma shes rab thabs// oM sarba d+harma bun da tsakra Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ rdo rje thugs kyi snying po yis/ zad par lnga yi skye mched 'phros/ e yaM raM laM khaM suM b+h+ruM/ e yi ye shes rol pa las/ nam mkha' go
'byed kun khyab yang/ yaM gyi ye shes rol pa las/ dngos med kun khyab 'degs byed rlung/ raM gyi ye shes rol pa a/ 'od gsal smin sreg me dpung 'bar/ khaM gyi ye shes rol pa las/ gnyen sdud dag pa chu
yi khams/ lam gyi ye shes rol pa las// sra brtan 'degs byed rin chen sa// sum gyi ye shes rol pa las// rin chen ri rab yon tan rgyas// b+h+ru?M gyi ye shes rol pa las/ chos dbyings mtha' dbus med pa

yi// phyi dang nang med gzhal yas khang// rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas// gru chad sgo bzhi rdo rje me/ dur khrod chen po me rir 'bar/ de nas rang rang gdan stengs su/ phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bskyed/ e badzra shu

n+ya ga ga na hU~M/ yaM ba yu maN+Dal karma hU~M/ raM dz+wa la maN+Dal hU~M/ khaM sa mud ta maN+Dal hU~M/ laM sarba ti sha maN+Dal hU~M/ suM badzra rat+na maN+Dal la hU~M/ b+h+ruM bi sha bi shud d+he/ dz+nyA na badzra karma da du maN+Dal hU~M/ gshin rje nyi zla pad+ma'i

gdan/ phyogs bzhi la sogs dbus su gding/ rdza ma ru tra ta ri baM/ dza ma tri pa ti ra baM/ dza ma ra ka baM/ dza ma ra ka sha ti ra baM/ dza ma ya k+sha ti ra baM/ ma sur+ya maN+Dal/ a tsan+t+ra maN+Dal/ pa pun da maN+Dal/ ya ma me

ta k+She/ ya tsa ni ra dza sa to ru na yo ni ra sba ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hU~M/ tiSh+Tha badzra/ rdo rje rgya gram lte dbus su/ ya yi ye shes rol pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo

bo nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje'i sku// shin tu khro gtum sgeg par gsal// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje dbyings phyug ro langs ma// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med

pas// thugs kyi snying po 'od 'phros pas// sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul las// ye shes khro bo'i dkyil 'khor snang// ma yi ye shes rol pa las// shar du zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// dza yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje
tsa tsam ka gnyis gsal// me yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru ser sna rdo rje nyid// sa yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje phag gdong gsal bar bskyed// ta yi ye shes rol pa las// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje

dang// rdo yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje dbyangs can gsal bar bskyed// k+She yi ye shes rol pa las// byang du phrag dog rdo rje dang// ru yi ye shes rol pa las// rdorje mdzod ldan

gsal bar bskyed// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// shar du rdo rje tho ba bskyed// tsa yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru rdo rje be chon bskyed// ni yi ye shes rol pa las// nang du rdo rje pad+ma bskyed// ra yi ye shes rol

pa las// byang du rdo rje ral gri bskyed// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// na yig 'dus pa'i gshin rje gshed// ga sha na ti zhes bya'o// ra yig ma yig ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed/ dga' ba'i rgyal po

zhes bya'o// bdag nyid dbus kyi sangs rgyas ni// gti mug rdo rje khro bo sku// ni yig de ltar gshin rje gshed// stobs mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed chen dang// rdo rje dbyings phyug khro rgyal
ma// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// sbyor bas byang chub sems su zhu// rtog med ye shes 'od du gyur// chos sku rnam dag ngang du gsal// tsa tsi ka sogs lha mo bzhis// dkyil 'khor bdag po sangs

rgyas gtso// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje la// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis bskul ba// kye/ chos sku byang chub snying po a// 'gro ba thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun bdag

khro bo'i rgyal// dpa' bo chen po'i sku mchog bzhengs// thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ zhes bskul gnyid log sad pa bzhin// ngo mtshar rdo rje'i sku ru bzhengs// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ste// rgyan dang cha
lugs rdzogs par snang// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nam mkhar bsam// rigs mthun lha mo bsam mi khyab// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum chu yis// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs
dbang bskur bya// ye shes rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad de// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so// byang du
don yod grub pa'i gtso// dbus su de bzhin rigs lngas brgyan// gnas gsum ye ge 'bru gsum las// dkar dmar mthing kha'i 'od zer 'phros// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sangs rgyas sku
gsung thugs rdo rje// dngos grub gsum bsdus thim gyur pas// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan gyis rdo rjes byin gyis brlab// gnas gsum rtog pa pad+ma gar// mi 'khrugs sangs rgyas sku ru

gyur// k+She traM hri dzI me th+l+hiM/ sa snying nam mkha' spyan ras gzigs/ phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang/ sgrib sel skye mched rnam drug brlab/ oM ma hA shU dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA

sa man ta dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA pra ta pe sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA krit+ta a nu ta dz+nyA na/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+ha wa ad+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAk+ka badzra swa b+hA ba Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba

Ad+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gcig go/// de

nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mngon rtogs rim pa rgyas bshad pa/ hU~M/ chos kyi sku las ma g.yos kyang// ye shes rang shar rig pa'i sku// gshin rje gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// rngam brjid khro bo'i rgyal por
sprul// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdo rje las// gti mug mun ltar gtibs pa yi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje rnam snang
mdzad// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug shes rab yum// thugs rje shugs kyis gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang me ltar mched pa yi// srog gcod gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms
mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje mi bskyod pa// rdo rje tsi tsa shes rab yum// thugs rje byams ldan gshegs su gsol// nga rgyal brag ltar gtams pa yi// tshe 'phrog gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// nga

rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rin chen dbang// rdo rje phag gdong shes rab yum// thugs rje kun snyoms gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrug pa yi// khrag 'thung gshin rje'i gdan stengs
nas// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje snang mtha' yas// rdo rje dbyangs can shes rab yum// thugs rje dbang gis gshegs su gsol// phrag dog rlung ltar
'tshubs pa yi// dbugs len gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje don yod grub// rdo rje mdzod ldan shes rab yum// thugs rje
'dul mdzad gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs rdo rje'i rigs las sprul// rdo rje tho ba gshegs su gsol// lho phyogs rin chen rigs las sprul// rdo rje be con gshegs su gsol// nub phyogs pad+ma'i rigs
las sprul// rdo rje pad+ma gshegs su gsol// byang phyogs las kyi rigs las sprul// rdo rje ral gri gshegs su gsol// bde gshegs rigs lnga sprul par bcas// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku// ma

lus spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// hU~M/ rnam dag chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan lhun rdzogs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sna tshogs rang snang sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung mi shigs sku la phyag 'tshal

lo// ma chags mi g.yo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos dbyings ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal gti mug rdo rje la'o// me long ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal zhe sdang rdo rje la'o// mnyam nyid ye shes rang shar

sku/ phyag 'tshal ser sna rdo rje la'o// kun rtogs ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal 'dod chags rdo rje la'o// bya grub ye shes rang shar sku/ phyag 'tshal khrag dog rdorje la'o// nam mkha' go 'byed kun khyab

ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyings khyug ma'o// sa brtan mi 'gyur brtan ldan ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje tsa tsi la'o// bsnyen sdud rnam par dag byed ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag gdong la'o// sgrib med kun gsal smin

byed ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyangs can la'o// thogs med khyab byed yang bskyod ma/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje mdzod ldan la'o// rdo rje tho ba be con dang/ rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ste/ ye shes sprul pa'i lha tshogs la/ sgo gsum

dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M/ rigs lnga bde gshegs shes rab thabs// sangs rgyas khro dpal gshin rje gshed// sgrib sbyang dngos grub rtsal ba'i phyir// gnas 'dir brtan par bzhugs su gsol// e h+ya hi

b+ha ga wa na shrI ya man ta ka ma hA ka ru ni kri sna ya ma ri sha hU~M sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ dzaHhU~M baM ho/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ma hA su ka sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stoM/ triSh+Tha badzra ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal

'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mchod pa'i rig pa 'di bshad do// hU~M/ bde bar gshegs so khro rgyal gshin

rje gshed// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes bsam mi khyab// srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas brjod mi lang// kun bzang mchod sprin rgya mtsho mchog tu rol// hU~M/ dri mchog sman sbyor chu gtsang bde gshegs khrus// khro rgyal
gshin rje gshed po 'khor bcas la// mchod pa phul lo thugs rjes dngos grub gsol// dri zhim rgyas pa'i gu gul spos kyi sprin/ kha dog dbyibs legs me tog pad+ma'i mdangs// sgrib med 'od

gsal dug sreg sgron me 'di// ro mchog brgya ldan gtsang ma bdud rtsi bshos// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+ha pa tra pu tsa me ka sa man ta swA hA/ oM shri badzra gan de a ha ra swA hA/ shri badzra du pe du/ shri badzra puSh+pe

pu/ shri badzra a lo ke hri/ shri badzra gan te a/ shri badzra ni bi te hU~M/ hU~M chos kyi sku las rang byung ba/ khro rgyal bdud 'dul gshin rje gshed// shes rab khro mo yum dang bcas// snang srid ye shes phyag brgyar

gsal// grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang// mdzad pa 'phrin las phyag brgya dang// bca' ba las kyi phyag brgya rnams// dbu gsum rnam par thar pa gsum// chos sku rdzogs sku sprul sku gsal// phyag drug pha rol

phyin pa drug sgrib med ye shes drug tu gsal// zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// tshad med bzhi dang phyag brgya bzhi// rab tu rdzogs pa'i mchod par bzhes// ma hA mu tra pU tsa sa ma ye swA hA/ hU~M/ rang byung rnam

dag bdud rtsi sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs dug lnga sel// byin brlabs grub mchog ra sa yan// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje dang// rdo rje dbyings phyug yum chen la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// bzhes te

kun tu dgyes mdzod la// thugs rjes dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// sarba pany+tsa a mri ta shri ban kha raM kha hi/ khro bo zhe sdang rdo rje dang// yum chen rdo rje tsa tsi la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal

ser sna rdo rje dang// yum chen rdo rje phag gdong la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal 'dod chags rdo rje dang// yum chen rdo rje dbyangs can la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro
rgyal phrag dog rdo rje dang// yum chen rdo rje mdzod ldan la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// ye shes thugs las sprul pa yi// khro bor 'bar ba bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod

'bul// khro bo rdo rje tho ba la// khro bo rdo rje be con la// khro bo rdo rje pad+ma la// khro bo rdo rje ral gri la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor// ma lus sprul par bcas
pa la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// hU~M/ dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// dngos grub mchog rdzogs dus 'dir

gsol// kA ya sid+d+hi badzra oM/ wAk+ka sid+d+hi A/ tsit+ta sid+d+ha hU~M/ hU~M/ oM ldan dri med dag pa'i sman// oM ldan chags mchog dbang gi rdzas// hU~M ldan longs spyod phun sum tshogs// rdo rje tshogs chen snod gtams
nas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// ma hA a mri ta pu tsa khA hi/ hU~M/ rak+ta dmar chen chags pa'i bcud/ don khrag dwangs ma pad+ma'i khrag khro rgyal
dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ chags pas gol ba'i mchod par dbul/ ma hA rak+ta pU tsa khA hi/ hU~M/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// thig le'i 'phro 'du dgyes pa
che// dkyil 'khor tshogs mchog gnyes gyur cig/ oM gu ha rak+ta gu ha bu de tsit+ta ma hA su ka ho/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i zhing gyur rnams// gnyis med skye 'gag med par bskul// srog dbugs longs spyod

mchod pa 'dis// dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul lo bzhes su gsol/ oM sarba sha truM ma sa rak+ta pany+tsa ri yi swA hA/ hU~M/ nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// nga ni khro bo kun gyi rje// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i lha// nga ni

srid gsum snying rje'i mchog/ nga ni khams gsum sgrol ba'i ging// nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo mkha' 'gro'i yab// nga ni rang byung rdo rje'i sku// nga ni gdul dka' 'dul ba'i mchog/ nga ni tshe srog
kun gyi bdag khams gsum srog la rang dbang sgyur// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed pa'i// log lta dgra bgegs thams cad kun// byang chub sems su bsgral byas te// sha bza' rus 'char khrag 'thung

ngo// ma hA maM sa khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ ma hA go ro tsa na khA hi/ ma hA me tha khA hi/ sarba sha truM khA hi/ hU~M/ khyad par rmad du byung ba yis// 'bru bcud dwangs ma'i gtor ma

dang// sha khrag bdud rtsi mchod pa 'dis// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yi// thugs dam skong phyir bzhes su gsol// ma hA b+ha ling ta pu tsa khA hi/ ho/ bdag cag ma rig
dbang gyur te// ye shes blo dang ma ldan pas// nyams chag 'gal 'khrul ci mchis pa// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor spyan sngar ru// gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// bzod par bzhes la dngos grub

gsol// sha ra la gats+tsha me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud las/ las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gsum mo//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ 'dzab kyi dkyil 'khor

rgyas bshad do// sku gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po yang dag pa// hri ti sngags kyi rgyal po yin/ de bzhin chos nyid thams cad kyi// srog snying las rnams thams cad kyi// des na gsang

sngags mchog tu bshad// de yang gang du gang zhe na// a ni stong nyid rdo rje ste// skye med rnam dag byang chub sems// oM ni gti mug rdo rje ste// rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku lnga yin// shri zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// na zhes ye

shes rdo rje'o// b+hi zhes nga rgyal rdo rje bshad// hri zhes 'dod chags rdo rje la// kri zhes phrag dog rdo rje yin// tA zhes rdo rje tho ba ste/ Na zhes rdo rje be con no// hU~M ni rdo rje pad+ma ste// phaT ni rdo rje ral

gri'o// de ltar ye shes snying po'o// de bzhin chos skyong snying po ni// oM zhes ye shes lnga yi lha// hri zhes dbang phyug lha dbang po// Sh+ti zhes gshin rje srog gi bdag/ b+hi ni chu bdag kun tu g.yo// k+She ni gnod sbyin

lus ngan po// ta ni dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid// a ni drang srong me yi lha// na ni bden bral srin po ste// Na ni kun khyab rlung gi lha// hU~M ni dri med zla ba ste// hU~M ni 'od gsal nyi ma'o// phaT ni tshangs pa lha chen

po// phaT ni sA 'dzin sa yi bdag/ swa ni khyab 'jug drag po ste// ha ni log 'dren 'byung po'o// de ltar chos skyong mgon po nyid// de bzhin thar byed chen po dgu// oM ni khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// hri ni gshin

rje thar byed do// Sh+ti zhes log 'dren thar byed do// b+hi ni byol song thar byed do// k+She ni gnod sbyin thar byed do// tra ni yi dwags thar byed do// Na ni dmyal ba thar byed do/// na ni dam sri thar byed do// hU~M ni klu

dbang thar byed do// phaT ni srin po thar byed do// de ltar thar byed dgu zhes bya// ye shes khro rgyal he ru ka/ dpal chen khrag 'thung dgu yin te// oM ni che mchog he ru ka/ hri ni pad+ma he ru ka/ hU~M ni badzra he ru

ka/ Sh+ti ni [(]radan[)]he ru ka/ b+hi ni bud+d+ha he ru ka/ phaTa? ni karma he ru ka/ kri ni rag sha he ru ka/ ta ni yak+sha he ru ka/ Ni ni guh+ya he ru ka/ na ni sa byu he ru ka/ de ltar khro rgyal bcu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yig 'bru bcu

bdun sa// gshin rje gshed kyi snying po yin// ya zhes gshin rje gshed chen nyid// ma ni ya ma ra dza gshed// me ni myos byed 'bar ba'o// ta ni ar+ya dmar ru rtse// ke ni ral pa tshar dgu'o// ra ni rdo rje bdud

'joms// tsa ni phya sangs srid pa'i bdag/ sa ni kong rtse brag gyon rje// to ni a ba glang mgo rje// ru ni gshin rje ya ba ti// na ni gshin rje mig dmar yin// yo ni gshin rje smig pa yin// ni ni gshin rje rtel
pa yin// ra ni gshin rje lha mchog yin// ya ni chos kyi rgyal po rje// dza ni gshin rje 'chi bdag yin// bi ni gshin rje thod dbyug rje// de ltar gshed chen bcu bdun no// de bzhin 'jig rten dregs pa

can// stobs kyi rgyal po bcu bdun yin// ya ni las kyi gshin rje yin// ma ni las kyi ma mo yin// me ni bdud mo nad kyi bdag ta ni dri za'i rgyal po yin// k+She ni rlung lha gnod sbyin no// ra ni bdud btsan
srog gi bdag/ sa ni sa bdag nag po yin// to ni bdud nag 'thoms pa'i gshed// ru ni srin po srog gcod yin// na ni klu rgyal gdug pa can// yo ni lha srin dregs pa'i gtso// ni ni dmu bdud nag po
yin// ra ni bdud btsan drag po yin// ya ni brag srin nad kyi bdag/ dza ni sha za dri bo yin// Ni na klu bdud nag po yin// de ltar thams cad 'dus pa ni// sngags kyi snying po zhes su
bshad// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bstim// ye shes sems dpa'i snying dbus su// rdo rje rab 'bar lte ba la// 'od 'bar gdan la snying po gnas// kun
'dus gsang sngags 'phreng ba yi// 'khor lo bskor te ye shes 'phros// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa na// til gang bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rgyud bskul mchod phul dngos grub
bsdus// gnas thim sgrib sbyangs dngos grub thim// byin rlabs mthu stobs bsam mi khyab// de bzhin byang chub sems dbang po// chos skyong mgon po mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dregs pa gtum po rgod la
sogs// ma lus mthu stobs bsdus te thim// gsal bas bar chad med par bzlas// 'od 'bar sku nyid mthong la sogs// mtshan ma bzang po byung gyur na// las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// dngos grub blang
zhing byin gyis brlabs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub kun// ma lus thob cing 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bsam gtan ni// bdag nyid gzugs kyi phung po nyid// gti mug rdo rje'i sku ru

gsal// rnam shes zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// tshor ba nga rgyal rdo rje nyid// 'du shes 'dod chags rdo rje'o/// phrag dog rdo rje 'dul byed do// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// sa nyid rdo rje tsa tsi ka/ chu nyid rdo rje phag

gdong ma// me nyid rdo rje dbyangs can ma// rlung nyid rdo rje mdzod ldan ma// de ltar 'byung lnga yum gyi ngang// de bzhin dbang po skye mched la// las kyi sems dpa' bzhi nyid gnas// mig la rdo rje tho ba ste// rna ba

rdo rje be con no// sna la rdo rje pad+ma nyid// lce la rdo rje ral gri gnas// rtogs nas ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// des ni bla med byang chub thob// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// gzhan yang bsam

gtan rim pa ni// chos kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thig le gti mug rdo rje 'chang// chos nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// ye shes ser sna rdo rje nyid// yon tan 'dod chags rdo rje'o// rang rgyud phrag dog rdo rje'i

sku// dngas ma lnga la yum lnga rdzogs// chos nyid rdo rje tho ba dang// rdo rje be con g.yas g.yon nyid// yon tan rdo rje pad+ma dang// rdo rje ral gri de bzhin no// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs na// ma yengs rgyun
gyi ting nge 'dzin// ye shes rol pa de bzhin nyid// chu la 'ja' chon rnam pa'i tshul// thig le byang chub sems su gsal// yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing// skye med rnam dag rang du gnas// de ltar
gsal zhing 'dres bsgoms te// snying po bar chad med par bzlas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsgom pa'o// des ni tshe 'dis byang chub pa// ring po mi thogs non gyur te// bla med byang chub yang

dag thob// las rnams gang brtsams thogs med 'grub// rtsa sngags brgya stong sngon du ste// bcu bdun bcu pa nyin mtshan no// oM hriSh+ta wi kri tA na na hU~M phaT/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dzA

ni/ thams cad kun 'dus snying po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu bzhi'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang
chen gyis// las kyi 'khor lo 'di bshad do// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa rdzogs pa des// rang gzhung bde ba'i dben gnas su// gang 'dod rab sbyor 'khor lo bskor// gtsang ma'i ras la rdzas kyis byug/ thig bskor
rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// gsang mdzod bzhi dang 'khrul mig lnga// phy-i rim 'khrul mig drug gnyis la// yang logs lcags mkhar gnyan po bcu// de la gnas zhing dgod pa

ni// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga dgod// gsang mdzod dmigs pa'i rnam pa'o// drug gnyis me dbal gshed kyi 'bru// bcu la thugs kyi snying po bcu// tha ma'i mu khyud stong pa la// gang dmigs las grub gsang

sngags dgod// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyar la// sngags kyi bdag po'i lto bar dri'o// de ni spyi ru shes par bya'o// zhi ba las kyi 'khor lo ni// cong zi dkar dang sa zhag dkar// gtsang ma'i chus byugs

dngul chu dang// ga bur tsan dan dkar po dang// cu gang shing thog g+hi haM dang// lhang tser dkar pos 'khor lo bri// ri zlum snum la 'jam pa'i gnas// der bsgrub da sa'i ga 'ur gzhug/ ras kyi skud pa dkar

pos dkri// lha rnams man shel lta bur bsgom// me tog dkar pos mchod par bya// sbrang rtsi mar dkar sbyor ba'i byug/ byams pa dang ba'i sems ldan pas// 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du bya// bsgrub bya gang
yin snying khar thim// sdang sems gnod sems zhi 'gyur te// byams sems dang ba'i sems ldan te// nyon mongs zug rngu dag cing zhi// der bsam ga'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan dkar po'i me la
bsro// sngags bzlas rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo de// bka' rten rab gnas byin can nam// byin ldan zhi ba'i sku gdan sba// des ni dgra sdang gnod byed gdon// nad dang mtshon cha gcan gzan sogs// gnod

byed nyon mongs thams cad kun// rab tu zhi zhing byams par gyur// drag po gtum po'ang zhi bar nges// 'di la the tshom med par bshad// sarba ma nu a a me tri shan ti baM la ha he shan ting ku ru swA hA/ a ho/
dbang gi las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri bo dgu 'dus chu klung 'gram// gnas der rgya skyegs tsan dan dmar// g+hi haM pad+ma'i me tog dang// rak+ta mu la me tog dmar// khye'u dang ju tse mon sran
gyis// 'khor lo legs bris sngags rnams dgod// gnas sa de nyid ga 'ur gzhug/ skud pa dmar po stobs ldan dkri/ lha bsgom byi ru'i sdong po 'dra// sna tshogs me tog dmar pos mchod// sbrang rtsi mar dang
pad+mas byugs// chags pa dbang sdud sems ldan pas// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsgrub bya gang yin snying khar thim// yid dang shes pa srog dbang po// rang dbang med par dbang du
'dus// tshur 'dus bdag thim bdag dbang 'dus// de gsal ga'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan ser ldan pad+ma ka'i// me la bsro zhing sngags bzlas te// bdag nyid 'og tu sbas byas na// skye 'gro ma lus thams
cad kun// rang dbang med par bdag dbang 'gyur// gang sgrub lha gzhan rbad dang// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha srin pho mo ma lus pa// nges par dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// lhug po rgyu ba zhi

yang dbang 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun la smos ci dgos// pa shang a na ya b+ha sha ta/ pa shang wa shang ku ru hri hU~M dza dza/ rgyas pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri bo lhun stug nags tshal dang// 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i
sar// ku sha star bu tsan dan dang// 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i sar// 'bras bu mar yod shing bcud dang// gser dang ldong ros ha ri ta// yu ba zangs lcags dngul dang sbug/ 'o ma bi shas 'khor lo

bri// sngags rgod longs spyod rgyud ldan pa'i// ga'u skud pa ser pos dkri// lha rnams gser gtso 'dra bar bsgom// me tog ser po sna tshogs mchod// sbrang rtsi lan tshwa rtsi mar byug/ dga' ba yid bzhin rgyas pa
yis// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing// 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas zhing// 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// rgyal srid 'bru nor longs spyod

rnams// rab tu 'dus shing 'khel rgyas bsgom// ga'u 'khor lo ser po'i shing// byi thang tsan dan me la bsre// skyed mos tshal dang mdzod khugs na// de ni rigs brgyud nor bu 'bru// thams cad rgyas shing

'phel 'gyur te// longs spyod rgyal chen bzhi dang mnyam// sdong gcig zha lag 'phel 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun 'phel the tshom med// rat+ta gu na hri b+ha'u sha ta po// sha na ma de ba d+ha da de ya b+ha'u sha ta// puSh+tiM sba

ra ya ku ru ho// dgug pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri phrag phyag bdud ri bo bdud// rang byung khrag dang pa la sha/ mu la rag+ha g+hi hang gis// 'khor lo sngags bri hri dza spel// bud med thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug
skud pa rten 'brel dmar po dkri// lha rnams dmar smug chags pa'i mdog/ me tog dmar pos mchod cing bzlas// co zi dmar pos ling ga byug/ gdungs shing dbang sdud sems ldan
pas// 'od zer lcags skyu dmar po yis// bsgrub bya'i snying kha'i srog rtsa zung// mgrin pa zhags pa dmar pos bcings// rlung gi shugs bzhin myur 'ong bsam// seng ldeng tsan dan me la bsra// sngags pa
bzlas ga'u rang 'og gzhug/ rtag pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bya// shing lo skam po rlung 'das bzhin// bsgrub bya rang dbang med par 'gugs// shing skam rtse mo rtsar 'gugs na// shes ldan rnams la smos ci

dgos// ha ra ha ra dza/ A kar+Sha ya dza/ A kar+Sha ya hriH/ rengs pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// dur khrod ras la yung bas bri// lam dang ming spel sngags rnams dgod// nags ma shing gi thang chu dang// gar sbyin tsha la

gu gul gnag/ de sbyar rin rab chen po yi// sa yi ga'u kha sbyar gzhug/ ri rab ri bdun bcas pa bri// ser po hU~M baM laM gyis spel// rdo rje rgya gram dbus nyid mnan// ga'u skud pa ser po dkri// lha rnams
gser mdog 'dra bar bsgom// lhor bltas sngags bzlas 'od zer ni// ser po 'phros pas dmigs pa de// ser po ri yis mnan par bsam// ri rab rdo rjes mnan byas te// 'jigs pa'i me 'dris
bcings par bsam// 'khor lo rkang gcig shing gnyan nam// ri rab chen po'i 'og tu mnan// lcags kyi khyud mos bcings pa bzhin// dmigs rings gnas nas 'gul mi nus// laM sba s+tha ne s+tha ba na laM laM

ya thA pra ra d+ha ka ra spya/ kri tra trang/ staM b+ha ya/ nan ku ru laM/ bskrad pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// gro ga shing shun 'khor lo bri// bya rog rkang snyug khrag gis bri// rlung gi dkyil 'khor ming byang spel// smyon pa'i thod pa

kha sbyar gzhug/ nim pa shing gi bcud dang sbyar// yugs sa mo'i skra'i skud pa nag pos dkri/ lha rnams sku mdog ljang sngon bsgom// brnag pa bdag 'dun gsal byas te// 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dal// sngon po

gzhu'i dbyibs ba dan bzhi// de stengs rlung gi rnga mo ni// sngon po kha ser de rgyab tu// brnag pa bzhag ste de rgyab tu// khro bo gshin rje sngo nag pas// dbyug thos brdeg cing lho phyogs su// rang dbang med par de

nas 'gro// bsam zhing bzlas pa'i sngags rdzogs nas// dur khrod ri mthon rtse la sba// bya rog skyer gdags rlung la spur// 'dis ni bsgrub bya gang yin de// rigs mi gcig gi yul du skrod// stobs chen gyis

kyang mi zlogs so// hU~M phaT sba ra na ya phaT/ phaT u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ye yaM yaM hU~M phaT/ b+ha ya b+ha u tsa ta ya hU~M phaT/ dbye ba las kyi 'khor lo ni// rta dang ma he'i khrag gis bri// gnas bdun sa la de gnyis
gzugs// de yi snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag ste// de gnyis thod pa'i ga 'ur gzhug/ skud pa rten 'brel sngon pos dkri/ bya rog 'ug pa rlung la 'thab// bsam
gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas pa// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed bsgoms te// mdun du rta dang ma he gnyis// steng du brnag pa zhon dmigs te// gnyis ka'i lag na mtshon cha thogs// gcig la gcig brdeg

khro sems kyis// 'thab cing khro brdeg 'thab par bsam// sngags bzlas 'khor lo thod par bcas// nyi ma phyed na dur khrod sba// nyi ma dus tshod dgra gshed la'o// rgyud gcig gnyis su 'byed 'gyur na// lus

can gnyis la smos ci dgos// nri a shag shag ya ma nri shag pra bi sha ya phaT/ bi de sha ya phaT phaT/ de ltar 'khor lo'i sbyor ba las// las rnams myur du 'grub 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang

sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu nga lnga'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po gsad pa'i 'khor lo bshad// dur khrod ro ras zhing lpags la// skye rtsedug dang

nim pa dang// dur khrod sol ba tsha ba gsum// d+ha du ra dang tsi tra ka/ tsha ba'i mar khu sme ba lnga// tsan da bi dza srin lag khrag/ ka na ka yi khu ba yis// nri rangs rgya dang skya bcad de// ldum bu thang phrom kha shog

pa// shi khrag dug sna rgya sol gyis// skra bshig lhor bltas sha chen mur// kang ka 'ug pa'i sgro rtsa'am// dri bo rkang gis 'khor lo bri// mar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// nyi phyed mtshan phyed khro sems kyi// mtshon

cha'i 'khor lo drag po ni// gong bzhin legs par bris byas la// gsang mdzod don po'i ming byang bri// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyar te// yab yum gnyis kyi lto bar gzhug/ rgyus pas kha btsem dong rtsang
brnag/ rgyu rten ling kha ming byang bcas// mon pa khram thod bsnol thod brnag/ 'khrul 'khor ngar thar dam bskur brlab// sngags pa khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// dkyil 'khor gsal zhing 'dres par
bsgom// drag sngags bar chad med par bzlas// shin tu gtum rngam 'jigs la khros// dus mtha' bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer 'phros// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas// khro bo
mdog nag zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis 'khor lo lcags kyu thogs// de sogs mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// 'jigs khros tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// bsgrub bya gang yin lus la thim// rnam shes dbugs
mdangs srog phrogs nas// 'brub khung rten gyi gzugs la thim// gong ltar khro bo 'jigs tshogs spros// bsgrub bya sna tshogs nad rnams kyis// gdungs shing mnar te rid la skams// gcer bu sdug bsngal
yid mug pa// shu bas lus khengs mig rtsa rig skad ngan khro tshogs sha zas bskor// ral gri phur pa 'khor lo mda'// mtshon cha tshabs che btab cing gtubs// rlung chen gyis g.yengs grang
'khyags 'dar// mdangs med lus la me chen 'bar// tsha bas gdungs shing sreg par byed// chu bo 'jigs pa rba drag pa// rlabs chen po yes khyer zhing bying// nyam chung sas nub ri yis mnan// stobs zad

lcags kyi khyud mos bcings// de la ce spyang seng ge stag wa khyi dom dred gcan gzan gyis// gtub cing sha za khrag 'thung bsam// kang ka bya rgod 'ug pa khra// bya gcan mchu rings rngam pa yis// za zhing snying
'byin rgyu ma 'dren// gsod gcod sgra sgrogs gsod par bsam// rkyal pa khrag gis gang ba la// mtshon gyis brtsogs bzhin khrag 'dzag bsam// brnag pa'i ling ga de nyid la// skye rtse dang ni lan tshwa

dang// nad khrag sna tshogs dug sna tshogs// tsha ba'i mar khu bse khrag byug gdug pa can gyi tsher ma rno// rtsang dang phur pa gri thog lcags// bar mtshams med par gdab cing phug de yi go cha bsrung ba
rnams// phrogs nas thugs dam snying por bsdu// de lus khong stong lta bur bsam// bdag nyid thugs las rab sbrul ba'i// khro bo 'jigs pa mtshon cha thogs// shin tu mi bzad rngam sgra sgrogs// gsod cing

'thub cing sha rnams za// khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha' bar bsam// de nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// dregs shing gdug pa'i dur khrod du// gtad rtsang bsreg dang 'phang bar bya// spyod lam rgyun gyi ting 'dzin

bya// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She la/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ oM hri Sh+tI bi kri ta/ A na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ stam pa ya/ staM pa ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT

phaT/ mA ra ya dza/ mA ra ya phaT/ mA ra ya hU~M/ mA ra ya nan/ oM shrI pa ra ya k+She gu h+ya sarba ka la ru pa ma ra na phaT/ oM ya ma badzra tsan da hri sti badzra rak+She ya ma baM baM khA hi hU~M hU~M a mu ka pa shaM ku ru hril hril/ mA ra ya dza/

mA ra ya dza/ oM oM oM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ 'dus 'dus raM raM yaM yaM raM raM hring hring dun b+h+yo dun b+h+yo hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ a mu kaM mA ra ya dun b+h+yo/ gshin rje gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad gshin rje

yi// dgra gshed sprul te 'dul mdzad pa'i// drag po sngags kyi rim pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong snying po mchog gi rgyud las/ drag po 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu drug go/ de nas sangs
rgyas thams cad ram spyi dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus 'di skad ces gsol to/ rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed/ rdo rje 'jigs
byed chen po yi// rtsa ba'i dngos grub bsgrub thabs la// sku yi phyag rgya chen po dang// de nyid sgrub thabs rnam grangs dang// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa dang// mthar thug drag po'i sngags rgod

dang// man ngag gsang ba'i gnas rnams dang// bla med byang chub thob bya rnams// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad ces ni rab zhus pas// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis gsungs pa// khro rgyal rdo rje

'jigs byed kyis// thun mong khyad par dngos grub rnams// sgrub thabs rgya chen zhus pa rnams// ngas bshad khyod nyon legs par zung// chos nyid dbyings las rang shar ba'i// rdo rje 'jigs byed gshin rje

gshed// sku yi phyag rgya chen po ni// ye shes rol pas shar pa ste// sku mdog mthing nag khros pa la// zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu bzhi// zhabs ni bcu drug brkyang bskum bzhugs// pho mtshan gyen du sgreng ba ste// rtsa
ba ma he'i gdong khros pa// de stengs srin po 'jigs pa'i zhal// dmar po zhal nas khrag 'thung 'dzag/ de stengs 'jam dpal ser po'i zhal// 'dzum bcas yid tsam khros pa'o// gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang
ldan// rwa yi g.yas na zhal gsum ni// sngon po dmar pos ser por khros// rwa yi g.yon na zhal gsum ni// dkar po dud ka nag por khros// zhal dgu spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// sma ra smin ma glog ltar

'gyu// shin tu gtum rngam 'jigs tshul bzhugs// khro gnyer ljags 'dril sha khrag za// ha ha pho mo'i rngam sgra sgrogs// phyag g.yas dang po'i gri gug brnams// gnyis pa mtshon cha rtse gcig pa// gsum pa gtun

shing bzhi pa gri// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa// drug pa sta re bdun pa mdung// brgya pa mda' chen dgu lcags kyu// bcu pa dbyug tho bcu gcig kha T+wAM kha// bcu gnyis 'khor lo bcu gsum rdo rje bsnams// bcu bzhi

rdo rje tho ba bco lnga ral gri bsnams// bcu drug ban cang te'u// g.yon gyi dang po thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// gnyis pa tshangs pa lha yi mgo/ gsum pa phub ste bzhi pa rkang// lnga pa zhags pa drug lag
pa// bdun pa rgyu ma brgyad pa gzhu// dgu pa thod tshal bcu pa ras// bcu gcig gsal shing bcu gnyis me thab 'bar// bcu gsum dril bu bcu bzhi sdigs 'dzub bsgreng// bco lnga 'phan rtse gsum pa

bsnams// bcu drug rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras// phyag gnyis glang chen ko rlon bsnams// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi dang pos mi// gnyis pa ma he gsum pas glang// bzhi pas bong bu lnga pas rnga mo'o// drug pas
khyi dang bdun pas lug/ brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis wa mnan pa'o// zhabs g.yon dang pos bya rgod mnan// gnyis pas 'ug pa gsum pas bya rog mnan// bzhi pas ne tso lnga pas khra// drug pas khyung chen bdun
pas ri skeg mnan// brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis bzhad mnan pa'o// ral pa dmar ser gyen du brdzes// thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan can// gcer bu gsus khyim che la brjid// thod rlon khrag 'dzag

do zhal can// keng rus dur khrod rgyan gyis mdzes// pho mtshan gyen bsgreng me dpung klong na bzhugs// ha ha phem mo'i sgra sgrogs pas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che// khyab 'jug gzhon nu za bar byed/
khams gsum dregs pa gsol bar mdzad// 'jigs byed chen po'ang 'jigs par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams kun la bsdigs mdzub bsgreng// gshin rje 'jigs byed dregs
pas 'joms// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i ma mo dang// mkha' 'gro lha dang gnod sbyin dang// ro langs gtum po rgod rnams dang// dregs pa can rnams bran du 'khol// de lta bu yi gshin rje

gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po de// dur khrod dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// dpa' bo gcig pa'i khro rgyal yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// sku phyag rgya chen po'i le'u
ste brgyad brgya bdun cu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// de nyid bsgrub thabs rnam grangs bshad// rtog pa bdun pa'i rim pa ni// rtog pa dang po dkyil 'khor bstan// sgo gcig pa ni dbye bar

bya// lhag ma yongs su bcad par bya// rtog pa gnyis pa las kun 'grub// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba zhes// nyi ma bdun gyi mtsha'o bshad// rtog pa gsum pa sngags btu+u ba// ji lta ba yi cho ga zhes// sgra

dbyangs A li kA li ste/// 'bru bcu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// 'bru lnga 'bru drug btu ba yin// rtog pa bzhi pa bsgom pa ste// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bya ba// dpa' po'i gnas la gnas pa'o// zhes bya ba ni

gdams ngag gnas// rtog pa lnga pa bris sku ste// 'tshogs par byin gyis brlab par bya// rtog pa drug pa sbyin sreg ste// rje btsun mdun du sha chen dang// chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug ces pa gdams ngag
gnas yin no// rtog pa bdun pa bsam gtan gyi// las rnams bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba ste// snying rje chen pos yid rlan pa// zhes nas bsam ste zhes pa'i bar// de dag gdams ngag gnas yin no// gzhan yang

rtog pa bzhi pa nas// de kho na nyid sbyor ba las// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yi// sngags par rtag tu bsgom par bya// zhes pas rdzogs ba'i rim par bstan// rgya che zab dang zung 'jug go/ de dag rgyas par

bshad pa'o// rtog pa bdun pa zhes bya ba// bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud yin zhes// rgyud rgyal 'di las rgyas par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgya che rol pa'i rgyud las/ rnam par dbye ba'i ste brgyad brgya
don gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub thabs bshad// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro rgyal mchog/ bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sngags pa yis// rgyud chen 'di nyid
dbang bskur zhing// dam tshig ldan pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas bsad dang bskrad pa dang// dgug dang dbang bsdu dbye dang rengs// ral gri mig sman ril bu ro// bcud len 'byung po ro langs dang// sha za

gnod sbyin pho mo dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro klu sa bdag/ la sogs sna tshogs yid bzhin gyis// nor bu 'dra ba bsgrub par bya'o// dur khrod nang stong mtshan ma gcig/ chu 'gram shing gcig ri yi rtse// grong khyer

lha khang ma mo'i khyim/ khang stong bzhi mdo 'thab mo'i gnas// byin che bkra shis bde gnas su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bshad de// shin tu mnyam bzhag sngags pa yis// 'byung ba'i tshes ni bcu bzhi

la// mtshan mo yar phyed mar phyed na// gcer bu sgra gsil thal chen dang// rnam par snang mdzad tshil chen gyis// lus byug khrag chen thig le gdab// bdud rtsi rnam lnga sha chen bza'// cang te'u dkrol zhing dur
khrod kyi// gnas su ha ha zhes brjod cing// gar stabs bya zhing sngags bzlas bsgom// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dges// ci 'dod pa la dngos grub ster// dur khrod gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro de// thams cad
rab dga' las byed khur// de nas sngags pa dpa' bo yi// g.yas pa rjes snang ral gri thogs// g.yon pa thod pa rlon pa thogs// dkyil 'khor lho phyogs gom pa bdun// bor ba'i sa der dong khru gang// gru
gsum bskor ba'i sa dag dang// gnas bdun grog mkhar sa rnams la// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed cing// g.yas g.yon gri gug thod pa thogs// byas la byang du kha bstan bzhag/ chos nyid rnam dag

sngags kyi sbyang// stong nyid hU~M las gri gug gyur// de las las kyi 'jigs byed gyur// de las 'chi bdag mdung gi phug lce spyang stag dom gcan gzan tshogs// ro la 'drad cing bya rog kha// kang ka 'ug pa sha

za bri// rnal 'byor gcer bu bsgrub pa po// skra bshig phyag rgya lnga dang ldan// thod pas dbu brgyan ha ha rgod// thod pa cang te'u kha T+wAM 'dzin// bcom ldan khros la rtse gcig lta// dur khrod gnas der 'jug pa

bri// gzhan gyis mi mthong rab gnas bya'o// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi lho phyogs dgram// gzhan yang zhing chen zhing chung gi/ bla re 'phan 'phran rgyu zhags dang// mi rkang gling bu thod pa'i rnga// dur khrod keng rus

rdzas rnams dgram// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// dam rdzas mchod rdzas rgyan rdzas yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdzas dang dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don

gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed la// mchod pa'i las rim 'di bshad do// oM ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra sa ma ti hU~M/ oM d+harma na swa b+hA at+ma ko\u0f85haM/ a d+hi/

oM a ra pa tsa na d+hi/ oM ya man ta ka hU~M phaT/ oM hriHSh+ti bi kri tA na na hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ dzaHhU~M baM ho badzra sa b+hA ya dza/ oM shri badzra/

d+hU pe/ pu Sh+be/ A lo ke gan d+he/ ni bi te swA hA/ i daM ba ling ti/ sarba sha truM/ ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ gri h+na gri h+na/ pU dza sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta ar+g+haM pra ti dza ho/ kha raM kha hi/

kA ya badzra sid d+hi oM/ bA ka badzra sid d+hi AH tsit+ta badzra sid d+hi hU~M/ bla ma yi dam rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dbyings nas spyan drang phyag 'tshal mchod/ sdig pa bshags shing longs spyod tshogs/ bsgrub bya'i rnam par
sbyangs spel brlab/ mchod dbul mnyes bya mnyam bzhag ste/ dpa' bo'i gnas la rtag tu 'dug sngags bzlas ma yengs bsgom par bya 'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ mchod
pa las rim gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa'i rim pa bshad// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor lhor 'dug ste// snying khar a las nyi ma'i

dal// de stengs hU~M las rdo rje 'chang// sngon po rtse dgu kha gyes gdengs// lte bar hU~M yig sngo nag la// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// bla ma dkon mchog rig pa'i lha// rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs
rnams// mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs te// phyag 'tshal bdun po rnam dag bya'o// de la sngar gyi tshig bcad kyis// 'dod pa'i don gyis gsol ba gdab// rjes su gnang ba byin bsams te// badzra mu yis

gshegs su gsol// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi tshad med bsgom// sdig tho mi dge'i chos rnams spangs// dge ba rnam par spyod pa ste// sems kyi rgyud cig yongs su dag/ sdug bsngal

rgya 'bras bral ba dang// bde ba'i rgyu 'bras phrad par ldan// de nyid mi 'bral rgyun brtan dang// thams cad kun snyoms chos brgyad bral// de ltar tshad med rnam bzhi bsgom// de nas sngon du chos thams

cad// bdag med spros bral ma bcos ngang// rang bzhin rnam dag byang chub sems// de yi ngang las chos thams cad// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas raM las nyi ma'i dal// hU~M la sna tshogs rdo rje

bsgom// lte bar hU~M 'od zu ba las// rdo rje'i sa gzhi rwa ba gur// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// sngon po rgya gram ba dan mtshan// de stengs a las gyur pa yi// zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dri med dmigs// de stengs dmar ser d+hI ru gsal// de las ral gri d+his mtshan pa// ral gri d+his mtshan yongs gyur las// 'jam dpal rdo rje gser mdog can// zhi ba'i tshul
'chang rgyan gyis mdzes// ral gri ut+pal po ti bsnams// a las thugs khar nyi ma yi// dkyil 'khor gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa
yi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo'i tshogs// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs la// nyi ma la thim 'jam dpal dang// de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems// thams cad ro
gcig chos nyid gyur// sku yi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// dpag tshad stong phrag 'bum khyab las// gsang sngags byin brlabs kun bsdus

te// thim pas de nyid hU~M du gyur// mthing nag 'od zer lnga ldan bsam// gsung gi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// la sogs phyag 'tshan

bsdus te thim// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu pa/ kha gyes 'od zer lnga ldan 'gyur// lte bar nyi ma'i gdan la hU~M// rdo rje lte hU~M sangs rgyas las// 'od 'phros sangs rgyas zhing yang dag/ sems can yongs su smin byas

pa// thugs kyi zhing khams dag pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// ye shes khro mo lha mo rnams// nam mkha' til gyi gang bu ltar// gang ba nyi ma la gnas bsam// de
dag rnams kyi mchog bsdus nas// yongs su smin sbyangs byang chub bkod// 'dus nas rdo rje la rab thim// rdo rje de nyid yongs gyur pas// shin tu mi bzad gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku ru
gyur// shin tu khros shing rngam pa'i gdong// dus mtha' me ltar 'bar bar bskyed// de la ye shes rigs dbang bskur// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan la// sku gsung thugs nyid byin gyis brlab// skye mched
drug kyang byin gyis brlab// gong bzhin gzhal yas khang nang bsgom// de bzhin rdul tshon dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin khro bo sems dpa' bsgom// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// rang bzhin dbyings
kyi gnas chen nas// ye shes sems dpa' khro rgyal nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gnyis med bstims// sngon du byon la mchod pa dbul// yang na bdag nyid rab gnas pas// de la de bzhin mchod pa
dbul// mchod pa'i rnam pa de dag kun// lugs bzhin byin gyis brlabs la dbul// ser mo spos khang thogs la sogs// phyi yi mchod pa byin brlabs dbul// yaM raM a tra khang las ni// rang rang byin
brlabs sngags brjod pas// bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma gsum// stong gsum gang bar byin brlabs dbul// yang na 'dod yon lha mor dbul// de dag bsnyen pa'i skabs su'o// bsgrub dang drag

po'i skabs rnams su// snang mdzad tshil chen bdug spos te// bkrag mdangs yid 'ong me tog la// drod dang tshil chen mar me 'o// dri chab de bzhin shes par bya// rak+ta de nyid srog gi khrag/ gtor ma sha rus
tshil la sogs// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// de ltar byin gyis brlabs la dbul// dngos su gsol mnyes tshims par bsam// de nas dkyil 'khor lho sgo nas// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i gnas 'jug
'dug/ sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pa yis// ye shes 'jigs byed khros la gsol ba gdab// dpa' bo'i gnas la sngags bzlas bya// bdag nyid thugs khar nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// ya yig sngon po khong stong de

dkyil na// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu kha gdengs pa// lte bar ya dkyil nyi ma hU~M nag po// de la yig 'bru lnga drug bcu pa dang// bcu bdun sum cu rtsa gnyis sngags kyis bskor// bdag dang mdun gyi 'jigs byed
gnyis la bsgom// gsang sngags bzlas pa gang byed dus nyid du// bdag nyid ma he'i zhal nas sngags 'os 'phros// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer zhugs// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal gyi thugs
khar thim// dngos grub mthu bsdus bdag gi thugs khar thim// mthu stobs byin brlabs bdag la dngos grub 'dus// mdun gyis ma he'i zhal nas 'od zer byung// bdag gi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer
zhugs// bdag nyid khro bo'i thugs kha nas 'od byung// mdun gyi 'jigs byed rdo rje'i thugs kar zhugs// thugs dam rgyud bskul sgo gsum dngos grub bsdus/// mdun gyi 'jigs byed thugs nas 'od zer

byung// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs khar thim// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// khro rgyal sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dus// bdag dang khro rgyal mthu stobs gnyis med gyur// de
ltar gsal bar 'khor lo ltar bsgoms zhing// gsang sngags bar chad med par ma yengs bzlas// thun mtshams dus su me mar gcig las kyang// gnyis su mched ltar gnyis byas bzlas pa bya// nang du
'jug dus gnyis po gcig tu thim// sngar bzhin bsam gtan ma yengs bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i dus su bdud rtsi ril bu'am// me mar chen po kha ru bcug la bzlas// thun mtshams dus su tshogs kyi
'khor lo bya// mchod dbul bstod bskul gang 'dod 'phrin las bcol// drod rtags mtshan ma byung byung bzlas// de dus dngos grub blang zhing gnyis med 'gyur// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor phyags la chu bor
dor// yang na sna tshogs nad zor dgra la 'phang// grangs kyi bsnyen pa bye ba chig 'bum gsum// dus ni rlung nag 'brug sgra 'tshub nag g.yos// mtshan ma phyi nang gsang ba gsum du
'byung// sngags pa dbang thob dam ldan pas// ma yengs rtse gcig bsgom bzlas na// thams cad las ni thogs med 'grub// 'di yi rnal 'byor la gnas na// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams// ma lus

myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di la the tshom med par nges// de skad rdo rje 'chang chen gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyus las/ bsam gtan gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don bzhi

pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po bsgrub pa'i las rim bshad// mi bsad g.yul bkye ro bsregs dang// dur khrod mi phung khang sa la// 'brub khung gru gsum khru gang pa// tsher shing kha dmar

gtsang gis bskor// thod rlon 'phreng bas kha dgyer bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ sngags pa'i g.yas phyogs de ltar bya// bsgrub bya'i dri chen dri chu dang// rjes sa skra shad ngar snabs gos// dri ma grog
mkhar sa rnams la// ling ga mtho gang dbang po dod// dpral bar rus bris snying khar ni// bla la bla gdags lto bar ming// dug dang khrag snas bris la gzhug/ gri mon rabs chad thod par brnag/ dong du

bcug la byad kyis bcing// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig dang// chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdo dang// grog mkhar mtshan ma gcig pa dang// rgyal po'i sgo dang ri rgod sa// las kyi gshin rje gnas sa la// chu

rgod shi khrag lngas sbyar te// gshin rje'i gzugs bya khru gang tshad// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsus khyim che// gcer bu skra bsil mche ba gtsigs// g.yas g.yon ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// dur sol shing khrag
rams kyis byug/ snying khar gru gsum brnag pa gzhug/ de la dur khrod thod mkhar nas// las kyi gshin rje bkug la bstim// gtor ma byin te las rnams bcol// 'brub khung gzugs la kha bstan
bzhag/ de nas 'khrul 'khor gzhung bzhin bri// dkyil 'khor bri zhing gtor ma bsham// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'khor lo bzhag/ yang na 'brug khung steng du lding// ting nge 'dzin dang rab ldan pas// slob
dpon lho nas drag sngags bzlas// grogs gcig shar nas ling ga dang// drag po rdzas kyi sbyin sreg bya// byang nas ling ga gtor ma dbul// gcig gis nub nas tshogs mchod bya// thun mtshams bcol

bskul dgra la rbad// de yang dang po'i thun la 'jig rten dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i thun mong sbyin sreg bya// gnyis nas bzhi pa'i bar du ling ga rus chen dang// sha khrag tshil dang tsha ba'i mar khu
sbyar// bsnyen pa gang bskyal sngags kyi sbyin sreg bya// mtha' ma'i thun la grogs po bzhi log ste// drag po bsad pa las kyi sbyin sreg bya// yang na rnal 'byor bdag nyid gcig pus bya// de nyid

dus kyi bsam gtan ting 'dzin ni// bdag nyid khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// zhabs brgyad g.yas nas nad brgyad spro ba dang// zhabs g.yon 'og nas 'phra men ma brgyad spro// thugs kha dag nas zhags
pa lcags kyu thogs// mtshon cha thogs pa'i 'jigs byed grangs med spros// brnag pa gang yin thal bar byas par bsam// de ltar rtags byung bar du bsgrub par bya// drag po bsad pa'i sbyor ba dang// dbang

drag la sogs las rnams bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ drag po bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya brgya don lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsad pa drag po'i 'khrul
'khor bshad// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas pa// thal chen lus byugs skra bsil ha har rgod// sha chen bdud rtsi ril bu kha ru mur// las kyi 'jigs byed dpang gzugs gtor me

btang// dpa' bo'i gnas 'dug dal bsgrub mchod pa bya// 'byung po'i nyi phyed yol nas lhor bltas te// drag po mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod ras sam zhing chen bags pa la// lan tshwa skye tshe

nim pa du ru sa// dug sna khrag sna tsha ba gsum// rme ba lnga dang ni ra su// skya bcad dung phyis legs bya te// ka ka ni rangs snyug gu yis// le tshe bcu drug 'khrul 'khor bri// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu pa yi// sngags

dgod hU~M brgyad bri bar bya// de phyir spu gri drag po dgod/ kha sbyar bsgrub bya'i ming byang dgod// me gnyis dbus su bzhag la bsad// thod pa kha sbyar nang du bzhug yang na gzugs brnyan lto bar gzhug 'khor
lo bri ba'i rim pa'o// de nas 'khrul 'khor byin brlab pa// dbus kyi ya yig yongs gyur las// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i grong khyer bsam// 'khrul 'khor me gnyis bsreg pa de// 'gro ba rigs drug khang par
bsam// drag sngags me gnyis me dpung 'bar// sngags gzhan 'jigs byed pho brang 'jug/ sngags rnams las kyi gshin rje mtshon// gang la reg pa gcod par bsam// ming byang ling kha dgra bo dngos// tshe

srog las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par 'chang zhing gcod// de ltar bsam gtan sbyor ba bya// thab khung nang du 'khrul 'khor de// nim pa'i shing gi me la bsro// bdag nyid 'jigs byed khro bor
bsgom// rkang pa g.yon pas 'khrul 'khor mnan// drag sngags thang gcig bzlas byas te// dkyil 'khor dbus sam dong khar lding// sngags pa mnye bzhag dpa' bor 'dug/ gcer bu skra bshig kha lhor
lta// tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs te// snang mdzad thal chen rak+tas bsgyur// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'khor lo rkang skyed gsum khar bzhag/ dur khrod me la rab tu bsro// shin tu khros

pas drag sngags bzlas// gtum po'i me la 'dug byas na// the tshom med par 'cho bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// gshin rje mtshon cha'i 'khor lo de// bsgrub bya'i rgyu rten ling ga yi// snying khar
sngags dang 'khor lo brnag rabs chad mon thod ga bur gzhug las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs brnyan gyis// snying khar thod pa'i ga'u gzhug/ ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// gnas lngar mi rkang phur pa
gdab// tsher ma rnon po sna tshogs kyis// tshigs rnams kun la gdab par bya// drag tu sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs nas nyin mtshan phyed dus na// dur khrod gnas sam ro bsregs par// shin tu

gting rings gru gsum brko// gzugs brnyan mgo bo lhor bstan te/ kha ni thur du phub la sba// slar 'ongs rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rnal 'byor shin tu gsal byas la// drag tu sngags bzlas ming byang spel// nyi
ma bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// don po'i bshang gcis ling ga bya// ming byang dang bcas dug gis byug/ skra bshig bdag kha lhor bltas te// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor

gyis// dur khrod me la mtshan phyed na// gzugs brnyan gtubs te bsreg bya zhing// ming byang dang bcas drag sngags bzlas// skad cig gis ni nges par 'chi// rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid kyis bshad// gzhan yang

rab tu sbyor ba ni// rdzas kyi 'khor lo sngon bzhin bri// rgyu rten drug la ling kha bya// de yi snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ mar khu chen po dag dang sbyar// dur khrod gnas su bdag nyid kyis// lus la rnam par snang
mdzad byug/ bdag kha lhor bltas rnam par brtsigs// ma he'i gdong gnas drag tu bzlas// mtshon chas gtums la ro bsregs kyi// mer bsregs myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rims kyi thebs 'dod

na// gshin rje'i 'khrul 'kho ra mtshon cha de// mi yi nya phyis ga 'ur gzhug/ dur khrod me la rab bsros te// de nyid kyis ni 'og sbas na// rims nad drag pos 'dzin par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba

ni// me long bcu drug 'khor lo la// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu pa'i sngags// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel bar bya// sngon gsungs rdzas dang lhan cig tu// bya rog zan gtogs lhag ma dang// rnam par snang mdzad rgyu

rten sbyar// dur khrod ris la byug byas la// sngon bzhin cho gas 'khor lo bri// de ltar sbyor ba tshang byas nas// dur khrod sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur// shing gcig drung sbas bskrad par 'gyur// mtshan ma gcig sbas
'byed par 'gyur// chu yi nang sbas rengs par 'gyur// khyim du bzhag na zhi bar byed// phyung nas legs dkrus grol bar 'gyur// de dag rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// drag po bsad pa'i sbyor ba
bshad// de dag bsam gtan rim pa ni// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// sbyor ba nyid la gnas pa yis// sngon du sbyor bas thams cad bya// raM las me dpung dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu gsal bar 'bar
bar bsam// gsal zhing 'bar la bsreg pa yi// de stengs bsgrub bya gcer bu ni// skra bshig bred par gyur pa de// bdag nyid mdun du gnas par bsam// bdag lus khro bo mang po spros// ral gri btab
nas khrag 'thung zhing// srog gcod sha za rgyu ma 'dren// 'di skad bsgo zhing kun kyang sgrogs// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed cing// bla ma la skur 'debs pa la// rgyob cig song cig ces bsam

bya// gzhan yang bdag las sprul pa ni// rnam pa sna tshogs sha zan spro// bya rgod bya rog 'ug pa dang// khyung khra kang ka ne le dang// sha zan bya gcan gzan sna tshogs dang// stag dom lce spyang wa khyi dred// sha za

khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha'// btog cing the shul med par byas// gzhan yang bsgrub bya gang yin de// ri rab kyi mnan sa 'og nub// rgya mtsho'i gting dkrug rba rlabs g.yeng// me dpung gyis bsregs thal bar

brlag/ las kyi rlung nag tshub mas khyer// dpag tshad brgyar gnas skyes bu yi// sems shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gtan rab tu sbyor ba 'dis// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yi// nyi ma bdun gyis 'chi

'gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// des na 'di la bsam gtan bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud la/ drag po sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don drug pa'o//// de
nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po las kyi mtha' btal ba'i// rab tu sbyor ba'i sbyin sreg bshad// sngags pa dur khrod gnas phyin te// mtshan mo phyed na las 'di brtsam// lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas

pas// las ni thams cad bya bar gsungs// phung sa gsum gyi me thab ni// drag po dug khrag rgya sol byug tsher ma dug can shing sna la// dur khrod shing dang me spar te// gang gi dri chen la sogs rdzas// ming rus

long kha sen mo skra// mi shi mi rus bong bu'i spangs// de dag mar khu chen pos sbyar// de nyid ma he'i zhal sbyor bas// shin tu mnyam par bzhag byas la/ kha ni lhor ltas ro bsregs kyi// me la gang gi ming bcas

pa// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas na// zhag gsum gyis ni 'chi bar nges// yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la// me thab rdzas sbyor sngon gsungs bzhin// gtum po'i me sbar sbyin sreg bya// drag po'i sbyor ba de
nyid kyis// las de nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'brub khung me thab tu// gdug pa can shing ro shing la// gtum po dur khrod me spar te// rgyu rten ling ga ming rus bcas// ma rti bya glang

shi mtshal dug mar khu chen po til nyungs nag/ bsreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'dis ni lha yi tshe yod kyang// myur du gsod par the tshom med// de dag bsam gtan rab sbyor na// ma he gdong khros rnal 'byor
gyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// raM yig yongs su gyur pa las// me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar// dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar dbus su// bsgrub bya bred sngangs 'dar bar bsam// de la
bdag lus rnam sprul pa'i// ba spu las spros gshin rje rnams// srin po mi bzad 'jigs pa'i tshul// sna tshogs lus can ma rungs pa// shin tu gtum rngam mtshon cha thogs// mang pos sha za khrag 'thung
zhing// lus dbang thal bar gtong bar bsam// bya dang gcan gzan de bzhin no// rdo rje'i zhal du'ang de bzhin no// mtha' rgyar mnan gtad sbyor ba bya'o// rab tu sbyor ba 'di lta bus// gang yang gsod

sgrol the tshom med// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// ling ga 'brub khung 'khor lo bcas// ma he gdong khros skur bsgom ste// drag tu sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskos// thun rdeg mchog chen phur pa gdab// bsam

gtan ldan pas sbyor ba bya// rab tu sbyor ba'i bye brag 'di// su la'ang mi smra sbyin mi bya// mi bstan gcig pu dben par bya// de ni las kun 'grub par nges// gal te mi gzhan mang dag la// bstan cing smras

dang byin gyur na// rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub// de nas gang la'ang bstan mi bya// shin tu sba gsang thabs kyis spyad// oM ya ma na ta hU~M phaT/ oM hri Sh+ti bi kr-i tA na na hU~M phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me to

ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+she ya dza ni ra ma ya/ sarba sha truM/ staM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ na sha ya/ na sha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha smiM ku ru mA ra ya hU~M/ dz+wa la raM raM/ ling ga

'khor lo la sogs la// tsha ba gsum dang skye tshe dang// dug sna myos khrag byug par bya// ma he'i gdong can snying po ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag sngags so// re re la ni bzhi 'bum bdun// gcig la rgyun du

bzlas byas na// nges par las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan ma rtags la phebs pa dang// dngos grub dbang thob gang yang 'grub// bstan pa la sdang bsgrub bya de// smyo 'bog bya ba'i sbyor ba ni// du du ra yi

'bras bu dang// sha chen shing srin zos pa'i phye// b+ha hu dang sbyar sngags bzlas te/ kha na pa na la sbyar na// skad cig gcig gis smyo 'gyur zhing// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi// b+ha hu ka pi ka tsu rnams// da
du ra snyoms btag pa'i phye// lus la sbyar na smyo bar 'gyur// thang gnas phya bo'i ro tsa na// de khrag gong gi rdzas gsum sbyar// me tog rnams dang dri chen sogs// gzugs sbyar gang gi ming bcas

pa'o// sngags bzlas rgyal po'i rten sbyar na// des ni nges par smyo bar 'gyur// drag po sbyor ba'i me thab tu// bya rgod chen po'i tshang shing la// gang gi ming byang sha chen bsregs// des ni nges par smyo bar

'gyur// drags sngags rtsa ba gong bzhin las// a mu ka ung ma ta ku ru ku ru mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ drag po las sbyor nges par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ drag po bsad

pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dbang du bsdu ba'i sbyor ba bshad// rdo rja 'jigs byed khro rgyal gyis// bsgrub bya dbang du bsdu bya ba'i// rab tu

sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rnal 'byor grub pa tshad phyin pas// gang dmigs dbang du bya 'dod na// lhun po dgu 'dus brjid ldan du// grog mkhar sa dang gur kum dang// g+hi hang rang rdzas lhan cig tu// bsgrub

bya pho mo gang rung gi/ gzugs brnyan bcu drug sor tshad la// g+hi hang srin lag rak+ta yis// gro ga dag la gshin rje yi// 'khor lo legs par bris byas te// de yi snying khar bcug nas ni// mnyam bzhag kha ni
nub tu bltas// ming rus dang bcas sngags bzlas nas// me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod// rang gi khyim du bcug byas pas// zhag gsum gyis ni brgya byin kyang// the tshom med par dbang 'gyir na// phra

mo rnams la smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// gro ga'am pad+ma'i ras dag la// tsan dan dmar po rgya skyegs dang// g+hi hang srin lag rak+ta yis// ho dang spel ba'i 'khor lo gnyis// mnyam por
bris la sngags rnams dgod/ kham phor mar dang sbrang rtsis dgang/ kha sbyar skud pa dmar pos dkri// nub tu kha bltas bsam gtan bya// me tog dmar pos dus gsum mchod// mnyam bzhag sngags bzlas

bsgrub bya de// gcer bu skra bshig myos gyur pa// rkang po'i drung du sgyel bar bsam// gal te nges par ma byung na// dka' thub brtul zhugs ldan pa yis// seng ldeng me mdag du med la// ma spangs 'khor lo ga

'u bsrong// dros pas bsgrub bya gang yin de// nges par dbang du myur du 'gyur// gzhan yang dbang sdud rab sbyor ni// bsgrub bya'i rgyu rten gzugs snying khar// g+hi hang gur kum srin lag khrag/ rgya skyegs pad+ma me
tog dang// gro ga la sbyar 'khor lo bri// mnyam bzhag sngags bzlas gzugs// seng ldeng mes bsro bdag 'og gzhug/ des ni nges par dbang du 'gyur// dbang bsdu rab sbyor sbyin sreg ni// lhun po dgu
'dus dmar la brjid// rgyal po'i sa la me thab ni// zla kham pad+ma'i me tog dang// rgya skyegs rten 'brel la sogs bsgyur// seng ldeng shing la dbang me ser// til 'bras pad+ma me tog dmar// g+hi
hang rdo rje'i chu dang bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbrang rtsi rnams// rnal 'byor bdag gzugs dmar por bsgom// nub tu kha bltas bsngags bzlas te// gang gi ming rus bcas bsregs na// nyi ma bdun gyis

dbang bdus te// ji srid 'tsho yi bar du mi 'bral lo// gzhan yang dbang sdud khyi sha dang// rdo rje'i chu dang bskyed pas ni// gang gi ming bcas las mthun bsgom// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na// 'khor
bcas bdag nyid dbang 'gyur ro// gnas gcig gnas la rta yi sha/ gang gis dri chen ming rus bcas// mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas// brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs rgyal po 'khor// zhag bdun dbang du
'gyur nges so// gnas gcig mtshan mo glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas tsan dan shing// mi yi 'jig rten kun rnams la// dmigs pas sbyin sreg stong byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni 'jig rten kun// nges par

dbang du 'dus 'gyur ro// nya dang sha dang chang dang ni// mi bcas 'jig rten sbyin sreg dang// brgya rtsa brgyad byas bud med kun// dbang du 'gyur nges thams cad 'du// sha chen tshil chen chang dang bcas// zla

ba drug tu mtshan mo ni// seng ldeng sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// byas na yul khams thams cad kyi// bdag por 'gyur te dbang 'gyur nges// ba glang sha khrag ro tsa na// gang gis ming byang rgyu rten bcas// sbyin sreg

stong byas ji srid 'tsho// rab tu gnas par the tshom med// de dag rab tu sbyor ba'o// gzhan yang ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// sngags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rnal 'byor nyid la mnyam gzhog ste// bdag nyid
dbang mdog bsgrub bya ba'i// gdan la gnas bcas bdag lus la// 'jam dpal dmar po dbang chen 'bar// phyag na lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams// mang po mngon phyung 'od zer dmar// des ni bsgrub bya
gang yin gyi// snying kha dang ni mgrin pa dang// bzung dang bcing nas 'gugs bsam ste// 'jam dpal sku la rab tu gzhug/ bsgrub bya myos bsam snying kha ru// yi ge bcu dang dbang sngags bsam/ kha dog
dmar po'i sgrub pa pos// ye shes gzugs kyi yi ge ni// de la gzhug bya de nyid dang// bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur par bya'o// des ni nges par dbang du 'gyur// gzhan yang bdag nyid gshin rje gshed// sku
mdog dmar po 'bar ba che// zla ba dmar po bsgrub bya bsam// bdag gi lus la 'od zer dmar// lcags kyu lta bu rab 'phros pas// bsgrub bya'i rnam shes snying srog nas// rang dbang med bzung 'gugs
par bsam/// myos par gyur nas dbang gyur dmigs// bsam gtan 'di nyid sbyor ba yis// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang// nyi ma bdun gyis nges dbang 'gyur// ji srid 'tsho bar the tshom

med// de dag dbang sdud rab sbyor ba'i// drag sngags spu gri sbyor ba ni// ho a mu ka ba shang ku ru ho/ a mu ka pa shang a na ya b+ha sha ta dza dza ho/ 'dis ni khams gsum bsgrub bya la/ dbang du mi 'gyur gcig

med do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba ni// grub pa tshad

phyin sngags pa yis// gzugs can gzugs med pho dang mo// de ltar gang 'dod dgug pa yis// grub pa tshad phyin sbyor ba bya// pad+ma lhan cig thod pa la// srin lag g.yon pa'i rak+ta yis// 'khor lo bris te
seng ldeng gi me la bsro zhing bsgrub bya yi// ming dang bcas pas sngags bzlas na// gang dmigs de ni skad cig gis// rlung gi shugs bzhin 'grub 'gyur nges// gzhan yang 'gugs 'gyur sbyor ba ni// dur

khrod ras la rang byung byug/ 'khor lo mnyam gnyis hri dza ming// spel bris bud med ga 'u dung// chen gzhung skud pa dung chen ni// dmar pos bcing zhing mchod par bya// mnyam gzhag ming spel sngags bsngags
na// 'grub 'gyur gal te ma byung na// seng ldeng me ni rab 'bar la// dka' thub can gyis bsgrub bya bsro// tsha ba gyur pas nges par 'chi// khyad par 'gro ba mo 'gugs te// mchog gi rab tu sbyor ba

yin// gzhan yang 'gugs pa'i sbyor ba ni// dmar po zla khams me thab tu// dri chen skye tshe gzugs brnyan bya// seng ldeng me spar de dbus su// lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs pa// las rdzogs 'brang ba'i
lha bsgom ste// ming dang sngags su bcas bzlas na// nyi ma bdun gyis gang 'dod pa// the tshom med par 'gugs 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/// seng ldeng med la bdud rtsi yang// gang
gi ming dang bcas pa yin// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na// gang 'dod de nyid skad cig gis// nges par 'gugs 'gyur gdon mi za// de dag rab sbyor thams cad la// tsan dan smug po'i sbyor ba

bya// gzhan yang bsam gtan sbyor ba ni// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// mdun du bsgrub bya'i rnam pa la// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de stengs a las byung ba yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de
stengs su// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lcags kyu zhags la thogs par bsam// ma he gdong gis de la bka' bsgo ba// gshin rje khyod song yul che ge mo nas bsgrub bya myur khug shog de skad
bskul bas yaM gyis ni// rnam par bskyod nas der song ste// skad cig gis ni 'gugs par bsam// 'di ni khams gsum gtogs pa kun// mi 'gugs pa ni gcig med do// hri a mu ka A kar+Sha

ya dzaH/ 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// shing skam rtse mo'ang rtsar 'gugs na// 'gro ba sems can pho dang mo// 'dre gdon la sogs smos ci dgos// 'di dag ma he gdong nyid kyi// rnal 'byor rtag gnas grub tshad

phyin// des spyad 'grub 'gyur gzhan gyis min// 'gugs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ dgug pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje

'chang chen gyis// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bshad// rtsi shing nags tshal 'bras me tog/ rgyas gnas de ni de nyid sa// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ba yu dang// ldong bsros dpal 'phel chag chag gdab// gro ga dag

la gur kum dang// ldong ros yung bas 'khor lo ni// gnyis bris swA hA ming dang spel// sa zhag gser las gub pa la// gzugs bya phyi rkan gan rkyal gzhag/ snying khar de nyid dang ni 'di// nang hU~M buSh+ti swA hA
bri/ de bris bcug la gzugs de nyid// mar dang sbrang rtsis byug byas la// skud pa ser pos 'bras ldan dkri// byang du kha bltas dus gsum du// me tog ser pos mchod par bya// dpal dang gzi mdangs
bsod nams tshogs// tshe nor rgyas 'phel sems ldan pas// rgyas pa'i bum pa snying po bcu// sangs rgyas dngos grub dbang bskur bya// sngags bzlas smon lam btab gyur na// thams cad rgyas shing 'phel
'gyur ro// rnal 'byor mnyam bzhag bsam gtan ni// bdag nyid gshin rje 'jigs byed gshed// btso ma'i gser ltar bsgom byas la// zla ba ser po'i dkyil nyid du// 'od zer bsam yas gang 'dod
mchog/ der gyur kun kyang 'phel rgyas shing// yid bzhin bsam 'phel rin po che// phyogs kun de bzhin 'gyur dmigs na// gang yang 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur// gzhan yang rgyas par bya 'dod na// rgyas

pa sbyor ba'i me thab tu// u dum 'bar ra'i shing bu la// rgyas pa rten gyi me sbar te// til dang rgya sran nas dang 'bras// mar dang sbrang rtsi shing thog tshogs// las kyi rjes 'brang lha sgom la/ kha ni byang bltas

mnyam par bzhag/ dus gsum sbyin sreg stong byas na// thams cad rgyas par nges 'gyur ro// rin chen sna bdun kun la 'jug/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga skabs kyis sbyar// de dag snying po rnam lnga dang// 'bru sna tshogs

dang rtsi bdud rnams// rin chen ga 'u rten la sbyar// gang 'dod rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur// swA hA a mu ka pu Sh+ti ku ru swA hA/ badzra puSh+tiM A yu pa shang b+ha 'u sha ta ni puSh+tiM swA hA/ rten la bcas pa'i sbyor ba
'dis// shing skams me tog 'bras bu 'byung// rtong gcig yan lag 'phel 'gyur na// gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos// tshe dang bsod nams dbang thang dang// nor dang 'bru dang longs spyod

dang// bu tsha rigs brgyud rgyal srid dang// thams cad rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas pa'i le'u ste

brgyad brgya brgyad cu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// zhi ba'i rab tu sbyor ba bshad// gdug cing sdang dang khro bo yis// sems 'chang ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// sa gzhi dkar zlum 'jam pa yi// gnas
der snying rje byams sems kyis// de nyid sa gzhi rab mnyam la// maN+Dal zlum po 'o mas byug/ thig le dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bri// dkar ldan zla ba gcig gsum nas// 'go btsugs khams gsum zhi bya'i

phyir// nyams su lon bya brtson pas bsgrub// gro ga dag la gur kum dang// g+hing dang dngul chu ro rtsa nas// 'khor lo gnyis bris ming dang bcas// ga bur bzang drug sbrang rtsi sbyar// skye tse thal ba rus pa

la// zhi ba'i gzugs byang snying khar ru// a mi la mi sa ti 'am// gang 'dod yi ge swA hA spel// ming byang de bzhin bris byas la// snying khar 'khor lo ras skud dkar po dkri// dbus su bzhag la bdud rtsi
lnga// bkang ba'i bum khar zla 'od ni// sangs rgyas kun dbang bskur bar dmigs// rtag tu mnyam bzhag bsngags pa yis// rjes su mthun pa'i lha bsgom ste// sngags bzlas snying khar yungs kar
brdeg/ thams cad dga' bas zhi bar 'gyur// de dag rnal 'byor bsam gtan ni// gshin rje gshed gzugs zla 'od du// bdag nyid bsam nas mdun gnas pa// zla ba'i dbus su byams pa'i
gzugs// de dbus bsgrub bya gnas pa'i sems// byams dang zhi dga' khro sems med// de dang gcig tu gyur dmigs de// shar du kha bltas dus gsum du// me tog dkar pos mchod de bzlas// khros

pa'ang zhi byed byams par 'gyur// gzhan yang zhi ba'i rab sbyor ni// dkar zlum zla 'dra zhi rdzas byug/ tsan dan dkar po rgya shug pa// khrims ldan me spar ming byang dang// rtsi mar sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang// dur ba ga

bur gu gul dkar// spos dang 'bras chan nyungs kar rnams// pa la sha yi shing dang bcas// sgrub bya gang yin de dmigs la// shar du kha bltas dus gsum du// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na// yul khams

kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur// swA hA a mu ka me tra nri shan ting ku ru swA hA/ las dang mthun pa'i lha bsgoms te// 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du bya// tshad med bzhi ldan rang sems kyi// byin can phyag rgya'i stobs
bcas na// drag po gtum chen khros pa yis// lhan ne zhi ba'i mchog gyur la// khams gsum gdug pa smos ci dgos// dgra bgegs bcan gzan sbod gtong byad// sdig sbrul nad skyeg phyogs

ngan sogs// thams cad zhi bar byed nges te// rab tu sbyor ba'i mchog yin no// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya gcig pa'o//// de nas

rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dgra bo lha dang nye ba rnams// 'byed cing 'bral ba'i sbyor ba bshad// dur khrod la sogs dben gnas su// sngags pa sngon sbyor rab rdzogs pas// du du ra yi shing bu la// dud pa med
pa'i me spar te// bya rog 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang// bram ze gtum pa lbos pa yis// skra rnams gcig tu byas la bsregs// de yi thal ba 'khor lo bcas// 'du shes sngags bzlas pho mo 'dzag bar du thal ba
'khor lo bzhag des ni de nyid skad gcig gis// nges par 'byed cing 'bral 'gyur ro// de nas dur khrod ras dag la// dur khrod rdzas kyis dran par bcug bsgrub bya'i ming bris ne le dang// sbrul gyi spu

lpags de la gzhag sdong bu byas te gang gang gi/ khyim du me de spar ba des// phan tshun 'thab 'bras nges par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'byed 'bral sbyor ba na// bya rog 'ug pa'i rus pa la// lcags kyi tsher mas
sgrub bya yis// ming dang sngags rnams lhan cig bris// gcig pu gnas su mnyam bzhag ste// gang gi ming bcas sngags bzlas shing// de gnyis gcig la gcig brud na// nges par 'byed cing 'bral bar
'gyur// gshin rje 'khor lo gro ga la// bud med skyes pa'i ming bris nas// sbal pa'i ltor bcug gang ming dang// bcas par tham pa'i 'og sbas de'i// yan lag mtshon gyis phug byas na// don pos yan lag
mtshon cha yis// nges par 'bug par the tshom med// gzhan yang 'byed cing 'bral 'dod na// gnas bdun sa la ma he rta// gzugs byas gcig la gcig zhon la// de gnyis khrag gis 'khor lo bri// snying khar
'khor lo bcug pa gnyis// nam pa'i shing gi drung du bzhag ma he'i gdong bsgom sngags bzlas pas// gang dmigs rten pa sbas gyur na// zhag gsum gyis ni 'byed 'gyur nges// 'byed cing phral byed sbyor ba
na// drag po'i me thab bya rog dang// 'ug pa me bya don skra sbrul/ 'bras phub ma he rta yi sha/ lhan cig gang gi ming bcas par// dur khrod mes bsregs 'bral 'gyur nges// yang na khyim gnas dur khrod

kyi// shing la gtum po'i me spar te// gong gi rdzas de bsregs byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang// nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'byed// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang ru la// gnyis ka'i ming byang de khrag bri// shing
rings rtser gdags rlung kha 'thab// des ni nges par 'byed par 'gyur// gzhan yang 'byed 'dod ting 'dzin ni// rta dang ma he'i snying kha ru// bsgrub bya mngon gsum de gnyis ni// phan tshun
'thab 'breg byed par bsam// bdag gi mdun du bsgrub bya gnyis// rta dang ma he la zhon te// mtshon cha thogs nas gcig la gcig/ brdeg cing 'thab par byed par bsam// ji srid rta dang ma he gnyis// phye

mar ma gyur de srid du'o// de bsam tsam gyis nyin bdun gyis// nges par 'thab 'byed 'bral 'gyur ro// che ge mo dang che ge mo// bi de sha ya pra bi sha phaT// ces bzlog 'khor lo phaT spel bri// thod pa kha sbyar

'khor lo gzhug/ skud pa sngon po khrag bskus dkri// nyi phyed dur khrod gnas sbas na// gang yang nges par 'byed par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ 'byed pa'i rab tu sbyor

ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rengs byed rab tu sbyor ba bshad// dben pa'i gnas su sngags pa yis// rte pa drag po'i lcags pa la// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas

rnams kyis// yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la// lcags pa de ni bsgrub bya yi// dri chu'i shul dang rkang rjes sa// bkang la de yi skra yis bcings// phyi nas bong bu'i dri chu dang// don po'i dri chen lhan cig
rdzas// blug ma dgos la dgang bar bya// de ru gshin rje'i 'khor lo gzhug/ de ni ro bsregs me la bsro// gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// rkang pa g.yon pas de mnan la// shin tu khros pas sngags

bzlas na// zhag gcig gis ni rengs par byed// 'di ni nges pa'i sbyor ba'o// gzhan yang rengs bya'i sbyor ba ba ni// dur khrod ras sam g.yam pa la// ba bla yungs pa ldong ros kyi// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor
lo ni// gang gi ming dang ras bcas par// legs par bris te bzhag byas na// de ni nges par rengs 'gyur ro// bu mo rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// ro bsreg thal ba dur khrod sas// gzugs brnyan mtho gang sol

chen byug kha gdangs mche gtsigs 'jigs par bya// dur khrod ras la gshin rje yi// sngags dang 'khor lo legs par ni// dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bri// de yi snying khar de bcug de// ma he gdong gi sbyor
ba yis// rkang pa g.yon pas de mnan la// sngags bzlas smon lam btab gyur na// myur du rengs par nges 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod ras la yungs pa yi// lam dang ming spel

'khor lo gnyis// bris la kham phor ser po rdzas/ kha sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug/ der ni ri bo bdun dang bzhi// kun tu mnyam bri de stengs su// ri rab rtse brgyad mnyam par bri// de stengs hU~M baM laM nan spel// de
stengs dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan par bri// skud pa rten 'brel ser pos dkri// rab tu drag por sngags bzlas bya// myur du gang dmigs rengs 'gyur nges// de nyid
ting 'dzin sbyor ba ni// bdag nyid gshed chen ma he'i gdong// bsgrub bya ser po myos pa'i gzugs// rin po che dang ri rab kyis// mnan te rdo rje rgya gram dang// dbang chen dkyil 'khor kun tu

mnan// gshin rjes mnan te 'od zer 'phro// lho byang mngon phyogs drag tu bzlas// hU~M baM laM nan rab tu rdzogs/ des ni myur du rengs par nges// gzhan la rengs pa'i sbyor ba ni// ba bla yung ba ldong ros

dang// g+hi haM bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi par byas rdzas de nyid// gang gi ming dang bcas pa yi// sbyin sreg byas te las kyi ni// rjes su 'brang ba'i lha bsgom nas/ kha ni byang bltas sngags bzlas

na// nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur// gzhan yang rengs bya'i rab sbyor ba// tsher ma can gyi dug shing la// dur khrod me ni rab spar te// dug dang skyer tsher bcas pa ni// rang gi khrag gis bsdus nas

su// sngags dang ming bcas bdas bya zhing// sbyin sreg stong bya smon lam gdab// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// rab tu sbyor ba de dag bya// des ni nges par rengs 'gyur ro// de dag gsang sngags sbyor

ba ni// laM a mu ka swa/ ne s+thaM ba na laM/ hU~M baM laM nan/ 'di dag rengs par bya ba yi// rab tu sbyor bar bshad pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po bshad pa'i rgyud las/ rengs par bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad

brgya gya gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// bsgrub bya bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// dkar po'i phyogs la sdang byed rnams// phyi mtha' thug par bskrad pa yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// gnas
bdun sa la rnga mo'i gzugs// byas te rgyab tu yam ljang khu// yongs su gyur las rlung chen gyi// dkyil 'khor phyogs la sdang byed rnams// phyi mtha' thugs par bskrad pa yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa

ni// gnas bdun sa la rnga mo'i gzugs// byas te rgyab tu yam ljang khu// yongs su 'gyur las rlung chen gyi// dkyil 'khor zla phyed ba dan bzhi// de yi steng du bsgrub bya bzhag de yi rgyab tu gshin rje'i
