gzugs// lag pas dbyug tho 'dzin pa gnas// rnga mo gshin rje'i kha lhor bstan// bsgrub bya der bskyon dbang med par// dbyug thos brdeg cing khrid nas song// de ltar bsam zhing 'khor lo de// tshul bzhin
ming sngags sbyor bris pa// de yis snying khar btsugs byas nas// drag tu sngags bzlas zhag bdun gyis// the tshom med par bskrod par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur ras dur khrod mes
bsregs pa'i// thod par dud chags dregs pa dang// mar khu chen po sbyar byas la// bsgrub bya'i rkang lag bzhi po dang// lham la zhon par byug byas na// skad cig gis ni skrod par 'gyur// gzhan

yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// bya rog rkang pas gro ga la// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla kham phyed// sngon po ba dan bzhi pa bri// de dbus ming byang spel sngags bri// gtor ma za ba'i mgrin par gdags// de bzung
gshin rje gshed chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis// sngags bzlas kha ni lhor bltas te// sbur nas btang na skad cig gis// bya rog bzhin du phyogs kun du// bskor skrod nges par 'grub 'gyur

ro// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i rab sbyor ba// nim pa'i shing la ske tshe til// mar khus bskus pa bya rog gi/ tshang rtsi nag na shing gi mes// bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs te// gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i mgor

blugs na// skad cig gis ni skrod par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// gong gsum sa la zla phyed 'dra// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thab dbus su// dur khrod shing la me spar te// gcer bu skra brdzes lho

bltas nas// rnga mo'i brun dang bya rog dang// chang dang rgyu rten ming byang bcas// lag pa g.yon pas mtshan phyed nas// sbyin sreg lan stong byas gyur na// skrod par nges 'gyur gzhan ma yin// gzhan yang grong

khyer skrod 'dod na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor thab dbus su// gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas// nim pa'i shing la me sbar te// khyi sha sbal sha khyim bya'i sha rnga mo'i brun dang byi la'i khrag lhan cig sbrus la grong ming

dang// bcas te yig bcu sngags bzlas te// sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga byas na// grong khyer skrod par nges par 'gyur// gzhan yang bskrad pa'i sbyor ba ni// bya rog sha ni ma 'dres pa// gang gi ming dang lhan cig

tu// bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang// nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur// pho mo rnams la smos ci dgos// gzhan yang 'bras phug bya rog tshang// ngu ngu ra yi shing bu la// me spar
ming bcas sngags bzlas bsreg/ nyi ma gsum gyis skrod 'gyur nges// gzhan yang bsam gtan sbyor ba ni// yaM las gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam// de yi rgyab tu yaM las ni// rlung gi 'khor lo zla phyed bsam// de

stengs bsgrub bya gcer bur bsam// de yi rgyab tu gshin rje gshed// dbyug tho 'dzin cing 'jigs par bsam// rnga mo kha ni lhor bstan btang// ma he'i gdong khros rnal 'byor gyis// gang gi ming bcas sngags

bzlas na// nges par skrod de zhag bdun no// gzhan yang kang ka'am bya rog gi/ rgyab tu bsgrub bya'i rnam pa bsam// de yi rgyab tu gshin rje gshed// nag po g.yas na thogs// g.yon pas bsgrub bya'i skra gzung
nas// de la ma he'i gdong can gyis// khrid la rgyug ces bka' bsgobs// lho ru kha bltas khrid song bsam// 'di la rtse gcig mnyam bzhag na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skrod 'gyur na// gzhan lta kun

la smos ci dgos// zhag bdun gsum 'bum sngags bzlas so// che ge mo dz+ha dz+ha u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ya/ phaT phaT/ yaM s+pha ra ya phaT/ 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba 'dis/ bskrad par nges par 'gyur ba ni/ sangs rgyas
kyis kyang mi bzlogs so// rab tu sbyor ba gsang ba'i spyad// dkon mchog don spyad gzhan du min// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rab tu sbyor ba'i rgyud las/ bskrad pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya bzhi
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen spyi dpal la/ rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong// gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad gsol// rdo rje 'chang rgyal de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung

ba'i phyir// bdag nyid rab tu sbyor ba la// man ngag gsang ba'i rim pa ni// rang gzhung rdzas dang sbyor ldan pas// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po'i gnas gshad pa// bsad pa gshin rje nyid la bya// dbang ni btsun

mo'i lto ru'o// dgug pa dre'u seng ge'i ltor// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga ma'i rgyab tu'o// rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya// mnan pa ri rab 'og tu'o// rgyas pa nor lha'i gzugs su bya// zhi ba zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor te// smyo ba spre'u shan dmar ro// gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya// de ltar 'khor lo'i gnas nyid dang// las kyi sbyor ba ma nor bya'o// bsad pa drag po'i 'khor lo ni// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las
bshad pa// dang pos gti mug klad pa'i gnas// mgo 'khor tshangs pa'i gtsug rtsagacad// gnyis pas nga rgyal mgrin pa yi// rtsa gcad hrag tu skyug bar byed// gsum pa 'dod chags lte ba'i gnas// rten rtsa

bcad de yid 'khrug byed// bzhi pas snying kha zhe sdang gnas// srog pa rtsa bcad gsod par byed// dbang du bsdu dang dgug pa ni// dang pos srog dang snying pos te// gnyis pas tshe dang ye shes la// gsum

pas bla dang sprul pa nyid// bzhi pas gzugs kyi phung po sdud// rgyas par spel ba'i 'khor lo ni// dang po tshe dang ye shes rgyas// gnyis pa bkrag dang gzi mdangs rgyas// gsum pa dbang thang bu tsha srid// bzhi
pas 'khor dang longs spyod nor// dbye dang bskrad dang rengs pa dang// mnan gzir la sogs de bzhin de// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba thams cad la// nyi ma bzhi bzhir bskor bar bya// g.yas bskor rnal ma

g.yon bskor sbogs// 'bru ded drag sngags bdun par bya// stag mchongs zhes bya 'grub nges pa'o// gzhan yang sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// oM hri Sh+ti bi kri tA nan hU~M phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'bru bcu pa'o// ya ma rA

dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ sum cu rtsa gnyis 'khrul 'khor sngags/ oM ya man ta ka phaT/ 'bru drug pa yi sngags so// rtsa ba'i sngags dang

las kyi sngags// snying po'i sngags dang gsum du bshad// pra ma ya/ mur dza ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya/ ma ra ya/ sarba sha truM/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ bsad pa'i gsang

sngags spu gri'o// bri ra sha ni dang po'o// A yu dz+nyA na gnyis pa 'o// tir ya ni r+ya gsum pa'o// ru pa skan da bzhi pa ste/ dbang sdud dgug pa'i gsang sngags so// dang po A yu dz+nyA na ste/ gnyis pa o te tso ta/
gsum pas pir sha pu tra rnams/ bzhi pas da la sam po ste/ rgyas par spel ba'i gsang sngags so// gzhan yang las kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams// de bzhin bzhi bskor shes par bya// gang byed spu gri ma nor

gdags// rtsa ba'i sngags ni dang po ste// snying po'i sngags ni bar du'o// las kyi sngags ni tha mar sbyar// de bzhin drag sngags so so rnams// spyi dang sgo yi spu gri sbyar// 'di lta bu yi 'khrul 'khor gyis// las

rnams gang brtsams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud chen po las/ rab tu sbyor ba'i man ngag 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gya lnga pa'o//// de

nas rdo rje 'chang chen la/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po/ phyi dus dbang rdzogs dam ldan pa'i// sngags pa bdag nyid lus gnas te// sbyor ba rab tu ldan pa yis// bdag gi

drag sngags 'di bzlas so// tshangs pa'i tshe srog ldan pa yang// myur du gsod par gdon mi za// khro bo kun gyi rgyal po ni// 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed de// mi 'gyur mi shig dbang po'i mchog/ tshangs pa
brgya byin za zhig sgrol// 'das pa'i lha yang 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje lta bu'i lus 'jigs pas// mu stegs 'jigs byed 'jigs mdzad 'dul// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// brnag pa'i gnas dgu
'joms bdud bsgral// zhal nas sngags rgod dgu 'phros pas// srog chags thams cad sgrol bar mdzad// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dbul zhal ma he'i gdong pa nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros
pas// snying la dngos sprul bla gnas 'joms// tsit+ta chol par raka thuM ni mA ra ya phaT/ rA bar dmar po'i 'jigs zhal nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros pas// klad dkyil phag gi bla gnas 'joms// ya

ma kri sna dun b+h+yo ha na ha na ro tsa na khrag thib rbad/ de stengs 'jam dpal zhal ser nas// drag po sngags rgod 'di 'phros pas// lte ba byang shar bla gnas 'joms// ya ma many+dzu shri kro d+ha staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ baM ril
rbad/ rwa ni g.yas kyi zhal gsum ste// sngon po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// mgrin pa rta yi bla gnas 'joms// ya ma ro sha sha subs ril da sta da sta ha ku ru ku ru phaT/ dmar po 'jigs

zhal sngags 'phros pas// gsang ba ra lug bla gnas 'joms// ya ma nri ma ra du pa tsa pa tsa raM shad rbad/ ser po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// rkang pa ba glang bla gnas 'joms// ya ma ni thums rmugs mA
ra ya nA/ sha ya nA sha ya rbad/ rwa ni g.yon gyi zhal gsum ste// dkar po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lag pas ri dgas bla gnas 'joms// ya ma kri ni sha tru?M mun thibs rbad/ dud ka 'jigs zhal

sngags 'phros pas/ kha yi nya sram bla gnas 'joms// kra na ya ma rak+Sha tsit+ta shag mar thums rbad/ nag po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lus kun nye drung bla gnas 'joms// rus pa mA ra ya ha ra ti ya ma

ma kA la rag sha nri rbad/ phung pa'i 'brub khung dug khrag byug/ rten drug ling ga ming byang bcas// rabs chad mon pa srubs drug gnag/ yan lag gan rkyal byed du bzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang// dri
rims khrag chen rak+ta khyi// ra dug spyang dug dug rgod sbyar// da lo sgrol byed rab gnas bya// gshin rje srin po bya gcan tshogs// mtshon cha me 'bar gang yang sgrol// zhag dgu'i bar du smra gcad
bzlas// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed gnas// rang rang bla rtags dang sbyar te// lus kyi gnas rer thun tshon dbab// thub kha re rdzogs mchod bstod bskul// kun rdzogs ling ga mtshon chas gtubs// drag
po'i sbyin sreg byas thal ba// ling ga byas mnan zor du 'phang// des ni myur du gsod par nges// de skad ma he'i gdong gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ gnad dgu

drag sngags kyi le'u brgyad brgya gya drug pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// drag sngags mtshon cha 'di skad brjod// dur khrod la sogs bde gnas su// grub pa thob
pa'i rnal 'byor pas// drag po bzhi bskor las 'di brtsams// drag po'i gnas chen phung sas bya// dug khrag sol chen la sogs byug/ snang mdzad la sogs sbyor bas gzugs// rigs dang bod sgra khrag gis
gsal// mtshan mo'i rnam pa gsal bar ldan// gsum gnyis gling gi dung chen brnag/ gsod byed tsha ba la sogs byed// drag po'i gnas su gsod mgo bstan// bcu gnyis tshad de khru mtho gang// gsod byed

rgyal po la sogs tshogs// rkyen gyi rnam pa sna tshogs khrag/ thig le gnyis dang tsha ba'i 'bru// drag po myur bral dung chen du'o// gnam lcags drag po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs ral gri gsod byed rgyal// sna
tshogs ngar glud de bzhin du// myos khrag rak+tas stobs bskyed bya// yu bor sa ba swa la swa/// de dag dgug rgyal sgrol byed kyis// bsang dang byin brlabs mthu ldan bya// nyin bzhi mtshan bzhi

gnyis bsdebs pa// klad mgrin lte ba snying kha dang ste// rdzas bzhi rim par mtha' ma la// gcod byed gsod byed gnyis su'o// brgya stong grangs kyi de bzhi ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa yi// gnas las 'od
zer rab spros pa// de bzhin gyur te rten gnas bcas// des ni las kyi gshin rje gshed// sngo nag gcer bu mi bzad 'jigs// ral gri sdigs 'dzub ma he zhon// skra 'dzings kha gdangs mche ba
gtsigs// mig gsum sma ra khro gnyer can// rang gnas langs te de nyid la// ma he gdong gis bka' bsgo bas// klad pa'i rgya bshig rtsa bcad de// mgo 'khor klad 'khrugs myos par byed// mgrin rtsa kha

skyugs ngan rgyun gcad// lte ba yid 'khrugs srid rtsa bcad// snying srog rtsa gcad sha khrag tshogs// bstodacing zos te shul med bsad// de ltar mtshon chas rdul byed la// drag po'i mtha' btul las byas

te// de nas gzugs brnyan rdul de la// dur khrod la sogs gnas drag tu'o// rab 'bring tha mas bskyod cing dbab// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas bya'o// oM a kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+ha dza hU~M phaT/ ro

tsa na ma ra ta ka pra ma ni thibs rbad/ hri ta ni pa tsa ha na rak+ta tsa ra ni shag rbad/ si ra thum ril ru thums mur rdza ni hur rbad/ tsit+ta tshal pa ni mA ra ya ku ru ni rbad/ sngon du bsnyen pa grub rdzogs pas// gang yang
myur du sgrol bar byed// gzhan yang drag po sbyor ba ni// sngags pas gcer bur skra bsil la// lus la thal chen la sogs byug/ dur khrod gnas su mnyam par bzhag/ sngon du bsnyen rdzogs las

'di spyad// dur khrod chen po drag mchog du// dbugs dang bral ba'i dung chen du// 'chi rkyen sna tshogs khrag rak+ta// thig le dkar brab sngags rgod bzlas// drag po'i gnas su bsgrub bya brnag/ ma he gdong gi

rnal 'byor gyis// gnas la rab tu spros byas te// srin po mi bzad 'jigs khro rngam// sna tshogs gzugs can mtshon cha thogs// me lce thog zer tsha tsha 'phra// shin tu ma rungs grangs med 'phros// thim pas de

ltar gyur pa bsam// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs pa// sha za srog gcod de bzhin no// de ltar mtshan ma las rung bzlas// ling kha rgyu rten ming rus bcas// lan tshwa skye tshe myos khrag dug/ byug cing thun du
dbab par bya// sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod cing// lus rnams thal bar gtong bar dmigs// khram thod brnag dpag bsreg par bya// dur khrod la sogs mnan gtad bya// dang por byin brlabs mthar
bsad pa// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang sgrol// srog chags mi la smos ci dgos// badzra b+h+yai ra ba hU~M/ ya dun rmugs ta rbad/ ya ma tsit+ta thums ril mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba la gdags bsnyen srog

bya'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong// gshin rje gshed khros drag sngags ni// dang po dbang thob bsnyen rdzogs bya'o// gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams la// gshin rje 'jigs pa ma he zhon// rdzas kyi sbyor
bas byug byas te// zhags pas ske bzung ral gris gdab// rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// 'brub khung mi shigs khrag thod brnag/ dug sna nyungs kar khrag la sogs// gnam lcags byin ldan ral gris

gdag/ srog gcod las kyi gshin rje la// ma he gdong gis bka' bsgo bas// me tog mtshon gyi char phab ste// ral gris btab nas rtsa srog bcad// sha za khrag 'thung rdul du brlag tshe bla gshin rje'i lto bar
'chang// 'chor mi srid de gsod par bsam// de nas bsgrub bya'i rnam pa de// las kyi gshin rje'i lto bar bzhag/ dur khrod gnas su lhor bltas sba// 'dis na gang lang gsod par nges// gzhan yang zhing

chen ras ma la// dug khrag skye tshe nim pa dang// tsha ba gsum dang sme bas byug/ kang ka'i sgro rtsas lhor bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis gshin rjer bsgom// le tshe bcu bdun 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi ldan

par bri bar bya// sngags dgong ming byang spu grir ldan// sngags bzlas gshin rje lto bar gzhug/ dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas gtad// des ni gang yang sgrol bar nges// mon pa'i rabs chad thod pa ru// rgyu rten

drug gi ling ga ni// ming byang dang bcas byad du gzhug/ gcan gzan dri bo'i thod pa ru// dug rgod la sogs dug sna tshogs// gri khrag la sogs khrag sna tshogs// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang// gnam
lcags ral gri thun brab brdeg/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyis// las kyi gshin rje sha za bskul// sna tshogs nad mtshon dbab cing bsad// dgra bo'i pha mes dur chad du/ khams kyi dgra yi gza' skar

la// mon thod dbus la rabs chad shar// gri thod lho sba gcan gzan nub// byang du 'brub khung gru gsum bru// drag po'i sbyin sreg sbyor ba bya// de ltar phyogs bzhi dbus su mnan// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang
gdab// gu gul nag po mu zi dang// mi rta khyi gsum brun dud btab// 'dis ni don po ma lus bar// myur du phung gsod brlag par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen rdzogs drag sngags bzlas// oM ya man ta ka badzra

b+hai ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya mA sa to me ya/ ka la ru pa badzra b+he ra ma hA kro d+ha ya kro d+ha ya/ me to ra na yo ta ya/ hri Sh+ti bi kri tA na na badzra d+he ra pa ma hA kro d+ha ro sha ba ya to yo ni k+she ya/ karma rak+sha badzra b+hai ra ba ya ma hA kro

d+ha u kra ma k+she ya dza ni ra ma ya hU~M phaT/ ya ma ni mA ra ya dza/ ya ma nri mA ra ya thum/ ya ma ni mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma nri mA ra ya hUM/ ya ma nri mA ra ya nan/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ gang la btab kyang
gsod par nges/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sbyor ba gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar thug drag sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gya bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// man ngag gsang ba'i gnas
rnams bshad// rgyud rgyal rdo rje'i tshig yin pas// tshig gcig sna tshogs spros par 'gyur// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu tshang// des na gsung gcig don snang grags// sgo gcig dbye zhing lhag ma
bcad// dbang bskur slob bu gcig gzhug cing// slob bu gzhan ming mi gzhug pa'o// bsnyen dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid gcig pu 'jug grogs po gzhan dag mi 'jug pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub sngags bzlas

ma he'i zhal sgra dbyung/ zhal gzhan brgyad nas sngags sgra mi 'byung ngo// 'khrul 'khor dbus kyi yang khongs ming byang bra// phyi rol re mig rnams la bri ba'o// gnyis pa rab tu sbyor ba nyi ma bdun zhes pa/ las
ma grub na sbog pa'i sbyor ba bstan/ las dang ye shes gshin rje gnyis la sogs/ nyi ma dang por las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs/ gom pa bdun por lho ru kha bub mnan/ ye shes 'jigs byed bsgom la sngags
bzlas so// gnyis pa thab khung de ru ye shes 'jigs byed bskyed/ las kyi gshin rje rkang pa nas gtubs sreg gsum pa ye shes 'jigs byed la spogs gsum/ sbyor bas spogs pa rdul tshon dkyil 'khor gyi/

bdag nyid byang du bsdad de lho ru kha blta'o// sngags kyi spogs pa dbu zhabs log ste bzlas/ ting 'dzin spogs pa dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ khro bo rdo rje hU~M mdzad skad cig gis/ mthing nag zhal gsum
g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba/ phyag drug rdo rje 'khor lo be chon g.yas/ zhing dbyug lcags kyu sdigs mdzub g.yon zhags bzhi/ me dpung klong na khro gtum rngam sgra sgrogs/ bsreg rdzas ye shes 'jigs byed
bsam la sreg gsum pa ji lta'i cho gas sngags btu+u ba/ gzhi nyin nus mthu ldan pa'i yan lag sngags sprul dang/ gsang sngags dag pa'i yan lag sngags btu+u ba// nus mthu ldan pas byed pa'i yan lag byin

gyis brlab/ slob bu mthu ldan byed par rjes gnang sbyin/ dang po me long sman spos dri zhim byug srin d+hu ra 'am mtshal gyi phye mas btsag de la 'khor lo re mig dgu pa bri/ dbus su a bri re mig brgyad po la/ sgra
dbyangs yi ge mtshan brgyad tshan re bri/ de las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ dbyangs sgra'i yi ge bkug nas thim par bsgom/ sha chen la sogs pas ni mchod par bya'o// gnyis pa gzhung bzhin
btus la legs par bri/ me long steng du bzhag la sngar bzhin mchod/ gsum pa sngags las 'od 'phros 'jig rten khams/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thugs kha gnas pa yi/ zla ba'i 'khor lo la
'od 'phros pas thim/ me mar gcig la gnyis su dbye ba ltar/ bkug nas sngags btus ba la thim par bsgom// snga ma bzhin du mchod pa rgyas par bya/ bzhi pa mdun gyi sngags de slon dpon gyis/ ma he'i
zhal nas bcu gnas snying kha yi/ bzlas pa'i 'khor lo'i sngags la thim par bsgom/ slob dpon rdo rjes lan gsum sngags brjod pas/ rjes su brjod de sngags bzlas pas/ slob dpon ma he'i zhal nas
sngags 'phreng byung/ slob bu'i ma he'i zhal du rab zhugs te/ snying khar thim pas byin brlabs ldan par bsgom/ bzhi pa shin tu mnyam bzhag dpa' bo'i gnas/ lho phyogs gnas ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs
bzlas/ mchod pa rdzogs nas lho yi phyogs nas 'jug lho yi lag pa'i steng nas bzlas pa bya/ lnga pa bris sku bris don gsum ste/ 'tshogs par byin brlabs rgyun ni brtan bya dang/ de la rab gnas bya ba la

sogs pa'o/ drug pa rje btsun drung du zla ba drug bsnyen bsgrub sbag ma rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis/ lha 'dre gnad la bor ba'i sbyor ba brgyad/ rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ sbyor ba gnyen po lha dang

las kyi lha/ rtog pa dang po nas 'byung gnyen po lha yi rdzas/ so tshas mal yin las kyi lha yi rdzas/ sngags kyi rtsa ba gsum ni gnyen po lha yi sngags/ de nyid dregs pa'i ngos 'dzin las kyi lha yi sngags/ gnyen po
lha yi ting 'dzin bdag dang bdun/ thab khung gsum du rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom/ las ky-i lha yi ting 'dzin de gsum bya/ gdan gyi 'og tu 'chi bdag gshin rje bsgom/ gnyen po lha yi sbyor ba grogs dang

bcas// mtshan ma'i sum cha nam stong dang po'i sbyor ba rdul tshon nam/ lnga pa'i thang kha la brten bzhi pa'i bsgom pa dang/ gsum pa'i sngags tshan gsum po bzlas pa'o// mtshan mo'i gung la dang po'i lnga pa la/

rten pa'i bsgrub pa bzhi bsgom pa/ gsum pa'i sngags bzlas pa dang ldan par bya'o// nam gyi cha smad sum cha gzhan kun sngar dang 'dra/ drug bdun gnyis kyi sbyin sreg mnan pa bya/ gnyen po lha yi sreg rdzas ma

he'i zhal du dbul/ las kyi lha yi sreg rdzas 'chi bdag zhal du dbul/ de dus gnyen po'i lha sngags ma he'i zhal nas bzlas/ las kyi lha yi sngags ni srin po'i zhal nas bzlas/ de ltar nyin mtshan thun gsum

drug tu bzlas/ dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan de bzhin zla drug bya'o/ bdun pa'i snying rje chen po yid brlan gces/ mtshan ma gyen bsgreng rnal 'byor lam bsgom pa/ lha yi sku nyid 'ja' tshon bzhin du bsgom/ lte
ba khong stong nang du mthing nag hU~M/ steng ngam 'og tu oM ni dmar po bsgom// ma he'i zhal gyi sna bug steng rlung thur la sdig 'og rlung bsdams nas rlung de yar log pas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas
rlung de yar log pas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas rlung de gyen la log sna bug gnyis nas dmar nag 'od zer 'phros/ snang ba rten 'brel thams cad gsal bar byas/ 'od zer sna bug gnyis nas tshur bsdus
nas/ yi ge gnyis la thim pas de gnyis gsal bar bsgom/ sa bon dag la sems dge zung ba'o// de la brten nas nad sems bzung ba// snang ba rten 'brel dmar nag som snang byas/ bsdus pas snang
ba thams cad rang la bsdu/ rang yang g.yas pa'o rwa zhal gsum la thim/ de gsum ma he'i sna bug g.yas nas zhugs/ g.yon gyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yon nas zhugs// sku de thams cad yi ge gnyis

la thim// yi ge gnyis zhu thig le dmar nag gyur// de yang na da shin tu cha 'phrar gyur// sems gtad pa ni na da sems bzung ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ man ngag gi

gnas bdun gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gya brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdzogs rim byang chub snying po bshad// de kho na nyid sbyar ba la/ dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas zhes pa/ de la rnam pa gsum
ste/ zab dang rgya che zung 'jug pa'o// rgya che ba la sems gnas pa// dang po bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' de thugs na// sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas pa'i hU~M la
dmigs/ khrag rlung shas che hU~M nyid dkar dmar ro// de gnyis snyoms na 'od du 'bar// de la dbugs drug bar du sems bzung ba/ de yi 'od zer gshin rje gshed la spro// de la dmigs te de nas hU~M che

spro// de la sems brtan mtha' ma'i sngags la spro// de nas phyi ya yid dang nyi ma ye shes sems dpa' dang// dam tshig sems dpa' rnams la sngar bzhin spro// hU~M la sems brtan bar du bsgom bar bya'o// de
nas phyi yi gzhal yas zhing khams dang// snang ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun la spro// 'od de bsdus la ma he'i zhal du bsdu// de la sems gtad gsal ba'i bar du bsgom// gnyis pa zab pa nyid la

sems bzung ba// hU~M gsal snang ba rten 'brel kun la spro// lnga pa ltar spros snang ba bdag la bsdu// de bzhin rim par bsdus la hU~M de nyid// na da'i bar du bsdus la na da'i cha phra ba// shin tu mi dmigs
gsal zhing brtan par bsgom// gsum pa zung du 'jug la sems gnas pa// spro dang bsdu ba thams cad sngar bzhin bya// rgya che'i dus su snang ba rang rgyud dmigs pa yin// zab pa'i dus kyi na dus gcal pa
yin// de nyid snang ba rang bzhin med par bsgom pa'o// de stengs a dmar lte bar hU~M nag bsgom// steng sgo gnyis rlung mnan pa'o// sa bon dang ni thig ler sems bzung bas// sems de dngos
med byang chub sems su gsal// rang rig ye shes ma yengs gsal bsgom na// tshe 'dis sa bon byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// de kho na nyid sbyor ba la// shin tu mnyam par
bzhag pa yi// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// pho mtshan gyen sgreng zhes pa la// gdams pa gsum yin te/ don dam kun rdzob dbyer med do// kun rdzob sems gnas rnam gnyis// hUM dang na da la gnas
pa'o// dang po lha yi sku nyid ni// snang la gsal ba rang bzhin med// 'ja' tshon lta bu'i rnam par bsgom// de yi lte ba'i gnas nyid du// hU~M yig mthing nag gcig tu gsal// de stengs thig le dmar po
bsgom// de nas ma he sna bug ni// g.yas g.yon gnyis rlung mar bsdigs la// 'og sgo bsdams pas rlung de nyid// gyen la yar log hU~M la thim// hU~M las 'od zer dmar nag 'phros// dngos po thams cad
dmar nag gyur// tshur 'dus 'od zer hU~M la thim// de la rnam par sems gtad gnas pa'o// na da la ni sems gtad gnas pa'o// dngos po kun 'dus rang la thim// g.yas kyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yas

nas zhugs// g.yon gyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yon nas zhugs// de dag sku gsum hU~M la bsdus te thim// hU~M nyid na da ra gyur te na da stong pa nyid// de ltar gyur te de la sems gnas pa'o// don dam dag la

sems gnas pa// de ltar hU~M dang na da kun// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// chu zla lta bu'i rnam par bsgom// de yang dngos med skye ba med// stong pa nyid du sems gnas pa'o/// dbyer med ngang la gnas pa
ni// de ltar don dam kun rdzob gnyis// ma 'gags ngos bzung med pa ste// yod pa ma yin med pa min// yod med rtag chad mtha' las grol// dngos pos ma rig 'dus ma byas// byang chub sems nyid dngos
med stong// stong la ma zhen sems gnas pa'o// des ni chos sku rang grol ba'o// gzhan yang gsang sngags bzlas pa yi// sems bzung ba yi lugs gnyis te// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa byed dus su// dbugs
gnyis phar 'gro sngags bzlas pas// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal du zhugs// mchod phul rgyud bskul byin brlabs bsdus// tshur 'dus byin brlabs dngos grub bdag la thim// rgyun gyi bsnyen pa byed dus
su// dbugs nyid thub tshad mar bsdigs la// hU~M la sngags rim gsum gyis bskor// de las 'od 'phros khams gsum gyi// sems can don byas sangs rgyas mchod// tshur 'dus rnam shes dngos grub
'dus// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgoms nas// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya

dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ man ngag rig pa 'di bshad do// ye shes las kyi lha grub pa'i// rtags dang nyams kyi rim pa ni// dbang thob dam tshig mnyam bzhag sngags// rab kyis lha yi sku
nyid ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon du mthong// ci 'dod gsung zhing byin gyis rlob// de la rnal 'byor bsgrub pa pos// 'jigs pa mi bya ci 'dod slang// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'bring gis

gzugs brnyan 'dzum dang bzhad// lung ston rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur// tha mas zhin can mon pa dang// mi nag bya nag mchod rten sngo// rlung nag tshub ma 'brug sgra sgrogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma mthong bar
'gyur// gzhan yang go chas lus brgyan dang// lag na mtshon cha 'bar ba dang// seng ge la sogs gcan gzan tshogs// bdag gi drung 'khor pho nyar byed// sems gsal ting sran tshugs shing// snang srid

phyag rgya 'bar la sogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// de dus dngos grub blang ba ni// grub pa'i rdzas dang bdud rtsi dang// snying po lnga dang sha chen lnga// bza' btung longs spyod sna tshogs kyis// dang

pos lha la phyag mchod bya// de nas dngos grub rdzas rnams la// oM A hU~M gis byin brlabs te// ye shes las kyi lha rnams kyis// snying po bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor bar bya// bdag

gi spyi mgrin snying kha ru// yig 'bru dkar dmar mthing gsum 'phros// de las 'od zer gsum 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
po yi// gnas gsum sku la thim gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// 'od zer rnam gsum tshur 'dus te// bdag gi lus gnas gsum du thim// lus ngag
yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// spyi bor oM dkar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dkar po dri med 'od// khro bo zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
dkar// snying po oM dkar shel 'dra bsgom// mgrin par AHdmar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dmar po dbang dang ldan// khro bo pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs khar pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar// snying po a dmar

dbang ldan sgom// snying khar hU~M mthing 'od du zhu// sku mdog mthing nag drag po'i sku// khro bo'i nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs kar rdo rje mthing nag gdengs// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid dang gsum// gnyis
su med 'gyur mnyam par 'gyur// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub nyid// yang dag nges par thob par 'gyur// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// oM ya man ta ka hU~M ma hA kro d+ha badzra b+ha

ra ba kA ya badzra sid d+hi oM/ oM kA la ru pa a ma hA kro d+ha b+he ra bA ka badzra sid+d+hi oM/ oM hriHSh+tIHwi kro ta na na mahA kro d+ha badzra b+hai re ba tsit+ta badzra sid d+hi hU~M/ sa ma ya ho/ de ltar dngos grub mchog thob bya'o// gzhan yang
drag po'i sbyor ba yis// las kyi mtha' brgya btul ba ni// ling ga 'khor lo thun dang gces// rabs chad nag po'i thod par bcug/ bdud nag drag po'i gnas gtad na// 'thibs nad lkugs par gsod
par 'gyur// mon pa las byung thod pa bcug/ dur khrod gnyan po'i sar mnan na// glo bur glang thabs gsod par 'gyur// mdze can dmar chod thod par bcug/ klu nag po la gtad byas na// mdze shul phol
'bras nad kyis gsod// dri bo dmar chod thod par bcug/ yul btsan khan dmar la gtad na// gri rgod khram gyis gsod par 'byed// yugs sa mo yi thod par bcug/ klu bdud mtsho bdud mo la
gtad// rims dal nad kyis gsod par byed// 'byung ba'i lto gshags dbang chen mnan// 'dis ni gang yang tshor mi srid// hri ti bzhi bskor sngags kyis mnan// gzhan yang thun 'phang sbyor ba ni// de
bzhin thod par thun gtor sbyar// nad kyi bskal ba sha za'i tshogs// nam mkha' gang bas dgra la gtibs// don po srog gcod brlag par dmigs// gong bzhin thun gyi sngags kyis 'phang// myur du gsod
par gdon mi za// de skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ man ngag rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
pos// 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can la// bstod cing las bcol 'di gsungs so// snang mdzad tshil chen spos btang ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas nas// hU~M/ 'phags mchog khros pa'i rgyal po 'jigs
byed ni/ skye med rnam dag kyi dbyings nyid las/ 'gag med rang byung chen po'i skur bzhengs shig/ bdud 'dul dpal chen phyag rgya 'di ston cig/ sku mdog mthing nag mi 'gyur drag por mdzad// dbu dgu
gab pa mtshon cha gnad dgu 'bebs// dbus zhal ma he'i gdong khros khrag 'thungs ba// spyi gtsug khro 'jigs dmar po srin po'i zhal// steng zhal 'jam dpal zhal ser 'dzum khro 'jigs// rwa g.yas zhal
gsum sngon dmar ser po khros// rwa g.yon zhal gsum dkar dud kha gnag/ spyan gsum mche gtsigs sma ra ag tshom ser// smin ma khro gnyer glog stong 'od du 'gyu// g.yas zhal gsum nas hUM sgra rngam
bsgrags pas// stong gsum dregs pa ma lus bran du 'khol// g.yon zhal gsum nas phaT sgra rngam bsgrags pas// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs thal bar rlog par mdzad// dbus zhal gsum nas
phem mo'i sgra bsgrags pas// dur khrod ma tshogs thams cad dbang du bsdus// zhal dgus ha he khro gtum bzhad pa yis// stong gsum ma lus g.yo 'gul ldeg par mdzad// phyag gnyis glang po'i lpags rlon

'dzin cing bsnams// bzhi pa chu gri mi yi rkang pa bsnams// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig zhags pa bsnams// drug pa sta re ha sta bsnam// bdun pa mdung thung rgyu ma bsnams// brgyad pa mda' chen 'od khung
bsnams// dgu pa lcags kyu thams cad tshal bsnams// bcu pa dbyug tho dur khrod ras// bcu gcig kha T+wAM gsal shing bsnams// bcu gnyis 'khor lo me thab bsnams// bcu gsum rdo rje dril bu

'khrol// bcu bzhi rdo rje tho ba sdigs mdzub bsgreng// bco lnga ral gri 'phan rtse gsum// bcu drug cang te'u rlung bskyod pas// sna tshogs mtshon chas gdug pa kun 'dul zhing// dgra bgegs ma lus myur du
sgrol bar mdzad// bcu drug zhabs ni brkyang bskum tshul bzhugs pas// zhabs kyi dang po mi dang bya rgod mnan// gnyis pa'i zhabs kyis ma he 'ug pa mnan// gsum pa'i zhabs kyis glang po bya rog

mnan// bzhi pa'i zhabs kyis bong bu ne tso mnan// lnga pa'i zhabs kyis rnga mo bya khra mnan// drug pa'i zhabs kyis khyi dang khyung chen mnan// bdun pa'i zhabs kyis lug dang ri skeg mnan// brgyad pa'i zhabs

kyis wa dang bzhad mnan pa'o// 'jig rten byad dang dud 'gro thams cad gdan du mdzad// pho mtshan gyen du sgreng bas 'jig rten gyi// bdud bzhi zil gnon mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// gsang ba'i rdo rjes ma
mo re 'dod skongs// gcer bu mi 'gyur dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// 'jig rten lha dang gnod sbyin dregs pa can// mgo gcad thod rlon 'phreng bas do shal mdzad// thod pa skam po'i 'phreng bas rab brgyan
mdzad// dur khrod keng rus mang po'i rgyan chas mdzes// ye shes me dpung 'bar bas sred gsum bsreg/ rdo rje'i sku mchog khro gtum rngam pa yis// bdud dang mu stegs 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// bdud

kyi bdud sde bdud rnams sgrol mdzad pa// rnga sgra nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i pho mo zil gyis gnon// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// shin tu mi bzad gtum rngam

gar stabs bzhugs// tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// khro bo'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas snying khrag skyug/ ma mo mkha' 'gro bdud mo srin mo'i tshogs// dges pa'i gad mos dbang sdud bran du
khol// dur khrod sha za srin po ro langs dang// lce spyang stag dom kang ka bya gcan tshogs// sha za ma lus pho nya sprul par 'gyed// kun bzang 'jigs pa'i nga ro ha ha sgrogs// rngam pa'i rgyal po

khrag 'thung gshin rje gshed// rang byung 'gyur med thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan pa bshig pa thal ba rdul du rlogs// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal
'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i sku la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gcig pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten
la// rbod gtong ngan byed nang 'khrug tshe// phyir bzlog 'khor lo bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// 'di skad
gsungs pa ngas bshad bya'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por snang// nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i

lha// nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// nga ni nyon mongs bdud 'dul dpal// nga ni dus gsum mngon du byung// rnam par gzigs la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun pas nga sngar
byung// 'das dus sgron me'i bskal pa ni// me tog 'od ldan bya ba ru// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mgon// klu yi rigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya// nga ni dus gsum da ltar gsan// dus gsum dus med nga
yi dus// da ltar 'jam dpal dbyangs zhes bya// nga ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung// byams pa la sogs mos pa yis// bar gyi sgrol ma'i bskal pa ni// yon tan yid 'ong bya ba ya// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye
shes thugs// kun tu gzigs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya// de ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// ye shes sku nyid rang byung ba// gdul dka' drag po 'dul ba'i phyir// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por mdzad// dus
mtha'i 'jig rten snyigs ma la// byad sngags nus mthu stobs 'gran tshe// sngags pa stobs can rang gi sngags// rang la bzlos ste bsad pa yi// phyir bzlog 'khor lo drag po 'di// dbang bskur thob pas

bsgom par bya'o// rnam dag spros med mtha' bral chos nyid pas// b+h+ruM yig dmar ser yongs su gyur ba las/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu 'bar ba bsgom// de dbus mthing nag yongs gyur pas// khro rgyal

rdo rje 'jigs byed gsal bar bskyed// de yi thugs kyi rdo rje snying po las// phyogs bcu'i rtsibs las rang mdog hU~M yig spro// de nas phyogasas bcu'i khro bo gsal bar bskyed// rdo rje drag po smug nag 'khor lo

shar// rdo rje snying po ser nag rdo rje lho// rdo rje rgyal po dmar nag be con nub// rdo rje gtum po ljang nag ral gri byang// de bzhin shar lho lho nub byang// byang shar rtsibs la gnas pa'i khro bo

ni// rdo rje rnon po dkar ser kha T+wAM kha// rdo rje 'bar pa dmar ser me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'bebs pa dmar smug gsal shing bsnums// rdo rje stobs chen mthing skya dgra sta bsnams// de bzhin steng gi rtsibs la

khro bo mchog/ rdo rje 'chang rgyal mthing nag rdo rje gsor// 'og gi rtsibs la rdo rje nag po ni// nag po rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa bskyed// g.yon pa kun na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// kun kyang spyan gsum mche
gtsigs khro bo'i sku// me dpung klong na mi bzad 'jigs tshul bzhugs// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched drug kyang brlab// ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug mchod pa 'bul// 'khor lo myur du 'khor bas
bsgrub bya gcad// thog gzer me lce 'phros pas thal bar brlag nyon mongs dug lnga bdud bzhi gcad par bya// ma yengs rgyun du bar chad med par bzlas// des ni byad sngags thams cad phyir la bzlog/ de

nyid rang la nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// oM ya mA na ta ka hU~M/ badzra b+hai ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ hriHSh+tiHbi kr-i tA na na/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo na/ ra ra dza ni/ badzra u kra ya/ badzra gar+b+ha/ badzra rA dza/

badzra tsan to/ badzra khad ka badzra dz+wa la/ badzra ba sh+to/ badzra pa li/ badzra ka li/ badzra d+ha ro/ sarba man ta pra yo ga ma la sarba bag+h+ni na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ staM pa ya staM pa ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha na ha na/ tsakra wer ti

tsakra wer ti/ pra taM ki ra/ pra taM ki ra/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ badzra b+hai re ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ bi dwan sa ya/ bi dwa na sa ya/ bitsur+Na ya/ bi tsur Na ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ zhing chen ras la dug khrag gis// mi rkang bya

rog sgro rtsa yis// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu hU~M yig bri// mu khyud mtha' la phyir bzlog sngags// dug khrag ske tshe lan tshwas byug/ rtsibs mchan gsang mdzod// sngags bzlas don po'i sgrub khang mnan// rang sngags
phyir ldog brlag par 'gyur// gtsang ma'i ras sam gro ga la// g+hi hang ga bur gur kum dang// ldong ros dza ti cu gang gis// gong bzhin 'khor lo legs bris la// sngags bzlas bdag nyid dpung par
gdags// bdag nyid rdo rje bzhi srubs 'gyur// lte ba chos sku spros med zlum// rtsibs rnams ye shes rol par 'phro// bdud bzhi nyon mongs dug lnga gcod// kun grub chos kyi 'khor lo 'dis// bla med byang
chub yang dag thob// 'jam dpal thugs kyi snying po las// sprul pa'i ye shes 'od zer shar// zhing bcu sgrol zhing rnam rtog sbyong// rigs can sems dpa' chen po la// 'khor lo rgyal po yun du
gnas// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen
la// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis gsol ba// ril bu dud pa mig sman sogs// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar brjod// kuce bog pri yang ku// sha

la ki la mu ra dang// de ba ta ru pa tsa dang// tsa rong dang ni ku du ru// skar ma rgyal dang tha skar la// zhib btags ril bu grib bskams bya// sngags ni khri 'bum brgya rtsa brgyad// btab ste yon tan bsam mi

khyab// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// sngags dang sman bcas bshad bya ba// ha ti du ra ba lang dang// shil bal sa bon spu shel rtse// gri ha ko li ma than phal// u shi ra dang go shing ga/ sa na pa ta ku du ru// ha

rti yan lag mtha' dang bcas// de la sngags ni de bzhin bzlas// hri sti bskul tshig bcas pa'i mthar// rigs kyi rgyal po 'di nyid gdab// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ a ta te/ sa ra sa ra/ gra ha mu tsa bi sha swA hA/ oM

ta ta sa ra sa ra/ gri h+Na gr-i h+Na/ gra ha gra ha/ mun tsa na mun tsa na/ ha ra bi sha swA hA/ lha sgom sngags 'od sman la bstim// grangs rdzogs rab tu sbyor ba bya// sman mchog yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// de yi dud pa
bdugs byas na// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du 'grub// rims nad nyin gsum bzhi pa dang// lo dang zla ba'i rims nad dang// ma rungs drag po'i gdon rnams dang// brjed byed skem byed gnod byed
rnams// ma lus gdon mi za ba ru// zhi byed byams ldan gnod mi byed// rtag tu rang gi khyim 'dug na// 'bru dang longs spyod nor 'phel 'gyur// mi shis pa kun zhi bar 'gyur// shis pa rab tu thob par

'gyur// 'bru nor rin chen rab tu 'phel// dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed// ming ni gdon mi za zhes btags// gang du tshong byed khye 'tshol na// bdug sa phun sum tshogs pa 'dis// ci 'tshong ba yi zong
bdugs na// tshong 'don bdag rgyal phye mchog rnyed// rje sgor phyin na bkur sti thob// bsam pa 'grub ste bdag dgar 'gyur// gang la bdug pa 'dis bdugs na// 'byung po lha dang sha za dang// grul bum
hrul po smyo byed dang// brjed byed gnod sbyin sbrul gdug zin// kos sna'i sbrul gdug sdig pas zin// ka sha la dug rkang mangs dang// mda' dug brgyab dang dug 'thungs dang// khyi sogs zin la 'di
bdugs na// mthu chen rgyal po gdams pa 'di// rdo rje srin pos bcom pa bzhin// dug rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// gang du bdug pa 'dis gdugs na// byis pa 'chi byed sri can gdon// 'dir
'ong mi srid 'bros par byed// bud med rnams ni rtag tu bsrung// sbrum ma nad med bde bar btsa'// drag po'i gdon gyis glags btsal kyang// gnod byed nus par bstan mi 'gyur// mo sham
la bdugs bu rnams 'chags// dug nad 'phra men thams cad 'joms// byis pa nu zho mi 'thung du// 'di bdugs nu zho 'thung mi du// nad rnams thams cad 'joms sel ba'i// mthu chen bdug pa dam pa
'di// byin brlabs yon tan dpag med 'byung// rtag tu lha sgom bdugs byas na// lha dang bsrung ma rab tu dga'// khro tshig mi byed srung skyobs byed// bshags dang bskang ba'i mchog yin no// ma mo mkha'

'gro dges nas srung// sgrib sbyong ma 'ongs ye shes thob// yi dam lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// des na bdud rtsi mchog ces bya'o// gzhan yang yid rab sbyor ba ni// 'di bzhin rin chen zhes bya ba// d+hi man sa yi

ra sa sogs/ sa rdzi ra sa sra rtsi spogs/ ha ra hri dang ha ri tra/ ha ri ta la na la dang/ byol song mu tig so tra dkar/ na la lce pog 'dre 'jigs rnams// cha snyam zhib btags ril bur bya// grib ma la ni

bskams byas nas// rgyal po'i pho brang nang song na// rgyal po dbang 'du mang pos 'khor// mig la bskus na mtshan mo zhing// khyim nag kun na gnas pa yi// nor dang 'bru rdzas thams cad mthong// mig bskus
sa 'og gter rnams mthong// dpral bar thig le gnyis byas na// sngar ma mthong pa'i sgo dang phugs// thams cad phyed cing mthong bar 'gyur// klu yi gnas su bdag song ste// klu mo kun la ci 'dod
blang// bdag la ster zhing dgos 'dod 'grub// ril bu klu yi gnas bzhag na// char chen po ni 'bebs par byed// ser ba 'beb tshe sman chen 'di// bdug pas bdugs na 'chad bzlog nges// dgra yi khyim
sbas 'byed par byed// mtshan mo ril bu mer bcug ste// thig le gnod sbyin gnas phyin na// de yi nub mo gnod sbyin la// dngos grub ci slong ster bar 'gyur// dug dang sbrul gdug zin pa la// 'o ma dang
sbyar blud na 'tsho// mi bzad gdon gyis zin pa la// bdugs na 'dre gdon chab pas gtab// 'bab cing skyu bro gtong bar nges// bdugs na gang bdugs dgra de dag/ rab tu 'joms shing brlag par
byed// bdag gi lag g.yas rtag tu bsku// dbang du bya ba'i bsam pa dang// ldan pas reg na dbang du 'du// bskrad pa'i bsam pas reg na skrod// rlung chen langs na mkhar thog tu// sa rkos sbas na 'chad

par 'gyur/ chu bo che la'ang de bzhin no// oM hi hU~M ho phaT phaT/ a kar ri sha ya tha tha/ gzhan yang gang yin sbyor ba ni/ ku sma ba ti ha ri byi/ pa tsA k+shusen d+ha ba/ zi yan ha ti pi pi ling/ a sho kan d+ha ma

ri tsi/ pa tra ha ti ro tsa na/ tsher phran rtsa ba me tog bcud/ cha bsnyam ril bu bye sgong tsam/ grib ma la bskams sngags kyis gdab/ oM na mo ka ma de ba ya/ sarba A kar+Sha ya hU~M/ de nas las kyi sbyor ba
ni// sman des dpral bar thig le bya// grong du song yang mi rnams kyis// bkur bar 'os pa'i rgyal por mthong// ril bu 'thab pa'i g.yul bor na// pha rol dmag dpung 'joms par byed// bdag la mi
rgol btse bar 'gyur// ril bu chu chen 'ong sar bor// shwa rgal chu chen bzlog par nges// ril bu ser ba la bstan na// skyin 'dang ser ba bzlog par 'gyur// bud med khye'u skyes pa'i zho la bdar// mig
bskus snang srid thams cad mthong// mi dang lha 'dres bdag 'dras bdag mi mthong// ril bu zhib btags tsan dan sbyar// mgrin bskus tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar 'gyur// gang la'ang sbas te 'dis bdugs
na// dgongs pa ci dris legs par ston// byis pa shes ma bye ba ya// za ma mdun du re re sbyin// sems gsal gtsug lag mkhas la mdzangs// gdon rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs 'gyur// ril bu khar bcang
dpral bar bsku// ma 'ongs rig pa'i ye shes thob// mi dang lha 'dre la sogs rnams// mi gnod mi rkyen 'khur zhing brtse// gang bcol ba yi las byeda'agyur// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bya'o// des ni

gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// tri dang pu ru sha yis bcud// nyi zla 'dres pa de gnyis dang// pad ma'i me tog ro tra ka ku sma ba ti spos kyis gang// ho ti ro tsa na rnams
bsres// rig sngags gdab cing ting 'dzin bsgom// ril bu byas pa de bdar te// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// khams gsum lha yang dbang 'gyur na// dmigs pa gang yin smos ci dgos// oM bi dza ye

swA hA/ ba shang ku ru dza/ gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni/ sku sma d+ha ti ro hi ta/ ha ti ro tsa na dang sbyar/ ril bu sngags btab srin lag g.yon// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// khams gsum lha dang dbang 'gyur

na// mi la sogs pa smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// mos na 'u su ri yi spu// de brun 'gar rta spu brag bcud// pa tsa ku sha sha ta sus// sa dza ra sa bya rgyal brun ro tsha dri ldan rnam pa gsum// shing
kun dang ni ha ya'i rlung phyogs nas// dud pa btang ste bdugs byas na// sna yi dri tshor mi rnams kun// rang dbang med par dbang du 'gyur// shes pa dbang 'dus bka' bzhin byed// de bzhin lha srin 'dre

gdon rnams// gang gi sna yis dri tshor rnams// dbang du 'gyur bar smos ci dgos// mi dang lha 'dre la sogs kun// dri tshor dbang 'dus bka' bzhin byed// rab tu mthu chen gdug pa'i mchog/ sad+ya the dan/

dzad kyi man/ ki ka rang ma ha rang/ gi a man// sho sha ni sarba ha pa ti/ sho d+ha ni/ go pa shu man tra mi yan te na/ mu shu shu the pa tsa/ yid bzhin rin chen sngags zhes bshad/ gzhan yang rab tu sbyor

ba ni// pa tsa ku man ti ri/ ku sma ba ti ta ka ra/ ha ra te la ha ri ra/ u shi ra dang ro tra ka ka ru ka no hi na dang/ thang shing seng gog hA rA byi/ na ga ge sar mi ta ka ka ti byi tang a ka ru/ tsha ba gsum dang ro
tsha na/ cha mnyam gcig gi tshad kyi phyed/ byi shi bi gcin nang du bskol/ smin gyi bar du sa seb bzhag rak+ta'i ril bu zangs snod bzhag der bdag gang gi snar blug na/ sbrul gyis zin dang du 'thungs
dang// brjed byed 'byung pos btab pa dang// mda' ngan mo dang mo gsham dang// bu gcig las mi 'byung ba yi// des ni bu 'dzin gdon gdug sel// bu de gzhan gyis mi thub bo// khyim du rtag tu bzhag gyur
na// gang 'dod bdag nyid thob par byed// der ni byis pa mi 'chi zhing// bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// yon tan mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// yid bzhin rin chen lta bu'o// 'jam dpal khri

drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rma bya gong sngon nang cha phyung// a

dza nang bcug phyir brubs la// sh+ma sha yi me la bsregs// rma bya tshig nas a rdze lus// lig phus mig dang bcas pa de// dngos grub 'byung ba zhes ku ku ka la ha sta tsa ri// sa la btsugs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram// dri
chu lde gu grib la bskams// sho na ka yi bal skud tsam// mig la bsku zhing skye mgul gdags// lha yi mig gis kyang mi mthong// bdag gi mig nad kun sel te// gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan
yang rab tu sbyor ba na// sa 'dul brag gnas ro dag ni// ma rul bum pa sar par gzhug bzhi mdor sa rkos de nyid srung// sas g.yogs de stengs bdag 'dug la// gsang sngags nang du bzlas bya

zhing// maN+Dal steng du bum pa bzhag/ shar du kha lta rdo gtsang dgab// me tog rtsi thog snying por sbyar// ril bu bdun bya gser gyis dkri// sngags bzlas khar bcug mig sman bsku// mi snang gang gis mthong mi

'gyur// mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed// sa la gnas pa'i nor dang 'bru// drug cha rnams la dbang bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// dung chen nang du mtshal chen dang// dri chu sbyar te brnyes pa
la// sngags btab gong bzhin rten 'brel sbyar// dpral bar thig le mig bskus na// mi snang gang gis mthong mi 'gyur// bi sha rtsi yi khu ba dang// lig phu mig dang de bzhin no// sri ka la yi mkhris pa
dang// ha ti ro tsa nu dag dang// a dza na snas kha mnyams te// sngags btab dpral bar thig le bya// gang gis de ltar byas gyur na// lha mig ldan pas kyang mi mthong// de dag gsang sngags sbyor

ba ni// oM A li ka li gyi ni swA hA/ mgo pi ta dang sen dra ba// 'bri ha ti pa la dang gsum// zhib btags lus la btab gyur na// lha yang nges par dbang du 'gyur// ka ko kan da b+ha'u dang// til 'bru dang ni

ma ti rtsigs// ro tsa na ma nyams zhib btags te// bud med skyes pa gang yang rung// lus sam sha la bskus gyur na// gzhan rnams gang la yang mi lta zhing// bdag la brtse rung bdag dbang 'gyur// b+ha 'u pa

tsa arga rnams// cha bsnyams tsur na byas pa de// su ta'i 'o mas sbyar ba'i phye// mi dang lha dang dud 'gro dang// gang gis brtse rung bdag dbang 'gyur// b+ha hu ku sha pa tsa dang// tsur da ni tsa'i thal ba rnams// ma

he g+he ri du dus sbru// tsur na gang gi lus dag la// btab na dbang du 'gyur bar nges// pa tsa kub+ha hU dang// dud 'gro 'dab can ro tsa na// rtsa ri cha bsnyams rgyu skar ni// ba ra na yi nyi ma la// phye ma mar ngo'i

brgyad dag la// rgyal po dmangs sam bud med la/ kha ru blud dam sha la bskus// des ni nges par skye 'gro'i rigs// rgyal po drag po'ang dbang du 'gyur// bdag la mi khro brtse gdung dran// gzhan yang ha ta ro

tsa na// ku smra ba ta ka ta na la// gsil chen spos glang ro ta ka dza ti li shi ka dan la// pad ma gser gyi ud pa la// cha bsnyams phye ma sbrang rtsis sbru// min sman bdug pa thig le bya// de yi phan yon brjod mi
lang// mi dang mi ma yin rnams dang// sbrul gdug gcan gzan dud 'gro rnams// bdag gi dbang 'gyur bran bzhin byed// gnod byed bgegs la thar bar 'gyur// me chu mtshon cha dug la sogs// 'chi byed
kun las nges par thar// nad dal rims kyis thebs mi srid// ma mo mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin mo// bdag la dga' zhing gus phyag 'tshal// gnod pa'i bsam pa gtan mi rgyu// gang gis bdag mthong dga'
zhing byams// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// sgrib pa kun byang ye shes ldan// mig sbyar snang srid sal le mthong// des na rin chen rten 'brel 'di// rnal 'byor kun gyis nyams su blang// 'jam

dpal khri drug stong pa don gyis snying po'i rgyud las/ rten 'brel yid bzhin gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje rdo rje 'jigs byed de// las mi byed cing
'khu ldog na// mtshan ma ldog dang gong rkyen 'byung// nyams mi bde zhing snying mi dga'// de tshe rnal 'byor dam tshig gso// dbang bskur tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'gyod
tshangs ni// yi ge brgya pas mang du bshags// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang dang brjod// sa tsha sbyin gtong mchod pa bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed
la// spogs par bya ba'i rim pa dang// ye shes 'jigs byed la sogs pa'o// gang byed gnyis la mthun pa ru// dam rdzas gtor ma dkyil 'khor dang// sbyin sreg mchod pa gsar pa bsham// de nas gzhung
bzhin bsgrub par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur na// gnas bdun sa la byas pa yi// sngar gyi las kyi 'jigs byed dam// yang na gsar pa gcig byas la// sngags pa ye shes 'jigs byed kyis// thugs
las ye shes 'od spros la// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// las kyi 'jigs byed bkug la bstim// de la don po'i sha khrag sbyin// sngags bzlas las la bskul byas te// lho phyogs gom pa bdun bor
gyis// sa ru gru gsum dong brus la// nang du kha bub mgo lhor bstan// sbas te de stengs ye shes kyi// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis mnan bsgom// gdug pa'i shing la gtum me spar// mi yi rus pa'i sbyin sreg
bya// des ni gshin rje las byed 'gyur// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed kyi// sngar bzhin gzugs la dgug gzhug bya// drag po'i me thab gru gsum du// dur khrod gdug pa'i

shing sna la// dur khrod gtsubs me spar ba yis// rnal 'byor bdag dang me thab tu// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed de// rkang pa gnyis nas gtub byas la// sha chen tshil

chen bsgrub bya yi// dri chen ming rus dang sbrags la// sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad la sogs bya// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed des// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed de// gsol te snam nas bton byas na// rang dbang
med par las la bskul// las kyi gshin rje 'chi bdag bdud// ma lus sbran te dgra bo yi// gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra la nad mtshon char ba phab// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung zhing// rjes shul
med par byed par bsam// des ni gang yang brlag par 'gyur// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed la// spogs pa zhes su bshad pa yin// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed
la// spogs pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gsum// 'dug thabs sngags dang sbyor ba'o// 'dug thabs byad nas lho ru blta// skra bshig thal chen lus thugs la// sha chen mur zhing zhing chen bgo sngags kyi spogs pa
zhes bya ba// drag po rtsa ba'i sngags gsum mo// mgo mjug bzlog la bzlas bya zhing// de la gcod pa'i spu gri gdags// sbyor ba spogs pa zhes bya ba// gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams kyi// gshin rje'i
gzugs de'i snying kha ru// dur khrod ras la khrag dug gis// ya brus gzugs de bdag mdun bzhag bdag nyid rdo rje hU~M mdzad sku// zhal gsum phyag drug khro gtum bskyed// thugs ka'i hU~M las
'od 'phros pas// ye shes 'jigs byed gnas nas dgug gzugs brnyan de la yang yang bstim// sngags bzlas mchod pa gtor ma sogs// brnag pa'i sha khrag dmigs la dbul// drag po'i gru gsum

me thab tu// dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// bse dri can dang dug can shing// tsaN+Da li yi gtsubs me'am// dur khrod gdug pa'i me spar la// de dbus rdo rje hU~M mdzad sku// sngags kyis gsal bar rab tu
bskyed// shin tu khro 'gying gtum par bsgom// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed gzugs// hU~M mdzad ral gris rkang nas gtubs// zhal du gsol dmigs bsrog par bya// de lta ra bsreg grangs mtshan mas

dbab// sha chen tshil chen khrag chen dang// dmar nag skye tshe nyungs kar dang// don po'i dri chen ming byang bsregs// rdzogs nas rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi// sna nas ye shes 'jigs byed bton// drag po bsad pa la
sogs pa'i// las rnams kun la mngag par bya// thal bas gzugs byas ming byang brnag/ dur khrod gshin rje'i gnas su sba// des ni don po myur du gsod// log non drag po'i rab sbyor ro// oM badzra kro

d+ha hU~M/ ka ra dza phaT dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M/ ka ra ma hA ba la/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ rbad nan// rbad nan/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ rtsa ba swA hA'i sngags bar du/ brnag pa gang
yin gzhug par bya// 'di ltar log gnon sbyor ba yis// las dang ye shes gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam pa gnyis// rang dbang med par las byed de// don po mngon du gsod par 'gyur// de
skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog gi rgyud las/ log non drag po'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo yis// che mchog dpal la yang
gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag dpal// dpal chen gshin rje gshed rgyal po// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// 'phrin las 'khrul 'khor las rim dang// sbyor ba'i rnam grangs bshad du

gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// 'khrul 'khor rnam lnga ngas bshad kyi// legs par nyon la yid la zung// skye med chos sku'i rang bzhin las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul
gzugs skur bstan// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ bcom ldan gshin rje gshed chen gyi// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// rdo rje las byung 'khor lo mtshon// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i
phyir// dgug dang dbye dang bsad dang mnan// dbab dang 'phang ba'i sbyor ba 'phros// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa rang byung ngos shar zhing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka'

ba'o// lte ba thig le spros med las// rtsibs rnams ye shes rtsal du 'phro// 'khor zhing gcod phyir 'khor lo'o// gdug pa drag sngags dpal 'bar gyis// nyon mongs sreg phyir nyi ma'o// zhing bcu bsregs pas

nyi ma ste// lus sems gcod pas 'khor lo yin// bsgrub bya'i bya ba gang yin la// mtshan nam nyi ma bzhi bzhi 'grub// de phyir nyi ma bzhi zhes bya// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang chen thabs// 'dod pa'i don kun
'grub byed pa'o// dbang gi gnang ba thob rdzogs nas// dam tshig la gnas rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// dur khrod dgu 'dus tshal chen rtsogs// gnas der dge bcu slob ma// sbyor ba

drag po'i 'khrul 'khor brtsam// dur khrod ras la bam chen gyi// sme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// ni rangs su yi thal ba yis// mtha' mar rgya thang skya bcad de// mchog phran rkang gis pir bya la// snag tsha dug chu zhun ma

dang// bam chen don gyi khrag rnams kyis// rjes su mthun pa'i 'khor lo bri// snying po rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang// stobs chen mi 'bar 'khor lo dang// gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsum// re re la yang
rdzogs par bri// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor yab yum ltor// ma 'dres rang gsal kha sbyar la// dbangabaskur dar rtsogs chos drug bya// nye bar gyur pa'i yan lag yin// de ltar bca' ba'i las rdzogs
nas// tig 'dzin dgongs pas nyams ldan bya// nyi ma bzhi ru bskor byas na// drag po'i las rnams gang yang 'grub// thun mong dngos grub thams cad 'byung// gzhan yang ye shes 'khor lo bskor// byang chub
sems kyi rtsal snang bas// dug gsum rnam rtog dra ba gcod// byang chub mchog gi dngos grub thob// 'di dag pha rol gnyis yod phyir// dam pa ye shes 'khor lo bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa 'khrul

'khor chen po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bcu bzhi'i le'u ste dgu brgya bcu drug go/// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ sku yi 'khrul 'khora'adi bshad do// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni// 'gyur med 'dus ma
byas pa'i sku// rdo rje sku yi 'khor lo ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyir rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// tha ma

rtsibs chen bco brgyad ldan// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su khro bdag dpal 'bru lnga// phyi rim sku yi 'phreng ba dgod// rtsibs la gcod byed spu gri dgod/ kha sbyar dong rtsang kha la 'dis// g.yon
bskor sprul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dgug pa dag gi las bya'o// g.yas bskor sbrul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dbye ba dag gi las bya'o// g.yas bskor 'bru ded drag sngags bdun// gsad pa dag gi
las bya'o// g.yon bskor 'bru ded drag sngags bdun// mnan pa dag gis las bya'o// kun dril 'khyil pa sprul 'gros kyis// mtshan mo mda' zor 'phang pa'o// de bzhin dbab pa'i sbyor ba la// g.yas
bskor chu bril rta sgrubs g.yon// 'bru ded g.yas g.yon zor dang gzir// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro// bsrung gzir gdon dgug sdong la phral// gzir dang mnan pa'i las rnams
kyang// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded sbyar// gal te sngags pa nang rgyas sam// spogs na ro langs dreg po yis// 'bru rgod gcig bor gcig blangs la// stag mchongs g.yas g.yon de bzhin
bskor// spu gri la sogs de bzhin gdags// thon nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// rang rang mthun pa'i sa ru mnan// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// skad cig tsam gyis 'chi

bar 'gyur// skyin dang chu 'ang 'bebs par nus// stobs kyi rgyal po nyid kyang gzir// gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos// de dag gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// spu gri lnga char mthun pa yin// rtsa ba'i snying po 'di la

ste// oM a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha badzra hU~M phaT/ nri A kar+Sha ma hU~M dza dza/ a mu ka A yu dz+nyA na A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ A yu ka tir ya nir ya A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ a mu ka ru pa skan d+ha A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ dang
pos srog gi snying po 'gugs// gnyis pas tshe dang ye shes 'gugs// gsum pas bla dang shes pa 'gugs// bzhi pas gzugs kyi phung po 'gugs// srog gi lha de ba shag bi de sha ya phaT// gnyis pa pho lha

gsum ma lha// bzhi pa dgra lha dag dang dbye// hri sti ka pa ye pra ma/ mur tsa rak+ta tsa ra mA ra ya/ shi sha ku ru ni/ rbad ya/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ staM pa ya nan/ de bzhin dbab pa'i drag sngags ni/ phroM phroM hril hril yaM yaM

shar shar/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hu hril hril/ shag shar sen ya hril b+h+yo/ thibs thibs phroM phroM hril hril dud kar ru tra shu ti ya ma shar shar phob phob/ tsa pa ti ra hu la trig nan phob/ raka sha se tri dud kar phob/

na ga ra dza yul che ge mor pra pa sa ra pa tha ya d+ha ri sha ya phroM phob/ chu dril rta sgrub zor dang gzir// drag po skyin 'dang sngags bzhi yin// gzhan yang bsrung gzir drag sngags ni// dgug dbye mnan 'phangs de

bzhin las// khyab par gzir zhing bsrung sngags ni// 'bu sta bam hri sti ba to rak+sha tsa kra hU~M trig nan// de ni 'khor lo la dgod bya// shrI many+dzu/ ya ma rA dza e ka dza ti ya ma snying khrag sha truM mA ra ya ma ra du ma ra ya baM
ril rbad/ nang brgyas ro langs drag sngags so// de ltar spu gri'i sbyor ba yang// kun la 'jug par shes par bya// 'khor lo'i bskor thabs de bzhin du// mkhas pas rab tu shes par

bya// 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sku'i 'khor lo dang spyi'i spu gri'i le'u ste dgu brgya bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gsung gi 'khrul 'khor 'di
bshad do/// 'jam dbyangs rngam chen gshin rje gshed// 'gag med zil gnon rngam pa'i sgra// rdo rje gsung gi 'khor lo ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// 'khrul dmigs lnga dbus gnas pa ni// shrI

man dzu a kro dgod// phyi rim 'khrul dmigs bcu gnyis la// te ka ya man ta ka dang// ka la ru pa hU~M phaT dgod// mtha' ma rtsibs chen bco brgyad la// drag sngags spu gri gong bzhin dgod// rtsibs mchan
gcad bya gang yin dgod// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor sbrul gyi 'gros// de bzhin 'bru dang stag mchongs rnams// dgug dbye bsad mnan zor 'phang dang// chu dril rta sgrub zor dbab gzir// bsrung gzir

ro langs rnams la sbyar// thon nas mthun pa'i gnas su gtang// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM shrI many+dzu a kro te ka ya mAn ta k+sha la ru pa hU~M phaT/ spu gri la

sogs sngar bzhin te// 'jam dbyangs gsung gi thig le ste// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams// gang bsgrubs 'byung bar ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud chen po

las/ gsung gi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu brgya bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje che mchog gis// thugs kyi 'khor lo 'di bshad do// khro rgyal dpal chen gshin rje gshed// mi g.yo rang gsal thugs rje
'phros// rdo rje thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// dbus kyi lcags mkhar lnga po la// ye shes rdzogs brtsogs 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// de
bzhin thugs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// rtsibs la spu gri gang rung dgod// rtsibs mchan sgrub bya rtsa sbyar bya// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded dang// gcig por gcig blangs dkrugs de bzhin// dgug dbye

gsad mnan chu dril rta// zor gzir bsrung gzir ro langs rnams// de bzhin thon nas mnan gtad bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM hri Sh+tiHbi kr-i ta A na na hU~M hU~M

phaT phaT// khro rgyal thugs kyi thig le 'dis// dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar nges// 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu brgya bcu dgu'o//// de nas rdo rje
'chang chen gyis// yon tan 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// bcom ldan khro bdag gshin rje gshed// 'gag med lhun rdzogs rin po che// rdo rje yon tan 'khrul 'khor ni// dbus nas mu khyud zlum

po gsum// dbus kyi 'khrul 'khor mig lnga la// 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim 'khrul meg bcu bzhi la// yon tan snying po bcu bzhi dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs la spu gri dgod// rtsa sbyar mtshams
su a mu ka/ g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded dang// dkrug dang dgug dbye bsad mnan dang// chu dril rta sgrub zor gzir dbab// bsrung gzir ro langs spogs las sbyar// thon nas mnan pa'i las

rdzogs bya// gang brtsams las la thogs med 'grub// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn+ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hU~M phaT/ 'jam dpal yon tan thig le 'dis// mchog dang thun mong

dngos grub 'byung// de nas snying po yon tan rdzogs// nor bu rin chen lta bur bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa'i rgyud las/ yon tan gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu brgya nyi shu
pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'phrin las drag po'i 'khrul 'khor bshad// gshed chen khro rgyal dpa' bo yis// thog med rol pa'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje 'phrin las 'khor lo ni// dbus nas

mu khyud rim pa gsum// dbus kyi lcags mkhar lnga po la// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim lca gas mkhar lnga po la// me dpal snying po bcu gnyis dgod// tha ma'i rab la gang rung sogs/ kha sbyar 'dod
pa'i sgrub bya dgod// g.yas g.yon 'bru dad dkrug la sogs// bsad dbab bsrung gzir ro langs sbyar// 'khor lo de dag mnan pa'i thabs// bsad pa drag po'i las byed na// klu'am mtsho bdud btsan la
mnan// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i las byed na// yul lha klu dang dmu la mnan// bsrung gzir dag gi las byed na// bka' rten mgon po rgyun srang mnan// de ni gang 'dod las rnams 'grub// 'khrul 'khor

rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sa 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud las le'u ste dgu brgya nyi shu gcig go/ de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po ngan sngags 'di bshad

do// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// ngan sngags bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya// dben la gnyan pa'i dur khrod du// phung sa'i gru gsum sol chen thug/ rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// rab chad thod pa srubs
drug brnag/ dug dang tsha ba gsum gyis thug/ dkar nag thig le me 'bar 'brub// khrag chen myos pa gdug pa gsum// 'chi byed sna tshogs thod chen sbyar// dgongs pa ldan pas byin gyis brlabs// klu la
rtsogs pa'i chi bzhis sbyar// byin rlabs dang bcas drag tu bzlas// me 'bar khol lud rlangs pa dros// mthong nas brab cing srog rtsa bcad// nyi shu gcig nas gsod rtags 'byung// thon nas

ling ga gdug par mnan// zor thun dmigs pa'i 'khor la brdeg/ badzra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hri te kA la ru pa ya mAn ta ka nag po srog nan rtsa rbad dbugs khyer kri myags srog la mA ra ya rbad/ mi 'gyur nges

par dus bzhin gsod// de nas drag po mchog ces bya// de nas thugs mchog gshed chen gyis// rdo rje 'chang chen la zhus pas// dus ngan mtha' ma'i 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig kha ru// skye bo
bden pas mi 'dul te// dam tshig gnyan po mi gnas pas// dus der nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po ngan sngags mtshon cha rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas
kyang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gshed chen 'khor gyi gtso// dus ngan mtha' ma'i 'jig rten la// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// ngan sngags rdzogs pa ngas bshad do// 'di
nas lho yi phyogs rol na// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i 'og rol na// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas de na// lcags mkhar thod pa'i pho brang na// gshin rje rnams kyi grong khyer yod// las kyi gshin rje'i sde
dpon po// ro langs nag po zhes bya ste// smug nag mdog la shin tu 'jigs// ral gri sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags 'phyar// mig gsum mche gtsigs rtse gdengs pa// ral pa kham nag thod pas gdams// glang

chen zhing gyon stag sham can// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i do shal can// rgyu ma sprul dang rak+tas brgyan/// dur khrod me dpung glong na bzhugs// ro rlon stan la brkyang bskum tshul// las kyi gshin rje drug khri

gtong// mngag pa bran dang pho nyar rtsol// dur khrod kang ka lce spyang tshogs// yang sprul ro la gtod cing za// de yi kha nas ngan sngags kyi// mtshon cha drag po'i dbal byung ste// skye 'gro thams cad sgrol zhing
zos// de lta bu yi dregs pa des/ dpal chen ya man ta ka yi// spyan sngar srog gi snying po phul// bstan pa bsrung bar bro yis bor// de lta bu yi ngan sngags mtshon cha de// nga yis da ltar bshad kyis

nyon// babs ni ro langs rag sha snying la dbabs// ya ma rA dza snying la khug thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying myags tshal pa byi ma ya/ 'ub thum ril snying mgo chod/ kha la zod/ tshal pa snying rtsa ro la baM ril rbad/

ya ma rA dza/ che ge mo hri sti ya ma ta kri snying khrag la baM ril rbad/ ya ma ra dza snying rtsol rtsa ri me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza glo rtsa la baM ril rbad/ mchin rtsa rul snying la hri ting rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ rgyu rtsa khum/ snying rtsa

pra ma ya/ srog la de par rtsa snying la rbad/ rtsa rag sha khug snying ro la baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la tod pa rak+sha ma baM ril rbad/ aM ku sha dza/ snying la khug mchin rtsa bka' pa rtsa ro ma g.yas/ ro

la gsha' bkra me baM ril rbad/ khrag rtsa snying la bshos/ ro rtsa myogs/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ snying la to ru me ya/ ya k+She ya ta yo ni snying la to ru me ya/ ra ya k+She ya/ a kra me/ a

kra me/ snying la rtsa ro me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza rtsa la rod pa khug thum ril/ snying la rag sha me baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza snying la rtsa rtsa nan nan/ srog srog rmugs rmugs che ge mo khung thum ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa

to me ya snying la ro sha baM ril rbad/ che ge mo/ rtsa ba glongs glongs/ snying la khug bka' sa pa tshal pa/ snying la ro tsa baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza ni dza/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul
gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ lo rgyus drag sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu'o//// de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis// sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di bshad do// ngan sngags de nyid bsgrub 'dod

pas// dbang thob dam tshig bla ma mchod// dge ba bcu yi las rnams bya// bsnyen pa drod tshad thon tshad bya// dben la gnyan pa'i dur khrod du// ra'i rgod pa la maN+Dal brtsig khru gang khru do rag tas byug phung

po'i gru gsum khru gang ba// kha la thod 'phreng nang logs sbrul// gdug shing rtsang ni nyi shu gcig/ zur gsum gri lcags mchog shing gis// phur pa sor brgyad pa re dgod// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byug/ nang du

dug sna khrag snas byug/ de nang rgyu rten ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag dod// ming rus lo khams snying khar snag/ tsha ba gsum dang myos pas byug/ yugs sa mo'i skra'i thag pas bcings// bkra mi

shis pa'i thod chen brnag/ thig le dkar nag tsha ba'i 'bru// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang// rgyal po g.yung zhing 'chi rkyen dang// ni ra la sogs gdug khrag bzhi// bkra mi shis pa'i ka pA lar// drag po gnas
pa'i mtshan ma dgod// gud du bsrungs la zhing chen dgab// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal rdzogs nas// g.yon du shes rab sgrol byed ma// mdun du las kyi gshin rje ni// ro langs nag po 'khor bcas

bsgoms// las kyi gshin rje sha za bzhi// khrag 'thung srog gcod drug khri stong// mtshon cha sna tshogs srog la rngam// 'bru drug sngags kyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag thugs ye shes 'od zer gyi// gnas nas
bkug la sngags kyis bstim// kha nas ngan sngags 'brug char 'bebs// gsal bas sngags gsum gtor las bzlas// gtor ma khugs bcas dus gsum bskul// bdun bdun nyi shu gcig tu bzlas/// me
'bar 'od 'phro me stag mthor// rmi lam sna tshogs sgra snyan 'byung// klu bdud dmu btsan myos pas sbyang// de bzhin thun nang ya las bskyed// dgug bstim gtor la bskul dang btab// 'od

'phros dug nad rgya mtshor 'khyil// stong na thun brab dum dril bzlas/ khol dang sdud dang rlangs pa dros// zhing skra mchog chen pir gyis brab// srog rten khrag sbal me mar ni// nad mtshon dug dpal tsha tshar

'phro// zhu bcad de sbal bar gyur// brgya brgyad tshad ldan gtor bstab bskul// dngos sam phyugs bshas dud 'gro sha/ gsod pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang// ling ga zhing chen zhabs mas gril// thod pa dang
bcas gnas su mnan// mtshon nag 'khyil ba'i bdud mo la// mnan nas chur grir gsod par 'gyur// ri rul mchan snying bdag po la// gtad khang rti bas dag tu gsod/// byang bltas nyi ma mi 'char

zhing// rlung 'tshub chu mig klu nag la// gtad ma blo bur mdze grir gsod// yul btsan khang dmar gnyan po la// gtad na mtshon gri gzer thab gsod// lha khang 'dre can nang sbas na// smyo 'bog dran pa nyams

te gsod// kho rangs pha mes dungs kyi dkyil// mnan na kha phung nyal gyis 'chi// dus brgyad kha gso rgyun du bya// gzhan yang las kyi mchong chen ni// drag po las kyi 'brub khung de// ling kha 'bru gsum mi

rtar// sha tshil mi byang mar nag dug/ mjug ma la dz+wa la raM gsum gdags// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas te// thal ba ling kha gong bzhin mnan// thun zor dmigs pa'i rten la brdeg/ 'dis ni tshangs pa'i

tshe ldan yang// lo dus tshun chad 'chi 'gyur na// srog chags mi la smos ci dgos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ ro langs nag po'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga gcig
go/// de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis// gshin rje gshed gsum drag sngags bshad// gong bzhin rnal 'byor sngon byas pas// maN+Dal dbus su gru gsum bka'o// khrag chen rgya sol sbyar bas byug/ zur re
gshin rje re re dgod// de yang ji ltar yin zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen ya man ta ka dang// yum chen e ka dza ti gnyis// gnyis med rol
pa'i byin brlabs las// drag po gshin rje gshed gsum 'khrungs// 'gan dang pa ti stobs mchog dang// rkang pa'i rgyal po gsum du byung/ khams gsum dus gsum sgo gsum la/ dbang sgyur tshe srog bdag

por byung// sha za khrag 'thung srog gcod cing// srid pa kun kyang 'jigs par nus/ kha nas ngan sngags 'brug char 'bebs// bstan pa bsrung ba'i mtshon char mngags// skye 'gro thams cad sgrol byed pa// de

ni nga yis 'di bshad do// badzra ki li badzra bi ga ta/ mi sba nya tu tra ba sni/ badzra 'grim ra nu na/ g+hen g+hen rbad rbad/ shag thum ril ril/ shag pa sni mA ra ya rbad rbad/ badzra kI li badzra bi ga te/ ya

man ta ka hU~M/ ku ka ta pu hi/ ki kaM rbad thuri li ri li dza hi b+h+yo/ ka ma li shag snying kha rag ya ti Ta dza/ bi sna mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ardza na ki la ya hU~M phaT/ mu ti pa tu snying khag rag rbad/ ka mu li

shag snying rbad/ mgo shag ga ba sni mA ra ya rbad rbad/ de lta bu yi drag sngags kyis/ srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod de/ 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud las/ drag sngags byung khungs kyi le'u ste dgu brgya
lnga bcu nga gnyis so//// de nas dpal chen rdo rje khros// drag sngags sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bshad// 'brub khung gru gsum shar zur du// gzugs med khams la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i yid la mnga'
mdzad pa// 'das pa'i gshin rje gshed rgyal po// ga na pa ti dgod par bya// gri lcags thog lcags phur pa gzugs// de bzhin gru gsum lho zur du// gzugs kyi khams la dbang sgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i lus
la mnga' mdzad pa// de ltar gnas pa'i gshin rje gshed// stobs mchog rgyal po dgod par bya// seng ldeng smug po'i phur ba gzugs// de bzhin 'brub khung bya zur du// 'dod pa'i khams la dbang sgyur

zhing// 'gro ba'i dag la mnga' mdzad pa'i// ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed chen po// dga' ba'i rgyal po dgod par bya// mchog chen phur pa dag kyang gzugs// rtan drug grog mkhar bag phye la// ling kha ming rus
snying khar dgod// gan rkyal 'og rkang shar nub bzhag chags myos thig le gnyis thod chen// gtor ma rag ta gzhung bzhin bsham// dang po bdag nyid 'ga' na lta// sku mdog nag po dbus mthing ka/ spyan
rtsa dmar bzlog mche ba gtsigs// phyag g.yas gnam lcags phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon lcags kyi 'khor lo bskor// gsal bsgom drag sngags sum khri bzlas// tho rangs skya rengs shar tsam na// dpral
ba'i skra mtshams lcags phur gdab// ngan sngags phur bus mgo lus gzams// rtsa srog gcad de thal bar bsams// gnyis pa bdag nyid stobs mchog gshed// sku mdog sngon po dbus dkar po// mche

gtsigs spyan rtsa ser po bzlog/ phyag g.yas seng ldeng phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon zangs kyi 'khor lo bskor// der gsal zhal nas ngan sngags bsgrags// rkang pa g.yon pa'i bol gong du// skya rings seng
lding phur bsngags gdab// mtha' mar bdag nyid dga' ba'i rgyal// sku mdog dmar po dbus nag po'i// spyan rtsa dkar bsgrigs mche ba gtsigs// phyag g.yas mchog chen phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon
gser gyi 'khor lo bskor// des bsgom zhal nas ngan sngags bzlas// rkang pa g.yas la skya rengs gdab// nyi ma'i tshe la phur pa dbyung// thun la bsngags shing khung bur blug/ nyi phyed rgya tshil me

la mug/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mgo nas gtub// khrag gi thig pa re re dang// ming rus nas phyung li dum bsreg/ thal ba rlung 'phyar chu chen 'bab// gong gi gnas su mnan par bya// 'di lta bu yi ngan thabs

kyis// rab 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// zhag bdun zla bdun lo dus na// thal ba'i ling ga gnas su mnan// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nas shin tu gsang ste spyad// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul

'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gshin rje gsum gyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga gsum mo//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje gshed kyi drag sngags bshad// rA dza ha la yag sha ni// mi dbal

gshed chen zungs thar byed// ya ma chos kyi rgyal po ni// ma he nag po la zhon nas// brnag pa'i mgo 'khor rgyal sa 'dzin// bsal gshin nag po ya pa ti// bdag bting chu glang nag po zhon// khrag skyug byed

cing srid bzhi 'dzin// myos byed 'bar bas glang mgo can// dud kha rdo rje ro langs te// bran byas srid pa'i khog 'bubs byed// gshin rje gsod byed smug nag de// ral pa tshar dgu pho nyar gtong// sbrul nag

zhon nas gang dmigs pa'i// gsod cing srid pa'i byag byed do// gshin rje phya sangs chos kyi rgyal po yis// 'khor lam rgyud lnga skos dbang byed// ded dpon tshangs pa kun 'dres ni// nyi zla'i 'khor lo la zhon
te// srid pa kun gyi skos 'debs so// gcod cing sbyor ba'i las byed do// rtel pa ya ba ta'i 'khor na// dbugs 'phrog dbang po ther shag ni// rlung gi rnga mo la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi dbugs len

no// dam sri nag po gnod sbyin no// lcags kyi spyang zhon glang mgo'i 'khor// dbang po 'khar byed dmigs pa ni// smyo 'bog sha ba la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi bla rnams rku// mig dmar ral pa tshar dgu'i
'khor// srog gcod dbang po ma ru rtse// lkugs pa lug la zhon nas kyang// gang la bya ba'i srog gcod do// de ltar sprul pa yang sprul bcos// lha mchog ya man ta ka yi// bka' sdod pho nya mngag par
'khol// chos kyi rgyal po bka' sdod 'khor// ya ba ya ti gdan du bting// a ba glang mgo bran du 'khol// ral pa tshar dgu pho nyar 'gyed// phya sangs srid pa'i skos 'debs so// rtel pa srid pa'i dbugs

len no// rmig pa srid pa'i bla rnams rku// mig dmar srid pa'i srog gcod byed// de ltar dpal chen gshed 'khor na// las kyi gshin rje mi zad pa// dregs pa can ni bsam mi khyab// skye 'gro thams cad srog
gcod cing// bla rku dbugs len tshe 'phrog cing// skos 'debs sha za khrag 'thung byed// ngan sngags mtshon chas nad 'bebs cing// sgrol byed bstan pa gnyan po srung// gshin rje gshed kyi

'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las byed tshul gyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje che mchog gis// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa bshad// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas
su// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// gru gsum 'bar bar ling kha brnag/ mchog phur seng ldeng gri lcags phur// 'bru dang 'chi med myos pa sbyar// dang po byin brlabs rtags la dbab// dgos pa dang

bcas brdeg cing gsad// 'bru thun spyang thod myos pa phag/ 'chi byed mi shis thod chen no// phur pa dang bcas dgongs ldan pas// spyi bo snying kha lte bar dbab// rus dang ming snying khams la bcad// drod dang
ldan nas bsreg par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs rten thal ba// de bzhin ling kha gnyan sar gnan// thal ba rlung chu thun rten ma'o// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyis gsod// gzhan srog chags smos ci

dgos// slob dpon la skur smad byas na// bskal par 'bad kyang mi 'grub pa'o// de nas bla ma slob dpon bkur// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a kro te ka ya man ta ka a ba ye/ kA la ru ma mu kha la/ hri

steng a pa ye/ ya ma sa ma ya dza/ srog la gzir dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ oM hriSh+tIHbi kri ta A na na dgra bo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ shri many+dzu dza mAn ra ra ka ya mA ra dza/ e ka dza ti/ pe ta li/ dgra bo mA ra ya sod/ 'jam

dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyus las/ sku gsung thugs kyi gzer sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga lnga pa'o//// gzhan yang gsad thabs drag sngags ni// 'brub khung ling kha thod
chen brnag/ sha chen la sogs gtor ma bca'// srubs drug mi shis ka pa lar// sbyor ba btab la thun kyang bca'// thal chen bkram la byad rjes brtags/ khugs nas bdeg pa'i las bya'o// gshin rje
gshed chen khro rgyal gyis// las kyi gshin rje dbang med bkol// dgra la nad mtshon bskal pas gsod// sbyor ba thon nas bsreg mnan 'phang// bla ma bkur zhingadam tshig ma nyams rdug mi srid// lo yi dus

bzhin nges par sgrol// nyams na rang yang 'chi byed na// las de 'grub par smos ci dgos// de ltar drag po'i ngan sngags ni// ya ma rag sha ba hra myags/ ya ru phu/ ya ma tsa srog smugs ra sha na/ tsit+ta rbad/ khrag

la myogs/ thun b+h+yo mA ra rbad/ gshin rje gshed khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las kyi gshin rje'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga drug pa'o//// gzhan yang drag po gsad pa'i las// 'brug khung ling
kha kha thun rnams// gtor ma mchod pa de bzhin bca'// khyad par gdong dmar sho na dang// gsod byed mkha' lding phag lding phag don sbyar// ting 'dzin ldan pas byin brlabs bsgrub// dbab
cing gdab dang gtub byas te// bsreg mnan 'phang ba'i las bya'o// ma nyams lo dus 'gyang mi srid// nyams na rang yang phung bar 'gyur// des na dam tshig srog ltar srung// gdug pa'i drag po sngags rgod

brdeg/ ya man ta ka hri sti sarba kA la ru pa hri myags dgra bo mA ra ya sod/ ni sha ku ru ni rtsa rbad/ u nan khyer b+h+yo yaM raM hU~M rbad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las mchog 'dus pa drag sngags kyi le'u

ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga bdun no//// gzhan yang drag sngags sbyor ba ni/ dong thun ling ga mchod yon bsham// dug khrag snying thun phur pa 'bru// dgongs pa ldan pas tshad mas dbab// dag cing bsad las

bya'o// thon nas drag po'i shing rnams la// tsaN+Da li yi me spar bsreg/ thal ba la sogs sbyor ba bya// 'dis ni grib so dbab pa bzhin// cis kyang mi bzlog nges pa yin// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// ya

mAn ta ka kA la ru pa hri ti/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ du ru le/ dgra bo srog la thun rmugs mA ra ya rbad rbad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ ar la gtad de gsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga brgyad

do//// gzhan yang rno dbal gdug pa'i mtshon/ 'brub khung nang du ling ga brnag/ dug 'bru khrag phung snying thun brdeg/ srog dbugs me mar gsad cing rbad// shes pa dwangs snyigs phye la rta// dngas ma rab
'bring tha ma yis// chos nyid phyag rgya go char bya// snyigs ma gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// bsreg cing mnan te 'phang byas la// brag dang rdo la btab kyang 'gags// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// dam

tshig dbang dang slob dpon bskur// rno dbal drag sngags sbyor ba ni/ hri sti ya mAn ta ka tsit+ta sham shaM kA la ru pa/ a ni ani u ne u ne/ du ne du ne/ ma sha ya dgra bo rtsa la rbad rbad/ mA ra ya rbad/ 'jam dpal
