khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rang mnan drag pos bsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga dgu pa'o//// 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'chang chen

khro bo'i rgyal// khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// bsgom pa rnam par bkod pa las// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'i// mthar thug gang lags bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdo rje 'chang chen
gyis gsungs pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// gdul dka' 'dul zhing 'gro ba rnams// bla med byang chub thob bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor sprul// de yi mngon rtogs rim pa
la// rnam grangs mang yang rnam bzhir 'dus// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// mthar thug de kho na nyid do// he ru ka dpal khro rgyal gyi// mtshan bcas mtshan med bskyed rdzogs lam// gang

bsgrubs bla med byang chub thob// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// ri rgyal lhun po dur khrod gnas// byin chen mdangs ldan par// sngags pa dbang bgrod dam ldan pas// phyi bsgrub sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// dur khrod la
sogs gnas sa na// stegs bu rgya dpangs khru do gang// khrag sna bdud rtsi spos kyis byug/ ba sus thig gdab ni rangs kyis/ dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// rtsibs mchan mdzes ldan phyi nang

bskos// thod rlon rdo rje'i ra bar bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho dur khrod tshogs// de la gnas pa'i khro rgyal ni// dbus su bud d+ha he ru ka// smug nag zhal gsum phyag drug rngam// g.yas dkar g.yon mthing dbug
smug zhal// dang po 'khor lo ri rab bsnams// bar pa be con kha T+wAM ga mtha' ma dril bu sbrul zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas khro mo dbang phyug la// dur dmar

snying thogs stob cing 'khril// shar rtsibs badzra he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug khros// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje dgra sta phur pa g.yas// dbyug tho me dpung ril spyi
g.yon// dri za lha yi gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje khro mo dbang phyug ma// de bzhin yum kun 'thun par 'khril/// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
dbus ser zhal// rin chen gri gu cang te'u g.yas// gtun shing sdigs mdzub nyi ma g.yon// grul bum gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma'o// nub rtsibs pad ma he ru ka/ dmar
nag zhal gsum phyag drug brjid// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// pad ma lcags kyu rgyu zhags g.yas// tho ba zhing dbyug mdung thung g.yon// klu dbang chu bdag gdan la bzhugs// khro mo pad+ma
dbang phyug ma'o// byang rtsibs kar ma he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug gtum// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// ral gri rgya gram gsal shing g.yas// 'jig rten shag ti thod 'phreng

g.yon// gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo las kyi dbang phyug ma// kun kyang zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// stod smad glang chen zhing chen stag/ thod pa skam rlon dbu rgyan dang// do shal

rigs bzhi sbrul gyis brgyan// khrag zhal thal ba me 'bar dbus// dpa' sgeg bzhad pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// shar lho nub byang rtsibs mchan bzhir// ye shes khro rgyal chen po bzhi// shar lho gshin rje mthar
byed sku// mthing nag be con 'khor lo bsnams// lho nub shes rab mthar byed sku// ser nag dbyug pa spu gri bsnams// nub byang pad ma mthar byed sku// dmar nag zhing dbyug rgyu zhags
bsnams// byang shar bgegs mthar byed pa'i sku// ljang nag rdo rje kha sdengs gram// zhing chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// spyan gsum zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par

ldan// gru chad dur khrod rak+ta'i mtshor// ke ri brgyad dang 'phra men brgyad// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// gtor ma dam rdzas mchod pa'i rdzas// phyi nang gsang

ba rdzogs par bsham// dur khrod rgyan dang bu don dgram// zhing chen zhing chung bla re 'phen// ga 'u rgyu zhags thod pa'i rnga// tshil chen mar me gsur chen spos// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang// rak+ta bdud rtsi

phyi mchod lnga// de dag rdzogs par bshams pa ni// phyi sgrub rdul tshon brten pa yin// gzhan yang dung chen mtshan ldan pas// ging lnga pa 'am dmu lugs gnyis// rag ta bdud rtsi g+hi wang dang// spos sna tshogs

sman sna tshogs// bla ba shing kun chu gtsang sbyar// rang rang tshon rtsi kha dog gis// tshangs pa'i sbug tu badzra he ru ka/ dpral bar bud d+ha he ru ka/ rna g.yas rang na he ru ka/ ltag par pad ma he ru ka rna g.yon kar

ma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro rgyal mthar byed bzhi// mtha' ma rang rang sngags kyis bskor// gcig la de bzhin yum rnams bri// dung chen ga'u kha sbyar du// snying chen sar pa ma nyams par// rdzas des hU~M 'bru

bzhi dang// ha he b+h+yo phaT 'bru rnams dgod// bdud rtsi thig le btab pa yis// dkar dmar dar gyis brgyan pa la// rdzas de maN+Dal dbus su bzhag/ ga'u gzhal yas khang nang du// lha bskyed ye shes spyab
drangs bstim// de ltar rdzas bshams bsgom bzlas pa// nang bsgrub thod pa la brten yi// gzhan yang gzugs brnyan ma yin te// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la// ye shes lha rnams rdzogs par ldan// dbus

kyi thig le spros med la// khro rgyal bud d+ha he ru ka/ khro mo sangs rgyas dbang phyug ma// mdun gyi chos nyid rtsa dkar la// khro rgyal badzra he ru ka/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma// g.yas kyi ye shes rtsa ser po// khro

rgyal he ru ka/ khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma// rgyan gyi yon tan rtsa dmar la// khro rgyal pad ma dbang phyug ma// g.yon gyi rang rgyud rtsa gnag la// khro rgyal ka ra ma he ru ka/ khro mo las kyi dbang phyug ma// yab
yum rdzogs nas gsal bar bsgom// chos nyid g.yas su gshin rje gshed// g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub pa// ye shes g.yas su rta mchog dpal// g.yon gyi rtsa la bdud rtsi 'khyil// sul dang bar
mtshams mdud pa la// ke'u ri sid+ha dbang phyug sgo// de bzhin gsal zhing rdzogs par gnas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bstim// de ltar gsal ba'i dgongs pa ni// gsang ba snying gi
'khor lo bshed// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu brgya gcig go/// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mngon rtogs rim pa 'di bshad
do// gtor ma mchod yon dam rdzas rnams// 'dod yon lha mo byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// mnyes shing tshim par mchod pa dbul// phyi nang gsang mtshams dam du bcad// hU~M/ ma
rig nyon mongs las dbang gis// nag po gdug pa srid gsum bdud// bsgral zhing log rtog rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor mdzad// hU~M/ chos nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag/ ye shes dngos

med rang snang bar// chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// dbang chen lnga yi rim par gnas// snang ba rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i

tshogs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang// hU~M/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// gdul bya rnam sbyangs mthar bsgral phyir// ye shes rol pa rang snang ba'i// khro
rgyal gzugs skur bzhengs su gsol// hU~M/ ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor tshogs// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings las bskyod med gshegs su

gsol// hU~M/ skye med chos sku dag pa las// ye shes khro rgyal rngam pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings las bskyod med gshegs su gsol// hU~M/ skye

med chos sku dag pa las// ye shes khro rgyal rngam pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rab snang dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brtan par
bzhugs// hU~M/ ye shes khro dpal dkyil 'khor la// gdugs mchog me tog ye shes sgron// dri chab gtsang bshos mchod pa 'bul// thugs rjes bzhes mdzod dngos grub gsol// hU~M/ snang srid ye shes rang
shar ba'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsam mi khyab// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las grub pa rtags// ye shes gar gyis mchod par bzhes// hU~M/ rang byung rnam dag dug lnga sel// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i

sman// dug lnga bdud rtsi mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod par 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// hU~M/ chos kyi sku la rang shar ba'i// ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// bcom ldan dpal chen
he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwA ri dbyings kyi yum// gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i// khro ba'i rgyal po shes rab thabs// gtso 'khor yab yum sprul pa bcas// gnas yul phyag rgya dbang phyug tshogs// pho
nya phyag brnyan bran g.yog bcas// khro bo'i 'dus tshogs dkyil 'khor la// bla med mchod pa 'bul ba ni// snang srid mchod pa'i longs spyod mchog ye shes 'dod yon sna tshogs snang// phyogs bcu rab

'byams rnam dag zhing// rin chen gzhal yas dpag bsam shing// 'gro drug lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// snang srid kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin// gzugs mdzes sgra snyan bsam mi khyab// dri zhim zhal zas rol mo
tshogs// reg bya mdzes pa sna tshogs brgyan// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// hU~M// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sbyor

ba'i// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'dul las// bde ba chen po rab gsal nas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor mnyes gyur cig/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su ka pU tsa ho/ bud d+ha he ru ka hU~M/ khams gsum bskul ba'i zhing gyur

rnams// khro chen sprul pa'i byin brlabs rnams// khro chen sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bsgral te rnam shes dag par sbyangs// sha khrag lus po mchod pa 'bul// ma hA pany+tsa/ hU~M/ snang srid rtsi bcud zhal zas tshogs// sha khrag sna tshogs
'bru bcud 'chang// ro mchog brgyad ldan bza' btung mchog/ 'dod yon lha mo mdzes ldan brgyan// stabs byed gar bsgyur glu dbyangs len// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su

gsol// hU~M/ khyad par rmad du byung ba yi// 'bru thog longs spyod gtor ma dang// sha chen khrag chen sna tshogs dang// sa yi snying po ra sa ya// zhal zas mchog chen mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor
la// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// hU~M/ ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyi// nyams shing 'khrul pas nongs bgyis rnams// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor

du// gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// tshangs pa bzhes la dngos grub gsol// e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan/ ma hA shri he ru ka badzra kro d+ha tsa ya/ ma hA ka ru ni/ kra ti sha ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya staM/ oM ru lu ru

lu hU~M/ dza hU~M ba~M` ho/ sa ma ya mu tra b+han tsa kra hU~M phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/ badzra Ta ki ni hri sta ya/ sarba badzra kro d+ha ta/ a kaD+D+ha ya/ akaD+D+ha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ toM sha ya hU~M b+h+yo/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ dza

hU~M paM ho/ sa ma ya man d+ha la hU~M dza/ ma hA su ka a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya staM/ talhan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ nir ma kA ya/ ma hA kro d+ha rA tsA ya/ dza hU~M baM ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA ban tsa badzra sa ma ya/ mu tra ma

rang pra ban tsakra/ dz+nyAn badzra ma ha ba la ti/ krod+ha rA tsa ya/ he b+ha ga wan/ ma hA kro ti shwa ri dz+nya na d+ha ki ni prad nya da du badzra da ra/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ bAg k+She ya/ bi tong sA yA/ bi tong sA yA/ bud+d+ha

k+She tra staM ba/ a ka taM ba ka/ sarba ma hA badzra kro d+hi/ ka ya badzra kri ta ya/ wAk+ka badzra a kra ya/ tsit+ta badzra tsan da ya/ dza hU~M baM ho/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi sha mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khang ud ga te/ s+pha ra na i maM ga ga na

khaM swA hA/ oM shri badzra ra ga d+hU pe du/ puSh+pe pung/ A lo ke hri/ gan de gan/ nai pi d+ye A/ pu tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ mu tra pu tsa ho/ sarba ta tha ga ta ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta/ rba na kha raM hri ka sa badzra si

ti oM/ wak+ka badzra si ti a/ tsit+ta badzra si ti hU~M/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA pu tsa me ka ya ra na/ badzra swa b+ha wa Ad ma ko\u0f85haM/ sa ma ye swA hA/ dza hU~M baM ho/ ma hA pu tsa ho/ badzra sa ma ya/ ma hA ma sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma

hA ba su ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA me thA mahA pan tsa a mri ta/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ a li mu li/ ha la ta ba ti/ bi ba to/ sa ma ya kha ha ho/ i daM ma hA ba ling ta/ gr-i h+na gr-i h+na/ khA hi khA hi/ b+hun dza ho/ pra ti dza ho/ sa ma ya

hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ sha ra laM ga tsa me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las rim pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnal 'byor bsam gtan rim

pa bshad/ rang bzhin rnam dag chos nyid las// dpal chen khro rgyal he ru ka/ ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur zhing// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// khro chung khrab chags bzhin du brtan nas// thugs khar
'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang// rdo rje rtse dgu kha gdengs dang// rin chen zur brgyad 'od 'bar ba// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbang gi cho ga/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang khu gnas// ye shes sems dpa' rigs kyi

mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bo'i sku// mthu mar rang sngags 'phreng ba dang// bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer gyis// chos kyi dbyings nyid rab 'byams su// sangs rgyas
rnams kyi thugs la thim// mchod phul rgyud bskul dngos grub bsdus// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro don bskul// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// tshur 'dus rnal 'byor thugs sogs thim// lus ngag
yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rdzogs// mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bsgom// mchod dang bstod pa sum yar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo ci nus bskor// de ltar gsang sngags

bzlas tshur ni// rang rang sngags dang bsgom dbyangs brgyad// tshom bu thig le stong brgya bcu// gtso 'khor dag kyang de bzhin no// dril ba'i snying po kun la bsdeb// 'di ltar ma yengs bsgom bzlas na// de

nas ring po mi thogs par// ngo mtshar drod rtags nges par 'byung// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang// yi ge 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid// tshe 'dis myur du thob par 'gyur// oM d+harma kA ya shu dz+nyA ta

dz+nyA/ na mo ta na/ bud d+ha ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ka ya a ta ri sha dz+nya na mo ta/ badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM saM bo ka ya sa man ta dz+nyA na mo ta na/ rat+ta ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA u kra

ya hU~M phaT/ oM bo d+hi ka ya pra ta ba sha dz+nya na mo ta na/ pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ka mahA kri ta hU~M phaT/ oM nir ma ka ya krin da dz+nyA na mo ta na/ karma mahA shri he ru ka ma hA rak+sha hU~M phaT/ oM bud d+ha thad ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+hi shwa

ri ni hU~M phaT/ badzra rat+na pad+ma karma da ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri hU~M phaT/ hU~M ya man ta krid pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ hU~M pad mAM ta kr-id hu lu hu lu phaT/ hU~M bi g+h+nAn ta krid tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM d+harma d+ha du dz+nyI na kA ya ma hA

bi ra shri he ru ka badzra ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ prad dz+nya ma hA kro d+hi sho ri/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa la ti/ hU~M he he phaT b+h+yo/ ma hA yo gi ni/ ma hA d+ha ka na/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ khro rgyal yab yum la sogs te/ thams cad
'dus pa'i snying po sngags/ ye shes dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur/ byin brlabs dpag med sangs rgyas sa/ ye shes bla mnon par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ bsam gtan

gsang sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ mthar thug de kho na nyid bshad/ oM ye shes lhun grub nyid/ a zhes chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par snang mdzad de ni

rigs// khro rgyal bud d+ha he ru ka zla tshes mnyam nyid ye shes te// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin rigs// khro rgyal rat+na he ru ka rna ru kunartog ye shes te// snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma'i rigs// khro rgyal pad+ma he ru

ka/ thig le me long ye shes te// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i rigs// khro rgyal badzra he ru ka bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te// don yod grub pa las kyi rigs// khro rgyal karma he ru ka/ rang 'byung ye shes rang shar

ba'o// sa rus sangs rgyas spyan nyid de// bud d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri'o// khrag chu mA ma ki nyid ni// rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri'o// me dang drod ni gos dkar mo// pad ma kro d+hi shwa ri'o// rlung 'byung dam tshig sgrol ma ste// karma kro d+hi shwa

ri'o// rnam rig nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma/ badzra kro d+hi shwa ri'o// 'byung ba chen po ye sangs rgyas// de ni phung po skye mched khams// gdod nas sangs rgyas ye shes lha// rang gnas dkyil 'khor rtogs par
bya// rtogs mchog ma spangs gnas su dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// snying po'i thig le gsang sngags kyis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// dpal
chen khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ mtshan don lhun grub chos rnams rdzogs// he zhes dngos med byang chub sems// chos nyid ma bcos rnam dag dbyings// sgrib med ye shes rab gsal
bas// thams cad der rdzogs dgyes pa che// ru zhes thugs rje kun la khyab// rang bzhin thugs kyi mnyam nyid las// dmigs pa med cing phyogs rigs bral// chags med chags mchog rgyal po'o// ka zhes
rol pa cir yang snang// sna tshogs rang snang ngos bzung med// thabs mkhas 'phrin las rnam mang bas// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dngos po rnam dag ma bcos

pa// dngos med mu mtha' med pa nyid// rang bzhin stong chen mtha' yas 'das// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos dbyings de// chos dbyings kro d+hi shwa ri ste// gnyis med bde chen byang chub sems// dbyings nyid ye
shes dbyer med pas// dpal chen ye shes mtshan rdzogs pa'o// oM ni 'khor 'das chos thams cad/ gnyis med byang chub sems su gsal// snying po byang chub sems nyid de// rgya ma chad cing phyogs ma
lhung// rang byung ye shes rang gsal bas// skye med 'gag med thog mtha' med// rang byung kun khyab 'dus ma byas// 'khor 'das ma lus snying po gnas// de nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ lhun grub rang rig ye
shes gnyis// ma 'gags rang snang gnyis med pa'o// 'khor 'das chos kun dngos gzhir shar// rig pa brdal khyab ma bcos pa// phyogs med rang snang snying po ste// 'khor 'das kun gyis sa gzhir
gnas// ru lu 'khor ba'i rnam shes brgyad/// gnas kyi ma mo ki ri brgyad// ma spangs gnas dag rang bzhin te// chos nyid byang chub sems nyid gsal// ru lu yul brgyad snang srid chos// ye nas gnas dag

'phra men brgyad// skye med rnam dag chos nyid de// mtha' la 'das pa'i chos nyid do// hU~M ni yul sems rang snang kun// byang chub sems nyid rang snang bas// he ru ka dpal ngo bo nyid// gnyis med byang chub

sems su gcig/ b+h+yo/ sna tshogs rig pa'i rang bzhin te// rig pa stong gsal ma 'gags shar// de nyid dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro snang ba'o// hU~M/ sna tshogs cir snang de bzhin nyid// ma

bcos rang snang ji bzhin nyid// phyag rgya bzhi ldan ye shes te/ rang rig rtsal ma 'gags pa'o// de nyid rang byung ye shes te// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o// de nyid rang gi sems nyid de// rang sems ma bcos

mnyam par bzhag/ rig pa brdal khyab ngos bzung med// cir snang ye shes ngo bor shar// ma yengs ji bzhin ngang gnas na// mdzad spyod ma chags blang dor med// ma bsgrubs chos sku lhun gyis grub// rdzogs
sku sprul sku shugs las 'char// 'gro ba las dag thams cad la// mngon par snang de don mdzad do// de dag tshe 'dis 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud

las/ mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste dgu brgya bzhi'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ drag po las kyi rim pa bshad// phung sa gsum gyi 'brub khung ni// gru gsum rgya dpangs khru mtho gang// kha khyer
dang po thod rlon 'phreng// bar pa mtsher rtsa srin mo 'gros// mtha' ma gdug pa'i sbrul rigs bzhi// phyi nang dug khrag sna tshogs drug/ dgra la rgyu rten drug ling ga/ bgegs la gang gnod rdzas kyi

gzugs// mtho gang dbang po dod par bya// gro ga ming byang khong par brnag/ tsha ba gsum dang dug sna tshogs// nad khrag sna tshogs byug par bya// khram thod bcug la dong du brnag/ dug rgod sbyang dug ra dug

pa// 'ol mo re lcag ba spru ba// mon pa kha byung thod par bsham// mi yi nang khrag sna tshogs dang// gcan gzan sna tshogs ra khyi rta// khrag sna snying sna gri thod sbyar// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang// ji

tse shang tse rdo lcags zangs// phye gsum rabs chad thod par sbyar// gri thod lcags phur seng ldeng mchog phur pa dug khrag ngar blud bsham// bdag nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ las byed pho nya sprul pa'i tshogs// shin tu
rngam khros mi bzod pas// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung bsam// des ni brnag pa gang yin pa// rang dbang med bkug rten la bstim// ling ga dgra bgegs dngos su bsam// dug thun bud med 'jigs tshul

rngam// khrag thun sha za srin po'i tshogs// 'bru phye mon dang mon mo'i tshogs// shin tu 'jigs khros mtshon cha thogs// nad kyi bskal pa 'bebs byed cing// dgra bgegs srog gcod sha za bsam// phur pa khro
bo'i 'jigs tshul rngam// smad dbal lcags sa thog ltar bsam// drag sngags brgya thun stong thun dbab// srog lus rdul phran brlags par bsam// de nas phur pas gdab par bya// srog lus go cha phyag rgyar

bskyed// 'di ltar drag sngags sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang// skad cig gcig la 'chi 'gyur na// dgra bgegs rnams la smos ci dgos// ma ma trag rag sha kha lding nag mo// rag mo shan pa

dgra bo la mA ra ya dza dza// rag sha rbad ling dgra bo snying khrag tshal pa rbad/ ru tra ma tra mA ra ya ha li ha li dgra bo la dun b+h+yo ma ra ya rbad/ badzra kI li ya tig sna ha na ha na nri ma ra ya rbad/ bsad pa dregs pa can la
gtad/ gzir ba bka' gnyan mgon pi la'o// thun 'phangs sprul pas nad mtshon dbab// nad byo sngags mthar skabs kyis brdeb// drod tshad ldan byas myur du 'grub// bskal pa nyi shu'i tha ma la// sangs
rgyas mu stegs bdag gzhan sdes// lha srin dregs sngags pho mo rnams// mthu rtsal stobs ldan dmod pa 'bor// sprul pa sha zan skar ltar 'khrug/ dmod ba'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab// byin

brlabs mthu stobs me ltar 'bar// sngags pa rdo rje dme 'thab byed// de tsho rang gi byed sdebs sngags// phyir la bzlog cing de nyid bsad// 'khor lo drag po 'di bshad do// rang bzhin rnam dag chos nyid

las// brub yig dmar nag yongs gyur las// dbang drag 'khor lo rtsibs bcug pa// rno la rgya chen me 'bar ba// lte ba hU~M yig yongs gyur las// dpal chen bud d+ha he ru ka/ yab yum sangs rgyas dbang phyug

ma// gsal rdzogs bsgom pa'i thugs kha nas// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la hU~M bcu 'phros// de dag yongs su gyur pa las// shar rtsibs badzra he ru ka/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug bsgom// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ khro mo

rin chen dbang phyug bsgom// nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka khro mo dbang phyug pad+ma bsgom// byang rtsibs karma he ru ka/ khro mo las kyi dbang phyug bsgom// shar lho gshin rje mthar byed gnas// lho nub shes rab mthar
byed gnas// nub byang pad+ma mthar byed gnas// steng rtsibs gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur// ser nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// spyan gsum mche gtsigs rin chen brgyan// 'khor lo ral gri phyag na
bsnams// lha chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'og rtsibs rdo rje hU~M mdzad de// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas// rdo rje dgra sta phyag na bsnams// ma bdud gdan brkyang bskum bzhugs// ye

shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched brlab// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// bdud rtsi myang zhing bstod pa bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba de// drag tu 'khor zhing

gang dmigs pa'i// lha srung rig sngags bcad bzlog gsad// de bzhin dur khrod rab la bri// rtsibs bzhi lte bar hU~M bcu gcig/ mu khyud nang mar rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi mar spu bri'i drag sngags dgos// rig

sngags drag po smra bcad bzlas// bdud bzhi nyon mongs dug lnga gcad// rang byung 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsad pa dang// byang chub bsgrub pa'i las rnams 'grub// rgyu rten ling ga

ming byang bcas// snying khar mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gzhug sgrub khang rgyun srang rten la mnan// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// na ma sa man ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra he ru ka ni/ oM A hU~M badzra ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/

shrI he he ru ru ka ka ma hA tsan d+ha u kra ye hU~M/ badzra kro d+ha pa la ti ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nya/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA yo gi ni tsiN+Da DA ki ni/ hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo/ tsakra war sti/ tsakra war sti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/

pra ti ki ra/ pra taM ki ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma tha ma tha/ nA sha la/ nA sha la/ ha na ha na/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ 'khor lo bskor zhing sngags bzlas pas/

'byung ba'i rgyun kyang phyir bzlog na/ sngags byang sbod gtong smos ci dgos/ rang 'khor bsrung zhing nyon mongs gcod/ bla med byang chub yang dag thob/ don kun 'grub byed 'khor lor bshad/ 'jam dpal khri

drug stong pa rdo rje snying po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i 'khor lo'i gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga pa'o//// de nas ya ma ra dza yis/ rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// don po
lha srin dregs pa la// gtad pa'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyod nyon cig/ brnag pa lha srin dregs pa la// gtad pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis// pho la
gtad dang mo la gtad// pho la gtad pa brgyad yin te// las kyi gshin rje la gtad dang// lha la gtad dang bdud la gtad// rgyal po la gtad btsan la gtad// gnod sbyin la gtad klu la gtad// mgon
po nag po la// gshin rje la gtad sbyor ba ni// zhing lpags rten 'brel rdzas kyis byug/ dug khrag sgro rtsas 'khor lo bri// dbus su brnag pa'i ming byang gzugs// rtsibs bcur drag sngags grangs phyed

dgos// gshin rje nag por lto bar bri// rgyu rten ling ga spyi rus cas// 'khor lo tshil chen gu gul byug/ mi rta la sogs snying sna tshogs// dam rdzas sha khrag gtor ma bsham// gsur chen btang zhing drag sngags
bzlas// nag po 'jigs tshul be con thogs// ling ga dgra bo'i dngos su bsams// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung gsod// gshin rje'i bskul ba gang rung btang// dur khrod lhor bltas dmyal chu khol// tsha sgo
khu rlangs ngam grog dmar// der ni 'khor lo ling ga mang// de la las bcol gnyer gtad bya// des ni yun rings mi thogs pa// gang gtad glang thabs nad kyis gsod// oM a kro to ka ya man ta hri ti ka la

rus pa hU~M phaT/ ni ya ma ra tsa ni/ khug drol shrI kro d+ha ha b+hi dza ya khams thums// nri 'gal byed gsod/ 'gal byed gtso bo kaM kar thums/ ya ma baM ri la/ ya ma baM ri li/ ya ma sa to me/ ya ma phu to me/ ya ma

khrag to me/ ya ma mug to ma/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ myag dum pu rbad/ oM shrI many+dzu ya mA rA dza sa to me yang yaM yaM thuM thuM/ dgra bo'i snying la dun b+h+yo/ mA ra ya dza/ lha la gtod pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod ras la rdzas kyis
byug/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i sngags rnams ming// ling ga ming byang bya rgod 'brong// lug dkar ra sha'i sha khrag snying// 'bru gtsang nas 'bras gro nyungs kar// dkar gsum mngar gsum gtor ma
gtang// dkar po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo can// sngags bzlas gsur gtang lha chen bskul// ling ga dgra srog srog gcod gsod// sha za khrag 'thung rlag par bsam// gangs ri brag dkar

yang rtse ni// rtse mthon rgod lding gtsang yul du// thod chen dmar chod mi shis par// 'khor lo ling ga bcug la gtad// hur thums nad kyis myur du gsod// oM ma hA de pa pra ma rag sha ya/ a sa pa ya tri/ i

dra rag sha a la pa ti ya/ de ba rA dzA ma hA na Shi/ badzra ti badzra laM/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha pra ma na/ ma hA de ba kA la tsan d+ha ya ha ri ha ri/ dgra bo mA ra ya thums rbad nan tsit+ta tshal pa rbad/ bdud la gtad pa'i sbyor

ba ni// dom nag pags pa rdzas byug ste// bya rog sgro rtsas 'khor lo bri// rten 'brel sngags dang ming byang dgod// kang ka skyung ka mkha' lding gnag/ lug nag ra rog g.yas rog po// dom nag mon dang rabs
chad nag/ rta nag khyi nag sha khrag snying// gtor ma 'bru nag rgyan ldan bsham// nag po 'jigs tshul khram thogs bsgom// sngags bzlas gsur gtang bdud pho bskul// dgra bo bdud gcod sha khrag za// ri
nag brag nag mas 'jigs// mdun na mtsho 'tshe nag po 'khyil// byang bltas ri mgo mdud pa 'dra// der ni rabs chad mon thod du// ling ga 'khor lo bcug la gtad// 'thibs nag myos pas myur du

sod// ka la ru tra mA ra ya/ kA la ru tra pra ma ya/ kA la ru tra rag sha dang/ dgra bo'i snying mgo chod/ du ru du ru/ ha ra ti ha ra ti/ dgra bo'i snying la dza/ kA la ti pa tsa'i/ dgra bo'i snying la baM ril rbad/ ha na ma ho

'bi li ma khu ru buM ru/ ru ru tra tra du ru du ru/ ru tra ru tra ka la sha pa tri baM ril rbad/ ka la her haM baM ril/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad dze/ rgyal po la gtad sbyar ba ni/ smya 'bog shi ba'i shun pa la/ rdzas kyi 'khor lo

rtsibs brgyad bri/ sngags dgod ming byang bri/ rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas/ rang lugs bya khyi rang shi dang/ smyo 'bog shi ba'i sha khrag snying/ dam rdzas gtor ma rgyan ldan bsham// dkar po 'jigs tshul ral

gri thogs// sngags bzlas gsur gtang rgyal po bskul// ling ga don po gsod cing za// de ltar brlag byed shul med bsam// lha khang rnyings pa lha 'dre can// rgyal po yod nges sa der ru// smyo 'bog thod par

'khor lo dang// ling ga brnag ste gtad byas na// smyo 'bog nad kyis myur du gsod// ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo/ ma hA rak+sha rak+ta tsa ru mun tra ma hA shi ri ti rtso ka tsa/ la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya hab hab/ mA ra na pra ma

ra tsa tsit+ta ba ling ma ya aM ku sha dza dza/ snying shag tshal pa dug myong mA ra ya rbad/ btsan la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni/ dri bo'i pags pa rdzas kyis byug/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sngags rnams dgod// ling ga ming byang
ra dmar rta// bya dmar lug dmar gro bo ni// rang shi sha khrag snying la sogs// dam rdzas gtor ma don por dmigs// dmar po rngam pa mdung dmar thogs// sngags bzlas gsur gtang btsan
rnams rbad// ling ga dgra bo dngos su bsam// btsan gyi srog gcod sha khrag za// ri brag dmar po gong gsum 'dzoms// la btsas spyi btsas gnas pa yi// gri thod 'khor lo ling ga dag myur du brnag pa gang

yin de// gri rgod gzer thabs nad kyis gsod// tsa ra de ba a pI shus ma ya tsa ra baM ni a bi shu a na na tri tri sha rbad/ badzra ra shan ting sa na d+ha ra shu na tsi na 'bis ma ku ru dza/ tsa ra sho le baM ril pa ya trang le rtsa

dur ya chur tring tsaM ya/ tsa ra tsa ra ki ta yaM/ ka ra ti phar yaM/ thod yaM shaM dgra bo khyer ya/ mA ra ya sod/ gnod sbyin la gtad sbyor ba ni// zhing lpags rdzas byug 'khor lo bri// rtsibs brgyad sngags dang ming byang

dgod// ling ga rgyu rten ming dbye bcas// mi rta spyang khu 'phar gsa' wa// stag dang dom gcan la sogs kyi// sha khrag snying sbyar gtor ma bca'// ljang nag 'jigs tshul ral gri thogs// gsur gtang sngags
bzlas gnod sbyin rbad// don po srog gcod sha khrag za// lcags ri nag po rkang gcig shing// brag dang chu 'thab nyams mi dga'// chu srin kha stengs 'du ba ru// 'khor lo mu za'i thod par gtad// blo bur

nad du gyis la myur du gsod// ma hA yag sha rA dza ki ta ya/ tri sha ru tra badzra yag sha sa ma ya/ ru tra shag tshal pa b+h+yo/ rag sha rag sha tshal pa b+h+yo/ rag sha snying ku ru badzra yag sha tshal pa kro ta ya/ snying kha la rag sha

hur la b+h+yo/ badzra yag sha sa ma ya/ nri dza dgra bo snying thum ril mA ra ya dza/ klu la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni// mdze can shun rdzas 'khor lo bri// rtsibs bcu sngags bri ming byang dgod// ling ga ming byang rten 'brel

bcas// zhing lpags stag pa'i shun pa la// rdzas byugs 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// ling ga ming byang drag sngags dgod// sbal sbrul mi sha khrag snying gi gtor ma mdze khrag ling ga byug/ nag po mgo dgu sbrul
zhags nad rkyal thogs// ling ga dgra dngos nad 'bebs shing// sha za khrag 'thung mdangs 'phrog bsam// gsur gtang klu rgyal nag po bskul// chu mig byang bltas nag por nyid// myur du mdze nad/ a a

gzha' la ka la chal pa mA ra ya/ kra ta nA ga dza la dza la dgra bo tshal pa mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA ga nA ga dza la dza la/ dgra bo mA ra ya phaT/ be rag sha dza la hU~M/ dgra bo tsit+ta dza la khrag skyug pa tsa pa tsa mA ra

ya rbad/ mgon po la gtad sbyor ba ni// zhing lpags rdzas kyis 'khor lo bri// rtsibs bcu sngags dang ming byang dgod// rgyu rkyen ling ga ming rus brnag/ ra rog g.yag rog lug nag po// mi rta khyi nag sha khrag
snying// gtor ma dam rdzas drag po drug/ nag po khro bo be con thogs// dgra bo srog gcod sha khrag za// sngags bzlas mgon po drag tu bskul// lha khang gnyan po byin chen gyi// mgon po nyid kyi

zhabs 'og gtad// myur du gsod par the tshom med// badzra yak+sha de ba ma khar ha ka wa ga na gu ti sa ma ye/ ma ho ko la kro ta ya/ ma hA kA la ra trir tri ma ta ka la drud ka ra tsa ya/ a ka la ma ti ma la dza/ ma hA kA

la/ dgra bo'i snying khrag la thum ril/ mA ra ya rbad/ mo la gtad thabs bzhi yin te// mtsho bdud mo dang klu bdud mo// dur khrod ma mo mtsho sman ni// de dag gang la gtod byed kyang// nam bu'i shun la rten

'brel gyis// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu rtsibs sngags dgod// dbus su don pa'i ming byang gzugs// rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// bya nag lug nag nal dre'u mdzo// rang sha'i sha khrag snying gis rdzas// gtor

ma rgyan dang ldan par bcas/ dug sna nang khrag gzugs la byug/ bdag nyid lhar sgom ma mo bdun// ling ga dgra dngos srog gcod gsod// sha za khrag 'thung shul med pas// trag rag+sha kha mun tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru he

mo a lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo/ shur mu he ma ya b+h+yo ru lu/ na ga ta na he ma b+h+yo ru lu/ yag+sha kro d+ha b+h+yo/ ru lu snying kha rag srog thun b+h+yo ru lu/ ma b+h+yo sri thun b+h+yo/ rdo rje lcam cig pad+ma gsal/ nag po dbu dgu thod zor

'phen/ nad kyi rkyal pas nad 'bebs ma/ mtsho bdud snying bdud ma la gtad/ badzra snying mgo chod kha la zom mun za don ti rbad/ yu na dan ting rbad/ da ra rnga rbad/ thib rnga rbad/ sha khrag tig sna rbad/ gnyan gyi

yum cig klu 'bum bsil/ mtsho sman ljang mo tri shul thogs/ rgyu zhags thogs pas mi zad ma/ mtsho sman rgyal mo'i lag tu gtad/ tshal pa duM khrag ti rbad/ tig sna rbad/ shag ti rbad/ shag ti rbad/ rba na rba na

rta tha rbad/ dum bu dum bu tshal pa rbad/ rag sha rag+sha ru tra rbad/ snying nag snying nag srog rtsa rbad/ tshal pa tshal pa nye ni rbad/ ba ral dam pa dum bu tig sna tsag rbad/ nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro dbyings rum

gsil// srid pa'i bu mo sngo bsangs ma/ 'jigs tshul tri shul ban da dmar/ klu bdud phu bdag mo la gtad/ shri tsa tsa ru thun ling khug thum ling/ guM thuM rbad/ sha rbad gug tshar ling mug rbad/ myog tshar ling mA

ra ya rbad/ ma ma rak+sha ru tra rbad/ rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' 'gro bsil/ dur khrod bdag mo tsa mun tri// nag mo 'jigs tshul ral gri thogs// rgyu zhags 'phen zhing dgra srog gcod// yugs mo'i thod pa mon thod
dang// rabs chad thod pa gri thod du// gu gul ling ga 'khor lo dug/ sna tshogs bcug ste gza' skar ngan pa la// bsgrub bya dngos su gsal byas te// gang yin dregs pa pho mo yi// lag tu gtad de zas su
bsngo// dregs pas dgra bo gang yin de// rjes shul med par zos par bsam// des ni zla bdun tshun chad kyis// gri rgod rims nad smyo 'bog dang// mdze shu gzer nad slugs pa yin// dgra bo

gsod par the tshom med// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba yang snying gi rgyud las/ pho mo gtad khram gyi le'u ste dgu brgya bcu'o//// nya stong brgyad la gtor thun zor// dgra rtags byung bar kha gso

bya// brag kyang 'gas la rgya mtsho'ang 'chol// srog chags srog gcod smos ci dgos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// drag sngags rnam lnga'i le'u ste dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa brgyad
do//// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// rno dbal bzhi pa drag sngags bshad// dur khrod mon khros brag nag tu// stegs bu gru gsum ling ga bca'// skam thun gsher thun de bzhin bca'// ting 'dzin rim pa
gsal bsgom ste// rno dpal sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// rtags mthong phur pa btab la btab// gru gsum gdug shing gtum mes sreg/ thal ba ling kha mnan zor bya// de spyi'i sbyor ba yin/ khyad par gshin

rje'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod phung sa byin chen sa// las kyi gshin rje gnas sa la// khrag snas sbrus la gzugs byas te// mgo dgu nag po khro tshul 'jigs// mi ro'i gdan la brkyang bskum 'dug/ thod 'phreng

sbrul brgyan zhing chen gyon// ral gri rgyu zhags phyag na bsnams// de ltar gzugs bya bsgom par bya// mi rta la sogs sha khrag tshogs// 'bru sna'i gtor ma bdud rtsi dmar// sum yar nyin mtshan mchod btab

bzlas// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang sod// ling kha dmangs rigs klu la gtad/ kha gso nya stong brgyad la bya// rno dbal drag sngags dmod mo ni// hri sti hur yaM klad pa la har har/ dmu phud yaM shig sing nga

ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsa sha mu la/ dgra bo srog la shag shag rbad/ mA ra ya b+h+yo/ gzhan yang las kyi gshin rje ni// lto dkrug sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ling ga thun sogs de bzhin bca'// mi gsad pa dang gong

gsum pa// la btsas mchod rten bzhi mdo la// dug sna khrag snas sbyar byas te// nag po mche gtsigs drang srong gzugs// zhing chen g.yang gzhi thod 'phreng sbrul// ral pa kham nag mi ro'i gdan// g.yas pa be
con 'khor lo g.yon// gzugs bya de bzhin bsgom par bya// gong bzhin gtor ma mchod yon btabs// rtags byung ling ga gnyan chen gtad// khyo ga grir 'chi bud med smyo// bu tsha rnams ni phyags mas

'debs// de dag gdug pa'i dmod mo ni// ya ma tsa sha me to ru na k+She ta ni ra yo ni to sa ra/ dgra bo u nan phrog phrol rtsa rbad mA ra ya rbad nan/ gzhan yang ma mo spyi yi lto// dkrug pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba
ni// 'brub khung la sogs de bzhin bca'// mtsho chen dur khrod ri nag la// dme gsum khrag lag na thogs// nad rkyal 'phongs la bkal bar bya// dme gsum khrag gis gzugs brnyan
bya// nag mo rab can 'jigs tshul can// re lde'i gos la zhing phran brgyan// thod 'phreng dre'u phyin phyogs zhon khram bam thod bag chags 'bru gtor bsham// mchod bstabs bzlas shing thun brdeg
gsad// ling ga mtsho bdud klu bdud gtad// stobs chen nyid kyang 'jigs par 'gyur// rims nad rlung ltar 'tshubs te gsod// de dag drag sngags rno dbal zhing// rag mo rgyu thum gzer thum rgyu lu ma/ kha

sha bam rim dgra bo sreg khyer b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin ltodakrug gi/ rno dbal drag sngags sbyor ba ni// dong rtsang ling kha thun la sogs// de bzhin bshams la sbyor ba bya// gong gsum bzhi mdo
la btsas mchod// dur khrod re hrul sa rnams la// rgya rog dkar dmar ra khrag sbru// dmar po 'jigs tshul seng ge zhon// ral gri snying sbram lag na thogs// gcer bu snying gi 'phreng bas brgyan// gzugs
brnyan bskyed la drag sngags bzlas// thun brdeg gris gtub phur pas gdab// thon nas dur kha gri btsan gtad/ kha gso la sogs sbyor ba bya// gtor ma bshos bu mkhar thabs bzhag/ dmar po zur gsum

dkar po ni// gru bzhi lden pa de ltar gsum// ra lug sna tshogs sha khrag brgyan// sum yar bstab bya dmigs pa'o// rno dbal dmod pa'i drag sngags ni// da mun ha du sti rag sha ya tsa thum thuM ra tri ru shag kri

ka ra shu la ma ma baM hi mang du ru/ dgra bo tsit+ta ro myags rbad mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo/ dregs pa can gyis sbyor ba ni/ me lce btsan dug khol ma 'dra// dam nyams rang srog nyams par 'gyur// dam nyams dus las 'gyang
mi srid// 'jam dpal khros pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ dregs pa bzhi sreg gi le'u ste dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas rdo rje dpal chen pos/ mtha' rgya bsdus pa 'di bshad
do// drag po bsad pa'i mtha' rgya ru// mnan gtad las kyi sbyor bas btul// de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// khrims ldan btsun pa dgrar langs na// bud med yugs mo'i thod par bcug/ dme khrag bskus la

zhabs mas gril// lha khang rgyal the la mnan na// smyo 'bog 'chi bar the tshom med// sngags pa nag po dgrar langs na// mdze can dmar chod thod par bcug/ dug dang rme ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ dmangs ris nag

po'i klu la gtad// bsrung khog mdze shus 'chi bar nges// mi yi rgyal po dgrar langs na// ma smin mi yi thod par gzhug/ dug sna byugs la zhing lpags gril// mtsho bdud klu bdud la gtad na// lkugs dang smyo
'bog rims kyis 'chi// bon po dgrar langs rme ba'i rdzas// sna tshogs tshil chen byug byas te// rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ brag bdud dur bdud la gtad na// 'thib nad drag pos

'chi bar nges// skye bo phal pa dgrar langs na// dri bo dmar chod thod par gzhug/ gri thag dug sna tshil chen byug/ gong gsum yul btsan la gtad na// gri rgod dag gis 'cho bar nges// bud med dri mo'i thod

par gzhug/ dug sna khrag sna mngal khrag byug/ lha btsan bdud btsan la gtad na// lcebs sam khyo pos gsod par nges// gshin rje gshed kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mtha' rgya
bsdus pa'i le'u ste stong tham pa'o////
